body: We tried several Keto apps & found this one to be the most user friendly. It lets you program in custom recipes, quickly scans barcodes and clearly charts each category.

title: Accountability, Support and Perspective
body: These three words are so important when it comes to dieting (a term I use loosely here).  As a Wellness Practitioner I assist people daily in their food intake focusing on Bio-individuality.  There are three things I find they struggle most with:

title: Excellent
body: I was recently told my blood sugar was getting too high.  Got the tools to monitor it with and found that I was skipping too many carbs some meals and over doing carbs at other meals. This was leading to sometimes tired or jittery feelings. (Blood sugar was erratic throughout the day)

title: Love this app
body: I really love this app. It is very easy to find the foods I need to input and when I can’t I love just scanning the barcode. It is very easy to use. It was easy to input my exercises too and it subtracts from daily calorie intake which is optional you can choose for it to not. The only thing I don’t like is the fact it charges you for premium and in that is their recipes but if you google a certain recipe they have on the list you can view it for free on google. So it should really just be added in the free version. But other than that I have no complaints and I really love it. It’s the best app I e ever found.

title: Premium is awful
body: Don’t buy the premium plan. I have been trying for months to get a meal plan generate and populate my calendar and shopping list and haven’t been able to get this to work since I purchased it last April. Don’t waste your money it will just frustrate you and you will never get your money back. I saw my meal plans one day and then they vanished and the meal plan still had foods in it I can’t eat. I don’t normally write reviews but I have to stop others from wasting their money. I’ve tried since the first week to cancel and get my money back but there was no option. Horrible. Update I just now received a response from their customer support which as you can see is long after this review. And of no help now that my subscription expired. I got no use from the app and paid for nothing. Very poor customer service
response: Thanks for contacting us! Please note that after you apply a meal plan, you need to individually log items (tap the three dots next to the food in your Daily Log, then select Log Item). To exclude foods, please be sure to select all variations of a food under the Exclude Ingredients selector, or use the Food Aversions field. If you're still unhappy with Premium, please contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll assist. Thanks!

title: Keto Novice thriving
body: This app is amazing for so many reasons. I’m pregnant and needed a change to manage my sugar cravings and help balance my blood sugar. This app helps me keep track of my carbs as recommended by my midwife and helps me figure out what I need to change if my body doesn’t respond well. I love all the comments from people who have done Keto and help guide newbies like me with great tips in staying the course as well as ways to make the recipes and stay the course.

title: Very cool carb tracker!
body: This app is great for keeping your carbs in check!  I’m doing Keto/low carb diet. So that’s a big plus for me! This would be a 5 star App if they made entering a little bit easier. Maybe if it could remember what you ate the previous day so you could just copy and paste it to the next day. (I’m still new to it so it might have this feature) Also, if you could text a meal to one another. My wife created a delicious dish last night and added it into her tracker. It would of been cool if she could text it to me instead of me having to look it up on my app. But that’s just me, maybe I’m being lazy lol And asking too much from a FREE low carb tracker app. Great app!!

title: Upgraded app is not as awesome as the original
body: When I first bought this app I felt like it was worth every penny I spent for the full features...but since the upgrade you have to weigh every bit of food you want to record...that is not how I cook I measure with cups now it won’t let you measure that way...I am not going to rewrite every recipe I get to try to figure out what the weight is...now it is useless to me...skip this app unless you want to add the extra step of weighing all your food then converting it back to cups for recipes you make!!! Ok after working with the new app again I see the problem...in the old app you could set the serving size to what you were actually eating in the new app I cant do that ...even after support told me where to locate the “setting” it doesn’t work...PLEASE GO BACK TO THE OLD VERSION IT WAS AWESOME THIS IS NOT!!!

title: Helped me lose 3” off my waist in a week
body: I’ve never done any kind of diet before, but after gaining about 50lbs I realized I needed to make some lifestyle changes. I’ve been trying keto and this app in addition to my cheap little food scale have been indispensable to my success! After one week on Keto I’ve lost 13lbs, 3” from my waist, feel more energetic and balanced throughout the day (no more crashing!), feel full throughout the day after my meals with no urge to snack, and best of all I feel way less depressed and anxious. Will continue using this app probably forever, it has made managing my nutritional needs SO easy.

title: Second time Around
body: I used Carb Manager for about a year prior. Decided to try and not track and discovered I need to track to stay on track. There have been lots of improvements since I last used CM. The free version is a good way to test if you like it and the premium is not overly expensive for a year and I highly recommend it if you’re serious about losing weight and watching your carb content. I love that I can easily copy foods from one day to the next. I’ve uploaded recipes of the net which is super simple too. This app makes it very easy to track and know what your carb load is.

title: Has been excellent for keto diet
body: I have had the Lose It app for years and happily paid for Premium version because the app & its features are great.  That app, however, is just not targeted enough to accurately track the keto diet macro & micronutrients.

title: After 1 month!
body: I’ve been eating Keto for 2 months but found this surprising gem of an app a month ago. Using it has made counting nutrition so much easier! I’ve encountered an error and reported it, and Ken and the support staff have gotten back to me quickly and efficiently. In truth, I’ve made some of my own problems by not experimenting enough. But now have found answers and work-a-rounds for all my needs! And the monthly subscription cost is budget friendly for those like me who want the premium version. Meal planning made easy, as well as adding your personal favorite recipes! Thank you Carb Manager!

title: Incredible!!
body: Well, this app tops them all. It’s a one stop shop combining all of what other apps lack. What I appreciated the most is a time stamp of when you eat your meals and /or snacks. You can track supplements. More importantly, it has more items in the inventory than all others. I don’t it’s appropriate perhaps to name them. But, you’re not having to manually enter every item, every time. Massive time saver. There are so many other great features, but I’ve found my app. Only thing I don’t like are the colors used in the app, in the grand scene of thing, it means nothing compared to its functionality. Thumbs up Emoji!!!

title: Essential to my Keto learning curve
body: I am new to Keto and the carb info and tracking capabilities of this app have been invaluable to my achieving and maintain Ketosis.  I cannot count the number of times that this app has saved me from eating a portion of some food that I thought was okay.  The “Scan” function is awesome.  The only complaint that I have is the erroneous carb info that someone entered for a barcode that made me cringe when it calculated me to be over my carb limit for the day...  but the app allowed me to enter the correct info directly from the label as well as submit a revision through the app.  I am truly appreciating this app.

title: Keto Beginner
body: My sister lost so much weight last year and I finally got to the point that I need to do so too. I knew that keto really works because I seen the proof and how she looks and others that I know, which is why I’m on the keto diet too. My sister told me about ‘carb manager’ and said it was a must because of the tracking that it does and the meal planning. So I added the app to my phone and begin my journey and I am so happy it’s two weeks now and I am finding so many wonderful meals that are quick and easy and already I’m losing weight and I don’t have to think too much it does it all for me.

title: Too many bugs!
body: Like another review I just read, this has been a great app up until the last release. Now, however, many things do not work right anymore. This new release did not bring over all of the foods I had entered, it doesn’t adequatelly show frequently viewed, frequently eaten, and several of my favorites are missing. This morning under frequently eaten (and recently viewed) it repeated the same list over and over and over and didn’t include many of my food items.

title: Cant follow my keto lifestyle without it!
body: This app has been so important to me for keeping on the straight and narrow with my keto lifestyle. I had high blood sugar and needed to change the way I ate. I also wasn’t eating enough. This app is a constant reminder of my successes (like seeing my sugar levels dropping and my weight too!). Having to keep my macros in my head or jotted down on yet another random piece of paper that would surely get lost doesn’t work for me. This app has been a lifesaver for that! And finally, the recipes are endless and so helpful for the times I get bored of my “usual go-to’s.” Thank you!

title: Amazing!
body: Carb Manager is Amazing! I paid for the year membership and it was 100% worth it! It gives me all the info I need for keto and then some. It keeps me accountable and on track with my food. I use the scanner at the grocery store to check food items, and looking up foods at restaurants to make sure I stay within my numbers. This is my 3rd week on keto and my first week using the app. The app shows me what’s keto and not but isn’t restrictive as long as I stay in my number range. I don’t feel like I’m on a diet, I feel like I’m more aware and this app helps me do that! Invest in the app! You’ll love it! 👍💪

title: Useful to track your nutritional info
body: What a great app!

title: Best app for ketogenic lifestyle
body: This app is absolutely the best you'll find for tracking macros on a keto diet. The list of foods and brands is extensive but if you don't find one you're looking for, it's super easy to add it by creating a custom food or even a custom recipe. With the help of Carb Manager I've lost 32 pounds in 11 weeks and I feel great. Just make sure you create an account because if you use the app without creating an account, at some point you'll lose what you've been tracking with the exception of foods you have added to the database. This is a VERY valuable tool if you've opted for a ketogenic lifestyle.
response: Hello and thank you for your review! We're happy to say that may of the raw, common foods and ingredients that are used in recipes are available on Carb Manager for logging. However, we will absolutely recommend to include Finnish foods as part of relevant upgrades for the future. If we decide to move forward with this we will absolutely let you know!

title: Great app
body: I love the colors, the charts, the bar graphs, and the pictures. You can even add your own pictures to recipes or meals that you create! This app has a lot of great features. Being able to track carbs, fiber, net carbs, fat, and calories easily laid out in a bar graph or wheel is very convenient. The app is easy to use and has some great features like being able to track measurements such as ketones, glucose, and I believe body measurements. I do wish they had some features that would make it even better such as reminders to log meals, reminders to log measurements, and a feature that one could use to easily copy a previous meal from a former meal.

title: Almost perfect
body: I would love to be able to select the vitamin while under the “in depth” column and be taken to a page with the percentage of that vitamin broken down by the food that accumulated that total. For example, if I’m at 60% vitamin A, I would like to be able to select it and see what foods got me to that 60%. It would help me identify what I need to incorporate more or less in my daily diet to insure I’m getting the best possible ratio of nutrients.

title: Great App!  Great Customer Service!
body: Update: have had some trouble with the app, but developers have always come through to fix any issues I may be experiencing.  Fits my needs and for that I thank them.
response: Hi there, thanks for getting in touch. If you previously paid for the app, then you should be able to access all nutrition and meal level data. Please contact us via the support center and we'll get that fixed for you.

title: Great app
body: This app is easy to use, and has been very educational. It has been guiding me in my new effort to go Keto, which is the opposite of my previous lifestyle, which i used to think was very health-conscious.  The carb content of some foods is surprising. The way things add up over the day is interesting. I am tip-toeing my way, hopefully to better health and i am grateful for the help of this app. So many apps like this are charging monthly fees.  I cannot see that they could be doing a better job, and this one is, thankfully, free. I am pretty sure this app can help you to be more nutritionally savvy too.  Here's to our health!

title: Carb Manager Tracker
body: I am a Type 2 diabetic and started using this app about a week ago. Although it takes time to input my specific foods for tracking, it’s well worth it since I can just type in my specific food in the search bar and choose to add it and tweak it as needed (portion size). Doing this makes tracking more accurate than any diet plan I’ve been on. I challenge myself to get as close to my limits without going over. You can keep track of other things like exercise and water intake and look at progress through the reports it generates. I love this app.

title: Best tracking app ever
body: I’ve had several tracking apps but this one is hands down best.  It tracks everything I need and more and makes low carb and keto easy.  I started the Atkins plan, which I’m also enjoying but their app isn’t nearly as intuitive.  This app gives me the info I need to customize my diet the way I want - kind of a Atkins/keto hybrid - and its working!  Cravings out the door and I’m able to stay within my limits.  I’ve lost about 12 pounds in the last 2 weeks.  For the first time I feel I can confidently say that this plan is one I can incorporate as a lifestyle.  Thank you!!

title: I Dont Like Paying For Apps Like This But..
body: If you want results the extra motivation from the recipes and other measurements you can get all help and i dont like paying for subscriptions but its helping and is compatible with fitbit

title: So much potential—just won’t work
body: I am so disappointed with this app. I excitedly paid $29 for the year subscription, then became so frustrated just trying to get it to launch. I’m tech-saavy with an always up-to-date iPhone, reliable carrier (bill paid!), good signal, solid WiFi. I know a good internet connection. This app consistently spins and spins telling me, “trying to open, please check internet connection” etc. The occasional times it will open, navigating its cluttered user interface is just exasperating. I had such high hopes because the app seemed comprehensive and mirrored my lifestyle desires and intentions. It has so much potential—just won’t work reliably. Apple would not refund my purchase even though I explained my frustrations and having it just few months or so.
response: Hi xoML, and thanks for sharing your experience. Sorry to hear you're experiencing some loading issues for your device. That's definitely not normal behavior. Please email us at support@carbmanager.com so we can offer a hand and get you back into your account without any hiccups. If you're still interested in canceling your subscription, we can help with that as well. Thanks!

title: Love the app hate that is does not always open
body: So far I love the app. It’s making my life a lot easier to calculate net carbs and track net carbs, fat and calories. The database of food is great and I love that you can add edits.  The camera scans quick and delivers results! I like the breakdown chart and you can change views from what you have left to what you have eaten.

title: Not user friendly at all !
body: I’m so sorry I signed up for the premium, as it looked like many useful extras, but boy was I wrong. Most of the premium features are not compatible with my device...I have the newest I phone. To look up basic recipes is a joke, the internet feature shows no items, when clearly when I get on the internet I find tons of the same recipes I search in the app. Can not figure out how to add measurements, although that looks to be a feature. I literally have to google recipes and manually add in the ingredients. Even a basic recipe just shows variations of the food that is nothing like I’m trying to add. If I could give this 0 stars I would, wish I had tried the one month plan first. I’ll stick with the FREE My fitness pal, does so much more and so easy and user friendly. 👎👎👎
response: Hi, and thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Since you posted it, many fixes and improvements have been implemented by our Development Team. If you have any questions or continuing issues, please reach out to us directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. We are very happy to assist! :)

title: Great Help!!!
body: This is a wonderful tool for those following their macros to stay in dietary ketosis. I use Loseit! and it’s much better laid out but this has the net carb and diabetic (I am) carb content which I very much like. The lacking feature, unless I missed how to do this, is being able to click on each separate meal and see the ratio pie chart so that I can see if I need to add or take away foods to meet my macros for fat/protein/carbs. This app would be complete with that ability and because it’s missing I still have to use Loseit! App to plan my meals because it allows separate meal carb/fat/protein viewing.

title: User friendly and intuitive
body: I’ve only been using it for a week or so, but so far I like it a lot! Very user friendly, easy to find what you’re looking for, and decent to look at too. I like the pie chart that adjusts throughout the day, and the at-a-glance preview of carbs in any item. I like it a lot better than My Fitness Pal which I found cumbersome to use when tracking macros as opposed to primarily calories. It doesn’t have a lot of bells & whistles, or special features at the free level, but it does exactly what I need—tracks macros with a clean easy to use interface.

title: Perfect app for me
body: I just started the Keto Diet. This app is just what I needed. I bought the paid app and couldn’t be happier. It scans products for a full nutritional profile that are easily added into the daily tracking.  It also has EXCELLENT recipes that have a wide range of food choices.

title: Keto diet
body: This app has helped me immensely!  I was terribly frustrated that I was on an endless diet plateau... I thought I was eating all of the right things, but just wasn’t progressing.  I downloaded and started tracking my food and trying to match the macros pie as closely as possible, and I was amazed that I was able to drop nearly 8 lbs that week!  I am so inspired by the functionality of it, and I love the many recipes I can find - oh! And the fact that you can drop an outside recipe link into the app and it will calculate from it for you is immeasurably helpful!    I cannot express enough how much I love this!

title: Excellent app but one thing could make it better
body: Every carb counting app has many of the features your app has.

title: Love love love the recipes
body: Not only does it help me keep track of everything it has amazing recipes and tells me exactly what’s in them. Tracks everything for me.

title: Very Satisfied
body: This app works very well and tracks all my nutrients that are important to me. I’ve lost weight using this and am very happy with the ease of finding foods and also being able to scan labels.

title: The best in depth nutrition app!
body: I am so impressed by all of the advanced features of premium. This app is incredible! I can pretty much customize make my own meal and diet plans along with discovering the myriad of awesome and tasty recipes! I was only going to try it for a month and then cancel, but I’m so impressed I’m upgrading to the annual. No matter what your goals, weight loss, health and wellness, build muscle, gain weight etc. I highly recommend trying this app out.  This allows you to measure just about anything health and diet related. I’ve never seen anything this in depth and advanced. Kudos to whoever developed this app!

title: Love the App!
body: I’ve only been using the app for a few days now for the Keto Diet, but this app is extremely helpful for tracking your daily macro goals.  It’s easy to use, huge food library, lots of great recipes (with nutritional info listed and ready to plug into your daily numbers), and lots of tools to monitor your progress.  I have used My Fitness Pal for years, and this app is similar to that app but may end up being my favorite of the two.  I especially love the scan feature that loads your foods by their barcode.  It is such a timesaver!  This app is very user friendly.

title: Premium is worth it!
body: Keto was really hard for me and my husband at first because I felt like I was constantly searching on Pinterest for recipes or making the same two or three things over and over again. I love love love the recipes option. They have all different types of meals you can look at including snacks and they make it super easy to log into your day. This has been a huge game changer for us in tracking our food. My only request would be that they let you make a shopping list based on the food you plan to eat that week.

title: Just Starting Keto
body: This App was referred to me by a friend that started Keto to help with weight loss and her hormones; (her husband and her were trying to get pregnant). She had great success with it and when I reached out to her about starting and assisting me with my own research, this App was the first thing she suggested!

title: So Heplful
body: This app takes the guess work out of everything! I feel much more confident in counting my macros and it’s so easy to use.

title: Recent update and now it works for Keto!
body: You can now choose to set this for either total carbs or net carbs!!! I literally just complained about it and today it’s completely fixed! I’m thinking it must have been included in the new update, but either way great job! I’m stoked to use this app. Look up foods yourself though. You can’t always trust what’s published. Unless I’m on the go, I verify each one and then just save that one to “my foods” so I don’t have to keep referencing, but you definitely want to in the beginning. Other than that, this app is amazing! Love LOVE it.
response: Hey there, it sounds like you might be tracking total carbs instead of net carbs. Please go to Settings - App Settings and select "Net Carbs" in the "Carbs to Track" field. This will make it so net carbs display on your daily log meal totals. Hope this helps!

title: Great app for following a Keto diet
body: This app is very easy to use. I chose to give the paid version a try because there are many more options available (tons recipes for each meal plus suggested meal plans). It even tracks your exercise and steps.

title: Great app....except
body: I really do love this app!!!  But why does it keep crashing and starting up?

title: Helps keep my “eye on the prize”
body: Being cognizant of what I’m eating and making sure I’m meeting my macros has helped me to “release” 16 pounds so far (We don’t want to lose things that we don’t want to get back, right?). 36 pounds to go, but it’s dropping off quickly, thanks to the app and my awareness of what I need to do to get there. Highly recommended for anyone who wants to know how they are measuring up to their daily goals. ONE FIX NEEDED: it would be great if you provided the “confetti” for MEETING macros, not for being under. Being under on something so important as macros should not be encouraged!
response: Hi, and thanks for the awesome review! We're so happy you're loving the app. The confetti celebration should only appear when you select "Done Logging for Today" and you have met your Macros and Calories. If you're seeing something different, please message us in-app so we can take a closer look. Thanks in advance!

title: Love this app
body: However, it said it was free and you could add as many foods as you want - just not access the full program. But, after adding a few meals I now am stopped from adding more until I join. So disappointed that I probably won’t ever join and I can’t afford it right now.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you've experienced a problem logging food using the free version of the app. Our support team would love to take a look. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username "luvketo" and we'll be happy to take a look as to why this is occurring. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Beyond useful! Already dropping pounds!
body: I purchased the full app and I’m on my way to weight loss and better health. The ability to log in my food with great ease and then track my meals/snacks had been a major benefit. The “ultimate” for me is the macros calculator which allows me to adjust my ratios (carbs/protein/fat/calories) if I plateau or feel the need to change my course. I am so happy that I saw this App mentioned in Women’s World magazine. By downloading this app you have nothing to lose but unwanted weight and with this app it is unbelievably simple. I highly recommend the full App version.

title: Bugs after update
body: I used the carb manager app for a long time and it was near perfect, then they did an update that was a major overhaul of the UI. While the update does improve some aspects of the app and make it look nicer, it seems to have slowed it way down. It now takes a long time to load on my phone. In addition, I have noticed that when editing recipes there is a major bug. When editing an existing recipe and trying to edit an ingredient or add one the app will suddenly go to the loading screen and then revert to the daily tracker screen, with none of the changes saved. It has gotten to the point where the app is almost unusable.
response: Hi there, and thanks for taking the time to leave a review! The issue you are referring to with editing recipes has been resolved. If you experience it again, the fastest and most efficient way to communicate this is by reaching out directly within the app or emailing us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: Hey do you guys ever read the reviews?
body: This is third request. This is a fine app, but Please change when you scan and add a food to store it by the food name. Otherwise it stores as the first word in the commercial brand name, such as 'big','organic', etc. Would be so much easier to find if it stores as name, such as egg, apple, etc. Please change this. Thanks
response: Hello from Carb Manager and thank you for your review! We happily read each review that shares information on usage. We'll gladly share with our product team your thoughts on the barcode scanning process too! Regarding privacy, under no circumstances will we sell personal information, including health information, to any third party. To further assist you, please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "fineartworks" so that we can answer any other questions you make have.

title: I lowered my blood sugar readings reading by 1/3
body: I have never written a review before but I feel the need to write this one is out of gratefulness. For the past few years as a Type 2 diabetic I’ve used another app to count calories and carbs. Even though I was diligent my blood sugar readings constantly averaged around 150. After creating goals with “diabetic carbs” using this app my decision making became different and my results changed. For the last two weeks since using this app my blood sugar readings have been between 90 and 120 but mostly right around 100. Thank you.

title: Love It! Exactly what I need!
body: This app has made me realize that there is something inspiring and motivating for me about being aware and mindful of my nutritional habits. I have resisted “dieting” for over a decade and my health is compromised as a result. I am overweight and diabetic as I approach 60.

title: Easy To Use & Track Daily
body: This app was recommended to me from a friend, after I had difficulty with another app. The Carb Manager is AWESOME! It is so easy to use and I am able to track everything that goes into my mouth. It’s incredibly helpful (and motivating) to see my progress. Additionally, I like the ability to scan items in the grocery store to see if it’s an item I would like to add to my diet. I recommended this app to four other people and now we are all supporting each other! I highly recommend this app! It’s a big thumbs up👍🏻 and FIVE stars!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Free Preview should be available
body: It’s just a very basic carb counter at the free version. But before committing to the pro version, they should provide a week free preview to see if its actually what we want. I sure don’t want to spend $9 to preview it or the full annual amount only to find out it doesn’t do what I am hoping for or if it does, it does it badly. I need to be able to import recipes from Big Oven and ensure it does the nutritional correctly. Can we edit our shopping list? Easily? Just lots of questions that a free preview would answer and if it’s as good as they claim, then I would be happy to pay the annual amount. But an app that won’t offer a free preview is sketchy. What are they hiding?

title: Great app but one new issue...
body: This app has been a great help in my attaining and keeping an A1C of 6.6. Being able to add the foods (and their nutrients) I normally eat is great, too.

title: I’m not Keto
body: I’m not Keto, I am diabetic.  This app helps me keep track of how many carbs I am eating and to make choices that keep me to the daily serving limits my nutritionist recommends.  I can even work in occasional sugary treats as long as I log them and am aware of their impact on my carbohydrate servings.  It’s easier than WW used to be because I don’t have to shift the math to some made up points system.  I can just use what’s on the nutrition labels and focus on the carbohydrates.  I occasionally push myself to include more protein when the macros chart indicates I am not getting as much as I should.

title: Best Tracking App 💗🥰💕
body: There’s so many features that allow me to track what I want when I want. From macros to ketones this app has it all. I tried the keto diet using my other app but I just couldn’t stick to it. Now, I’m able to easily track and see my progress which has given me the strength and willpower to stick with it. The meal ideas are very helpful and delicious too! I’ve been on keto for 8 days now and have lost 7.2 pounds! Mostly water weight I’m sure but that means I’m doing it right all thanks to this app. I’m super excited and thankful for this helpful app.

title: I love it, but...
body: This app is great for people who are committed to the keto diet enough to consistently track what they eat, like me. I love that, unlike many other apps, I can add as many items as I would like to each meal and can create many custom meals and foods. This would be a 5 star review if it wasn’t for the restrictions created for the free version. All of the recipes look lovely on this app, and having access to them would make my life so much easier, but you have to pay. I also can’t keep track of any other measurement than my weight, which for me is fine, but I know many others wouldn’t be okay with that.

title: Excellent App
body: Once you get used to moving around this app it puts the weight watchers app to shame.  You can do so much with it especially if you upgrade.  Which is very reasonable.  And they have sales frequently.   If your a beginner at keto, which I was, this helped guide me through the start and macros.   The better I get at keto the more features I’m discovering.  The scan system has a huge database of foods and has an easy add feature.

title: Used to be great!
body: The old carb manager was the best app out there for keto before the upgrade. I really liked the feature where you could plan out your meals on the calendar- yes you can make meal plans with the upgrade but it’s not at all user friendly and so hard to do. It was nice to be able to plan my macros exactly for the next week or two in advance because as a full time student and mom to two toddlers, I don’t have time to do Keto on the fly. Please at least give the option of going back to the old version. So many of the items scanned on the barcode that use to show up no longer show up any more. It’s incredibly frustrating. Used to love this app but I am seriously considering finding a different one once by subscription ends in a couple of weeks.

title: This APP has changed my life for the better!
body: I tried using “My Fitness Pal” but found it too cumbersome and tedious. A friend turned me in to CarbManager 8 days ago and I love it! The fact that I am still enthusiastically using it says a lot for me. Good behavior that gets recognized, gets repeated. That’s what I find I like about this app. Easy to use, easy to read, easy to find what I am looking for. I love it, not to mention that I stay within my limits easily because I love using it and I challenge myself to make better choices. This app helps me do just that, and I am grateful!!

title: Excellent Functionality-one tiny complaint
body: Overall, I’m not sure I could be much happier.  Ease of use.  Connectivity to fitness apps.  Food database.  Custom meals and recipes.  I could go on.  I’ve been using it for just under 60 days and have lost 24lbs.  That’s pretty good for a 50-yr-old.

title: Amazing
body: I love every feature on this app. I’m horrible at tracking anything, even taking my meds on time. But this makes it insanely easy to scan in things. Make a quick recipe to log whenever you have that one sandwich or a breakfast you regularly make yourself. It even connects to fit bit and Apple Watch to adjust your carb intake based on your energy spent.

title: CRAZY GOOD APP
body: This app is amazing!! The more I use it the more I love it. The ability to scan food labels and adjust potion amounts down to 1/8th of a portion makes adding your food a quick and painless activity. Track your water for the day, your exercise and so much more! The encouragement I get from seeing my macros below my max levels for the day keeps me motivated. And knowing when I’m “close” to my limits for the day helps me walk away form that “one more slice”  to make sure I keep moving forward with my new way of eating for life. Get this app NOW. You will NOT be disappointed!!!

title: Great app, tiny problem
body: This is a great app. I became pretty good at daily tracking with WW but never a fan of daily logging when dieting. But this app encourages me to daily input my food and easily counts my calories and carbs since I'm mainly Keto focused. So four stars for that. To the creators of the app... I have tried and tried to 'create an account' but it will not allow me to. The feature pops up constantly during the day to do this now I just cancel it out. It's frustrating 😡 When I try to enter anything to create an account there's nothing that confirms I've done so and it just repeats back to "please create an account."

title: 5 Stars!
body: I am pretty picky about my apps and I have failed several times on one diet to the next including the keto diet. When I learned about lazy keto I decided that I was going to need help and I started researching apps. This one took me a minute to figure out, but after I got all the bugs worked out I love it it is kept me on track and keeps me honest! I even splurged for the premium and I’m glad I did because the recipes on there and the comments about people that refuse the recipesAre very helpful! Way to go guys! Down from 130 to 111 today thanks to you♥️

title: Best App out there, not just for keto!
body: I got this app because I was trying Keto.  However I have shifted my macro goals and this app is still the best out there for calorie management, macro goals, and micro nutrient tracking.   It has a great social aspect that has helped me and a friend keep each other accountable.   The customer support is quick to reply and very friendly and helpful.   All around this is the best app for anyone trying to track their caloric intake, to help meet goals, and become a healthier person.   Thank you for all you guys do and the new update is awesome!

title: 2021 update is terrible
body: Used to love this app, where I pay for premium version, but changes for 2021 make it less usable. New version is aesthetically nice, but navigation is cumbersome and requires a lot of scrolling and swiping to get the screen you want. Since updating in Feb, the app reads data from Apple Health but no longer writes data, thereby wrecking my use of not just one app but two! I’ve tried troubleshooting tips and they don’t work. In theory the Graphing button in carb manager would allow me to see progress over time (weekly, monthly, etc), but the circles for each data point make the graphs unreadable. I’d prefer the summary column graphs that Apple Health displays — but I can no longer use AH to see nutrition data because CM doesn’t write data! Please fix these issues!!!
response: Hi, and thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Since you posted it, many fixes and improvements have been implemented by our Development Team. CM does continue to import nutritional data to AH. If you have any questions or continuing issues, please reach out to us directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. We are very happy to assist! :)

title: Loved the app until the recent update
body: I’ve been using Carb Manager for over 3 years now and I loved it until the recent update. They’ve made it really hard to track your food. Before the update I could just easily add my food from the recent history. Now, those frequently used items don’t show. When I type the name of food it doesn’t show the frequently used ones but rather some random items I’ve never used. It’s super frustrating. Also, since the update the app is glitchy and it takes longer to open and track items. Very disappointed!

title: Good! But buggy
body: Really like the app for tracking macros. Seems to have lots of foods available so I don’t always have to scan in or create a recipe but love that these options are available. They have member recipes and that’s a great resource. HELLA buggy tho!!!! Sometimes it just won’t load any foods on the search page. It’s like it can’t pull anything from the server. One time it said my internet wasn’t connected but I could use the internet outside the app. Today the last 4 days of food tracking disappeared. Sometimes I just get a spinner that just spins and page won’t respond. If it keeps this up, I’ll have to try another option. Whomp whomp.

title: The BEST carb counter
body: I've lost over 38 pounds using Carb Manager on a ketogentic diet. It's been my most valuable tool in losing weight. I've tried all of the other carb tracking apps -- this one is by far the best. I think the most impressive feature is the ability to log foods by "saying" them. It's smart enough to understand what you said and find the matching foods. The food database is enormous. I rarely come across a food that they don't have, and even then I can enter the info manually. I also like the recipe builder feature and barcode scanner. Highly recommended.

title: Great app for Keto diet
body: This is a great app. Just plug in your age, weight and how much weight you’d like to lose per week. It will tell you what your caloric intake, but most importantly your carb intake should be to attain your goals. I would give this app 5 stars if it automatically adjusted the calorie and carb numbers as you lost weight. Instead you have to go into settings and change everything to get the calories and carbs to adjust to your weight loss. Also this app isn’t compatible with workout apps like Fitbod or your activity app. If it worked with those apps this would be a home run. As is it’s still a great app though.

title: The premium version is well worth the price
body: I had been using the free version and liked it. But I took the plunge and upgraded to the premium version. The added features plus the meal plans are definitely worth it. I started following one of the meal plans and have lost 7 lbs my first week. They are easy to load into my phone or iPad and then all I have to do is accept that food for it to go onto my daily log. It has definitely kept me on my plan. Also, all of the recipes have been yummy. Really enjoying the variety of fat bomb recipes.

title: Just what I needed for keto/lchf
body: I’ve used several apps over the years for food journaling and just keeping track of things and none did everything this does!  I gladly paid the yearly fee because it was less than my previous app, and it has more options!  I love that I can also note my glucose and ketones. I can make notes on how I’m feeling or how a good affected me.  One of my favorite options when you pay for the full app is the recipes. You can customize the recipe, get step by step instructions, and add the macros to you day so easily.

title: Great app and worth the upgrade
body: I love this app. It is so easy to use and the upgrade features are well worth the money. I can import recipes so easily and it figures out all of the nutrition for me! I was having difficulty getting that feature to work with Pinterest but when I copied the actual website url into the import feature it has worked every time! Love that is syncs with my fitbit and the recipes are fantastic...makes sticking to the diet much easier.  I would (and do) highly recommend this, the free or upgraded version are both great.

title: Change Your Life
body: After a scary health crisis, and renewed motivation to experience well-being, I began searching for a Better Way. AND I’ve probably read all the same books you have, but concerning diet experts tend to disagree.

title: Huge resource for creative low carb meals.
body: I’m not really a review writer but I am so impressed with the layout of the recipes section. Every one of them has a beautiful photo, clear step by step instructions with even more photos for each step.  I haven’t gotten into all the logging of exercise and stats yet, though I have logged a few meals.  I mainly stay in the recipe section just typing in a single ingredient of something I have in the fridge and I can build a recipe around it with all the creative ideas in this app.  Great job creating this app.

title: Love the app BUT customer support is a joke
body: I updated my app and now I cannot login my app. I have reset my password, deleted the app, tried wifi and cellular data, restarted/turned off my phone and I cannot log in.

title: Carb Manager
body: When I was first diagnosed with diabetes, the clinic provided me 8 different apps to try. This was not one of them. I found this on my own. I simultaneously tried all the apps but stuck with this one and have passed it along to others

title: Love this app, but...
body: Gotta say, I love this app!  I have tried them all, My Fitness Pal, Total Keto, SS Keto.  The list is endless. And this is by far the best. It's intuitive, includes products you think would not be out there, makes menu plans for me based upon my own macros and then gives me a shopping list. The only flaw I have found is that when you click on the tab for the "share recipe", or if you are in the App Settings and click on "Share this App", it forces a hard close on the App itself. Please fix and you'll have a total 5-star product.

title: Best App for Keto Ever!
body: I’m the type of person that doesn’t say something, one way or the other, unless I mean it. I had to lose weight and fast, and the thought of counting carbs and calories was making me anxious. I found this app and I’m in love. It’s making Keto so easy for me, and less boring. I just had coconut flour pancakes for breakfast. Not listed in app? No problem! Easy and accurate add in. Just scan and add and viola! No more worrying about whether or not you had too many carbs, protein, calories, etc. Give it a try. I’m sure that like me, you’re going to love it 😊

title: Best keto app
body: I downloaded a total of FIVE apps to help with keto and counting carbs along with exercise and I wanted the ease of scanning/searching food brands. This one  was the winner!!!! It lets you customize and log as much as you want for free, I’m sure we (hubby and I) will eventually get the paid version once we start doing more exercise. There are some brands that aren’t always correct when you scan/search but it’s easy to edit it right then and there. BEST APP for KETO! Get it you won’t regret it, just look around and tinker around with it first to see all the benefits.

title: Best carb app
body: This is the one! It has made my diet process go smoothly. It’s very easy to hold yourself accountable for all your food ..it calculates everything for you if you need to guess on something just scan the food and it will let you know before you eat it if it’s in the keto or any diet approved plan. No more stressing. The app is full of recipes and suggestions ..it also counts your water and your exercise ..everything you need to be successful on your weight-loss journey is at the top of your fingers..This app is guaranteed to help you get back on track.

title: So far, so good!
body: This is helped me keep track of my macros on my keto diet. I found that this was the most complicated part. I like that I can put in a food even before I eat it to see how that will affect my overall numbers. Then I delete it if I decide to go in a different direction. The only thing I’m not quite sure about is the numbers they give me for my total goal, for instance, 30 carbs as a daily goal. That’s way too high for me. There might be a way to change that. I’m just a little new with this. Maybe writing a review a little too soon.

title: So disappointed
body: I use the iPhone platform. From the start the app did not work correctly. The words in the screen were all jumbled... things seemed to work once I started logging. After 3 days of use, I tried to log a food and a screen, giving my no options but to purchase the upgrade, appeared.... I could back out to the previous screen, but continued to get the same screen on subsequent attempts to log food. I tried logging out then back in... no change. I uninstalled then reinstalled the app. All to no avail.

title: Amazing weight loss app!
body: I absolutely love this app! It makes living the low-carb/keto lifestyle so much easier. There are a lot of nice functions in the free version but the premium version is even better. I can set different macros goals for different days, get Keto “grades” on foods that I scan to help identify if it’s good to eat on my diet and the emails they send are very informative and encouraging. I feel like I have a lot of support from the app creators in my weight loss goals. This is the best weight loss/diet management app I’ve used so far, even better than Lifesum and MyFitnessPal.

title: USE THIS! KETO DREAM APP!
body: This app has every thing you need to manage your keto diet!

title: Love this app
body: I don’t write many reviews on apps, but I felt this one deserved it. I’ve been using Carb manager for a couple weeks now, and finally had to invest in the premium plan. This app tells me everything I could possibly need while on keto. Deciding to live the keto lifestyle is one thing. Having a plan and watching it unfold on the app is a load off the mind!!

title: Great but intermittent miscalculations
body: First of all, I love this app!! Makes tracking super easy and I love all the “hidden” features I’m finding that have been incredibly helpful!

title: Glitchy
body: I paid for subscription, but app has some glitches.  Like custom meals sometimes I can add foods and sometimes I cant I can only add macros.  Sometimes I can scan a barcode and other times the feature on my IPAD says it is not available.  Reports are great, but limited, for example I want my fasting blood sugar for last 30 days but I get all blood sugar results for last 30 days and haven't found a way to get the reports the way I want I the info.  I would also like an app that I can set reminders through out the day (drink water) add more steps or Wednesday weigh in.  I still like the add better than my fitness pal, but it needs some work.
response: Thanks so much for the constructive feedback!. While I can't give any specifics at this point, I think you'll really appreciate our next major app update :-) If you have any questions in the meantime, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team at support@carbmanager.com

title: Great app!
body: I've been using this app for about a week and a half, and I really love it. I have used My Fitness Pal and the Atkins app, and I find this one far superior. I can easily track my net carbs, and it seems to track macros well too. You can also track calories. There seems to be a huge database of food and recipes, and the scanner works great as well. This may be silly, but I love the pictures of the foods as you look them up. My only quibble is that the net carbs round up if it's, say, 2.5 carbs, to the whole carb. Other than that, I think it's great!

title: Password reset
body: The app has logged me off twice, and then will not accept my password which I know is correct because I use facial recognition on my phone. I made at least 20 attempts to reset my password and gave never received the reset email. I’ve tried sending the Wombat Corp and email with no response and I’ve tried the chat with no response. I used another email today to get a new account started and the same thing happened. I have paid for a premium membership and I’m not able to use the site. I don’t want to keep creating new accounts every day. I really enjoyed the app, and would like to be able to use it again, especially since I paid for the premium service. I guess I’ll be contacting The App Store for a refund. Very disappointing
response: So sorry for the problem! Please contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we will assist you.

title: The reason I continue to be healthy
body: This app has been essential in my success of living a Low carb/Keto lifestyle. It is super user friendly. The recipes are delicious. Love how I can plan my meals and it creates a shopping list for me. If you don’t know about a product don’t worry just scan it and the app tell you if it’s a keto friendly item. After a week of the limited access I subscribed for the year and it was the best investment into my health. So for those of you like me who don’t like all the research involved in Keto just download carb manager and enjoy.

title: New version
body: The new version has a lot of additional features the old one dent in addition to the old features that are now easier to use. It is indeed a big improvement. However, when it first popped on the screen I was greatly disappointed and even angry. The type is so small and tiny you can’t read it. You can make it bigger but that’s not much of a help.

title: Greatest tool ever.
body: New Year’s resolution : Arrest the obesity train of excessive carbohydrates and as of this week, thanks to this App and its informative, collaborative design, I have lost 40 lbs and 6” waist reduction!  I began at 267 lbs. I feel and look so much healthier. I have only 17 lbs to go. Thanks to this app, which makes this journey lots of fun, my life (and my family’s lives) are benefiting. Thank you for all the thought and hard work that obviously went into development. I mean, all the app’s “mechanics” work flawlessly - at least the ones I use and know about. Kudos!!

title: USED TO BE PERFECT!!
body: As the title says it used to be a great app! But the recent update destroyed this apps functions. I just don’t understand why developers think they need to change something that didn’t need changed. Soooo disappointed. So many people in my KETO community have stopped using this app due to the update. I have been trying to stick with it but I have to side with them. This app is far to time consuming to use and to figure out. Previously it was so quick, simple, and efficient.
response: Hi Cococalypso - Thanks for that feedback, and sorry to hear that the app update isn't a good fit for you. We hadn't updated the app in several years, and many users grew very accustomed to the old version. Change can be difficult - we totally get it! I'd like to invite you to reach out to our support team with any specific issues. You can contact them via Settings → Help & Support. All the best in the meantime!

title: Helping me learn how to eat better!
body: This app is a life saver but I do wish they didn’t charge you just to get recipes to be on there from websites without having to create it yourself with all the facts. That’s annoying and I’m unsure how to get the same foods to pop up automatically each day. I’m sure there’s a way. So it is 3-4 star user friendly. However I’m Thankful for this app as I’ve not used others so...I gave it a 4 star rating. I like how I can track more than just carbs and it’s helping me to see when I need to add a green veggie, aim for a low carb dinner and I can plan for the day ahead! Loving that!

title: Like it, but
body: I feel all the user contributions get very confusing and I don't know who to believe or use. You should not post them until someone verifies them for accuracy.
response: Hey there! Thank you for posting a review of your Carb Manager experience. Our support team would love to help you log the correct foods you're searching for, and show you how simple it is to create your own meals and use our feature to copy your meals to everyday, so you don't have to log them each time. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username so we can help.

title: New version is dissapointing
body: I used CM for more than a year, and even got premium version. It was very good. But since latest update I'm upset. Two most used features are gone. I cannot set up to see daily percentage ratio of carbs, proteins and fats - it only shows me how many grams out of my daily norm I had. And also when you save favorite recipes there's no easy way to look through your saved favorites - they are all mixed up with favorite foods and your own recipes - I need a separate folder or tab where favorite recipes are collected. I'll wait for a few more weeks, and if nothing changes in likely to start using another app :(

title: Terrible New Layout
body: The latest update totally redesigned everything and its awful. It’s not as user friendly and the pages and features are not as easy to find. My foods don’t come up in a search anymore. There was nothing wrong with the old version. For once I wish my app didn’t auto update. I hate this version and I’m paid for a full year. Minor changes are fine but you made massive layout changes and it’s painful. I recommended the old version to people. Won’t be recommending this one. I also had 23 notifications and can’t figure out what they are for to clear them so I had to turn off notifications in the settings of the phone to get them to go away.

title: Best App Hands Down
body: After finding out I was diabetic, I began searching for apps to track my carbs. I must have tried 5 of them. Although many say they track your carbs, they were actually calorie based. Others were just too much of a pain to use. Carb Manager is simple and does what it says.

title: Love this app on iPhone, bugs exist on iPad!!!
body: This app is great for counting net carbs.  The recipes are unique and yummy.  There is a little bit of time needed to learn the user interface.  I bought the paid app because the free app really offers just minimal info.  Sadly I am considering dumping the app and looking for a different app.  Every time I use the app on my iPad it freezes on the opened page. One time it froze on a white blank page.    I can only get out of it if it reboot my iPad.    It doesn’t do this with any other program,  I have even sent a video of it doing this action to tech support.  They suggested I cancel my subscription and ask for a refund.  I suggest not buying this app if you are intending on using it for an iPad.

title: Data entry needs work
body: Overall a great app. I used to use My Fitness Pal which I liked a lot. MFP didn’t calculate net carbs this app does plus tracks all the other micronutrients  The reports are awesome. The only complaint I have is when editing names and foods on both my iPad and iPhone it gets crazy. Insert the cursor where you want to edit, hit backspace one character disappears but the cursor jumps to the end of the window, sometimes the edit window closes as soon as the first character is entered. Very frustrating. Fix that and it’s a 5 star.

title: Problems after moving the app into a iOS folder
body: I have been using the premium erosion of Carb Manager for many months. It’s and easy quick way to track my micros on my Keto lifestyle. I have some other health related apps and wanted to organize them into one folder on my iPhone. Since moving them, I have had so many crashes using the app that I cannot use it anymore. I moved the app out of the folder but the app won’t even open now. I suppose it could be coincidence with an app update. I don’t know but I need help to get the app working again. How do I get assistance with the app?

title: Worth Buying
body: Definitely worth buying the app. Gives you endless recipes and allows you to enter all your measurements and weight and it’s easy to navigate and visually allows you to see your progress. I put myself on a 20 net carb and 2000 calorie diet and I’m ending up changing my whole life style for the better because the food tastes so good and the deserts are great too! I also started intermitten fasting combined with this and have immediately saw results. Dr. Berg for more education videos and tips and this app combined will change your life.

title: Disappointed
body: I have never left a review before but hope this helps others decide whether or not to purchase this app. I had owned this app a couple years ago and really liked it. Now, I am completely frustrated. Mostly because it shuts down on me often, normally when I am entering a recipe. The other day, I was halfway through adding a recipe half a dozen times when it shut down on me every time.

title: Perfect before new interface
body: The app was 100% perfect and fast before the new January 21 version with the new interface (have been using it for 10 months now). It now needs literally minutes to start and then it still needs a lot of minutes to get each item in the database - seems the app reloads it entirely each letter you type in the search box! Also the upgrade lost my “recipes” 😢😔😤. Also, the support is not answering whereas it was previously. I do not want to change keto tracking app but also I can’t spend 10+ minutes waiting for an app to respond before being able to track only one item I want to eat... and no roll back seems possible :-( very sad about this not-smart move from Carb manager team 🤔😔😢
response: Hi Smarties - Thanks for reaching out. Luckily, all of those issues can be resolved! Support is available to assist as always. We're seeing high ticket volumes and it may sometimes take longer than in the past. But rest assured, they're still available to assist! You can contact them in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: Love the new version BUT!
body: First of all, I really do love the Carb Manager app! But the new version for whatever reason makes you verify that you actually want to add the breakfast that you eat every single day. If I wanted to have to tell it to add it to the log I wouldn’t have bothered to add it to the daily log in first place! Secondly, please put my total carbs remaining number back in the middle of the target! Even though I do keep up with my calories I really do not care to see them in the middle of my target! There are other places on the app that I can find calorie information if I need it.

title: Please look into making offline mode available
body: I LOVE this app! It’s very intuitive, easy to use, has lots of options! I love the fact that I can create a 7 day meal plan, or opt to letting it generate meals for me, and/or custom create my own foods. I appreciate how we can import recipes by copying and pasting the url address. This app is amazing. However, my only complaint is that I can not log foods in offline mode because unfortunately, I live in the mountains and service is not that great. But, other than that I highly recommend this app!

title: Upgraded to pro and wish I’d done it sooner!
body: What a fantastic keto app. It’s everything I could have wished for and more. I’m enjoying finding new recipes and adding them to my favorite foods. It integrates seamlessly with my Apple Watch and is tracking my exercise for me, leading to a net calorie goal measurement which is cool. Originally I thought that I would just try it out and cancel the membership after a while — now I’m hooked and will happily pay the annual fee! So worth it! Thanks for putting so much thought and great features into a wonderful app!

title: Great app until latest version
body: Have used this app for 3 years and had loved it until last update.  Now very slow to use because of how it is set up and all foods have a dramatically different profile than prior to upgrade.  For the love of God go back to prior version so I can start using again.
response: Hi there, thanks for the note. We pushed an update that will speed up the app a lot and also brought back many of the best features of the previous version, including the wheel picker for serving sizes. Please give them a try and let us know what you think. Thanks!

title: Best app for concise, useful macros in readable pie chart!
body: Works great now!  Gives me my macros is a quick reading pie chart, I can add my own recipes or import recipes from the internet - complete with macros calculated in. Great concept in a concise, useful format!
response: Sorry for the problem! Please try opening the app again now. If it doesn't work, please email us at support@wombatapps.com. Thanks!

title: Carb Manager bugs
body: I have recommended this app to several people because it’s the first app I have come across that is carb driven.  It’s awesome!  HOWEVER, there are some bugs that frustrates me.  The slowness to respond to searches and the times it times out make it frustrating that I walk away from it.  When you get to this point you tend to forget items and then your counts are off.  Then what is the sense of the app.?  I was thinking about switching to premier but I won’t until these get fixed.

title: Everything I was looking for
body: I was a long-time user of MFP but became frustrated and unhappy with the app.  This is exactly what I was looking for!

title: Very helpful
body: I’ve been practicing sloppy Keto for about 6 weeks. I don’t own a scale -which is s good thing because I would use it too often. But I am losing weight and feeling better and people are commenting about my weight loss. Carb manager let’s me test myself - I’m getting quite good at keeping my carb intake around 30. When I use it my days are more like 20! It’s quite helpful. This is a lifestyle not a diet and the app is a good tool for reaching your trim self. In general carbs are in every packaged /processed food and most of it is bad for your health.

title: Count Health, not Calories
body: I like Carb Manager because eating right is more that just tracking my calories per day. I can actually see what foods I need to eat to meet my protein, fat and carb needs.  These are called “ Macro” food units. My doctor told me how much protein I need per day, so I make sure to meet that “macro” unit per day.  I never liked counting calories. Boring. But I’m very interested in making healthy protein choices. I also like to know how many carbs and fat  I eat. It’s easy to switch certain food for better choices using this app.

title: Lifechanging!!
body: I didn’t even know I wasn’t doing keto right until I started using this app to track my macros. I realized I wasn’t eating enough fat. As soon as I started meeting my daily fat requirement of 70%, I got over the hump instantly. This app is great for tracking macros and keeping notes. I even use it to decide if I want to eat something before I eat it. I’ll plug in the food and if it throws off my day I’ll decide not to eat it. Or maybe it eat it in a different quantity. VERY helpful. The premium version has even more great features.
response: Thanks for the super review! We're happy to hear you're enjoying and fully taking advantage of our app's features! Let us know how we can support you, by messaging us in-app anytime. Thanks!

title: Love CarbMgr with one exception
body: The recipe import is outstanding, however, it would be nice if it was possible to move the ingredients to another location. I usually modify some recipe ingredients to make them more low carb or to specify products. This usually requires me to delete old product then add replacement product. When adding products, they go to the bottom of ingredients list. It’s a bit cumbersome to have a fully converted recipe without having to input every ingredient if I just created a new recipe. I hope this makes sense.

title: Super help
body: I love this program it has a lot of option to help you to control your weight and loss more weight, excellent food recommendations, and exercise program very easy to follow. I was very frustrated before because I like to eat and the traditional diet it was not option for me , now I can still eating a lot of options and still control my weight.  now with this program I have the control and motivation to control and lose more weight without starving myself or with difficult diets. I love it 😍😍😍

title: Dislike the update
body: I have subscribed to this app for over a year, and paid for premium even. I have really liked the app and would’ve rated it 5 stars. However this recent update is clumsy to use. It takes longer to find foods and the search often brings up nonrelevant results. It doesn’t list the food you have added recently, so you need to search more often. And, when you do search, results take longer to pop up than they used to. In other words, the update is not an improvement and needs work. I am only giving it 3 stars and then that because I used to love the app.

title: Satisfied user!
body: I've been a daily avid user of this app. I follow a super strict keto diet. With the help of this amazing app I've been able to log all my daily food intake and lose 120 pounds in the past year and a half. The app is very user friendly and has so much information at your fingertips. This has been one CRUCIAL key to my weight loss. Thank you, Carb Manager for helping me track my food intake with ease! Now in maintenance I still use it to make sure I don't end up back where I began. I will be a long time user for sure!!!

title: Beginner Keto
body: I’m a beginner at Keto and I’ve always heard about the macros you have to keep up with.  This has always kept me intimidated and shied me away from ever trying Keto.  I always just thought it was to hard and to much work to do all the math.  My wife asked around online about which was the best Keto app to use so we gave it a try.  That being said I absolutely love this app and the ease of use.  I’m on day 6 of Keto and I’m down 9.2 lbs!  This app made it all possible.  I love putting in all my foods and nailing a perfect day every day.  This app is my best friend lol.

title: Key to Keto!
body: This app has been indispensable in my transition to a ketogenic diet. The main screen is a great visualization of where you stand on macros and bio marker measurements. The nutritional database seems very comprehensive and the food scanning feature works well. The detail reporting is also comprehensive. My only minor complaint is the interface for blood pressure measurements is clunky - you have to enter systolic, then use a pull down to switch to diastolic, and enter the second number. So I use BP Companion to track BP separately. Highly recommend the app though.

title: I like this app except...
body: So far this has been a great app. The only thing that is not super user friendly as other apps is the lists of foods. Other apps you can type in a few things and the lists that comes up includes all of the things. For example, a Wendy’s cheeseburger, other apps you type that in it comes up with the Wendy’s cheeseburger and the Wendy’s cheeseburger, no bun. Since this is a low carb app it should automatically bring that option up. You shouldn’t have to type the whole thing in all the time. I’m fat because I’m lazy I don’t like doing extra work.

title: App just stopped working - UPDATE
body: I have to re-review this......they did ultimately fix the problem and now I don’t want my money back......it is a very good app for keeping track of carbs and other nutritions and of course access to recipes etc.....sorry carb manager for the previous bad review!!

title: BEST APP for Carb(free)/(less) Diet!!!
body: This app is by far the BEST I have found for counting carbs and overall intake. I have used MyFitnessPal and Lose It. Good apps but you have to manually count and track Net carbs. That isn’t helpful if you’re on a Carbless/Carb Free diet. This app calculates a lot for you, give you the exact calculations as you’re logging a food (shows what you have left.) Great options for Premium-Haven’t upgraded yet. Kind of pricey options! The interface itself can use a facelift or new design. But still 5 STARS because the functionality is SUPER!

title: Love it!
body: This app has helped me so much! It is difficult to track your macros and to understand how much and what to eat. I have lost 10 pounds in the past 3 weeks and I don’t think I could have done it without this app. I paid for premium mostly because I wanted the full access to view my nutrient intake to make sure I am still remaining healthy. The only thing is I wish there was an option to easily add fasting days including the times. If there is a way to do that, can someone please let me know? Thanks!

title: Great app but...
body: Great app for macros but not as good as Chronometer for visualizing % completed for micronutrients. I think it should be an easy fix to show all of the micronutrients bars in one place vs. having to flip through each of them individually from a drop down so I’m very surprised this is not already a feature.
response: Hi, Octopuscandysticks and thanks for your review! We hear you loud & clear, and we're currently working on a new version of the app to be released soon that will revamp our UI and how we display Macros as well as Micronutrients. Until then, select Settings-Diet Goals-Micronutrients to track your daily nutrients, and you can customize your intake per day. You can also see an analysis of your Micronutrients in Daily Log-In Depth. For any other questions please reach out to us in-app. Thanks!

title: Excellent app for tracking
body: Carb manager is by far my favorite app for tracking macros. My needs change as I rotate between maintenance and light losing so being able to quickly and easily adjust my options is a bonus. When I lost a bulk of my weight it was with carb manager. That was 85 pounds and 3 years ago. I still use it to this day to stay on track. The premium features are nice and I’ve done it a couple times, but the base free version is invaluable to anyone tracking macros especially carbs or net carbs.

title: Challenged with recent update
body: I used to LOVE this app but recent changes have really impacted my experience.  Two changes in particular that have changed.  The fact that I can no longer see total and net calories on dashboard- it only shows me net and I have to go elsewhere to get total or add myself.  Also the serving size does not allow you to add what you want, ie today I tried to enter 1/3 avocado and I could not enter - it only allowed me to enter 1/4 or 1 1/4.  I have noticed with custom added foods the serving size works differently than it used to.  Would love to see fixes for these changes.  Lastly trying to find entry for ketones and glucose was a chore.  Not as user friendly as prior version.

title: You get what you give.
body: If you are honest with the app, it will be honest with you. The visual of the ring of macros is great feedback. The barcode scanner is super responsive and I rarely don’t find exactly what I’m eating. When I don’t, it’s quick and painless to add whatever it may be to the database.

title: Something isn’t right!
body: When I first downloaded the app, certain features were only available for premium members so because I liked the app and wanted to get everything out of it I decided to sign up to become a premium member. They had it advertised as $3 something a month for twelve months so I figured hey $3 and some change a month wouldn’t hurt just to see if I really like the app. So upon clicking on the 12 month subscription and signing up, I receive my receipt from apple stating that they charged me the full years price!!! No where on the app did it say that you pay the full price it said PER MONTH! So I’m really not understanding why they charged me the full amount instead of the per month price. Something just isn’t right!!
response: Hey SB340, thanks for contacting us. Premium is USD $39.99 per year, $16.49 per 3 months, or $8.49 per month. We offer discount of 60% off the monthly rate when you subscribe for a year prepaid. Please contact us at support@wombatapps.com if you would like help switching plans. Thanks!

title: Great help managing my food
body: This APP is very easy to use, I am 66 and NOT tech savvy, but I picked it up very fast. It has given me several WOW moments when I realized what I was eating and what I was NOT. I think I will purchase soon as this one works great. I was able to add recipes and then be able to add a portion to my meals. It has really helped me feel more in control of this KETO diet which I love but was not loosing weight, and as soon as I started keeping track of my food-fat,Carbs etc. the weight has been coming down, slowly, but steady, 1  pound per week.

title: Easiest way to plan, log, keep on track.
body: I am NOT a disciplined person and could never imagine myself keeping track of anything or succeeding with any plan. But Carb Manager is almost like playing a phone game. It is so comprehensive and easy to use. I always know exactly what I can still eat and find something easily to fit the specs. And I eat so much and am never hungry, so much more than when I just eliminated categories or played it by ear. I’ve lost 7 pounds in a week but I know now that can keep this up.

title: Such an amazing app!!!
body: This is so helpful!! Not only for people starting out keto but for long time keto dieters as well. The recipes are to die for!!! This has made tracking my carbs and cals so easy. It’s not just for keto either! They have meal plans for vegans/vegetarians, paleo, Intermittent fasting and so much more. I bought the premium membership which u don’t really need to but the benefits from the membership just added to my experience. Definitely worth the price. Highly recommend for people who find tracking cals, macros, and carbs hard!!

title: Keeps me on track
body: Carb Manager keeps me on track for food and exercise throughout the day. I’ve been using it for a year now and it’s the only way to keep me honest. It’s so easy to use which is why I’ve managed to lose weight and keep it off by being accountable for my intake. I also love entering my exercise and having that activity impact my intact. It keeps me wanting to exercise. I love being able to scan food labels and having all the nutritional data displayed. And, I love the recipes. Carb Manager is a way of life.

title: A New Friend
body: Since I met CM (Carb Manager) I have been on an exploratory Journey!  I thought CM  might just look and sound good on the outside but in these several days I have found CM to be an authentic new friend who helps me put together a food plan, grocery list, then CM motivates me throughout the day with articles to read.  CM even organizes what I have consumed into a data format and reminds me to input my food/beverages into my diary so I can reflect on my progress (food and exercise).

title: Great Tool
body: I have the paid version of the app and it is the best value I have seen for anything Keto related. It has recipes and a meal plan feature. It can even generate a meal plan based on your macros. If you’re not picky and don’t have time to figure out tracking and planning yourself. You can track just about any health metric you can think of in it to really see how your progress is going. Love this app, very well thought out. It also has info on getting started with Keto. What to eat and avoid, what to expect and so on.

title: Good app but something amiss of late
body: Update: the latest version is less user friendly though it looks more colorful. And the data exchange issues were not fixed. I might delete the app after a couple of weeks.

title: Decent app for tracking but don’t trust every element
body: Do your due diligence. If you scan a food or import a recipe, the values will not match the manufacturer or website data for contents of the food. The values can be “reported” as wrong and corrected according to the documented stats but this is a pain. As a premium member I expect better.

title: Love it!
body: I’ve used a few different apps for counting carbs and this one absolutely beats the rest! It makes tracking simple, and the macros are so easy to keep track of!

title: Card manager
body: Carb Manager gets you up and running in a matter of minutes!

title: For Always Hungry Diet
body: I’m not doing the Keto diet but rather The Always Hungry Diet but this app is just what I was looking for. It alllows you to track percentages of fats, carbs, and protein with each meal or snack and for the day. It has a huge database of food-often I’m surprised to find my item, especially since they would never be eaten on the Keto Diet. It is easy to use and because of that I’m making better choices.
