After just one day I ordered it for a year because I’m so optimistic that it will keep me on track. Absolutely recommend this!

title: Get Keto right
body: My 2nd review: I was struggling getting Keto right until I got this app! I might have said it before but it’s fantastic! I could get Premium to sync with my watch (which would be the only reason I would I purchase it), but entering my info manually takes seconds. I can’t say enough about how much I love CM!! I used MFP for years but couldn’t track net carbs and was really struggling trying to keep carbs and net carbs straight (math confuses me!). I was hesitant to switch but after a couple of days I deleted MFP and have never looked back!!

title: Great App; Premium is Easy to Use
body: I recently decided to start the keto diet and was using a different app to track my Macros. I was struggling and this app solved all my problems. It gives me my net macros, gives meal suggestions, allows for food to easily be added with scanning of barcodes, calculates my goals throughout the day based on my exercise (pairs really well with Apple Watch functions) and so much more. If you are looking for an app the help you understand your macro proportions and help you meat (ha get it) your goals on a low carb diet this is the one.

title: Good, could use a few improvements
body: I like this app a lot. I use it daily, it’s really helping me stay on track. Takes a lot of thinking out of the diet. Calculates my macros for me and helps adjust to fit my goals.

title: Love this app!
body: This has helped me so much with Keto. I love tracking my food and seeing where my macros are for the day. It is so helpful when I need to check something to see if it will put my carbs over. I have found one of the most useful features to be the fact that I can go back and look at past days to see what I ate!

title: Billing problems
body: I love this app so much! My only complaint is that I signed up for the full membership, then I quit using the app (I fell off the Leto wagon) and when I reinstalled the app it reinstalled with the basic non-membership version, which was fine as I wasn’t using the recipes, but I just got billed for the full membership and I can’t use all the features and it wants me to pay again to use them. Not sure how to contact customer service so I don’t know how to cancel or start receiving the recipes I’m paying for without having to pay again.

title: A few things could make this app 5 stars..
body: I’ve been using this app for a few weeks now and I really like it. There are a couple of additions that would bump my rating from four stars up to five stars. First, I would really like to see both total carbs and net carbs included in my daily totals. Second, I would like to be able to enter a recipe, and then add a fraction of that recipe to my tracker. When I make a recipe, it usually has 6 to 8 portions. Dividing every single ingredient by the number of portions before I enter it into the meal creator is tedious. Otherwise, I’m happy with the app.

title: Old Was Better
body: I used to adore CMgr, but now?  Lets just say I have too much history to switch.

title: Only Issue
body: My wife & I are on the Keto diet. She has a recipe and we entered the same chili recipe on both of our phones. We have even compared the recipe with our phones side by side; ie: same exact ingredients, same exact amount of each, & same yielded amount (5 servings). However, when I click on it on my phone: it shows 4g carbs; 35g fat; 52g protein....On my wife’s phone it shows: 4g carbs; 44g fat; 36g protein.
response: Hey there - we'd love to help determine what the issue is. One possibility is if one of you did a quick edit on the food, but there are other possibilities. Please contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll figure out why there's a difference. Thanks!

title: Crazy easy and intuitive
body: This is the most intuitive, easy app for keto. So simple to use and yet the most resources, food and drink items I’ve ever seen in an app. I use the scan feature when shopping and I’m amazed at the “hidden” carbs in foods. I say no to more foods than I ever have, and yet I am not craving anything bad. My choices are spot on by using this app all day. I lose anywhere from0.6 to 1.0 pounds per day! p.s. I did pay for the premium, but well worth it. And it was cheap, I forgot how much, but I think it’s $25 for a year!

title: Keeps me on track
body: Love the app! I’ve been following the Ketogenic way of eating for almost 2 years and this app helps keep you on track. It’s super easy to log foods, even stuff from restaurants and you can make your own combinations of foods from ingredients. One recommendation from a faithful user is to change the colors of the macronutrients pic chart. Fat should be green (good) carbohydrates should be red (bad). Or allow the user to customize the colors. If you are serious about Keto or just eating low-carb, you need this app!

title: Enjoying Carb Manager a lot!
body: I appreciate all the features this app offers me, and I’m learning a huge amount about the keto diet and what’s in the foods that I have eaten every day for decades, thinking they were healthy, but unable to lose weight.  After 3 days tracking my typical food consumption, then 4 days adhering to Carb Manager’s keto limits, I’ve lost 3 lbs!  This app made it possible.  Plus you can find recipes, save your own recipes, make your own food lists, etc.  But this app can be used for much more than just keto.

title: Love this for a new diabetic!
body: I am amazed at how many brand-name foods are in the database. I love being able to edit my choices, create my meal plans ahead of time… I only have one question, I can’t seem to find out how many days it will save. I have to go back to the endocrinologist in one month, and I don’t know if I’ll be able to show her all of my meal plans of the previous at least 30 days. I might go to the premium plan mainly because I’d like to be able to save entire meals for quick reference.

title: User friendly...especially with a friend
body: Downloaded app yesterday, & between a motivated friend & myself, we avoided getting “stuck” trying to figure things out. We’re both moving right along developing our facility to negotiate all the many features: videos of recommended exercises, recipes, & best of all, in the Daily Log, the pie chart to the left, & the details of what you’ve chosen to the right, or are planning to eat on the right. We each signed up for the one year Premium option.👍👍👍

title: Best app for a low carb diet!
body: I’ve tried many diets in my life. I would loose weight but eventually I couldn’t follow the diet anymore and gained back the weight. Carb Manager has allowed me to pick my favorite foods while keeping with the low carb guidelines. It made me realize that some of the food I was eating were just high carbs and should be avoided. I lost over 40 lbs the first year and have kept it off. My LDL went down and I think I prevented myself from becoming diabetic. I love the app and would recommend it to anyone.

title: Not happy with new update
body: I liked the way it was.  I was able to connect with my iPhone 1 time, and I don’t like the new version.   The new version constantly tells me it’s having trouble connecting to my WiFi.  I’m sitting in the same room with my WiFi system and my phone shows there to be a strong signal yet your app won’t connect.   I shouldn’t have to work so hard to get your app to work!  I don’t know what bugs you fixed, but now there seems to be more problems.
response: Hi there! Looks like you might still be on a slightly older version of the app that doesn't include any bug fixes. Please be sure to update to the latest versions of both our app and iOS, and if you're still running into trouble, don't hesitate to reach out to our friendly support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: Love This App
body: I love this app! It works with all 3 low carb-type diets and couldn’t be easier to use. The food lookup lust is endless and I love the icons that let you know if a food is diet “friendly” or not. I think this is the last app I’ll ever need because it does everything I’ll ever need!

title: Carb conscious
body: It’s an easy app to use to plan out your whole day. It offers really good recipes that have been tried and true. Not only can you track your carb intake, but you can also track your calories, fat, protein, etc. this app is helpful because sometimes people don’t use the best judgment and end up eating more carbs than they think. With this app, you know exactly what you are putting into your body and how much you are consuming on a day to day basis. I highly recommend using it.

title: Everything I hoped and almost perfect.
body: What I wanted from this app was to see in detail my daily percentages of vitamin intake. I wanted to know how close I am to reach my daily goal. What I like very much about this app is the ability to select a food or custom input data then see my result. It’s great! ***my one improvement to the app would be time stamps for meals. I’d like to see when I last ate. This would make me check the app more often and also be helpful to me.*** You do have to pay for the detailed feature. I am currently trying it for one month at 8 bucks.

title: Exactly what I needed
body: I’m a long time MFP user but in order to properly count macros in a ketogenic diet, this is the best app around (free version). It really has everything you need, without all the bells and whistles. There are some features that are “premium only” such as changing the name, amount and order of your meals that I think would be great to include in the free version. I’d consider paying for this app if there was a 1-time fee. I don’t do any subscriptions. There are too many features in the paid version that I don’t need such as recipes and meal plans. Overall, great app. Very happy.

title: Success at last!
body: I'd been doing the keto diet for 3.5 months with no weight loss but kept at it because I felt so much better. My daughter decided to try keto with me and got this app, so I did too. This app made such a difference. I've lost seven pounds in 2 weeks and this is another thing I can share with my daughter : ) I love this app! Especially like the copy function. My seven ingredient coffee can be copied as my breakfast to my afternoon snack or even to another day, no need to find each ingredient again. Thanks so much for this app!

title: Carb manager rocks!
body: I love this app! Just started a week ago and am finding that the Keto diet is easy to keep track of using this. I do not have the premium package (yet.) I like the option of keeping your favorite foods on the list plus adding ones you or someone else have created. Being able to edit foods and amounts to check your current daily numbers is great. The option to copy foods onto other days. The ability to scan....I could go on and on. Thank you for this wonderful app!

title: Great app
body: Lots of features and lots to do if you want to get into the nitty gritty details of your diet. The recipes are plentiful and the ability to make your own custom recipe is wonderful. Only 4 stars because there is no feature to save a recipe. You have to favorite the recipe and then it stores it in the exact same place as your favorite individual food items. That's a lot to scroll through when you've been saving recipes to make in the future. If they figure out a way to save recipes without having to make them a favorite, I'd give 5 stars.

title: Love the premium
body: I started using this app to supplement my Weight Watchers WW app.  Although I am at Goal weight with WW I wanted an app to track my food in more depth.  This app gives me the ability to track exact carbs, proteins, fats, sugars, calories and many other statistics.   The premium has the scanner I needed and access to recipes plus a great way to see your progress in more depth!  It was worth the extra $30 a year for me to get the entire suite available on this app.  I love the app! In fact I like this app better than my WW app!

title: Has helped me stay on track!
body: Thanks to Carb Manager I’ve been able to successfully start and maintain my Keto Diet! It helps me plan ahead so I know exactly what I’ll be eating that day/week; it helped tremendously this weekend when I was out of town! Staying in a hotel and depending on restaurant food was my weekend but thankfully I had this app to help me make smart decisions and plan ahead so I didn’t make any mistakes in a hurry with our server! Plus, I found some great gas station snacks I could eat on the road trip! Love love love this app!

title: Doesn't work half the time
body: When it works, it's great. But ever since I started using it again, it will very often just refuse to load. I have deleted and reinstalled the app, it doesn't help. It tells me to check my Internet connection. My Internet connection is fine, everything else works. I'm not going to renew this, and will probably cancel it early, because it does no good when it won't even load. On the few occasions when it does finally open after spinning for a long time, it just brings me to a non-functional new day. I can't enter anything, I can't scroll to another day.  I just re-installed it yet again, and it won't even open.
response: Hi, and thanks for sharing your experience. We are certain the app's performance will be greatly improved with our new app's launch in early Fall. Please reach out to customer service at Settings- "Need Help? , so they can troubleshoot this issue with you now.

title: Clearly Disappointed
body: Researched, read the reviews and needing help managing my Type 2 diabetes I decided to download. Graphics are nice and I played with it and decided to buy the Premium so I could sync with my Fitbit which I love. I paid $50 bucks only to find out the data flows one way. From Fitbit to Carb Manager but carb manager doesn’t read the food so you get nothing but calories in gross numbers. I also understood I could log blood sugar readings and insulin. Never found it. To top it off, just now, for the first time in 5 years with Fitbit their app quit logging data input. I cancelled my subscription only to find out it’s cancelled for next year, not a refund for poor performance which I deserve. So Developers... if you read this I want a refund.

title: Great Functionality...when the app opens
body: My wife and I have both been using the app for our keto diet and really love the functionality of it overall. However, no matter whether we are connected through our home Internet or cellular many times the app now takes forever to open or simply does not. I am pretty certain it is not an Internet or cell phone configuration issue. Maybe we reaches a data retention limit or something... Note: we are not yet on a subscription. Still testing the app out before committing.

title: Not just for Keto
body: I know most people probably use this app for Keto. I’m just using it to track my macros and this is hands-down the best app I’ve tried. It has so many pre-entered foods and nutrition facts and varying portions with easy to use sliders to adjust serving sizes and serving measurement types. For example it has cups, grams, ounces as well as stalks and inches like if you’re eating celery or asparagus.

title: Great app for low carb high fat diet
body: I use this to track my macros and I love how I can import recipes (after paying for the upgrade). The only problem I’ve noticed though is sometimes it shows the macros of downloaded recipes than different from what the recipe shows. If I want to though I can easily enter the ingredients I actually used to make the item and it will show accurate results.

title: BEST AP EVER FOR DIETING!!!!!!!
body: It took me a couple days to get the hang of it and I am not normally a dieter but there comes a time in your life when you just have to do it!  I just turned 50 and started going through menopause. This app is amazing.  It has opened my eyes to how little I have to eat to rack up the carbs and sugar and calories. I’ve lost 11 pounds and six days already!  Just started my exercise regiment on day 4 and lost two more pounds in the following two days.  On my way to surely hit my goal to lose 30 pounds in 90 days!!!!!

title: Love hate relationship
body: This app is by far the best app to track nutritional value. I did pay for the upgrade for the year and the extras you get are very helpful. My complaint is how often this app crashes. Even closing it and reopening it does not work. I have to shut down my phone and restart it, but even that does not always solve the problem. Been looking for customer support but cannot find contact info to report this. Could it be my phone? Possibly, but this is the only app that’s glitching right now. When it works, I love it! When this issue is resolved, I’d happily update my review to 5 stars!

title: The numbers don’t add up
body: I was super excited to find this app. But over using it for several days, realized the math did not add up. When looking at mayonnaise, I noticed that the numbers for 1/2 cup were NOT double of a quarter cup (and not even remotely close). Then I started to notice that the numbers for the grams of proteins and carbs were not adding up correctly in my daily total. Again, not even close. So its totally useless to do what it claims. You can’t manage your carbs when its a crap shoot if there is ANY accuracy at all. Third thing- I noticed when eating a Kind bar, that was the EXACT same size and flavor as listed in the app, that the carbs, protein and calories were wildly off. I would suggest getting a different app. I am.
response: Thank you for taking the time to review Carb Manager. We're sorry to hear that you've experienced some inaccuracy when logging foods in-app. We'd welcome the opportunity to research a few of the items that were giving you conflicting nutritional information. We absolutely make it a priority to provide accurate and concise information to our users. In this case, we would love to take a closer look to ensure that you're being provided with accurate information. Please contact us in-app directly via "Settings - Need Help" and reference your username Shepherd52. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Best Free App
body: I think this is the best free app out there with lots of features available without paying. I tried to use Fitbit and Myfitness Pal with my Apple Watch and it never clicked right. This app syncs with my watch calories automatically. It’s also easy to track your Macro intake daily, the food you enter goes into the nutrition section of your health app. The only improvement I would suggest is to improve the water intake section. Allow to track ml instead of glasses and have a goal bar for it.

title: Great free app, but not perfect
body: I love this app! It’s fairly simple and easy you use. I find it very helpful to plan out whole entire days of meals days ahead which helps me stay on track.

title: New to Keto
body: So, I decided to try a keto diet. The first day I was going nuts trying to figure and remember my macro nutrients. So I decided to look for an app. I found this one and am just thrilled. It’s easy to track and let’s me know if I am meeting my needs and how many macros I have left for the day... for free. Many things are premium only for meal plans and recipes and nutrient counting, but this is perfect for my needs— I am not using the premium upgrade at this time. I might, down the road. Anyway, great app! I recommend it (and the keto diet.)

title: The new app update is the WORST EVER!
body: I lost all the food I’ve recorded over the past year and carb manager has done nothing to fix the issues. Not to mention it’s impossible to find  logged food.  Please check the reviews from angry users. You won’t find a single person who’s happy with the new update.  If it’s not fixed and they don’t address the issue with their users who have used carb manager for years then it’s time to move on. Already downloaded 2 new apps to try

title: Not happy about update
body: Before when I was using the app you used to be able to scan a food in the grocery store and it will tell you the food rating like saying avoid or moderation or good. Now when I scan items in the store it is extremely frustrating to not see the grade because that is what helped me the most. I reached out to customer support and never heard anything back. Is anybody else having these issues?It is a major buzz kill that it does not say this anymore. There are a lot of items in the store that you think would be keto friendly and when I scanned them and it says it’s not that helps me more than just seeing the macros that are posted now with this upgrade
response: Hi there! We still have Keto Grades: Friendly (green) Limit (yellow) Strictly Limit (red) Avoid (red)- so you can still check the food items while you're grocery shopping! If you need additional assistance with the Keto Grades or anything else, please reach out directly to support@carbmanager.com and reference your User App Review Name. We'll make certain that someone responds to your email ASAP!

title: Perspective
body: I’ve only been Keto-ing for 6 days. I couldn’t imagine following this diet without a way to put my foods, calories, proteins, and Carbs into perspective. The great thing is that once you’ve plugged in a food, it’s saved and ready for you to click on it for another day. As the day goes on, the app generates how many carbs you have left in the bank. Also, if you plug in your exercises,  the app adds carbs back in if you feel like you need to use them. Easy to use and glad I found the app.

title: Best app for Keto/Low Carb!!!
body: I use to use “Fitness Pal” it was a good app but this app just blows them out of the water!!! The creators of this app really put a lot of thought into it. I was able to pick my macro ratios, what kind of diet I’d like and input any restrictions or allergies. My favorite part is the live graph of your daily macros. I’m able to see where I’m at and how much I have left as I’m imputing my food. I was so impressed with the app that I decided to subscribe to 3 months. Very worth it. The premium recipes are so yummy and easy!!

title: WAS Great, Now Lame. Disappointed w/New Update
body: IT WAS GOOD. However, This recent and stupid update is awful and makes it harder to navigate the app. I appreciate the clean and fresh layout but The layout is way too intricate for no reason.  Also, the nutrition labels on foods is INCORRECT now!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! That’s probably the worst part. Im in a Keto group and many of my fellow Keto people are so unhappy with this new update. It also makes it confusing for beginners.

title: Love it!
body: I have the free version & love it!   The food library is extensive so it’s easy to enter meals.  I really love how simple it is to track carbs, fat, fiber, and protein.  When I first got the app I was given the option to choose the type of diet.  I am on the keto diet.  The app gave me a breakdown of how many calories I should take in, how many grams of carbs, fat, and protein in a day in order to lose about 2 pounds per week.  I’m losing more than that because of the added exercise I engage in. I highly recommend this app.

title: One of the best--if not the best
body: I never write reviews but this time I was compelled to do so. This is one of the best apps I've ever used.  It's SUPER user friendly and intuitive. I especially like the ability to scan bar codes.  Every item I've scanned has been available. Also very useful is the function to copy meals from previous days.  I typically have the same salad for lunch.  I'm able to quickly copy the entire meal.  Needless to say, this app is HIGHLY recommended. I would not change a thing.

title: Keri Success Insured-Carb Manager
body: Just started keto last week. Found this great app and compared it with two others. I deleted those two and stayed with Carb Manager. It tells me how many net carbs I’ve eaten and how many I have left to go for the day. It tells me grams of fat, grams of protein and all the percentages that I need for macros. It even tells me how many calories that I’ve consumed for the day. And you can track water too. And it’s easy to copy food entries from one day to another, and one meal to another.  Five stars-YES!!!

title: UX needs upgrade
body: The app has all the features you need in a good tracking app. That’s why I decided to pay for the yearly subscription.

title: Premium?
body: Love the app & all its functionality.  Since I have multiple food allergies, and Keto is tough to do dairy-free, I especially love the searchable database of recipes.
response: Hey MommaAng2 - Thanks so much for the detailed review. Please reach out to our support team at support@carbmanager.com and they'll be happy to help you with each of these points mentioned. Please allow up to 12 hours for a response. Cheers!

title: Great app! So helpful with Keto diet!!
body: So I’m only 1 week into Keto I’ve already lost 5.5 pounds and I don’t feel hungry at all.

title: Almost....
body: Great app. It’s almost perfect except you still can’t print one of there own recipes if you have an iPhone. That was one of the features that I was very interested in. There is a work around of going to the website or emailing to myself to then print. I’m paying for the app. I would like to be able to print directly from my phone. So much more convenient. I was told 2 or 3 months ago they were working on it. They are very responsive to questions, etc. I would give it 5 stars if not for this print issue.

title: Going good so far
body: So far it’s going good, only been using 1 week. The main things I do not like is that I can not multi-add my foods per my meals, just have to keep going back and forth between recently used and my foods. I also wish the recently used foods list was longer, I find within 3 days I have to re-scan my food. Lastly, I’ve had to add 3 foods to “my foods” which is fine, I understand there is a ton of food out there, I just have had more success in this with other apps. However, this app keeps very very accountable with my Keto Diet. Thank you

title: Keto Necessity
body: The Carb Manager has allowed me to control my weight-loss.  I know exactly how many carbs and calories I am consuming.  It is easy to use and allows you to create recipes from your meals   Saves time in using the app when you have that same meal again. App lets you sync with a Fitbit and you can graph your weight and measurements and enter blood glucose levels to really see how your meal choices impact your blood sugar levels.  Was recommended to me by a Keto group on FB.  App will help me carve out a healthy future.

title: Time!
body: Love this app!  I’ve been using it for almost 3 years - it just gets better and better.  The Track Meal Time feature is my latest discovery. I’d been tracking meal times so I’d know how long I’d fasted, how late I had coffee, etc.  But wait!  This evening I discovered I can adjust the time to show when I actually had something instead of when I remembered to track it. It’s wonderful.
response: Thank you for the great review - we're always happy to help! We'll definitely look into the issue with frequent and recently viewed foods. Thanks for letting us know. We'll also try to improve the wheel picker. If you have a minute to check out the latest version of the app (6.0.2), we'd love your feedback on it as well. Thanks and best wishes.

title: So far so good!
body: I signed up for 3 months of the premium. I’m loving the tracking of my macros and the delicious easy recipes most of which look like something out of a cuisine magazine if prepared correctly! Food that looks good seems to taste better. Maybe that’s just me! 😉 Being able to enter my foods into my meal planner and pre-plan my macros for the day and design meals around what keeps me on track is great and really makes KETO a no-brainer!

title: Best keto app !
body: This app is great!  It is by far the best app to track carbs, exercise, weight, and measurements.  I gladly pay for the premium because it is worth it.  I have tried so many different apps and none compare to this one.  I can enter and save my own recipes.  Everything I have scanned so far has been in their database.  It’s extremely easy to use with many bonus features.  If you are struggling to find an app that is right for you while on the keto journey then try this one!

title: Honestly… it keeps me honest. Continues to improve
body: So I’ve been using this app on and off for almost 2 years. The developers do a great job at keeping it current and updating the database so you don’t have to hand enter food. I love that I can select a restaurant and see a list of options. When I’m not seeing the results that I’m looking for I realize that I’m actually not tracking the way that I should be. When I go back and stay consistent I have a stark improvement. Go ahead and buy the yearly subscription, it’s worth it.

title: Used to love it
body: The new updated version is constantly crashing. I have a LOT of foods entered, as I have been using the pro version for years, but since they “upgraded”, I often have to re-enter foods as I can’t find them using the recipe name. Eventually I sometimes come across them as double entries because of this. The carb counts are often wrong, and it rare that I can actually import a recipe.  This has always been an issue, but it is way worse now!  I am sticking with this app for now, only because I don’t want to start over again entering my recipes.  I truly hope they will bring this app back to the shiny star it (almost) used to be!
response: Hi, and thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Since you posted it, many fixes and improvements have been implemented by our Development Team. If you have any questions or continuing issues, please reach out to us directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. We are very happy to assist! :)

title: Good but want to see % in pie chart
body: I’m new to tracking my food and this app was recommended.  So far it’s ok, but sometimes finding food isn’t that easy and even food that I have logged before.  I’m playing around still, so maybe it will get easier.  One thing I would love is if the pie chart could show the % instead of the grams.  I’m tracking percentages.  I know I can click on each one to see them... but I want to see all of them at once.  I have looked all over the app and through the settings to see if there is an option to change that, and I haven’t found it.
response: Hi there - Great news! We released a new update over the weekend that added % back to the My Macros chart AND that includes the option to view the pie chart! We're continuing to listen and respond to feedback about our new app update to make sure that Carb Manager 7 is the best macros tracker on the market. If you have any other questions, don't hesitate to reach out in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: Almost Perfect
body: It is a very good App. The vast array of foods listed is exceptional. Well done. The ability to copy from one day to the next is excellent. The ability to transfer all data from certain websites into the App is a bit confusing to the point of frustration. This needs fixing. Alas, the App also needs a Monitor who will filter various entries that contradict one another, which leave me, the user, trying to determine an HONEST entry.
response: Hey there! Thanks so much for the 4 star review, and for the constructive feedback. We're aware that the food database could use some improvements, and the issue that you mention is on our radar! I don't quite understand what you mean with regard to transferring data, but we take customer feedback very seriously, so we'd love to hear more. I invite you to please reach out to our friendly support team via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: The app is ok but
body: It works fine but I personally found low carb unpalatable on a long term basis.  I want to cancel my subscription but can’t find a way to do it. In settings the website option says it will send an email with instructions. Tried it twice and received no email.  Tried the iPad option and it only allowed a change in the billing period/type but no option to cancel.  This seems pretty shady way to keep a subscription running when a person wants to cancel.  Could someone advise me how to cancel?
response: Hello, and thanks for sharing your experience. Canceling should not be difficult. Please reach out to customer service at Settings -“Need Help?” and they can assist.

title: Great when it actually works
body: Was enjoying the app and getting a lot of great use out of it. Suddenly, it stopped loading or opening. I’d go to the app and tap on it, and it would show a spinning wheel like it was loading and never actually open. When promoted to reload I would and it would do nothing. I was promoted to ask for support and all the suggestions they have made no difference. Might just be my device but if I can’t get the app to open and run then it doesn’t really help me. Wish it would have kept working.

title: Great app
body: Switched to the app bc it is optimized for keto and net carbs.  But the recommended calories is too low for me and my only criticism is that when I change the calorie count it reverts to the app count based on my height and weight, despite hitting apply etc.  and I have rebooted the app.  Only glitch i see.  Also MyFitnessPal has a frequently paired feature so the user can easily check off frequently selected items. I know you can’t copy but … also aware of copy feature but …

title: Super useful!
body: I just switched to keto to lose my postpartum weight & started using this app the first day of switching- it’s been 5 days and I’m down 9 lbs!! This app is easy to use to set my goal, monitor my macros, and I get to track my weight. I went to Rite Aid and got Ketone test strips for super cheap, and eventually wanna purchase the Premium version just so I can track those levels but it’s definitely worth downloading even if you don’t want to purchase premium. Thank you to the creators of this app!

title: Great app
body: Very easy to use and it has a website component which is amazing for logging at work.   I especially love the Glucose index and the diabetic carbs - it gives a view of how your body reacts to food that other apps don’t show. 😍

title: Makes Tracking So Easy
body: This app does so many ‘little things’ so well. Every barcode scans. Every product can be entered in any unit you like (weights or volume or quantity). Repeat foods default to their last measurement. The My Foods list is easily accessible (though admittedly, it took a few weeks to find it).

title: With use and education and dedication comes victory!
body: It’s like most things that we have all around us. It’s a tool to use if we know how to use it.

title: Best Help for Keto
body: Having looked at all the apps and sales pitches from other Keto plans, this app for the price is the best!  Just the ability to scan foods to see their values, help to create my own recipes and maintain my macros is huge.  Let’s you import recipes for example from Pinterest and evaluate ingredients, you can edit said recipes and delete or add your own ingredients to make them healthier...the list goes on and on.  The more I use it the more I learn.  I have tied my fit bit into the app....amazing!

title: Keeps Me on Track
body: I like how the net carbs you have remaining for the day are the focal point. It’s also easy to look at all your other macros and fiber for the day. Very easy to use... can scan food. Only thing that’s kind of annoying is if you search for food, sometimes it either doesn’t exist or it’s wrong, but users can edit the nutrition information so it’s not a HUGE deal, just can be a bit of an inconvenience sometimes. Overall, I really like the app and would recommend. I would actually give it 4.5 stars.

title: Great App!!!
body: It lets me know how much I can eat to lose weight. I make up meals and the app helps with the amounts. I can add recipes and adjust them to my tastes and needs. I never have to eat something I don’t like. I even have the ability to add a gram of food at a time to get it perfect. Let’s you reset your goals whenever you want or hit a plateau. The recipes can be set for one serving or the whole family. You can be as creative or quick as you like. Unlisted foods can be suggested by users.

title: Awesome
body: Overall I love this application it’s really easy to use the scan feature works perfectly and you can pretty much type in any food and it will come up. It would be nice if you could have a friend in the app that you share your results with and it would be nice if you can save a commonly used food example would be I make the same coffee every morning it would be nice to just save it and Collett my coffee instead of inputting the information every day

title: Great!
body: I went ahead and subscribed because I like the photo recognition (only 3 free). Still exploring all the features. The automatic calculation of nutrients and effective carbs is outstanding. The only thing I'm missing is a way to input items that aren't on the database. Another program I have used allows you to scan barcode snap photo of front and back nutritional info and submit to the database. Maybe I just haven't figured out how yet? Anyway it's great. Fairly pricey for full function. $$$

title: Great app...if you pay for it
body: This app has so many capabilities, but it’s very limited if you don’t pay for premium. They allow you “log” 12 items a day for free. What they really mean, is that you can “search” 12 items a day for free. I logged two items for breakfast and was using the app to search for something I could eat a restaurant, and it blocked me from being able to choose one unless I paid for it because I had already searched 10 items.

title: I love the look of this app
body: Every food item has an icon that goes with it. I like that the graph is at the top of the page so I can see easily where I am for the day on my micros.

title: The best for keto
body: Doing keto for the first time and this app has been really helpful. I tried to use MFP but you can’t adjust your macros, which stinks when you’re very new at something. Well, according to the internet you can load some backdoor script into MFP to make it work but that was way more than I wanted to deal with. After researching, I found Carb Manager and am so happy I did. Gives me structure, motivation, and information all in one. Been using for a week and I’ve lost 6 pounds already.

title: KETO diet TRY IT
body: Started the Keto diet almost two weeks ago after a week of low carbs. Honestly, started after I realized I was eating absurd amounts of carbs. This app has been the keys to any level of success in this diet for me; 8lbs down. Helps keep me on track with setting my Ketogenic macros and having a large selection of nutrition values for the foods I’m actually eating. Didn’t have to buy the expansion for the app to have it be usable and effective but I’m considering it just to see if it can get any better.

title: Not trustworthy
body: It’s a decent app if all you’re looking at is carbs. But every day at every meal I have to change the calorie count of what I’m eating, especially for scanned foods, because it’s wrong in the app (it’s usually off by 10 calories). It’s gotten too frustrating for me and makes me think this app is not conducive for a long term commitment. I don’t have the time to constantly report foods and check if it’s correct. 10 calories might not seem like a big deal, but if we’re talking multiple foods on a daily basis, if it’s not caught it can really throw a wrench in your weight loss goals. Not cool. If they fixed this issue it would get a 5 star review from me.

title: Really Happy with Carb Manager
body: I have used several other tracking apps over several years, but I am so glad I found this one.  Nice clear visuals and easy to locate data and options within the app.  It is the Best I found for easily tracking Net Carbs while following a Keto Diet.  Scanning foods is easy, quick and accurate.  Lots of customizing capabilities.  It easily linked up to my Fitbit, but it would be nice to have more fitness app options available, like Strava for biking for instance.

title: Should include breastfeeding moms
body: I am just setting this up so I can’t speak on the overall user friendliness of the app but it seems easy to use. My only complaint at the moment is that there is no way to account for breastfeeding. The weight watchers program asks whether or not you are breastfeeding during set up and accounts for the extra calories needed in the points balance. It would be nice if this app would do that with the net carbs because a breastfeeding mother cannot diet the same way someone who isn’t breastfeeding can.

title: Great app! Super helpful!
body: Love this app! It helps me track everything! Being able to put in recipes with all the nutritional info helps out so much! Makes my life so much easy doing this Keto lifestyle! What’s great is being able to create a recipe and sharing it with my husband or friend so we don’t have to enter in all the info individually all the time.

title: Newbie but loving my energy and weight loss
body: I do love this app and purchased the Premium and it’s been very helpful

title: Love it
body: Right now I’m just using the simple version of it I haven’t purchased the upgrade for the app. But I still really love it because it helps me pay attention to what I’m putting into my body and it helps me understand and then that it was a visual to it to where I can see the numbers. And then I can modify things which I really like. So it makes life a little easier it makes it less complicated and it kind of doesn’t numbers for you so I think it’s great

title: App crash & frequent glitches
body: I had used this app in the past and upgraded to the Premium plan. I liked it well enough but stopped using it after awhile and let the premium plan end. Due to some dietary changes, I started using the app again just a few days ago and again upgraded to the Premium Plan. This time around, I’ve noticed that the app is very glitchy. Fields you should be able to type in don’t always work, upon opening the app it flashes in and out, and now - just a few days later after spending $30 to upgrade - I can’t even access the app to log my information! It just spins. So frustrating!

title: Great App
body: I read a lot of good feedback about this app so I decided to try it a few weeks ago. It is terrific. Unlike some apps yours is very intuitive and therefore only requires a few minutes to log in of my meals and snacks. I would offer a suggestion for one of your future updates. Is would be more user friendly if the recently used food list was presented to the user alphabetical to make it that much easier to find. Thanks again for such a great app..

title: Keto made easy!
body: This app has been amazing with the scan the product feature there is no guess work and mist all food I look for including restaurants are in there. I have lost 10 lbs to date and this is only day 6! Thank you so much to developers this is way better than other apps as it provides openings to different styles of keto and also will give you your macros based of your keto style and weight! Download now because that’s all in the free version.

title: Great for tracking, even if you're not low carb!
body: This is my favorite tracking app, and it feels like I've tried them all! It's not just for keto, or low carb--you can select whatever your specific goals/macro needs are. I feel like it has more options for ounces/grams than MFP for those who weigh their food. My only criticism would be, I wish you could remove the 'keto grade' feature, as I am not keto and always feel a little judged when I log a food that gets a keto grade of F. 🤣

title: Very helpful but a little buggy
body: I downloaded this app a few days ago and so far it’s been extremely helpful, especially with meal planning.  But it has some bugs, such as miscounting my total carbs. The nutrition database is a fantastic resource as is the barcode scanner.  I may eventually pay for the premium version.

title: Update makes it annoying and less functional
body: New update is horrible. It takes too long to open app, takes too long to search for foods etc. New update is incredibly bad.

title: Give it a try
body: Honestly I think this is the best keto app out there. Not that it’s perfect but I’ve been scammed hard by other keto apps and this one is above board. You can tailor your macros, create and share recipes and scan bar codes, develop meal plans that sync to your daily food journal or use generic ones. The recipes are great too and I love that you can leave reviews for other users to see. A lot of times people post substitutions to recipes that they’ve tried. You could use this app for any diet, i think it’s better than MyFitnessPal.

title: Review ! Love it!
body: I recently was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes. I was overwhelmed and did not how to start taking care of my self by changing my eating habits ! This app has been amazing in helping keep track of my carbs and calories. It has been so helpful to be able to add what I want to eat and truly see if it’s the best choice before I consume my meal. I love everything about it . I am losing weight and my glucose readings in the morning before I eat are dropping every day ! I high recommend this app!

title: Found a problem
body: I logged my Coke Zero intake and it shows 3grams of protein which is contradicting to what Coke states. I have only used this app for a couple days but really like it a lot better than Cronometer app. I am committed to the Keto diet and have lost over 30 lbs (not a Puritan though...like my Coke Zero). After a month I will review it again in detail and then I will purchase the premium app and do another review. This review is mainly for customer support to see if their is a fix for this issue.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We see you! :) We have a process for reporting food errors that we're happy to share with you. In order to report an error, please open the food, then tap the ⋮ button in the top right corner and select Report Error. In the fields that appear, you can enter the corrected nutrition information. However, to discuss this in more detail, please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Twistin Dragon". Thank you!

title: Carb Manager
body: This is a great App for the Keto Zone diet. I plug in what I am going to eat and it breaks it down to show my macros instantly. This lets me adjust my meals as needed to maintain my macros to get to my goal. The only thing I have found that I don't like is say I make jalapeno poppers stuffed with cream cheese and wrapped in bacon, the gives you 40 kinds of poppers that you can purchase but doesn't allow for them being home made. But that is a small price to pay because I don't know what I would do without it.

title: Very good app but... is it crippleware?
body: Great for Keto if you spend $40 a year. Unfortunately the billing is all in one lump sum and not monthly. The other complaint I have is that periodically the app devs rollback features on non subscribers. What once was a feature you are used to using has been locked out until you pay. Almost sounds like a master marketing plan. It Gets you used to something that you can’t live without then bam pay up. Still a good app even though it is yes, crippleware
response: Hi Kyaecker, sorry about that. This problem has now been fixed. We'd love it if you could update your review when you get. Thanks!

title: Helpful but flustering
body: Having recently been put on a low carb diet I was excited to try this app. However I’ve become very flustered with many of its quirks. Some noted include

title: Perfect Keto tracker
body: I downloaded the free app after I read a recommendation in a Keto cookbook.  After navigating and playing around with the app, I purchased a one year subscription to the premium app because I love it so much.

title: Fabulous, but no offline mode
body: Fantastic app! I love all the premium settings and would highly recommend this for anyone who manages their macro and micronutrients on a daily basis. The only reason I took away one star is because the app does not have an offline setting. Considering that other “calorie counting” apps (like Livestrong) DO offer a limited but still functioning app when offline, I encourage the tech wizards of this app to get on that and OFFER IT!!

title: Great App
body: This is a great free app to get started with Keto or ANY diet!!! It’s a little tedious to keep adding your food but it’s worth the little time.  You’ll be surprised with the calories, fat and carbs.... but once you’re in the groove it’s a piece of cake!

title: Used to love it… easy to use.
body: The app in the last couple of updates seems to have gotten slower and is a bit less user friendly.  It may be more of getting used to it but it seems it was a lot of interface/graphic updates to make it look better.  Does not seems a fast when searching or finding the right menu/button.  Perhaps I’ll get used to it and hope so.  Great tool and actually glad to see the update it regularly.  However too much May make it harder to use and drive me to look at other options.
response: Hi there, thanks for the constructive feedback! We would love to hear more suggestions from our valued customers. Please feel free to fill out this quick form so that we can improve the new version of Carb Manager. Just copy and paste into your browser: https://7vh.short.gy/EOi89i If you need extra guidance with any features of the new version, our Support Team is at the ready to answer any questions you may have. Just message us directly within the app!

title: New update is garbage
body: The new update was a radical redesign making it more difficult to navigate, less intuitive, and they’ve expanded all the elements so you can’t see your entire day in one screen anymore without scrolling up and down. If the you I needed some modernization they didn’t have to completely nuke the original user interface. I’m sure there are tens of thousands of people out there just like me hating the redesign. I really hope they walk some of this back in a new update, but considering how expensive it clearly was to do all of that redesign work there’s no way the decision-makers are going to do that. Really unfortunate.

title: Good app/confusing recipes
body: I’ve done many food lifestyles over many years and have used a few apps. Carb manager is very good except the recipes are confusing. I made pancakes which had 10 teaspoons of oil listed in ingredients but instructions didn’t specify to add it to wet ingredients or use in pan for frying. Since the plan is very carb/calorie driven the ingredients/ amounts can make a difference in daily counting.  Also serving sizes for recipes are a little vague. Usually says one serving so you’d have to batch up the whole recipe to be accurate. Would be easier if it said 1 cup mashed cauliflower, etc. but recipes are good.
response: Hi, and thanks for the helpful feedback. If you have a question about a recipe, you can ask in the comments, and often the recipe writer will respond. You can also reach out to customer service at Settings-“Need Help?“.

title: App stalling on load
body: Love the app and used it for months without an issue however as of the last week the app keeps stalling and asking to check internet connection whenever I load it even when on Wi-Fi. This makes it hard to log and a bit frustrating but everything else is great, I do wish they would let you export your projected weightloss to a larger chart so I can see estimated dates but that’s not really a compliant. I spent the money and purchased a membership, has been worth it so far.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing an issue with the app responding in varying environments. Our support team is ready, willing, and able to assist you further! Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "NinjaHavekk" so that we can help! Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Best app for Keto Diet!
body: I was using My Fitness Pal for ever! I loved it when utilizing other diet plans. As I transitioned into Keto I had to find a more efficient solution. This app puts you net carbs front and center. Best PART!!!! It is free to record and learn on the app. As you get acquainted, you can adjust your macros and goals. I am seriously considering the Pro for the analytic portion. I am try to make this my lifestyle so this feature will help me adjust my habits. If your trying to keep your carbs in check this is the App for you.

title: Upgrade to premium after I had purchased premium?
body: When I got this app, there was a free version and there was a paid version. I purchased the paid version due to my health issues.
response: Hi there - thanks for getting in touch! Please contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll get you upgraded.

title: Best I've Used
body: I have been tracking my diet for many years. I used FitDay which is a good app but hasn't been updated in years. I tried several others until coming across Carb Manager. I follow a ketogenic lifestyle and this app makes my life so much easier.  I love that it makes finding what I've eaten before easy. I love the scan function, and the vast database. I love the portion controls, and I love the integration with other activity and health apps.  So solid. So easy! Kudos to the developers.

title: Would be 5 stars if ...
body: I really like this app except for one thing- and it’s a big thing. The whole app is store on the cloud. This creates a problem for me because I live, work & play in the mountains- very rural & don’t always have a good data signal or WiFi. Which means the app is very slow or I can’t use it at all. Which is very frustrating.

title: Just starting the Keto eating
body: If I did not have this app I would have eaten so many foods not allowed.  I love the ease of finding foods and adding it to my daily chart.  Exercise and supplements too.  Had I not boo ugh this this I would still be trying to lose.  I only weigh at the doctors but knew by my clothes that I had gained weight.  I think tomorrow or Thursday is my 7th day and I know I’ve lost weight.  I did take a pic so in a few weeks I too can see the difference.  Thus app for me was a must.

title: Accountability
body: So I really didn’t know how easy it would be to track Macros and keep track of all thing I ate until I met carb manager lol. Really this app is the best. I now see just how much I was over eating before I downloaded this app and it made me accountable for everything that I put in my body. So thanks again Carb Manager I will continue to use you throughout this journey. Oh and by the way I have lost 14 pounds since Feb 1st and today is Feb 8th!!! Most of it is water weight but Hey I will take it🙂

title: Really want to like it!
body: The app keeps crashing while I’m creating recipes. It makes it really difficult and frustrating to use. I had to use the desktop computer to get a recipe in my account. If it doesn’t crash by the time I have the first ingredient inputted, I save it right away. And keep saving after every ingredient is added. If I wait too long, or it takes to long to find the ingredient I want, it will crash and take me back to the main screen. Please fix the bug! I have several recipes inputted that I would rather not transpose to a different macro app. Thanks!
response: Hi there!

title: Really great App
body: I’m doing a modified Keto diet and this is fantastic for tracking macros but also finding recipes that fit into your diet. Recipes are fairly simple. My only complaint is I wish there was an option to search recipes based on all organic or natural foods or if you could search for recipes that exclude certain ingredients. I’m also trying to stick to the Grain Brain diet that doesn’t allow any processed food and a lot of the recipes seems to have processed ingredients.

title: Great app but preferred the old version
body: I used this app about two years ago and had great success switching to a Keto diet. I took a break and am getting back into it, and I am not loving the update. It’s still a useful app, but the search tool is not great at identifying everyday foods. It is annoying. The old version would also pull up web recipes or recipes submitted by other users. The search tool doesn’t seem to be doing that. Maybe these are all tactics to get users to sign up for the premium membership.

title: Premium isn’t so premium...
body: I started my keto journey with this app and decided to go premium. Sometimes the premium features work, most of the time it did not for me. With a google search, I realized this issue is common enough to be on the FAQ.
response: Thanks for reaching out. That must be very frustrating to not have access to Premium after you've paid for it. Our support team is standing by to look up your account and help you get access to the features that you've paid for. Please contact them at support@carbmanager.com, and you should hear back within 12 hours. Cheers!

title: I love this tool for monitoring what I eat.
body: I would not be able to keep track of carbs and manage sugar intake without the info and discipline of carb mgr.  It is invaluable for maintaining the self- discipline I need as a human being; always wanting greater satisfaction.  When I go through the process of grabbing the phone and thinking though my day to record intake, I am reminded or rewarded with the satisfaction of seeing my progress instead of eating it.  And, eating more is just its never enough

title: Love this little app!
body: First day on Carb Manger and I absolutely love it! I’m on the Virta program and I find this is an awesome tool to use right along side it. It keeps track of your carbs, protein and fat intake. You can scan UPC codes on the back of items to keep track of their values. It has a pro plan you can buy that I’m sure offers a lot of extra help but the free version is awesome as well. Thinking about buying the pro plan though. I completely recommend this app.

user_name: never too old never too late
title: talk about thinking of everything...
body: these guys are great.  Not only is tracking easy but the range of sorting for the info one might choose to track os amazing.  Moreover, the system works! Time after time.  I’ve found no glitches yet & I do lots of work around w this to use the recipes (also winners) for a vegetarian household... my husband & I are doing this together.

title: Really don’t like the newest version
body: I loved the earlier version before this last update. The pie chart made it very easy to check macros at a glance. I really, really don’t like the rings they have now (or the whole new “look” for that matter). I understand wanting to update apps and keep them fresh, but why change the one thing that is most convenient about the app? I even pay for premium but now I’m on the hunt for a new app to switch to. I’ve never written a review before so that should tell you something. I would have given the old version 5 stars.

title: Sometimes.....
body: Hi
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you've run into an issue with Carb Manager and its we thank you for compiling a list of requests. We'd love to offer some suggestions to help! Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username "Nitsrek5" and we'll be happy to lend a hand. Thank you! We feel that the bulk of this issues can be addressed with a small conversation with our support team, so we can't wait to connect with you!

title: Carb app
body: This is the first program that I have actually had success with weight loss. I have lost about 6 pounds and an inch off my waist. It’s affordable and user friendly. Easy to plan meals or have them plan meals for you. The recipes are easy to follow and make and taste amazing! Tech support is very helpful and we’re able to fix my issues when the app updated and kicked me off my premium membership. I rave about this app to all my friends and family.

title: Love the App but Not the Update
body: Love the app as it helps me teach my macro goals, but the update is not as user friendly when it comes to adding or creating custom recipes. Instead of one click on a sidebar, I have to click through several options to take me to a place where I can create a recipe. I also can’t seem to find “My Foods” anymore unless I click “add” on a meal/snack. Sometimes I just want to view/update recipes to meal plan, but it seems the tab isn’t there anymore except in a very roundabout way.
response: Hi there, thanks for the constructive feedback! We would love to hear more suggestions from our valued customers. Please feel free to fill out this quick form so that we can improve the new version of Carb Manager. Just copy and paste into your browser: https://7vh.short.gy/EOi89i If you need extra guidance with any features of the new version, our Support Team is at the ready to answer any questions you may have. Just message us directly within the app!

title: Great app
body: This is a great app

title: This is the app to lose weight!
body: This app is so easy to use. It does the math and keeps track of everything!!! I even push on the app without opening it to scan food items. Love that it remembers foods I’ve had in the past for easy adding to my day. I had no idea what carbs, calories and whatnot I was putting in my body before this- and I knew how to eat keto! The weight chart is challenging and inspiring. It’s celebrates a good day with confetti- yay! I’m shedding weight! That’s the idea, right?

title: So helpful and easy to use!
body: Loved using this app!  I've used My Fitness Pal for a long time but fell off the wagon.  This app is more niche to my diet goals and specifically displays data for keto. Love the scanning option for fast decision making on items.  Love the display of the carb tracker. I started a week ago and stuck to a low carb, low calories diet and was able to lose 4lbs already. Looking forward to new features without having to pay for premium.

title: Still Figuring it Out, but....
body: So far I love how easy it is, overall, to use.  I wish there were more flexibility in adding foods, because if it’s not in the data bank there is no way to add it (can’t even scan it), which leads to guessing, which could lead to inaccuracies, slower weight loss, etc.  (See the problem?).  I also wish it were easier to use the sliders when calculating macros.  But other than those drawbacks, I’m fairly happy with this app!

title: Uber-responsive tech support!
body: An app is only as good as its tech support when a problem arises. Yesterday an unexpected one-off situation arose that froze me out of the app. Through an extended but professional email conversation and information sharing about what happened, Kevin and the technical support team were able to implement a fix on the fly and get things working again. I am more than impressed with the quick and courteous user support for this app.

title: Already lost 4 pounds in a week!
body: What a great app. I’ve been using lose it for many years with mixed results. Only by focusing on the actual macros I not only feel better, have note energy but I also lost 4 pounds in a week. And believe me I know it’s just water weight but after the month of the holiday season this was much needed. This app is very easy to use and when you stick to your macros it makes you looks and lost importantly feel amazing.

title: Life Changing
body: I started the keto diet after attending the Arnold Classic Sports Festival 2k19 and deciding it was time to buckle down on my diet. Carb Manager has made it possible to know where I’m at in the day; it helps me decide what to eat to bring balance to my body. The free version is immensely helpful, I’m likely to upgrade to the paid version once I check out the added features. Thank you developers for your keen attention to detail, you’ve improved the quality of my life.

title: Awesome Carb App
body: This app has changed my life. I am on a mission to be healthy and lose weight. When I accomplish my goal of losing my 50 pounds I WILL continue to use this app throughout my life to manage and balance my daily intake of food. The graphs daily amaze me and whether you are trying to lose, maintain or just be aware what you are putting in your body this app is for you! I am in control of my food instead of controlling me. The extra benefit is it’s fun! Thank you for this free app.

title: Helpful Keto!
body: This is a really helpful app for trying to eat Keto. I was struggling to understand how to really eat with this food lifestyle by this app has helped tremendously. It’s only been a week with the app, but I already feel so much better about how to be keto. It’s more than just meat and cheese which is not something a grasped before the app. I love that I can scan barcodes and quickly tell if it’s something worth eating or not. The ‘keto grade’ is helpful. I’m happy I have found this app.

title: What the doctors don’t tell you
body: This app picks up where a doctors diagnosis drops you off , by the roadside with an old map in hand . It’s been 3 years since my own  Diabetes diagnosis and this is the first time I saw numbers and understood them in real time . In 5 days by tracking my foods using this app my sugar has dropped by an average of 20 points .
response: Thanks for the awesome feedback and sharing your story! These are the kinds of stories that drive us. We're proud of your journey, and happy to help along the way. Feel free to message us in-app anytime by selecting Settings - "Need help?" if we can offer a hand. Thanks!

title: This is a great way to track keto
body: The only issues I have are some syncing issues with some of the apps and watch plus. Other than that, it seems to be a great tracking app for those tired of the push to eat 6 times per day low fat. I love being able to add my own food instead of relying on other entries. I wish people would understand how bad that is for your organs! Oh, i wish the fasting part of it was more robust. I have to use another fasting app and I’m not sure that it syncs with this.

title: Excellent starting point
body: I used Carb Manager when I started my Keto journey. It was immensely helpful in creating and tracking macros that worked for me. I love the app. My only issue is that it has become so popular that there are multiple nutritional information entries for every product/food and they are not all accurate. Some people cannot read, interpret, or enter nutritional information. Someone needs to go through the app’s database and clean it up.

title: IT WONT LET ME IN
body: I have to do a low carb diet for my hula halau competition. I felt the need to track my carbs and such. But as soon as I TRIED to log on it tells me “Still loading? Check your internet or cellular data”. And the thing is I’ve done everything, I checked my data (turned it off and reset it), checked my WiFi, and reset my phone and settings trying to get it to work. I don’t know if anyone else has or had experienced this but if so please fix it. It looks like a great, well thought out app. But, sadly, I cannot get in. Thank you for reading, if you are!
response: Hi there! Thanks for letting us know about the issues that you're experiencing. Please reach out to our friendly support within the app via Settings → Contact Support and they'll be able to get this sorted out for you. Cheers!

title: most useful app for Keto Dieters
body: This app was easy right out of the gate! very intuitive! I love that I can search food entries by establishment or scan bar codes from items in my fridge or at the store! I love that it tracks all my macros and %! I love that I can pre-enter meals and get an idea of where I’ll end up at the end of my day! There’s something about this app that makes it simple and encouraging to enter all my food! I’ve never stuck to it with another app before!

title: Great app for tracking macros
body: I never counted macros before.  After gaining some pounds and not being able to lose them by what I used to do I decided to try keto out.  This app calculates your correct macros based on your weight and goals.  I think they calculate slightly low so I add what my body says it needs but easily was able to drop several pounds and the scale goes lower daily.  This app is the only thing that has ever made me conscious about what I put into my body.

title: Cannot find the grocery list printout
body: A lot of good features except it is buggy freezes a lot I have not been able to print a grocery list for the recipes I use.  No way to ask how to use the app directions on how to use are non existent.  So I gave it a 3 this is the highest rated

title: Carb manager
body: I love this app but at least five days out of seven I have a hard time getting it to load on my iPhone

title: Not completely intuitive, but very comprehensive!
body: I wish it would tell you the recommended amounts you need to change on your macros at a much easier glance, then the small bold print after you ask for a report on your macros. It should have section for “Your Guide” that lines that out better what you need to eat more and less of.

title: SIMPLE & CONVENIENT
body: Took my Iphone with me when shopping and was able to barcode and select best choices for the week. When recording my daily log and scanning foods everything is right there with a tiny thumbnail...all I have to do is select the serving size. Was using & paying for another service but liked the Keto/Diabetic feature & focus. Finally I have help...right at my fingertips, 24/7 to make intelligent choices. This senior citizen gives a thumbs up.

title: The BEST app for tracking
body: I’ve used this for several months and am always amazed at how user friendly it is. What prompted me to write this are two recent experiences - one with a meal delivery service and one importing a recipe from the web. I have recently started using Hello Fresh and am thrilled to find that this app has all the Hello Fresh menus in their database. Further, I found an interesting recipe on the web and was able to import it directly and flawlessly into the database. Wow!

title: Love this app!
body: I absolutely love this app! It’s super easy and convenient. I have it set to remind to log all my food in for the day and the way they break down everything is great! I want to get the premium part of the app and get a yearly subscription but I am not sure if they will charge me the full amount or will charge me a certain amount monthly! I would love to just pay the few dollars a month cause this is such a great app with great recipes and everything!

title: I ❤️ the app
body: I was really glad to be able to start using the app the only thing I would change would be as a new person to Counting my macros I’m still a little uncertain if I put in the information correct in my settings meaning that I just want to make sure I’m eating the correct amount for my age and weight etc. like the right amount of carbs versus calories versus fat and protein is there anywhere in the app that it describes this thanks Cheryl

title: New Updates Look Good, but don’t function well
body: A little while ago, Carb Manager introduced a new updated that completely overhauled the app. They fixed several issues that needed to be updated and revamped the look of the app. However, the update also introduced new bugs that cause some parts of the app to not function. The biggest issue I’ve run into is not being able to edit custom recipes. This is a major problem, given that I often create my own/or edit other recipes to reflect my own ingredients. Please fix!
response: Hi there! Thanks for the feedback, and for reaching out. We've actually released a few updates to the new app already that should have taken care of glitches with custom recipes. If you're running the most recent app version and still experiencing issues, please reach out to Support in-app via Settings → Help & Support and they'll troubleshoot any remaining issues with you! Thanks!

title: Great for what I need.
body: Great for tracking macros & calories. Love the scan feature when it works.

title: Terrible lately
body: I’m about to throw this app in the trash. Been using it for a while and was considering upgrading, but it’s SO incredible buggy, I can’t see that it warrants the investment. Lately, I’ll be in the middle of entering a meal, and it will interrupt my entry and put up the “premium” or upgrade option on the screen, and of course, the x button to close that screen doesn’t work, so you’re stuck there and can’t get out of it. Even when I close the app, and launch it again, the upgrade screen is the first thing that appears now. If the free option is no longer available, just say so. Time to move on.
response: Hi there - we're so sorry for the problem! This issue should now be fixed.

title: What’s the issue?
body: I was really enjoying this app and then all of a sudden it stopped working. Every time I try to log an item I get an error message that tells me to use the app. Hello I’m already in the app. It tells me if I’m using a company network or VPN to switch to an open network. I am using the app the same way I always have, on my Wi-Fi from home on the app. Please help! This app was such a great tool and I used it daily and that’s why I didn’t give it 5 stars.

title: Perfect App
body: Just started using this App and it is perfect for Keto or low carb. It gives choices of carb/protein/fat ratio which really helped me determine I really did not want Keto. I have tried 3 other apps and this is by far the best. It tracks net carbs, has a camera option, has many Keto recipes, is easy to use, gives summaries whenever you need them... and has taught me lots, ie about the option to fast, how to eat for better sleep, and more. I highly recommend!

title: Best app ever!!
body: My husband and I both went on Carb Manager.  He has last 30 lbs and I have lost close to 30 lbs.  Using this app has helped us so much.  You put in the food you eat and it tells you the carbs, fat, protein and calories.  We put in what we’re going to eat for the day in the morning, so we know we’re staying in the right range.  Thank you Carb Manager.  We will keep this app even though we have met our goals and stay on Maintenance.
response: Power Couple over here! Way to go on crushing those impressive goals. Feel free to message us in-app anytime with any questions or support you need. We're here to help!

title: Cannot take pics or scan barcodes
body: Overall the app is pretty amazing. I’m digging the updated format style. However, I’m a premium member and pay for the app, but still cannot scan barcodes or take pictures. The previous apps I’ve used have this capabilities, I’m not sure why this one cannot. It’s really time consuming to enter in every single nutritional item for each meal plus track them. If they don’t come up with a way to incorporate that feature I’ll have to cancel my monthly membership. It’s not worth the extra time spent.

title: New version very broken
body: Often the carb values are way off -  I compare the same foods with my wife who is on the old version and more than likely the new app under values the carbs.  This is done from scanned barcodes. An example would be 6oz of grape tomatoes registered 1g of carbs.  Clearly wrong.
response: Hi Boi Tom - Thanks for reaching out. We haven't made any changes to the carb values between app versions; we're pulling from the same database as before. We'd love to help you get this sorted out though! Please reach out to our support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support. The pie chart is now a donut chart, and it’s available by swiping the daily log carousel. Let us know if we can help with anything else!

title: LOVE THIS APP!!
body: I started on Keto not too long ago and just couldn’t get into Ketosis for some reason. I felt like I was “doing everything right” but was hardly seeing any results. Now that I have this app it’s so easy to track everything!! I’m super happy with it also and I love that one can track absolutely everything there is to track. I also pay for premium and I love the recipes that are at my fingertips. Literally😆 Great job on this app! Thank you!!

title: AMAZING APP!!
body: This APP takes ALL the guesswork out of everything!! Adding it before meals lets me see if I’m willing to lose that much of my allowances, or save more til later!! Sometimes I do not eat it all, but then I can go back and quickly edit my amount eaten!! Even if you do not understand it well, you don’t HAVE to- it does it for you!! Just EAT, enjoy, and sit back and watch the fat and pounds melt away!!
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review! We're delighted that you're loving the app, and are glad that you're finding it a useful resource! 😄

title: Looking For an Easy Tracker? Here You Go!
body: I have used other apps (all good), but I nevee stuck with tracking for more than a day or so. Since being on keto, I discovered this app that makes mapping out my day so easy. The app remembers your usual foods so logging is FAST, also you can set your target macros, factor in exercise, water, and supplements. By far the most helpful, user-friendly, easy to use and convenient app for tracking food. Highly recommend!!!

title: Awesome app
body: Overall this is an amazing and simple app to use.  My one and only issue with it, is that under exercises it has a very limited number of exercises.  You also can’t enter your own calories burned under the cardio section, instead you tell it how long you did cardio and it gives you a predetermined amount of calories burned.  If they would correct these few things then this app truly would be the beat on the App Store.

title: Loved and then disappointed.
body: Loved this app for two weeks and purchased the premium. Then my Fitbit stopped syncing. I followed the direction to go to website found that it wouldn’t link up with my phone so then followed direction to fix that and lost all my data. Now the app won’t give me the same goals as before and when I went to renter a recipe it won’t add it to my daily totals even though all the information seems correct and saved in the recipe.

title: Anyone else notice that the meal totals dont add up?
body: I really like this app and the macros breakdown, however I’ve noticed that the totals that are at the top of each meal dont add up to what the totals for each item shown. For example, i listed everything i ate for breakfast individually and i had 3 grams for the eggs and 1 gram for the 1/4 avocado for a total of 4 carbs at breakfast. But in the totals , the top line in yellow for breakfast shows 3 grams not 4. And yesterday it did it in lunch category.

title: What happened yesterday???
body: I woke up this morning to a completely cleared app. All of my recipes, log history...everything...cleared and no where to be found! What happened overnight last night that wiped out all of my data? Freaking out all day and super bummed that I have to start from scratch 😢 Loved the app until this happened. Can’t even create a new account because it says one already exits. Well if it does, I want it all back 😩
