response: We are so sorry for the interruption! If you are still missing your data, please log out (Settings > Log Out) and then in the log in or sign up screen, look for a link toward the bottom of the page labeled "Get back in here". This will restore your data. If you need additional assistance, please email us at support@wombatapps.com.

title: Why do I need a password?
body: I have given this app 3 stars.  I would really place it around 2.5 stars.  The concept is spot on but as others have mentioned it is a little glitchy.  I have used apps that are much more intuitive in their operation as well.  The big problem I have is after five days of use the app wants me to set up an “account”.  When I decline, it prompts me that an “account” is not necessary, however I must set up a password in case I am locked out of my “account” that isn’t required!  This seems a little shady to me.  I don't care for shady apps.
response: Hey there, thanks for contacting us! We don't require an email address to use the app, but we do ask for you to set a unique password to help you access your data in case you accidentally log out of your account.

title: Great app for anyone on keto
body: This app makes my life so much easier. When you scan foods they are almost always in the system. You can easily set your goals and see where you are at. You can sync the app with your iPhone. You can even set meal reminders. This app is so helpful and I would recommend it to everyone trying keto, and I do when people ask for a good app for tracking. Thank you to the developers for creating this app! :)

title: What gets measured gets done
body: 33 lbs in three months

title: Loved it until today
body: I have been using this app for a few years and loved it - until today.  The app must have updated today and now it is more complicated to add my own recipes.  I used to be able to simply enter how much of each ingredient was used in the recipe.  Now it will only let me enter it by ingredient serving size.  Recipes don’t always use a complete serving of ingredients.  Example - recipe calls for 1 and 1/3 cup of cheese.  I can only enter it by 1/4 cup serving sizes.  How does one do that easily?  Frustrating.  Now I need to start looking for a different app that will better fit my needs.
response: Hi there, and thanks for your review! We haven't made any changes to how a recipe is created, and we'd be happy to assist you with the issue you are having with the measurements of ingredients. The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: New “improvements”
body: I have found the new and improved version of Carb Manager much more difficult to use. I couldn’t find where to track my weight. I tried to use Help and Support, but it just redirected me to goals. Entering data there erased my previous information. Worse yet, it said something about only being able to track body data with the premium version, which I bought about 6 months ago and it now does not recognize. All previously entered “meals” and customized foods (basically anything I created in the old version of the app) are not recognized by this upgrade and no longer available. Eight months of data gone.

title: Worst carb managing app ever
body: Different answers for the same item and not even close to accurate! Green bell peppers have 5.5 carbs not 0. And many other inaccuracies. Watch your goals go down the drain if you trust this app! Good luck!
response: Hi & thanks! We work hard on the accuracy of our Food DB. It's true some branded/processed foods have been input by users, so if there are inaccuracies, you can always Report a Food Error or make Quick Edits to them. Just reach out in-app, & we can help share how as well as how to identify our NCCDB verified foods to make it easier for logging!

title: When it works
body: When  (free) CarbManager works it is helpful for tracking. Though merely adequate in recognizing portion size and various items. However, it is constantly moving onto a purchase site for the fee paid (monthly) program & you are forced to wait if you do not wish to purchase. This inconvenience would be acceptable if the site didn’t often crash ( 3x in 3 months) - so must delete and reinstall. Not worth the aggravation.

title: For a New Keto, this App is a life saver
body: I love the app! It has helped me figure out these macros. I can plan ahead. I cook so I can enter my own foods with all the nutritional info!! love it. I have used the scanner and that is a no brainer, automatic uploads!! My only hope is the first 2 days of using this app it allowed me to change the amounts and now it is a set amount. I would like to go back to selecting amounts. I may not have a full cup or 3 slices, please bring back the spinner wheel to adjust amounts!

title: Best keto tracker!
body: This app is beyond the best keto tracker I’ve used! It does a outstanding job of counting macros and graphing it for you. The best part is this app is fully functional even if you don’t by the premonition version. My only downside is I wish it connected to fitbit like my fitness pal does. But- the way this app functions is way greater for people on keto, diabetic, increased carb intake or any carb restrictive diet than any app I’ve ever seen! Thanks to this app I finally track my macros the way I want to!!

title: No free trial for premium
body: I got the app today and right away I seen restrictions in order to get me to go and buy premium. I would not mind going premium if I got to test it first to see if I like it or not. Maybe they should consider offering a free month, or evenv2 weeks free premium to allow people to see if they like it before having to pay for it. I read a lot of good reviews about the app and it is a shame I may not be able to fully test the premium service because I would love to see if I liked it or not before I drop $40 for the year of premium service. Maybe even offer a first month of premium service for $1 so people can test it? Something would be nice

title: Best APP EVER
body: I usually don’t write reviews because I don’t have the motivation but I just needed to share my thoughts about this app. This app helps me so much to keep track of all of the things I need to be on keto. You don’t even need to have the premium version to keep track of the basics. I have only been on keto for 5 days and I have long 5.8 pounds. And I am eating very well. Just not many carbs and no sugar is all. Please try this diet out!! It is so worth it I promise😊
response: This makes us so happy and proud to hear! Congrats on crushing your current goals. We're with you the whole step of the way!

title: You keep losing stars
body: What happened to the pie graph? I used to see my net values in % now I see nothing until maybe the end of the day. The only way to see my macros is to use consumed. The graph info that used to be net values is now goal. This has been a very useful app but you keep messing with it and each time it seems to become less useful. When I add exercise it blanks everything out completely and leaves me with negative numbers. I opted in for a three month sub to see if I liked this. Right now I don’t know if I will sign up after May.
response: Hi, and thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Since you posted it, many fixes and improvements have been implemented by our Development Team. If you have any questions or continuing issues, please reach out to us directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. We are very happy to assist! :)

title: Great for Ketogenic diet
body: This App is a life saver if you follow a ketogenic diet or low calorie diet. I was able to find all types of food easily. It’s very easy to select the amounts eaten and it automatically measures the calories, carbs, proteins, fat in each food item and the total through your whole day. Time wise it takes 5_10 minutes to enter what you ate and get the results instantly. You can also edit any item you’ve already entered. I love this app

title: This Dietitian loves this app for macros
body: I’m a registered dietitian that’s taking on a plant based keto for autoimmune health reasons.  This app makes tracking, scanning foods, adding recipes so easy to stay on track with the necessary macros to stick in ketosis.  I really find the importing recipes feature extremely useful as I make many different Instant Pot online recipes for my family.  I also like that I can track exercise & also make notes on how I feel day to day.

title: Incomplete recipes
body: I paid for this app, primarily so I could access the recipes.  I’ve yet to fine one that is complete. There’s always a list of ingredients but the directions don’t use all of them. For example- I’m trying to make a Mexican dish that uses zucchini. Zucchini is in the ingredient list, but the directions don’t tell me what to do with it. This has been my experience with every single recipe I’ve tried and that’s probably a dozen or more. I end up having to search Pinterest for complete instructions. I would’ve stuck with the free version if I’d known.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear you've run into an issue with some inaccuracies in the recipe viewer. In this case, we'd welcome the opportunity to take a look at the recipe and offer some suggestions to make corrections for accuracy. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "BenjiT15 " and we'll be happy to lend a hand! Thank you!

title: Keeps Me On Track
body: I’m no Keto expert but Carb Manager keeps me on track in spite of that. I’ve lost 15 pounds in the last 3 weeks because I can see what’s in my food - carb-wise and how it adds up each day. I’ve just started getting into some of the health tracking features that make it even better. I’m 55. I’ve dieted before without success. But I’m well on my way and on track to my ideal weight, lower blood pressure and lower cholesterol thanks to this app.

title: Very slick app!
body: I used to use the WW app, but then I hit menopause and the weight starting creeping up.  My doc recommended a low-carb diet, and this app is really helping me accomplish that.

title: Great little diet tool
body: I'm only on my 2nd week of low carb dieting, but am planning to make this a lifestyle change instead of another yo-yo trip.  I have so much easily accessable information literally at my finger tips that good choices are easier to make now.  The daily food tracker seems to inspire me to stick with the plan.  I have used two recipes; both were delicious.   At age 67, I am long overdue in getting a handle on healthy eating...thanks to this App, I'm hopeful for success.

title: Decided to try premium
body: This is the most straightforward app I’ve found for beginning a low carb diet. Past apps I’ve used have focused too much on connecting with friends and became like social media, which felt less like challenging/supporting each other and more like a Diet Facebook. I also appreciate that the primary focus is NOT calories on this app. I’ve enjoyed using this so much that I just purchased a month of premium to get some meal plans.

title: How do you connect to the iPhone health app
body: So far so good but I’m having a few issues. I cannot seem to figure out how premium members can connect to the iPhone health app which, according to the exercise page, should be possible. Also, the carbs on my daily log aren’t adding up properly. (2+1=3, not 4 last time I checked.) Lastly, are the daily amounts/allowances of fat/protein supposed to change to accommodate large quantities of exercise? Please help!

title: One small complaint
body: I love this app! However, today I realized that the only entries for unsweetened, brewed black coffee in the app state 2g of fiber. I’ve never heard of fiber in coffee so I looked it up and despite some study in 2007 all the nutrition facts I could find report that coffee has 0g fiber. This has little to do with the app itself as much as the database it’s drawing from so I still give it five stars, just hoping someone will take note of the misleading info out there on coffee.

title: Simply Awesomely Powerfully Flexibly Friendly
body: Found Carb Manager 3 weeks ago. Purchased 3 month subscription but wish I had subscribed for 12. I have followed Atkins style eating but tracking carbs was challenging. This app makes it easy and I have dropped 10 lbs eating Ketogenically. The ease of logging food and weight then viewing the data in an overlapping chart or graph is eye opening. I will enthusiastically subscribe for a year when my three months expire. Thanks.

title: All time favorite tracking app
body: I’ve used them all. This is my favorite. I bought premium because it was well worth the money, being able to create meals for quick adds (I eat the same meals all the time so it makes it very easy) is awesome. I also really love being able to plug a recipe in, input servings yield and having it calculate individual serving macros. That’s amazing.
response: We're delighted that you're loving the app, and are glad that you're finding it a useful resource! 😄

title: Great app
body: I am newly diagnosed with diabetes. Prior to getting the app my glucose numbers were all over the place and mostly high. This app has helped me get better control over my diabetes and my glucose numbers are more consistent and in range. I love that I can track my glucose and the amount of insulin I need. I use the information from the app to share with my pcp so he can help me with any issues I may be experiencing and make any necessary changes.

title: User friendly, newbie friendly, amazing recipes
body: So my boyfriend and I just started keto diet and we had no clue how to track what we ate and a friend of mine referred me to this app. It is awesome. The app is free but with the premium benefits for the year you get access so many more features including recipes that are phenomenal. We have made like 5 recipes and they are definitely going to be made regularly in this house. Definitely worth giving this app a shot.

title: Great App
body: I e just started the Keto diet and needed a way to track everything. This app was recommended by a friend and he was right. You just plug in your info and your off. You can log all your meals, snacks, supplements, etc and it calculates everything for you. Plus you can scan the barcode of whatever you’re about to consume and it pulls up all the data for that item and you can use that to plug into your meals. So convenient!

title: Life Changer!!!
body: Discovering this app has literally changed my life! I love the ability to track my macro’s & net carbs!!! Incredibly easy to use & comes loaded with tons of food selections. Best of all I can create my own meals & recipes. Love that you can import recipes from the web! This app has definitely helped me to continue to lose weight, get healthier and stay fit! I also love that It connects to my Fitbit Alta Hr!!! Give it a try. You’ll see what I say is true. It’s a life changer!!!

title: Idiot-proof
body: I have no problem paying for an app I know I'll use- especially if it benefits my health in any way, shape or form. Having said that- paying for an app I still need to do the calculations for, is ridiculous- if anything, it deters me from using it.

title: I am Amazed!
body: I am so impressed with just how versatile this app is. I’m fairly new to Keto so I downloaded this app and was immediately overwhelmed. To my surprise it was actually very easy to get the basic stuff and the more time that I spent on it made everything else just fall into place. So don’t give up if you think you can’t use this app! It’s really just so easy and fun! I love planning my meals ahead of time so I know what groceries to buy and this lets me do it.

title: AWESOME APP and only one draw back so far
body: This app is the most comprehensive, user-friendly nutrition tracker I have seen yet! I love it. The only drawback is if you have a fitness tracker you can’t link the two from your phone. You have to have a desktop. I unfortunately don’t own a personal computer and I cannot access the site at my job so I am stuck with this downfall. Regardless, my user-experience with this app is overally extremely positive!!!

title: Great app but has a lot of glitches
body: This is a very comprehensive app with great recipes and other features included.  I paid for the premium version but it won’t connect to my Fitbit which is a big let down considering that is why I paid for the premium version.  It does try to connect to Garmin and Apple Watch but has a glitch and doesn’t work for Fitbit.  It also won’t let me contact customer service via the app either.  It also freezes a lot which is frustrating.  It’s close but not quite there in my opinion.

title: Pretty Happpy
body: I bought the app within the last week and I’m fairly happy with everything except the accuracy of the food scanner.  I’ve seen quite a few items I’ve scanned that are errors or state “users have submitted error correction”.   Some of these have several users that have submitted changes but still pending. If I don’t have accurate info on the foods inputted how can I keep my diet as accurate as possible.    Otherwise I’d give this a 5 star rating (for now).   PLEASE UPDATE THE SUBMITTED CHANGES.

title: Keeps me accountable!
body: I’m not a person who likes make list or track things. I hate reading ingredients and numbers but wow this app made everything so easy! You can scan barcodes on packaged food or type in just a few letters and almost 95% of what you ate is already on their list. I also like the ability to sync your smart watch so it deducts your steps/exercise calories for the day. This app has helped me tremendously.

title: Updated rating after use
body: I loved the previous version of this app, but, alas, it was updated. I was willing to give it a try before I complained too much. After a few weeks of using it, I still don’t like it. I find it very difficult to use after the ease of the previous one. You ask why I give it 4 stars? Because it does do what it’s intended to do. With lots of effort, I can keep up with my foods and my numbers. That’s really the most important thing, right?

title: One feature before Revamp was key
body: Dictation was the one feature that made me love carb manager.  I could say, “given this meal of day, I had (quantity) of (item), (quantity) of (item) and it would automatically fill in the correct foods in the correct amounts - and even if it guessed a wrong version of a food it’d be close.

title: Very helpful app
body: As an older man who is struggling to adapt to a healthier lifestyle, I find this app very helpful. The ease of tracking my carbs, proteins, fats and calories (even water intake) make it easier for me to stay on-track. I’m not a person who enjoys weighing food or having to read every nutritional label, so the database of food and their pre-defined nutritional info makes my life easy.

title: Best Keto app for tracking food and macros
body: I love this app! It’s great. No ads, no pop ups, really intuitive design and displays macros and goals clearly. I usually don’t like tracking my food and stuff in an app, but I really like this one. Only criticism would be in the food search/barcode scan, oftentimes the nutrition info automatically filled out is wrong. That can easily be edited, but it would be nice for it to be correct on the first try. Other than that, I love this app, and it’s really helped me so far in my Keto journey!!!

title: Great App!!
body: I initially had some issues after paying to go premium, but I contacted customer service and within 10 minutes they had me fixed and ready to go. I’ve tried several carb trackers, but I really like the layout on this one. It’s easy to navigate and copy meals to another date. Adding recipes is a breeze and it’s just really working for me so far. Thanks again to customer service for the prompt reply!!

title: Almost perfect
body: It is made for tracking carbs, but it also tracks your macros if you are on a keto diet. It’s a little hard to use. A tutorial would be great. It tracks carbs and percentage, calories, fat grams and percentage, protein and percentage. Put in your exercise and it will deduct the calories from the days total. Plus there are a bunch of nutrients you can track as well. Overall it’s really good. But because of being a bit difficult to figure out I can’t give it five stars. But it’s worth the time.

title: Good for tracking- not for linking
body: This app has really helped me with my tracking of foods- which I love.

title: Beware, not actually free!!!
body: The app seemed awesome at first, I’ve been using it to track food for three weeks. It hasn’t been pushy with the fact I wasn’t Premium and I could live without the recipes and extra details included and just use the free app like advertised, cool right? Nope.
response: Hi there, thanks for getting in touch about this. This was an error, and has now been fixed! Sorry for the interruption!

title: Winning!
body: I’ve struggled with my weight for years and have tried all the apps. Nothing worked until now! I’ve tracked every morsel for a month and am down 16 lbs. The scan feature is fantastic and I love seeing the visual grading of Low-carb foods on an A-F basis. Being able to preset goals and easily see daily progress is a huge plus. I recommend this app for anyone who is ready to be serious about a low carb diet. And this is all in the FREE version!

title: Need to see my all report in one page
body: It’s a very nice app but something very important is missing. There should be a report on one page for the whole month and week where you can see all calories, carbs , protein and your workout. This way you can keep track of the whole month that how many days you were on track and how many days you missed and you can do better.

title: Does the job
body: I had used another app years ago and this works a little better. It does pretty much what I need it to do, but grow weary with the ad to upgrade with almost every entry. Also would like a smoother process to enter a homemade recipe. An addendum with the standard grams of regular food-what you might have in the fridge-was available, I.e., anything that you can’t scan, would be nice. Overall, keeping me on track while I learn what is low or no carb. I would recommend it to anyone.

title: Latest version erased my entire profile
body: I was adding stuff to the database and the app bombed out so I closed and reopened.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you've run into an issue locating your data. Have no fear! We can help! Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "LaurianneVZ" and we'll assist you immediately. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Macro's in a snap
body: Also,  Macronutrients had to be the most confusing weight loss option to get a grip on how to manage food. However, when a friend of mine told me about this program, it is easy. Great interface, can copy forward, generates graphs of performance and accepts information from my fitbit. It can't get any easier than that for a great tool to losing weight and eating healthy. BTW it comes with really good and easy to make recipes.

title: Why did I pay $10 - updated
body: Update: issue addressed within 24 hours by friendly customer support. Really couldn't ask for more.
response: Hi there, we're very sorry for the problem! Please contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll ensure that you're upgraded right away.

title: Always freezes
body: I have been using it for 2 weeks now and it always freezes. Or gets into “thinking mode”. So one cannot finish the food diary on daily basis. First I thought it had to do with free version and I tried updating to premium version but it wouldn’t let me do that either. The actual working window where you can actually work on app is very low.

title: Best low carb tracker I’ve used but
body: If we’re paying for the premium, which I do feel it’s worth it, can you not just finally fix the white out & network connection glitches? It’s really frustrating and annoying especially when in the middle of adding a recipe. Otherwise I’m totally happy with the app!

title: Great for counting net carbs
body: This is the first app I’ve used so far that is easy to track net carbs with. And, it has a great library of foods to search from and track. Makes it easy to add just about anything I would eat. So far, the only thing I would like improved, is the way you track weight. It’s not difficult, but it’s just a lot of clicks to add a weight. Maybe if it was right on the front, on your daily tracking screen. Idk. Anyways, I like this app. And plan to keep using it!

title: Best keto app to date
body: I am fairly new to keto and have tried a few app's. This is by far the best and easiest app for my needs. It has given me a better understanding and knowledge of keto. More so then any other app. There are so many delicious recipes to make and I can finally see what my goals are and how to achieve them. It is also very easy to maneuver through it and find what you need. I finally think I can do keto. Thank you for this app.

title: Good app
body: I have been using the app for a couple of years. It was the easiest diet app I found. But since the recent update, I have found it is harder to navigate. Fix bugs, add extras, but why change a good layout?

title: Fix the new version or I’m moving on.
body: I used to love this app. Easy to use, clear breakdown of macros, easy to import recipes, the reasons go on.

title: Hate, hate, hate & more hate this new upgrade!!
body: Yesterday in the middle of shopping, and trying to scan a barcode quickly, a new viewing platform appeared.  And it’s AWFUL!   It’s visually unappealing, huge, clunky, useless, takes too many clicks to get things that were easily accessible, no option to go back to old view, no warning.  I pay for my subscription and have for about three years.  I will be cancelling now.  This interface is abysmal.  Carb Manager developers, if it ain’t broke, don’t fix it!  You ruined a really good thing.  So damned frustrated/diet derailed.  I use this to track carbs for epilepsy, so I don’t have seizures.  You made this so much harder.

title: The only go to app for weight loss
body: This is by far my favorite app on my phone! It completely has been keeping me on track with my macros and I’m finally seeing results. With the busy schedule I have this keeps me organized, user friendly to track, and helps me sustain my needs and goals. Thank you for making this and helping my life!! Will eventually go premium because there’s a ton more benefits with that.

title: All these ratings don’t matter they just completely changed the app
body: Only look at the most recent reviews because its gonna be a long time before this app is anything special again. I started crying because I couldn’t find the hundreds of recipes I’d created. Now in a recipe you can’t readily tell how many carbs each ingredient is after you create it. It would also be nice not to have to scroll until the end of your recipes just to create a new one. Why would the app that has great ratings ever think of completely changing its design to make it almost unusable?

title: Carb Manager will definitely help you to eat healthy
body: I love being able to see how I can keep myself on a good diet. Carb manager is very important for me to use on a daily basis.
response: Thanks for the review and feedback, and best of luck on your journey!

title: Need distance tracker
body: Giving this 4 instead of 5 - really find this app easy to use, and am keeping myself on keto.  One thing that’d be GREAT? If there was a place on the exercise section where I could post my daily distance walking.  Shouldn’t be a big thing...I can already post/change the time of walking.  Adding distance would be a terrific way to see my progress.

title: New update
body: I like the new update. It took some getting used to. However, the app isn’t functioning properly. My daily totals are not reflecting my entry’s most days. I have to manually add up my entry’s to see where I’m at for the day.  Some screens that overlap another are not functioning  properly, if I try and scroll it will scroll the screen behind it. I do pay for premium and right now I’m not getting at all what I’m paying for. Please fix these glitches ASAP thank you.

title: I REALLY hate this update.
body: Everything was well with the old layout for me, and I was having a lot of good results before this new update. I had no idea that with the new update, there was a macros deduction with calories burned, and I unknowingly went over my carb count causing me to get kicked off of my ketosis. To add more to my frustration, some of the net carb counts on items that you scan are so inaccurate. And there’s no user edits anymore! It looks like MyFitnessPal, and I left that app to use Carb Manager because I hated that layout. I hate that I wasted my money to use an app that feels like the one I ditched to begin with.

title: THE GOOD IS GOOD AND THE BAD IS TERRIBLE
body: The only food app I have ever used before this one is/was myfitnesspal. The database leaves a lot to be desired and get a failing grade from me.  Very common items are not in their database and pales (by a lot ) to myfitnesspal! Scanning items also frequently does not work either. The data it does provide to help count carbs is good, but it definitely is not worth paying the rate for premium. The challenges are also gimmicky, it counts things that you didn’t earn, and doesn’t count things you have earned! Needs a lot of fixing!

title: Love the app but sometimes it just won’t load
body: And I have a brand new iPhone 10 on WiFi so not a phone or dat issue. It just gets bogged down and spends a few hours “stuck” in a phase of can’t open it. Makes it annoying when you’re checking to see if you have a certain amount of macros available for dinner or something and it just won’t open. Yet it displays a widget and sometimes will open from that. I’m afraid to delete as I’ve done that with other apps and “lost” my subscription. Just buggy.
response: Hi, and thanks for sharing your experience. We're sorry to hear you've run into some loading issues on your device, and we definitely want to help. Please message us in-app or email us at support@carbmanager.com so we can check it out and help sort out the problem. Thanks!

title: Easy
body: Carb manager makes Keto dieting easy! I was overwhelmed when I first started. I spent hours every day calculating my numbers. Then I found out about Carb Manager! Four months, forty pounds lighter and now on maintenance. I could not have done this without Carb Manager! My husband used Carb Manager on his tablet and 50 plus pounds later and on maintenance now. We still use it! Loved using it in restaurants. Instant calculations. I recommend this ap for everyone!

title: Many Foods Options to Calculae for Keto
body: This app has really helped me keep track of my daily food intake including carbs, protein, fats and calories. Many food options to chose from including the ability to scan items and calculate them. It saves all of my favorite foods, so it's easy to pull them up daily. The paid version has recipes you can use and has the ability to print your daily log.

title: Only “but”
body: How do you calculate carbs and net carbs? I just came back from a trip to the biggest keto store here (they carry hard to find keto products), and when I tried to scan the nutrients they were all wrong, take for example lacanto chocolate bars... the total carbs were off and the net carbs too... I came back empty handed because now I don’t know what to trust the label or the app... it’s not the first time it happens either... help please???
response: Hello from Carb Manager and thank you for your review. We'll be happy to offer some assistance to help you get up and running with Carb Manager by directing you to contact our support team. We are standing by ready to assist! Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Hungry & Confused" and we'll be happy to help. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Helpful App but can’t always find certain foods
body: I wouldn’t have been able to do keto successfully without the Carb Manager app. It is extremely helpful not only to track carbs but to find recipes also. However, if I vary the recipe a little, I have a hard time tracking the exact macros. Also, sometimes I can’t find the food I have eaten. Also find some conflicting macro information. I end up guessing on some of these but overall it is still a helpful app.

title: Wonderful app!
body: I’ve been doing Ketogenic for a few months now and keeping a food diary and carefully following my fat to protein ration is difficult... until I found Carb Manager!! This app works great and makes is very easy to keep track of every macros! The scan option is great and reduced time looking up and logging nutritional information to seconds! I don’t mind paying for something that has made my life so much easier!

title: Like a lot about this app but...
body: One feature My Fitness Pal has this app does not is the ability to select then add foods to another day without having to search individual items each day. On MFP you simply click often repeated items (like bullet proof coffee ingredients) and add them to the next day. Much more convenient and fast. However- this app is great for tracking macros at a glance. Love the colorful design. I also love that you can add supplements also. Keep up the great work! This app is a nice Keto helper.

title: Great app,worth the price!
body: My husband and I started a keto diet 12 days ago and hands down, this app is the reason we have been successful. We have both lost 12 lbs! We were brand new to keto and thought we were going to struggle, but CM app made it so easy for us to put together meals and keep track of macros. My only wish is that you could track 2 people on the same subscription, even if it cost a bit more initially.

title: Almost a 5
body: Excellent features including a great at a glance view of your 3 key macros.  The user interface for the web version needs rethinking.  The menu structure is too complex.  Adding a food takes too many clicks.  You have to wave the mouse pointer back and forth to indicate “OK” and “Save” and “Cancel”.  The units drop down menu takes a magnifying glass to see.  They should get a UI consultant and clean it up, followed by user testing.  If you commit to the work it takes to use this app, you’ll be rewarded.

title: Great app BUT
body: This is a great app I use for my daily keto meals. It helps me track my macros and calories daily. I’ve lost a lot of weight so far and I input this into the app. However, the macros and calories in the app do not change when I input my weight loss. As you lose weight your macros and your calorie amount should change alongside it so you can have an accurate amount of what to eat up to in order to continuously lose weight. Please include this on the next update 😊 thank you.

title: Recently started using....
body: I recently starting using this app, and I absolutely love it!! But... I have had an issue with it today...  it’s stopped opening...

title: Lost 30 pounds in 3 months using this app!
body: First of all, the daily log rings are super visual, and I love that about it. It’s helped me keep on track by sending me helpful reminders to log every meal. I also love the weight tracker and seeing my progress in a graph. It tells me how many pounds I’ve lost in a period of time - whether it be one week, one month, three months, or a whole year! Super great app for eating keto and losing weight! 🙌🏼

title: Stay on track
body: My brother & wife started using this app with their new keto lifestyle. Mind you I was using fitness pal and it was good but I find this much easier to use for keto. I thought I was eating good but found out with this app I was consuming too many carbs. That’s why I wasn’t dropping weight. I’m workout at least 4-5 days a week, cardio & weight training, but I wasnt seeing results. Since using this app I’ve lost 4 pounds in a week.

title: Good carb app but needs updates
body: I’m Happy with carb master. But there are sooo many discrepancies in nutrition counts. Take the Chicken ceasar salad from the restaurant NEWKS. There are 2 sizes of the salad, even without croutons the carb and calorie counts are all over the place for what is the same salad in its description. CarbMaster customers would be better served if the App curated items from established restaurants, also keeping in mind that people needing carb master won’t have croutons on their salads anyway so why are salads with croutons even a option?

title: 4 of 5
body: An increased database for major Keto friendly companies would be nice. Also, it would be nice if you could type in a product and the app would recommend a good Keto substitute. For instance, if I type in Ketchup it could recommend 3 or more types of keto substitutes. I would also like to see a small percentage of free recipes. More of a “If you like these recipes then try premium for thousands more” approach, instead of EVERY recipe being monetized. Overall great track and impressive database for foods.

title: How do I change my subscription plan?
body: First I love this app! It is easy to use and meets all my needs. I like the flexibility of the settings. I originally signed up for one month of premium intending to switch it to the yearly subscription rate if I liked it well enough, which I do. But now I can’t figure out how to do that. I don’t want to continue paying the monthly fee because of the difference in cost. Can you help me with this?

title: Easy to use
body: I tried several nutrition apps before settling on this one. Like everyone i rarely pay for apps, so when i do its an important app and it has to be a good app. I have found this app very easy to use. The microphone feature is very handy. You can speak a list of foods you are eating/have eaten and it will enter them all. I have found its database to be very extensive as well. There are few foods that it does not have.

title: Disappointed
body: Been using a different app, let’s call it “my fit friend” for months, but downloaded this and upgraded to premium to try because so many Keto dieters rave about it.  It’s ok, and I like a lot of the features, but I’m finding it doesn’t read barcodes correctly which is a HUGE problem.   At first I thought maybe it was an issue with the barcodes, but then cross referenced with the other app which read them fine.  I use this to track macros easily, if I need to double check or input manually what’s the point?
response: Hi there, thanks for the feedback. We've recently improved the way we lookup barcode scans, and the accuracy should be better now. Give it a whirl - thanks!

title: Great, but missing something!
body: It would be the best carb app ever if I could change the ingredients in the recipes. For instance I use ground turkey rather than ground beef....should I add that recipe to my tracker it doesn’t give me a clear picture of my actual fat and calorie intake. I have tried to alter the nutritional facts, but the app freezes and I can’t use the app until I completely close down the app and reset the values. I almost dropped my subscription because of it. It was slightly frustrating.
response: Hi there, thanks so much for the feedback! To edit a recipe, please tap the ... button in the top right corner and select Copy to My Foods, then go to Foods > My Foods > Recipes and edit the recipe there.

title: Makes it SO easy to manage food intake!!
body: *~*LOVE IT!!*~* I recently downloaded this app hoping for help tracking what I eat while eating a ketogenic diet. It is THE tool to use! You input your height, weight, etc. and select your target weight loss goal per week. I love that you can scan barcodes and it finds the nutritional value!! If it’s not in the database, you can add the food manually. It’s a “must use” for anyone who needs to track carbs for weight loss.

title: Best Low Carb Ap Ever
body: You have to be honest with yourself and plug every little snack or meal you eat when adding foods into the Carb Manager Ap to truly have a lifetime of successful weight loss and health. I have had the best success with this Ap. It has helped me see, visually, where my choices can make or break my diet. I couldn’t “see” before why I was having bad days. “Seeing” my foods on the pie chart has helped me really understand Keto and bring real results.

title: I love this app!
body: I have tried Keto before and could never stay motivated and never had the dramatic results that so many people report after being on the plan.  Now I see why!  I was eating way too many carbs and calories, but not enough fiber.  Now that I can track everything so quickly and easily, I know exactly what I need to do to see results.  10 pounds down in 3 weeks, yippie!  I owe it all to this amazing app!

title: New interface - thumbs down!
body: Been a member for several years. Have loved every upgrade. Until now. I hate this new user interface. Maybe i’ll get used to it? I certainly don’t need the closing circles like the Apple watch — and i love apple products — a dedicated Apple user since 1987. I’ve given 4 stars because the product is great. To the version before the complete overhaul I would have given 5 stars.

title: Generally good but one big frustration
body: In general, I’m happy with the new version and can find what I need. I am a paid member.
response: Hi there - thanks for the feedback, and we'll pass this along to the team. Cheers!

title: Love this app!
body: I’ve been using this daily for a week now, and it’s a fantastic app. I did buy the upgraded version. I love the recipes and meal plans, and tracking macros is super easy. I’ve been using a combination for scanning bar codes, entering my recipes (so I can easily add them in when I make the meal again), and pulling foods from the data base. Tracking is quick and easy, and that’s everything with an app like this.

title: Great App
body: I love this app. I started the Keto diet last week and came across this app. It’s been a tremendous help in tracking my macronutrients and my weight (I’ve lost about 8lbs in the first 6 days). It’s super easy to use. Most barcodes from foods can be scanned and easily added to your daily food intake tracker.

title: I’m impressed
body: Recently started Keto & our son suggested this app to help us.   OMG it’s fabulous!  Constantly amazed at the database of foods, and I don’t have to worry about macros, this app takes care of it for you!  Very easy to use although I’d like to copy supplements for entire month rather than a day at a time.  Haven’t spent enough time to figure out how to add my own custom recipe info but for now just adding ingredients.  Very intuitive and powerful, tyvm.

title: Makes my life simple
body: It only took a few days to upgrade to Premium. I love that it shows you what is left after each meal, how you can tweak carbs and such to fit your needs, the huge food database, how you can create recipes easily. Being new to Keto, I was so overwhelmed and while I have much to learn, this app has made things so much easier and will keep me focused as I continue to tweak and learn. Highly recommended!

title: Cannot love without this app! (on Keto)
body: My husband and I just started the keto diet and I do not know where I would be if it was not for this app. I tell him every day that thank God for this app or else I would be driving myself crazy with trying to find the food and the different macro nutrient ingredients.

title: Relief
body: Very relieved to have found a user friendly, and seemingly spot on Keto plan app.  I struggle with most diet apps, and this is the app for my computer app challenged mind.  It takes so much stress out of my eating and sticking to it plan.  I have lost 7.8 ponds in 5 days, and realize most may be water, however this number is very encouraging.  I have tried the keto diet without this app previously and did not have these great results.  Keep up this great app...THANKS!!

title: Bug with editing calories burned during exercise
body: The app only grabs the minutes I exercised from my Activity app (I have an Apple Watch). It doesn’t grab the calories burned. I have to manually click edit and then manually add the calories burned which is a pain. Now, it’s not even saving my manual inputs no matter what day. Also, shouldn’t your app allow users to earn macros after we’ve logged an exercise? in other words - give us a few more net carbs, protein, & fat, to consume.

title: Sleep is important
body: To fully utilize this application requires a fairly steep learning curve. However, once accomplished it makes succeeding in the ketogenic diet much, much easier. I do feel, however, that there should be a major tab for entry of sleep, much like there is for water consumption. The quantity and quality of sleep has almost as much to do with achieving your diet goals as the food and the liquid you put in your body.

title: Recent iPhone problem
body: I love Carb Manager, and am a paid subscriber. But there’s been a glitch ever since your last update. It opens and operates fine on my iPad. On my iPhone, however, it’ll start to load and then spontaneously close. Both my phone and the app have all updates installed. I’ve shut down and restarted my phone. I’ve uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Nothing helps. This needs to be fixed!

title: Good, but constantly threatens to delete your data.
body: The app works but it always has the warning “!!Please create an account. If you lose your device or change devices, your data will not be accessible without an account. An account is also required to sync between devices.”

title: The new version is incredibly difficult to navigate
body: As someone who has been keto for years, and has used (and loved) Carb Manager exclusively for tracking daily eating, I am so frustrated. My personal recipes that I have had saved for years now have spontaneous and weird errors in the ingredients now. Trying to edit the errors is maddening because it wants me to re-enter all my recipes? I am all for improvements and changes, but it seems like y’all rolled out a new version without addressing major errors and issues. I am looking at other tracking apps now because this just isn’t working anymore. Disappointed :(

title: Great App has a large food selection
body: Love it app!!! I’ve only come across one issue. The app was not loading however, once I turn my phone off and re-started it was ok. I hope that doesn’t happen again.

title: Good app
body: I love this app, it makes tracking my carbs since I’ve started Keto close to effortless. I love that it shows me everything from the amount of carbs/fat/protein in a pie chart, to even the percentages. I just wish that premium wasn’t so expensive as id like to use the other benefits. Also it’s a little ridiculous that I need to be premium to even connect my Fitbit to this app as I really like the app and would like to use more features but it’s whatever. It gets the job done.

title: Love This App!
body: I started the Keto diet a week ago today and am down 9 pounds already! Big thanks to this app for being an amazing resource and tracking tool for me as I try to greatly cut down my carb intake. I really think I wouldn’t be making such good progress without being able to look up food nutritional information at the touch of a button. Would recommend to anyone wanting to track their macros!

title: Easy and fun to use
body: I was skeptical after reading the reviews. This was recommended by the Galveston Diet and I have found it very helpful in keeping me mindful and motivated of what I eat and drink. It’s especially nice bc I was able to put in the recommended ratios of fat/protein & carbs. It helps me to track it all plus calories. It really makes you think and I look forward to recording my meals so I can see my progress. My thanks!

title: Great app
body: Still my favorite app but I noticed that the feature that counts carbs burned during exercise is no long there. If that was still an option this would be 5 star app. Because that feature is what made this app stand out from all the others I was using.
response: Hey and thanks for your review! We're glad to hear you're finding our app useful. We're also happy to report we still have the feature to deduct Macros from your Exercise. If you're having trouble seeing/accessing it, please reach out in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" so we can help. Thanks!

title: Premium
body: Carb manager helps me keep track of my food and carbs which is really helpful because I’m diabetic. I was really looking forward to the keto recipes and was ready to start baking again with healthier ,low carb ,less sugar, recipes! But then it showed that all the recipes were for premium members only. I understand that they have the premium membership but they should have some recipes for free. Please change this in the future and take into account that carb manager would be more helpful if there were some free recipes.

title: Latest Version Ruined the App
body: My husband and I started keto 1/1/21 and downloaded this app and found it so helpful. We were able to share foods with each other to make calculating easy. He updated his app and I did not. We are no longer able to share foods because most of the items are gone from the update. The layout is not easy on the eyes either. It looks busy and confusing. I paid for premium and will not upgrade for as long as I can but it’s discouraging for my husband beacause it’s hard to find the same foods to log. If you have not upgraded to the latest version DON’T!!!! If you have, well, I’m sorry.

title: LOVE THIS APP !!!!
body: I have to honestly say this app have COMPLETELY changed my life ! I can’t even tell you how much I absolutely love it ! I can finally watch what I eat ! LITERALLY! It makes you completely accountable for what your putting in your body and it tells you what to avoid. Plus the scanning feature is great ! I feel confident now to go out to eat without worrying if I’m killing my diet ! HIGHLY HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS APP ! Also I lost 6 lbs in a week just saying..

title: Best app for keto
body: I like Carb Manager better than My Fitness Pal for counting carbs and overall macros. I used CM for two years, stopped keto for a stretch and recently got back on it. Everyone seemed to like MFP, so I gave it a try. Nothing against that app, but I just find CM much better suited for Keto and more user friendly for my needs. I use the free version and everything I need is there. Thanks for a great app that is constantly being improved.

title: Horrible App
body: This app could be so much better. It has gotten a little better since he update, but I have had nothing but issues. I have had problems with the app saving recipes and daily entries. When I attempt to add recipes it will freeze or not update. When the app is open and I get out to go to Safari, it will shut down when I go back to it.
response: Hi there - sorry to hear you're experiencing these issues with the new app. Feel free to reach out to support in-app via Settings → Help & Support and we can troubleshoot what's going on for you. Thanks!

title: Terrible App
body: They want their PREMIUM money.
response: Hi there, thanks for contacting us, and sorry for the problem! Your account data is safe -- it sounds like you were signed out of your account (we don't delete accounts). Please email us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll help get back into your account.

title: Keto helper
body: I have been struggling on a keto diet for five weeks now but have only recently found MC. This app has really helped me to track my numbers each day!  I was able to see where I needed to make adjustments to my daily routine. I am still just using the basic free section until I get comfortable with my new way of eating. But it still offers amazing functions to help you along the way!  Happy macro counting!

title: CARB MANAGER IS THE BEST
body: I’ve used My Net Diary, My Fitness Pal, and Weight Watchers Free Style. In my opinion Carb Manager is by far the best. I love the wheel that tracks and shows you all your carbs, net carbs, fat, and protein, snacks, and supplements throughout your entire day, and awesome bar scanner. Simple and easy to use, and copies good entries from one day to another. And this is just the basic free app. Go premium, and you also get recipes, and meal plans. Nothing to

title: Buffering
body: I love this app so much!! It really helps with keeping track of everything I can and cannot eat, my Dailey meals, and how much I’m taking in. But I’m currently having a problem with the app. It keeps loading when I open it and says that there is a problem and that the engineers are working on it but nothing’s changed. I’ve restarted my phone and the app, even deleted and reinstalled it. Help?????

title: KETO focused carb tracking - no free trial
body: I’ve used a lot macro tracking apps. I have to say I really enjoy carb manager, it’s rather straight forward and it’s ability to write recipes for quick adding is wonderful.

title: From 5 stars to 1 star, read why!
body: New update made this very useful app user unfriendly.

title: Garbage update
body: This app has been my go-to for tracking while doing keto for almost a year. Since the most recent update, it has deleted all of the foods I commonly use, it’s become so much harder to track foods and the foods in the app aren’t accurate to what the label says per serving. This app is now garbage. I’ll be looking for a different app to use now because this update has made it much harder to track things unless they go back to how it was. It’s already hard enough trying to diet and track foods why would they go on and try to make it even harder for everyone. No one likes this update. Change it back.

title: Great app (non premium user)
body: The app will have just about everything you need for keto. The only downfall is if you don’t always have service you won’t be able to access it. Being out of town quite often leave me sticking to what I know and having to write everything down. Other than that I have no quarrels with it. It would be nice if they allowed you to manually log without internet but the app doesn’t even open.

title: Best app for macro counting
body: I’ve tried tons of apps for counting macros. Even ones specifically designed for macro counting. This by far was the easiest for me. It’s clear as day where you’re at during the day with your macros. If I had anything to say that I wish were different it would be to be able to change the “carbs and calories” titles listed under my meals but then it wouldn’t really be “carb manager” lol. It’s perfect!

title: Got this to reduce carbs
body: I don’t know if Keto diet is for me, but this app is definitely making me aware of my carb intake. I also use the Fitbit app, but this one has a better food database and it has vitamin and mineral info too. Altogether, it just blows the Fitbit app out of the water! Note, I paid for the premium plan because I want the get real serious about losing 15 pounds and improving my health. So far, I think this app will help me get there.

title: Wonderful app
body: I love this app! This app has been so helpful in helping me keep track of my carbs, fat and protein, I have only used the free version and it’s really good, I’m thinking about paying to upgrade for the recipes, they look so yummy!! I would recommend this app to anyone starting a low carb diet, it has many useful features! You won’t regret it! It’s one of the best I have tried and I tried several.

title: Helps me track.
body: Only thing keeping this from 5 stars is the app does not link to my Apple Watch.  So have to manually enter.   Although you have to pay for the premium version for some features, it does have a shopping lists, blogs and recipes.  The recipes keep your meals fresh and not same ole.  Have to know carb counts and watch the ingredients and serving sizes.  Can get out of hand quickly.    Worth the upgrade.  Only a week and have dropped a couple pounds.  Finally.  Menopause has been brutal for weight loss.
response: Hey, thanks for your incredibly constructive feedback! The app absolutely syncs with Apple Watch, and our awesome and super friendly Support Team is waiting to hear from you so we can assist you with this. Please reach out via support@carbmanager.com or directly within the app, and we'll get you synced up in no time! :-)

title: Think twice BEFORE using this app!
body: I’d used Carb Manager premium for a year and a half. It was user friendly, I lost 45 lbs.! Then came the UPDATE!! I have been so frustrated trying to use it, watched all the videos and still struggled. I got to the point that I gave up, cancelled my account and deleted it. I have many friends that have done the same. Why couldn’t you have just left it alone, instead of coming up with a complete new interface. It is like a different app. I would love it if you could bring back the old app and give this one a different name (that is, IF it is actually been successful in any way).
response: Hi there, thanks for the constructive feedback! We would love to hear more suggestions from our valued customers. Please feel free to fill out this quick form so that we can improve the new version of Carb Manager. Just copy and paste into your browser: https://7vh.short.gy/CMfeedback If you need extra guidance with any features of the new version, our Support Team is at the ready to answer any questions you may have. Just message us directly within the app!

title: Couldn’t do it without CM!
body: I have tried being on a low carb/keto diet but did not see any results until I downloaded this app. I have lost a total of 20 lbs in 5 months! (With 5 more to go). I have thrived with the recipes and the accountability of seeing what I am consuming in the dashboard.

title: Excellent for accountability
body: Easy to use. Scanning bar codes makes tracking super easy. I don’t do keto, I set my own macros. It quickly identified some food forgetfulness and a big lack of protein in my diet. I’m down 10 pounds in a month from nothing more than staying accountable to what I put in. I didn’t pay for premium but I’m considering it, however I’ve done everything I need with the free version.

title: Best low carb healthy fat app
body: This app is awesome. It even has high end protein powders that are especially for keto/paleo. It’s food library is extensive. So much better than my fitness pal. What took me so long to discover this?? I also hated tracking before because it was challenging on my fitness pal with my keto/paleo diet. I love this app! I also lobe the articles and the examples of exercises that have videos to show you the proper way to do them.

title: Keto life saver!
body: I’m killing the Keto game and achieving all my goals, wouldn’t be able to do it without this app. I try to plan out my food for the next day the night before while I’m meal prepping and it helps me make my macros every day! I don’t put anything in my mouth before entering it in CM first, so it makes me so mindful about everything I’m putting into my body. The recipes are all awesome, and I couldn’t be more thankful for this app.

title: Lovin’ it!
body: I started Keto about 3 weeks ago and found Carb Manager 2 weeks in. Not knowing if I was doing it right, I thought Carb Manager would provide me some guidance and I was right! I usually don’t like logging food but this app makes it easy. I love the scan feature and really like the selection of items included in the app. My only suggestion would be to include an option in the settings that would allow me to increase the text size. 👍🏼👍🏼

title: Easy
body: Let me start by saying I don’t pay for the premium version and I’m using it for tracking macros. I just started tracking my macros and I am loving this app. It has made it sooooo easy for me to track what I’m eating and know where I’m at with food. It’s helped me with accountability and kept me on track. It’s so simple, which I need bc I just had a baby and I was looking for the easiest method for me to do this! Love this app.

title: Free version is great!
body: The app itself is great. Imputing your foods and seeing the 3 big macros is a breeze. I was a bit skeptical when the wife wanted to go Keto, without this app I’d probably blown it already. The exercise portion is very limited to some very basic exercises, and it’s short on those too. Searching for foods to input finding the food and being unable to add that recipe without going premium is also pretty lame, but not a deal breaker. Overall really great user friendly app!

title: Makes Keto simple
body: My husband and I are so happy to have found this app. It is very simple to use and makes keeping track of progress so much easier. Do the Keto diet and limiting our carbs to only 25 max a day does not give you much room for error. I downloaded this on our third week and it has made a huge difference already and it’s simplicity has made it a good motivator for staying on track.

title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
body: I follow a keto diet and track macros.  I seriously don’t know what I’d do without this app.  I love the ability to scan items, search tons of food items, restaurant items, build your own recipes, and keep a list of favorites.  You can customize what you track and you get a nice visual chart in addition to a list to see where you’re at daily.  You can even go back and edit previous days.  Great app.

title: This app is a Must have!
body: Love this app! I have been using it for a few months now. I initially downloaded it because I was on the keto diet. Now that I am no longer doing that, I am still able to use this app to meet my health goals. You can change the settings to make it whatever you need it to be. I looked at many of the other free apps, and I found that this one has the most to offer.

title: Very Helpful
body: I have been using this app with the paid subscription for a few days and it is very helpful. It’s great to be able to see how many grams of protein, carbs, and fats I am eating per meal and also for the whole day. It breaks everything down nicely and is easy to understand with their graphs. Being able to calculate calories and how many calories I am burning is also really helpful. I love this app!

title: Overall great aid!
body: I really do love this app. I have taught fitness and am a nurse and I appreciate all the info available here. I love the recipes as well. My only complaint is there is no option for me to personalize for my schedule. I work nights and wake at 1600 every day. What I call my lunch is at about 0200 and dinner in the morning when I get home. Would be an AMAZING thing to have an app able to adapt to alternative schedules...

title: Beware! I downloaded the free version of the APP last nigh
body: I downloaded the free version last night.
response: Hi there and thanks for taking the time to leave us a review. We do offer a 7 day refund policy depending on how you subscribed. The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our human Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: New version do frustrating
body: I recently updated to the newest version of carb Manager and things are so different it’s making it so time consuming learning it all over again. I want to love it like I use to but just keep finding myself frustrated and wanting to not login. It use to keep frequently used foods right at the top of the list now they are gone everyday gotta type in all the sane products. I haven’t even been able to find the premium recipes! Really not happy with the changes. Can’t give up on it cause I paid for the year :-(

title: Awesome App
body: Been using this app for about a week. Was very skeptical. I love my new app. I am an older person who was told by my doctor to cut the carbs way back for health issues. The app is easy to use and it was a real “eye opener” as to the amount of carbs I was consuming. I especially love the scan feature. It saves me a lot of time searching for my off brand items. Kudos for making this app. Highly satisfied.

title: Always Crashing
body: This app is amazing but needs a couple fixes. Ever since I bought the premium it’s been crashing EVERY DAY and when I create a recipe and look for it in “My Recipes” sometimes I can’t find it which is frustrating. If they would fix those 2 issues I’d definitely give it 5 stars because overall it’s really goid at helping you track your Macros.
response: Hi there, thanks for the review and feedback! Many of the crashing issues have been resolved with recent updates, so please make sure you're updated to the most recent version of v7 via the app store. If you're still experiencing and specific issues you can reach out in-app via Settings → Help & Support, with your issues + app store username and our Support team can troubleshoot for you. Cheers!

title: They broke it, look for an alternative
body: I have faithfully tracked my foods daily for the 20 months I’ve been on keto and have credited the premium subscription version of Carb Manager for being able to do so easily. With this new update, however, they have royally screwed up a great product (think New Coke). It is unusable. It is slow, you literally can’t read text because gray text is on colored boxes that obscure it, foods have disappeared and the charts are useless. Unless they put back the original, look elsewhere. That’s what I’m on the App Store for now. It’s not worth it to use the free version, much less a premium subscription.

title: I heart my Carb Manager
body: This is the first app I have used that actually works the way it’s supposed to.  I had gone through different programs wanting to keep up with Net Carbs and my Protein.  I’d even paid for premium services but none did what Carb Manager does.  The scan was hit or miss with other apps like Livestrong or Atkins and I was always having to manually enter the information but not with Carb Manager.  Great job, great app!

title: Very good app. A few notes
body: I have enjoyed the app. The food logging is relatively easy and there are lots of foods available by scan or from the database. I wish the interface was a little better. Some features are difficult to find the first time. Also, I wish there was a way to share food items that one use has logged with another user so that my wife and I don’t have to dual enter everything (recipes, custom foods, etc.)
response: Hey there, thanks for the review! To answer your question: you can share food items with another member by going to Community > Friends and adding that member as a friend. Then, you'll be able to view their custom foods, recipes, meals, etc., and vice versa. Hope this helps 😃!

title: Not working on my iPhone
body: I really love this app and I’ve been using it for 5 months now. I’ve lost 26 lbs and use this app to track my food and weight. The past few days it stopped working. It won’t let me add any food. I’ve tried deleting it and reinstalling it several times. It also doesn’t work on my iPad but it does on my pc. I really miss it on my phone and I’m not sure what else to do.
response: So sorry for the problem! Please email us at support@wombatapps.com and we’ll get this fixed for you.

title: I’m loving this app
body: I have already seen results with weight loss just by using this app. It gives me a visual and a goal to keep!!! It’s been so helpful!!! I would recommend it to anyone who has health goals they’re trying to achieve!!! I have been trying to lose weight for a long time now and am finally seeing results in just 3 days of using this!!! Thank you whoever created it!!! Seriously!!!

title: Best App in existence!
body: Bought this and loved it so much that I bought it for each of my parents. Helps us with every aspect of planning, choosing and buying everything we need for a Keto diet. We love logging our meals, building recipes and participating in the challenges. This app provides everything we need to measure our levels and progress. Great articles and videos are available as well.

title: Has Made Keto So Easy!
body: I love this app mainly because it’s user-friendly. I’m able to scan products that I buy and eat frequently, so that I may easily add them to a meal period during the day. It’s got a large “library” of grocery and restaurant items, which help you keep up with your micros, total carbs and calories on the go. It also has some wonderful recipes. And this is the free version!!

title: REALLY excellent app
body: This app is incredibly easy to use, comprehensive content and an exceptional user interface. I’ve tried other weight related apps and have failed to follow through because the app was stubborn, clunky or just really hard to use. Carb Manager is well thought out and the Pro level has ease of use features that make it a cinch to stay on track. Kudos to the dev team.

title: Time to make human centered design
body: Wombat Apps: you’re nearly a top 20 fitness app because of solid content and an all-in-one approach. However, it’s not because of design. When all these apps start to provide the same thing (copy you), users will switch to whatever has the most friction free experience for something they need to use multiple times daily. Highly recommend hiring a pro UX designer who does only front end—not full stack.

title: First Honest Review
body: I’ve recently had to adjust to some major lifestyle changes due to medical issues and using this app has made changing over into a ketogenic diet an easy transition. The best part is this app provides me everything I need without having to pay for a premium account. Thank you, Carb Counter. Thank you for not trying to get me to pay a membership just to use your app.

title: Bad, bad update
body: The new version is much harder to use, and there seems to be a glitch that won’t allow me to use the app right now.  The dashboard is less intuitive and harder to see.  I can’t find how to add a food, and I don’t think I can see other user’s contributions.  I really liked Carb Manager before the update, but now I will look for another app for tracking nutrition/carbs.

title: Great tool for tracking Macros
body: I never though if ever track macros but when I started keto I thought it would be beneficial. That’s when I found Carb Manager. It took less than 2 minutes to figure out how to use it and I’ve been going strong ever since. I like how I’m able to track steps, exercise and water in addition to my food intake to get a well rounded view of all efforts towards my goal.

title: Non-Native feel
body: This app doesn’t feel like a native iOS app. It looks like it was built using Google App Maker - all of the iconography looks like what is found throughout Google’s web-apps - Forms, Docs, Sheets, etc.

title: Love it
body: I started using carb manager and loved it so much I upgraded to the yearly premium. Second day of this happening, I am logging my foods as always and I just checked my daily log to see how am I doing with fat intake and it says 1g, I added MCT oil that alone is 16 grams of fats but they are not showing on my macros. I closed the app, open it again, shut my phone down and is still happening. This is driving me crazy. Pls help!

title: Awesome!  Fun!  Motivational
body: This app is so cued in to getting you motivated it’s almost like a game trying to win those carb rings and get everything right where it’s supposed to be.  I’ve managed to follow the Keto plan, the recipes look great and when I’m feeling tempted I start scrolling through the recipes and it really helps bc I’ve been able to find stuff that’s so simple I just wasn’t thinking of it!

title: Works ok
body: I only use this to track my carbs for Keto dieting. I don’t create meals or recipes, or anything like that. This app is easy to use and it tracks my carb intake. But there are little things that are annoying: Like trying to find food that I eat frequently. Some appear in the list and some don’t. Regardless of which filter I use. So I mark all as Favorites- nope. I scroll down the list and all it does is redundantly all the exact same favorites, over and over. The best app is My Fitness Pal, but it does track Net Carbs.

title: So unbelievably frustrating
body: Pushed out an update that I didn’t ask for and the entire thing is wonky and buggy now. Net calories are no longer being tracked even though I’ve gone into settings 100 times and verified everything, e.g. If you feel like your blood pressure isn’t high enough and you don’t have enough frustration in your life, I highly recommend a download. Also good luck with tech support it doesn’t exist. Awful.
response: Hi there - Thanks for letting us know about the issue. We're not having any widespread issues with net calorie tracking, so we'd love to provide personalized assistance with this. Please contact support via Settings - Help & Support. It may take several days to receive a response due to high ticket volumes. We thank you for your patience!

title: Hate the new update!
body: I was excited to try the new update since the old Carb Manager was a little dated looking. I wish I hadn’t updated. The new app experience is confusing and definitely not user friendly. I could deal with that but it’s also messed around with some of my settings and even some of the foods that I had created. I’ve wasted so much since I updated yesterday just trying to get this back to where I can use it and I’m really irritated. I’m a Premium member and I loved the ease of Carb Manager before and I’ve tracked religiously but unless I can get the old app back, I think I’m going to be looking for a new app.
response: Hi! We hear you on the frustration of getting used to a new app, and know this is a big adjustment. Some changes are expected, others may be a glitch that our developers can fix. Please reach out to our friendly Support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Be sure to reference your app store user name, and they’ll get you sorted out asap.

title: Great app
body: I’ve used carb manager for about 2 years. I’ve tried other apps but always come back. They’re not always the most consistent since you rely on other users a lot but overall close to real macros. I did premium for a year, not really worth it IMO. I mainly just use the app for logging intake, watching macros, and reviewing weight trends though. I like that I can save my go to meals and recipes!

title: 5 stars!
body: I gave this app a 5 star rating because it checks so many boxes for me! The ability to scan a barcode truly simplifies not only adding new foods but also while shopping gives helpful insight to which foods to avoid, limit, and which foods are better choices! The articles and recipes provide additional inspiration but most of all it is so easy to use!

title: Loving this app.
body: Having Carb Manager has made this journey so easy and fun.  I can do what if scenarios and it's almost like a game to meal plan.

title: Managing low carbs is easier with CM
body: Knowing what I am eating is much simpler with CM. The index of foods is extensive and generally accurate. Being able to scan codes simplifies everything and seeing the balance or imbalance on a chart is very helpful.
response: Hi Seasons Series, thank you for the great review! We have worked hard to create the largest, most accurate, and easiest to use food database available. Glad your liking the scanner and pie charts. If you have a minute, would you consider checking out the latest version and letting us know what you think? Many thanks and best wishes!

title: Created account and it lost
body: I have been using the app for about a week and have liked what it offers but after a week it wasn’t acknowledging that I had an account so I thought I would just create a new one- assuming all of my information would stay on the open app - not only did it not acknowledge me as a created account holder but it completely lost all of my food information. Staring from Square one and disappointed
response: Hi there, really sorry for the problem! Please contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll work on getting your data restored!

title: Keto
body: I just started he Keto diet, I've been on it for a week now. My friend first recommended this app as it had everything i needed for my diet to guide me. This app has been a great help to a beginner like me to help keep track on what I've eaten. My diet requires me to have a high fat low carbs. It keeps me in line until i can do on my own. The recipes are great and the list foods if not all I’ve used come up in the search options.

title: Great tracking app
body: I’ve only been using for about a week but I love how it breaks down the calories, fat and carbs to help you manage your day. You have to manually input your exercise but it applies the calories burned right to your daily allotment. There’s a scanning feature so you can scan barcodes on foods but there are a lot of items already in their database. Really enjoying this app so far.

title: Best app for keto by FAR
body: I keep trying others just because I like to see what’s out there and always come back to carb manager. I am here to stay. I have recommended it to many friends. The initially set up process can be a little confusing for some people so I’ve heard but other than that I love it! I love the recipe builder. I’m still using the free version and get all I need. Might purchase the paid one day.

title: This app is the bomb
body: I’m just on day 3 and I don’t even know if I could have started at all without the structure and guidance of this app.  I have to say that I (fumble fingers that I am) needed the help of support when I set it up under the wrong email due to a typo and was unable to retrieve all my info I had submitted.   Customer Support was FANTASTIC and got it all straightened out very quickly, and on a Weekend!!

title: Luv it, Fix date-forward
body: New to keto and this keto app but really like the look and ease of use. Noticed that when I back up a couple days, it won’t let me go forward to “Today”. I have to close app and reopen to get back to today.  Don’t know if a bug or me but thot I’d mention…

title: Terrible update - I want my money back
body: I credit Carb Manager for helping me lose 60 pounds in one year. It was simple to find foods, favorite them and it was so EASY.

title: Poor account integration
body: I have been using this for a few weeks and having problems integrating my email address with my app data.  Super frustrating and it keeps asking me to subscribe to premium service when I am already a member.  What’s more frustrating is the service and support line.  There is a chat function that is hardly managed- they claim a two day turnaround.... for a chat?? I submitted this question and no one got back to me.  I have cancelled my premium membership, and am shopping for a new more tech savvy app.  Very disappointed.

title: Hate This App After Update
body: Called me old-fashioned & resistant to change, whatevs. I hate, hate, HATE what’s happened to this app! I cannot edit my own recipes, the new tracking circles are hard to understand, it’s slow to load, it’s too busy with offering up other crap besides my meal tracking & entries.
