In short, a wonderful app that I used for 3+ years and recommended to all I could, has become an unusable mess.
response: Hey Mickey330 - Sorry to hear that you're not loving the update. We understand that many users grew very accustomed to the previous version after 3+ years, and that change can be difficult. Any issues with lag or loading have now been resolved. Please update your Carb Manager app to see the changes take effect! Let us know if we can help with anything else in the meantime.

title: Getting going
body: If you are new to paleo, KETO or low carb/Atkins diet this app will enhance your learning curve and as you compute your meals and menus it will keep it real and keep you honest. These diets work. They deliver. But getting solid counts of your fat, protein, carbs, calories will help maximize your food choices and learn portions. Completely easy to enter, edit or delete foods as you go. I’ve done this diet in the past....going very well with this app.

title: Fantastic but needs verified information.
body: I love this app! I use it to track how many carbs, proteins, and fat I need to consume for my Keto diet while IFing. The only thing I recommend is having verified information that has a verification badge beside it so that I know the information has been verified and I can consume it without worrying that I'll kick myself out of Keto. I've already seen some info that doesn't line up. Once I see this feature I'll 5 star it all day!

title: Super Easy!!
body: I’ve been using the app for about 3 weeks now and I have to say it’s very easy to use. Many other users have things already in the system that really help when your in a pinch. Sometimes fast food is it for lunch if your on the run and if you lose the bun on a burger typically you can find it already in the system “without/no bun”. All in all I have no complaints!

title: Best Low Carb Tracking App
body: So I love numbers and had lost 85 lbs but have 100 more to go. This app allowed me to see exactly where the hidden carbs I had been consuming caused me to stall.  It connects with my Fitbit Blaze and b cause of that picks up my WiFi scale measurements.  It also has one of the largest food database and I have built my own meals that make tracking really ease. I love this app and hopefully it only get better and better!

title: Best thing since Sliced bread
body: I was having great trouble counting carbs until I found this app yesterday. Go on with the voice adding your food it makes life a lot easier. I never realised there was such a thing and so glad that I found it and I urge anyone to use it it’s easy. Make sure you turn the microphone on and use it it’s easier than searching for food and typing it in great app

title: the best meal tracker app hands down
body: this is better than my fitnessypal.

title: Servers always down
body: Great app, when their servers are working. At the moment cannot log food. I add a food item, and it says added, but it did not add it! Second time this particular issue has happened and now I have to write down my foods in case I forget. Just annoying. Not my device, I tried on both iPad and iPhone, same issue. Going to search for another app
response: Thank you for taking the time to review our app! We experienced a brief period where users food lists were not loading, but have since resolved the issue. We do hope that you've been able to log meals. Please contact us in-app directly via "Settings - Need Help" and reference your username so we can assist further. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Low carb keto app
body: I previously used another app (fitness pal) to track my macros but it was not focused on low carb items. Carb manager yes, obviously the name implies it.  I follow this lifestyle and has make a breeze to track all my low carb items and giving them a grade gives you an idea if it’s helping or not. Not expensive at all. I’m trying the premium feature and will continue to do so. So worth it!

title: Great app. User friendly
body: I’m using the free version because I don’t need too much diet detail break down, but would definitely pay If I did. This app is user friendly, pleasant to look at and very helpful. One issue I have is when trying to scan a package it says my phone doesn’t have capability, which isn’t true. Maybe that only comes with paid version?

title: Useless
body: Couldn’t wait to start counting carbs with this app. First day I’ve had it I deleted it. It’s similar to my fitness pal except almost every food I added to my meal didn’t log. 3 things added and then it just stopped. Over and over again. Reset the app. Again, no matter how many times I added the foods it didn’t add to my list but I could feel the add button submit just fine, the little vibration on the screen. When I’d go to my list the foods I added weren’t there. I tried over and over. I deleted it and will find something more useful. I was really looking forward to using this app too!
response: Hi and thanks for sharing your experience. We're sorry to hear you ran into issues logging your foods. That's our core feature, and we'd love to connect with you and help troubleshoot what could be the problem so you can get back to Macro counting ASAP. Please message us in-app at Settings - "Need help?" so we can sort it out. Thanks!

title: So far so good
body: Been using for about a week for tracking while doing Keto. It’s easy to use, and simple. Has a pretty decent database of foods when you scan and also when you search by name. Interface is much better for those following Keto than MFP. The confetti when you reach your goals is a cute touch.

title: Great tool so far
body: I’ve been using Carb Manager for a week. I’ve been very happy with the ease of use and intuitiveness of the interface. I’m also pleasantly surprised by the breadth of foods in the “library”. I’ve used MyFitnessPal and other tools and found them wanting in terms of the number of foods in the system.

title: Hoping this saves my life.
body: I was faithful to the app a few months ago.  Depression set in.  I am now doing with all the energy I have in me to pull myself out of the depression of sadness to try keto one more time. I have no family I have no support.  All I do is for myself.  And on many days I want to give me and on life.  CM keeps me in check of my eating habits.  I leaving nothing out.  It shows me accountability.
response: We appreciate your candor and are proud of you for restarting your Keto journey. We're here for you. Any questions, concerns, or need for support, just message us in-app at Settings - "Need help?". You're doing amazing

title: Premium is disappointing
body: The free version is super useful for tracking any kind of diet. I decided to try premium mostly for the meal planning. However the available meal options are extremely limited and most aren’t even that highly reviewed. Also if you choose to let carb manager auto add some items to meet your macro goals (I needed more carbs) it adds beer, wine, and sugar. Like straight up table sugar. What the heck! I thought this was supposed to be a health app. How about some fruit or starches instead?
response: Hi there, thanks for taking the time to share your constructive feedback! Our Development Team is in the process of fine tuning this feature. Please reach out to us directly through the app or support@carbmanager.com and our Support Team would be happy to notify you when an update for this has been released.

title: Good and ok
body: I’ve tried several keto apps.  Carb Manager has many details that are handy.  However, recipes are limited and search option is just ok.  Keto Cycle has much better recipe choices.  But the app lacks the details, like percentages.  Eat This Much has decent recipes, meal planner and grocery lists that are nice and easy.  Search function is easy to use.  But there are no percentages.  Bottom line, I’m using 3 apps right now, each one having good and not so useful actions.  Still shopping for a “complete” keto app.

title: Best Diet App yet
body: Takes a little time to learn how to use but so worth it. Can choose the type of diet / daily macros , can even change that throughout the day as long as you stay under the calories needed to lose weight you want. Goes to show it REALLY is all about calories consumed vs calories burned at the end of the day. And it tells you exactly how many to eat to meet your goal.

title: Awesome App
body: I paid for a 3 month subscription. This is a great app. Tracks almost everything. Due to health issues, I need to follow multiple diets. Carb Manager tracks all my macro nutrients, calories, insulin, blood sugar readings, etc. The app also connects to my Fitbit and Apple Health App. Gives me peace of mind and helps with my overall health. You can also print out reports for doctors, nutritionists... or for anyone!! Highly recommend!!

title: Calorie math WAY off
body: I’m questioning the validity of this app. It states my total caloric intake to be 683; however, when I add the totals from the column it comes up to 1089. When I go to the “In Depth” view it has the math done correctly. What gives?
response: Hey there, thanks for sharing your experience, and your concerns are completely valid. Please reach out to us in-app, and we'd love to take a closer look and verify all is as it should be with your Macros and Settings. Thanks!

title: I love this app!
body: So easy to track everything in my diet! I’ve used other apps and this one is worth going premium! Do it! You won’t regret it. I’ve stayed on my diet faithfully for 2 weeks when normally I blow it after a couple days because keeping track and counting anything is such a drag. I love how the app tells me the keto grade of a food so I don’t have to guess. Highly recommend!

title: Best Tracking App for ANY DIET
body: I used MyFitnessPal for years and it’s an overpriced piece of garbage that is clunky to use and needs to be updated.

title: Love this app - track macros not calories
body: Love that it lets me take off the amount of calories I’ve eaten.  When i see actual calories, i begin to panic that I’ve eaten too much, however, when i set a macro limit as per my lifestyle, i can focus on macros and as long as i stay within my goals, calories do not matter.    Wish recipes were easier to navigate, but not too much of a biggie to me.  Love this app.

title: Great app for all diets
body: This app is user friendly. It has settings for several different diets. You just choose your specific needs and it calculates your daily goals. Finding and adding foods is easy. Has a weight tracker and can be used with fitness devices. It has so much more than what I am mentioning. I just chose my favorites. This app has helped me completely change my lifestyle.

title: Great App—Very User Friendly
body: This app has really helped me with eating keto.  I use the scan option a lot.  I also like the list of foods that pop up, although it would be great if there were a way to add to the list.  One fix it really could use is a way to send a report about incorrect nutritional info for scanned or listed foods.  Or else a way to enter the correct info by hand.

title: Track on track
body: This app has truly helped me stay on track with keto diet. Staying consistent on KETO    has never been easier with carb manager. The great scanning tool has made it completely easy to follow along with the keto diet it’s been the best tool yet. I didn’t buy the premium or any of the packages but I’m seriously considering it, if I do purchase any of them I will be sure to give an update on my rating.

title: Needs improvement
body: I love that this app tracks macros and net carbs, better than others I’ve used. However, I find it very frustrating that it insists on calculating my calories and macros for me and won’t allow me to manually input them. I can manually input the calories and it will calculate the macros or vice versa, but it won’t let me enter both. There’s also no way to manually enter my own recipes. I create them on MFP and then just enter the macros on this app. Would be great if I could do everything in one app.
response: Hey there — to input macros and calories manually, please go to Foods > Quick Entry. There, you can enter custom macros for a meal. To create a recipe, please go to Foods > My Foods > Recipes and add one there. Hope this helps, and please get in touch if you have any other questions.

title: Keeps me keto accountable
body: This is the best ever App for Keto. I love how easy it is once you’re familiar with adding foods in the right place. The scan option (for food labels) is my favorite thing to use on here and the recipes look amazing!!! Just started tracking my blood pressure as well as blood glucose and ketones. I stopped using this app 2 yrs ago and really regret it. This definitely keeps me on track and holds me accountable.

title: Latest update killed it
body: This app used to be pretty easy to use for tracking calories and macros at a glance. Now they’ve changed it so calories are the smallest inner circle of the display, and that makes it REALLY easy to misread. The old display was so much better and I don’t understand why they changed it for something uglier and harder to use. There are definitely gonna be people who want to lose weight who find themselves stalled out or gaining because the most important part for building or losing mass is now impossible to read.

title: Why fix what wasn’t broken?
body: Before the latest update this app was excellent. The current update is full of bugs. It takes me at least two times to load - it continuously tells me I am offline when I am not. The progress circle (next to pie chart) is completely broken and just sits there looking empty all day.  Custom recipes do not always appear when I want to add them. They do eventually but sometimes are not there. I recommended this app to several friends and am embarrassed at how clunky it has become.

title: It’s ok
body: I am new to keto and like that it offers recipes but I wish there was an option to choose a recipe and switch it with another one with similar macros. I like to choose the meal plan option that will tell me what to eat during the week but tbh I don’t always like the choices given for my meal prep. So I wish there was an option for when i don’t like a certain meal, I can swap it for another suggestion but the app doesn’t allow that so I’m at a loss when it comes to make Hong something to eat
response: Hi and thanks for your review. We appreciate the feedback and recommend trying out our Customized Meal Plans that allow for more liberty when choosing meals. Also, you can always delete any Meals from your Daily Log and replace them with anything else. Message us in-app so we can share more. Thanks!

title: Almost great
body: I love this app and bought the Premium feature because I want the recipes. It would be so much better if I could print recipes directly from the app. There’s an option to do so, but it doesn’t print correctly. Can you fix this? Another thing that would be helpful is if the recipes could specify serving size, ie. this recipe makes 6 servings of 1 cup each. Instead, the recipes only say how many servings total.

title: This is not a free app
body: I like this app, it works pretty good with a good source of foods. But it is not a free app. It’s not as easy to learn how and what all the settings are on the app. It’s my first one that is just a low carb app. Other apps I have used seems more user friendly and allows you to customize a lot more of your goals. You only get to use the app 12 times in one day and that’s why it’s only 3 stars.

title: Didn’t understand keto and this makes it easy
body: I paid for three month subscription after one day of using it and I love that I can just scan food in, search meals, and edit the meals I find on there. It’s tedious to put all your food it but great for people who don’t know where to start. Also it gives you and whole write up of what to avoid and what is okay.

title: Great app but....
body: Every time I edit a workout to get the proper calories burned (fit bit runs ridiculously high in this category) the setting I edited returns to the previous value and saves the larger number. Other than that small issue the app is great at keeping track of macros and the UI is very easy to operate. One of the best features is being able to copy the link from recipe and it load all the info from the website.

title: Tracking with carbs
body: I found this a little difficult at first because I didn’t access the menu and learn how to work it. I had answered all the questions and it gave me 8 carbs and a total of 650 calories! I actually stayed At that the first day and did 800 calories the next day and wasn’t hungry until the second evening! I then learned how to reset the macros. It still won’t let me go to 20 and stay at 1200 calories but close enough!

title: Good App (missing Glycemic Index)
body: Once you get the hang of it, which isn’t long if you’re not afraid to explore by clicking here & there.  Great current graph for carbs, calories, protein & fat.  One can add daily exercise, water intake and hours of sleep as well as insulin, glucose and keytone readings.
response: Hi there - thanks for contacting us and for the feedback! We include glycemic load for all common foods (non-branded). This is part of the free version. Hope this helps!

title: Add icon to indicate a Favorite
body: When scrolling through recipes, I can’t easily tell if I’ve already saved it to my Favorites. I have to click on the 3 dots in the top right corner and read “Remove from Favorites” which is too time consuming. Please add an icon (ie. a heart) to the front page (visible while scrolling) so I can quickly see if I’ve already saved a recipe to my favorites

title: Super support!!
body: This is a great help to keep track of daily carb intake.  While the system is intuitive, there is an initial hurdle to attain proficiency — this evening I was successful entering a food product, (including photo!) to the data base! The community effort to record a library of easily accessed food products is very impressive.

title: What a rip off
body: I told the meal planner no chia seeds and for one week straight it gave as my breakfast chia seed pudding. When I deleted it they had no other option for breakfast for me. I guess I was supposed to go without.  Then for a snack the gave me a bacon wrapped pickle. Keto doesn’t have to be disgusting but the owners of the apparently aren’t aware of this. I wasted a lot of money on this app. Don’t do the same as I did keep your money!!!

title: Love it!
body: This app is the best! It’s not going to lose weight for you but it sure opened my eyes as to how many carbs I was putting away. The ability to just scan or search a food and it’s values is great! I am happily at my goal of 25 lbs gone and will continue to track my food intake in carb manager. Takes the guesswork out and if you truly measure and track you will lose the weight!!

title: Getting use to it
body: Okay I gave this app a second chance. The first time I couldn’t even sign in or make an account so I decided to delete it. For my second attempt, I finally got it. After using the app for a couple days, I do like it. It helps me track my intake very well. My only problem is that you have to make sure the item you add to your meals are correct. I noticed that some members input aren’t accurate.
response: Hey there! Thanks so much for giving us a second chance, and for this feedback! Sometimes our member-submitted food data is inaccurate (human error, labels change, etc) If you encounter data you feel is wrong, you can always report it by scrolling to the very bottom of the food's nutrition info page and clicking "report it." We appreciate our users' feedback in sourcing the most accurate database of user-submitted foods! Thanks!

title: This will replace my Weight Watcher app
body: I started eating Keto 1 week ago today. This app has helped me stay on track.  It easy to use and most of all it is helping me to track my macros for free!  I’ve been on WW for a while and I’m currently on a contract deal with them, but when that ends I will go premium on Carb Manager.  The free version is great!  I lost 4.5 pounds on my first week and for a 52 year old woman in Menopause that’s amazing!

title: Changes aren’t good
body: I don’t like the new update. My fave part of this app was being able to chose the amount of weight I wanted to lose per week/month. It’s not user friendly at all anymore and I’m stuck using it as I foolishly went premium and wasted $40. Ugh. Searching for better app currently; very disappointing as this was a huge help in my weight loss journey.
response: Hi there - thanks for contacting us. It's still possible to chose how much you want to lose per month. Just use the slider to select a calorie deficit, and the app will you show the expected weight loss per month based on your calorie goal.

title: Better than My Fitness Pal
body: I just stumbled upon this after using another recommended app that lost my first day entries. This app is more intuitive than My Fitness Pal and, for KETO, very accurate and easy to use. Whether doing KETO or just counting calories or just want to keep track of your carb intake, this app is everything you want, plus I’m not bothered by ads or begging to enroll me in a subscription

title: Been using for 4 years!!!
body: I love that all the food I eat is usually entered by someone else so it’s super easy to track when you go out to eat too!!  Highly recommend, it keeps track of everything and keeps it for years so you can look back on your eating habits and patterns of when you weighted less and what you were eating or doing. It’s great ;)

title: Very cool way to track your diet
body: Really easy and great way to help stay on track and keep you accountable while on the keto diet. This is really helping me stay motivated, and the app has hundreds , thousands of different food categories and items with their nutritional info. This app has definitely kept me away from a lot of the stuff I didn’t even know was high in carbs.

title: After using a while, I subscribed. Love it!
body: Life-long weight struggle, here. As I’ve learned from everything else in life, you can’t manage what you don’t track—so I’ve used a lot of health-weight-fitness trackers.  And this one is tops!  It checks all MY boxes, anyway:

title: Great all purpose food tracker
body: Easily allows for customization or using quick preset choices.  Barcode Scan feature is awesome, accurate, and convenient.  Tons of foods within the app’s memory make adding your daily food selections a breeze.  Great tool to get on track with what you can and cannot eat for your goals.  Thank you, Carb Manager for helping me live a healthy lifestyle!!

title: I love this app!
body: It makes it reeeealy easy to combine your foods to get the right Keto balance.  I find if what I planned is too high in one category or another, it is easy to change ingredients or amounts of ingredients to make the day work.

title: Great app for Keto beginners
body: Excellent App!  Only complaints so far are that it is a little slow and I wish the premium app was less expensive (I would purchase if $10-15). But otherwise, it’s great and very easy to use. Suggestion: under the measurement section, it would be nice to see weight +/- from the last weight-in to assess how you did in the last week/days. Thanks!

title: Good, can be better
body: Latest update 6.2.2 opens and crashes on iPhone XSmax was fine until this update. Searching can be improved, keyboard jumps around and you select items by mistake, time entry is also a bit quirky. Helpful to be able to use web interface while they fix the mobile app... but won’t be a long term workaround as like to use scan feature and enter items on the go.

title: Couple of flaws but overall ok.
body: I have had this app and upgraded for about two weeks. It is overall pretty easy to use. Flaw #1 when entering your macros there is a bug that will set the number of calories to 358. If you try to change this number it crashes unless you add a 1 in front to make it 1358 then edit. Flaw #2 manually entering recipes is a PIA. I love the upload button for websites but I haven’t found that you can edit what you actually put in the meal/substituting.

title: Best app Ever!!!
body: This app has helped me loose 40lbs! In less than 4 months!!! I had abs! I stopped using it and put 23lbs back on in 6 months! Now, I am back and going to loose the weight again! I swear by this app! & I sell Advocare. This is still better!!! It helps you learn your food and check it out!  Any time you are thinking fast food you need to see if it is worth it. This app will do that!

title: Eye opening
body: I started keto about a month ago. After a couple of weeks of just winging it, I decided to download a couple of apps so I could track macros accurately.  Of the three I tried, Carb manager was the most user friendly and I liked how it had the carb consumption front and center. I would recommend a calorie/macro counter app to anyone trying to do keto and this one has been great for me.

title: The Best
body: Started low carb on April 1st 2018.....(Atkins and Keto)..My weight stalled for two weeks....because I was jumping from one to the other..... So, I decided to

title: The best!
body: I honestly could no do Keto without this app. This app actually makes it so easy to see where you are with your carbs each day, it reminds you to eat if you are trying to intermittent fast, it can re-adjust your macros as you move towards your weight loss goals...or not, depending on your settings. It can do so much or as little as you want, it really is perfect!!

title: This app helps a lot!
body: There are some tweaks needed like me saving my previous food entries so I don’t have to keep retyping and searching (specially if it’s food from the past week).

title: Almost perfect.
body: I am vet pleased with this app. The only reason I don't include five stars is because I have to use a separate app to  Remind me of my intermediate fasting times.  I wouldn't even mind if it didn't have a reminder on it as to when I should eat as long as it at least had field in which I could include the time of day that I eat these meals.  But ideally it should have an adjustable window for consuming foods, with notifications.

title: Good but not Great.
body: One thing I do like about this app is the way it helps you keep track of net carbs. On the downside, it does not have a lot of food variety choices, and you would have to enter the food individually, and not the whole meal. Another downside is the premium. I have a Fitbit and I want to connect my Fitbit, but can’t because it requires you to subscribe to the premium. That’s why I still use MyFitnessPal. Though it doesn’t count net carbs, I am able to have more of a food variety
response: Hi Abby, thanks so much for your review. Most users actually tell us that we have a much more extensive food database than the competition. You actually DON'T have to enter foods individually; we offer robust support for meal entry! If you reach out to our support team in the app via Settings-Contact Support, they'll be more than happy to show you how to use these features. All the best!

title: Great app, easy to use
body: I’m a T2 diabetic on keto.  I’ve never bothered with an app before because I’ve always thought I’m pretty good at keeping track of what I eat, but once I started tracking my food intake I realized how wrong I was.

title: Great but not perfect
body: Very good app and when it works it is fantastic but I have found a few foods not in the database and I don’t see a way to add those foods.  In addition reported errors don’t seem to be fixed in any type of timely manner.  I just had a quest bar and the net carbs did not deduct the sugar alcohol despite a note saying this has been reported 15 times.  I was able to do a quick edit but it really should be fixed.

title: Love it
body: It does everything I need, easy to keep a check on your daily carbs and gives all kinds of chart that you might need... giving one less star as they could add the following :

title: Exactly what I needed
body: I actually bought two apps before this one, but neither of them had what I needed. But everything I need is in this app, because I can track my daily intake of carbohydrates, proteins, and fats. It’s easy to add food, it’s easy to find foods, the scanner works great. If you’re looking for an app that simply helps you know what macros you were eating every day, this is the app #Love

title: Generally good but some kinks
body: Generally a decent app but there are some problems with the recipes transferred from other sites. There was a apple & celery salad listed but then when viewing the recipe there was pork substituted for what I’m assuming was the apple (it was missing).  The pork is what seemed to make the carb count fall within low/Keto guidelines, otherwise the recipe wasn’t Keto...so basically it wasn’t an apple celery salad. There were a few other recipes that did this as well.

title: I like it, but....
body: I like it, but it has some definite glitches. Sometimes it doesn’t calculate the numbers correctly. Like today I’ve had 8 net carbs, but it’s calculating a total of 9, even though when you add them up, it’s 8. Also doesn’t register some nutritional information correctly and sometimes it’s difficult to modify it.  This happens when you scan things and the numbers are way off. Otherwise it’s ok.

title: Best I’ve found!
body: I down loaded 6 different keto type apps, and this one (especially if you pay for the premium version) is by far the best. Premium is well worth the $40 annual fee for all the options it gives me. So far, the only thing that is keeping me from giving it 5 stars, is that I would like to have a Notes section added to the bar on both the My Measurements and the My Nutrition & Wellness bars at the top.

title: Well worth it to upgrade!
body: This app really helped me get through the first few days of transitioning to a keto lifestyle. As I began to explore the various functions and possibilities of the app and how it could benefit me even more, I decided to upgrade to the paid version. It was well worth the money. Saves me a ton of time on tracking myself as well as a ton of time researching meals or menu ideas. Love it!

title: Weight Loss Helper
body: I began the Keto Plan and needed to keep track of the foods I was eating and how that impacted my diet. This app was a life saver. I could look up the foods I was eating at home but also this in restaurants. I could scan bar codes in the grocery store before I bought it so I could keep foods in my house on track with my eating plan. I didn’t even have to pay for this benefit. As I progressed and got my diet better in hand I can add the premium and have the total package with meal plans and recipes. I love this app!

title: Hella Good!
body: Newbie to Keto and at least 50 pounds overweight.  Also in menopause and a 57 which can be a challenge when you’re trying to lose weight. I had to share with the masses that I’m so excited about Keto and really loved being able to have a graph that helped me connect the dots about what goes into my body.  This tool empowers people. Carb Manager I love using your App on my journey to Fit and Sexy for life ❣️ 😉

title: “Done logging for today”
body: So far I love the app. I just upgraded last week for all the analysis’ but I rarely remember to click “done logging for today” which isn’t a big deal if you don’t have the paid version. But if you did buy the paid version a lot of your analytics won’t show up or are incorrect and there is no way that I can find to edit the day to click “done logging for today.”

title: Deceived by auto renewal
body: I originally purchased what I thought was only a 3 month “trial” subscription, but then come to find out I’m automatically renewed and charged every 3 months.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. Thank you for this feedback! We're sorry to hear that you were surprised about the automatic renewal. All of our subscriptions auto-renew, but can be easily cancelled up to 24 hours prior to the renewal date via Settings. If you need any additional assistance, we're happy to connect. Please email us at support@carbmanager.com and reference the username "Palooke76" and we'll be happy to assist!

title: I got nothing!
body: I paid n downloaded the App yesterday and it's still not working. I have deleted the App & downloaded it again several times, still no luck! I am currently waiting for a response from my email yesterday. 🤔
response: Hi Ms Marcella, please email us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll help you get up and running. Thanks!

title: Awesome app, just one issue
body: I downloaded this app yesterday and started logging in no problem. This morning I was on my ninth item and it did not let me log in no more.. its telling me to purchase a premium plan. What if I do not want to purchase a premium plan. Why not state this when you download the app so that your aware.. I love this app I just wish they would let you know that you have to pay eventually to keep tracking...

title: Very Easy
body: I love carb manager! You can take pictures of almost every UPC,  even your supplements.I also love that you can tweak the portion sizes. I wish that I could upload my before and after picture. But I cannot do that unless I have the the paying membership one😀I can also search for different workouts and it adjusts things as well. I do love it!

title: Actually the best
body: I don’t write reviews, this app actually is the best I’ve found if it’s kind. The ability to customize my goals for macros/micros/calories helps immensely. It’s also great to be able to create my own recipe, so whenever I make a big stew or stir fry, I create a recipe with everything I added and divide by my estimated servings and tada! Accurate info on my homemade concoction. That’s priceless to me.

title: New Version is Awful
body: The recent changes to the app are awful, visually unappealing, and difficult to use. I am actively looking for a different app after being a faithful user for years. I had great success using this app in the past and have recommended it to others but, as a result of the newest updates, can no longer do so. I know the majority of users feel the same way given the multitude of reviews online in other related forums. I hope they recognize their mistake and go back to the previous layout.
response: We understand that millions of our users have grown very familiar with the former version of the app and that the update is a big adjustment. We are grateful that you chose us to be on your journey to healthier eating, and hope you’ll give us another shot.

title: Won’t uninstall
body: I downloaded the app to evaluate it along with other Keto apps. I removed the app (like I do any other app) and no longer have an icon for it.
response: Hi there and thanks for your review! It sounds like this may be an issue with your mobile device. Our awesome Support Team is happy to assist you, just email us at support@carbmanager.com. :-)

title: Not accurate values
body: I was enjoying this app for about 3 days when I noticed that NONE of the values are accurate - even when scanning a barcode. Adding carbs when the value of the actual product says zero carbs, adding calories, etc. Pay attention! It may look right at first, but double check. Scanned an item and the only accurate information was the carbs, everything else was wrong. Giving me 2 carbs per egg, 5 carbs for mayo? I have no idea how many carbs or calories I actually ate these last couple of days.
response: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. We pull our nutritional information directly from government, academic, and manufacturer databases. If you're seeing some inaccurate, we'd love to chat with you! Please reach out to our friendly support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support. All the best in the meantime!

title: I love this app but one lil problem
body: My app freeze on me and then I have to uninstall it and when I reinstall it I lose all my information And it’s connected to my email I am have to do this more then once a month And I have a IPhone i really wish this problem would get addressed and this is my third time reinstall this app because it get frozen.....please help I love this app
response: Hi wildflower559, thanks so much for the great 4 star rating! Please reach out to our support team in the app via Settings - Contact Support, and they'll be happy to help you with the issues that you're experiencing. Cheers!

title: Almost Perfect!
body: I love everything about this app except for the ability to print the recipes.  I have the premium version and there’s an option to print the recipes which would make preparing the meals so much easier, however whenever I try to print them, the app freezes and I have to completely shut down the app.  Please fix this issue because everything else is great!!!

title: Suddenly I need an account because Skip this Step function doesn’t work
body: Guys, I just want an app to track my weight, my custom macros, and food I eat. You had that and it was great. Suddenly it’s getting more invasive - I don’t want to give you my information because every app that “doesn’t sell your information” finds ways to make my inbox full of more crap. I was able to use your app to lose 57lbs in Spring ‘19. Now I can’t get past the sign-up page because it loops if I press skip.
response: Hey there! Thanks for leaving a review and letting us know about the issues that you're facing. Users are never required to create an account or share their information in order to use the free version of our app. If you're having trouble moving past the login page, please reach out to our support team at support@carbmanager.com and they'll be happy to assist :-)

title: Great app, but recently very buggy
body: This app has help me lose over 40 pounds and I cannot say enough good things about it! However, within the past week or so, I find that before I can enter in specific information, the app automatically routes back to the daily log page. Quite frustrating and I hope it gets sorted out! Otherwise, I adore the app and hope to continue my progress with it!

title: Pretty good tracker
body: I’ve started keto and heard about this app from a friend that I used to be on MyFitnessPal with. I’ve done side by side comparison with the other tracker and I do see variances but not enough to feel like this app is inaccurate. I do occasionally have difficulty scanning or locating food in the database. Overall I think it’s really helping me understand the effect of what I’m eating and helping me be successful on keto. Started on Saturday and weighed today and have seen some weight loss and have not been hungry at all!

title: Database
body: I was with My Fitness Pal for several years and heard about this app as superior due to net carb tracking. I was disappointed in the lack of branded items in the database, such as Sodexo, a major food service company. However, CM has expanded their database, and even lets you know when it is a user-defined option or an officially branded option. Excellent upgrade that sets CM above the competition.
response: Hi there, thanks for contacting us! We have lots of items from the Sodexo and thousands of other brands. Please open the food view and go to Search and enter the name (i.e. Sodexo).

title: Great, Detail Oriented App
body: I downloaded this app and got a 3-month subscription to assist with my low carb/Keto diet. I have plenty of  experience counting macros, but I wanted something specifically carb-focused. This app is providing that, and much more! Additionally their tech support is great! I contacts them with an issue and got a reply very quickly. Definitely recommend this app for the details and the customer service.

title: Needs ability to customize
body: I am just getting started with the app (premium) and one area in which I see a major need for improvement is tracking measurements. I would like to add customized measurement categories and not be limited to those set by Carb Manager. Example — I want to measure both right and left bicep, thigh, and calf. I also want to measure my lower belly. (Even the FREE version of MFP has this basic functionality- I would expect that something I am paying a premium for would too.)

title: Stepped up my weight loss once I started using this
body: This is an easy to use food tracker that has absolutely everything already in the data bank  I have tried to find so far to put on my list! Especially helpful for beginners when you aren’t sure what counts as what! Now go whip that hot coffee with butter and cream and get going! 14 lbs down in three weeks! Thanks!!

title: My lifesaver
body: Just started Dr Berg health Keto way if eating. This app makes staying on track Amazing.  I bought the full version as I use it EVERYDAY.  It is nice having it on my iPad, where I do most my meal planning, but also on my phone to have it with me on the go. Seeing that is account based and not device base the info shows up on BOTH devices.  This is a Huge selling point for me.  Amazing App!!!
response: Thanks for the great review, Steve! Syncing across multiple devices is definitely a popular feature. And there are no device limits. If you have 5 devices, you can sync Carb Manager across all of them at no additional cost. Let us know if we can ever help you with anything!

title: New to it, but I’ve it already!
body: I’ve only been using Carb Manager for a week, but I love the flexibility it gives me. For instance, we were starving and stopped at Wendy’s for lunch and I was able to check the carbs on several items before ordering.  When I get to the end of the day and find I have carbs left over, it’s like a bonus because I can squeeze it in a snack like mixed nuts. Love it!

title: Crucial to Keto
body: I am on Carb Manager a thousand times a day, checking stats on foods, tracking and planning my meals. I am more educated bc of CM, and with something as challenging as doing Keto for the first time, I would be so overwhelmed if I was having to google or track down Pinterest posts for every food/meal option. It’s streamlined everything beautifully. Also, I’m down 7 lbs in my first week. So thankful!

title: It’s Easy, Just Do It!
body: This app is super easy to work. The carbs, fats, and protein that you need for the day are right there in front of you. It asks if you want to bulk or lose weight and sets your daily calories accordingly. It also has a ton of food already added in and there nutritional facts plus it lets you custom food if you can’t find it. I’ve never used a macro counting app before but this one is helping me a bunch during my keto journey!

title: Best tracking app bar-none
body: I'm really enjoying this app for all my tracking needs. I love the look and simple layout. I even tried "My Fitness Pal", but I really like this application much better. The devs are constantly working on it and it's just amazing. FYI - I have used only the free version so far, (couple weeks now), but can say I will eventually go premium once the ol'paycheck comes in. :-)

title: 7.5 lbs this week
body: I’ve been using this app along with my Fitbit app for 1 week. I’ve had the Fitbit for over a year and I’ve been up and down in the scale. Adding this app, I’ve lost 7.5 lbs this first week. I eat about 20 carbs a day, sometimes 30. I try to stay around 1400 calories. I am active and I felt like the Fitbit food tracker was overestimating what I could eat. VERY pleased with this app so far.

title: Doesn’t work if there’s no internet connection
body: I have been using the app for years, but now when I upgraded to the latest version, it turns out the app doesn’t function without an internet connection. This is extremely inconvenient and I don’t see the reason for that - it is really poor software  design. I would expect the app to be able to store nutrition info for recently viewed items as well as custom foods and favorites. I don’t expect it to fit the full database on my phone, but when I am out of internet coverage, I want to be able to enter foods that I use often.

title: Don’t buy premium (use free!)
body: I loved the free version so I bought the year subscription today. I wish I hadn’t.

title: Great app for all levels of Keto dieters.
body: I’m a Keto noob.   Excited about the weight loss toad ahead but getting started was daunting.

title: Perfect for my needs
body: I have used this app for a week. I wanted to lose weight I gained from my pregnancy so I decided to try the keto diet or if that was too challenging just a low carb diet. Other food apps didn’t break down my macros like this one does. It’s simple to use, which has helped me use it consistently. The app only works if you use it, but if you use it this app is fantastic.

title: Very Simple to Use
body: Been using this for a week. The scan option makes it virtually effortless to track carbs/protein/fat intake.   I don’t like logging food. This app makes it easy.

title: Wish i didnt update !
body: I absolutely loved the older version of CM. So easy to scan or log food.  With the new version, it is very frustrating and takes too long to find food.. even food that has been previously logged.   For the most part, my breakfast and lunch are pretty consistent so when i go to add entry, i cant find the food that was logged the day before or food that i use multiple times a day.   I hope they will fix this as I really enjoyed this app.
response: Hi Sarita - It looks like you may be on a slightly outdated version of the app that doesn't included the latest incremental updates. Please be sure to update both your app and iOS version! If you're still running into usability issues at that point, please reach out to us in the app via Settings → Help & Support and we'll be happy to assist. Rest assured that the issues you're reporting aren't normal for the app at this point. Cheers!

title: So far, WONDERFUL!
body: I’ve decided to try the premium version of this app and love it! I had tried the free one about a year ago and it’s really good, but I can track and log better with this. I’m down 6 pounds in less then 2 weeks. I did encounter a bug in the custom time frame drop down that I contacted support and they fixed it right away! Great app! Great customer service!

title: Excellent “eating right” guide
body: I absolutely love this app- Carb Manager! My son found it and recommended it to all of us. Since I started using it less than a week ago I’ve lost three pounds. I had no idea the food mistakes I was making everyday until I started using this app. And the friendly reminders for you to put your meals into the daily log are helpful too. Also the food ratings serve as an excellent tutorial! Awesome guide!

title: So far so goo
body: Does a great job of pricing the information I am looking for from my meals. However, as a frequent use of My Fitness Pal, there are several features lacking that can be frustration. Copying and pasting previous days meals, seems like it should exists, I can’t figure out how to do it. Adding multiple foods at a time to meals, can’t understand how this does not exist. The data base of foods is lacking and the barcode scan isn’t as good

title: Helpful and Functional - Worth the Premium
body: I find Carb Manager flexible and helpful in managing my healthy meal planning and tracking. The database of nutritional information on food products is great—but a note of caution: not all are accurate, since users can create and post their own information. Whenever possible, I confirm the info via the manufacturer or other 3rd party websites or tools.

title: Incredibly helpful
body: I have a lot of apps, business and personal, but only a few of them are as helpful as this app has been to me since I started the keto journey. It’s so easy to track your macros. And I love the feature where you can scan a barcode and get all of the nutritional information on an item. That is invaluable. Highly recommended!

title: LOVE this app!
body: Really don’t know how I would do Keto without this app!! It is so helpful, so user friendly and it has so many great features once you explore what it has to offer. This app is awesome. Even when/if I stop doing Keto I will still use it. I recommend it to anyone/everyone. I have tried several other apps (free and paid) similar to this one but this one is the best one!!!

title: Great app/small suggestion
body: Suggested change: the share button at the bottom of the page is a great feature but it would be good to be able to share with phone number in a text in addition to the email which is the current method for sharing. Needs both email and text sharing

title: Major Database
body: I love this app so far. I’ve only been using it for about a week or so, but every food product I’ve searched for has been in the database for me to log.  That’s amazing!  I am not an overly serious dieter but this app makes it easy to track what you’re eating and is a great motivator to keep going.  It’s my first diet ever and I’m happy that someone recommended this app to me.

title: A little frustrating
body: I’ve had the premium option for about a week now and it seems to have more glitches then the free version. When I try to enter things (typing or scanning) it refreshes the app and won’t let me add. Otherwise I do really like this app.   I do wish there was a way to contact on the app. I just have a few questions/suggestions I was interested in sharing!
response: Hi there, and thanks for your review! The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: Used to be great
body: This was an excellent app. It probably still is if you’re a person that likes spending all your time managing your diet. Before they decided to “reimagine the app from the ground up”, I used it every day. Lost a ton of weight. It was super easy to enter all your foods and see what you had remaining. Now it’s just a lot of garbage on the screen that convolutes the whole experience. I don’t even use it anymore. What a shame. Might I suggest adding a classic view option for those of us that can’t stand the new look

title: Love but needs just one thing
body: Hi ! My husband and I started keto a couple of months ago and this app has really helped us to stay on track. I even paid for premium.

title: Need support
body: I love this app.  It’s easy to use and has many features that are great. I have the premium version and it just renewed Nov 30, 2020 but now when I try to access the recipes it says I need to upgrade. I select upgrade thinking maybe the automatic payment didn’t process but it says my current subscription is active and will renew in November 2021. So why can’t I access everything?  Very frustrating

title: Keeps you on track!
body: The Carb Manager has really helped me stay on track since I’ve started the ketogenic diet. There is no way I could keep track of my macros without it. I don’t like that it only allows you to enter whole numbers the weights. If I have lost 1/2 a pound I want that to be reflected on the graph. Maybe this is a function only if you pay and again I think that would be silly. Other than that. Great app

title: Where are all the low carb options?!
body: There should FOR SURE be a feature to remove certain items from an entry. For example. I wanted to add a Jack in the box cheeseburger wrapped in lettuce/ no bun but couldn’t find that option so instead added the one from Wendy’s; sure it’s all the same at the end of the day but being a Keto app and knowing people will be modifying their food the ability to add a standard item and then remove the carb items should be a standard feature... please add this for the community - seems like a no brainer.

title: Would be my fave meal tracker app if....
body: I’m starting to like this more than My Fitness Pal and would possibly even upgrade from the free version but I’ve yet to find the ability to add in my own recipes like I can on MFP. For that reason I’m still using MPF more. Carb Manager seems to have more foods in their list and I like how it calculates Net Carbs. Just wish I could add My Own recipe ingredient by ingredient or a similar way as MFP; instead of from an online sources etc. Definitely worth downloading and trying it out.

title: Great App
body: I love this app. I can easily and quickly add my meals for the day,  scan food labels to save to my foods. I purchased to full app so that I can track more things. Down side I don’t care for measurements area, I think it needs to be revamped, also the supplement section is difficult.

title: Awesome
body: This is best app for anyone serious about tracking their daily nutrients and overall health. I’ve been using this app for 90-days now and highly recommend you try the premium version which gives you full access to the premium recipes which are amazing! I will admit, it takes discipline to log everyday but it is well worth it.

title: Best Carb Managing App
body: I’ve tried a few different food tracking apps, but this one helps me out the most.

title: AMAZING
body: I haven’t even paid for the subscription and I’m loving everything the free version has to offer and some. They have almost every brand you can think of as well as accurate serving amounts ESPECIALLY when you scan the barcode of the item (which is a COOL feature). I would highly recommend this app ESPECIALLY if you have trouble managing your diet

title: Make counting carbs SUUUPER easy!
body: I’ve only been using this app for the past 5 days or so, but it’s nice to not have to do the math involved in tracking net carbs/protein/fat intake in my diet. It also helps me when I’m shopping because it gives you a “Keto grade” for foods that you buy so you can figure out how much of each thing you should buy. 10/10 would recommend

title: Scanning food / barcodes
body: Half the time when you can a barcode the item can’t be found... is there a way to address this in an update / add a way to add multiple foods at one time ( Rx: during breakfast time ) also a lot of the numbers people put in are working so you are constantly having to double check to make sure what’s in the screen matches the nutritional value list of the product your gonna scan..... other than that love it .

title: Complications but I still like it
body: I downloaded this app, and went ahead and upgraded to the premium so I could share my recipes with my mom etc. I keep getting prompted to upgrade to premium which is making the app more annoying to use- I don’t know how to fix this, so if I could get this fixed it would have a 5 star rating but so far I can’t utilize any premium features.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you're encountering the pop-up upgrade option when viewing recipes from a community member. In this case, we'd love the opportunity to inspect your account, as well as the other members and offer some advice! Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Scaryderry" and we'll be happy to help! Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

title: Great app😁
body: Really great app! Helps out a lot. Just two things I don’t like need to add some exercises from like Jillian Michaels videos the beach body. And last thing it says 360,000 recipes I rather just be able to go thru them all then have to type in dinner or chicken but rather then that I’d recommended this app to any one wanting to lose weight I’ve lost two lbs in two weeks 😁👍

title: No privacy policy?
body: I have enjoyed using this app for about a week and find it very easy but learn more every day. I love that I can track my food by store and brand, exercise, supplements, water,… Today I downloaded the app and in setting up the account I had already created I decided to check the privacy policy. I’ve tried multiple times throughout the day but get a “404 Page Not Available”.
response: Hi there, thanks for contacting us! Our web server was having a bit of trouble earlier, but we're fully back online now, and our privacy policy can be viewed at https://www.carbmanager.com/privacy. Please let us know if you have any questions.

title: Couldn’t do it without this app
body: I started the Keto Diet a week ago.  This has been a life saver for keeping my ratios in check.  All you have to do is scan barcodes and select the portion you ate.  This helped me to realize the ratios are based on the calories provided by each category as oppose to the grams consumed of each.  Couldn’t imagine a better app for tracking macros

title: Carb manager
body: After trying a number of iPhone apps  so I could manage my carbs while on the Keto Diet, I found that the Carb Manager Premium appeared to  be the easier to manage. Apparently, one can’t get a good app without paying a premium.

title: Fix it
body: It’s so much harder to find food items by typing in items.  Like a nacho no beans or chips can’t add it anymore.  I actually stopped using my fitness pal and was just relying on this that probably going to change for me.  Now too I’m also a paid premium customer and feel like and I’m totally disappointed in the new upgrades

title: Keeping Me Honest
body: Weight loss is tough.  Tougher for some than others.  The app keeps me honest on my eating and I’ve lost 25 lbs. in the past ten weeks.  But using the app daily is the key.  And therein lies the rub for my past yoyo successes and failures.  I lost the weight and think I can go back to poor eating habits without consequence.  So give it a whirl and good luck!

title: Pretty good for dieting
body: I’ve been using this app for over a year now and it’s pretty good for tracking your food. I’ve reached out to support before a f they’re also responsive.

title: A lifesaver!
body: I am new to Keto and it all became a bit  confusing.

title: Beware- may miscalculate net carbs!!!
body: I was loving how easy this app is to use. However, I started noticing it miscalculates the macros in certain foods, particularly the NET CARBS. I've experienced this when entering whole foods AND even when using the barcode scanner. For example, the La Mission low carb wraps list 3 net carbs per wrap on their packaging, but when inputting the wrap via the barcode scanner, this app says it has 4 net carbs. According to Perfect Keto, 1 cup of cabbage has 3 net carbs, but the app calculates 5. I don't feel I can rely on this to help me keep track of what I'm eating. Hoping they fix this!!
response: Thanks for sharing your experience and feedback. We pride ourselves on the accuracy of our food database. With some branded and processed foods, they've been input by other users, so if you find there are inaccuracies, you can always Report a Food Error to be updated, and in the meantime, make Quick Edits to the Nutrients. Just reach out in-app, and we can share how. Thanks!

title: Great app and great price!
body: I love, love this app!  It has helped me lose 10 lbs. and the best part is that I don’t feel hungry all the time and my cravings have been significantly reduced.

title: Makes managing a diet possible!
body: I never write app reviews... ever. But without this app I probably would’ve quit my keto diet by now! It makes my sister and I feel so good seeing when we can see our daily goals and watch ourselves actually stay on track.

title: Tracking calories
body: This app is great for tracking daily caloric intake. The visual of calories eaten helps me know if I need to add or limit carbohydrates, fat or proteins. I should have been using this app long ago as my calorie counter. The app does take getting used to during the first few days as it needs a bit of input work at first. It does get easier over time.

title: This AP is such a wonderful help
body: The Keto diet is somewhat complicated. I joined another diet site and it was really just a “rip off”,  then a friend told me about this one and it has been such an amazing help. There is a learning curve to use the AP but it is absolutely worth the effort. This AP has everything a person needs to go on a successful Keto diet.  Also the recipes are delicious! Thank you!

title: Won’t allow me to set carb amount
body: I have doctor given need for carbs for my diabetes. This is telling me 19 a day, this will seriously kill me. I’m trying to change this as developer said it can be. Took 20 min digging through the app to find.  Which makes east of use issues.   When I found it, protein/carb/fat combined % that you slider bar to change % between them. Again I need a carb manager not a mess of things and someone else’s ideals, and this is not just a carb manager as the name insinuates.  If it’s so simple.  I should have this much trouble.   It’s a mess not making things easy
response: Hi there, and thanks for your review! You can totally customize your macros by choosing "Custom" under "My Macronutrient Goals"! The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: Ruined
body: I’ve subscribed to the premium version of this app for several years. Will be letting my subscription run out since one is unable to get a refund even though app is no longer the one I purchased.

title: Ehh. Gets the job done.
body: Not a fan of the new interface; for my needs, it’s too complex. The older version (4-5 months ago) was perfect because it was simple. Used to be able to create recipes, add custom foods without issue; this newer version is often buggy when it comes to doing those tasks and I become frustrated. My vote would be to go back to their other version from a few months ago! Never an issue. I continue to use it because the database is extensive & fairly trustworthy.

title: Was perfect...
body: The app use to be perfect, but since the most recent update every time you open the app it reloads the logo screen. This isn’t that big of a deal on its own... but the app also randomly crashes now when trying to log items, which makes the annoyance of having to watch the loading screen over and over and over again a waste of time. The database also needs to be purged as now there are a number of user submitted nutritional data that is blatantly incorrect.

title: Loved the old version, HATE the new one
body: Absolutely loved this app before. It was easy to navigate, I could easily find and edit food when I needed to, it was wonderful. Then the developers decided to upgrade it to try and make it look fresh and “modern” and I absolutely dread using it everyday. It is glitchy, I can’t find any of my food easily, all my recipes were wiped, it’s hard to even see how many carbs you have eaten now. It’s terrible! Please app developers, go back to old version or make something NOT TERRIBLE please! I absolutely hate it and it’s making me hate tracking my food

title: Easy to learn
body: This app has been so helpful! Not going to lie I hate learning new things, but this is so easy, just type in what you want to eat under food & it tells you how many carbs it is and how much you can have, and the recipes help sooo much!

title: Needs a little work
body: A good app. But when I try to type in foods, if I make a spelling mistake and try to go back to fix, the curser advances.  You have to go all the way back and retype the entire entry.

title: Love this app
body: Finally an app that lets you add your own recipes by copying and pasting.  Most of my recipes come from Pinterest.  Now I can seamlessly plan our menu with some of our families favorites but also with the many choices that come with the membership.  Still very new user but so far I am very excited about learning and using all of these features.

title: Exactly what I needed.
body: This app makes tracking your intake so easy. My favorite benefit is being able to scan barcodes at the grocery store and knowing before buying whether the item is keto or not. It also gives you a grade for that specific item which informs you about how it’s keto and how often/how much you should have of it. I love it!

title: Love it on some levels
body: I became a premium member in order to sync my Apple Watch for steps and exercise. After three frustrating days and no response from customer service except for links to things I’ve already tried on their help page, I’m about to call it quits. Customer service gets a 0. The app itself is pretty good as a carb counter except being wrong at times, and when you try to report the proper info and see that “35 people have already reported” yet it remains unchanged a week or more later. 🤷‍♀️

title: Great for keto
body: This app is great to keep track of your macros for keto. Most of the items I eat can be quickly scanned.

title: App is great
body: I’m glad I tried this app and went ahead and purchased the premium subscription for 3mo to try it!

title: Best Macro and Carb tracker for Keto
body: I wanted to be able to track carbs and downloaded this free app to help me.  After just a day I decided to purchase the premium app and it was the best decision ever. The recipes are amazing and I can even set up my weekly planner OR (better yet) have it automatically build for me with the grocery list that aligns to my macro goals.  I just reached Ketosis and excited for this journey!

title: Love this App!
body: What do I love about this app? Everything! Keeping track of my calories and macros has never been easier. There is an extensive food library to choose from. I even played around with it to see if the uncommon weight loss shakes and bars that I eat are there and they are! You can even keep track of your water intake and more.

title: Very easy to use
body: Super dynamic, customizable and very very useful. I’ve been measuring and weighing my meals for almost 2 years now and I couldn’t have gotten to where I am right now physically and mentally, without carbmanager’s help

title: This keeps you on track
body: I absolutely LOVE this app!

title: Tbh
body: I love this app it has helped me so much and for me I like it better than other “higher downloaded apps” I prefer this app and it’s so easy and I love using it and don’t get annoyed like I would with other apps highly recommended. Also with other high apps you have to pay to do Leto and certain types but with this app it’s free and that’s a big plus for me !

title: Pretty good....
body: This is about the only carb app I have found that works well. I like that includes exercise, bodyweight, and has a large food inventory to choose from. I love the scanning feature as well. I think the monthly/yearly prices are quite steep. I paid the one-time fee of $10 to have unlimited logging of my food. However, that didn’t give me access to any of the other features. Disappointing. Overall, it’s a good app. The pricing seems to be a bit out of whack.

title: Fantastic App!
body: I began following the Keto diet. I used the free Carb Manager app on the recommendation of a friend. It was so useful to figure out my macros, searching for nutritional information for many different foods, and in keeping track of my carbs. I decided to subscribe to the paid version. Wow!!! What a wealth of information it has! Tons of recipes, sharing options, and more! I’m so glad I did!

title: New format too complicated
body: I am greatly disappointed in the update and changes made to this app.  The old one was simple and very easy to use. Thus new one is VERY complicated. Finding foods is frustrating, even simple basic ones. I didn’t want or need all the things this ‘improved” app can do.   May have to find a new one.....

title: Great app for counting macros!
body: I have been using this app for keto diet. Overall a great app. However, it glitches a lot and the pages get messed up often. This needs to be fixed. I would love to have a diary where you can put in tour weight and it will show you a graph of your progress. Not sure if the premium version has this as I use the regular one. I like the fact that I can contribute recipes here.

title: So amazing
body: I downloaded this app yesterday and I cannot believe how amazing it is. It linked easily with my Fitbit to track my exercise and it gives me thorough nutritional information and has an incredible database. I’ve never downloaded an app and been this happy with it. Thank you so much for developing this and giving me a chance to get on track

title: New version stinks
body: I had all of my regular foods saved in the old version and now you have to go back and add them in with the upgrade. The upgrade also doesn’t pull the most common entries anymore and lists stuff I haven’t used in weeks or months verses stuff I entered in the last few days. It’s harder to add your updated weight as well. I hate the new version. Please give the option back for quickfind of the foods I’ve actually used recently and have added in the last couple of weeks.

title: Updated app to version 7 and lost everything
body: Title says it all. I used it for a month with no real complaints to speak of, got a notification for an update, did the update and it kept asking for me to enter my email and password even though I was still logged in. Logged out and couldn’t log back in because I forgot my password, reset my password and logged in, found all my information gone and my year of paid subscription gone... not sure how this kind of thing happens. Very unsatisfied right now, and that’s putting it very very lightly.

title: What happened?
body: I’ve used this app for two years and it has been a lifesaver for me. This new update is not what we needed. The interface is reminiscent of the useless Google fit. The dark and grayed out fonts in the macros are hard on the eyes. My everyday items are not working properly (unable to edit). Finally and most importantly, the app does not export calories to Apple Health app consistently or logically. I hope that you turn this around or I will have no choice but to cancel my subscription and go elsewhere.

title: Used to be fabulous
body: One week ago (December 2020) this would have been a 5-star app.  I used it everyday and it had a fabulous interface, amazing library to pull from, etc.  Now, they “fixed it” and it is terrible.  I am going to assume all the functions are still there but good luck finding them.  All the functionality I relied on is hidden and makes this a painful app to use.  Going to have to start looking for something new that

title: What an amazing app
body: $30 for the year? That’s incredible. It saves all of your food you’ve entered. It’s easy to read. My favorite part is the Say function where you can type everything and it gives the recommended items so you don’t have to search everything individually. Try the free version. This is amazing.

title: This app is worth it
body: I started out using the free version and have since switched to the 3 month paid version. It is well worth it. This app takes the guess work out of tracking. The scan feature to capture food stats is great, recipes are delicious and creating your own menus so easy! If you re looking for a great Keto app, Carb Manager is for you

title: My Carbs on keyto
body: I love the fact that I have to really watch my carbs and the funny things is I had just got my blood test. My doctor said I need to watc my carbs they were a little high and the fat level in meat or other foods when cooking.

title: The best app for Keto!
body: Have tried MFP Premium and this app is much, MUCH more user friendly. Also with MFP I was still seeing all kinds of ads with the premium version which was irritating. If I could make one recommendation for an improvement, it would be the ability to bookmark recipes. Maybe the option is there, but I haven’t found it yet.

title: Good but not great
body: I’m doing Keto and switched from using the MyFitnessPal to this, at first I was like this is great now I can see my net carbs without having to calculate it my self. However this app makes you pay a subscription to import recipes, really. At least I could do that on MyFitnessPal without paying. Plus the navigation is funky not nearly as smooth as the other app. Can’t say I’ll be using this app. I don’t want to manually import recipes and I’m not paying $9 for premium.

title: Easy peasy
body: You can’t ask for an easier app to track carbs! And being visually inspired, I’m addicted to checking the pie chart first thing after entering a meal - you know exactly where you stand without having to interpret numbers. You can even contribute to the global nutrition database if you want. The scan feature to enter foods is a bonus, too. Try it!

title: Really Nice App
body: We downloaded this app when we decided to go on the Keto diet. I like it better than the FitBit or My Fitness Pal apps, it’s just easier to use. So far we haven’t found any foods not in the database. We love the scan feature, and use it almost every day.

title: Review
body: I’m just using the free version right now and love it! I’m strongly considering the premium now that I’ve experienced how user friendly and convenient this app is! I’m first going to purchase the 3 month membership and if I continue to love it, I’ll upgrade to the year. $40 a year sounds like a great value to me! I’d spend $40 a month to get my energy and health back!

title: Great App for Beginners & Beyond
body: We just started KETO about 4 days ago and this app has helped tremendously. I love how you enter your own recipes, scan barcodes, and how it tracks your macros.  I also love that this App does not require you to upgrade after a few entries like I found with other KETO apps I tried. It’s very important for me to really see how an App works before upgrading.

title: Very Unhappy with this Carb Manager
body: Problems is food directory is uncompleted and you had to type in the information from other source. Another major problem is you had to pay for a membership to sync with Apple Health which Under Armor My Fitness Pal don’t required.  By this rating I only gave a 1 because it cannot be below that. The review under Google is incorrect or didn’t do a full review. Please try other before you pay money for this and have to continue a year or you be unhappy requesting a refund like I just did. To be satisfy only deals with Under Armor or Nike Apps.
response: Hello from Carb Manager and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you did not have a pleasant experience when using Carb Manager. We'll be happy to review your account and offer any suggestions to help make the usage of the app clearer and easier. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username so we can offer some immediate assistance. Thank you!

user_name: must not be the only one
title: Tracking - them carbs; you - you’re money
body: I loved this app. It helped me lose a lot of weight. I haven’t used it in over a year, remember canceling the membership, was just billed $42 dollars without asking to renew it, went to app to find out how to contact someone, was asked to join, went to settings, they say I’m using it on free status, still paid $42 and can’t find a number to call. Good app but something fishy is going on so use with caution and keep track of your iTunes purchases emails. Meanwhile I’m on a mission to talk to a human.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support. We're happy to help delve into the issue that you've encountered with the app & your Premium status! Our support team is standing by to assist you. We ask that you select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Must not be the only one" in order to connect with someone from our team. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Great app but no way to track weight
body: This app is easy to use. Very user friendly. Intuitive and i love it.  Would have given it five stars because it is perfect except that.... unbelievably, there is no way to track your weight!!  How is that possible!? Whats the point of a carb counter if you cant track your weight?!! Thats whole point of counting carbs... its not for a pastime. It has a purpose:  to lose weight.

title: Overall a good app
body: Wish it had a scanner and photo capability. I shouldn't have to pay. Nowadays everyone wants to nickel and dime you. But hey I get it, it's a business. Overall, does the job at keeping track of things. Makes it very easy to count macros and encourages me not to indulge. I almost had two incidents my first week! Easy to use. No bugs so far. With the app I've been able to lose 6 pounds in 7 days.

title: great help planning meals
body: love this app.  i am on a progressively changing diet to strengthen body and soul.  i have changed up my diet in 3 changes so far.  It accommodated me well for two, but figuring carnivore diet which uses weight in grams i.e., fats and protein, is not as easy.

title: Gatillo38
body: I love this app because my Keto progress is always on point. Never fails on me and keeps me on check. Started 6 days ago and I’ve noticed change on my clothes. Wait my self when I started but waiting for a full month to wait my self again. But my clothes shows it I’ve lost sizes on my self. Thanks Carb Manager for developing this app for us.

title: Fabulous app
body: I started the keto lifestyle two weeks ago. I downloaded this app the first day. It’s so easy and quick to use. I use the free version to track my net carb intake. It tracks all foods. Type food name in the search engine, add amount. That’s it. You can also track water intake & exercise.

title: Stupid log in pop up
body: Every time I open the app or go back to the Daily Log tab, a “Create my account” pop up comes up. I already have an account, it’s logged in. WHY WON’T IT GO AWAY?!? It’s incredibly frustrating and annoying to have it pop up every. single. time.

title: Used to be great
body: It still works, but is far less convenient. Frankly, they’ve managed to make the app dumber. All my recent foods used to pop up once I clicked the search bar. Now, there’s more (unnecessary) navigation to get to frequently eaten foods. There’s also more button pushing, and swiping/scrolling, to add foods. Used to be able to tap the progress bar on the macros and they’d change back and forth from how much you’ve had and how much is left. I’m so disappointed. I used to love this app. Poor form.

title: Rage against the machine
body: I was diagnosed with diabetes 8 weeks and struggling with my eating habits.

title: Carb Manager App
body: Carb manager app is hands down the best app out there for keto dieting! It holds you accountable for all that you consume throughout the day. It is extremely easy to use and perfect for on the go use when at the store and don’t want to calculate on the spot!! I recommend to anyone and everyone that is thinking about dieting! I pray it will always be here to use and enjoy!

title: Loving it 💜💜💜😍
body: Just started using the app, I was very intimidated at first and thought I won’t be able to use this. Definitely not an app, internet person. BUT omg I can do it and it is not hard at all I absolutely love it. Especially when it gives me kudos for logging my days (I’ve only done a few, but it’s on and popping from now on 😁👍🏾)💜💜💜😍🥰

title: Great app
body: I did by the premium and everyone I have gone I have been able to reference via the meal planner to ensure I’m making good choices.
