I do wish that it could upload info (blood pressure) from other apps. I have a blue tooth bp machine but have to manually upload. However that’s a nice to have! Overall very excited about progress and help from this app!

title: Great App but Copy doesn’t work
body: I really like this app. I purchased the premium and I’m loving it. I meal prep so I eat the same meals daily. I have been trying to use the “copy” option to just copy my meals from day to day ( although I can create recipes which I’ll do in the meantime) but the food items are never added. Hopefully this will be tweaked soon! Other than that small issues it’s the best app I’ve used on my Keto journey.

title: Glad I found Carb Manager
body: I have tried three other apps, before seeing a post about carb manager and how well it was working for them. I decided to give it a try. I first started with the free part of the app but quickly realized the premium added all the extra features I was looking for. This is the perfect app for tracking my macros! Love this app.

title: It’s okay but........
body: Nicely designed.

title: Update made it useless
body: I’ve been using the free version of the app for almost a year now, but the new update is crap. It deleted all of my previous data.  when I tried setting up a new profile, it incorrectly set my macros... and now it refuses to let me change them. Guess I’m looking for a new app, because this one is now useless.
response: We are so sorry for the interruption! If you are still missing your data, please log out (Settings > Log Out) and then in the log in or sign up screen, look for a link toward the bottom of the page labeled "Get back in here". This will restore your data. If you need additional assistance, please email us at support@wombatapps.com.

title: New to Keto
body: I’m new to Keto and a friend told me that I should count my macros to get the best results. I’m so happy I found this app. It makes it so easy. Even without a subscription. I can scan the barcodes of food I eat and it will pull up the nutritional facts for it to add to my daily intake. I can even make my own recipes and it will add up all the ingredients for me. Highly recommend!

title: Love carb manager!
body: Been doing keto lifestyle for a while and not losing weight, because I was never tracking my macros accurately.  This great program figures it all out for you!! And almost every food out there is in their data base.  Love it that you can ”speak” the food and not have to type it in. If I could only get the program to manage my life!😊

title: Love it!
body: Big help for staying on the keto diet. I have narcolepsy and staying low-carb/high-fat helps me manage my condition. I especially like how Carb Manager helped me set up my own particular diet plan in the beginning and how it tracks fat and protein intake in relation to carbs. The articles are informative and I’m looking forward to digging into the recipes. Also, CM sinks to Fitbit. Overall, I’m very grateful for this app!

title: Works great when it works
body: This is my favorite food logger.
response: Thanks for sharing your experience! We're working on updating our offline mode with our next version that will be released later this year. We'll keep you posted! In the meantime, please reach out to us in-app with any questions or concerns you may have, and we'd be happy to help. Thanks!

title: Help!
body: I’m liking the app so far, except for what seems to be a glitch. Whenever I add a food (scan it or enter it manually and then tap on the little ✔️ to add it to my list) it ends up being added to a meal in my Daily Log. I can delete it from there, but this is very annoying. Can this be fixed, or am I doing something wrong?

title: Pros and Cons
body: This app is very user friendly. It makes journaling an easy task. My primary use is food journaling so I can’t speak to other functions.

title: Encouraging app!
body: I rarely ever write reviews but this app is so convenient and actually makes tracking my calories enjoyable. Such as when it sends me the notification that says “just a friendly reminder to track your calories” it genuinely puts a smile on my face. If I could give it another star I definitely would!

title: Great tool
body: I have been using Carb Mgr for about a year and a half. After going through a cleanse I found the app helpful in keeping me on the right track. I enjoy the exercise input and notes besides keeping track of my food and beverages. I have referred other friends and family to the app, so they can keep track of their carbs! Thanks Carb Mgr

title: Awesome weight loss tool!
body: I have been using Carb Manager for about 2 months to lose weight. Using their tracking system, I have lost 18 pounds. Not only does this app help inform me when it’s time to stop eating, but it also helps me UNDERSTAND which foods are worth it and which are not. I definitely recommend! It is also very user-friendly!

title: All My Favorite Foods Gone
body: I’ve use this app for almost a year now and just loved it. This week they upgraded it and made it awful. All of the foods I had saved are gone off my program and it is a completely changed and not user-friendly. I am so disappointed with this company I wouldn’t even have given them one star but I couldn’t write a review without  choosing, so I’d like to make it -5 stars instead. Please restore what was wonderful with this program. Did you ever think of asking your users what they thought before you changed it all?

title: All In One App
body: I love this app because I can count macros and all things food. The basic, free version has everything I need and I appreciate that. I use this as my calorie counter but also it has a feature that helps me figure out what my caloric intake and macros should be set to depending on what my goal is. It’s a 5 star app and very user friendly!

title: Great tool
body: Love this app, I just started Low Carb , working towards keto. I’m learning so much by using carb manager, so easy to log your foods, and nice to see where I’m at through the day. Love the scan feature, so far it’s recognized everything and knows exactly how many carbs/fats/ protein.  This is the best tool I’ve come across for keeping me on track!  1 week lost 4#’s.

title: Wish I would’ve found this sooner
body: I’ve been searching how to “Keto” correctly after winging it on my own and heard about this app. A lot of people preferred this over “My fitness pal” & I can see why. It is so easy and convenient to use; I love all of the perks that comes with it. And for less than $4 a month, it’s a no brainer. Worth every penny👍🏽.

title: Wonderful app
body: The most useful dietary app I have used so far. But I don’t like that it won’t enter and save my challenge points automatically. If I go through all of the effort to log my food and exercize, why should I Ioose all of my challenge points just because I forgot to tap that I finished the challenge for the day? That doesn’t make sense.

title: Love, but wish for...
body: This app has been extremely helpful. I wish it would save my scanned foods so I could find them quickly. Also, I wish for the ability to move food items from one day to another, not just copy them & then have to go back & delete from where they were. These added functions would make this a 5-star app in my mind!

title: Carb Manager
body: Carb manager combines quantitative focus by counting carbs and a qualitative adjustment in your eating to allow real results and real weight loss. Eating carbs is easy. Reducing carb intake requires a real focus. The good news is once you cut down on carbs, you will lose weight and you’re craving for food quickly goes down also making the change to weight loss inherently easier.

title: My favorite nutrition app
body: I found this app really easy to use and I learned to navigate it quickly. I am doing the Keto diet and this app has made it unbelievably easy to track my net carbs. I was using MyFitnessPal for years, but when I started Keto, I found I had to customize all my food in order to reflect the net carbs. I love this app and will be using it for a long time!

title: Best App!!
body: This is the easiest app to use!  All but one item that I’ve eaten since I’ve started using has been able to be scanned in.

title: Good, but too many paid features
body: I have used MyFitnessPal for years and thought it was the best until I found Carb Manager. I do Keto and this has been a huge benefit for me because of its net carb feature. For The Developers: I would pay a one time fee for the features I want (like glucose and ketone tracking), but will never pay premium membership.

title: Great App, But!
body: I really like like this app and use it every day, but I wish I could select multiple items at a time from the food list when adding daily food.  Example, If I have coffee with cream, MCT Oil, Granola, and almond milk, I have to separately each item from my list at add to breakfast.  It would save so much time if I could pick all 4 items (which are always on my pick list) and add all to Breakfast at the same time.

title: Exactly what I needed
body: This app does what I needed a carb app to do. I went ahead & purchased a year sub because the recipes are so good. The database isn’t quite up to mfp standards but it is way better than any other carb app you’ll find. I’ve been using heavily for a week & have only found like 1 thing that wasn’t in the database in some form. Totally worth it.

title: Easy, Informative
body: I’m new to the Keto/low carb lifestyle and this app is coming in really handy. It’s easy to figure out, you set your parameters and add food and there you go. It’s great when your going out to lunch and want to know how much a certain item will cost you carb wise. You can add exercise and all sorts of things I haven’t even tapped into yet. I recommend.

title: The perfect carb manager app!
body: I love this app!  I get notifications if I forget to post (or eat) my meal.  It’s easy to find the correct foods to eat to stay within your parameters, especially if you’re out & about.

title: So easy & helpful!
body: I had been trying to figure every amount for everything! Some things could be confusing, other just hard to keep track, others hard to find information! This app has made things SO much easier! Have so much more time for actually working up menus, finding recipes, and actually doing a bit of exercise! Love this app!

title: Useful tool for keeping track of your macros
body: Love the feature where you can scan products that you eat and it loads up the nutritional values. Also great app to look for new recipes (premium members only). You can also set goals to lose weight or gain muscle. I got the app because I started a Keto Diet and the app already had a goal setting for keto!

title: I loving this app for tracking CARBS!!!
body: I have only been using it for few days, but I love it! The foods list are endless and I haven't come across anything it doesn't have. It has many features. And you cans pour chase the upgrade for even more.  Using this app for tracking my carbs/fast/protein ratios, I have lost weight every day. Highly recommend, so far!

title: Fairly Easy
body: I was introduced to this program by a friend. I’ve done the Keto diet before and I like this version. I do have issues with scrolling through quantities and cups , ounces, etc. it just scrolls the whole page. I have noticed some name brand foods that the total carbs don’t match on the package and the app. All in all, it’s a good program.

title: Incredibly useful and relevant!
body: The design of this app is on a “next-level”. It is beautiful in its useful and relevant graphics. The recipes are terrific and photos show everything step-by-step. It drives one to have a balanced view of their diet taking into account not just carbs, but protein, fat, calories, water intake, and exercise!

title: Love this App
body: I’ve been looking for an app to help log the food I eat. It’s easy to make entries.

title: Update
body: I don’t like the update to CM; it’s harder to read, they took away the Steps chart, and it is difficult to navigate and figure out how to enter data.  It is also very sensitive to touch, which can cause some entries to change unintentionally.  They also took away the decimal feature which I loved using on the previous version.  Bottom line: I DON’T LIKE IT!!  Oh, they also switched colors around - Red used to represent Fats, now it represents Carbs; and Yellow now represents Fats; no more Green.

title: What happened??!!
body: I would have definitely given this five stars except recently it is not recognizing foods that I have been eating, changing the titles on foods and not able to log foods that it did in the past. It seems like as time goes on it is doing this to more and more food items. A message pops up and says it may be because your using wifi ????? This has nothing to do with the problem. Furthermore it does this on wifi or not. Fix this or I am jumping ship very soon!

title: Macro adjustment
body: I generally love the app, it’s very helpful. However, i wish it would adjust my macros like it did my calories when i entered exercise. I also wish it showed the exact amount of carbs in a food rather than just rounding to the whole number. Ill limit myself to a “3g carb” snack when i have eaten “12g carbs” that day and it will put me over because it was actually 3.4g and i didnt realize

title: Keto power
body: I have loved using the carb manager app to help me and my husband stay on our keto diet. We’ve each lost 40 lbs while using it and still going. It’s easy to use too!  I do wish it was a little more intuitive and before I finished typing brought up my favorites. To make it go faster. But it’s still been easy to log foods.

title: Beware when using this app.
body: This app is useful for tracking carbs. However, I've found that many of the food listings--including meals from popular restaurants and barcode scans--have inaccurate information in the app. They often have the wrong carb amounts. If you use this app you will have to check every entry to make sure the net carb amount is correct by going to the restaurant website or checking the nutrition info with the app listing.
response: Thanks for sharing your experience. We do pride ourselves on the accuracy of our food database, but it is in constant growth and expansion. If you've run into nutritional errors when scanning restaurant items, you can always report it as a Food Error so we can fix it, and in the meantime, make a Quick Edit so you can log it with the correct Macros. Just reach out to us in-app, and we can show you how. Thanks!

title: Love this app!
body: There’s only one thing missing. The ability to group together all of the components of a frequently prepared food. I drink my coffee exactly the same way each morning: Coffee, cream & Stevia. Instead of entering the components one by one, it would be incredibly handy to be able to create a favorite item called “My Coffee” that automatically enters the three elements as a group. Developers, are you listening?
response: Hey Queen Caffeine, we're listening! We do have an excellent way to log items that you consume daily that we're happy to share with you. If you'd like for our support team to show you how this works, please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Queen Caffeine". We'll be happy to show you how to log items daily automagically. Looking forward to connecting with you!

title: I like this app
body: I do like this app, it was easier to understand and monitor my macros. I have little challenging to enter my recipe and break down to portions and calculate my macros per portion I eat. I don’t know what I am doing wrong?  Thank you for lot of barcodes that make life easier to enter to my daily foods like salads and salads dressing and much more.

title: Perfect app to track your Carbs
body: Tried numerous diet / macro / carb tracking apps and am really happy to find Carb Manager. The app is pretty easy to setup and use. Super easy to quickly log and track your macros. On top of the easy to use app - there is a rich help section. Email support was fast and thorough. Absolutely worth the subscription cost. Thank you for making a great app!

title: Love this program.
body: It took a bit to learn to manage it (I went with the premium), but I have ended up loving it. It actually has a lot of flexibility to it, and it has made managing my food a lot easier.

title: Love the app
body: Works great to track what I eat and connects to Fitbit so all my info blends together.   Only thing I would add would be some way to check off or highlight when I’ve actually eaten the food.   I like to go ahead and add all or most of my food for the day and sometimes it’s hard to remember if I ate everything.   Just helps me plan my day.

title: Works great
body: I love the app.   Really let’s you track the important net carbs.  Easy to figure.  Can create your own fav list of foods and also calculates exercise into your daily equation.   Not quite sure if there is a place to create a favorite meal so you can just click on it to add it to your day, but maybe I just haven’t figured it out yet.  Overall, great for me!

title: Plateau Breaker
body: I was stalled out on weight loss after two months on Keto. I didn’t realize all that I was eating subconsciously and my fat/carb ratio was all whacked out. This keeps you honest and helps you make better decisions. I was surprised at the range of foods you’ll find already listed such as my favorite grocery store’s brand of deli meat, etc. I’m back to losing weight!

title: So Helpful
body: So I’m new to the world of 𝐊𝐞𝐭𝐨 and decided to try it after hearing so many success stories. I downloaded this app and it’s so incredibly helpful especially the scan section for when I’m walking around the grocery store and I’m not sure about something. Lost 3.5 lbs the first week going strong on my second thanks to this app.

title: Greatly Simplifies Keto
body: I would not be successful on keto without this app, and the premium features are well worth it.

title: Convenient and easy to use
body: I really like this app. Convenient and easy to use. My only request or suggestion….allow us to change the cups of water to bottles or at least give us the option to select what works best for us. Also, allow us to start and stop an intermittent fast whenever we desire. Add a “start fast” button and “stop fast” button.
response: Hiya! Each glass is 8 ounces, or 355 milliliters, by default, but you can change the size of your water glass in App Settings. Regarding the custom Fasting feature, our developers are working on fine-tuning this, so please check back often for updates!

title: Members only
body: This looks like a great app BUT, 15 seconds after you load it on your phone and give your email address it ask you if you love this app. I answered no because I hadn’t had a minute to look it over or even log in. After entering my coffee I wanted to start planning my menu for the day. I found some things that really looked good but when you clicked to see how difficult it would be to make this blurry screen came up with , members only. Needless to say I deleted the app.
response: Hi there - thanks for the feedback. All of our basic macro tracking features are available for free (including net carb tracking) and in fact most of our user base are free users who find this to be more than sufficient to meet their needs. You can always close the Premium upgrade screen if you're not interested in upgrading at this time, and still log all your meals. Cheers!

title: Perfect app for tracking carbs AND calories
body: I have used a bunch of different tracking apps, but as someone who likes to keep track of net carbs but also not overeat, this one is by far my favorite.  It’s easy to use, it remembers all of your foods, tracking usually just takes me a few seconds. Highly recommend

title: Simple and easy
body: Nicely designed app. Gives you many options to in put the foods you eat; also shows different fast food options. I even found name brand items from the store with the  all the nutrition facts. Well worth checking out if you start keto or wanting to keep an eye on what you eat

title: Amazing tool
body: I started using Carb manager 1 yr ago after being diagnosed pre diabetic. My dietician recommended 177g of carbs/ day. Since that time I’ve lost 45 lbs, not on meds thanks to this amazing tool I feel confident with my food choices. It helps me track my carbs dining out as well as at home. The helpful reports and the keto recipes have been an added positive for me.

title: Does not work
body: Spent over an hour fixing meal plan.
response: Hi and thanks for sharing your experience. We can help sort out these issues you're experiencing with the Meal Planner and Shopping Lists, so the process is as smooth as possible for you. Because you requested just a cancellation, your renewal was simply cancelled. If you're still interested in a refund, just shoot us a message in-app and we can help. Thanks

title: The help I needed
body: When you’re ready to do Keto right, this app is the way to go. It makes counting macros simple and you can learn about how YOUR body reacts to different food combinations. We’re all different and our results will vary but if you stick to this and don’t cheat yourself, transformation will happen. Thank you, developers, for helping me succeed!

title: Best App for Keto
body: This app is so user friendly and helps you tremendously tracking your nutritional outlook for the day.  When you first start Keto it is so important to make sure your weighting of intake is 75 fat, 20% protein and
response: So glad to hear that you're loving the app, Chillinfrys! Many users find that the positive health changes really start when they start tracking macros instead of doing lazy Keto. Thanks for giving the shout out to the macros visualization tools; we've worked hard on those features! Grateful to have you onboard as a user; let us know if we can ever answer any questions!

title: Love this App!!
body: I was recently diagnosed with diabetes. I decided to go to a Keto diet and saw this app suggested on some Facebook Keto groups. I paid for the 1 year service and it is totally worth it. My husband, daughter’s and I all use it. It has tons of great recipes. I’ve made probably 10 of them so far and my family and even my kids’ friends have loves the food.

title: Just what I was looking for!
body: This free app was just what I was looking for to track and trend my meal / intake as I start a keto-friendly diet / lifestyle. So far, every food I eat (including fast food options) is easy to find in the extensive database.

title: Best way to do the low carb/Keto life
body: I decided to try Keto for a number of reasons and was recommended Carb Manager as a way to easily track macros. It really makes life so easy in this lifestyle. It’s very easy to read. It’s very easy to track meals. After one week I have lost several pounds and I think using the app is a part of what makes it possible.

title: Switching it up
body: I’ve been using MyNetDiary for a while and it helped me change my lifestyle permanently, now I’m looking to go more low carb and I love the fact this app isn’t STRICTLY for Keto. I love that Keto works for a lot of people but it wasn’t for me. This app has helped me however keep my net carbs really low and because of this I have almost reached my second goal!

title: Must be specific
body: Really enjoy this app. One caveat, be specific about your search parameters. Just using a generic term instead of exact product name will definitely give you wrong stats. Love the measurement options, better than, “this is how much you need to eat” it allows you to pick how much you did eat. The success of the app is based upon how honest you are with yourself. Be true and enjoy!

title: Good list of exiting foods
body: I used the Atkins app but the list of restaurants and foods were very limited. Also used MyFittnessPal which is a good app but the charge to upgrade to the carb counter. While Carb Manager does charge for some of its upgrades its the most complete off the apps I tried, which will more than likely convince me to upgrade to the more useful tools.

title: Love this app!
body: It’s so user friendly and has a huge database for referencing foods. I wish I could track weekly weight and measurements, probably could with premium.

title: Carb Manager
body: I love this to keep up with everything you eat and keeping up with your stats.  Makes it easy to not cheat, for me.  It was worth paying for.  As long as I can pull this up and see improvement it makes me stick with it.  Plus saving all my foods I eat regularly in my favorites makes it easy to find and enter.

title: A great find
body: It took a few days to get used to, but as I looked back over the last few days where I tracked my food , it gave me incredible insight into what exactly I’m eating and how many carbs , fat, protein I’m taking in. It shows exactly what I’m doing right and wrong. Every item I eat is in their database.

title: Finally losing the pounds
body: I was having a hard time understanding how to count my carbs and maintain my protein and fats. Now with this app I am understanding it more for the Keto diet and love using it. I have been using the app for a week and have lost 4lbs so far, this is great because I wasn’t losing anything with what I was trying. So I love the app and would recommend it to anyone!

title: Accurate informan
body: I first tried another app and heard about this app through a Keto blog group. I like that the app is just for Keto and it has a feature so I can see my macros by looking at each food when choosing so I can make accurate decisions to keep me in a position for achieving my daily goals.  This is now the only app I use for recipes too.

title: Perfect for Keto beginner or strict keto eater!
body: This app has helped my husband and I track our macros to a t!  We just started the Keto diet and are taking the strict path so, we love being able to track and see what we are putting in our bodies! You can look up almost any food and if it isn’t in the app - you can add it yourself and save it to the database!  It’s so awesome!

title: Love ❤️ this!
body: Keeps me honest and on track.. I love the recipe ideas. I have use this app for awhile now. I love the new figures on the newest version. Smart and easy to use. Thanks for this, best ever. I was wondering if there is a intermediate fasting on here too. I was using a other app for awhile but got too expensive. Would love just to use this app only. Thanks again

title: Poor customer service
body: If you fast, then there is no food to log into carb manager. But if you don’t log any food, your “carb streak” goes back to zero.
response: Hey there, sorry for the problem! To keep your streak during a day when you are not eating, just click the "I'm done logging today" switch on the daily log. That will keep your streak going!

title: Crushing keto thanks to this app!
body: I am down 85 pounds in a year largely due to this app! It is easy to use, helps you set your macros and keeps you on track! It makes low carbing easy and manageable! I log everything I am planning on eating the day before so I know I won’t exceed my daily allowance! Love carb manager! Couldn’t have done it without this app!

title: Used to love this app!!
body: As soon as I went Keto everyone said “you gotta get the carb manager app!!!” So I did and I loved it!! I used it for a long time and then they “updated” it. Epic failure! I have not talked to one single person that likes the updated version!! It’s harder to use and find things and found that not all foods are listed correctly anymore. I even upgraded my membership hoping that might make it better but nope. I wish there was a way to opt back in to the older version. Very disappointed!

title: Great for beginners!
body: I just started my keto journey, and this app makes it so easy to stick to my goals. Logging food and exercise is so simple with the barcode scanner and search options. I know exactly where my macros are at after logging nutrition and exercise with the app. This is the most fool proof way to get started or continue any fitness journey!

title: I’m loving this app! 😍
body: This app is such a Blessing. No matter what health wise changes you are taking, this is a Great tool. I only have one request, for it to monitor my sugar intake. It may do that already, but I haven’t found it. Everything else is Spot On! And the fact that I have been able to sync it up to my Apple Watch, Awesome! Thank you so much!

title: Family Sharing?
body: Have been keto and using Carb Mgr Premium for over a year very successfully, and my husband started using it this week. However, we can not get the family sharing to work so he can also use the premium subscription we pay for. All of our settings are turned on for family sharing, and we’ve deleted and re-downloaded the app several times to no avail. Frustrating!
response: Hi there! The Apple Family Sharing Program does not apply to in-app purchases like Carb Manager Premium. You can read more about it on Apple's Support site. However, if we can help with any other questions you have, please reach out to us in-app, and we'd be happy to lend a hand. Thanks!

title: Super helpful for Keto!
body: I am really enjoying this ap now that I have the hang of it. I am amazed at how many foods are logged in here. My only complaint would be that when you report the that food is calculated wrong as I have found more than a few they don’t update it accurately. Ohwell. I’m happy for this ap regardless and just make adjustments with my quantity to get to the right amount of fat etc...

title: Thanks for tracking with me!
body: This app a must!!

title: First time user
body: So far I am really pleased with this app. It has been a huge part of keeping me on track and motivated.

title: Makes macros counting SO EASY
body: With all the flexible ways to import new items (especially the in-app SCAN feature) and find cataloged items, this is the best app I’ve found for tracking my food intake. If I had to make one suggestion, the next upgrade should include the ability to copy foods to bulk days of the week. Love the app!

title: This will guide your life
body: This Great app tells you what to eat give you the recipes it’s wonderful not only for Keto Diet but for any low  low carb diet or it’s better to say lifestyle yes not diet lifestyle and it gives you ideas how to cook how much time it takes is everything I love it and I will buy it again and again and again and again♥️

title: Numbers are inaccurate.
body: I like how easy it is to use, how simple adding my own food is, etc. But I don’t like that the macros don’t always match what the USDA nutrition database has for the same food, and calories don’t appear to be accurately calculated either - the calorie count seemed off today so I crunched the numbers myself and my result came out to be 30 calories below what the app said it was.

title: Better and easier than my fitness pal imo
body: It’s just easier, look up one food and sure you don’t have as many options but going through each ingredient if you need is way easier. Along with less clutter and a graph showing exactly where you’re at in the day helps a ton as well.

title: Best APP ever!
body: Try this app, your experience will say it all!  It’s use friendly and services my needs better than any other of it’s kind.  At least from the one’s I’ve tried.  The biggest thing is that it saves me time!  I love the scan label option, this way I don’t have to input every thing.  I’m amazed at what comes up!  Enjoy!

title: Pls add fat/protein columns to My Day
body: This app is great for tracking intake on keto! My only ask is to add options for what column info displays on My Day.  I would love to see the #s that are important to my success, on this page. Would like to see cals, carbs, protein, fat in one view per logged food/drink. If there’s a way to see this without viewing each item individually, I haven’t found that feature. Thank you!
response: Hey there, thanks for the note! If you rotate you phone to the landscape position, it will show additional fields such as fat and protein for each item in your log. Hope this helps!

title: Real review
body: I never leave reviews. I didn’t buy this app. It was free. Plan on buying it at end of month. It has helped me understand all that I was doing wrong to get/stay into ketosis. That furnace that everyone is talking about.... I feel it. As I am writing this - I am feeling it. Great app - you just have to be honest about what you eat and you will be ok. Try it.

title: Great app!
body: I really like this app. It’s very easy to use. I would have given it 5 stars except I’ve noticed a few of the nutritional values are off somewhat. I like how it shows you how many carbs you have left on notifications. I also like how you can look up foods and it will let you know if it is a good choice. I have been searching for this for a very long time. Thanks for a great app.

Just started intermittent fasting and will be starting my ketotarian diet next week! This is my favorite app right now and so easy to use, I’m thinking about paying the $40 for year to upgrade to premium! I know this app will be the most useful tool and my best friend for the next few months, totally worth it and very cheap and reasonable for what it is!! Love love love!

title: Fantastic Tracking - Keeps Me Balanced!
body: I find it so much easier to use this tracker and make sure that I’m not over consuming fat while continuing to keep low-carb. I physically feel better when I am gluten free.  This is ever helpful with keeping track of how much I’m taking in daily.  I will say I’m terrible about tracking my water (but that’s on me lol).

title: Awesome app!
body: This app is awesome. I’m a type 1 diabetic and have used many things to keep track of carb. This app is the best thing I’ve ever used!  It is super easy to use. Tons and tons of foods in its food dictionary too!  It lets me know how many carbs I have left at a glance at my phone. I don’t even have to open the app to see it!  I recommend it highly!!!

title: Great keto tool
body: Carb manager is easy to use and is a great way to track carbs, calories, fats and proteins, whether you are trying a keto way of eating or not.  The database of foods is really large, and even includes brands and chain restaurant foods.  I have yet to eat something that I can’t find in the database, so it is fast and easy to include each meal as you go through the day.

title: Great app; needs better off-line capabilities
body: Found the app as I needed a tool to manage myself back to healthier living. While not yet using all the features, it has helped me a lot.

title: Best Tracker I Found
body: This is by far the best tracker I have found in the App Store. The new updates that came out recently (January 2021) have made this app even easier to use. I started out using the free version and liked it so much that I upgraded to the premium version for $30 for the entire year. Well worth the investment!

title: Bring it back
body: I’ve been a long time user of this app, but no longer use it daily. The way that it’s been updated has made it anything but user friendly. Everything is difficult to find, it’s almost impossible to edit incorrect nutritional info, and probably a long list of other issues I haven’t bothered to find yet because I stopped trying. If it ain’t broke, why did you “fix” it?!

title: Carb manager review
body: I’ve struggled with my weight for a long time, but keto has always been my go to diet. With that though I never knew how much to eat I just ate low carb this makes my life 100 times easier since limiting myself to 20 net carbs a day I can clearly see how many I have left and what I’ve eaten. J highly recommend to others.

title: Wow! I’m so impressed!
body: I’m new to Keto and even though I’ve probably only used about half of the features, (I paid for premium) this app really helped start me off on the right foot. The fact that you can scan barcodes makes tracking super easy and actually kind of fun. I know I will be so much more successful thanks to CarbManager.

title: GREAT TO USE ON YOUR KETO JOURNEY
body: This app helps you take it to the next level and helps eliminate all the guessing. It’s nice to know when you’re staying inside the lines and when you might be getting a little out of control on certain macros. It also helps with meal planning so you can stay within those macros and know which foods are good and bad on a keto diet.

title: Macros Calculations
body: I have had the premium app for about a year. Initially I would’ve given this app five stars. Now even two seems too many. The daily calculations of my carbs are never correct. Today for example I have had a total of 3.9 carbs to include 3.9 net carbs. App is showing total carbs of 19.9 !? This is happening daily, incorrect totals for macros, but varies whether it’s incorrect on the carbs or the protein. It could be incorrect in the fat too but I haven’t been watching that. I will not be renewing my premium membership.
response: Hi, thanks for your feedback! We welcome the opportunity to assist you with any issues you may be having or answer your questions about the accuracy! Please reach out to us from within the app and our awesome customer service team will be happy to help you troubleshoot!

title: Info often incorrect
body: So there is very little verified nutrition information unlike on My Fitness Pal. Lots of the items you will find are from other users and are incorrect. I have spent a lot of time editing info or entering myself. Even for grilled chicken breast!!!!!! They desperately need to expand their database.
response: Hi, and thanks for your review! We work hard on the accuracy of our food database. It's true some branded & processed foods have been input by other users, so if you find there are inaccuracies, you can always Report a Food Error to be updated, and in the meantime, make Quick Edits to the Nutrients. Just reach out in-app, & we can share how as well as share how to know which of our foods are our NCCDB verified foods to make it easier for logging. Thanks!

title: Easy to use
body: This app is easy to use. Does what I need to track my daily intake.  Its free.

title: Display problems on iPhone XR iOS 13
body: Having multiple problems when trying to enter My Foods. It appears that the top bar gets hidden under the status bar so I am not able to click on top row buttons like Scan, Water, etc. Display constraints problems? Also when trying to create a recipe, I cannot go out of app to prepare a photo to add without loosing what was already typed when I attempt to come back to it.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you're run into some issues with the aforementioned phone model and OS. Please trust that we're actively looking into these issues and welcome the opportunity to speak with you via our support platform. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Jim Coates" and we'll be happy to assist! Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Perfect for Keto!
body: I just got this app, and it puts the net carbs first for everything on an amazing bar right up front so you know where you stand all day. I absolutely love it, puts MyFitnessPal to shame for carb counters. I have been keto for almost a year and this is the best app I’ve found. If you’re doing keto I would definitely recommend getting this app!

title: Carb Manager is User Friendly
body: My daughter is the one who shared her discovery of Carb Manager with me, claiming that it is the best app available. I have come to agree with her research and assessment. Very user-friendly and I really like the scan feature for entering foods. It has made my new way of eating less carbs fun. A wonderful tool. I have shared it with others who are equally pleased.

title: Great app
body: Love it! Easy to use, graphics make keeping daily macros balanced. Add items and customize recipes very easily, and editing, copying, deleting are all intuitive and simple. Getting it set up was easy, walked thru it basically, but later on had to hunt in settings to find a few things. That was the only bump, otherwise, it's great.

title: Simply Awesome!
body: I was searching for an app that would give me all the nutritional information at a glance. This app is worth the upgrade! I love it and would not be able to function without it! You get all your macros lined up and you are good to go. I’ve been following a healthier diet after I’ve downloaded this app and have lost weight! Speechless!

title: Great app
body: Pros: Counts carbs and other things - Protein, Fiber and Fats. I really like how it grades food for Keto (A-F). The pie chart is very helpful as well. Recipes are awesome.

title: Keto made simple
body: Keto sometimes can be super difficult and I can never find recipes that I like on websites or they have hidden carbs, but when I found this app recommended in a Keto group I’m in and I haven’t looked back I love all the recipes and all the stuff I can do I even linked my Fitbit to see how much I’m burning the best app if you want to do Keto or a low carb diet!!

title: Terrible sync with Apple Watch
body: I loved the possibilities with this app, so I upgraded to Premium because it said I could sync my fitness tracker activity. However, it does not sync unless I constantly open to app and it doesn’t back-sync data so I am showing whole days of no activity where I actually had a lot of activity. Tried reaching out to Customer Service for help or a refund. There is little to no way to contact them and the one way I found (chat box) has shown zero response.
response: Dear kminnick, thanks for contacting us, and really sorry for the problems you've experienced. Could you kindly contact us again via support@carbmanager.com.

title: Go ahead and get the premium.
body: This app is great. I’ve loved using every minute of it. Even though I’ve sabotaged myself, if I stuck with my low carb lifestyle then I’d be right on track. I do wish it was a little better self explanatory as far as adding meals or changing carb intake, but I’m learning as I go and it was cheap for the full year.

title: Don’t get the update!
body: The new update is AWFUL! I have been a daily, faithful Carb Manager app user for a year. The update is HORRIBLE! The app now takes forever to load and it freezes all of the time. Plus, the new weight loss chart is useless! It no longer tells you how much weight you have lost in the last 30 days or even calculates your overall weight loss. I’m looking for a new app to use. I’m just sorry that I will lose all of my history. Carb Manager was with me every step of my journey. But, I can’t deal with this new “update”. It’s the worst!
response: Hey there, we are sorry for the slow search times recently. A fix has been made and you should notice it MUCH faster now. As for the weight loss chart -- yes, it can definitely do all the things you mentioned. Our friendly support team at support@carbmanager.com would be happy to help walk you through it.

title: Needs work
body: The update is better but boy is this app SLOW!! It also doesn’t input information well especially for adding weight and food. It constantly crashes or has to reload. I also don’t like that it tells you what you have eaten in bold and not what you have left. It also doesn’t care much about calories. The design layout for counting just seems backwards and not very intuitive. I also doesn’t like to count my streaks and constantly resets it.

title: If your serious about Keto
body: Every food you can imagine and every portion size available is in this app for logging. It’s so helpful for keeping track. All the Net carbs are calculated for you. It will even remind you to drink your water and eat when it’s time. I don’t think I would’ve been as successful without it.

title: Best free app ever
body: You do have to pay for somethings but it’s really not necessary unlike other apps who barely lets you do anything unless you get the full subscription. The free version is the one I use. It’s helped me so much and it’s so easy to use which used to be one of my biggest problems when I was searching for apps.

title: This app is great
body: I love it’s food data bank, ability to create recipes from a HTML page, scan items and more. It also provides knowledge about keto and LCHF; as well as recipes to try. The one thing this app could improve is its the look of its user interface. It’s ugly and almost turned me off from using it.

title: Wish it had more features
body: Love the app. I only wish it had a few things

title: Great App For Keto
body: I have been on a keto diet for about a year and a half. The first three months were really a struggle with inconsistent results. Then I found Carb Manager. In the last year using Carb Manager, I have lost over 30 lbs. The app makes tracking super easy. It’s easy to find, save and add foods. Love it and highly recommend you give it a try.

title: Just WOW!
body: Everything At your fingertip with all you need to know to be successful at a ketogenic diet. Track carbs, calories, fat, protein, exercise, ketones, water intake, and more!  Awesome recipes and daily food list so easy to use will help you stay on track. It’s not an easy diet, but I achieved large Ketosis within a week!  Well worth the money for anyone considering a ketogenic diet.

title: Really a great app
body: After spending a few days learning to navigate the app, I find it is very rich. The best app I have found for tracking food and macros at the same time.
response: Hi there, and thanks for sharing your experience. We definitely want our users to navigate the app as seamlessly as possible. If you haven't already, please reach out in-app and we can offer some tricks and tips to get familiarized and comfortable with the app ASAP. Thanks!

title: Nice app, great functionality
body: I downloaded this app a few days ago after the one I’d been using had an update and went haywire.  I’m really impressed with the features and functionality of the free version.  I’m going to try it for a couple more weeks and then may upgrade to the premium version.

title: App not loading properly
body: So I bought the paid subscription and I love this app but it makes me upset when I’m trying to input my macros and it won’t open. I don’t have a good memory so I have to use another app to hold my macros until this one comes back online. With this being a paid app I may look for a different one when my subscription ends in a year unless this bug gets fixed. So sad though because this is a great app to keep track of your day if eating. The recipe part is awesome too. Please fix the glitch so I can keep this app.
response: Thank you for taking the time to review our app! We’re sorry you've experienced a brief period where you were having issues accessing your account. We are happy to report the issue is resolved. Please contact us in-app directly via "Settings - Need Help" and reference your username so we can assist further. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Great App for Keto Diet
body: One of the great things about Carb Manager is that if you forget to enter your foods for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, it will send you nice little reminders.  Even the free version is just awesome with all the features it has.  Very in-depth at tracking not only carbs but calories, proteins, and fats, as well as your water intake and exercise per day.  One of the best diet apps out there!

title: Tracking made easy
body: I love that you can scan put your recipes in and track everything from the health app from your fit bit. The only downside is I can’t view a recipe that I have put in terms of what ingredients are and I can’t share the recipe with my friends on the app. Other than that this app is fantastic

title: Love Carb Manager
body: So easy to use. Believe me, if I can learn this app in less than a few hours, anyone can. I’m 60 and not all that tech savvy. It has helped me track all my macros and from that I’ve learned a lot about weight loss. It’s fun too. Sometimes I’ll need a food with c amount of fat and protein. Out of my food list I’ll experiment for the right one.

title: Best App For Keeping Up With Your Diet
body: I absolutely love this app. Very easy to use. It helps me track my my carbs, calories, fats so I’m on top os my diet. I lost 8lbs in a week and thanks to this app I was able to keep up with my carbs so I knew when to limit my carb intake. Finding the foods to add with my meals was extremely easy as well. I recommend this app to anyone dieting or not.

title: Excellent, but small learning curve.
body: I spent 2 weeks trying out as many keto apps as I could. I would download them and use them for a few days and then compare them. For me, this app was the most comprehensive (premium) and did what I wanted, including importing recipes.

title: Keto App
body: This is a must have if you were going to try and eat a keto diet. Brilliant simple little tool allows you to really see what you’re doing and if your macros are out of whack you’re never going to lose weight. Must have. BTW, turned my whole family and a couple of friends onto this in less than a week.

title: Good app
body: Hi I find this the easiest keto app to use. However, is there a way to set up your meals a month at a time? I find I have to click on each day. For example, I drink coffee everyday. I have to click on each day rather then click on a month at a time. Also, to reset macros I find I loose all my saved foods each time. Is there an easier way then deleting or resetting profile?

title: Great App
body: Very helpful and easy to navigate app.  I appreciate that they don’t force you to make a profile.  Nice option to upgrade for recipes and other features if you want.  I just started keto and it’s so convenient to be able to look up basically any food imaginable.  I’ll definitely continue to use it.

title: CM helps me keep to a program!!
body: Several days ago my husband and I started using the Carb Manager app. Both of us were in need of losing some weight and needed something that would work for us. My NP recommended CM, and wow do we love it! So easy to keep track, scan foods that we love, and see our progress. We’re well on our way! So happy!!

title: Keto Winning
body: I couldn’t do any part of my diet with this app. This is a Keto must-have! It’s the app for me & the variety of brands is so cool so I don’t have to guess the app helps me remember what I ate but it’s best to note as you go so you’re getting enough fats. I just wish it sent notifications but the graph helps to know if you’re eating enough protein, fats & water.

title: I love the app but...
body: I love this app but I recently lost my streak after almost a month and I have been religiously logging my foods and water. I’m not sure what happened but I logged out and deleted the app bc it was glitching out and now the app won’t even open. The app on my Home Screen is showing the white screen before the app finished downloading but I don’t know what’s happening. This is very disappointing because I was loving the app.

title: Excellent app
body: Excellent app for carb management. I am a family physician and I recommended to my  patients that want to eat a low carb diet , specially to my prediabetics, diabetic patients . I have used it personally on and off for several years , have learned a lot about making healthier food choices and keep my weight on track

title: New update won’t work
body: So sad! This new update lost all my foods- yes I logged in. They were there at first and then I scanned in a new food and everything was gone. All my macros were reset. When I try to click on getting started or anything to reset it, I get a blank screen. Please fix quickly!!!

title: Beginner Keto dieter
body: This is a must have app whether you are beginning or experienced in your journey with Ketosis.  The Carb Manager is easy, user friendly and keeps you on track.  I tell all of my friends about it... I look forward to celebrating with the party avocado every night I am successful in staying within my daily goal.

title: No support
body: Paid for your service and you stop recording my Fitbit steps. Contact Fitbit and they say problem is on your end.

title: Really hate the new update
body: I have used Carb Manager for several years and loved it. I have the paid subscription. This latest update is terrible. It is very hard to find items. Your favorites don’t come up. Recipes are missing. There’s a glitch when you want to change your daily items amounts and it won’t let you change them. There needs to be a lot of changes made to get the app back to the valuable tool that it used to be. If the app does not improve by the time my renewal is due in May I will not renew.

title: App update Feb2021
body: I’ve been using the app for 2 years and really liked it UNTIL NOW.  There’s been an update and the app got re-designed. I absolutely HATE the new design. It all blends together, it’s harder to find what you’re looking for, you can’t really tell how far you are from getting to your goals. Very unfriendly. I want the old design back :(

title: Wish there were 6 stars!
body: Love it love it love it.  I’m diabetic and have to do mental math just to eat anything.  This I can just scan the package set the portion and poof it is done for you.  Throw away the pen an paper. I can’t print out a food journal to bring to my appointments.  I can use my laptop or my phone or my iPad. It stores the data online.

title: Everything available with one click
body: Just started using Carb Manager. Love that you a can log food, select a recipe with all ingredients lusted as well as cooking instructions with all the macros listed.

title: Option for multiple selections at once
body: I love this app, however I wish you could select multiple entries at once to add to daily log.  During the week I eat the same foods and wish I could select more then one item for new entries. A feature like that would make it 5 stars worthy.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're happy to report that we're absolutely interested in exploring the option of adding this to the app. Our product team has received your suggestion and we'll reach out if we decide to add this feature to the app! Thanks for your suggestion!

title: A Must Have App for Keto
body: I just started out a Keto diet this week. Since the macros are so important it is helpful to have this handy app keep track of that. Especially one that calculates the net carbs. Super easy to use it is keeping me on track so far in this early stage of my journey. I definitely recommend this to anyone who is switching to a keto diet and lifestyle.

title: Dao
body: I like the app but it is really slow also I got premium under the pretense that you can use the app even offline which is not possible.  I get it that the entire datebase cannot be downloaded to your phone however common meals and favorites should.  Before this I was using lose it which does have a decent amount of food that you can access offline but it did have net carbs which is why I switched .

title: Super helpful
body: This app has been super helpful in starting the Keto Diet and being able to keep up with all my macros with ease & know where I am at any point during the day. I LOVE the scan part - it makes putting in my food so easy!! I highly recommend this app if your wanting to change your lifestyle with ease.

title: User-Friendly, Lots of Features
body: I enjoy using this app because it is very user-friendly. There are many foods already in the database, which makes it easy to track homemade/store-bought meals. I also appreciate the option to tailor the different settings to my specific needs.

title: Really helps me
body: A little over a week into using the app and I can tell it really helps me stay organized and committed to eating low carb and helps me figure out the right percentages for a keto diet. The only thing I wish it had was an update on expected weight loss (if that is what you are using it for) to tell you what you can expect if you stay on the track you are on.

title: Keto and loving it
body: I heard about this app on a keto group I’m apart of in Facebook. People wouldn’t stop talking about it so I thought I’d give it a whirl! And I am loving it! This app makes tracking my macros EASY! Out of all the apps I’ve tried using this one is the best!

title: I just purchased annual subscription! So far so great!
body: I will follow up and update my review after reviewing app for more than a week. Will consider revising to a top rate of 5 stars after reviewing app further.

title: Best Carb counting app
body: I tried several other apps in this one is by far the best! And they don’t try to pressure you into a subscription to get the app to even work. I have suggested this app to several other people who also like it. Even if you’re not counting carbs but are using some other form of nutrition monitoring this app works great

title: Amazing app!
body: Have used several other nutritional apps and Carb Manager is by far the most robust and user friendly!!  I love the detailed analysis, the HUGE foods library, and the ease of making your own recipes. Also the sharing feature is really helpful for “copying” my girlfriend’s entries instead of having to enter it all myself 😊

title: Can’t Believe you get all this for FREE!
body: Best App I have ever downloaded when it comes to tracking and efficiency. I love it so much I have had 2 friend get involved to. I can’t believe there are no ads, I recently upgraded to premium because I felt the free was so good I was getting away with to much and wanted to invest in this company !! Recipes have been Awesome!
response: Hello from Carb Manager support! Thank you for your review and your support of our app! We're delighted that you're loving the it, and are glad that you're finding it a useful resource! 😄

title: Great but has a few drawbacks
body: This is great for keeping up with your macros. My only complaint and reason for kit higher stars is because when entering food, it has the option for popular fast food options but not bunless options. If I go to McDonald’s and get a McDouble it shows the McDouble but not “no bun@ option. This is the same for lots of foods and restaurants. I think this needs an update with this information.

title: Awesome weight loss tool!
body: Thanks to carb manager I lost over 50 pounds!!! I did gain some back during quarantine, but I’m SO excited to start using the app again! It not only helped me lose weight, but I was able to track what foods caused me to feel sluggish or caused migraines. Also a really great app if you’re just looking for a food journal.

title: Enough with the premium
body: It's a good app for keto but I'm seriously rating it down because of the constant barrage of "upgrade to premium".  Seriously,  every time I open the app and at least every other time I change a page "upgrade to premium" page pops up.  Supremely annoying.  Makes me not want to give money to the people who subject me to this - even though the premium features seem useful.  A little space to breathe would go a long way developers.
response: We're sorry to hear that the pop-up reminder to upgrade to Premium has created some annoyance for you in the app. This reminder should only appear 1x a day or any time you tap on a feature that is only accessible to Premium subscribers. We're thrilled to offer the free app to as many people as possible. However, we do rely on paid subscriptions to assist us in this goal.

title: Continued crashing
body: I’ve used this app in the past and when I decided to go back to a keto diet I reloaded it to my phone. I remembered it was really helpful in monitoring my macros and it was easy to use. However, this time I even paid for premium and the app continues to crash every time I open it. I have closed and reopened app, restarted my phone, uninstalled/reinstalled, and updated iOS 14.6 and nothing is fixing the issue.
response: Hi there, and thanks for leaving us constructive feedback! The issue you are having is definitely not normal app behavior. Please allow us the opportunity to look into this further by messaging us from within the app or emailing us at support@carbmanager.com.

title: What happened?! Used to be so great!
body: I use this app three years ago and lost 30 pounds by tracking my macros. It was so easy to use. Going keto again and trying to log my food today and it is so difficult. Scanner does not seem to be working correctly, enter the food and then wanted to edit it and the edit button does not work. I should not have to go to my computer and login to make this change. Please fix these this app and make it usable.
response: Thanks for your valuable feedback! I will certainly pass along your comments to our Development Team. Some of the issues you are experiencing can be answered by our awesome Support Team, so I encourage you to reach directly to them from within the app or support@carbmanager.com. :)

title: New Update is Awful
body: I LOVED this app before the new update. It was easy to use, easy to scan items, easy to create recipes, you name it! But since the new update EVERYTHING has become harder. Just adding to a meal is complicated! When I scan a barcode it always scans and then just comes up blank, which makes me have to scan it again! It takes me 2-4 tries before it actually pulls anything up! Honestly I just wish I could somehow revert back to the old layout!

title: Great app for food control - not just Keto.
body: This app isn’t just for people on Keto.  It holds a wide range of information of food content which allows you to monitor and track calories, carbs, fat, protein, sugar etc. so you can customize what type diet you need to follow.  I highly recommend this app for anyone that desires to control their diet.

title: Terrible
body: After using carb manager for 3 years, I’ve came to realization that there are better user friendly apps. Ive enjoyed this app for I had lost 100 pounds and am now in the best shape of my life thanks to carb manager, no doubt. But ever since carb manager dev team updated it, it’s just not the same anymore. To confusing. Not user friendly. Prior to the update, the interface was very easy to maneuver through. Until they have a option to use the older interface, I’m going to delete this, cancel my premium, and look else where.

title: New UI is pretty but glitchy and slow
body: I upgraded to the new user interface a couple of days ago. Everything takes much longer to enter in the new app due to slow loading times, especially with search. In addition it is harder to add foods to “my foods”, And the three dots in the right hand corner of any particular food item screen where a menu should come up, isn’t pulling the menu up for me. I wish I could go back to the old version.
response: Hey there, sorry to hear you're experiencing challenges with the new app. We're currently working on a big fix to our search engine functionality, which will speed things up in that area. In the meantime, feel free to reach out to support in-app via Settings → Help & Support for assistance with the "my foods" menu issue you referenced.

title: Very nice UI update, but...
body: Update: while it looks great, it does seem to have bugs. Most of the time it says I am offline. And does not allow me to add or see anything. This is no good.  When it connects, it’s great. The old version, which is still available as a web app, still works.  Please update.

title: Easy way to track
body: Been using free version for 2 weeks. Love it. Been finding keto recipes online for dinner and most are already uploaded into app. Great way to start Keto otherwise would be very difficult to know how many carbs per day you are having without having to measure/weigh every food item.

title: Night shift
body: This is a great app and I love it the only thing I wish is that you could adjust the time that your day resets... trying to help/teach my boyfriend how to track and keep up with his diet... and it’s difficult to track being that he works third shift... is there is a way they could put it in the settings so you can pick the time your day resets this app would be Perfect!

title: Night shift
body: This is a great app and I love it the only thing I wish is that you could adjust the time that your day resets... trying to help/teach my boyfriend how to track and keep up with his diet... and it’s difficult to track being that he works third shift... is there is a way they could put it in the settings so you can pick the time your day resets this app would be Perfect!

title: Lots of Apps for KETO- but this is my FAV
body: Lots of options out there (I experimented with over 7 different Keto calculators) but this works best for me. Macros easily understood, scanning barcodes has worked 95% of the time, easy to understand inputs, FREE and works perfect for me. Hope you enjoy it too. I never ever do these reviews but I like this app and am willing to share my thoughts.

title: Best app on my phone
body: I started the Keto diet about a week ago, I knew it wouldn’t be easy tracking my carbs because I work 70+ hours a week, but thanks to this I easily track fat protein calories and carbs, plan and record what I eat, and how much exercise I do. I can confidently say this app is responsible for helping me lose almost a pound a day so far

title: Free Carb Manager ( Keto with net carbs)
body: I thought you have a basic carb manager for keto I want the free one I don’t want to pay monthly want net carbs counting. Many on Facebook have a free Carb Manager shown in Keto sites on FB.   I   Personally find the adds aggravating because eyour locked in to taking one of the following: 1 month, three months, or a year. Where is the one for free?
response: Hi! Our core app is free & always will be. Many of our users reach their goals without upgrading to Premium. Our Premium version is there for users who want access to advanced features, but both versions find success stories! Message us in-app to learn more about free features. Thanks!

title: It is missing other types of measures!
body: I will add this, many dishes are missing in the folder of origin from other countries, no other types of measures such as: pinch, slice, 1/2 piece, 1 piece of tomato cocktail, I am a beginner in this diet, I can see the effects, the duplication does not reflect the actual calories  which I ate 100% because there are no other measures.

title: Fix your Tito’s carb numbers
body: I was looking up Tito’s Vodka and saw you have this listed with 13 total carbs and 6 grams of fat.  After looking at all the comments, many of your users have requested this be fixed.  There are no carbs or fat in vodka.  Please update this! We have to have our Tito’s.  One star until you fix this. 😬
response: Hi there, and thanks for bringing this to our attention. We definitely understand the importance and sanctity of Tito's Vodka. We'll look into this, but in the meantime, please reach out to us in-app so we can address and respond to your questions directly once the issue is fixed. Thanks

title: Makes life easier!
body: My husband and I wanted to lose weight, and I spent countless hours searching for a way that we could lose weight easily. That’s when I found Carb Manager. Hundreds of recipes and desserts that I fell head over heels for! I absolutely fell in love with this app, and if I could rate it a billion stars, I definitely would ❤️❤️❤️
response: Thanks for the lovely review! We're so happy to hear you've fallen in love with our app, and finding it useful on your journey. That's what we're here for! Feel free to reach out in-app any time with any questions, and we'd be happy to help. Take care!

title: Great diet app
body: This app really helped me lose weight, by tracking my food intake and understanding my nutrition intake and understanding what I needed to change. I stopped using this app for a while and sadly I gained my weight back. I am using it again and this time I am paying for the premium version so that I can connect with my Fitbit. Fingers crossed.

title: My success
body: This app is why I was able to loose 35 lbs in 3 months. I now have learned how, what, and when to eat! The recipes are outstanding and so user friendly and delicious! I have 30 lbs to go and it’s easy now! My husband has lost 105 with 30 more to go too! We have found the “secret” to healthy living! Thank you carb Manager😘

title: Saved me
body: I’ve been very sick I’ve struggled with CFS fibromyalgia EBV and all kinds of crazy results high cholesterol high sed rate etc etc. I knew I had to change my diet but where to start. I found this app!!! Love it saved me got me up and running on keto diet in one day!

title: Great but recipes without premium looks to be a mess
body: The recipe section is all outta whack. There is large carb items under low carb search (using the default).

title: Better than most
body: I love the way macros and other info is displayed - this app is terrific for keto. However entering a complete recipe is very tedious and time consuming compared to some other nutrition apps. I also don’t like that the app doesn’t work when there is no data or WiFi available. I think a few simple changes could make this the hands down best app. I hope the developers continue to make improvements.

title: Almost 5 stars
body: I like this app because it lets me track carbs by meal and offers a choice between total carbs or net.  I find the recipes easy to use.  Two things that would make it better have to do with memory - remembering which food option I last used (when typing cheddar cheese sticks, showing my last used brand first) and remembering my serving size

title: Great app & customer service
body: I’ve used other apps that track your calories (myfitnesspal, lose it, lifesum) and this one is my favorite. Not only is it easy to use but the customer service is amazing.

title: I love it!
body: I have been using it for a couple days now and it works beautifully! I get all the features I need with the free version which is a huge bonus. I like to log my foods ahead of time, so I wish I can hide a meal after I eat it (or maybe check it off), but that’s super minor and not necessary.

title: Disappointing
body: Every feature worth using on this app costs a premium subscription. Not even a free trial to see if it would be worth the cost of the subscription. I mean seriously... what if I don’t care for your idea of a meal plan? Or the recipes I find are just too out there for my taste? And I opt not to continue using this app? Then I’ve paid for something I’m not using. It’s a waste of money without allowing me limited time trial access to see if what’s available is worth it to me to actually pay to continue receiving the content.

title: Good app but food database is lacking
body: Unlike fitness pal this app does NOT have a lot in their food database. I’m finding myself needing to manually add items of food that I consume even when scanning the UPC barcode of the food items. Plus some of the macros of the selections they have are off. For example, they have sea scallops as 5 grams of carbs?! They should be at least 1 or even 0 grams. The development team needs to improve this feature. Oh and the new update is awful. Whenever I do attempt to scan a barcode, the app crashes every time.

title: Super Easy
body: I am new to keto. Tried it in the past but was overwhelmed trying to figure things out. This app makes everything super easy and actually fun finding things I can eat in portions that are perfect to keep my numbers right. I love the bar scan option. Makes shopping easy!!

title: I like the app.
body: I wish it gave more guidance with questions. I posted them in forum but I see they don’t always get answered by others. Idk who I would even contact if I needed help with the app. Also I get notifications but it doesn’t tell me where they’re coming from. The app is nice keeping track of my macros.

title: My Favorite App of all time!
body: I, like most folks I suppose, rate an app based on its usefulness, benefits and ease of use. The Carb Manager team has truly hit the ball out of the park with this one! Functionality is fabulous and primarily intuitive which makes it a pleasure to use. Have recently become a proud Premium Member and lovin’ it. Thanks for doing such a great job team!

user_name: Some other guy you don't know
title: Great!
body: The app is really great for helping me stay on track with my diet.  but I’m a little unsure of how accurate all the info is. I scanned in a bag of monkfruit sweetener with erythritol, and the bag says “zero calories” right on the front, but when I look on the app it says that the specific brand I put in has 96 calories a cup. (Which is still pretty low, given) but I am unsure if the app is wrong or if my sweetener is lying to me XD

title: Sweet Keto App
body: Since I am new to Keto, finding this app has been a great help in keeping me on track with how many fats/carbs/protein I am taking in. Along with this, I love the fact that it is easy to use. Can’t say enough good about this app. If your new to Keto, or are just looking for a great way to log the food you are consuming, this won’t disappoint. Love this app!

title: Trouble using
body: I just down loaded this ap yesterday and when I click on it it doesn’t open!!! Just the logo and 3 dots at the bottom!! Very discouraging!

title: Pretty decent
body: I am new to Keto and love the barcode scanning feature, however I’m not completely sure it’s accurate. Just to test I scanned a bottle of Shock Top Belgian white beer and it have it a Keto grade of “A” and said it had 0 carbs.  If that’s the case I can drink a million of them. Lol. I googled the same beer and it stated it had 14g of carbs. Not sure why the discrepancy but this could really cause issues with my Keto with inconsistencies such as this one. Hope they can fix this
response: Hello from Carb Manager support. We're sorry to hear that you've encountered some inaccurate nutritional values. User-created are sometimes inaccurate, as what may have happened in this situation. We're reported this error on your behalf. However, we encourage you to continue testing the logging feature and using the scanning feature. We'd love to connect with you further regarding best practices when logging foods. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Jknight118".

title: Great App for staying on track!
body: I love the food database on this app, and also love adding my own finds to the database! I also find that it definitely keeps me on track when I am logging my foods and see the nutritional value to them. I have made some of the recipes found in the app and they are all fantastic!

title: Carb manager app
body: Was interested to go on Keto diet since my aunt lost about 40 lbs

title: Great app but...
body: I absolutely love this app, its super helpful and really makes keto a easier way of life. But, the new update is awful... somehow it has become harder to navigate through the food choices. As well as the exercise choices are not as detailed and straight forward as they use to be. Please fix it...

title: Still losing weight
body: This app has 100% helped me lose the extra weight I’ve gained. It keeps me on track, provides access to multiple recipes with the app upgrade, and overall is a helpful app. My only complaints are the nutrition info errors and product redundancy. I plan to use this app even after I meet my weight loss goal.

title: History stopped recording
body: After 3 days all of a sudden History stopped recording weight. Look for something else. Update: First I gave this app 2 stars. If possible I would give it a zero! Every day there is some kind of glitch, doesn’t record or even worse it erased some of my recordings! I simply hate it! 2nd update: 5 months later I have encountered other issues issues: the app is frozen. I got the icon on my screen but when I click on it all it gives me is a blank screen. Can it get any worse?!
response: Hi there - thanks for the feedback. You can always reach out in-app via Settings → Help & Support to troubleshoot any missing data or other glitches you're experiencing. Thanks.

title: Accurate and easy
body: I love using the app to keep track of my foods. I can scan the barcode of almost any food and use the portions for accuracy. I sometimes just scan a product to get the “score” for making better choices.

title: New update is awful
body: So many bugs with the new update. Having issues trying to add my meals, sometimes it works sometimes it doesn’t. I currently can not add a meal. When I favorite a food, it’s not always saved to my foods. The layout is harder to navigate than before, harder to find where certain things are. So disappointed.
response: Hi there, sounds like you're experiencing some glitches and unexpected behavior in the new app. Our developers are working around the clock to fix any bugs that are found. If you reach out to our friendly support team in-app via Settings → Help & Support they can assist you in getting all features functioning. Be sure to quote your app store name, and we'll get you sorted out asap.

title: Great carb app
body: Carb manager actually makes counting carbs/protein/fat/calories fun for me - love the graphics, great food database, easy for new users, a great variety of measuring options, lots of good information included for free! There’s no food listing I haven’t found that I needed. I can’t say enough good things about this app - it makes keeping keto easy!

title: Constantly freezes, edits not applied
body: A lot of nutrition facts on this app are incorrect. Many people have already reported but it’s yet to be fixed. Also there are times when I’m trying to add food to one of my meals and the app completely freezes and I have to close it down and re-open it several times before it works again. Pretty good app but definitely need some improvements
response: Hi, thanks for your feedback! We welcome the opportunity to assist you with any issues you may be having or answer your questions about the accuracy! Please reach out to us from within the app and our awesome customer service team will be happy to help you troubleshoot!

title: Incorrect Nutrition Facts
body: I constantly am having problems with the barcodes I scan to have incorrect nutritional facts. I feel like I have to edit most of the things I scan. My weight has been fluctuating and I’m always confused as to how or why since my tracking is on point (and I always fall within my macros). It’s very frustrating and time consuming, especially since I bothered to pay for the premium version. I wish the barcode scanner was as good as Weight Watchers’.
response: Hi & thanks! We work hard on the accuracy of our Food DB. It's true some branded/processed foods have been input by users, so if there are inaccuracies, you can always Report a Food Error or make Quick Edits to them. Just reach out in-app, & we can help share how as well as how to identify our NCCDB verified foods to make it easier for logging!

title: I love this app!
body: I had weight loss surgery and used the Baritastic app for a long time. I recently found this one and bought the premium version. I love it!
