It’s easy to use, has good recipes, let’s me track steps with my FitBit, and gives me all the information I want to follow a low carb-high protein diet. I highly recommend it!

title: Absolutely amazing
body: I lost 40lbs on keto last year. I slowly reincorporated carbs back into my diet and began to get a little too lax. I downloaded this app via a friends recommendation and I have found that I am excited to get back into keto again! Having  tangible evidence of your progress is a game changer for me. It give me something to be proud of!

title: Absolutely Awesome!
body: This app gives you so much for zero cost.  It helps you learn HOW your diet affects your weight and nutritional intake.  It adjusts your carb/calorie/fat goals for how much you want to lose, then helps you maintain the target weight.  Much thanks guys for giving us so much and not making an ad-factory app like so many others!

title: Great program
body: It works! I have had weight issues all of my life. This is the only thing that has kept me on track. I have not even been tempted to cheat in over 8 months! This is a record for me. Only the first three days were difficult. Now I have no sugar cravings and have never eaten healthier!

title: Love app
body: I found this app to log in my Keto meals, to keep me on track and get ideals on menus and recipes. I’m using the free version, however the subscription offers so much more. I’m not able to pay for it and just wish the price was a little cheaper or at least get a free trial to see if it’s worth the cost. Anyway you won’t be disappointed using the free version.

title: Best App for Keto Diet
body: I’ve tried a couple others and this one is the best. It has features like how you can manually adjust your macros and as you lose weight it automatically changes your macros. When adding your daily food, it has a search by restaurant feature which is very helpful.

title: I was skeptical at first, but the app is great!
body: The app is amazing! I just began using today, and I am incredibly impressed with the level of ease I can add my meals into the app (by just scanning barcodes!!) and the accuracy of the charts and nutritional information. I can see myself going premium if I continue to use this app as a macro calculator.

title: Love this App!!
body: This app is outstanding! I have a great and accurate calculation of my macronutrients to keep up a KETO diet!! I also love the premium account resources that the app offers! I have full meal plans with affordable ingredients that I can purchase on a budget!! I would recommend this app to anyone who is starting keto diet because of its simplicity and excellent resources!!!

title: Easy and comprehensive
body: This is the most comprehensive app I have seen for tracking carbs.  It has so many useful tools and they are organized for simple management of information.  My favorite feature is the scanning of barcodes...no,no, my favorite is that it links to my Apple Watch....no, no, it’s the recipes linkage....I love it ALL!

title: Love this app!
body: I’ve used both MyFitnessPal and Livestong’s MyPlate but this app blows them away with all the tracking and data access. To get thing like diet advice, recipes, keto plans, etc you will need a subscription (which is very affordable) but CM has everything a DIYer could want. I love the adjust your macros feature too...Well done!

title: Love it!
body: I don’t track items everyday.. it’s just too much to track everything I eat, but I love it for grocery shopping when I’m buying premade items like salad dressings or anything else. I can easily and quickly compare items to figure out which one has the least carbs.l and is graded the best.

title: Review
body: I love this app if I’m not certain if I can eat it or not I just scan it. But I still read the labels. The only thing that I don’t like is you can’t connect your Apple Watch to the app you have to pay for it🙄 but rather then that it’s a great app haven’t had any problems with it crashing or freezing.

title: Really great app
body: This app is so helpful and easy to use. The meal planning and tracking weight especially. The only things I would change would be that recording your excersize would be more intuitive. Also when writing custom foods it would be a bit easier.

title: Best accountability partner ever!
body: I love this app, I’m currently on my own fitness journey and I wanted to kick it off with keto for 30 days. I love how easy this app has made things for me. Super easy to use and very informative. I thought I would be annoyed with logging what I eat every day but it has actually been fun for me. Highly recommend!

title: Net carbs accuracy
body: Found that searching or scanning an item, the net carbs are wrong half the time. Great app and is better than MyFitnessPal cuz I can just go in and correct the macros per item, but it’s still frustrating a bit. I’ll use this until I find another that’s more accurate... cuz wrong calculations can screw up your whole meal plan if you don’t catch the error

title: Great so far!
body: The app is an excellent tool overall. So far my favorite is the import recipes from the web function. It would be nice to be able to enter grams of food above 99. Also, it would be great if you could type in the number of grams without having to scroll and scroll and scroll.

title: Awesome app! Makes tracking a cinch!
body: I love this app all my favourite food is in here as well as my exercises. It also syncs with my FITBit so there are no my excuses! I’ve been using this app for 2 months and I’ve lost 22lbs! Tracking your Macros makes all the difference!!! Thank you Carb Manager you are my new best friend, I tell everyone at the gym to get this app!

title: So user friendly
body: I started a keto diet and downloaded 5 apps to start tracking my carbs.  This app is by far the best.  It is so easy to use. I can track my macros and has a lot of variety foods to choose from.  I am able to customize them as well.  I ended up deleting the rest and staying with this one.

title: No reason to pay for an app...unless you want to
body: I've been doing keto wrong for so long and this app really helps with my tracking and all. I love the carb counter...hence the name...but seriously this has been beyond helpful. I paid for the plus membership but honestly the free version is AMAZING also. No troubles so far.

title: Buggy
body: I’ve paid for this but it doesn’t work. It should be quick and easy to add food but some days the food add via UPC doesn’t work and says “Not Found” even though I just used the same feature to add the same food a couple days ago.
response: Hi there, and thanks for your review! The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: Best membership I have ever paid for
body: I have done weight watchers and plenty of other ways to track my food, calories etc and this has been by far the easiest, most helpful and cheapest  weight loss program I have ever had and you are really in control of your journey.

title: Finally!
body: This app makes it possible for me to do Keto. It is so easy to track food and macros. Carb manager does most of the work for you. I have been wanting to try a Keto diet for years, but couldn’t get the hang of it. I found Carb Manager and decided to give it a go and it’s going well so far, 5 days in. Finally!

title: Best app for Keto!
body: I love this app. The scan feature (that allows you to scan the barcode of packages and it automatically inserts the nutritional data) and the ‘copy to’ feature (that allows you to copy all the ingredients in an entire meal to another day/meal) are insanely convenient. Tracks everything I need, easily. Love it!

title: Don’t fix something that isn’t broken.
body: I really loved the old version of this app. It was the best in the App Store. Visuals were nice, easy to navigate, easy to add, edit, and create.
response: Hi Nicole - We hear you! I'm happy to report that our developers are still working diligently to smooth out the rough edges and fine tune the new version of the app. The cost of Premium hasn't increased by a single penny! You may have seen a sale price in the past.

title: Not liking this new update
body: I thought the search feature was a pain before for looking up foods, now it’s even more convoluted.  They have completely changed the entire format and layout of the app. It takes more time than ever to navigate and look up and enter in meals. And now I am looking for where to log in my weight, which used to be a quick link, now I guess where it is in the “progress” tab, which won’t open!
response: Hey SeaShoreGirl! We hear you and understand that you're struggling with some of the recent changes. Rest assured that our Development Team is working diligently around the clock to fine tune the new version of the app. To log weight, just navigate to Goals → Progress. If there's a tab that won't open, we'd be happy to assist! Please reach out to our friendly support team under Settings → Help & Support.

title: Deleted all my data with no warning!
body: I’ve been using this app since July of last year and it has been so helpful keeping me on track with macros, looking up foods is easy, and tracking my progress. I opened it to use it this morning and it was back to the start with none of my data saved at all. Really frustrating. Still deciding if I should start all over or try a new app.
response: We are so sorry for the interruption! If you are still missing your data, please log out (Settings > Log Out) and then in the log in or sign up screen, look for a link toward the bottom of the page labeled "Get back in here". This will restore your data. If you need additional assistance, please email us at support@wombatapps.com.

title: Freezes up.
body: Yes I love the app even though I have not paid for the annual premium I still get a lot of benefit just learning how to track my carbs and fat etc. the problem is it will freeze up when I’m trying to go back on some things and sometimes I just close it and then start over.   I hope they can fix the problem.

title: Doesn’t work across devices
body: I purchased the premium version of this app and am disappointed that I can’t use it across my iPhone and iPad.  Other than that, it is a good app.  Update 5/9/20 - After the developer contacted me with instructions, I was able to sync over both devices.  Love the app!
response: Hi there, and thanks for your review! You can totally use the app and sync your account across devices. Just message us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" and we'll share exactly how to do that in no time. Thanks!

title: Great app for diabetics.
body: I was diagnosed with type two diabetes a few weeks ago, and among all the info I got I learned I had to count my carbs and fat intake. This app has been such a god sent in keeping track of all my numbers as well as it helps keep track of my glucose readings before and after meals. I love this app.

title: Thank you!!!!
body: I am doing the free app and I have been very successful with it. Its very easy
response: Congrats on your awesome progress and thanks for the kind words! We live for experiences like this. Feel free to reach out anytime in-app if we can help with any questions you have. Have a great day!

title: This app helps
body: I have been doing Keto for 8 months now lost 23 lbs and hope 20  more to go  .this app helps me track and know when i don’t make the best choices great community and connection with friends option — also shared recipes really a helpful tool — recommended to several friends

title: Best macro tracker EVER!
body: I’ve been searching and trying out trackers that will sync with Apple Health. My searching is over. It is awesome. Scanning barcodes has been right on for me. I even went premium which I don’t do. The customer service is prompt as well. Thank you for offering such a well thought out product.

title: So helpful for the Keto lifestyle!
body: I’m new to Keto, and this app is helping me SO MUCH!! I can’t believe how many great features there are in even the free version. So great for tracking on the go. I could’ve used something like this several years back instead of writing everything down in a notebook. Best app I’ve run across in ages!! 👍🏽
response: Awesome, stripes4life, really stoked to hear that the app is working so well for you; that kind of feedback is the reason that we do what we do. Let us know if we can ever help with anything!

title: Easy enough to use
body: This app for being free has been very easy to use. I have had to write out most all of my own keto recipes, which does take a bit of time, however once they are listed they are easy to find in “my food” I especially love the “scan” option for packaged products with UPC symbols. Things like lunch eats, cheese, cream products etc.

title: Must have app!
body: I’ve been using this daily for 6 months and I love it! I totally would not know what to eat without it! I’ve been ignorant for too long not knowing the nutritional values of the food I was eating. This app has helped me shed the fat and maintain my goal weight and I certainly couldn’t have done it without this app.

title: Great app!
body: This app has been very useful to keep track of carb intake. Very customizable so you can set it up to work for your needs. Their Support team is great! I emailed them to report an issue. They responded within a couple of minutes and then followed up to let me know when the issue was resolved.

title: Easy to use
body: Until you track what you eat you have absolutely no idea how many carbs are going down.  This carb tracker really keeps you on track.  You will see results in weight loss in less than 1 week once you set your goal and this carb counter makes it easy to do.

title: Super User Friendly
body: I downloaded the app and quickly added recipes and food items for my whole week in under an hour. I haven’t paid for the premium because I already bought a meal plan from another source. The free version has worked fine for me.

title: Lost 60 lbs in one year
body: Love the ease of finding and tracking foods.  The scan feature has not ever let me down in finding the foods I am eating ... there are so many in the database.  I also like the fact that you can choose so many different measurements (oz, tablespoon, grams, etc).   The best app out there for Keto dieters.

title: Great Keto app
body: Switched to Carb Manager after using another keto app for 9 months. One reason for switching is the ease of importing recipes so I don’t have to recreate them. Love how it shows at a glance where I am in my macros for the day. Easy to use and can customize it for my needs and goals. I wish it had more ingredients in the search, I’m having to add a lot of staples I eat daily.

title: Hate the new update
body: This program was working pretty well until they just did an update the other day and now it doesn’t show me my daily totals it only shows a week total. If I want to know how many calories total I’ve eaten that day I have to go find a calculator and add it up myself manually. I’ve sent several requests to the company and they sent me this lousy email that does not answer any of my questions. Poor customer service hate the new update. Canceling my subscription and going elsewhere.
response: Hi there, thanks for taking the time to leave us feedback. Please reach out to our friendly Support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support and reference your app store review username.

title: What happened?
body: I used the app for free for a few days, then I decided to go premium for a year because I found value in it. A few days after going premium a major app updated was released with a new UI and now the app is very slow to launch, hangs a lot, one day it shows I’m a premium member the next day I’m no more premium and the next day again I’m back to premium. Not sure what is going on.
response: Hi R0bb - We appreciate your support as a Premium member! We'd love to provide some personal assistance in getting these issues resolve for you. Please reach out in the app via Settings → Help & Support and we'll be happy to assist! For fastest service, be sure to include your app store user ID and to mention that you're a Premium member. However, please understand that ticket volumes are high and that it could still be up to 24 hours for a response. Cheers!

title: It works
body: I find this app very helpful in my keto journey. I’ve lost 20 lbs tracking my eating with carb manager. However the app can be very slow, and some of the food item’s nutrition facts don’t make sense. Something like a cheese stick will be -10 carbs or a single cough drop will be 520 calories. Those are just a few examples of my experiences, and don’t happen often. Overall a nice app, just needs a few bug fixes.

title: perfect for keto
body: I paid the one time fee for unlimited macro tracking. Well worth $5. Database of food getting bigger all the time. Would be awesome if it would sync to my IPhone exercise app or strava  to share exercise data, but otherwise it's perfect for me. I used keto buddy app to set my macros and plugged them in manually to carb manager.

title: Wonderful but one suggestion
body: Create come more images! Different eggs, cheeses, etc. for a keto app there sure are too many bread and carb options (even if we can make and buy some of these items as keto). I just have a lot of repeat images for very different favorite recipes and foods so the images for the purpose of a quick glance aren't that useful.

title: Best app for tracking macros
body: I love this app. It is the best for tracking low carb, Keto, etc. Great library of foods, or you can add your own. Tracks measurements, sleep, activity and syncs with my Apple Watch.

title: Love this app
body: If your on keto especially if you’re a beginner you need this app it takes all The guess work of tracking your carbs protein fat and calories I was loosing weight and kept hitting plateaus until this app once I started using this app I was losing a pound a day it’s a must I cannot say enough good things about

title: Carb Manager gets a Keto A+
body: I’m 48 years old and on day 10 of a very strict keto diet! I have used other apps to “diet” in the past, but so happy I started from day 1 using Carb Manager! I love the pie chart which makes it so easy to visualize how to meet my daily goal.

title: Changed my life!
body: Ok seriously my title says it all. I went from keeping track of everything on paper to this beautiful well thought out app. It literally has everything you could want in calorie/ macro counting app! Saves me SO SO much time and stress!!! And on top of it the FREE version is what I have!! Thank you Thank you!!!

title: Carb Manager Made Easy
body: This app helps you find out the net carbs on so many foods prior to consuming. I’m new to the diet so my cousin recommended this app because she  is currently on the same diet and losing weight. I’m 6 days in and feeling great. Cutting out carbs was so easy! It actually takes your appetite away. I highly recommend!!!!

title: Easy access to all your macros!
body: I am so happy I found this App!  It shows all the information on one screen instead of having to search separately for each. Plus easy access to calorie count!  Just started using the App yesterday. Hoping it keeps me on track. So far, I love it!

title: Great Carb counter .
body: Nicely done carb and calorie recorder . Impressive database of foods . Premium version syncs with fit bit and other  devices and step counters and has other features like recipes etc . Free version is good too and all you need to count carbs , calories or both . Used it for months before upgrading and no regrets  .

title: Excellent  tracker... I only have one issue
body: People are... well... Stupid.  Why do you let people out in nutritional values and macros for food?  You have pizza and french fries on here that show zero net carbs... Now MOST people know that's not right..  But you know there's people out there eating the crap out of some fries sayin "but it's keto according to my tracker!". Wish they would use only verified nutrition info.

title: MUST HAVE for Keto!
body: This app has been the answer to ALL of my hopes! App is super intuitive and perfect for tracking all your macros. The ability to track macros, ketones and blood sugar and then print a report to show levels over time is amazing.

title: Extremely helpful
body: I am diabetic and was looking for a detailed app that would help me to not only loose weight, but focus on my carb intake. Although I am not doing Keto, I am planning to do it at some point. I love how it rate A-F for foods that are Keto friendly and to avoid. I just love the detail of this app and so glad I found it!! I’ve loss 4 pds and have learned a lot about my nutrition intake! I give it a 5 star!

title: Easy and accurate!
body: Every food I’ve entered has already been entered by other users, so that saves a lot of time! I just search for the food I want to enter and it’s always there. I’m seeing results after only a week so I can only attribute that to the accountability this app has given me!

title: Love this app!!
body: I have tried several apps to track my macros including MyFitnessPal and Keto Diet. I can’t even think it the others right now...this one is the best by far!  I did pay so that I could use all of the functions. It’s $10 less than MyFitnessPal and much better. I highly recommend it!

title: Great experience
body: The app is simple enough to use that you will actually use it and record and research your food intake. I find this is a critical component to successful diet modification. I have tried other apps in the past and have found the to be somewhat cumbersome and my use drops off because of that.

title: Hard to use
body: There are a lot of positive feedback on this app. But I guess I am just not as savvy as them. This app is not very user friendly. I make a meal list and generate something but I cannot find it add a shopping list. I tried to find the macros on something in the store and could not find the scanner feature     It seems like a lot of the features are hidden   I have spent about 2 hours on this app and still I. The same place I was before I water my money.
response: Hey there, sorry you weren't happy with the app -- we appreciate the feedback. Meal plans you generate can be found under Foods > My Foods > Meal Plans. They also should pop up after you generate them to apply them. The scanner can be found under Foods > Scan. Please email us at support@wombatapps.com if you need any additional help!

title: Great Keto App!
body: I love Carb Manager! It is easy to use and all the recipes that I have tried so far are delicious. My weight loss has really taken off now that I am able to keep a record of how many Carbs I have left for the day. Would definitely recommend for anyone who wants to track exactly what they are eating!

title: Best free Keto tracker I’ve found
body: I recently started the Keto Diet and I used a few different trackers before finding Carb Manager. All the others limited how many items you could track. CM let’s you track as much as you want and it is very usher friendly to enter your own recipes. So far it’s functioning well for me.

title: This app helps so much!!
body: You might think you are eating well, but it’s a reality check when you diligently log in everything on Carb Manager. This app has helped me so much!! Helps me keep track of my weight, my water intake, and of course all the yummy food. It’s great and I highly recommend it to all. 👍🏽

title: Old version better
body: I hate the updated version. I even pay for this app and going to cancel. It doesn’t let you edit your macro and calories. When you can finally edit the calories it switches back to the old count the next day. I also found a lot of the foods net carbs are wrong. Even from past foods I scanned. They just changed for some reason.

title: Updated app
body: Overall the new version of the app is good except it no longer tells me my calories that I have left after logging.  It tells me the fat carbs and protein I have left but not calories and that’s frustrating when I have to take time to figure it for myself.  May be a small thing to some, but it’s big for me

title: Buggy and can’t find Favorite/Heart saved recipes
body: Have the paid premium version and it has been buggy from day one. Scrolling through recipes and it will boot me out of the app or reset to the beginning. Also, even after reading where to find all the recipes you favorite, still can’t find them anywhere. Shouldn’t be that hard. So far disappointed but will continue to attempt to work with it for a bit longer before cancelling. Seems hopeful but so far not impressed.
response: Hi Zkeeper - We appreciate your support as a Premium member and we'd love to get this sorted out for you! Please reach out to our support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support and they'll be happy to get things working smoothly for you. Please be sure to include your app store username for fastest service. Can't wait to hear from you!

title: Frustrated and feel ripped off
body: Paid for the premium and cannot select meals. I can only select individual items that go into the recipe. Also click links to to troubleshoot the issue and the links are just blank pages. Very frustrated and feel ripped off!

title: Helps to keep me on track
body: It is user friendly and helps me to keep track of carbs and makes it easy to keep track of my water intake. I also like that most of the food I eat is already available on lists provided on the app. Definitely recommend!

title: I use it every day ‼️
body: I’m a professional strength coach and nutritionist. Carb manager is by far the best nutrition app I have found. Customer service has been great, very responsive. They also produce excellent information materials. I upgraded to the paid version (the only app I have ever paid for). I highly recommend CM‼️

title: Game changer
body: Tried keto several time always topped out at 10 lb off. I think this is a game changer. I feel more in control with all my eating and so yummy and the best is I am not starving, full and satisfied wonderful app since this is my first ...yes first smart phone. I am 63 lost 12 in in 24 days! 27 to go yes I can yes I can thanks carb manager!

title: Love this app!
body: I can’t say enough good things about this app. I’ve lost 38 lbs with my active ketogenic lifestyle and I’m half way to my goal. I really didn’t want to journal everything I ate since I’m not on a “diet”, but the app is so very easy to use and coordinates with my Apple Watch/Apple Health. Thank you so much!

title: Week 1
body: Carb manager has allowed me to track everything I put into my body thus tracking the precise numbers needed to reach Keto. I’ve lost a lb. a day & am never hungry. Lots of water ingested as well.

title: Buggy
body: Has a steeper learning curve than other weight loss apps but you get the hang of it.   Signed up for premium though and disappointed that it’s glitchy.  Just spent 30 minutes trying to log bacon in the food journal but keep getting an error message. The foods database is completely inaccessible today ... pretty serious bug!

title: Easy to use for tracking
body: This app is great! The scan feature makes things easy. I especially like the letter grade it gives you as it pertains to a Keto diet. Searching for foods to track is a breeze. I have yet to get a food it cannot find even at restaurants. A plus in my book.

title: Amazing
body: This app is the only thing holding me accountable for staying on my diet, I have no will power but I make sure to put everything I’m eating into the app and the visual of my macros and carb count keeps me on track. I love the scanning option it makes adding food speedy and super easy. By far the best app I have used for Keto.

title: Carb manger
body: I have only been using this app for a few days but I love it already. It makes tracking my macros so much easier. I am finding new things everyday. There is still things to learn. I will probably get premium later, after I am sure about the app. So far it's really helpful.

title: Great app for keto!
body: This app has helped me manage my macros while in keto. You can go by the preloaded goals or customize it to you specific goals. It’s a good app if you just use the free version, but if you use the premium version there are a lot more options and ways you can manage your diet and tons more stats.

title: Good Carb tracking app
body: Overall, works great. The add recipe function is a bit cumbersome and I can’t figure out how to delete the old versions of recipes that I couldn’t get to finish. And can’t figure out how to edit recipes. Also, sometimes when I tap on a meal to add foods, it won’t open, even after repeated tapping. Fixing these things would get me to rate it 5 stars.

title: So helpful!!!
body: This app keeps me on my toes and making sure I stay within my macros. I love picking recipes and it makes my grocery list, even off the ones I make. Great database of products, awesome scan feature, track your water, walking..still new to it and learning but so far it’s been excellent.

title: Love the app....only problem I’m running into is.....
body: I really love this app for tracking my net carbs, protein and fat intake.  I did upgrade to the premium app for a year.  The only problem I have had recently is it freezing up on me.  Is there anything in the works to fix this or is it an issue only I am having??

title: Coloring hard to read
body: The only thing I don’t like is the color of the fonts. It’s hard to read. I wish it was all molded for macro numbers in stead of having one bolder and the other not or something. I struggle enough that I’m considering switching apps. It’s so hard to read the weight loss too with having to run and find my glasses which I only usually use while sitting at the computer. Please fix this.

title: Love the App, but...
body: I love using this App. One of the features I found to be awesome is the ability to import recipes that I found online. Now when I try to import it automatically goes to the Carb Manager Paid version where you have to pay for elite recipes. I’m hoping this is a glitch in the system because otherwise this is a turn off.

title: Keto
body: Just starting the keto program and this app makes it super easy and simple it’s great to be able to look up the foods and it just tells you everything you need awesome and you can make up your own meals and it will give you the information you need on your carbs protein and fat

title: Finally! The help I need!
body: I have tried the Keto diet before, but always gave up because I had NO CLUE how to figure out how much of each food group to eat, and which foods fit into each category!  No more guessing...Carb Manager does all the work for me!!!  I have lost 7# in 7 days and feel like a total success! 🎉💪🏻

title: I like but don’t love
body: I like this app and enjoy it a lot it helps in a lot of stuff. What I don’t like is that the app doesn’t let you get deeper information unless you pay,for example get Recipes or add the exact Keto nutrients unless you are a member. I understand but ppl like don’t have the money and I’m trying to learn and be healthier and still have to pay. No can’t do!

title: Gone down hill
body: We used to love this app, but now find it nearly impossible to find the right food to add. If you can find it the carbs and calories are completely wrong when you compare it to nutrition sites. Nearly double the calories in many cases. If you still decide to use this app knits know it isn’t accurate, so double check on sites such as nutritionix or other sites. Don’t even think about a simple search such as “boiled Potatoes” as it will return meatloaf and mashed potatoes and all sorts of unrelated foods!

title: 4 months keto
body: Was on Noom for 12 months and lost 21lbs but then hit a plateau. A client steered me to keto via carb manager and lost 5lbs in first week. Now 4 months later I’m down 15lbs total. Have learned 4 helpful tips: (1: Intermittent fasting (2: veggies much needed to prevent constipation (3: off keto every 3-4 weeks for 1-2 days (4: cardio necessary! Love the app and their new book!

title: Overall good
body: I have the premium version and I love it. My major complaint is that accessing saved premium recipes is not convenient. It would definitely be better if there were a separate section for saved recipes. I had to Google how to find it and others had the same problem.
response: Hi there - thanks for the feedback! If you tap the heart icon on a recipe ("Favorite" it), you can find all of these under "Quick Find" → "Favorites" when you tap the green "+" to log foods. Hope that's helpful!

title: Hate the update!
body: I tried to give you guys time to respond to the help email I managed to find a way to send through the app. Two weeks was more than enough time. I HATE the update. All of my frequent foods...GONE. Favorites that used to pull up....GONE. This app used to be my favorite, and I always recommended it. Can’t say that I will recommend to anyone else if the issues aren’t fixed. Paper & pencil would be easier & less time consuming that trying to figure this version out. Please fix!!!!

title: Need features from old added
body: I used to be able to easily add recipes or edit them. Now, I have to search and add as if adding to my daily log, which is a pain. And the remaining macros finder doesn’t seem to be working-I asked for high protein, no carb, and low fat options....it’s giving me breads (no protein and high carbs!). The old one worked so much better!! I do like the look of update, tho. However it isn’t filling in the circles like it should be. Please fix!!

title: Love the new update!
body: It took a little discovering to get used to the new interface, but after getting used to it I absolutely love it! The new ui is so nice, the recipe section is beautiful and it’s so much easier to discover recipes. It’s also easier to see my goals for the day with the new visuals.

title: Thank you
body: The app is fairly intuitive ... yet sometimes I get overwhelmed or just forget how to accomplish something. When I couldn’t remember how to contact help I googled it. It worked. Also, support on this app directly from Carb Manager is phenomenal. The Recipes are consistently great!  Thanks guys. Money well spent. I keep renewing!

title: 19lbs in 28 days
body: This app has literally saved my life! I’m accountable to myself, and if it doesn’t fit into my day I don’t eat it. I’ve already shared it with 6 people. I have to say the customer service team is fantastic. I had an issue, and they responded in less than 24hrs. A great app from a great developer!!

title: Love it
body: Switch to this app from weight watchers, it is easy to use and I prefer it because the point value of food is based on the carbs and not some arbitrary decision by weight watchers. This is working much better for me! I love that it links with Fitbit, and I love the scan feature for barcodes! So happy I got it.

title: Works for me!
body: I had only been tracking my carbs with a notebook. With CarbManager, I was able to see that I was consuming way too much fat and not enough protein.

title: New User
body: I downloaded the app today and while I like that the directory of food seems to be pretty comprehensive, there seems to be something weird going on with the app development. I can see the coding for everything! The coding for different sections of the app is overlaid over the user-facing titles.
response: Thanks for downloading the app as well as letting us know you are having an issue with it. Please reach out to us in-app at Settings-“Need Help?” and our friendly customer service team can assist you better!

title: Love it
body: This app is such a great tool to help with weight loss. It takes the guess work out of how much I’ve actually ate for the day, and helps me stay on track. It’s user friendly, and I love the barcode scan option for my food, makes tracking so much easier. Best free carb tracker out there!

title: Paying for Accuracy but CM is Waaaay Oof!
body: I have been inputting recipes to track my macros accurately but when I add them to my daily log they do add to my daily totals and actually change them to be lower. For example, I made a special dinner for us last night which included Keto Beef Stroganoff. One serving accurately tallied is 43.6 g of fat (which is why I don’t make it often!) but when I put it into my daily log which already had 30 g of fat, CM said that I only logged 23 g of fat for the day! Come on CM, I am paying for “Premium” and this is the best you can do??
response: Hi and thanks for sharing your experience. It definitely sounds like you have the Deduct Macros from Exercise setting turned on. Message us in-app and we can share how to turn it off. Thanks in advance!

title: Making KETO Beginner Life EASY
body: I’ve been wanting to start KETO but knew I was going to have a hard time tracking my macros/micros. I love how easy it is to search or scan bar codes to find out how keto appropriate food is! AND you can add in custom foods for the recipes you find online. My friend recommended this and it beats the standards diet app!

title: What happened?
body: I loved the app, but the swipe functionality left the application recently. I used to be able to swipe left to delete an entry in the log, or to switch between days. Now It’s multiple steps. Did you guys miss something in the last update?
response: Hey there, and thanks for sharing your experience! We'd love to take a closer look and check out the functionality that went missing, as it should still be available. Just reach out in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" so we can do some troubleshooting for you. Thanks!

title: Love this app!
body: I’m on a keto diet and I absolutely love this app! One thing I love about this app is that I can create recipes and it will calculate all my net carbs from my recipe. Has everything I need to keep me on keto and for free!!! Also for premium they have already planned keto recipes and plans. In the future I may go premium. But as a free app it’s already amazing!!!

title: Love!
body: I am not a dieter. I tried the keto last year and failed and couldn’t figure out why-I was following directions I had read on Pinterest? Then I found this app-and it makes so much more sense! I have a completely different feeling going in this time because I feel prepared.

title: Great when it works
body: I downloaded this app and I wasn’t disappointed for the first week. It helped me in every way possible. But today... it suddenly states I am NEGATIVE in some of my macros. I have 5/20 TOTAL carbs consumed, but if states I am -5 net carbs? What? Also, my breakfast was 110 calories, but the app is stating I am only at 55 calories. I want to give this a 5 star, but if this keeps happening, I may delete it and try to find another app.

title: Best app ever
body: Helps you log everything you eat and keep up with calories and progress! I have never cooked before this app. It gives you all ingredients needed, and step by step with pictures so you know how to do everything exact! I really do highly recommend this app!

title: Keto Tracking
body: This app has helped me sooo much in tracking my carbs, protein, and fat for each food that I eat throughout the day.

title: New to Keto/Low Carb
body: This app is easy to use and extremely helpful...it shows me daily targets, and where I can improve. I thought I was eating too much protein but as it turns out I’m not eating nearly enough...

title: Was loving it but now noticing frustrating bugs
body: Today I opened the app and can't see my daily overview of food. The "Daily Log Screen" takes me to my weight tracking page. Also, often I'll try to log multiple foods for one meal (like meat and vegetables) but I'll log one and then as I log the second food item, it cancels out the first one (it disappears all together off of my daily log). It've been having this problem for the past month.
response: Hi there, sorry for the problem! Please restart the app and this problem should be fixed. Also, please contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll figure out what's going on with the disappearing log entries.

title: Very User friendly
body: Love the app and very user friendly. Makes counting carbs a lot easier with the option to scan the barcode. Only thing that needs improvement that I find so far is it would be helpful for a better serving and/or portion options than what it gives you. But other than that it’s a great app👍

title: Love it
body: I really like this app! It was a little overwhelming at first with how much you could do with it but now I appreciate everything it has. I do wish on the recipes this offers there was a way to adjust ingredient amounts when copying it into a day, like who only eats 4oz. of salmon?! If I want more of an ingredient from one of their meals I should be able to manually adjust

title: I’d be lost without it in my diet.
body: Started a health needed change in diet to also lose weight. Keto diet was the last diet I hadn’t tried. But the portions!? That’s the hard part. And the idea of eating fat now after a lifetime of avoiding it! The community feedback and the daily log takes all the guesswork out. One week in, lost 7 lbs.

title: The best
body: I’ve tried a lot of apps like this but always end up quitting cuz they’re so hard to keep up with and calculate nutrition info for recipes. This app has everything in the same place and is great if you don’t just eat “plain old” stuff and prefer recipes with lots of different ingredients

title: Looking for a replacement
body: I’m getting kind of sick of this app. It’s slow, has problems loading data a few times per week, and the food library is pretty lacking compared to other apps. Today I’m not able to do anything in the app because nothing is loading (again), so I’ll have to wait to track my food tomorrow. Not what I want in this kind of app. As soon as I find another one where Net Carbs are front and center, I’m deleting this.

title: App great but won't load?
body: The App is quite great but it seems like it has a hard time loading. Right now, for example, it simply won't load. Very frustrating as I want to start logging my day. Browsing other reviews and reach outs to technical support, it looks like many more people have been experiencing this. App won't load! :(

title: Great app
body: It took me some getting used to when I had to search the date base for my foods. But if you are patient and take your time, it’s easier than it looks. And watching that pie chart helps me keep my goals in check. You’ll want to do better each time you have a meal.

title: Kept for 1 week, this is really helping
body: Easy to log and track macros for the day, has huge list of food stuffs to log all your eating in quickly. Really helpful! Easy to put down the food when you see how many carbs per serving 😳 highly recommend

title: Great app. Missing a few things
body: It’s a great app and nice to not be yelled at by an app for eating fat. But I wish it would give you goal estimates. When you complete your daily log, I wish it would give you something similar to my fitness pal and say if every day were like today you should lose x lbs in 2 weeks. Other than that it’s pretty good.

title: Is there anything else to compare it to?
body: I don't know of another net carb calculator. The adding food can be a little clunky but not horrible. There database for barcodes and basic items is legit.

title: Eye opening app
body: This app takes a little getting used to but it’s amazing how much nutritional information you can get from scanning the barcode before you buy and eat something.

title: Great app, not great recipes
body: I purchased premium for a quarter just to try it out (mainly for the recipes access) but it turns out most of the recipes are user generated...which means most of them need a lot of tweaking to work. I’m vegetarian and lactose intolerant as well, so they’re very limited in that regard. All in all I really like the app, but for me the premium subscription isnt worth it.

title: Must use
body: This keto diet app is so useful it’s probably one of the best apps I’ve ever used to lose weight! I lost 7 pounds the first week and the more my body got used to keto the faster I would lose weight. This app is a must, if you’re really trying to lose weight I definitely consider this app.

title: Questions
body: I am using this app to help control my carbs. My doctor would like printouts of my meals but I can’t fine anywhere to print reports. Is it available in the premium edition?  What does the premium upgrade do?  I really enjoy the app but I don’t want to hand write all my meals for the doctor. This is the main flaw I have with the program.

title: Where do I begin?
body: Why did you have to fix something that wasn’t broken?  I’ve had this app since last March.  It was practically flawless and easy to use.  Since the app was updated a few days ago, it has lost most of my food history of things I eat on a regular basis.  Have to rescan everything only for it to tell me it can’t find the item where as the old version was able to.   This is just one of many things that make this app pretty much useless now. 🙄

title: Great healthy KETO app
body: Before menopause, I used weight watchers and loved the app. But my body needed to become fat adapted and I was addicted to carbs. This app tracks EVERYTHING, and is easy to use. And I’m a total keto newbie. If you buy the premium app, which is cheaper than WW and totally worth it, the recipe plans, and endless tools and trackers make it so easy to follow.

title: Made account in APP still lost data
body: App reminded me to create account if not premium to prevent loss of data, I used APP to make account. After using one week adding lots of data the APP mysteriously shuts down, loses my data. I have now created an account via the website verified via email. Having to start all over! Had I been a premium customer, that would be even worse. Not sure I can trust the APP yet for any purchase. Trying it again.

title: Keto struggle
body: I’ve had my ups and downs while on keto specifically because I don’t know how to track macros. This app has totally changed this for me and now my days are more enjoyable now that I don’t have to constantly worry if I am too over/ under on carbs, proteins and fat. This tool is literally a God send!
response: Wow, we live for experiences like yours! Thanks for the awesome review and sharing your story. We're happy to be of help anytime!

title: Fasting timer
body: Was wondering if you guys plan on putting a timer that way i dont have use a second app to track my fasting, you input your gki fasted before meal and after meal but i dont check my gki every time i fast would like to just hit a timer for fasting. Overall love the app thank you!

title: Great for Carb Monitoring.
body: Was using a different app to track my food intake for over a year, but decided to give this one a try. I am really glad I did, it is especially helpful since I am primarily tracking net carbs intake.  But it is also great at tracking all the macros. Overall, I am glad I switched.

title: Great app
body: 2 things that could make it better.

title: One great tracker App
body: I was using My Fitness Pal for over 2 years but always thought it to be clumsy and the food entry and databases were a mess.

title: Can’t beat a free app that does its job
body: Carb Manager does exactly that—counts calories for you without the hassles. It even has a scanner for food with bar codes to tell you the calories. If you are on the keto diet, this is the app for you. And it’s free. It calculates the fat, protein and net carbs (all carbs minus fiber carbs). I love this app. Would recommend a thousand times.

title: Apple Watch doesn’t sync
body: Paid for premium integration with Apple Watch - after many frustrating hours I finally got the watch app version to display but no matter what I do it will not sync with either iPhone or iPad apps So as usual the in app purchase of $39 was a rip off to get you to buy the free app. But the free manual entry stuff does work pretty good the only reason for 3 stars but I definitely not recommending Premium
response: Hi Srbrute - Thanks so much for reaching out. We're glad to have you onboard as a Premium member! I can assure you that the Apple Watch syncs with our iOS app. Our support team would be more than happy to assist you with getting this working. You can contact them at support@carbmanager.com. Cheers!

title: Cannot scan a barcode
body: Hi, I’m just starting using this app and really like it. Just starting my keto diet. For some reason I cannot scan a barcode and I get the message ‘device is unable to scan barcodes’. I checked to make sure that barcode scanning is on in my settings and I have successfully scanned barcodes in other apps. Could you help me?
response: Hey there! Thanks so much for the great rating. We'd be more than happy to assist with troubleshooting this issue. In the app, go to Settings - Contact Support, and our friendly team should be able to get this sorted out. Let us know if you have any other questions!

title: Get this app!
body: I live and die by this app. Sounds dramatic I know BUT my life needed a change and KETO is changing my life. That would not be possible without carb manager. I use it to check foods I don’t know about so not only is it tracking for me but it’s helping me learn this new lifestyle. I honestly don’t know how people do KETO without it.

title: Love this app.
body: This app is great!  Obviously created with a lot of thought towards being able to enter info quickly and without a lot of steps. I have used the scan option and every item has been in their database!  This app is very impressive.

title: Super easy
body: Super easy to use and find what your looking for. If they don’t t have exactly what I am having they have something close enough to it to get a ballpark figure. I enjoy the keto aspect of the app since it helps me keep on track with my day. This app is the best food app I have ever tried

title: Disappointed
body: I used to love using this app but since anyone can add items it's now horrible there's so much miss information on here. People are just putting what is on the carbs on the package as the net carb count not doing the math and inputting the actual carb count. Even some of that is wrong I have compared the product info to the actual product info and there are so many errors it's ridiculous. Unfortunately the hunt is on for a more accurate app.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you've run into an issue locating foods to log. We do pride ourselves on the accuracy of our databases, so we're so very interested in lending a hand. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Cricket1" and we'll be happy to assist. Thank you!

title: Such a huge help
body: It has really help with keeping track with my diet, but the scanner never pulls up the item I scanned and not all foods are available otherwise I would give it a 5 star review. I’ve had to use the macro counts on my food and find another comparable item and use that instead but other than that it works.

title: Loving it!!!!
body: Although I have not bought the yearly subscription I love it because it is keeping me in check with my carb and calorie goals. The fact that I can put in my recipes and not have to figure these things out is great! Would love to have this app be able to link with my fit bit so that I can record my exercise that way.

title: Simple and easy!
body: All the great benefits of my fitness pal but specific for low carb and Ketogenic diets. Extensive food library, calculates net carbs, fats, and protein, and has a lot of other features if you want a premium experience. You get everything you need with the free part of the app. Really helps to keep me on track!

title: Not bad
body: The app is great if you’re starting keto to get you in the mindset of counting carbs and macros. But the subscription should only be used by those that don’t know how to google recipes 😃. I purchased the year plan and it is helpful.  If you really need to link your macros from recipes then the subscription is good but again with a little work you don’t need it.

title: Making my life easier
body: This app is just so easy to use for foods that are store bought or homemade. I try to log in the morning what I think I will be eating all day and then I don’t have guess if my choices meet with my plan. I recommend it to people who aren’t even watching carbs!

title: I love Carb Manager!
body: Easy to use to keep track of food, as well as calories, and alerts me of food to avoid.  There is an extensive library of different types of foods and food I may order at restaurants so I know the caloric intake and other useful information for everything I eat! Thanks Carb Manager.

title: May need a few up grades
body: I paid for the premium and thought it would be helpful to sync my Fitbit. My Fitbit won’t sync and I can not enter that I am over 30,000 steps, or 3,000 calories. I feel I am just taking a loss on my calories and steps that don’t count. Kind of disappointed, main reason to use this app was so that I could sync my Fitbit.

title: My experience with Carb Manager
body: I’ve been using it for a week and it really does make it so easy to track your meals which of course makes it easier to eat healthier and hold yourself responsible for doing so. I feel like this is going to get me to a healthier way of eating & therefore a healthier weight.

title: Premium is upsetting
body: The over all free app is great to track your macros. I went ahead and purchased the premium to get recipes and all the other stuff but mainly the recipes to make it easier on myself. But it will not scale to fit my macros no matter how many customer service emails I’ve gotten to try to resolve. I decided to cancel and get a refund. Carb Manager told me to go through Apple, Apple wont accept my refund. Told me to contact carb manager 🤷🏼‍♀️ hoping someone sees this and can help me out.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're ready, willing, and able to assist with your current situation! May we ask that you reach out to us via the Carb Manager app by selecting "Need Help?" and reference the username "bfox1610" -- Looking forward to assisting you as soon as possible!

title: The app doesn’t load
body: The app has a handful of useful information, however, one con is that pages load forever and now the entire app just doesn’t load at all. I hope I won’t stuck with the app that doesn’t work. Developers please address this issue, all app pages should load smoothly.

title: Not just for low carb!
body: Love this app! You can adjust the macros so that it fits what type of lifestyle you are living! I can’t do low carb, but am doing low fat but that’s no problem as I am able to adjust the macros to whatever I want so no matter what you’re in to, this app fits the bill 😊

title: Good app
body: Overall is a good app. Excellent to keep track of your carbs if doing keto, or just your calories in general. However, all your data is on their server, not your phone. Outside of the privacy issue, whenever they have server problems, which happens too often, you have no access to your log.  That means you are out of luck if you are trying to figure out how many carbs/calories you have available for your meal.
response: Hi there, thanks for your review! We very rarely experience server outages and typically get our user's back in touch with their data in a matter of hours. Sorry for the inconvenience and we hope you decide to give us another shot!

title: Lose weight
body: This is the app to help you. It easy to do and its all right there.

title: Really frustrated!
body: Yes, change can be difficult or take time to adapt to BUT change just for the sake of change is useless!!!
response: Hi there, thanks for the note! This update brought a variety of new features, fixes, and a redesign that brought the look and feel into the year 2021. There have certainly been some challenges, and we're listening to all comments/feedback and following up to implement changes, fixes, and tweaks based on what our customers are telling us. Rest assured that your favorites are not lost! Please reach out via Settings → Help & Support, and we'll help you get them back. Cheers!

title: Please Roll Back the Version
body: This app was not ready to be released. The search function has taken many steps backwards and I can’t find my usual foods without spending time looking.  The “My Macros” view no longer provides the actual percentage carbs, fat, and protein. This was the main reason I use this app and pay the yearly subscription fee.  It is a dealbreaker without this view. On a positive note, I think that the graphical presentation is much improved, just wish the function was up to speed.
response: Hi KD-88 - We hear you, and we appreciate your feedback. Rest assured that we're working around the clock to fine tune the new version of the app. In the meantime, our support team should be able to assist with those specific issues that you mentioned. Please reach out in the app via Settings → Help & Support and they'll be happy to assist. Cheers!

title: LOVE this app!
body: I rarely pay for an app, but I paid for this one based on my cousin’s recommendation and I absolutely LOVE it. Great recipes. Great menus. Easy to add foods to your day. I have tried other apps that make it such a pain Todd your meals that I give up on them in just a couple of days. This app actually makes it easy to do keto!

title: DO NOT get the new update to v 7
body: This new update is beyond HORRIBLE. I am so angry that all my recipes that I spend hours each week developing and tweaking are now incorrectly calculating my macros and sometimes missing info. The visual layout is useless. I can’t import recipes from my favorite websites any longer. I also can’t share info easily with my husband who also uses the app. Bottom line is that all the features and functions that brought me to CM are not working or effectively gone. I will be canceling my subscription ASAP.
response: Hi and thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Since you posted it, many fixes and improvements have been implemented by our Development Team. If you have any questions or continuing issues, please reach out to us from directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. We are very happy to assist! :)

title: Love this app
body: I love everything about this app/program because it does everything I need it to do and it calculates both Net Cabs and Regular Carbs as well as all the other Macros used for control.

title: Super Easy!
body: I’m not an “app” guy...and I’m certainly not a super health nut, but I felt like Keto was the best way for me to easily lose weight and get healthier.

title: Need help with syncing health data
body: I’ve noticed that the app does not sync my Apple health data as far as weight, bodyfat, etc. It syncs only my activity and workouts. Am I missing something? It would be nice to not have to manually enter my bodyfat and weight each time I weigh in (my scale bluetooths to my Apple health).

title: Overall, it’s a great app, but...
body: It’s quite easy to use, and fairly accurate. I do have issues with importing recipes from other sites. They are usually incorrect in their macros numbers. So, I have to input everything manually, therefore getting a much more accurate read.

title: My  little Leto helper.
body: Carb manager helps me keep track of my carb count all day as well as check the nutritional content of foods I plan to eat to ensure I don’t exceed my carb limit for the day. I have never been so committed to Following a diet as stringently as I am doing keto. This app has been super crucial to my success so far. Love love love carb manager❤️❤️❤️

title: So easy and seeing results already!
body: Love love love this app. Easy to use, with a really robust database (SO much better than WW!!). I’ve only been using it a week and have found it super easy to use which means I’m tracking what I eat every day. So much helpful information. Great work from all involved!!!

title: It’s fabulous but...
body: I really love this app. It makes counting macronutrients so easy. So far it has recognized all the foods I have entered and I love the pie chart. The only thing I don’t love is that I weighed more than the place holder weight already in the app, so under my newsfeed it says I gained xx (specific number of) pounds. A bit demoralizing.

title: Best one out there
body: I’ve tried other apps and this one is by far the best no need to sign up or pay money and you can use it for free but I upgraded for the recipes and I don’t regret it. I would recommend this to anybody who is trying to watch what they eat and lose weight

title: Love it, but it drains my battery...
body: I have been getting a lot of great use out of this app, but if I keep it open in the background my battery hits the red within hours. I have been recommending the app to others since I started using it, and I hear the same complaints from them. I hope this is being looked into.

title: The only thing missing.
body: This is a really great app. They put a lot of work into it. But it’s missing a sodium tracker in it list of totals. I think that is something very important for us over 40 types who are trying to get healthy again.

title: Carb Manager is a life saver
body: As someone who is new to the keto lifestyle, having carb manager has really helped me out a great deal. The app allows me to keep track of my carbs, proteins, and fat on a daily basis. I even get to create recipes so I can stay interested & on track and carb manager will give me all of the vital nutritional information!

title: Carb Manager
body: This app is amazing and very helpful. I wish you that you can log your water in smaller portions. For example, you can log that you drank 4 ounces of water not the eight ounces of water yet. There are tons of items that the app does not recognize. Therefore this should also be a correction that should be made to both of these issues.

title: Nothing else compares
body: Seriously. As someone who’s tried to do Keto a thousand times (and gotten pregnant twice then had more weight to lose) this app is SO helpful. The only reason I haven’t purchased the yearly subscription is because I’m overdrafted hahaha, I seriously love it so much! Thanks for all the hard work, guys!!

title: The greatest app
body: I love this app. The basic version is awesome, but the upgrade is well worth the money. There are so many ways to add the food you consume to the app. It even imports recipes from online and analyzes the ingredients to tell you the nutritional content! There are recipes everything you need to track. Great app

title: Feeling great!
body: I started the keto diet one week ago today I could not have stuck with it if I did not have this app. One week and a loss of 8.3 pounds. Thanks for giving us this great app to track our carbs, calories & waters. I will definitely recommend this to family and friends. Stay healthy!

title: Easy way into keto!
body: This app is awesome! Easy to use and has been a great tool for learning about the keto diet. I upgraded for 3 months and use the analysis feature but the only advice it has given me is to start evenly spreading my carbs throughout the day. I’d really like to see a more in depth analysis or maybe some helpful tips.

title: Perfect Keto Alternative App
body: Tried several other popular apps, but they seemed clunky when trying to log meals with my dietary guidelines. This app seems a little complicated at first, but after a few minutes it’s a breeze to navigate. Very user friendly, and has a great food database.

title: Great App HOWEVER.....
body: This app is good and has a VAST product guide and let’s you create your own recipes BUT it won’t let you import any recipes you find online, unless you pay for the premium  edition. MFP does allow this feature, as do a few other I use, but I’d like to make this one my #1 but until they allow this feature it won’t. Very frustring😤

title: It May seem like a pain to count....
body: I hate having to think about my food... but this app is eye opening. It’s been teaching me about my choices.

title: Helpful, but it does freeze a lot
body: Has good resources. Deals in whole numbers so if something has a carb count of 1.3g it probably goes up or down and maybe that it the reason the carb count seems off in the final tally when you calculate 19 from the food diary and it says 20 in the final tally at top.

title: What a farce
body: I don’t see how this app has so many positive reviews. I couldn’t use one function on this app without being asked to purchase premium. It didn’t say you HAD to purchase premium to even remotely be able to use this app or search recipes. Can’t search recipes, can only pretty much track your macros if you self put in everything. I have a free app much more user friendly than this frustrating thing. It’s called my fitness pal. And don’t get a “buy premium” smack in the face with every click.
response: Hey Ginger2112, thanks for the feedback. Carb Manager is free to use. The free version allows you to do everything you need to stay on track with keto: set your goals; search & view net carbs & macros on over 1M+ foods; track your macros, exercise, and water; create custom foods & recipes; chart your weight; join our community; and much more. We have an optional Premium upgrade -- including exclusive recipe & meal plans we developed ourselves -- that allows us to fund our business and keep the rest of the app totally free. Hope this helps 😃.

title: Fantastic!
body: Carb Manager is is simple to use and keeps you on track on a daily basis as well as long term. Great way to track everything you eat.

title: First app not following the trend
body: I usually dislike fitness and diet apps with wizard form (steps), because at the last step(after 20 step) you will see (unlock now $$$$ before even you see how the app works)

title: Finally a food tracking app with a purpose!!
body: This app allows anyone to visualize their progress with long needed metrics and tuning to the individual needs of a Keto diet individual; extremely simple and intuitive yet sophisticated to allow for great detail.  Fantastic list of common foods and detailed descriptions... Great stuff!!

title: Keto lovers
body: When I started to get serious about making a journal of my daily habits in order to loose weight with keto, I miraculously came across this app. I LOVE IT. It took a while to learn , but once I did...BOOM! Now it's second nature.  The only time I start gaining weight I notice it's because I stop inputting what I'm putting in my mouth.  I LOVE THIS APP.

title: Extremely Helpful
body: This app has been so helpful as my husband and I are learning to follow a Keto lifestyle. It helps you track your macros with easy to understand charts. You can look up foods and get their nutritional value and Keto rating before you decide to eat them. Highly recommend.

title: New update
body: It’s taking me a little while… I’m trying to work with two of my clients and help them use it as well…

title: So much better than My Fitness Pal
body: Wow carb manager is so much better than my fitness pal. Plus no Keto bashing on Carb Manager. I also love that not only are macro totals up front and center but  you can track fasting,. blood glucose and blood ketones and so much more. I wish I would have switched a long time ago!!!

title: Today’s reformatting has ruined what was an excellent app.
body: I’m done with this app. Does anyone here have a different one they like?

title: Karen
body: I love everything about the ap. except, I do wish it kept more of the foods that I have entered, the list is too short and I’m disappointed when I can’t find the same food that I scanned two days prior. Couldn’t you keep like thirty of the food history? Thx

title: Easy
body: I didn’t want to bother with what I thought would be a time-consuming method of tracking everything I eat. However, this app is very easy to use and it is extremely helpful in seeing your overall picture for the day.

title: Could be five stars
body: I would definitely give this app five stars if it would stop crashing every time I try printing a recipe. It takes forever to actually communicate with a printer and then it kicks you out right when you get a chance to click the print button. So frustrating!

title: Editing your recipes
body: I love this app so much but I wish once I add one of your recipe to my recipe list I would have the option to edit the recipe. All of your recipes are really good but I like to add, delete or replace items to what I like. By not allowing me to edit them gives me an inaccurate carb intake for that meal. :(

title: Must purchase to have adequate trial.
body: I think the app would work very well for a Keto dieter, however you can only log 9 items a day without purchasing the subscription. I would prefer  trial period. If i can't even log one day to try it out, I am not going to purchase the app.
response: Hi there, thanks for the feedback! We wanted to let you know that we've implemented a 7 day free trial. Please give it a try and contact us at support@wombatapps.com if you need any assistance.

title: Carb Manager
body: I’ve had many apps but this is the most complete all encompassing app I’ve ever experienced. They have thought of everything. I opted for the free app initially and was so pleased with the details that I decided to purchase the Premium version. I am so impressed and mostly I feel I’ve made a Great investment in my Keto journey.

title: New to Keto - The ONLY way to do it is with this App!!!
body: Easy to use and manage. I’m adding food and creating recipes for smoothies. After one week, paid for the year membership, this is SO EASY with this app!! Before I was writing everything down and I tried some junk free apps. This one takes the carb-free cake!

title: Selecting multiple items at one time
body: I like this app...I just wish there was a way to select multiple items at one time like you can do in MyFitnessPal. Also wish you could edit a previous saved workout without having to type everything in again. Maybe there is a way and I just haven’t figured it out yet.  Otherwise I like how it tracks.

title: Really really handy
body: Once you get used to tracking it’s super duper helpful. One thing I would really like though is the ability to duplicate one of my recipes. I always tweak stuff and would like to be able to make the new version without altering the initial recipe. Maybe it’s a feature and I don’t know? Would love to hear from the devs. Thanks.

title: Tracking is now manageable
body: I never wanted to track what I eat, but decided I needed to try it as I was stalled and even going in the wrong direction.   Boy am I thankful for this app!  It’s easy to use and helps me decide what I want to eat prior to eating. It’s easy to see what I have left for the day and many other perks!

title: Just updated and it crashes immediately
body: It worked beautifully this morning. Updated the app today and now it immediately crashes upon opening. Stinks because I use it more than any other app!

title: Love it - one request
body: I love this app! So intuitive and user friendly. I stopped using for a while and regret it (and gained weight back). I have dumped Fitness Pal and come back to this great app.

title: Change In Life Style
body: Recently been diagnosed with moderate fatty liver disease, with inflammation.

title: TERRIBLE NEW VERSION- 7!
body: Most successful apps roll out small improvements, not a complete overhaul all at once! Expecting users, especially those who paid for Premium, to take extensive time & effort to learn & navigate something that already worked well is totally irresponsible & uncaring of your loyal users. Based on the outpouring of frustration via social media & groups, I know I’m in the majority of loyalists who feel duped & sold something on a bait & switch platform now. Trying to get a refund now, but get no response.

title: So much better than MFP
body: I’m glad I switched over. Everything is easier on this app after you get used to it, Especially making custom recipes and tracking macros.. the database food items include all the measurements you need too, including weights. 👌🏼🙌🏼

title: Used to love...
body: I have been using this app on/off for last few years and always loved it but recently it has been a hassle to use. I can never find my most recent foods and the barcode rarely scans. When it does scan, the nutrition is inaccurate to what the nutrition label is on the food item I am eating. This needs to get fixed because this is a hassle. I want something easy I can count on. Please fix this or I will be looking into another app that I can use to track my carbs.

title: Accuracy
body: Hello,
response: Hi Smajors64 - Thanks for reaching out. Yes, improvements are currently underway to resolve the accuracy of the database. In the meantime, there are some workarounds that our support team would be happy to assist with. Please reach out to them in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: Has everything
body: Love this app it has everything you need to be keto or low-carb sufficient!!!!

title: So easy!
body: Never has counting carbs been so easy! I felt lost last week trying to figure out how to manage my carbs for my newly diagnosed type 2 diabetes. With this app it’s a piece of cake to put in what your having and how much and it tells you how many carbs your meal was/is going to be!

title: Why this is working for me.
body: Carb Manager keeps me in balance. It gives me a understanding of what I actually eat everyday. I know where to add or take away on my food intake daily. I’m learning more and more everyday on what I have to do to balance myself everyday to lose weight . Thank you Carb Manager.

title: Premium not updating my Macros correctly
body: I loved this app, and have used it for 2 years without trouble.  However, this past week, it stopped updating my Macro-goals.  It is supposed to give me “smart goals” based on my current weight, activity-level, and % Calorie-Reduction desires.  Very frustrating, bcs my Daily-Tracker makes no sense at all, with the wrong Calories and Macros now.  I sent an email to Customer-Service, and I’m really hoping they fix this, otherwise I’m going to have to cancel my subscription.
response: Hi Eric, thanks for sharing you're experience. We're glad to hear you've emailed our support team, so we've most likely already responded to you. If not, please message us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" so we can sort out your Smart Macros. Thanks!

title: Smart app
body: The detailed information this app gives you is mind boggling.   In a good way.  The way you can chart your trends with macros and blood sugar and measurements in such detail is very impressive.   Also love the community feature.  And how it syncs to my garmin.   They have really thought of everything.

title: The perfect app! Easy to use!
body: Finally an app that is efficient, easy to use, and tracks everything that I want to track, which includes carbs total calories fat and protein along with fiber to give you net carbs along with tracking your weight. Easy to use, perfect!

title: Nutrition Facts don’t match food labels
body: My first day using the app and I had to edit the nutrition facts in the app because it didn’t match the nutrition facts on the product’s label. The foods I had to edit were Atkins shake, Beyers carb smart bars, and Blue Diamond almonds. Now I worry that all the facts may be wrong. The app looks great, but this issue has me worried. Let me know if I have it set up wrong.

title: Great app for a beginner
body: I have been using this app for about a week and I’m so impressed by it. It’s easy to use and not time consuming.  You can scan a container and the information is already in the app.  I have already lost a few pounds limiting my carbs and this app has helped me so much.

title: I LOVE this app
body: As a Registered Dietitian, this is the best App for food intake. I absolutely love the calories along with the Carb, Pro and Fat. I love how I can scan food labels. I love how I can make a recipe. I love how I can copy food to any day/meal. I love how I can adjust the nutrient percentages. I love how at the end of the day, I get confetti for staying within my goals. Thank you!!

title: Easy to use, great information
body: This is a fantastic app for those tracking macros and following a Keto way of eating. Voice add, type to add and scan barcode make it so easy. I have my scale and exercise syncing to my iPhone and it is seamlessly integrated into my stats on the app. Highly recommend.

title: Great to count carbs!
body: Sometimes the app is slow but still works well to count the macros and calories. Or thing I do wish is when making a recipe to have a container option to add in the recipe. Also generic food choice option on the average item when you don’t know nutritional value. This is why I only put 4 star.

title: Keeping track
body: This app is probably a life saver for me. It can be for you as well. No one lives forever. Taking control of your diet and exercise has a good chance of keeping you around a little longer. Don’t be singing “just one day” sooner than necessary

title: Be ready to upgrade to pro
body: Too aggressive in getting you to upgrade to the monthly service.  I was not opposed to doing so, but I wanted some time to see if I liked the app.  But every food search was a solicitation so I deleted the app and am now looking for another low carb tracker.
response: Hey BZ! Thanks so much for taking the time to leave a review and share your experience with the app. We've actually designed Carb Manager with free users in mind; although Premium is powerful, it's possible to meet your goals using just the free app. We don't display upgrade prompts when free users do a food search. Could you please reach out to our support team w more information via support@carbmanager.com? We'd love to get a better understanding of what you were seeing.

title: Horrible app!!
body: Whatever you do, don’t waste your money to purchase premium version!  This app arbitrarily assigns calories and macros to food which is just ridiculous. For instance 1200 cal, 70g fat for 2 cups black coffee!!  There is no possible way you can adequately track your macros. Also not user friendly and very difficult to add foods. Keeps assigning breakfast foods in lunch category etc. you can edit it, but will often go back to original when re-opening the app. Again, this is HORRIBLE. Find a better one!
response: Thanks for sharing your experience. It looks like you've already reached out to us in-app and we realized where the issue was rooted, but if you have any other questions or concerns, please let us know, and we'd be happy to help. Thanks!

title: The best option for tracking keto macros
