body: Seems like the best option for tracking macros on a keto diet. I like how easy it is to find foods. I wish it was easier or more intuitive to chat with friends. I’ve spent a while trying to figure out the difference between chat and news feed and if I can chat privately with friends..

title: THIS IS WHAT EVERYONE SHOULD USE!!
body: So I got on the keto flow... I didn’t wanna waste time trying to calculate everything and think of it too much while I eat and live my busy life.. this app is GENIUS!! I’m ALWAYS on the go and always very focused for a lot of what I do in my life! This saves me a ton of mental energy and makes logging seem less 🙌🏽 5 STARS !!

title: Great App - Easy to Use
body: I LOVE this app!  I’m a 71-year old woman who has just been diagnosed with diabetes.  It’s imperative that I count my carb intake so that I do not go over 180 carbs a day.  This app makes it so easy for me to accomplish this.  I’ve already lost 8 lbs in 5 days.  I never realized just how many carbs a day I was really consuming.

title: Solid investment especially for people tracking carbs.
body: This app does everything I need in order to eat a carb steady diet. The food database has been sufficient for my needs, and I really like the barcode scanner. I upgraded my subscription to include the recipe feature, and it was worth the small yearly fee.

title: Easy to use
body: My favorite feature is the scan: hold your phone up to the barcode of the package you are eating from, and this app auto enters all the macros, micros, calories. So easy.

title: Free app fine, subscription disappointing
body: The free app was surprisingly easy to use with a nice interface and a large database of foods. However, the subscription was disappointing and a waste of money. Many of the Keto recipes have inappropriate macros or are difficult to prepare, there is no Apple Watch app, so integration did not help me, suggested meal plans were meh. Stick with free version, canceled my subscription, but can’t get that money back:(

title: Not too shabby
body: Great tool to help me keep track of my macros while I live the keto lifestyle.  The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because I have a hard time finding foods with the search button.  There's not as many options to choose from as there is in my fitness pal. But other than that, it's simple and overall great.

title: Low Carb Keto App
body: I decided on the free version to see if I like it. I’m only one week in but I am very happy with the choices for entries and I especially like the scan option for some of my personal favorites.  Using the App helped me to see the areas that I need to improve.  Give it a try, you will love it.

title: Can’t create recipe
body: Update: I’ve updated my review. The glitch has been fixed. Happy with the app; fairly user friendly!
response: Hi there - we're so sorry for the problem. It has now been fixed. Resume recipe creation!

title: Why I like Carb Manager.
body: We used Fitness Pal for a long time , but when we went to Keto it was not as easy to track Fats. My daughter suggested this App, she has been on Keto for over a year & lost a lot of weight, most important she has gotten Healthy numbers in all her blood work & is no longer on Insulin.

title: Finally figured out Keto!
body: This app is amazing!!!! I couldn’t figure out why I wasn’t losing weight when I thought I was following a Keto Diet. This app helped me to wrap my head around the percentages and apply it! Love love love! I am now in the highest level of ketosis and losing weight! Thank you for the work of putting this app together!

title: It used to work great
body: But now it seems to have forgotten my info. And it keeps saying to update, which I do every time I open it. Now all data seems to be gone. What happened to this amazing app? I will be discontinuing subscription if it doesn’t remember me
response: Hi there - if you haven't yet, please reach out to Support in-app via Settings Help & Support and we'll get this sorted for you ASAP! Make sure you reference your App Review Username. Thanks!

title: Do not like recent upgrade
body: I do not like the layout of the recent update to carb manager.  Visually there is too much in the summary and is not a simple review.  Text is too small   Also when you have the calorie deduction option selected you can’t see both the total calories and the total minus activity calories.  That option was on the old version

title: Carb Manager has changed my life!
body: I have done Keto off and on for a couple of years and always struggled to track my macros because other apps made it so difficult.  Carb Manager has so many more foods stored, it tracks net carbs vs having to calculate them yourself, and it is just so user friendly.  Love. Love.  LOVE!!

title: I want the old version back!
body: My app updated yesterday, now totally lost.  Information is spread out all over the place.  Print is too light, can’t find where to log my weight.  You had a great app before this update, if it ain’t broken, don’t fix it.

title: Great app for low carb!
body: I’ve used this app since I began my keto journey 2.5 years ago. It’s awesome, you can scan items to get accurate macros, search, or add yourself. I also track my weight and other measurements and enjoy seeing how things have changed over time.

title: Amazing
body: I love this app! It’s helped me track my food and loose weight. It’s easy to use and does all the work for me. My only issue is sometimes the macros for the food choices are not accurate so I have to use my best judgment and try to do the best I can with that. All around a great app.

title: Hate the update
body: I’ve been using this app almost 2 years and loved it. However, this update is horrible. It’s taking longer to do things, and finding foods is horrendous. I was looking for Peanut Butter in the search, and everything but PB came up, and it seems to be only looking at my foods. I checked “all”, cleared all filters, still no luck. It used to be so easy to find foods, because most store bought things are already in the system. Now, not so much. So irritating. Not happy at all.
response: Hi GoCougs - We have a big update on the way to improve the food search functionality in the updated app. Sit tight and it should be released soon! If you have any specific questions in the meantime, don't hesitate to reach out to our friendly support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support.

title: Tried everything
body: Carb manager is legit the only app that I find works wonders. It has everything. And if you can’t find your food (rare) you can add it and enter everything into the nutrition facts. It’s amazing. I’m doing keto and intermittent fasting and it literally has everything. GET IT! do the dang thing!

title: Good app
body: The fact that users can  edit and submit inputs it’s huge for accuracy as products do change or are labeled incorrectly. The app is good for tracking macros. Haven’t gone into the recipes yet but this app definitely helps me stay on track and integrates well with the health app.

title: I love this app BUT
body: Tracking my nutrition is great. Scanning containers lovely BUT I have no way to create a back up. I can’t export the data. Neither the share button for the daily log or the reports that the premium version says I should have don’t work. I want reports and back ups.

title: Great for tracking but...
body: I have a love hate relationship with Carb Manager. Yes, I use it daily but everything entered needs to be double checked. More than 60% of their stock information has the wrong macros (not the user entered items but the ones providers by Carb Manager). This makes your daily count way off. Use the app with caution and double check all info they give you.
response: Hi & thanks for your review! Our food database is made up of info directly from the USDA database for all of our whole & common foods and updated daily. Any branded or processed foods may be added by users or brand owners, & of course you're welcome to input your own foods as well. However, message us in-app & we can share how to distinguish our USDA-approved foods, or help with anything else. Thanks!

title: Love the app
body: Among other things I love the fact that the recipes give the weight of the ingredients. I have a very accurate Cuisinart 10 ounce scale. Now I don’t have to guess if a red pepper is medium or large as an example.

title: Best Keto Macro Food Tracker
body: I recently began Keto and couldn’t stand the chaotic layout of MyFitnessPal. Also tried a few other popular tracking apps...not so great. I ended up trying this one because of the clean, simple layout. It has everything I could want - so easy to use. I’m SO glad I found it!!!

title: Paid $40 and it’s not working!? SO MAD
body: UPDATE: apparently there was an outage or something. The app is working really, really well.... hopefully outages aren’t a regular thing!
response: Hi there, thanks for getting in touch about this, and our sincere apologies for the problem. We had a server outage earlier today. Our engineers have restored service and all systems are up and running again. We are very sorry for the interruption.

title: Best nutrition tracker I’ve used!
body: Love the app and find it super helpful. The database behind the nutrition is the most comprehensive I’ve seen. My only complaint is that it take SO long to load. It would be nice to keep my daily summary cached for a quick view and then get the loading times as I use the app for other things. Great job though!

title: Regret buying
body: I should have never paid 40 something dollar for this app! Very disappointed. As a Caribbean person I found it very frustrating to try to put the food I eat in there. Almost none of them are in the search bank. From the description they had thousands of items in the search bank....NOT!!! So I try to put in the food I eat that are “ethnic” to the best of my knowledge. I should have kept using the free version.

title: GREAT ap!
body: Have fallen in love with carb manager’s intuitive interface, expansive food database, and cool analytical tools. Logging food, which I’ve always thought of as a total drag, is fascinating and fun with this ap!!! I got the premium sub because it wasn’t too expensive, and the recipes aren’t ghastly or weird— just good food!

title: Major difference
body: I was so upset not being able to lose weight, but once I started using this app to track everything I ate I could see exactly where I was going wrong. Now I’m losing weight with no issues!! Thank you for making this app!! Lol
response: So glad that you're seeing results with Carb Manager, Aubszy! There's a quote from the business world that says "What gets measured gets managed". Just as true when it comes to health and dieting. "Lazy keto" has it's place once you've reached your goal weight, but to really see the weight loss benefits of Keto that you hear about in the media, it's crucial to track your macros. Let us know if we can ever do anything to make the app even better for you! - Trever

title: Game changer
body: I have been struggling at 160lbs for months. On keto, off keto to reset but still 160lbs. I was ready to give up and settle for always being this weight. UNTIL this app. I chart everything- even when I go over. My scale hasn’t stopped moving down. I’m hooked!

title: Losing weight
body: I haven’t lost a pound in three months,  so I got this App. I’ve lost two pounds in two days. Being accountable for everything I eat and being able to track it has got me back on track!! I highly recommend this App

title: Great Calorie Tracker
body: My favorite calorie counting app in the App Store. Even when I’m not doing low carb this app is great. I love the speak function and scanning is smooth. You can keep it simple with this app and there are even some advanced settings.

title: Automatically adding in additional weight ins
body: I love the app and have been a faithful user for over a year. However I only weigh myself once a week and the app is adding additional weight entry’s (usually multiple times in one day). I used customer support via the app and I cannot get a response.
response: Hi there - sorry to hear about this issue you're experiencing! Our support team has been exceptionally busy recently, but we can assure they will get back to you if you've sent a ticket via the app. We appreciate your patience!

title: Lost me with the new changes
body: I’m a long time user and loved the app, but the new changes make it difficult to use and  it’s visually  difficult to track your daily counts. Liked the old version much better. if it ain’t broke don’t fix it!

title: Dark mode?
body: I absolutely LOVE the new update as this is exactly what I have been asking for and what I needed to finally go premium! I’m also SO glad you included a widget! My only request now is for a dark mode, please. For some of us, the over abundance of white is a bit harsh on the eyes.
response: Thanks so much for the constructive feedback!. While I can't give any specifics at this point, I think you'll really appreciate our next major app update this week! :-) If you have any questions in the meantime, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team at support@carbmanager.com

title: This app used to be the best—before update
body: I found this app a couple of years ago and really fell in love with it. The upgrade has ruined it for me as well as for most of the longtime customers. I decided not to renew and made a decision to go back to the LoseIt app since they have made tremendous improvements on carb tracking, macro management, as well as a bunch of great new features. It’s a cleaner platform and much easier to navigate. Wishing all the customers best of luck in trying to navigate the new version chaos.

title: Keto Diet friendlier than MyFitnessPal
body: I used MyFitnessPal for years, and it was good for it’s time. Carb Manager is so much more personally adjustable, and Keto Diet informative. Love the “warning” status on foods to avoid. I was consuming too many foods I thought were “safe.” Now I can see the A-F grade, and be much more careful. Weight is steadily coming down. Yah!

title: Great app to track with
body: I’m very surprised and delighted that this app allows my to enter and track foods, including using the scanner. There are lots of features available but you have to pay but not a lot. I’m probably going to upgrade to the premium app.

title: So helpful
body: I love being able to scan a food and instantly find out how it will effect my diet goals. Having the ability to see right away how I am doing that day is really keeping me on track. I also love the recipe ideas - I might even cook one day!

title: Awesome way to track your carbs!
body: I love the ability to scan products on this app, but my most favorite thing about it is all the recipes within! You’ll never be left figuring out what to make with so many options at your fingertips!

title: Way Better Than Expected
body: This app is fantastic. Makes it simple and easy to track all aspects of my eating. Has every food   I’ve searched for so far and allows you to enter foods that are not on lists. I highly recommend this app. It’s my safety blanket. It works.

title: Failed before Thanksgiving
body: This app worked fine until I needed it the most. All of sudden, it started asking for login info but won’t recognize it. No doubt, the engineers are already eating Turkey. I’m searching for a better app. I’m feel like I’m getting played here.
response: Hi, thanks for sharing your review and turkey experience with us. By the sound of it, it seems like you may be working with an anonymous account. This is an easy fix, and we'd be happy to sort it out so it doesn't happen again. Please reach out to us at support@carbmanager.com, and we'd be happy to help! Happy belated Thanksgiving!

title: Not intimidated by KETO!
body: This app is amazing if you’re looking into a dramatic weight loss. I was so intimidated by the KETO diet that I kept on procrastinating... it took me a year to decide I wanted to do this after a trip to the doctor. This app allows me to easily scan or search all carbs, fats and proteins on all foods I’ve searched. I recommended 100%!

title: unimpress
body: I admit my fault but considering i submitted my request for a refund on the day it renewed i thought no worries it would be easy ; of coursed denied.

title: Slow response
body: I have had this app for several years now and I do love it! What I don’t love is that it has gotten extremely slow.  The delay is sometimes almost a minute between taps...idk if this because I have so much info on it or what but I don’t have time for that. If it were not for that I would give it 5 stars.

title: Complicated
body: I was in love with this app, but it’s been changed so that I can no longer enter accurate numbers to accompany the measurements—for example, 1/3 cup. I can choose “cup” but the smallest number is “1”.  This change has made tracking virtually impossible.

title: Finally, the app I’ve been waiting for!
body: If been dying for a food tracking app that doesn’t make me track calories.(#CarbsNotCalories!) This is it! I’ve been using this app for a week and still haven’t found any foods missing from the huge database. This app is great.

title: Easy to use.
body: Of all the apps out there I have found this one to be the beat. It’s east to use, keeps all information in one app. Love the notification of amount of carbs left, this way you don’t have to dig through the app looking for the information.

title: Love this App
body: This is by far the most comprehensive Keto App. You can set your Macros for any type of Low carb program or customized program. It has a lot of information when you first start of on a keto lifestyle. You can because a Keto Wiz with this App. As a premium user I find all my info in one App.

title: Best Results I’ve seen from an App
body: ☝🏾1 week down 4 lbs.  You don’t understand.  Weight fluctuation is my middle name.  This app is gold and I highly recommend.  User friendly and simple to create a log.

title: Good, but a few bugs
body: I really do love this app. It’s helped a ton getting started on the Keto Diet. But one thing is a big challenging is the weight tracking and Apple Health integration. If I enter my weight in this app, it doesn’t sync to Apple Health. If I enter my weight in Apple Health, it makes each weigh-in at 12:00am in the app. For multiple weigh-ins a day, it really doesn’t work well.

title: The Help I Needed!
body: I have been doing low carb for 1 1/2 yrs and went KETO a few months ago. I was just guessing then but now I am TRACKING! This App makes it so easy to see your macros in real time and makes dieting so much easier! JUST TRY IT! You will love how easy it is to use and to lose the body fat! ❤️

title: Restaurants
body: It would be great if there was a tab to search for common types of foods (ieMexican, Italian, etc.) or common and national restaurants. It is difficult having to go back and forth what a menu states and what the nutritional values are. What the website offers just doesn’t cut the ease of use and deciding where to go.

title: Why change a good thing?
body: Absolutely LOVED this app and lost 50 pounds, but I made the mistake of updating to the newest version. I'm literally in tears. This app has been such a big part of my pathway to wellness and now you have months of my data held hostage by wanting me to purchase a "premium" edition. Thanks a lot.
response: Hi there, sorry for the problem! Firstly, congratulation on the tremendous success with this app. Regarding the upgrade prompt: Please go ahead and do a hard restart of the app. If you've been using the app for a while it should not require a Premium upgrade to continue logging. This was a glitch. If this is working for you, would you consider updating your review so we know you're back up and running? Thanks!

title: LOVE
body: Love this app I used another popular one for years and now it constantly crashes I haven’t been able to log food for days so searching for a new one for low carb and this one right here is the best! I should have looked for a new app along time ago. Thank you!

title: Love it!!
body: I have only been using this a few days but, it absolutely keeps me on track when I think about a bite of something “high carb”. With the extensive variety of foods, I can look up any food to make better choices for staying on-track.

title: Seriously awesome!!
body: This has been the biggest help so far to keeping me on track with my Carb count!!  Not only that, but it also keeps track of my water intake and my weight loss!  I LOVE being able to scan my food instead of having to search for them. AWESOME app!

title: Need to cancel
body: Somehow I got signed up for a year and I did everything to try to cancel but I COULD NOT!!!!  I want to try it for 3 months!!!  Please help me before I have to go to my credit card and cancel there!! I am definitely willing to try it for three months.
response: Hi there, and thanks for your review! The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: Fasting calculator is off update 3/15
body: Please fix the fasting goals. The calculation makes absolutely no sense.
response: Hi there - we hear you and understand that change can be difficult! Many users grew very accustomed to the previous version, and this is a big adjustment. We've recently pushed several fixes live, so make sure your app is updated in the app store. If you're having specific issues please reach out to Support in-app via Settings → Help & Support.

title: Updates
body: It’s a great app. I would say one of the best I have used. I do the premium version, to take advantage of the recipes and extra features. However, since the latest update, it has been very slow and sometimes won’t find the food Im looking for, which i know was previously there.

title: Used to be great ... but not since the update
body: I used to love using this app but I hate it since the “update”. If I could get my money back for my current subscription, I’d do it in a heartbeat. Never again. I don’t know how the app has close to a 5 star rating when everyone in my keto groups on social media hate it. Most say they wouldn’t have paid to subscribe the way it is now. Looking for a different app that is more user friendly and less time consuming than this app is now.
response: We hear your frustration—our developers are working around the clock to fine-tune the new version. We’re fixing those glitches as fast as we can. We also understand millions of users grew familiar with the old app, and this is a big adjustment. We appreciate you chose us for your healthy eating journey, and hope you give us another shot.

title: I regret updating
body: The old interface wasn’t perfect but it worked well enough. Now I can’t find anything, and I’m forced to sift through community entries and “premium” options just to find my own stuff.
response: Hi there - thanks for your feedback. We hear you and understand that change can be difficult! Many users had grown very accustomed to the previous version. Rest assured that we're continuing to tweak and improve the updated version of the app. If you have specific questions or issues don't hesitate to reach out in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: Why?
body: The new app is terrible. I couldn’t sign in, lost all my information and it could not be more cumbersome.  Searching foods is a chore.  Setting my account back up was a chore and I still can’t get it correct.   There are numerous reviews pointing to the same issues which makes many of us wonder how this update/do over was ever released without a great deal more testing.
response: Hi Ykckby - Thanks for sharing your thoughts! The good news is that all of those issues are easily fixable. Your information isn't lost! We'd be happy to help you sign into your original account that still has all of your info. We've made tweaks to food search based on customer feedback in the past few days; if you're still having trouble with it (or anything else!), please reach out to our support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: Accountability!
body: I love this app as it keeps me accountable. All I have to do is be committed to logging, and I can see progress in every area on this app. PS: I’ve NEVER felt better about purchasing the premium/pro. Woah! The support and TONS of extra features were absolutely worth it! Thank you! 🥰

title: Lose weight and eat more
body: I thought if I just reduce my carbs and ate lots of protein I would lose weight. That didn’t work. I didn’t realize it was a balance of carbs, proteins, and fats. This app will get you were you want to be. I’m actually eating more and losing weight. I love my results!!!!

title: So easy
body: I absolutely LOVE this app. It really takes the work out of dieting. The only thing I have to do is be mindful of what I eat and log it in the app, carb master does the rest. It calculates the macros and it’s easy to look and see how I’ve done for the day. Anyone that is dieting should try this app!

title: Not working & is not consistent
body: I bought the premium & used it for a couple of weeks & now all it keeps saying is internet not available. All my other apps are working so I know it’s not the case. Also I had a food entered from a previous day & go to select that same entry & all of the grams of that food are gone. This is very frustrating & I don’t even know if I’ve had it for a month. I even looked to see if there was an update I missed. Can you fix this or help me????
response: Hi and thanks for sharing your experience. Sorry to hear you've run into som loading issues on your device, and we definitely want to check out what may be occurring. Please reach out to us in-app by selecting Settings-"Need help?" so we can sort it out as well as troubleshoot the missing Macros you encountered . Thanks!

title: Worth paying for
body: I use this app and it just keeps getting better.  Love all the things I can track. Only thing I would like to see is for it to connect to more things like sleep and fasting so that I don’t have to manually enter those. Love, love, love this app!

title: Super easy
body: I love this app! Where do I begin?!? This app has been so helpful in regards to my weight loss journey. The app is extremely user friendly. It keeps me on point and it actually keeps me motivated just because I look forward to my journal entries! Hands down best tracking app!

title: User friendly, but buggy.
body: First off, I want to say that this app did as advertised. It is an efficient way to manage your intake. The UI works well, and it is easy to navigate.
response: Hi, and thanks for sharing your experience and review. We're sorry to hear you've run into some loading issues on your phone app, and we definitely want to help. Please message us in-app or email us at support@carbmanager.com so we can check it out and help sort out the problem. Thanks!

title: Great app so far
body: I started a week ago and I especially love how it has many useful features on the free version. They actually work and have helped keep me on track with my Keto journey. Also, I've learned new things about my keto journey just by using this app. It's fantastic.

title: Would recommend to anyone doing keto
body: Great app! I tried another app once before and it wasn’t near as helpful. The scan feature saves a lot of time logging my foods. When shopping I can easily scan snacks to see if they fit under keto if I’m unsure

title: Great app
body: This app makes managing the keto diet a breeze.  Incredible database of foods to input into your daily intake.  It is so good, that I am considering going to the paid model just to reward the developers, even though I don’t need anything more than I get from the free app.  Highly recommend this app.

title: Chicks
body: Carb Manager has changed my life and I highly recommend the Premium version. I plan my meals with Carb Manager to easily stay within my macros. I had been manually tracking for Keto but found out I was not being thorough enough. Truly amazing to let this app do the work for me!

title: Finally!
body: This is a near-perfect app for keto or low-carb dieters. The in-app purchases are optional, but they give you so much for free already! From the alphabetized personal favorites list to the insanely fast scanner, this app is a dream come true. Extremely easy and user-friendly, too. Thank you so much!

title: Reduces the stress of wondering.
body: A great way of keeping track of how many carbs I have had.   And the food list is huge, I have never searched for anything and not found it on that list.  Helps a lot with meal planning.  I feel it has helped make this WOE a lot easier.

title: Love what the app can do but it Makes my phone freeze
body: I bought the premium membership and it really helps me track my macros...BUT IT MAKES EVERYTHING ON MY PHONE FREEZE.  I have to uninstall it to do anything on my phone then download it every time I need to record my food. Please fix this!
response: Thanks so much for sharing your experience! We'd love to check out your account and offer help to improve loading issues. Please reach out to us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" and we'd love to help. Thanks!

title: Lost 38 pounds
body: The app makes the diet easy and fun. You can plan out the day or wing it before each meal regardless it has large library making it easy to to meet your goals. Been on the diet for two weeks with no problems. Feeling the benefits already.

title: Great
body: I tried Keto and it wasn’t fully for me but low-carb is. This app is so easy to track your food no matter what diet you are on. They have so many foods pre-loaded and with the scanner it is super easy to scan anything you can’t find. Highly recommend!

title: Cut Carbs
body: Carb manager is a wonderful tool that has helped me stay on point. I know my carb allowance and calorie count for the day. I’m able to create my menu for each meal and snack and not be fearful of blowing my diet. And, I’m enjoying the planning process, manipulating foods to stay within my carb and calorie budget. I love it!

title: Awesome app!
body: I love Carb Manager! Super easy to use and SO helpful. I’m on the Keto diet so every macro is important. The grading system alerted me to 2 products I was using that weren’t good for me! Thank you Carb Manager! I just found you last week but you already help me break a plateau. 40lbs down in 2 months as of today🥰👏👏👏

title: Works!
body: I’ve been really enjoying using the app to track all my food, exercise and water.

title: Wow this app is amazing!!
body: As someone who has always struggled to gain weight, this app is very useful and unlike none I have seen before. Just enter your goal of how many calories you want to eat whether it be for loss or gain and after every meal or snack log it in and boom done super easy!

title: Loved it until...
body: Loved this app until they limited me to just a few entries a day. Each edit is a new entry, so if you want to change from cups to ounces, you’ve used two entries.
response: Hi there, thanks for getting in touch. There is an option to purchase unlimited entries for a one-time fee, without any subscription. Please go to Go Premium and look for the gray "Unlimited Logging" button. Thanks!

title: Love it!  Thank You, Thank You, Thank You!
body: This is the first diet app I have found that totally suits my needs.

title: So happy
body: I’ve never written an app review (that I can remember anyway) but I have to for this one. They’ve done an amazing job! I’ve used so many different diet counter apps and this one is as good, if not better than, all of them. I splurged for the paid version but it’s worth it. Love the recipes!!

title: Very motivational
body: I've been using the app far a little over a week now. And so far it not only helps me keep track of what I'm eating but it motivates me to eat the right things. I'm learning so much about what goes into my body. I'm going to start exploring the meal planer section next.

title: Love hate relationship
body: I love this app but ever since I purchased the subscription, the app keeps crashing. When I search for food or when I go to log food, the screen goes white and I have to close it and restart. Getting frustrating and I think I’ll go back to the free version after it expires in a month.

title: Works better than advertised
body: After a short introduction period and use it is simple works well and is accurate

title: Favorite Recipe Problem
body: While I love this app and have paid to enjoy the premium which offers recipes - I am struggling to find my favorite recipes after I have put a heart on them.  I have had the app for quite a while and it used to work perfectly. Please advise the easiest way to find my favorites recipes!

title: Good but slow
body: I tried this app for a couple of weeks and it worked well. It would freeze sometimes when overloaded or I went too fast but I just closed the app and reopened it and it worked fine. It was quite slow when inputting anything or really doing anything at all on the app. Again, it’s a good app just really slow.
response: Hi Michael - We hear you and we're listening! We're continuing to make updates to the app, and a fix for the speed issues that some users are experiencing is one of our top priorities. If you have any additional feedback on the app update, we'd love to hear it! Please write us at support@carbmanager.com.

title: Decent app
body: I really like this app, but after using some others I have a few suggestions that would make this app even better if incorporated. Can we get a multi-add feature? Adding foods/ingredients one at a time can become really cumbersome. Also it would be great to be able to add a meal/recipe I’ve created and remove ingredients once added to my daily log.
response: Hi and thanks for the feedback and review! A muti-add feature is a great idea, and something we're currently working on, so stay tuned! Also, you can make edits to your foods/recipes at any time, even after having logged them. Message us in-app and we can share how. Thanks

title: Previous Review has Disappeared
body: Updating to latest version has dumped my data, and even though I have been a subscriber the last couple of years, my email no longer appears to be valid in their system, so no way to login or even request a reset of my password.
response: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. Please contact our support team at support@carbmanager.com and they’ll be happy to assist!

title: SO EASY!!!
body: I was using MFP, but Carb Manager is SOO MUCH better! The free version is simple to learn and you get A LOT of features! I am absolutely crazy about this app! Doing Keto is a breeze! I know EXACTLY where I am everyday! I can even plan and plug in tomorrow’s food in advance, then delete if I don’t eat it! Makes hitting targets and limits easy-peasy! LOVE CM! 😁

title: Easiest app ever
body: I am new to keto and this app is making it so easy to keep track and make decisions based on macros. It has a lot of abilities so definitely take your time and go through it thoroughly.  I really like how it translates the data into charts. I am down 5 lbs week one!

title: Totally recommend this app!!!
body: Being new to a low carb diet and trying to find all the right foods is challenging and can be discouraging BUT this app has put me on a great path to success , I don’t have to over think anything and I find many of the foods I love in the AWESOME food search...great tool!!!

title: Easy to use
body: I did modify my allowances a bit until I get better at it but only a little. Foods are easy to find, add and I also add my steps from pedometer and weight each day. One week in, I’m down 6lbs..... fingers crossed but today I’m motivated to keep going and reduce allowances.

title: Too soon to tell?
body: I would love to give this 5 stars but I find the shopping list feature frustrating, mostly because the recipe to meal planning to shopping list generation workflow aren’t as eloquent as I would like.
response: Hey there, and thanks for sharing your experience. We'd love to dive a little deeper and share how to make the best use of our Meals Plans and Shopping Lists! Just reach out in-app, and we can share how. We're also happy to announce we're in the process of revamping these features now, and you should expect to see this new and improved very soon. Thanks again!

title: Just What I Need!
body: Love this app.  I want to simply keep track of carbs - I don’t need all the extras most apps have.  With this app I can customize it to suit my needs.  It has a ‘diabetic carbs’ option which is perfect.

title: Great app
body: This app is simple to use and has every food that exists in the program for simple macro counts. Even generics, store brands, and store deli meats come up in the search. I am technologically challenged and can navigate this app easily. I enjoy the confetti after logging in my macros for a job well done!

title: Very easy to use!
body: This app is fantastic. It’s easy to add foods, edit, copy, or move meals if need be. Also the scan feature is fantastic! It’s so easy to add ingredients. There are user recipes and they are listed right there in the app! This app has been VITAL to my success and tracking carb, fat, and protein intake.

title: Been using this less than a week
body: I’ve been using this for less than a week and I’m already finding myself making better food choices and I’ve already lost 2 pounds. I’m not doing Keto, but it’s still very helpful.

title: Easy to use
body: I am new to Carb Manager.  I have used other programs but I find this one very user friendly and easy to use.  I also love the access to the menus and they many are not complex or time consuming.  I will provide another update in 3 months.

title: Works well
body: I’ve been using the app for a week. It’s relatively intuitive to use and the database seems very robust. The reason I only gave three stars is that a very large portion of the features require a premium membership, whereas other trackers I’ve used, such as MyFitnessPal, include those features for free. I’d rather see a couple of ads and be able to link my Fitbit and see my micronutrients.

title: All you need in one place
body: Excellent app... allows you to scan barcode and gets the nutrition info.. all you need to do is in mention the amount you consumed. Also... has inbuilt diet plans with detailed recipes for lunch breakfast dinner and snacks... best feature is you can link it with fitbit

title: Great app for counting carbs!!
body: I’m new to counting carbs and was hesitant to use an app thinking it would be cumbersome. A little time up front with some of my fave recipes and it’s so easy!! You will be surprised where all the hidden carbs are and how fast they creep up. The scanner works great too! I’m very happy with this app.

title: Excellent Tool
body: This app is a must if you are doing a Keto lifestyle change. It has the best tracking system I’ve found, along with a great visual graphic pie to show your daily Macros. I would love the ability to add yesterday’s meal with one swipe, but other than that, it really helpful app.

title: Most useful application
body: Use it several times a day, has been extremely useful to keep track of my eating.

title: Too many templates
body: I would like to be able to delete past templates and only keep a rolling two weeks.  I don’t want to review data from months past.  I’m sure there are other users who like to keep past months but I want the option not to.  Customer Service at Carb Manager tells me it can’t be done.  Other than that the program is okay.

title: Incredible
body: I really like this app. It has helped me to keep track of my macros and calories. One of the main things that I like is that it has a diverse list of products including meets, produce and vegetable. Also, I’m able to write and record voice notes.

title: Refund requested. Not worth it
body: I got this for a month and had issues all month. Database is incorrect on many foods macros and not having them on file. Server issues several days this month. Also i find that the computation for macros is inaccurate. Im unable to override the calories or macros to what I know should be accurate for myself. I got my refund and am returning to “my fitness pal”. The only upside to CM features was it allows us to track net carbs vs total.  Its not worth the hassle of everything else.

title: Very easy to use
body: I do not like “recording “ food intake even knowing this is the best way to track calories and carbs.  This app makes it easy and has a wide variety of options to choose from I have been using it for a week and love it so far

title: Foods Won’t Upload
body: I just downloaded this app and I was so excited because it has features that a previous app I used didn’t have. However I need help because none of the recipes or food I’m trying to download is working. It keeps saying “Network Error.” I’ve tried to use the app using WiFi as well as cellular data. I’ve looked at help articles on the website and all. Can someone help me because I really want this app but I’m not going to pay for features I can’t use.

title: Big help
body: As a beginner this app has been my go to for figuring out what I am doing.  I like that I can at a glance see how my macros are.  It’s easy to use the food adding part.  They offer your choices in many amounts unlike other apps I tried.  I highly recommend this app!

title: Good app
body: My Only issue is the load time sometimes it takes forever to load or I’ll have to open it close it then reopen it before it will actually load. The app has certainly helped me lose weight and stay committed to my diet.

title: Good but needs a few things
body: App is good ! Some food items have wrong  macros but you can’t expect 100% from the app and also I would like to see dark theme mode added please the white is hard to look at at night times

title: Super app
body: We used a different app when we started keto and paid $66 each! We read the reviews on Carb Manager and decided to purchase the premium package! Look no more, this is it. It has anything and everything you’ll need to succeed, thank you guys

title: App isn’t fully functional
body: I paid for premium and the app is super glitchy. Premium things you pay for such as meal planning time out and you can’t save your progress. I contacted developers twice and they’re response was to use the web version, it’s their busy season (?). I paid for the app not to use your website. If anything your app should be more functional for me than free users. Just my opinion.
response: Hi, and thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Since you posted it, many fixes and improvements have been implemented by our Development Team. If you have any questions or continuing issues, please reach out to us directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. We are very happy to assist! :)

title: Very impressed
body: I can find most of the foods that I eat including from chain restaurants, just found out you can log your workouts too. Pretty impressive little app that is making me want to go premium to connect to my Apple Watch

title: Horrible update
body: I’ve been using this app as a premium user for a long time and previously loved it. There are sooo many issues with this latest update. Recipes that I created over the years are gone. Many foods that I saved are gone. You can no longer add foods from a recipe individually. So many more issues. Come on developer, this was not ready for prime time. I’ve invested so much time in this app until now so I’m hopeful that you push an update to fix all this stuff soon.
response: Hi Meepersmonkey! Thanks so much for that feedback and for your support as a Premium member. What you're seeing isn't typical for the app update, and we'd love the opportunity to get this resolved for you. Rest assured that all of your recipes and saved foods can be restored. Please reach out to our friendly support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support, and be sure to reference your app store user name. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Takes the guessing away.
body: This app just makes eating a low carb diet of any sort much easier. Being able to see how much fat I’m eating as well as protein makes it so I can easily achieve my goals with getting healthier and losing this quarantine jiggle!

title: Mass “copy” would be nice
body: When copying meals of the day from one day to another, you can only do one at a time. It’d be nice to be able to just transfer a whole days meal plan to multiple days. Also, when you do copy, it takes you to the day you copied over to. I don’t want to do this. Since I can’t mass copy, I have to go back and find that day again.
response: Hi there, and thanks for the review and suggestion! If you have any questions about copying meals or food items from one day to the next, please reach out to our awesome Support Team at support@carbmanager.com, and they will be happy to assist you!

title: Downloaded then deleted.
body: I’m looking for a simple app to track my carb intake. I downloaded this app then began the set up process until I reached a dead end demanding I purchase their service.
response: Hey there! Thanks for your feedback. Our core app is free and always will be. In fact, we don't offer a trial of our Premium, because we always let our users choose for themselves. Many of our users reach their goals without ever upgrading to Premium. Our Premium version is there for users who want access to advanced features like fitness device integrations, premium recipes, and more, but both versions find success stories!

title: So helpful
body: Sometimes there are hidden carbs in things I thought were low carb. I love being able to put a recipe in to confirm it is actually low carb and the scanner is really helpful at the store so I don’t have to spend too much time reading labels.

title: Best Keto Tracking App
body: There are no words to express how much I love this app.  It provides so much useful information and is super easy to use.  The databases are vast and if it what you are looking for isn’t there you can add it!  Customer Service is awesome!!!  I’d give this app 10 stars if I could!!

title: What’s not to love
body: I can’t say enough about this app. I have the premium version and it is worth every penny. It tracks everything and makes it super easy to know where adjustments should and could be made. It’s super motivating and very user friendly.

title: Barely functional after iOS 14 update
body: The app has not loaded since updating to iOS 14. I get a “still loading” error message. Tried on an iPhone 11 Pro & an iPad Pro with the same result. Clicking ‘reload’ just returns the same error and clicking ‘cancel’ stops it from trying. Can’t get in to the support section of the app since it won’t load.
response: Hi there! Thanks for leaving us a review! Apple just released a bug fix, 14.0.1. If you're still experiencing issues after downloading the most recent iOS update, please email us at support@carbmanager.com and we are happy to assist you with some further troubleshooting!

title: Great App!
body: It’s the easiest way to track my carb count and more. It also tracks your fat, protein and calories. I get all I need from using the free app. The only reason I would upgrade is to sync it up with my Apple Watch to most accurately and easily track my exercise.

title: Major reason I have stayed on keto
body: This app has been a lifesaver for me! It has been 32 years since I have lost any weight although I’ve desperately needed to do so the entire time. Lost 10 pounds in first month! This app makes everything so unbelievably simple and that is a huge timesaver which translates to ease of staying on keto.

title: Great app for Gestational Diabetes
body: Great app to track carbs. You can even change to track “diabetes carbs”. I tried for a week and then upgraded to Premium so I could track my Glucose Meter readings (Blood Sugar Levels). This will help me identify which foods are making my blood spike. So critical for the safety of my baby.

title: Keto Best
body: I have used this site to track my macros & weight loss progress for 9 months.  It is super easy & helps me keep track of all my health data.

title: Uughhh frustrated user so far...!
body: I immediately subscribed for the 3 months Premium and wanted to get started right away with meal planning and grocery list, spent 45+ minutes trying to figure out how to do that~finally figured it out then made the mistake of logging out and now it takes me back to the FREE version ONLY every time I sign in!  Hopefully customer service will get back to me soon and I can change this rating!
response: Thanks for sharing your experience. If you haven't already, please reach out to us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" and we'd be happy to help. Mostly likely you've accidentally logged into a duplicate account, but it's an easy fix. Cheers!

title: Awesome app.   Does so much
body: I just downloaded this yesterday.  It figures you macros, tracks your daily intake, provides wonderful step by step with pictures recipes and generates daily, weekly, or monthly reports. As your weight goes down it automatically generates new macro amounts.  I’m so impressed.

title: Microphone
body: I want to understand this a little better. Why would I want to do certain things the screen for to buy premium comes on. Why is it you cannot use the microphone to say what you were eating? And I don’t have time or the patience to measure everything out exactly so a lot of the stuff makes it hard to add food. Just as bad as doing weight watchers

title: Lifesaver!!!
body: Wasn’t doing too well before started tracking my carbs fats and proteins to find out exactly what I was putting in my body every day. Carb Manager is awesome and I’ve lost weight since using it and I scan my food (the barcode) which makes it so super easy!!!

title: Inconsistent
body: My wife and I are both using the app for keto. It works great and is a great way to keep yourself in check. The only problem is we can eat the same exact thing (food type, amount, etc) and the macros on her app would be different than mine. For some reason mine is more on par with the nutrition labels and hers is off. If it wasn’t for that then this app would be perfect.

title: Top notch
body: I just started a Keto diet a week ago and was looking for an app to help me. I tried a few, but this one stands out above the rest. Easy to use and a pretty good database for looking up things. I would highly recommend this app for this kind of diet. I can’t say enough good things.

title: Walking
body: I wish I could add my phone as a step counter to the app without having to pay. I am ok with adding a fit or other device. But the app is here because of my phone. I wish they would allow steps to be counted from that.

title: Perfect for me!
body: Never consistently monitored my food intake until finding this incredible product. I’m two weeks in, and the visuals/feedback/analysis provided by this product have greatly helped me to consume <25 carbs each of those days.

title: Best carb counter available
body: This app is genius and is so user friendly. I love that I have a one stop place to track my progress, search for recipes, chat and share ideas. Upgrade to the full package if you can, well worth every penny in a quest for better health.

title: Key Motivator
body: I have known I was over my desired weight for a long time and felt the Keto program would work best. I was fed up, but did nothing.  Then a friend installed the Carb Manager App on my phone.  This app alone gave me the guidance I needed and motivation to stay within the Keto daily guidelines.  I highly endorse it!

title: Great app, but suddenly I have to set a password?
body: I have been using Carb Manager for 3 months now and I really like it.  Unfortunately, today it started locking me out, telling me I must set a password.  I’m in the app way too many times each day to want to enter a password every time I go in it.  Is there any way this can be avoided?

title: Easy and comprehensive!
body: I downloaded this app one week ago and it made starting my Keto diet so much easier! I love the scan function and that it saves my past entries for easy adding next time. I’m already down four pounds. Love it and plan to keep using it.

title: Great app, but ...
body: I love this app and will continue to use it. However, in order for it to sync with my Apple Watch data, I have to log out of the app on all of my devices at least once a day, and no, the app doesn’t support TouchID. A small annoyance, but if you forget to do it and a day or more passes, those missed days are not synced.

title: Best Macro Tracker!
body: I’ve been trying to lose weight for years. I’ve tried every fitness and food intake tracker there is. So far, this one is my absolute favorite! For someone who is new to tracking macros, like me, this is a GREAT tool to learn about the things you’re putting in your body. I love it!

title: Love it BUT
body: I simply love the app and recently bought their premium membership. Very easy to use and best visuals I have seen yet. Have been trying to work on the meal planner and the import URL function and somehow the macros generated with it seems off. Also the entire recipe at times does not get imported. Please  look into it and fix the issue.

title: Great app easy to use
body: I gladly offered up a few dollars for unlimited food logging. Such an easy place to look at all my macros. I don’t use it for everything yet but I have been in Keto since I have been making sure my net carbs stay under 20 with this app.

title: Easy and beneficial
body: This app does a great job in helping you track your net carbs. It also provides recipes and meal plans at your fingertips when you upgrade. However, the free portion is plenty helpful and does a great job tracking carbs, calories etc.

title: I’ve tried them all
body: I’ve tried almost all keto and regular tracking apps.  For keto, this is my favorite. I love the new design... without the new design I was looking for other cleaner looking apps, but since the update I’m here to stay.  Premium is worth it as well.

title: First Timer
body: First time using this app just started out but truly amazed at how many items are already stored from every day grocery items to specific food dishes from restaurants really awesome so happy I found it can’t wait to delve into it further!

title: Best Carb App Counter!
body: I have literally tried over 10 different apps and this one is truly the best! Easy to follow, easy to understand and delicious recipes. I am a very visual person and this has helped me so much because it makes sense to me with the pie chart and easy slide tabs!

title: Awesome app
body: This app has everything you need to stick to a low carb diet! I imagine it would work for other diets as well. The database is huge in premium and I would recommend it. Well worth the price since all the hard work is already done, haha.

title: Kicks me off
body: I love this app (I would give 5 stars) but, this is the second time that I have tried to use my carb manager and have been told I have no account. Every time I try to put in my password and email it goes back to create an account. I’ve been using this app for a year and a half and now I’ve lost all my data for the second time.
response: Hi GrammaEs - Thanks for reaching out. Your data isn't lost! It looks like you may have accidentally created a new account. Our support team would be more than happy to help you get access to your original account. You can contact them at support@carbmanager.com. With the NYE holiday, please allow up to 24 hours for a response. Cheers!

title: Game Changer
body: I had been struggling with Keto not knowing what I was doing wrong. Then I found this app. I calculated my food for the day and realized I was eating twice as many calories  than I needed, mainly in protein. I lost four pounds my first week using this app and I have more confidence in what I am doing.

title: Need help
body: I think the premise of the app is great, but there’s some big thing frustrating me.  I purchased the premium subscription because you can import recipes, however I am unable to import a single recipe from Diet Doctor’s website.  I would also like to be able to import my exercise activity from Beach Body in the same manner.... but I can’t do that either. 😩

title: Great App!
body: Just been using for a week and really like it!  Super fast to scan foods, make recipes and track everything.  Also great that I can share with my family do when I make up a re joe we all eat-they have the details right away.

title: Amazing
body: I absolutely love this app. It makes tracking all of my food a breeze. I’ve tried other apps before and never really stayed with it because they are cumbersome to use and require lots of manual effort. The design and intuitive nature of this app are flawless.

title: Very detailed
body: I’m diabetic and need a low carb plan.  I was glad to have found this one.  It took awhile to understand the meaning on net carbs and also deciding on what plan I should follow but after that I really like it.  Love the scanner and ability to talk to phone on food selection.

title: Good app but...
body: I like this app a lot, but the fact that they want you to go premium just to connect a Fitbit is stupid.  I don’t need any of the other features premium offers but connection to a device.  I’d pay a one time fee for that but not a large monthly fee.  That is the only reason I’m going with the Atkins app, which is not as nice in my opinion but works with my Fitbit for free. ☹️

title: Just started Keto and love this app!!
body: I love the option of scanning foods and bam! Most of the time it is in the app and it gives you all the info you need. So far I love everything about it. Well, maybe add for cardio and exercise options as not all the machines I use are listed.

title: FINALLY! The perfect app!
body: I’ve tried to go keto and have always looked for something to make it more simple. I could never find anything to spell it out for me. There is so much to keep track of and it can get very overwhelming. This app makes it so simple! What a lifesaver! ❤️

title: One big complaint
body: The only thing I dislike is the app is difficult to navigate because the view is so large I can’t push the x to close the app or navigate between foods and daily log because on my new iPhone 11 is right under the clock. I can find no way to make it smaller so I’m frustrated. I have to tap the darn thing about fifty times. 😡

title: Best App I’ve Ever Used
body: Makes my meal planning so easy. Keeps me extra accountable and thus disciplined. Extremely helpful for weight loss or muscle building. I eat healthy but after using this app for only a week I’ve already seen and felt a huge change to my body.

title: Excellent for Starting Keto!
body: I am one week in on my Keto diet. My first day I exceeded my goals by double. It stinks but this app has allowed me to look up foods and learn what works best to stay on track. I am only a few days in but I am loving it and feel great already. I plan on using this for a long time.

title: Unsure of this app
body: I started using this app to track my food intake for the keto diet. I eventually purchased the app so I can have access to the unlimited amount of keto recipes to help with my success. I’m noticing that the recipes are not all low carb. And the recipes that have bread in them don’t give the recipe for the bread, so is that really a low-carb recipe?  I’m so confused.
response: Hey there, thanks for getting in touch. To narrow the recipe search to very low carb items, please tap the "More" button and use the carb slider to only search for recipes below a certain threshold of carbs. Hope this helps!

title: I love carb mngr!
body: I absolutely love car manager! I can look at a glance at the pie chart that shows your quantity of fat protein and carbs. It’s very easy from day today to add items from the previous day by just copying them. Plus I love that I can scan a product and get the exact amounts!

title: Words cannot express!
body: How much I love this app ❤️ I am a diabetic following a keto diet and this app has everything I need. I love the fact I can track everything from blood sugar, weight, bmi, carbs, fat, etc. The developer really put time and energy into this I couldn’t succeed without it.

title: Great app—major glitch
body: I love the app and its tracking capabilities! My only complaint is that it crashes regularly (like every few days). When it does that it goes to a white screen and the only way I’ve found to get out of that is to delete and reinstall. Gets pretty frustrating.

title: Wish there was Comparison on one page
body: There is just one thing I would change about the ap. I would love it if there was a comparison on one page for your actual daily intake VS goal. Otherwise it has really helped me be aware of my ratios.

title: Keto Game Changer
body: I hit a plateau with my weight loss even though I was eating all low carb and keto foods. I decided to strictly count my carbs to make sure I was < 20 per day. This app makes it really easy to count and stay on track. I have been back in ketosis and lost 3 pounds in 5 days thanks to this app.

title: Needs more details in food search
body: I’ve been using this app for a week, and so far I find it to be pretty helpful. My one complaint is that it takes so long to log meals. I wish there was a way to see the details, ingredients not just nutritional value, when searching for food.

title: A Must On Keto
body: This app is a must have if you’re trying Keto for the first time or even if you’re doing it as a lifestyle. I love the ability to scan the majority of the foods I eat to see if they will work on my plan. Only a week of Keto and using the app and I’m already down 9 pounds.

title: Wrong numbers
body: The numbers aren’t adding up right, I put all this food in for the day and it’s only reading a small number of calories which isn’t right and I’ve tried restarting the app so must be a glitch

title: Don’t do Keto without it!
body: Great app. It has helped me figure out my macros and includes some wonderful recipes. I recently had an issue with the app when I transferred it to new phone (user error) and support responded within 24 hours and solved the problem.

title: Wish they had better food dietary info.
body: Love the app, i only wish that the food items you scan were actually accurate instead of having to search and modify the nutritional info. I’m happy at least we can modify the important macros at least.

title: Love the app but... I can not log anything
body: I’ve been using the app for about a week. I love how convenient it is and how easy.. but this past few days it’s been slow starting and I’m not able to search or log any of my foods. And then my email said free gift and when I clicked on the ultimate keto guide the web page just kept loading.
response: Hi there, and thanks for your review! The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: Macros and recipes
body: Learning my way around Carb Manager and I find listing my own receipts a little daunting.  Can you make this process a little easier?  Also, I would like to adjust my Macros ratio myself but whenever I make one adjustment it automatically changes to others to numbers I don’t want.

title: Why fix something that wasn’t broken??
body: I’m not really a fan of the new update (2-21) maybe it’ll grow on me but it takes a long time to load and many of the features that I’ve grown used to aren’t there anymore.

title: Used to be good
body: Used the app last year and really liked it help me keep on track. Whatever updates have occurred since then have bogged data entry. Now it is a real pain to use. Very slow to respond, cursor floats on the screen before it lands, can’t close page, had to shut down iPad to try to use again. A useful diet app loads and responds quickly. It shouldn’t take 10 minute to enter breakfast.
response: Hi, and thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Since you posted it, many fixes and improvements have been implemented by our Development Team. If you have any questions or continuing issues, please reach out to us directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. We are very happy to assist! :)

title: I HATE THE UPDATE
body: I don’t know why you all decided to fix something that wasn’t broken, but I thoroughly dislike the new version of Carb Manager. I tried for over an hour yesterday to input a custom recipe and the app wouldn’t allow me to add ingredients. Furthermore the layout, while looking nicer, is no longer concise. I have to post my daily meal plans for my nutrition advisor and what used to take two or three screenshots, now takes 5-6.

title: Access without WiFi
body: I want to use this app. to log my food throughout the day but the app. will not log on without WiFi. I am at work, I don’t want to use the work WiFi but I want to see how I am progressing throughout the day. I cannot log my food until I get home. NOT HELPFUL! I get the “snack logging” reminders but how good is the app if I HAVE to use WiFi! They need to fix this.

title: They messed it up with the “upgrade”
body: The previous version was much better. My biggest problem is logging my most recently used foods. Items keep popping up that I have not used in a long time, as well as repeated items, and, being that there is a limit of items that show up, I have to look the product up all over again. It’s a waste of time and aggravating. You need to revisit this update and consider rolling it back.

title: Latest update removes function, adds fluff.
body: I’m disappointed with the new app update, Feb 2021.   I’ve been using Carb Manager for 2-3 years to tack macros.

title: The Absolute Best App for Keto
body: I tell everyone about this app. From tracking macros (which a lot of apps do) to meal planning and grocery list. It also allows to find recipes and import other recipes off the web. This is a must have if you are doing keto.

title: This has been a game changer!!
body: I have tried and even paid for another app that was difficult to use and didn’t give me this info!  This has helped me to stay on course with keto and see where I need to make changes.

title: I’m still getting the hang of it
body: I have only had the app for a few days, and it was a little complicated at first because I am used to using MyFitnessPal. There are a few things I need to figure out, like how to edit ingredients out of a recipe.

title: Carb Manager changed my Life!
body: I have been using Carb Manager daily since the first week of October, 2019. This is the only food tracking app that has ever worked for me - and keto is the only diet program I’ve ever stuck with - and I am down 45 pounds in six months as proof!
response: Vikki, that's an amazing feat! Congrats on your progress along your Keto journey. Feel free to reach out in-app anytime if we can help with anything. Thanks!

title: Premium Service Paid for not Provided
body: I signed up for premium and was charged for it, but cannot access it. Since there is no support option in the App this is my only option to reach out. When I go to the page to get premium it recognizes I have premium, but still wants me to buy premium to access the features. I tried refreshing - still nothing. This is probably a great app, but I will never know. How can an app not have any support option?
response: Hi there! We do have a support team ready to help. Reach out to us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" You can also email us at support@carbmanager.com. We'll get your Premium activated and set up for you ASAP. Thanks!

title: Highly Recommend
body: Doing a lowered carb diet. Will bridge this to Atkins with intermittent fasting. Considering a future transition into Keto higher protein diet. Customizable food group ratios from this app allow a seamless change from one to the other: 20:40:40, 15:35:50, 10:35:55, 5:35:60. Purchased premium for added convenience. Great app.

title: Just the ticket
body: Didn’t think it was so easy, I’m loosing weight and extremely fast. Down 6 pounds in the first 5 days on Keto and it’s all thanks to tracking my eating with this app. Well made, easy to navigate. Once familiar with the concept, it’s a snap. Thank you!

title: Awesome!
body: Even the unpaid version is awesome! I have a subscription to myfitnesspal and chose to use this instead because MFP was off on some of their nutrients and this is more user friendly. May upgrade to the full version. I have lost 5.5lbs in a week using this on a keto diet!

title: Annoyed
body: Okay, the app LOOKS good, however, as a long time user of MFP I am used to being able to search meals and add that way. The only way to do that on this app is to pay for premium. So, I can’t even really try it out the way I want to without either entering every ingredient individually (which I don’t mind sometimes, but I don’t want to do it all the time). I probably would have paid to try a month. But I am not paying for a year when I don’t know if I actually like the app.
response: Hey there, and thanks for your review! You can add Meals in our free version, as well as add individual ingredients, as you've been doing, if they're not found in our database. Also, we want to point out you can always purchase a 1 month or 3 month subscription of Premium instead of our annual option if you'd like. Message us in-app for more info! Thanks!

title: Helpful breakdowns for Keto
body: Helpful and i like it all in all, but the exercise options/descriptions and calorie breakdowns seem lacking there. Having used other fitness and food tracking apps, there are some style and ease functions I like better on some others, but can’t say I dislike these...

title: Great tool
body: I’m new to Keto and carb counting. It’s hard for my mind to change from counting fat to counting carbs now!  This app is a great help. Easy to track and learn.  I also like how I can customize it.  I have the free version, but I like it so much I plan to get the Pro Version.   Highly recommend

title: It’s all about tools
body: For a successful weight loss journey & life style changes, don’t fight it & go at it alone. This app makes tracking easy & convenient. Love that you can scan labels, make them your favorites & that you can create your own. Easy, easy, easy.

title: Quality
body: Been using the app for 8 days now. The free version not the paid, and I absolutely love it. It tracks food, macros, exercise, and water intake. It has a built in scan tool to scan your barcodes. Truly a great quality app for free to keep you on track.

title: Good but…
body: App has great food library, the ability to create and save recipes, tracking net carbs, fats and proteins, and the ability to search for foids in lots of different ways. BUT, it often loses the ability to connect to the internet which got even worse when I bought the latest iPhone.  The app has been next to useless since. ☹️

title: Bug with anonymous account - fixed
body: Bug with skipping account creation - button disabled.
response: Hello from Carb Manager and thank you for your review. Good news! Thank you for sharing with us your recent experience with using our app. We have corrected this behavior in the app and you're now free to use an anonymous account to track your carbs without making an account. If you need any further assistance, please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username so we can assist further. Thank you!

title: App saying to make sure cellular data is available
body: The app keeps saying still loading.. and it’s telling me to turn my cellular data on for the app, but it’s already on. Tried resetting my phone and nothing. So frustrating!!
response: Thank you for taking the time to review our app! We’re sorry you've experienced a brief period where you were having issues accessing your account. We are happy to report the issue is resolved. Please contact us in-app directly via "Settings - Need Help" and reference your username so we can assist further. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Love the app
body: I love the app but my biggest sore point is that I am unable to share recipes with my husband if he has the app downloaded. If that were fixed it would be a whole lot better. Also the search feature isn’t the greatest... if I can’t scan it it’s not as accurate.

title: Great system to keep yourself accountable
body: I’m not using this app to follow keto, but it’s great to track macros in general. The huge database of foods & different ways to measure what you are eating make it really easy to eat right and try to get everything from the right food groups

title: Kiss My Keto said 👍🏼
body: New to Keto doing great on Keto & excited to be referred to this app. It came highly recommended by Kiss My Keto & app reviews. I needed to start tracking my foods instead of just guessing how close I am to my daily carb limit. In 2 months I’ve lost 35lbs & my A1C went from 8.5 to 7.7. Thanx so much

title: Great App for Keto
body: I’ve been looking for a way to track my macros. I’ve tried other apps, but they seem determined only to count calories.  My brother introduced me to this app.  I love it!!!   It’s easy to use & keep up with daily progress.  I can’t recommend the app enough 😁

title: AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME
body: This APP. is perfect for me.   My A1C just kept climbing and Doctor told me I was pre-diabetic.  I watched my Father travel this same path and don't want to follow.   I've been using for several months and am down 30 pounds.  Very easy to use and follow.   Next A1C will tell the tale.  Hoping back into the 5's where it should be.

title: 12 items per day in free app.
body: You know I live in Europe and as it is I have to manually add everything I eat because 90% of the items I scan are not in your system. Then I get blocked after adding 12 items for the day and am prompted to pay $39 a year for the privilege of adding more than 12 items per day - that I will still have to do manually??? Rip off.

title: Great overall tracker!
body: It takes a little more effort as you first start but then makes tracking your diet, glucose, water intake, exercise and more. Totally worth the monthly charge for premium to have all info in one app plus use of graphs and data analysis

title: Love this app
body: This December I decided to put the Fitbit back to work and I needed a companion app to help me manager and count macros as I embarked on a new journey toward losing weight and a more healthy life.

title: Best Keto App
body: It is soooo hard to stay on track without an app.  This one has the most comprehensive food adding stuff I’ve seen so far.  Your able to take a pic of food or search recipes online and get the carb content.   Nothing else has come close.

title: SmoothSailing
body: I absolutely love this app. It makes it so easy to track carbs, calories, fat intake, fiber and protein and the list of foods to choose from is very extensive. Because of the app, I was able to get into Ketosis in less than a week. Thank you Carb manager for helping me to live healthier!

title: Best Motivator
body: Love this App... Finally feel like I’m getting on top of my health!  Used free app for almost two weeks but it is so good that I feel I will more than recoup the cost of the paid version in weight loss and normal blood sugars!  I signed up and paid happily. Thank you for this huge help!!

title: Amazing tool for keto
body: Used this app to help maximize my keto life change.   It allowed for one place to see food, carbs, protein, apple health data, blood sugars, exercise and keytones.  The database of food is huge and almost always find a match with a barcode.  I think it is a must have app!

title: L
body: I love this app to lose weight. It has recipes to use to keep you in track. The first time i used it i lost better than now. This time i entered in a plateau because i was eating a lot of fat bombs, my fault. But I’ll use it whenever i need to be

title: Don’t like the new version
body: The latest version makes you scroll too much to see your daily log. But the worst part is it takes a long time to load, then says it can’t connect until you retry, then it comes up the second time. This happens almost every time I want to use it. Very frustrating...

title: Love it!
body: Makes controlling my diabetes much easier. Connects with my glucose monitor and my Livongo app which monitors my blood pressure. They are open to suggestions, like also taking the weight measurement from the Livongo and are always quick with responses to my questions

title: Was a 5, now a 1
body: This was the best app for LC/Keto tracking,  was so easy to navigate. Then they updated it in 2/8.  Lost all my saved info fir my recipes and frequent foods, the macros are off on a ton of foods and it so clunky to even understand what you’re looking at or how to add foods.  Why would you upgrade something that was the most highly rated app to this garbage?  Hope the change this back to the way it was.  If it ain’t broke.....  Highly disappointed.  Looking for another app.

title: What a great app!!
body: This is such a great, full-featured app! I highly recommend to all keto friends out there!

title: Horrible update
body: Just give us a list… Everything is so big, it’s like you’ve made it for kindergartners. It doesn’t have to be so flashy and cartoony. I need be able to see a large part of my day on one page and instead I am scrolling and scrolling to see what I’ve eaten that day. It is unusable compared to the previous version.

title: So grateful for this app!
body: I didn’t want to try Keto because of the overwhelming amount of information out there... This app has educated me and been my guiding beacon .. or should I say, guiding BACON! Easy tracking, Yummy recipes, I hate to sound cheesy... (last pun- I promise) but It has been a true game changer !

title: Medical Keto
body: This app is awesome and seems very accurate. My daughter is on the classic medical keto diet for epilepsy and it’s nice to be able to track everything in one app with the ability to send a daily report to her dietician to easily monitor and tweak for changes. Highly recommend!

title: Really useful when starting Keto
body: Great app, and so easy to use! I have been using it for two weeks and upgraded to premium after a few days to find recipes. All I have to say is use it every day, set goals and it does work!

title: Fantastic!
body: This app is exactly what I needed. I bought premium almost immediately. Easy to use and every food I’ve scanned so far has been on file. I’ve already stayed under my carb max for several days now. 100% worth it!

title: Love Carb Manager -
body: This app is so easy to use and the annual fee is pretty darn cheap when you calculate it on a monthly basis.  It links with my Fitbit and you can add notes.  The day I was contemplating a Charleston Chew and I did a quick scan it rated it and it also said “Avoid” in red letters.  I kind of loved that!

title: Great- until last week
