body: Love this app...until about a week ago.  It won’t log anything. It times out and tells me there is no internet connection. I am not having internet connection problems with any other app though. So it is not an internet problem. My husband is also having the same issue.
response: Thanks for sharing your experience. We're happy you're loving the app, and would love to help sort out the issue you're experiencing with your device. Please reach out to us in-app at Settings - "Need help?" so we can lend a hand. Thanks!

title: Best App for Any Diet!
body: Whether you’re doing any version of Keto or simply want to properly keep track of your diet this is the app for you. You can use pre-existing options or create your own, you can even keep track of your meds and/or vitamins.

title: Motivating and easy to use
body: I started eating clean and watching my carbs, sugar and protein intake.  This app makes it so easy and is even enjoyable.  Keeps me focused, “in the moment”, and motivated.  Will most likely upgrade to premium to use with my Apple Watch.  Highly recommend this app.

title: Love it!!
body: I had no idea how poorly I was eating until this app. It has totally transformed the way I eat and gave me what I needed to successfully lose 8 pounds in two weeks without being hungry.  I think it’s an eye-opener for anyone wanting to lose weight even if not doing Keto.

title: Amazing!
body: It’s difficult to track everything but this app does it! Choice of ways to count carbs and premium connects to Fitbit and gives additional help but free app is great, too! Watch for user input that doesn’t match the label but get ready for great results!

title: Simplify
body: This app has taken my healthy eating to the next level. I’ve never quite understood how to count calories or any food intake. This simple does all the work, all you do is enter the type of food/ beverage. I’m heading in the weight lose direction💖

title: You won’t regret it!
body: This app is absolutely amazing! It is perfect for all levels and SO easy to use. A lot of time, energy, and resources have gone into this app. I wish it would sync to my Fitbit as advertised, but steps can be easily added manually.

title: Problem With App Reloading
body: I’ve been using the app since March. I love using it for my new Keto lifestyle. Lately I’ve noticed a slowdown on the app response speed. Frequently, the app fails to load and I have to reload and wait for. Few minutes for the app to load. My iOS device is on the current OS and this happens when I have great WiFi or phone signal. What gives?

title: I love this app
body: I used the Fitbit and app to log all of my exercise and daily food. Then I bought an Apple Watch and needed a new app to log food for my Keto diet. Carb Manager is the perfect app for my needs. I upgraded to premium so that I can retrieve info from my watch. I recommend this app.

title: It works with discipline
body: I find this App to be good
response: Hey Lilian! Thanks so much for the kind words and for the feedback on the scanner. We'll have our dev team look into improving the functionality with very tiny barcodes! As far as the Premium version, you definitely DON'T have to buy it. Most users get to their target weight with just the free version. The entire food database and all food logging features are available for free. Premium is there for users who want advanced features to reach their goals faster. Cheers!

title: Great way to stay on track
body: This is a really program. It really helps you stay on track. I found I don’t miss carbs when I see the weight I’m losing. Only been on the program a week and a half and have lost 2 pounds!

title: Amazing!
body: This is exactly what I was looking for. Add your own recipes or just look up foods. Either way it’s great. It tells you your macro counts and it even break down your food to show you all the info that you would need to know (carbs, fats, protein, iron, vitamins, etc.). Seriously great!

title: Just starting keto and this app helps!!
body: This app is super helpful, I did but the pro version.  So far, absolutely nothing lacking that I can see except for I’ve found I have to double check some entries for food.  I’ve found a couple errors.

title: Excellent app
body: This is an excellent app for keeping track of carbs, proteins, etc. It is user friendly and gives visual presentations of the carbs, proteins and whatever else you track. I especially like the scan option. Works beautifully!

title: Best carb app
body: I started the Keto diet about a month ago but I wasn’t losing, so when I got this app I realized I was eating the wrong foods at times during the day which stopped me from losing.  Now I put everything in and I am doing much better.  It has been so helpful.

title: Needs a few more restaurant items
body: Love this app! Super user friendly and has helped me shed some pounds. Just wish it had a few more items from restaurants...like individual items from restaurants since low-carbers have to order so many things special. Otherwise, it’s fantastic.

title: Awesome
body: I have tried so many calorie counting apps and this one is the best! It is amazing. It is so easy to use, it has every good and little pictures and it breaks down the net carbs. It really is the best, and I get to use it for free! I might pay for premium and sync it with my Fitbit. Thanks for this awesome app!

title: The only app that keeps me 100% keto
body: Super easy to use, TONS-as in MOST- foods available by the scan feature, easy sync for exercises and the health app, recipes, a way to track everything from water to supplements and to see your keto-specific macros in one place. I dig it.

title: Easy to use
body: I am new to Keto so needed help to keep track of what I was eating. After looking at several apps, I found this was the easiest and most informative. It has name brand and fast food to make it even easier!!!  I highly recommend!

title: Best keto app
body: This is the 2nd app I’ve downloaded and by far it’s the best. I love how the app gives you good choice or you’re able to log your own food. This keep track of my carb in take and it makes it super easy to stay on track.

title: The best!
body: If your doing keto this is the best app for you. I rarely ever purchase or subscribe to apps however I didn’t mind the price, because it well worth it. I actually feel my success is keto started here, before this app I was confused and uneducated . Now I’m in ketosis like a pro .

title: Grateful in PNW
body: I used the free version for a year or so. This is my 2nd year of using the premium version and I am so happy I tried it. I have had a lot of success working towards my fitness and nutrition goals using this app. I don’t know what I’d do without it! I seriously love it!

title: Simple, Very helpful
body: Starting something new is always challenging, but this app has made it so much easier to track my macros and feel confident that I’m doing the right thing! Thank you for this effective and efficient tool!

title: New Carb Manager doesn’t work half the time
body: Not pleased with the updated/new interface Carb Manager. The app takes super long to open and occasionally won’t open at all. The import recipe function is not working, and the add food feature via scan is hit or Miss at best.
response: Hi DoraTheExplora - Thanks for reaching out. Most users who are experiencing issues with slow opening or lag are on older versions of the app or of iOS. It looks like you might be on app version 7.0.0. We encourage you to update to the latest version! If that doesn't help, please reach out to our friendly support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: Great app but...
body: I use CM every day and overall it’s great. I really wish “Foods” could be listed alphabetically. Also, I pay for Premium and I do not have an unlimited food list. If the food I eat (and have eaten many times) is not listed automatically in “Foods” in left hand column, I have to manually enter it. It happens a lot.

title: Its okay -  klunky but functional - see notes
body: I was using free version for the start of keto. Felt awesome but searching food is awful. You type in avacado and there’s like 20 avacado by fill in the blank. I have no idea what’s accurate or not. Also it would be better if it synced my work outs and heart rates. I have it permission but none of the data is shared from my watch.
response: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. Please contact our support team at support@carbmanager.com and they’ll be happy to assist!

title: Support?
body: I signed up for premium, but every time I try to enter my foods, I keep getting the screen to sign up for premium and it won’t let me log what I’ve ate. When I try to click a selection, it says I’m already signed up for premium. I haven’t been able to use the app for two days now, and I can’t find a support link anywhere.
response: Hi there, I'm sorry to hear that you are having issues accessing your Premium subscription- we can definitely help with that! You can email us directly at support@carbmanager.com or go to the settings page of the app and tap on the "Help?" button.

title: App
body: Love this app I have premium and it was one of the best purchase I have ever made. I track everything and went from 30+ insulin injections a week to 1 insulin injection a week. I now have my glucose in check.  A1C is 5.0!  This was only after 5 weeks!!!

title: I love this app
body: I have tried many apps for counting carb and calories and they are all so difficult or just too much this one is so simple and a lot of options for food entry makes my life and my weight loss journey so much easier!!!

title: I love this app
body: I have never been good at eating healthy and this app has made it so easy. I’m learning what foods I should and shouldn’t be eating and losing weight has never been easier as long as you log in everything you eat every day.

title: Love this app!
body: So easy to use. I’m not one to track my food. I’ve never actually been able to use a tracker and this one is so easy. I love that I can scan items I want to check/add or I can type it in.

title: Best Application Ever!!!
body: This app is user friendly and I love all the recipes that comes with it. I like having my exercises merge with the app as well. You have everything you need to help you loose weight at your finger tips. The education information is great as well.

title: Best app out for tracking
body: Super easy to use and barcode scanner makes it even better when you second guess yourself well out grocery shopping, highly recommend it.

title: Saving My Life!
body: This app is saving my life, literally.  I have switched to a low carb way of living and this app enables me to track everything that I eat, cook etc.  it helps me to make better decisions about what I am putting in my body.  Highly recommended!

title: Most Satisfying Life Style
body: Keto foods are delicious and satisfying. And having the proper ratio of carbs fats and proteins is essential. Carb Manager allows me to do that so easily. I love managing my daily intake and seeing results in the My Measurements part of this  App. I have lost 45.2 pounds in 5 months and my husband has lost 55!!  Carb Manager is Awesome 😊

title: So far so good.
body: I do think this is worth the 40 bucks/year.  As long as you can afford the shopping list and follow instructions, you could lose many pounds. I have lost 4 in just 2 days but that’s water weight for sure. It is motivating.

title: Great app, only one thing missing
body: Would love to have some sort of fasting measurement tool.  Not a stopwatch thing, just a way to enter when you stopped and started eating. LOVE that I can say my foods and it will look them up and log them. Truly a time saver.

title: Carb struggle made less complicated!!
body: This program has made calculating carbs SO MUCH EASIER!! I LOVE the recipes that allow a person to consume a variety of nutritious foods and then document consumption easily. The macro nutrients are ready to record with complete accuracy with every entry!! Thank you 💕
response: Hello from Carb Manager support! Thank you! We're delighted that you're loving the app, and are glad that you're finding it a useful resource! 😄

title: Learning my way around...
body: This app is pretty user friendly. It took me a couple of days to get the hang of it b/c I’m

title: Game changer!!!!
body: I LOVE this app! I can’t image doing Keto or low carb without this. I am still learning a lot, as there is a big learning curve for this diet/way of eating. This app makes it super easy! I LOVE the Keto grade feature!!!! I depend of it a TON! This encouraged me to stick with it early on when I wasn’t sure if I was eating the right things. Highly recommend!

title: A very helpful app that’s easy to use
body: This app is great. Does a great job of tracking macros and visually shows you how much you’ve eaten at a glance. I’m a part of a keto Facebook group and I see a lot of people using this same app as well. I definitely recommend it!

title: Today the Save button does not work!!
body: I have closed and reopened the app several times. It is full of recipes. I have edited my recipes several times but the first time this has happened. Help!! I love this app and will amen my review when fixed!

title: Never had a clue
body: Never had a clue as to how close I was to being on this program without knowing it. I love meat, protein, etc...however I was abusing the carbs and calories. Now I see it before I chew it...Thank you 15lbs in 6 days so far...And its bonding my beautiful wife and I even closer.

title: Best App Ever!!!
body: Phenomenally thorough, well thought-out application. Easy to learn interface, dang near every food on every shelf in the universe broken down into nutrient profile. Takes the drudgery out of tracking my food intake. I’ve never been happier with any app of any kind!

title: Great App
body: I’ve checked out quite a few of the Keto apps, and this is by far the best one. Do yourself a favor and open your wallet for at least the 3 month plan. It’s worth every penny. The app and the website are great tools for your Keto success. And pairing my Garmin up to the app was seamless.

title: Great app when it works
body: This is a great app and very user friendly when it works, it is highly frustrating when I’m trying to log meals/snacks and the app just won’t open. It’s a pain to delete it then reload it every time I want to log something,  and it doesn’t matter if I’m connected to WiFi or running on cellular data.

title: Free app lacks so much
body: I have had the free app for about a week. It has been so helpful in keeping track of carb intake. However if you want access to recipes, track measurements, or many of the other cool features they show you, you have to pay. If you strictly want to track carbs, it’s a five star app.

title: Very helpful app
body: This app makes my tracking easy. It does need some work but that will come with time. That may even be because I use the free version instead of premium. I use it every day. I recommend it to others.

title: Very easy full features
body: I am amazed at the food database - even obscure brands and products.  The data and graphics presentations are very helpful, particularly scanning the day to see which foods are the leading net carbs and thinking through how best to replace that food next time.

title: Fantastic app for keto
body: Been using Carbs Manager for about three weeks and it's fantastic- polished, has all the things I need for a successful keto implementation, and I find good value in the pro upgrade. Have recommended it to friends and will continue to do so. Keep up the great work!

title: Meal planner horrible
body: I loved the log so decided to go all in and use the meal plan. Though I check to have the plan fit my profile most days were way over in fat and protein. When I try to change a meal the whole thing rests. I looked at the groceries list for the week for one person and it had me buying 24 eggs. The whole thing is worthless.

title: Works Well Enough
body: Would be 5-Star if you didn’t have to subscribe for a monthly fee to access the full app features. Very annoying to have an incomplete analysis tool. So I just track the few basic feature it allows me and use my Fitbit Blaze to track the rest. And for a monthly fee I could upload the data from my Fitbit to the app. Really? 😐

title: Love the app...
body: I have the premium and love it, however it says I have like 19 notifications on the app icon on my phone, but when I click on it to open it I can not see where the notifications are coming from or how to clear them. HELP!!

title: A life saver but....
body: As a type 1 diabetic, this app is my holy grail item. It makes my life a million times easier and I love it. However, it doesn’t connect to apply health and that makes tracking everything a bit harder. Please please add the ability to connect to apple health. Otherwise this is a 5+ star app.

title: Love love love...
body: It’s truly my diary.  I’m diabetic and l can keep notes and see what I’ve done from day to day that may or may not affect my blood sugar. I scold myself and I praise myself in my notes daily. And I can see at a glance what’s working and what’s not without switching from frame to frame.

title: Love it
body: I’m not very app savvy so it’s taken me a few days to manipulate custom menu items, but that has made all the difference in the world! It’d be nice to have the features you have to pay for free, but it’s working just fine (albeit a bit slower) without.

title: Carb manager
body: I have only used carb manager for a week but love love love it...it’s very detailed and I can track my carbs, fats, macros, water, and exercise! And that’s just a few of the things it does! It’s well worth it! I’m going to also sign up for the premium package...I can’t say enough! It’s awesome!

title: Additions
body: Been using the app for a little under two weeks, the app is great! It makes me responsible of what I intake, but the app should add a separate section for supplements/oils/minerals that people take during keto. Other thing that would be helpful is adding a feature to the calendar to mark a "cheat” day.

title: Don’t like new version
body: I have been a member for more than a year I used to log food every day I find the new version hard to work with and crashes or freezes a lot so hard to log food hard to find food that was in my favorites or recipes wish you could give us the option to still use older version I’m about ready to look for another app.
response: Hi there, we’re sorry to hear you’re struggling with the update—we’re listening, and our Development Team is working diligently to fine-tune this new version of the app so you’ll love it as much as the old version. Please reach out to us in-app, and our awesome Support Team will be happy to guide you through the update and answer any questions you may have.

title: Great for tracking
body: I do love the app.  I think some minor flaws need to be fixed.  Save foods that I’ve ❤️in my foods.  When searching for foods highlight old search to be immediately deleted once typing new search.   Erasing the whole item is minor annoyance.   Other than that great app

title: New update
body: I have loved the app and I think the new UI is great HOWEVER, this new update makes it incredibly inconvenient to find the foods I most often eat. Previously, the app would show a lot more selections and now it keeps prompting foods that I haven’t eaten in months and hiding my actual everyday foods.

title: Carbs
body: Some of your amounts are not correct.  Arby’s cheese sticks...the top one says 5 or 6 grams & the others say 30 something. Very misleading if you don’t look

title: Brings up wrong foods often
body: I mostly love the app, however it is SO frustrating to search and add foods, even if I scan the barcode, because half the time it’ll glitch and bring up a different food. Yesterday I scanned the Atkins peppermint patty (treat, fat bomb) and it logged it as zucchini alfredo noodles?! So frustrating. And I even paid for the premium version...
response: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. Please contact our support team at support@carbmanager.com and they’ll be happy to assist!

title: Absolutely the best app ever
body: I started Keto as a rookie and this app has been such a valuable tool which I use all day long! I love it so much I upgraded to the premium, which I highly recommend! You get meal plans and thousands of delicious keto friendly recipes etc!!! Love it ! ,Love it ! , Love it!

title: Wish I’d started this long ago
body: Much easier than trying to track it all everyday.  I also tried another highly rated food app and didn’t like it nearly as well as this one.

title: So far so good!
body: This definitely helps me keep on track and manage my carb intake.

title: Beginner Keto Eater
body: I really love that I am able to keep track of my macros easily! If I’m uncertain about a food at the store I just scan and it lets me know! Even kept recipes I make, I can input all the ingredients, amounts and it brings up all the values and keeps it in log for me! Great app!!

title: Absolutly love Carb Manager
body: I have learned so much about how to eat better and learned so much on how to eat right for the first time in my life . I truly love Carb Manager and highly recommendThe it to anyone who struggles with weight issues and wants to make a life change.

title: Best tracker out there!!!
body: Thank you so much, Carb Manager for keeping me ahead of myself and for always keeping me on track! I track my meals before I eat them to know exactly what I can and cannot consume to keep me on track. Without this, I would be lost. THANK YOU!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: One thing missing
body: I love this app with one exception.  I would like be the ability to add my own recipes, like I can do for instance on weight watchers.  Adding each ingredient every time I have that meal is very time consuming.  Please consider that change.  Thanks!

title: The real deal
body: I got this app about two weeks ago when I decided to do the Keto diet the recipes are awesome and I’m already down 15 lbs best app ever I do recommend purchasing membership the meal prep portion is next gen level stuff And the jump start guide is really useful

title: Easy to use and keeps you on track
body: Everything you need is in this app. Just type in the fist 3 letters and voila you are golden! Try it out and you will achieve whatever nutrition goals you have your heart set on. Highly recommend.

title: Love it!!
body: I’ve been using just the free version for now. It’s been a great tool to help me manage my macros during the keto diet. I will continue using app as I will eventually transition to carb cycling. This app is a must have, even if your looking to lose only 10 lbs like myself.

title: Noticeable difference!
body: Since loading the app I have been able to see what I’m consuming and am better able to stay within range of calories fat and protein, and now I can see the difference!

title: Keeps crashing
body: The app is taking me a little to get used to but everyday is getting easier.  After two weeks I prefer the paid version of my fitness pal but I’m going to give this some time.  I’m frustrated because I keep getting a blank white screen when I go to log info.  It’s happening a couple times a day.  I have to delete the app and then reload it to my phone.  So annoying!
response: Hi there, we're sorry for the problem! Could you contact us via the support center or at support@wombatapps.com? We'll figure out what's going wrong and get it fixed!

title: I did like it
body: I liked this app. It stopped opening. I’ve tried everything to get it to work. I downloaded it onto another device and logged in and nothing at all was saved which was the whole purpose of creating the login in the first place. Other than that it was a pretty cool app. I’m just disappointed that all my logs are gone.

title: Great Tool
body: Life is so busy juggling work and home and I don’t really enjoy cooking but like good food.  So it’s wonderful to have a great variety of recipes and a super simple way to record my daily food. Now I know when I’ve had enough food for the day.  No more guessing!

title: Pretty good
body: The recipes are great, I’m just getting started, but the tracking seems good, although I have found the app to be a little difficult to navigate. For example, I went though and added a bunch of recipes to “my favorites” but now I cannot find the “my favorites” list. 🤔

title: If I could give this app 0 stars I would.
body: This app is horrible. Doesn’t sync my info most of the time, the scanner can’t find stuff that is common items from the grocery store. MyFitnessPal is much better than this app.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're happy to report that we have 1000s of users that rely on the linked food database to track all of their logged food items. We're sorry to hear that this feature did not work correctly for you. So that we may assist you further, we ask that you reach out to Carb Manager support by selecting "Need Help?" in-app and referencing the username "Butterflyd2424" so that we can assist further.

title: Having fun learning
body: I’m really only just getting started with this app. but I feel like I’ve learned so much in a week. I just discovered today that the app has an exercise program. I’m having fun learning what it has to offer.

title: Awesome
body: After only a couple weeks it is truly amazing. The first 10 days to understand carbs in everything and get down to 20-30 carbs per day. But then the magic happen. Since then I have been averaging over 1lb per day.

title: Lacks a few things I love
body: My Fitness Pal doesn’t truly align with my

title: So far I’m loving this.
body: It has a lot of foods to choose from plus I can add some too. I’m learning to keep better track of my carbs. I do wish they had a blood glucose and insulin entry they don’t so I added it as a food, but since it’s just for me, I know what it is.

title: Finally an easy macro counter
body: I’ve tried a few macro counters in the past.  They were probably fine.  I just couldn’t figure out how to see my macro’s.  I especially love that this one doesn’t make me feel screamed at for choosing high fat!

title: Carb manager is fantastic!!
body: I absolutely love this app. I just started keto and it has all the features I need and is very user friendly. The database and manual input features are great. The little graphic that shows my macros is perfect for visualizing how I’m doing on my daily targets. In-app purchases are totally reasonable given how much you get for free.

title: The best!
body: Iv used this app for my first year of my keto adventure. And lost 60lb thanks to the app and imputing the food and all the recipes and everything in the app is also helpful. And now I use it again to keep track of my daily intake and carb watch.

title: Almost Awesome
body: As a diabetic I was happy to find Carb Manager. It has done is great job and tracking the items I need it to track. However, the food search is so awful that it almost renders the app useless. Just trying to find grilled chicken took 10 min. I will continue searching for a app that makes adding food less painful.

title: Loving it
body: Only thing I wish they had is if you eat like this daily you will be this weight by this date at the end of a log in but overall I love the app for the keto makes it’s super easy to track macros

title: Not syncing with Carb Manager.
body: For about 2 weeks now Fitbit and Carb Manager have not synced info.  Had worked great up until both apps did updates.
response: Hi there - some users (like you) are still experiencing fitness device sync issues, please reach out to Support in-app via Settings → Help & Support so we can troubleshoot what is going on for you specifically and get it fixed. Thanks!

title: Could be more friendly
body: I used weight watchers app in past which was extremely friendly. I find this app not as easy to maneuver. I also noticed that some items have to be scanned or entered to get accurate information. Some items can’t be entered because “premium “ but I have found recipes elsewhere

title: I lost 5 lbs the first week!
body: I love Carb Manager! It takes the guess work out of Keto. Trying to live Keto and lose weight is very difficult, hitting the right macros is paramount. Carb Manager keeps us on track to hit our daily goals. I lost 5 lbs the first week using the app. Love it!

title: My favorite carb counter
body: So far this is my favorite carb counter. IStarted off with another one and it was OK but I kept seeing everybody in different Facebook groups talk about how much does a carbManager so I thought I’d give it a try. I like it a lot better I’m happy I switched.

title: The worse app ever
body: I paid a 3 month subscription for premium and I was never able to do anything except to long my meals I ask for help from the support center and they never responded. When I canceled my subscription they try and charge me for the year subscription again but I had already disputed the charges form the first transaction so my bank didn’t let the second transaction go through. Worst app ever! Do not use it save your money.
response: Hi there, thanks for leaving us a review. I'm sorry you had issues with your subscription. Please reach back out to us from directly within the app or support@carbmanager.com and reference your app review username so that we can take care of this billing issue for you asap.

title: So helpful!!
body: Without this app I don’t think I would be able to stay in ketosis! It is such an easy way to track carbs, proteins and fat! I love that you can look up brands as well! If I want to know how much is in a small glass of Bonterra Chardonnay this app tells me! 😃

title: I’m loving this
body: I paid for the premium features and it’s well worth it! I appreciate all the tips and tricks it sends me to make sure I’m using all the features. It makes logging everything I eat quick and easy. So far so good!

title: Get it!
body: Quite a helpful tool for a newbie to keto diet!

title: I would give it 5 stars if this app didn’t alway freeze up
body: I honestly really enjoy using this app . It has help me keep track of my carbs and help me with weight lost. I have referred my friends to use it .  The mine issue is that the app take forever to load and it’s annoying when I am trying to keep track and the app not working .
response: Thanks for sharing your experience. Wonderful to hear how helpful the app has been to you. We are confident the load performance will significantly improve with the launch of our new app in late Summer/early Fall.

title: AMAZING
body: This app makes keto so easy! Not only can you search food, scan barcodes for nutritional measures but it tracks water, movement and keeps track of every day telling you when you have met carb, calorie and fat limits. The most comprehensive app. I love it

title: Love it!
body: I’m new to Carb Manager. I’ve previously used MFP & I’d have to say I’m loving it a lot more! I love the visual of your macros & I love that I don’t have to pay for my macros to be set at an exact number like MFP. Not sure if I’m going to splurge & buy the app. The free version is pretty awesome & fills all my needs so far!

title: Great app for low carb/keto
body: Fantastic app. It runs smooth. There is a very extensive library of foods. The set up has you focus on macros more than calories. I really like this. It’s an attractive app. It also links with several other apps like scales or fitness apps like Fitbit.

title: Love it!
body: So easy to track macros and water intake.  I started seeing more results when I used CM to track my intake. Recipes are a great resource.  This is what I need:  an off grid bare bones version for tracking macros.  I barely get cell signal where we live, and no WiFi.   Please?

title: Carb counts are WAY off in many cases
body: We just started the free app, 5 of us, all doing keto diet together. I do like the app and data entry and recipes.

title: It’s perfect
body: This app is exactly what I needed to track carbs, proteins, sugar and calories.   It takes the guess work out.  I track everything which sounds burdensome however this app makes it simple.   The reward is consistent weight loss. I love this app.

title: Easy to use and Very helpfully
body: The app is easy to use, and the graphics make it easy to see the carbs adding up.  The food lookup process is easy and scanning bar codes is nice.  I wish my previous lookup items could be sorted alphabetically.

title: Best way to low carb counting
body: After using a few other apps to track my carbs- this is by far the best one! It’s quick, easy and accurate. The tracking of total net carbs is all I need to see and this does it very well. Visually appealing app. Thanks!

title: User friendly!
body: Absolutely in love with this app. Recommend to add your exercises manually aaa well as your own steps and calories burned. Seems to be easier than searching for exercises. I haven’t found a good yet that isn’t listed.

title: Good app!
body: This app is very helpful when doing keto!!! Only complain is finding recipes in the app is hard unless you have premium so you end up listing each ingredient instead of being able to click the recipe. But good overall, recommend to all trying out keto!

title: Horrible they your money for the membership but don’t give the features they claim to
body: I downloaded the app and had been using the free version for a while. Then I decided to pay for the premium membership for three months. They took my money and I still was Not able to benefit from the premium features that I had paid for. I logged out of the app and tried to log back in and it wouldn’t allow me to log in anymore.
response: Hi paragraff1 - Thanks for reaching out. That must be very frustrating to not have access to Premium after you've paid for you. Our support team is standing by to look up your account and help you get access to the features that you've paid for. Please contact them at support@carbmanager.com, and you should hear back within 12 hours. Cheers!

title: It helps a lot!
body: This app brings awareness to my eating choices and keeps me on track. Knowing I have to record my food for the day makes me want to stay where I need to be and want to be. It’s like going to confession at the end of the day.

title: The ap I’ve been looking for
body: This is the ap I’ve been looking for. I didn’t like Noom or WW. I do like Carb Manager. I am going to start the diet plan after the holidays. I

title: Great Keto app
body: Excellent all purpose Keto app. Especially like all the recipes that are easy to convert to the meal log. Would like a better way to manage all my modifications to recipes. Haven’t figured out how to print and mark up yet. Really have liked the recipes most with a few changes ( more spices) are very good.

title: Amazing for beginners!
body: Honestly, I’ve never watched my carbs before and am ready to shed some much needed weight. This app let me decide how much weight I want to lose and breaks down everything I can eat in a day. It even has recipes for ready uploading! I love it

title: Great app for food tracking
body: This app is great! It works so much easier than My Fitness Pal, especially for carb tracking. I think the food data they have is better quality than MFP as well, and recipes are easier to input.

title: Great!
body: Really helpful in tracking macros. Could use a slightly more helpful user interface if you eat the same things every day, would be nice if the auto fill list was predictive based on your past food selections.
response: Sorry for the problem! Please try opening the app again now. This should fix it!

title: Finally!!!
body: Finally I found a great app to help me keep track of what I’m eating.

title: Sync for free
body: This app has completely kept my mind straight while getting the hang of Keto diet. I would give this a 10- however I hope in the future that the free subscription would also include syncing to my steps. As of now users can only sync if they pay extra 😔

title: Great app!
body: I read several reviews on which carb app would be best, this is it! It’s user friendly and I have not had a hard time finding my foods in the listing they have available. Carb counting is a lifestyle and this helps to keep me accountable to it!

title: Won’t load on my iPhone!
body: No matter what I try, even after contacting support and implementing all of their suggestions this STILL will not load the app on my phone. It loaded onto my iPad but I don’t carry my iPad everywhere. So disappointed!
response: Hi there, sorry for the problem! Please contact us again and we'll get this working for you.

title: This app rocks
body: I am proud to say that I have lost 50lbs by sticking to my daily dietary recommendations!!!! This app keeps me focused and disciplined (along with self determination). There is no food that cannot be found on here....which is extremely helpful when youre focused!!! 5 stars from this user. 👍🏻

title: Awesome app!
body: This is a fun way to keep me on track! I have lost 10 pounds and I can’t wait to keep going! Great recipe ideas attached and my only complaint is that some of the carbs are a little off in eggs for example, and some vegetables as well! Eat your vegetables!!!

title: Fairly accurate carb counter, however, way TOO MANY ads to go premium!
body: Having a medical background helped me confirm this aps accuracy. The older version was much easier to navigate and get right getting one’s meals entered.
response: We're sorry to hear that the pop-up reminder to upgrade to Premium has created some annoyance for you in the app. This reminder should only appear 1x a day or any time you tap on a feature that is only accessible to Premium subscribers. We're thrilled to offer the free app to as many people as possible. However, we do rely on paid subscriptions to assist us in this goal.

title: Keto
body: I have used this app on and off for a while now and the last time I used this app I lost 30 pounds in 3 months doing keto. I am restarting my weight loss journey and feel confident

title: Not as good as old version
body: Myself and many others find the new version much less user friendly. Old version was much easier to navigate , if it’s not broke don’t fix it

title: Purged database
body: I used this app for two years marveling at how it found so many foods through a simple scan. It had a 5 ⭐️ rating from me.
response: Hi, and thanks for your review! Please reach out to us within the app so that our Support Team can assist you with the issue you are having with the Food Search- we are happy to help!

title: Must Have For Keto
body: I would not be where I am in my weight loss journey without this app.

title: Was an awesome app but update ruined it!
body: This WAS my favorite app and I used it almost every day. I upgraded to premium and recommended it to many people. The update lost and changed my food lists. It also made navigating the app and viewing information extremely difficult. I will not be renewing my premium subscription and will not recommend the app unless it is restored back to the awesome and user friendly app is was before this terrible update.

title: Getting started
body: It was a little difficult to get started on this app, but that was probably my fault for not reading more about it and trying to just jump in without really knowing anything about keto.

title: Great app!
body: Carb Manager is easy to use and really helps keep me on track. The food database is especially helpful with tracking foods when you don’t have the specific nutritional information readily available.

title: Keto
body: I find that using Carb Manager helps me to keep track better on a daily basis by logging all of my food. I’ve never really logged my food before and this definitely makes a difference for me personally

title: Amazing
body: Just downLoaded the app, very easy to use, love the scan bar and I like the easy search with just typing the first 3 letters it will give you a list of options, I use to use my fitness pal but I like this more.

title: Premium is WORTH IT!
body: The interface is so easy, scan barcodes is so convenient, the premium version is absolutely worth it. Tons of recipes, wonderful meal plan feature, shopping list... it all makes tracking your keto/low carb diet SO EASY!

title: Great for Keto!
body: I love this app! Definitely helps for the keto diet bit the only thing I don’t like is that it doesn't break down fats, and proteins even with the carbs it shows in the app for each item or food you add. Overall I gave it four stars because of that. It’s easy to use and easy to navigate. 👍🏼

title: Excellent!!!! Ill give it more stars if i could
body: This app has made it so much easier to track everything. It saves me the trouble to count net carbs and legit does it for me. And also lets me input all of my ingredients and foods any shape and form i want. Keep up the good job!

title: Carb Manager
body: This is the easiest and most convent nutrition tracker I have ever used.  I frequently adjust my meal plan and activities based on my daily log. I’m well on my way to losing weight and now have the tools to keeping it off.  Worth every penny!

title: So helpful!
body: As a new member of the keto club, this app has been so helpful understanding what o am eating and the impact on the keto diet. I have come across very few items that aren’t accurate on the app (Tito’s Vodka shows way more carbs than actual) but that happens very rarely. We have really been relying on this app to help stay in ketosis!

title: Okay
body: I purchased this app with the thought that it would be compatible with my Fitbit. It isn’t.  It tracks my carbs and does the basics but there are a LOT of bugs in the software. I don’t see the value in purchasing the software vs. just using the free version. I won’t renew next year unless a lot of changes happen in the next version.

title: Great Resource
body: If you are gonna diet then you have to have this resource! Truly invaluable! Let’s you keep track of the exact amount of carbs, calories, etc. I couldn’t believe how far off I was until I found this! Thanks!

title: Great App
body: This scanning feature is amazing. It even has Kimchi on it LOL.

title: Great for Keto
body: This app is amazing. Firstly it’s free to use for most of the best features. It tracks your meal info including macros and your daily totals. You can scan barcodes and the food catalog/library is deep. Do yourself a favor and download this app if you’re doing any kind of low carb diet.

title: No offline access
body: Excellent, except when there’s no WiFi or LTE access. Also, occasionally won’t open even with that, so maybe internal issues? It would be nice to have offline access, even if use was limited to favorite foods and viewing your planned day.

title: Great n useful!
body: I tested this app side-by-side with another diet tracking app, and this app won hands down because it really helped me get into detail about managing a keto way of eating. The interface is a liiiiiitle klugy but it’s nbd. The RECIPES are amazing resource bc they are already broken out to the nutrition!

title: Love it as it is
body: I have used and loved this app for months now.  It is intuitive, straight forward, and makes food tracking a breeze.  I have a pretty large low carb group on Facebook (100k members) and I recommend this app often.

title: Best tracker yet!
body: Love the scanner option for food and a great database as well. Beats Cronometer and all others. Very intuitive user interface, well designed and simple to use with a lot of convenient easy features. Highly recommended!!!

title: Great app
body: I’m using this app everyday to keep me on track during Keto program. Only needed to drop a very stubborn 8-10 lbs. Keto is fantastic. Lost 5 lbs fairy quickly.

title: Great app for Keto diet!
body: This app has enabled me to chart how many carbs, fat, protein and calories I take in, which has lead to weight loss. I wasn’t losing weight on the Keto diet because I was taking in too many calories. This app solved that, and I don’t feel like I’m starving myself either.

title: Helpful App
body: I really like the app I just wish that the food that you eat more frequently allowed a longer list and went back more than just a couple of days I like to scan things in and not have to scan them again in a hurry.

title: Intuitive
body: This is very intuitive and helpful for managing carbs and calories. Love the bonus recipe ideas. Wish there was more sort and filter functionality for the food list. For example, I’d like to be able to sort my list alphabetically or by most common used.

title: Good with some room for improvement
body: It’s great to have this app, and with few improvements it would be perfect. Measurements are not intuitive - while it’s great to have options of many choices - for the foods that are typically measured in cups or oz - these options should come first. Also the database of brands and food options still needs to be expanded.

title: Easy Carb Tracker
body: It is so easy to keep up with my daily carbs.  I really like the carb goal for each day.  The app is user friendly.  I have been using the app for about 3 weeks and I’ve lost 15 pounds.  Carb Manager is a winner and very accurate!  I recommend this Carb Manager!!

title: So helpful
body: I hate recording what I eat but the scan option and the fact I tend to eat the same foods and the app pulls them up easily, makes this work for me.  Very easy to use !  Highly recommend .  Can’t believe I am NEVER hungry.

title: Wish I could customize my macros and calories
body: Following a reduced calorie/macro for HCG diet but it won’t allow to change to the amount I need. Works well otherwise, just makes it difficult because I have to manually track whether I’ve reached my limit.

title: It’s amazing
body: I have been doing Keto and really helps me keep on track and if there is something i am not sure if I should eat I’ll still put it to see “the damage” it’ll do to my diet . I love this app. Even the line grid of the weight entry .

title: Loving it
body: I am on spark people but it didn’t do tracking like I needed..you do net carbs..blood sugar numbers and insulin does numbers..so easy to navigate..and pics with ingredients with recipes..wonderful..I was so impressed I joined for year membership last night

title: Great app
body: This app is perfect for the normal working person. I, like so many others, work night shift. I wish this app had the ability to set the hours for “my day”. Logging and accurately tracking my food is difficult when my sleep is in the middle of the day.

title: ABC ratings Gone
body: I don’t like the updated version of carb manager. One of the features that I really enjoyed was the ABC ratings on food. Some foods are better than others. ABC ratings made it very easy when shopping. Trying to figure out the new updates on the app is to difficult when you’re in the market. Has me wanting to use a different app. Bring back to ABC ratings!! ☹️🤔🤔

title: It is ok
body: This app is fine to have some sort of carb counting but it sometimes says that product is ok for you to eat on your diet plan but the food is actually not ok. As long as you are aware this app is great to keep track of your nutritional counts

title: Love the visual and easy inputs!
body: Love this over my fitness pal because of how easy things are. It comes with a pre-built function of diets you can choose and adjust to! My fitness pal seems nice but I can’t seem to love it like I do car manager!!

title: Horrible new version
body: The app changed EVERYTHING that was working to keep me on track.

title: Success Story in the Making
body: With this app I can keep track of all my eating very easily and it offers recipes. What is not to love about this app and that’s that I am using the free one I can imagine what the paid subscription is like. Very Happy 😊

title: Great app
body: I love this app! I wish you could see the date the day your logging your info in. I would also like  to be able to log info in or even be able to have the info I put in calculated if you forget to hit the button done for the day.  Thanks JH 😃

title: Best Diet App Ever
body: Having used several of the food apps in the past, Carb Manager is by far the most well designed and user focused yet. I actually look forward to entering my food and checking my steps and exercise picked up from my iWatch.

title: Superior in diet help!
body: Eye opening as to why my diets likely failed in the past! I can adjust to what I’d like to consume and I’m held accountable by sticking to it. Results with my health have never been easier and my results are already showing! Five stars

title: Thank you
body: Thank you for this amazingly helpful program. My husband has enjoyed watching me finding foods that are good for you and foods that I love. He’s so excited about the keto diet, that he’s decided to join me. I am so happy. Thank you for the guided. You guys are the best!

title: Not what I expected.
body: I’m trying to get more detailed information about keto that’s free. This is not that. So I decided to delete the account I had just set up. I found the place to do it and followed the instructions to type delete in the space provided and select continue. Instead of deleting my account, I got instructions to type delete in the space provided and select continue. I tried multiple times...it’s just a vicious circle.
response: Hey there! Our core app is free & always will be. Many of our users reach their Keto goals without ever upgrading to Premium, and we offer loads of Keto education. Our Premium version is there for users who want access to advanced features, but both versions find success stories! Message us in-app to learn more about free features, or if you still want to delete your account, we can do that too!

title: This is a life saver
body: Using this app has helped me and our keto group keep exact tract of what we are putting into our bodies! What we may be lacking or over using! It’s made perfectly for each h individual!! Thank you we love this app!

title: Great app
body: A great eye opener!!! Helped me realize why I wasn’t losing weight. Definitely happy that I found it. I would recommend for everyone to use it. You will realize why things don’t change in your life and how much carbs you are eating.

title: Love the ability to customize
body: There are several levels of carb intake frameworks to chose from - nice feature.

title: Easiest Macro counter
body: This is the easiest macro counter I’ve found yet. It has a ton of vegan food already in the database which is unusual from others I’ve tried. I’m not a techy person - so if I can use it with ease, you can too!  Give it a try!

title: My app crashes with iOS v12.4.1
body: I love this app..helping me with my Keto lifestyle for about 2 months now. However I cannot open the app on my iPhone when it was updated with iOS v12.4.1. I tried to log in on the website and I couldn’t log in there, so maybe it’s not iOS version related? Welp...help!

title: Very useful friendly
body: Intuitive app, makes tracking your food very easy and more importantly gives you a sense of control over your intake if you’re on diet. I’m giving it 4 instead of 5 stars because it doesn’t have a free trial for the premium subscription.

title: Keeps me on track
body: This carb manager is very easy to use ...and it acts as your conscience. At the end of the day it keeps you honest as you look at the food values you’ve consumed during the day ...and helps you forego that yummy dessert that keeps calling your name.

title: Love this app!
body: I have been using Carb Manager for 2 weeks, and I haven’t found anything negative about it.

title: Disappointed with the changes
body: I loved this app, it really helped me on my keto journey. One of the things I loved most about it was that I could enter my food for the upcoming days when I had my meals planned out. Not anymore! I tried to use that function today and I’m being told I need to upgrade to premium. Why?! There are already so many functions I don’t have access to as a free user. And I’m fine with that. Don’t take away functions we already had.

title: Keto lifesaver!
body: I’m 5 days into keto and would have been lost without carb manager app!  Every food I could think of is listed and nutrition broken down, even brand names.  It does the ratios for me so it makes it simple to know what I need more or less of.

title: THE BEST!!!!
body: Tried other apps, this is BY FAR the best most user friendly. Logging my macros used to take 20 minutes with total Keto diet because I couldn’t save meals, with this app you can import recipes and tracking takes a few minutes. LOVE IT!!!

title: The best..
body: Carb manager is teaching me what to eat in the nicest way possible.. it is gently opening my eyes to the hidden dangers in food.. as long as I am honest with cm it is helping me to lose at least a pound a day and that is huge for me. Thank you so much for a very special and now beloved app..

title: Amazing!!
body: I’ve found this app only yesterday, and I feel more confident on the Keto diet! Right now I’m on the 4th week and I started gaining... This app told me I’ve been eating too much fat and now I can’t wait to see those extra pounds come off!! Thank you!

title: Nikki
body: Great app love it makes doing Keto very simple. 5 stars for the scanner feature it works sooo well. I have not found a need to pay for it because most of the extra features can be found elsewhere. Again love this app.

title: My husband and I  both use it.
body: I haven’t purchased the premium version but the free one is really nice. I love how it takes the guess work out of certain foods. My husband is using it too. It’s been really helpful for us both.

title: My Keto Companion
body: This incredible app has made getting into the keto diet so much easier. I love the ability to scan items and that they have such a huge database. I also like the graphics and how easy it is to adjust the measurements.

title: I deleted this app!
body: I really am focusing on getting 10,000 or more steps each day. The ability to record steps accurately in this app is lacking. Also, once steps are recorded for the day, changes cannot be made. If steps are accidentally recorded on the incorrect date, the record cannot be changed. I had used the WW app previously and had become used to a well-designed and user-friendly app. I selected this one because at this point I need a free app.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support. Thank you for taking the time to review our app. We'd love to let you know that the core app is free and always will be for folks that wish to live a Keto lifestyle. Also, we'd love to show you how to record, edit & track steps easily on a daily basis. Please reach out to support@carbmanager.com so that we can assist you further. Please reference "tfbpl" in your reply and we'll help you ASAP!

title: Total Carbs
body: Total carbs should be presented for each meal. This is what a diabetes patient needs. After making this statement I received an e-mail from the App Store showing me very easily how to track total or net carbs - and other values. My rating is now 6 stars - ******
response: Hi there, thanks for contacting us, and for the stars! To switch to tracking total carbs, go to Settings -> Carbs to Track and select Total Carbs. You can also find total carbs for each meal by tapping the ... button next to each meal, then selecting Details in the menu.

title: Good but...
body: I was really enjoying using this app until a few days ago. Now it was get past the loading screen. I’ve tried restarting my phone, searching for an update, and using the app both on and off WiFi. Nothing seems to work. I haven’t been able to log my nutrients since this weekend.
response: Hi there! Sorry for the problem. Please email us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll help you get this fixed.

title: Keto Diet Manager
body: I recently started the “Keto diet” and carb manager has been a huge help with learning to navigate my new diet.  The only problem I have is you can’t add home made meals, you have to add every ingredient separately, it would be nice to be able to add that list as a regular item even if it’s only on your profile.

title: Quick, easy, better results
body: Much easier than any other program I’ve used. Ease of use means more use and better results. I love the scan option it is very quick and easy.

title: Disappointed
body: I used this app and loved it for almost 3 years, helped me lose 60 lbs. Then about 3-4 months ago it got extremely slow and it took me forever to enter my meals ! I’ve tried several times since and it still SLOW so I got the Atkins app to help me along . Wish they could fix it to work like it did before, I loved it then!

title: Love it
body: Loving this app! I downloaded a week ago when I started doing keto. I was dreading counting my macros but this app has been a game changer. It makes it so quick and simple to just plug everything in. The free version is perfectly sufficient for my

title: Great app - Suggestion
body: I love this app! It’s great and easy to use. I love the amount of products that I can find.
response: We have been following the research on allulose and will soon change the calculation of net carbs to include subtracting allulose as well as fiber and sugar alcohols from total carbs. We will also add allulose to the nutrients list of foods in our database, so when food brands supply that information it will be listed. When our users make custom foods they will soon be able to include the amount of allulose used in the food or recipe. If you want to log allulose or add it to a custom food, our users are typically adding the value of the allulose as a sugar alcohol so it subtracts from total carbs.

title: So far so good
body: I’m really liking this app. It makes tracking so much easier. The only thing I wish it was better at was connecting to my Apple Watch to get all my workout info so I don’t have to input it. But that’s the only thing I have found wrong with it.

title: I really love this app, BUT...
body: On a daily basis I have issues signing on and have to either restart my iPhone 11 or use the desktop version because I simply can’t get on.

title: Want the old app back
body: I really dislike this new update. The whole look of it number one. Number two you can’t see your total calories anymore you just see the deducted calories. And number three are used to be able to take all of the food I put in for breakfast or lunch and then create it into a recipe and now I cannot do that why? Please bring back the old app. Going to start looking for a new one to use
response: Hi there - thanks for the feedback, we appreciate hearing what's working (and not working) for our long term users, and are making many adjustments. You can indeed still make a recipe from the items added to a meal: after you've logged all foods tap the three dots beside Dinner (for e.g.), then select "Create Recipe" and it will walk you through the steps to create a recipe, with all foods logged from that meal included. Check out help.carbmanager.com for FAQs on the new app. Hope that helps!

title: SO easy to use And much more flexible than other popular carb trackers
body: I started keto last week and was looking for a way to track my carbs and I tried a few different trackers and this one is by far my favorite!

title: Hate the update
body: The old version things were simple and easy to look at only issue was the processing speed. Please go back to the old version but keep the new processing speed.

title: Best app ever!
body: It’s very advanced and has many options

title: What happened?!
body: Items that used to scan don’t scan any more. When I click on an item something completely different pulls up. Nutritional facts are no accurate based off of product boxes. Pllllease fix your app!! I love it and tell everyone about it. I rely on it for my health and it’s failing me and this gives me major anxiety!!! HELP!!
response: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. Please contact our support team at support@carbmanager.com and they’ll be happy to assist!

title: Something seriously wrong with this app
body: If you enter something in, for example, Rebel Cherry Chip and you click on it, macros for turkey pop up. I tried again with a different ice cream, and when you click on what you want, a totally different food shows up. Then I thought it was user error so I had my husband enter items in. Same issue. This app desperately needs an update.
response: Thanks so much for the constructive feedback!. While I can't give any specifics at this point, I think you'll really appreciate our next major app update :-) If you have any questions in the meantime, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team at support@carbmanager.com

title: Great app!
body: As a premium member, this app has absolutely EVERYTHING a person could need to follow the Keto diet almost effortlessly.  There are so many great tools to use, and the recipes I’ve already tried are really good!  Premium service is completely worth it!

title: MUST DOWNLOAD
body: I love this app so much. Every month I do a 10 day NO carb NO sugar challenge and using this app makes it so easy, it breaks down net calories, net carbs, etc it also lets you log your meals and even your exercise!! I LOVE CARB MANAGER, it makes my logging and dieting so much easier.

title: I love carb manager
body: I really like the extensive database.  It is much easier tracking carbs than calories but at the same time this includes the calories in the days log.  I have cut out food or limited food that I thought was good nutrition wise but now I can see if it is loaded with carbs

title: Great app
body: I have used several apps for tracking over the last few years I think this one is the easiest to use and had a great data base for searching and scanning food into your app.  5 ⭐️+

title: I was doing Keto all wrong
body: I could not loose weight because I was consuming too many calories.

title: Great app, but I wish...
body: I like this app a lot, but I wish it offered the ability to manually adjust the macros once you find the food. I often have to play with the brand/serving size (ending up using an incorrect serving size or brand in order to get the macros to align with what is on the label.

title: Lost data
body: I’ve been using this app for 3 weeks and have loved it, however I was suddenly promoted to create an account and my history is now all gone. Is there anyway to recover this? It’s not a huge deal but it’s nice being able to reflect on the progress.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support. We're sorry to hear that you've lost your data. Our support team would love to assist in attempting to reclaim your data. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username "machanzar" and we'd be more than happy to assist! Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Covers everything!
body: I paid for the yearly subscription, well worth it.  It allows me to track everything, even my glucose.  I went from 3 apps to just this one, live it.  Highly recommended

title: Great for journaling
body: The only thing i do not like about this app is that you have to purchase a years subscription to take advantage of all of the features. If it was a one time payment it wouldn’t be a big deal but $40 a year seems a bit much.
response: Hey Shelly - thanks so much for the review! While Premium unlocks lots of awesome and time saving features, the free version is plenty to get started tracking macros on Keto. Let us know if we can ever help with anything by contacting us in Settings - Contact Support :-)

title: LOVE app, but not working with new iPhone!
body: Just got the new iPhone (yes, on the first day ;-) ) and Carb Manager doesn’t display properly on it! I can’t go from the food selection menu back to the daily menu, which renders the app unusable! Please update ASAP!!!

title: Helping with diabetes management
body: This app is a great tool for anyone working to improve their diabetes management. The carb counter can be customized for diabetes carb counting. You can manually enter your food or scan the barcode making tracking super easy

title: Great app but slow to load
body: Love the app and the ability to focus on carbs. The only downfall so far and why I did not rate it as a 5 is that it is very slow to load.  None of my other apps load like this. Faster load times would be great since I use it at every meal.

title: Great app
body: I love that I can scan any food and it’s graded A-F for the Keto diet. That makes my food choices much better. I also love the daily graphic that shows me how many of each macro I have left in the day. I’m seriously considering upgrading to premium.

title: All the tools
body: So far this app is great.  I paid a lot more for a similar app with Weight Watchers and it was harder to use.  I used this for free and decided the great price of $30 couldn’t be passed up for a year.  I don’t think I’ll be disappointed.

title: Great but missing one key component
body: I love this app for my Keto diet.  The one thing missing which I would use a lot is info on home made dishes.  I end up adding everything in my recipe which works, just more time consuming. It would be hard to add these dishes, but a “general” homemade totals would work for me.

title: Monthly Subscription Fee
body: So tired of these apps that present themselves as free. I just installed it and was using it for 10 minutes. Trying to figure things out. I had added some food for the day but then made some revisions. And with that came the pop up that only 9 meal actions are allowed for free per day. Think of all the things you have to enter. Coffee, milk, eggs, butter, cheese, tomatoes. Breakfast was already six things. Any corrections also count. This essentially is a pay app.

title: Love the app but not the price
body: Love the app but after so many entries they lock you and want you to pay. I would pay a flat fee but nope they want a monthly fee, it's ridiculous. Waste of time because now I am used to this app and love it but I am not going to be tied in a monthly payment, it's stupid, either make me pay for it once or don't. False advertisement.
response: Hi there, thanks for getting in touch. We do have a flat fee, one time purchase option to unlock unlimited logging. Please go to the Go Premium page and look for the gray button, labeled Unlimited logging (fourth option at top).

title: New to this APP
body: I just downloaded this APP a few days ago & just starting to use it. I loaded my 1st days worth of food in & it was very simple. It has a lot of helpful information on it. I like the food look up option.

title: Update broke on iPhone X
body: The latest update has changed the iPhone X interface for the worse. The app is great at what it does but now it has blacked out the area up top where time, battery, signal etc are at, and opening the side menu no longer scrolls, but it scrolls the background while menu is open in the foreground.

title: Cool App
body: I really like this app however, I would like for the app to offer a way to copy the entire breakfast, lunch and dinner instead of copy each entry one by one. If there was a way to copy all at once I would definitely give a 5 stars. Very easy to use and every food  I input is there. Please update the meal entry ASAP!!!

title: Carb Manager excellent Keto tool
body: I started a keto diet 6 days ago after seeing a family friend had lost 30 pounds in 6 weeks. I stumbled upon Carb Manager the day I started. It makes being in target range for net carbs and macros so easy! I’ve lost 5  pounds in 6 days and I’m not hungry!

title: Best Nutrition Tracking App! Keto friendly!
body: This app is so wonderful and intuitive to use. My only complaint would be to change the scroll wheel for quantity to text entry. As wishes maybe allow a dark mode or maybe change the logo to a bit more modern but neither of these wishes detract from how great this app is.

title: Carb Manager
body: This is the most awesome app, years ago I started eating “real food”. I thought I was doing great however I never seemed to lose any weight.  Then started using this app which really showed me what and how much I was eating. Use this app for great results

title: Was great at first!
body: When I first downloaded and used this app it was great, getting food info and the barcode scanner was lightning fast, for the last week it has been unable to load food items, I reset my network settings uninstalled, then reinstalled to no avail. If that gets fixed I may try it again as I had such high hopes. If the issue gets addressed I will edit my review.
response: Hi there, thanks for the feedback. Could you contact us at support@wombatapps.com? We'll look into the issue and get it fixed asap!

title: Game Changer
body: Carb Manager is a game changer if you are tracking a low-carb or ketogenic lifestyle. I knew nothing about macros before starting my diet. This app makes it easy and defines your personal needs according to how much you want to lose or maintain. Love the recipes too!

title: Best app yet
body: I love the fact that you can log foods in the unit of measurement of your preference and in a practical way. No more using apps that require me to scroll down to try to find a unit of measurement and hope it’s close enough.

title: Love the app
body: I have been living the ketogenic lifestyle for about a year now and in that time Inhave consistently logged all my food intakes on the app. I believe that without this app I would not be down 72 lbs and feeling amazing at 50.

title: Works well
body: Recipes are good and easy. Sometimes the app lags and doesn’t log everything but I  think that’s my internet connection. All together much happier than with the other keto app I tried

title: Was five stars....then updated
body: I absolutely LOVED this app! It was super simple, fast to scan and enter, very user friendly! I looked forward to entering everything and it kept me on track because it was enjoyable to use! This new update kinda ruined it for me! I wish there was an option to use the old version😞

title: Hot Garbage
body: This app used to be the simplest and easiest app to use to track your macros. Their recent tricked out update has made it unusable. They will tell you it might get some getting used to but the bottom line is that it has become a complex mess to find, add, and edit foods and recipes quickly and easily.  More is not always better.  Paying for the upgrades arent worth it. This used to be so easy- try something else instead.

title: Knowledge
body: I thought I was keeping a low carb diet, but when I plugged everything into this program, I realized I was consuming too many carbs. I put everything in, even 2 olives, and this app keeps me far more disciplined. I love it!

title: Awesome carb app!
body: This app is so user friendly that I started benefiting from it immediately. The free version is robust enough for simple and helpful nutrition tracking - definitely enough to monitor your keto diet as you get started.  Thank you, Developer!

title: Was overcharged but good app nonetheless
body: I was charged more than the year subscription amount and am finding it difficult to get refunded.

title: Carb Mgr is great!!
body: For quite some time, I had used another App but found it cumbersome and inaccurate!!  It might be fine for counting calories but terrible for KETO!   Carb manager is easy to use and make it so easy to track carbs, protein and fat which is what we want for KETO!!!!

title: Great app, but one issue since update!
body: I love this app, and have used it for a long time.  Since the most recent update, the barcode scanner will not work.  I have force closed the app and even deleted and reinstalled, still won’t work. Please fix this ASAP, it’s the best feature!!  I will update my review and rating if fixed.
response: Hi there, and thanks for sharing your experience. Any recent update shouldn't have changed the functionality of the scanner. It's possible your camera access changed though. Send us a message in-app, by selecting Settings - "Need help?" and we can help sort it out. Thanks in advance!

title: Makes keto easy breezy!
body: I love this app! It makes it easy to keep up with my keto and gives you the option to track 3 kinds of carbs. Very simple and to the point. Essential in my journey. I recommend it to everyone who’s starting keto!

title: Best tracking site!
body: I have used this tracker for over a year! It really keeps me on track! Some of the foods you scan are not correct but you can easily search for foods in the library!

title: So easy and helpful
body: Thank you to whoever made this. I am the LAST person to understand nutrition or technology. You have made this so easy to use and I have lost over 15 pounds in just over two weeks!
response: 15 pounds in two weeks is major progress. Congrats! We've done our best to make the app easy for anyone to use, with no nutrition or technology experience required. Keto is a tool for everyone! Let us know if you ever have any questions :-)

title: Fasting tracker doesn’t work
body: I’ve been using this app for several months and tried multiple times to figure out how to set a time. When I first uploaded the app I didn’t pay for it and some of the features didn’t work. After paying for it, some things still don’t work. Not a fantastic app.
response: Thanks for sharing your experience! We'd love to help get you organized and implement your fasting schedule into the app. Just reach out in-app and we can walk you through it as well as refer you to our guides and articles. For any other issues you're experiencing, feel free to reach out. Thanks!

title: Need better micronutrient tracking
body: I love this app for macro tracking and overall tracking for the low carb lifestyle. But it falls short on tracking micronutrients which can be so important in changing to a healthy lifestyle. Please add the ability to track more micronutrients or input our own. We also need better reporting on micronutrients.
response: Hey Comnav - Thanks so much for that great feedback. We do have improved micronutrient reporting on the roadmap, but we'd love to hear more about precisely what type of feature improvements you're looking for. Would you be willing to contact our support team in the app via Settings-Contact Support to share some additional details? Thanks so much!

title: Keto diet
body: This app really help me keep count of my carbs since I been on the keto diet. I love the fact that's when a food is not keto friendly it will let you know to avoid that food 😊 counting carbs can't get no better without this app I'll be lost 👏🏾

title: Great app!
body: After being on a weight loss plateau for 6 months, this app helped me keep better track of my carb and calorie intake. I wasn’t being as diligent at it as I thought. I’m finally seeing scale movement in the right direction again!

title: Connectivity Issues at Times
body: Would have given five starts but has connectivity issues too often. Otherwise, great app and very helpful to get after it. Would also like it more if I could make some more user adjustments.

title: Best Keto App I’ve Found
body: This app could have some bugs fixed with the occasional freezing and delay, but other than that it has helped me lose weight and that’s more than I can say for other apps.

title: Good but not great
body: I really like the recipes and that’s why I gave it four stars but the tracking of your daily food leaves a lot to be desired. They should look at Fitbit tracker, it’s much easier to track previous meals instead of creating new ones every time...

title: Good but......
body: I’m really enjoying the app. It’s convenient and has a good amount of items to choose from compared to other apps. My only complaint, it can be so slow to load and searching for an item can sometimes be time consuming....at one point, I had to delete the app and then reinstall.

title: Super helpful
body: I have been so pleased with CarbManager. With all the other apps out there, this display and preprogrammed recipes have been simple and user friendly. I’ve been able to set my goals and track carefully!

title: They have every food on this app!
body: I like this app because the free version has every food out there to make your food diary from. It’s easy to use and I can set it to count net carbs. It also calculates your macros. This app should win an award.

title: Works great!
body: Really easy to use. Lost 15 lbs (water) in 4 days following a KETO diet. The pie charts make it super easy to calculate all my calories. Love that I can pretty much look up ANY food and it shows you all the fats, carbs, etc. highly recommend to anyone starting a diet.

title: Not working
body: I am a premium member and I really like the app but it constantly signs me out and then when I log back in, everything is gone, my profile, meals, all at zero! Please can you fix the problem! Thanks.
response: We are so sorry for the interruption! If you are still missing your data, please log out (Settings > Log Out) and then in the log in or sign up screen, look for a link toward the bottom of the page labeled "Get back in here". This will restore your data. An account is not required to use the app, and you can continue to use it as before. If you need additional assistance, please email us at support@wombatapps.com.

title: Easy to use
body: Very intuitive to use.  So far, every food has been on the list.  Helps keep me on track and more successful staying on track.  Extremely glad I decided to use this app.

title: Great app!
body: I love this app so much! it keeps me on track! one suggestion, my daughter wants to do this app, but it does not have the year she was born when she tried signing up. Maybe put more recent years for the teens/tweens who want to join?

title: Must have to track your macros
body: I’m currently trying my best staying strictly keto and this app helps me track my calories, fats, protein and most important carbs, has basically every food to add to your daily intake and its so easy to use! Very grateful for this app! 😃

title: I wish I could share recipes with other users.
body: I love this app., I just wish I could share recipes with other users. I cook for 4 other adults and it’d be nice if I could enter recipe and share it to just them so they could track the meal. As opposed to me telling them what was in it, and it how much.

title: App Problem
body: I used the app one day and now it isn’t tracking any food. It shows the food as added but isn’t showing up on daily log. I was going to order 12 months subscription but now am not able to use app at all.

title: Out with the old!
body: I used to use the Atkins carb tracker app until they ruined it with an update.

title: Works for what I need it for
body: Works well enough for what I need it for for counting carbs and such. Just don’t feel it’s as easy to navigate as MyFitness Pal app was for me. That app doesn’t accommodate the carbs as closely as this one does so I’m stuck in the middle until I bite the bullet and decide if I want to pay to go premium.

title: Fancy5576
