body: This app has everything you need to track and stay accountable! It’s very user friendly, accurate and easy to use. I’ve used Weight Watchers online and My Fitness Pal, but Carb Manager is hands down better!!

title: Having problems
body: They’re problems occurring for many today as nothing is loading and this is very important for people tracking their macros

title: Really like it, but....
body: I really like this app, but I would like to be able to enter in how many miles, not time for my exercise. Also I can only enter in 8 cups of water a day, I would like to be able to enter in how much I actually drink a day....(I'm using the free version)

title: Makes Keto Easy!
body: With the help of this app I lost 5 lbs. in 6 days!  I am new to The Keto lifestyle and this app made tracking my foods so simple and easy!  Also love checking the pie chart with all my percentages at the end of my day to see if I stayed on track for the day. Love this app!

title: Ketorrific
body: This app has been super helpful keeping up with my macros for the keto diet. I suggest this to anyone who wants to check their macros, especially For Keto. Gives you a breakdown percentage of fat, carbs, proteins to make sure you’re getting what you need for the day

title: CityCountryGirl
body: I just started using the App and I checked on a food before eating it, found it was listed as one to avoid, so I didn’t eat it! I also have stopped eating at least 3 hours before bed. Great incentive tool

title: Great app to help keep me accountable!
body: This app has everything that I need to track my food. I tried my fitness pal and it was horrible. Carb manager is so easy to navigate, I am already seeing amazing results from my calorie deficit!

title: HATE the update like no other
body: Used for several years and really liked it except for very annoying pop up upgrade demands.  The update is terrible, the interface is not intuitive and very difficult to use.  All of my favorite foods painstakingly portioned and saved are lost.  New food list is much more difficult to use.  The app has completely lost its utility for me and I must uninstall it.  Very sad to have lost an old friend.
response: Hi there - please check "My Foods" under the fork + spoon icon for saved recipes, custom foods, etc. If your data is truly missing, please reach out to support in-app via Settings → Help & Support and we can help you to troubleshoot and recover anything. Thanks!

title: Excellent app with one wishlist item
body: This app excels in every aspect. I would really like to see Samsung Health support for automatically logging exercise. I think that’s the only big-five fitness device integration that’s missing. Thank you!

title: New Version issues
body: I am someone that does well with change.  The reason why I selected your app was the simplicity compared to others.  My lower rating is also do to the very slow load when I first open the app.  I upgraded for a 3 month membership hoping it would be faster.  It cycles through the logo 3 times before the app actually opens.

title: Ap changes 👍
body: I like how it calculates each meal and snack!!

title: Need help
body: I am leaning to love this app. I even pay for premium now. But, I have gotten logged out and can’t get back in. I have even reset my password, it goes through, but won’t let me log back in. I am looking to contact support, but can’t find that either.

title: EZ to use!!
body: I’m actually loving the keto lifestyle! Although I did have the keto flu at day three and four, after my first full week, I am down 4 pounds and feel absolutely terrific! This little app Totally helps keep everything on track!

title: Update issues?
body: I really love this app, I’ve been using it for over a year now but I have noticed with the update the Er carb count is off.

title: It’s not nice to take money that’s not yours!
body: I am very disappointed in the fact that my refund has not been received yet.  I have send numerous emails since November about this issue.  I did as I was told and canceled my subscription before the 7 day expiration for a full refund and have yet to receive it.  Even after receiving 2 computer generated emails and still no refund.  I have done as directed for my refund, now do as you promised and send me what’s owed.
response: Hi Diva - Sorry to hear about the issues that you're experiencing. I'd like to invite you to reach out to our friendly support team for assistance. You can reach them in the app via Settings → Help & Support. They'll be happy to assist! Be sure to include your app store user name (DivaQtie) when you contact them. All the best!

title: I love it!
body: The only reason it doesn’t get the 5 th star is because I wish that it would calculate the nutrition info from a recipe I input. Right now I have to calculate the nutrition in another app then transfer them to my custom foods. I wish I didn’t have to do that extra step.

title: Very functional and easy to use.
body: Great tracker - even if you’re not doing low carb because you can set your own goals! Only change I would make is to make it easier to copy multiple items from one day to  another.

title: Game Changer!
body: I have tried several meal-tracking apps, this is by far the easiest to use and stick to. Makes it so easy to track all aspects of your diet and also identify keto friendly options. Love it!

title: Keto NEWBEE
body: Just started Keto after doing HCG....it has been wonderful!  Logging and watching my carbs & staying sugar free is super easy with this app!!! It helps me every day!! The quick scanner is wonderful!!! Every part is 10+ in my book!!!! Easy to do!  Easy, Easy, Easy...

title: This is now help button or contact support.
body: This app seems to work fine for lots of people, but apparently not for me.  I had it one day and it would not load my information, when I tried to reset it that did not work, deleted it and recreated an account, and now it won’t even load food (says I have a bad connection, yet I am able to access all my other apps and the internet).  Where is support for this app?

title: Love everything + sodium tracking note
body: Love everything about this app. The one thing I would like to do but can’t easily is break out sodium content of my individual meals or snacks. I would love to be able to do that!

title: Beautifully designed and great features
body: This app design is so well put together. Kudos to the graphic designers. Also the functionality is superb. Simply scan the barcodes on your foods packaging, and track. It’s that simple!

title: First day
body: Played with app for several days. Decided it is worth premium. Just entered first day. Lots of flexibility.   Away from home the next 8 days. Curious to see how that works. Could not find a box lunch that did not require refrigeration.

title: Best tracking app
body: Easy to use with almost everything I’ve scanned being there. Easy to add when you scan an item that isn’t listed. It keeps me on track.

title: Enhancement request.
body: Love the app.  One thing I’d love to see is a pure scan mode.   I’m at the store and just want to keep scanning things to see their grade.   Having it just scan, and then flash up A B or F and be ready for the next scan would be awesome.
response: Hello from Carb Manager review and thank you for your review. We're happy to add this to our list of feature requests for the app. Thank you for contributing a useful improvement. If we decide to move forward with this request, we'll happily let you know if it's available. Thank you!

title: Great app
body: I wanna give this app a five star but then there would be nothing to improve right? Wrong. I do wish the library of food entries was bigger so I can be more accurate. Otherwise a great app if you are determined to lose weight.

title: New to Keto
body: I am very new to keto and this app has been the biggest help during my journey. I am able to make the best keto choices while I am grocery shopping. I am able to get a firm grasp of my card intake. The pound are just steadily dropping off.

title: Scan tool stopped working
body: I’ve been using this app for a year and have really enjoyed it, however all my scanned items in my history are not showing the macros anymore.  Also, if I try to re-scan them it still will not show macros.  Paying for the premium membership... Not happy
response: Hello from Carb Manager support & thank you for your review. We're very sorry to hear that you are not able to locate your data your recently scanned items! Our support team welcomes the opportunity to assist you with this issue and would love to hear from you. Please select "Need Help?" in-app & reference the username "Beefin12" & we'll be happy to assist!

title: Perfect
body: This app gives me the data I’ve been searching for on what and how much to eat in each category. I am looking to minimize carbs but it also tells me how much protein and other things I should eat. Thanks!

title: App won’t sync to or from iPhone
body: I followed the directions carefully (logged in with exact same info) but the app will not sync to my iPhone. It will sync to my computer from my iPad. I paid for the premium service for a year. If I can’t resolve this, it was definitely a waste of money. Otherwise it seems like a fine app.
response: Hi there, so sorry for the problem! It might be that you are not signed into the same account on all devices. Please check your login under Settings > Account Settings. If this doesn't work, please contact us via the support center in the app and we'll help you out!

title: Confused
body: I am lost to what a meal should be. Looks like I have smaller portions and staying by what I need. Yesterday I went over in a couple things. I thought it was a very good portion of food. I’m getting a little frustrated. I work 10 hrs shifts and my husband MS. So when I return to work from my injury I feel I might fail with prepared meals for both of us in advance.

title: Makes Keto Macro Counting So Simple
body: I love Carb Manager. It’s helped me track all my macros. I love that you can scan barcodes and it pulls the food and nutrition facts right up for you. I also love that you can create your own custom meals and share them with others!

title: Liking it...one addition would be nice
body: Liking the app and bought the paid version. Would ask that you feed water consumption   data to the apple health app. You have the water tracker in carb manager already...why don’t you feed that data point?

title: Keeps me on Track
body: This App has been super helpful and keeps me on track!  I’m already down 23lbs in a month and a half !  I will continue to use this even after I hit my goal just to keep me maintaining!

title: Great resource!
body: I downloaded the app the first day of my low carb/keto diet. I couldn’t have done it without the app!!! It’s helped me not only keep track of my macros but also understand the diet much much better. I highly recommend it.

title: Easier to find usual foods
body: Wish it would pull foods you use easier.  Ones you eat more often should be easier to find and you shouldn’t have to search for them as hard.  It should adjust to each person.

title: Best app for tracking
body: The carb manager app is amazing. It breaks the food down into its nutrients and gives you a visualize of how you are doing each day. It’s so easy to use and you can transfer food forward to another day.

title: Easy
body: I love carb manager.  I would not be able to stay with my healthy eating habits if it was not for carb manager.  It makes it so easy to stay focused and on track.  It is amazing how much information they have on foods in their library.

title: Love this...
body: Tracking is so time consuming but this app makes the process so much easier. I'm very happy with the library of foods and adding new foods is very simple. I wouldn't have gotten into ketosis so quickly without this.

title: Easy look up
body: My husband is using something else, I tried to use his and prefer the look up and recipe features of CarbManager. I often get the data on CarbManager to enter into his app. He’s not willing to switch yet.

title: Helpful and I’ve lost weight.
body: The app is easy to use but also has the bells and whistles of you need that.  Just the simple act of tracking every bite I take has helped tremendously.  I like the interface and ease of use.  Thanks.

title: Can customize macros
body: Too many of these apps set the macros for you. I love that I can customize my macros myself. I do wish at least some of the recipes were not only for premium members. Just started carb cycling, great app so far.

title: Better before the update
body: This app used to be clear and intuitive. Then it was as upgraded. You know the saying, “If it’s not broken, don’t fix it?”  The Carb Manager people didn’t pay attention. I can’t find anything and the app is nice longer intuitive. I spend a lot of time looking for stuff. 😩
response: Hi there, we’re sorry to hear you’re struggling with the update—we’re listening, and our Development Team is working diligently to fine-tune this new version of the app so you’ll love it as much as the old version. Please reach out to us in-app, and our awesome Support Team will be happy to guide you through the update and answer any questions you may have.

title: It was a great app before the recent update!
body: I’ve been trying to add my daily intake for like 15mins now and no matter how many times I’ve tried it just wouldn’t load!! I tried deleting every window I had open and tried loading it again and nothing! Complete trash... Wish you guys had left it the way it was. It was perfectly fine to me!
response: Hi there, we’re sorry to hear you’re struggling with the update—we’re listening, and our Development Team is working diligently to fine-tune this new version of the app so you’ll love it as much as the old version. Please reach out to us in-app, and our awesome Support Team will be happy to guide you through the update and answer any questions you may have.

title: I hate the update
body: When I first installed this app, loading food and looking for past foods that I documented was easy. Now, I can’t find stuff that I know I documented or scanned. There use to be a better option to look for past food entries. I don’t want to navigate the calendar because it’s too cumbersome. Fix it

title: New update not working out
body: I have used carb manager for going on 2y  now and have always loved it until this latest update. Now it is constantly going off line, telling me there ‘is a problem adding this’ when I try to creat my recipes, etc. you need to fix this carb manager, if it gets too frustrating to use, people will find other apps.
response: Hi there - thanks for the feedback, and for being a long time user! We're listening, and making regular (daily) updates and fixes to get CM7 in top shape. Feel free to reach out in-app via Settings → Help & Support or via support@carbmanager.com for help troubleshooting any of these specific issues, as it we can help you and in turn help other members of the community who may experience similar issues! Cheers!

title: New version is trash don’t update
body: I’ve been using the carb manager app since December 2020 and it was great until the latest update when they completely reworked the entire layout, I can’t even find the barcode scanner so I’m guessing it was removed. I even paid for the premium version but this is horrible whatever you do do not make the mistake I did and update the app I wish I could go back to how it used to be.

title: Don’t like update
body: Do not care foe the latest update.  Can no longer share recipes with my wife or friends, tried sending a “friend request” and still have issues.  It is also more difficult to find and log foods than previous version.  The UI is sexier, but it doesn’t fix the UX.  I hope Carb Manager figures out a good update.  I’m already looking for a replacement...

title: Easy to use
body: It’s so nice & easy to count your macros when you just add what you’ve eaten throughout the day & even easier when your following a carb manager recipe.  Also easy to use adding a custom recipe to my foods.

title: The best in the Industry
body: I love Carb Manager!!!  It takes the frustration out of counting carbs  and lets me spend more time creating new keto recipes. The scan feature is so easy to use and helps you determine if the item in A rated keto item.

title: Carb mgr
body: The app has worked well thus far (first week).  It’s very easy to pick or scan the foods off the search feature.  Only thing I have found is not all scanned items work in the app.  I would recommend it to anyone trying the keto diet.

title: Awesome App
body: For Keto dieters this app does it all for you. Enter your size and weight goals and it does the rest.

title: Keto
body: This is the best app to count all your macros on keto, I love that it saves your recents inputs. I mainly eat almost the same thing weekly and switch over. It makes it way easy if the portion size and brand is already in my history. Love this app

title: Good app
body: I really do like this app and it’s great for Keto since it calculates net carb. I knocked off 1 star because some days it’s really slow and won’t load. I like to plan my food diary from the morning so I keep track of macros and it’s frustrating when I can’t. Other than that, great app!

title: Help
body: I love the ap but 2 days or 3 out of the week I cannot get in. It says trying to reload check internet. Internes is super good in this area we have the best never problem with any other app. What’s happening. I also have premium. Sometimes I can’t log meals all day. Help

title: This App!
body: I love this app, it gives you almost all the foods you would eat!   However...there is one issue I have and that is I opened this app on my iPad and it doesn’t copy over to my iPhone .  So now I can only use when I’m home and not out and about when eating. 😞

title: Couldn’t have done it without this app!
body: I started the keto lifestyle without much knowledge on how to balance the numbers. This app made all the difference for me! I have told so many people about it! It is my lifeline right now!

title: Easy to use. Free portion meets my need.
body: Great app for following macros. Although many apps have incredibly limited free tools, this one has everything I was looking for. A couple of the premium things look okay, but none seem essential (IMO).

title: Shopping Made EZ
body: Besides all the tracking, the ability to scan UPC codes makes the guessing out of keto friendly items. Example would be marina sauce. Another loved feature is how the app rates the foods. It’s soooo easy to do right.

title: Great for keto!!!
body: I am on my 7th day and this app really has kept me on target.  It makes keeping your daily nutrition goals so much easier.  Since I’m new to keto, this app has kept things in perspective for me.  Definitely worth going to premium!!!

title: Has all the info
body: I am super impressed by the food brands it has!! I’ve entered many brands from Natural Grocers and Sprouts and most are in the system! Most apps only have very well known brands...this app makes keeping track of carbs and fats super easy.

title: Keep on track!
body: I love,love this app! It keeps me on track and I know exactly how many carbs,calories,fat,fiber and more I need for a day.I love the scanning foods when I’m at the grocery store cause it’ll tell me exactly a no no n a yes on carbs. I couldn’t do without it.

title: GREAT App!
body: I would buy full version if they offered a one time purchase price instead of monthly as long as it had guarantee on life of app. So many apps stop working after operating system updates.

title: Great ap
body: CM makes it so easy to keep track and compare. I love the graphs! The best though is the scanning of packaged food for data. And then you can keep using the same data or revise it for quantity.

title: Very helpful
body: This app is extremely helpful, it provides tailored macros that can evolve as you do ! I found this very helpful keeping me accountable for my intake and helping me eliminate foods that play against my life style. Very practical and user friendly

title: Really good for tracking net carbs!
body: I’ve used plenty of food trackers and I really like this one in general, but for tracking net carbs, it’s outstanding. My only wish: please update it for iOS 13. The UI does a lot of weird things now.
response: Hey there! Thanks so much for the kind words. We've prioritized our net carb tracking features (and we're one of the only macros trackers that offers them to free users) so we're thrilled that you like them! As far as the issues with the UI on iOS 13, we had some issues when iOS 13 first came out, but we've updated the app for iOS 13 and those issues should now be resolved. If you'll please reach out to our support team in the app (Settings - Contact Support) they'll be happy to troubleshoot!

title: Really good tracker
body: My manager recommended me this app when I started my Keto diet last month. I love how it tracks everything and I can look up foods from restaurants beforehand to see nutrition facts before making decisions. I have lost 13 lbs!!!!!

title: Very helpful in my Keto lifestyle!
body: The app is great for tracking daily macros. 4 stars because some times adding items is not as easy or transparent. But that upc scan option is pretty cool as well as all the options for serving size. Makes me pay real close attention to my portions.

title: Love this app
body: Carb Manager is absolutely awesome for setting goals and showing daily progress of your food intake. Very easy to track food using either search feature or scanning a products packaging. A+

title: Great App
body: Easy to use, lots of helpful info, intuitive.  Can be tailored to meet individual goals.  Highly recommended for all looking to track their carb consumption.  Actually tracks much more - check it out.

title: Easy but could use an improvement
body: Easy to use, and my rating would be five stars but wish that once you enter a recipe you could share between members in your group so everyone would not have to re-enter all the info.

title: Easy carb tracking
body: This app is perfect for a person who wants to track their carbs and see how they are managing their nutrition. While the purchased program probably adds additional information, the free app irks very nicely.

title: Life Changing
body: I have used Carb Manager for 6 days and it has completely changed my eating habits and life style. Easy to use! I hope to buy the premium one in a couple of weeks! So excited to keep using Carb Manager!

title: Keeps freezing up
body: I purchased this app about a week ago and love it. My complaint is that when I go to use it it freezes up. I have to restart my phone and it works. I am not willing to restart my phone every time I want to log something. Please fix this! Or I will be forced to find a different app…

title: Great app!
body: I like this app. Tracking my macros is so helpful! I wish I didn’t have to pay to get recipes, but I understand they need to profit somehow. For now I will just use the free part of it. Maybe I will pay later.. we’ll see!🤷‍♀️

title: Great App - Please add fasting
body: This is a really well done app.  Super useful, well designed, UI is respectful of my time to enter data.   I do wish you would add fasting routines.  Tracking my fasts in CM would be amazing and I'll be even more likely to renwew my premium subscription.
response: Hi there - so glad you are loving the app! To track fasting, please go to Settings > Track Meal Times. Then, set a time when you add foods, and the app will calculate your fasting and eating windows (My Nutrition & Wellness > Fasting).

title: App is having network error codes and won’t let me add food
body: I have been using this app for about 8 days and today it is saying there is a network error and won’t let me add food... what’s wrong?

title: Easy to use
body: The easiest app to calculate my calories and carbs. It has a lot of food options which makes it easier when making food choices.

title: Great app
body: I love this app especially since it’s free. There is an option to track your steps however I don’t think it’s worth the monthly fee. I just continue to use my other tracking apps for that

title: Beginners Dream!
body: I have never been on a diet. It's always been unpractical and ultimately never sustainable, so I avoided failure...sort of. I have learned so much in such a short time.  I really think it's fool proof. I can make these changes without stressing. Try it. It's a pocket nutritionist.

title: Love it!
body: Love the app and the ease that you can track all of the measurements and nutrients. I would recommend also adding a export data feature to allow to download daily logs also. Keep up the good work!

title: Love
body: I love this app!!  It’s so easy to use and helps me so much!  My favorite thing I think, is that I can make a recipe.  Like, I put together a recipe for my iced coffee, and now I don’t have to add all the Ingredients every morning, I can just select what I named “iced coffee.”

title: Worth it!
body: I used the free version for a while with amazing success, but the additional ideas, menu, suggestions, etc with the paid version is absolutely worth it!

title: Additive
body: Took me 6 months to actually start using, but once started have lost 7 lbs. My husband has lost 10 and that is after only 2 weeks. It’s now part of my daily routine.

title: Should have left it along!
body: Subscribed to this app for a couple years now and won’t renew. Will find another app that is user friendly like this app was before last update. Importing recipes doesn’t work half the time if that much! Trying to find other things that were easy on the old version is now like playing hide and seek in this version. Sorry but this app now gets a big thumbs down!!!!!

title: Frustrating
body: After I sign in it keeps telling me to sign in. Then when I swipe to change screens it tells me to sign in. I have a difficult time navigating the app anyway and then this makes it even harder. I have uninstalled and reinstalled to try to fix the problem.. ugh

title: New Version is HORRIBLE
body: The recent update is sooooooo slow.  Takes forever for foods to populate for selection.  You have to select s food more than once.  Instead of providing you with your macro percentages, they only show you the percentage of total for each individual component.  I want to know my overall macro percentages.  Also if you have the app on more than one device, they no longer sync.  Looking for a new app.

title: Opened my eyes
body: I am a Type 2 diabetic and truly was not aware of my carb consumption as much as I thought I was. This app is very helpful in knowing where I am spending my calories and carbs, helping me make much better choices.

user_name: Is it legit I think so
title: Easy access and very user friendly
body: Easy access and very user friendly. Tells you everything you need to know and where you stand for the day.

title: Slow response
body: App is amazing at tracking macros and is super fun. Many diet options but the app is. So. Slow. Slow when opening up the app. Slow to recall data. Slow to search and log food. It’s caused my phone to crash a few times and I have fairly new phone. Would not recommend.
response: Hi Daldo222 - Thanks for reporting the issue! Rest assured that we're working around the clock to fine tune the new version of the app.

title: Great App
body: I found this to be easy to manage my intake of carbs. Also to just scan my items and see if it’s acceptable or not. at the end of my day I can see my numbers so I can improve where I lack.

title: App
body: I love Carb Manager. It makes it so easy to keep track my daily carb intake, and there is access to wonderful recipes.  It also gives me daily reminders to log my food intake. Great app, I couldn’t live without it.

title: Easy
body: I’m new to the keto diet and I wouldn’t have been able to start this confidently without this app! It’s a carb counter, keto grading, calorie counting, and exercise counting app! It’s everything you need to keep track of your successful diet plans!

title: Awesome
body: I love seeing the macros visually and this app has helped me keep track of everything I’ve put in my belly. From drinks to snacks its got it all! You can even track exercise and water intake. Great app! Even for not paying the price.

title: Couldn’t do Keto without this app!
body: This app has been so helpful!  I have learned so much and see what I have done wrong in my past attempts at doing a Keto diet.  I have been using this for four days and I have lost four pounds.

title: Search Option
body: I wish there was a search option in the recipe tab.

title: Best tracking app out there!
body: Easy to navigate. I started using it while doing low carb, but eventually went off of that way of eating. This app is still great! Don't let the title fool you, it is very customizable.

title: Loving App
body: I’ve been on Keto for 13 months and Intermitting Fasting for 8 months. I’ve lost 130 lbs over the 13 months. This Is making me sure I stay on track for the next 45 lbs.

title: Weight Loss Journey
body: This App has help me so much thru my Keto journey. I have lost 30lbs in 4 months. As long as you log/scan everything you intake you will get the best results from this app. Thank you Carb Manager so such an awesome and free app. 100% recommended!

title: Not upfront
body: For prompt and friendly response to a previous review that in my error, I misunderstood what I read, and for being top notch with their customer service and detail to explanations- Thank you!
response: Hey there! Thanks for your feedback. Our core app is free and always will be. In fact, we don't offer a trial of our Premium, because we always let our users choose for themselves. Many of our users reach their goals without ever upgrading to Premium. In addition, our Premium app is $39.99 for the whole year; not monthly. Our Premium version is there for users who want access to advanced features like fitness device integrations, premium recipes, and more, but both versions find success stories!

title: Great app!
body: Makes counting carbs simple. I’ve never done this but I’m losing 1-2 lbs a day. Amazing. I’m never hungry and I have given up sugar!  67 years old. Wonderful!

title: Need refund of non approved subscription
body: Great app. But I did not agree to an automatic subscription. And of course there is no where to unsubscribe. It says if I delete the account it will not stop auto subscription fees...... this is not how to do business.
response: Hello, and thanks for taking time to provide feedback. Subscriptions are easily cancelled or changed through the service provider, iTunes, Google Play or through Carb Manager. If you're having trouble cancelling an auto-renewal, please contact us through the app, Settings - Need Help?

title: Good but not worth Premium cost
body: Basic app is good but was disappointed when I bought the upgrade. I was hoping for a more interactive analysis feature and the recipes, etc are pretty basic and available for free on other online sites.
response: Thanks so much for that great 4 star rating! We really appreciate it. Our Premium version includes a meal planner, access to Premium recipes, automated shopping lists, educational resources, interactive analysis, a feature where you can log food simply by taking a picture of it, and more! We'd be happy to help you get the most out of your Premium subscription. Don't hesitate to reach out to our support team in the app via Settings - Contact Support. Cheers!

title: Works great
body: I’ve lost 80 lbs on a keto diet.  Tracking your food is the most important aspect of the diet.  This app works great and makes it so easy with UPC scanning and ability to put in recipes etc.

title: DISAPPOINTED TO HAVE BOUGHT THE APP
body: I am totally bummed after purchasing the $40 app to specify help me generate meal plans to work within given perimeters of my macros and food allergies. I thought this is great, I now will have the perfect tool to help me customize meals plans and provide specific recipes that I will like. So after I listed the couple of food allergies and food aversions on the food list to be EXCLUDE in the meal plans, the first meal generated INCLUDED BOTH THE ALLERGIC AND AVERSION INGREDIENTS IN THE FIRST RECIPES!  WHAT A WASTE!  I WOULD HAVE GIVEN IT A NEGATIVE STAR IF AVAILABLE!!!!
response: Hi there and thanks for your review. We're happy to offer some suggestions to help you edit and customize your meal plan to meet your needs. Additionally, we're sorry to hear that your meal plan results didn't meet your needs. From here, we'd love to connect with you to help sort this issue for you. Please select "Need help?" in-app or email support@carbmanager.com so that we may assist you further. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Have lost 50 lbs since 1/1/19.
body: I starts with a wellness coach in April of this year and she go me to use Carb Manager. It makes keeping track of what I am eating so much easier. I am doing low carb not Keto and it is working great. Highly recommend using this app!

title: Making keto easy!!
body: This app is great. Very user friendly. If you are considering the keto life style this is an awesome place to start. Customer support is awesome as well....I know this because I’ve had to contact them a time or two 🤗🤗

title: I use it daily
body: This carb counter is absolutely great. It has been easy to use and the food data is very complete. For me it has the right amount of detail but is easy to use. I use it daily!

title: Disappointed
body: I loved this app, I love the way it’s set up and counts my macros, but since I redownloaded it it’s been so glitchy. Most of the time it won’t load to open the app. It always says I have no internet connection when clearly I do. This is very inconvenient when I’m eating out and need to track my meal. I always end up having to write it down so I can try to input it later.
response: Hi there - so sorry for the problem! Please email us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll get this fixed for you.

title: Warning - randomly resets your data!
body: I use this app every day,  and every couple of weeks or so the app resets and I lose all of my data - including all tracking history, custom foods, macros, etc. This has happened twice now and is infuriating. I understand that changing devices would cause me to lose my data, but this is the same phone, no change to any accounts. Going to be looking for alternatives now.
response: Hey there, thanks for contacting us. Please contact us via Settings > Contact Support and we can help get your data back. All data is stored in accounts, so it sounds like you were signed out and then created a new account. We can get this sorted out for you.

title: Great app- check macros
body: This is a great app for tracking your Keto macros. Beware- you need to double check the macros on your food selections and adjust them, or just make a new food with the right info. Sometimes they are way off!

title: Great app very thorough free version
body: This app has educated me on keto.  I am using the free app and have lost 2.8 pounds in 8 days. It has so many helpful articles that and has helped me navigate this new way of eating.  The scale is moving slowly but I feel really good.

title: Carb Manager is thorough
body: I like the complete picture of carbs, protein, fats, and calories of the foods I have entered. It has definitely helped me reduce the amount of carbs I’m taking throughout the day. I also like the list of options available.

title: Keeping Me ON TRACK
body: I was failing big time with my Keto Diet because I was tracking.  A friend told me about this app, and I found out, though I was eating Keto friendly foods, I wasn’t eating near enough 😳!  This app helps me to see where I’m having problems and help me to adjust accordingly.  I’m hitting my macros now 💪🏽!

title: Isn’t dependable
body: I love how the app is set up- I’ve been using it for a couple weeks now, but I have come to notice that it is slow and doesn’t always load when you want to use it. I was planning on trying the free version and then buying but now I know it’s not worth the money. I have to move all my information into another app that will be reliable

title: Super educational!!
body: I love the carb manager ap for helping me learn so much about what I’m putting into my body and where it falls with my calories and macros. I’ve lost 6 lbs this week and failed on my carb intake 3/5 days!

title: Best app for carb management!
body: It’s well worth getting the yearly subscription—hardly anything per day for a killer accountability “partner.”  Love the recipes and the adjustable macros depending on my goals. I actually look forward to entering my food and exercise each day! Thanks!!

title: 5 pound in a week
body: I’ve dropped 5 pounds in the past week with the help of carb manager. Logging everything I eat is pretty tiring but being able to actually SEE my carb intake had made all the difference.

title: The best tracker, not just for low carb
body: This is by far the most thoughtfully designed tracker for those focused on a keto / paleo / primal way of eating. Frankly I’d use it over MFP even if I weren’t focused on carbs primarily. It’s more user friendly without being feature light.

title: Macros are mostly WRONG
body: For instance, I scanned a bottle of dressing into my meal. It had the correct name but totally wrong macros (2tbsp/10gm fat/1 carb per bottle, but scanned input and it says 2tbsp/6gm fat/5carb). Um what? Yeah this messed up my whole macros goal for today. Had two cups of diced chicken breast - 1 cup for two meals - and it said they were 87 gm protein??! Yeah, Back to MFP I’m going. Had heard good things about this app but I’m not impressed. Too bad I signed up for the three month subscription and have already paid it. Oh well.

title: 16 lbs the first week
body: Yes it is true. I’ve stayed on this diet as carefully as I can I have not gone over in carbs or calories or anything else. I go to bed satisfied and have not experienced any hunger.

title: Not what I expected
body: I had a hard time uploading recipes into the app and almost always just had to type it in or cut and paste.  The macros are hidden and takes a bit of searching to find.  I like My Fitness Pal a lot better.  It’s easier to navigate and upload recipes from the web.

title: Better than fitness pal
body: I like this app better than fitness pal because it’s easier to keep track of your macros. Also, like that the main screen shows me a pie chart of where I’m at for day.

title: User friendly app.
body: First 3 days kick start with zero- none- zip carbs. Low carb doesn’t count. After 3 days very low carb and get keto test strips. Lost belly fat right away plus exercise is import. Easy app to keep track. I recommend this app 100%

title: Helps!
body: I love this app! This app is definitely helping me keep track of the net carbs! I don’t have to do any math for my macros and that makes it soo much easier!! Being able to scan labels at the grocery store is wonderful!!!!

title: Great app
body: My only suggestion would be the ability to sort Food entries, when searching, alphabetically.  I have a limited time for lunch.  Spending time searching for a common entry seems wasteful.

title: So helpful!
body: This app is so helpful! I haven’t used it in a while and I’m trying to get back on track with my goals. They’ve made lots of improvements! I loved it before but I love it even more now!

title: New improvements are exceptional
body: So glad to have updated the application.  The upgrades make this an exceptional tool.  So point on to creating a plan, recording your intake and adding your recipes.  Excellent tool

title: Best free carb managing app ever and I have tried them all
body: FREE AND Easy to use - no pressure to upgrade.

title: No longer syncs with website
body: The app was easy to use and worked well. There was a February update for the companion website and new entries no longer sync with the app. Will there be a fix? The new site also makes searching for food items more difficult.

title: Horrific User Interface
body: This app is not user friendly at all. I find KetoDiet app or myfitnesspal so much easier to use. After updating I can’t even find where my calories, macros, carbs, fats for the day are located to see if I am under my limits. Also been trying for 10 minutes to put in philadelphia cream cheese and app keeps crashing after scanning barcode. User interface just doesn’t cut it for me. Do not recommend at all.

title: New Release is Buggy
body: I started with the older version and it wasn’t always the most intuitive but it worked. This new version looks great but I’m constantly having to close it and reopen to get search to work and it crashes a ton. Any idea when a new update is coming out?
response: Hi there, we are constantly updating the new app and pushing fixes to any known issues regularly. Make sure you have automatic updates on, and the most current iOS installed for best performace. If you have any specific questions or would like to report an issue, feel free to reach out to Support in-app via Settings → Help & Support for assistance.

title: So easy to use
body: I love this app to keep track of my food intake. It helps to keep me on track. Also links to my Fitbit to track how many extra calories I can eat based on my workout.

title: Not good
body: The problem with this is it doesn’t tell you what the serving size is. Although it has great recipes,  you can find recipes anywhere. The app gives you the totals for the entire dish but that’s common on any recipe. This is supposed to be a carb manager app. The whole point is..  we’re supposed to be managing carbs. And when it says 8+ servings it doesn’t tell you what a serving of the dish is. It’s pointless!!  That’s the only thing we needed!!!
response: Hi and thank you for your review! We appreciate your suggestions for improving the food logging experience. We'll be happy to review your account and offer some helpful advice to ensure you're set up for success when using recipes and meal logging. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username. Thanks!

title: Love this app!
body: I am a very busy professional. Carb app has completely improved my dietary ha bits!!!! I have fantastic energy and feel amazing! Also lost 15 pounds mostly from my tummy and feel like I’m 19 again! I HIGHLY recommend it. Thank you!!!!😊❤️

title: On My Way
body: I just started July 1st with CarbManager and new to Keto.  I need the tracking to keep me accountable and love the recipe options. I’ve got goals for my weight loss and I really think CarbManager will be extremely important in my success.  “On My Way”

title: Love Carb Manager
body: The membership is so worth it. Lots of recipes. Easy to import info. I also love the community features. I can share my log and meals with selected friends. Wish I would have gotten the membership sooner!

It’s really great in my opinion it helps me keep track of everything without going over when you scan food it might not have or can’t find item that’s the only thing but other than that it’s really great

title: Love this app
body: Just started the 𝙆𝙚𝙩𝙤 diet and I live this app.  My favorite thing is the meal planner.  Two things I would change tho.  I’d make it where you can edit the meals easier and the shopping list would be easier if it were more like a total list.

title: Inaccurate
body: I have found many inaccuracies if strict Keto appropriate

title: Why change?
body: I’ve been using this app very successfully since last fall. Very recently they changed the input method for the food logging page.  Not sure why, but now it is awkward and frustrating. If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it.

title: Love it
body: At the beginning I didn’t understand the app.  Once I learned how it works I was thrilled.  The recipes are great. Haven’t had one to complain about yet. My husband loves having something different and yummy every day.

title: Good App Easy to Use
body: I have the free version and it does everything I need it to do. I am LCHF. I would consider going premium if you can search your daily notes as a premium user, but I can’t find any info on that.

title: It Works
body: I love the app. It is doing a great job helping me keep my carbs at a reasonable level. It is super easy to use. I have been trying for over a year to lose weight without any success. I have lost 5 lbs is one week.

title: Love this app but...
body: I love this app, it has helped me track my carb intake and I have been losing weight like crazy.  But...  I need the app every day.  Please update the app ASAP to go along with the Apple updates because now my app won’t open!  I paid for premium I expect premium!  Thank you.

title: The number 1 app for weight loss
body: This app is the Best app I could ever download.. who ever thought of this app is brilliant!! Thank you! I have been doing Keto since March and lost an incredible 70 lbs within 7 months with this app. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ definitely 5 star App!

title: Keeps me in check
body: I love this app. One issue is with my new iPhone 11 pro the app does lock up and I have to shut down my phone at least once a day and reopen the app. I’ve re installed the app twice now.

title: So helpful!
body: I was worried about starting keto, but with this app it takes the questioning out of what you’re eating and makes you feel confident that you’re getting everything you need!

title: Love this Keto app!
body: Since I've been using this app, I've discovered how much over I've been eating and which foods to stay away from. Gave it 4 stars because there is no weight recording or graft, which would add to motivation.

title: Great UI, but USELESS because INACCURATE
body: Scan absolutely ANY food you want, then carefully look at the macros and compare it to the food label.

title: Love it!
body: I didn’t realize how badly I was sabotaging myself and my attempts at weight loss until I got this app! It’s amazing what the small act of keeping track of what goes into your mouth can do. Losing weight without starving is awesome and great for the soul!

title: Like it
body: This app has been essential in my health goals.  My doctor recommended I use it.  I just wish it had a bigger food database.  Sometimes I have to switch back and forth between myfitnesspal.  But all in all it's awesome.  I appreciate just knowing the net carbs of a food.  Great idea for an app!

title: Wonderful App!
body: A fabulous app! This keeps track of everything in one place. I love that I can change my macros as often as I need to! No matter what program your on, Carb Manager will keep you on track!

title: Accountability is key
body: This app helps me so much to be accountable for what I put in my mouth!  I was never about apps to help but this is super easy and does a great job of keeping me on track!  I’d recommend to anyone who is serious about their health!!

title: Can’t live with out it
body: I had no clue how to figure and keep up with my macro when the doctor put me on the keto diet!! I didn’t even have a clue what a macro was. Lol I was overwhelmed to say the least. So, have a tool like this app was such a blessing to have!!

title: Best app for a Keto beginner
body: If you are new to the world of keto dieting this app is extremely helpful to getting you started on the right track there were foods I had no idea had so many carbs and this app helped me sort that out.

title: Love it
body: It’s super easy to be on a keto diet and know where you stand on your macros with this app. I’ve used MFP and honestly prefer this app more. Plus there are THOUSANDS of recipes if you choose to get the premium version. But even without premium this is a good app.

title: Love this app!!
body: I really love this app. I was extremely stressed about trying to understand how to track my macros but this was the only app that made it make Sense and easy for me!! I really recommend it for anyone trying to hop on the keto wagon!

title: Sharing the app
body: Hi friends! I'm such a big fan and always want to share your app but can never find the sharing button. I mean just sharing tha app itself jot inviting someone to view my journal.
response: Hi there! Thanks for the review -- and for wanting to share CM! You can share apps directly from the app store on an iOS device via the share icon (little box with an "up" arrow) in the header beside the "open" button. Once you tap the button, just choose if you'd like to share via email, messages, etc. Hope that helps, and thanks again!

title: Has everything I need
body: Title pretty much says it. I haven’t ventured too far into everything but as far as tracking macros it’s perfect.   My only complaint is when I log a meal, I still get reminders later to log the meal I already put in.

title: Has helped me loose 45 lbs
body: Tracking macros is the key to loosing weight. Specially if you’re carb sensitive like me. Being able to meet a goal by tracking and planning meals is amazing. Here’s to another 10 to reach my goal of 190lbs

title: Hate the change!!
body: Carb Manager was an awesome app, and very helpful with my keto diet. I lost 40lbs using the app.

title: The update is awful!
body: I have been using this app for some time now and it was great. Keyword is WAS! Ever since the update it is complete trash. It does not store your searches, it is very hard to navigate and it is telling me I have 24 notifications and I can not find any or get it to clear. Several of my friends and family use the app and all feel the same way. PLEASE FIX THIS! Just go back to the old version!

title: Progress Wheel
body: It’d be nice if the progress wheel had cut-offs for your set goals. Certainly this is something that could be included or added with its current functionality. I love the app, but it’d be nice to not have to go through your settings each time to remember what you set as your goals! 3 stars for now.

title: Good evening
body: App is great .  Downfall is that once you start uploading your food the app stops working, spins forever and doesn’t update the food you selected.  I’ve had to reset and power off my iPhone many times just to upload something.
response: Hi there - Thanks for letting us know about the issues! We'd love to get this fixed for you. Please reach out to our friendly support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support, and be sure to include your app store username for fastest service. Cheers!

title: Great for beginners
body: Great for beginners to learn how to manage carb intake and be able to get take out options on the app is fantastic for me. Because I work 12hr shifts at my hospital. Not many fast food or restaurants that work with my schedule.

title: This app has incorrect nutritional values.
body: Even when I scan a UPC to add a food item it doesn’t record correctly. For example I added these sausage patties I eat for breakfast. Scanning it into the app it STILL says 5carbs. It clearly states ONE FULL PATTY is 3carbs. It always enters in incorrectly. I’ve had a snack come up as NEGATIVE CARBS even. Just odd and should be fixed because it’ll max me at breakfast or lunch for my total carbs for the day.
response: Hi & thanks! We work hard on the accuracy of our Food DB. It's true some branded/processed foods have been input by users, so if there are inaccuracies, you can always Report a Food Error or make Quick Edits to them. Just reach out in-app, & we can help share how as well as how to identify our NCCDB verified foods to make it easier for logging!

title: Amazing app for keto
body: The free version is fantastic! Almost all foods are on their database. It even lets you change up your macros goals unlike other popular tracking apps. Highly recommend it to anyone on keto

title: Mostly like this app
body: I like this app but I paid for the premium access so I could build recipes and get nutrition facts but I don’t have access to it. I have emailed and tried all the troubleshooting options and still don’t have it. Waiting for response.

title: Better than my fitness pal if you are doing keto
body: My fitness pal does not allow you to track net carbs, this app does. It also gives you more information about keto friendly foods.

title: Keto
body: So far so good it’s better then some other apps that only let you input and save a few foods before you have to pay $$. This app allows you too save so far every food you enter. I really like the scan option. Currently it’s the only Keto/diet app I’m using.

title: Extremely helpful program!
body: Love all the features of the program. Easy to add your own foods and recipes. Great way to keep up with what up put in your mouth. Access to lots of excellent recipes.

title: Love this app!!!
body: I had been looking for an app to track carbs and am so happy with this one. It has many of the low carb foods I am eating already labeled. Makes any low carb diet easy and manageable. Down an average of 7 lbs a week thanks to the app.

title: Carb manager
body: This is a huge help in recognizing exactly what you are eating. It is a little difficult because it’s hard to find your particular food at times. But it is still a help.

title: Subtract for Erythritol
body: The app needs to be updated to subtract Erythritol (or any other sugar alcohols) from total carbs. For example, Quest Bars on Carb Manager would have (correctly) 1 fewer carb if  the amount of Erythritol were subtracted from total carbs. Quest Bars have 4 net carbs, not 5—as Carb Manager measures. For any other foods that contain Erythritol, the grams of it should be subtracted from net carbs. This is net carbs basics!
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear you've run into an issue reviewing macros for a food item. We do pride ourselves on our database being as accurate as possible! However, to assist you further, select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "FocusBC" and we'll look into this issue immediately. Thank you!

title: Excellent app
body: Love the recipe ideas you get! You can even put a recipe in and it will rate the recipe. I made changes to a recipe to turn it from a C rating to an A rating. It works far better in helping to stay in ketosis then my Fitbit application!

title: Well worth the Premium subscription
body: Doing a Keto diet to lose weight and control (hopefully cure ) Type II Diabetes.  This is a. Invaluable aide for not only calculating my intake, but for shopping for recipes as well as what I can eat at restaurant chains
response: Thank you for taking the time to review our app! We’re sorry you experienced a brief period where you were unable to access your account. We are happy to report the issue is resolved. Please contact us in-app directly via "Settings - Need Help" and reference your username so we can assist further. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: I love CarbManager
body: I had stopped losing weight despite following my Keto diet to the letter and did not know what to do until someone recommended Carbmanager and now everything is super easy, I eat exactly to continue with a healthy life

title: Great app for Keto
body: This is the best free app I’ve found for Keto. It is a little annoying that it keeps asking over and over again if you want to upgrade (and it’s kind of spendy) but I can’t blame them, they have to make money too.

title: Very good (as long as you buy the $30 premium upgrade)
body: That’s the caveat.  Otherwise functionality is limited.  I have premium and my hubby has standard download.... it’s not that impressive.  Just prepare to upgrade To premium if you want decent functionality.

title: Great App
body: I highly recommend this app to anyone on a ketogenic diet. I used the free version for a few weeks, and ended up buying a subscription to the Premium version. It’s so worth it.

title: Carb counting
body: This app is the extremely valuable for me to find out how many carbs food has! There is no way I could or would spend as much time that would be needed to look foods up individually.

title: Easy
body: Very easy. Counting Macros can be difficult but Carb Manager makes it easy to keep up with my fats proteins and carbs for the day. Able to make quick decisions about what i should eat based on the pie chart given

title: My experience
body: It’s easy to follow and I know exactly how many net carbs are left for the day. My only concern is using the exercise app. It’s challenging finding exercises that I’m doing but carb manager is not tracking them ie certain exercise are not showing up so I have to estimate... otherwise it’s great!

title: Love the app but...
body: This is a great app for the Keto diet but it freezes all the time. And at least a couple times a week I have to delete the app and reinstall it because it won’t open!! I wouldn’t be so mad but I paid for this so I would expect it to work properly.
response: Hi there, sorry for the problem! Please contact us via Settings > Support Center and we'll help you get this fixed.

title: New to app....
body: Although I have only been using the app a short time it is very easy to use and really helps me stay on track. I know how many carbs I have left and how much fat I need to add to my next meal.  Thumbs up!!

title: 5 stars
body: Carb manager is a great way to manage my macros. With the scanner I don’t have to worry about accuracy and makes it easy to enter bought foods. I can enter and save whole recipes for future use too!

title: Love it
body: I’m personally someone who hates logging and tracking stuff but this app has made my life so easy on the Keto diet. I highly recommend the paid features and the scanning items and food advisor are go to’s for me.

title: Paleo diet tool
body: I want to keep my grams of carbs down to only 15 in a 3-4 hour period in order to burn fat and to get my A1C level below 5.0. This app is great for meal planning and tracking calories, protein, fat, carbs and other nutrients. It has supplement values and exercise values.

title: Used to love it!!
body: I really loved this app and used it for several months. I just tried again after extended non use and now you can only add five items per day without paying. Screw that.
response: Hi there - thanks for getting in touch. If you previously paid for the app, you should get unlimited entires. Please email us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll get it sorted for you.

title: Premium Customer Here
body: This would be even more Awesome if The Premium I paid for the Year of $40 would have transferred over to my new phone! I’ve only had it two months and now nothing 🤥

title: Jus right
body: Unlike some trackers, this app is geared towards keto or low carb high fat. It doesn’t make you feel bad about eating fats. In the initial assessment it asks what diet/lifestyle you’re doing and adjusts your macros accordingly. It’s got no ads and is just what I was looking for.

title: Leads you by the hand
body: I absolutely love this app. I was so intimidated when I started keto but this app helped me plan my meals, made me a shopping list and wrote out what I should eat all day with recipes. I would 100% recommend.

title: Love it, but there is a request.
body: I love the app a bunch, and i use it every day. I was just wondering if you could make it be compatible with Widgetsmith? So i could have it on my home screen.

title: Very helpful- wish more customizable
body: Overall super helpful the math of being keto is so complicated and this makes it easy! I just wish I could have it set to more carbs per day- I’m vegan and I’m realizing even if I ate straight tofu and olive oil shots it’s not possible to get 19 carbs or less lol

title: Nice app
body: This is a great app to keep track of carbs. It really helps me know how many carbs/calories I have left for the day which helps regulate what I eat every day.  I’m also learning what foods are Keto friendly- some that are not are surprising! I definitely recommend this app!

title: New input methods not good!
body: 1) no ability to ask for support in app
response: Hey JohnsJolly - Thanks for the review. Not sure what you mean on #1. Support is available in the app under Settings → Help & Support. On #2, that's thankfully not accurate. If you just tap the "Enter Your Own" link, the keyboard will open as always. If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to our friendly support team via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: A wonderful wonderful app that they just broke by making it too fancy
body: This was a five star app until a week ago when over complicating and fancification turned what was a very useful, easy to interact with and extremely helpful application into an overly obscure and ploddingly difficult to use application. Fancy with extra buttons and spectra steps is not better.

title: Unexpectedly Great App!
body: Free and fabulous. This app is great for keto diet. I love that it gives each food a keto grade and tells you if you should enjoy it often, in moderation or just occasionally. Thanks to the developers for giving us such a powerful app!

title: THE best app for Keto dieters
body: It’s well worth the subscription price. I lost 15 pounds my first month and feel incredible. Tons of amazing recipes, a plethora of helpful information and advice; I honestly don’t know why I waited so long to try this!!!

title: It makes it all so easy
body: This app is simple, well thought out, gives lots of benefits for the free version and makes understanding how to choose food clear and easy.

title: Not the worst not the best
body: It’s free, lots of incorrect food macros identified, check the comments people will let you know if they found a better result for that specific food.
response: Hi & thanks for the review! We work hard on the accuracy of our Food DB. It's true some branded/processed foods have been input by users, so if there are inaccuracies, you can always Report a Food Error or make Quick Edits to them. Just reach out in-app, & we can help share how as well as how to identify our NCCDB verified foods to make it easier for logging!

title: Accountability
body: I have logged every bite of food I’ve eaten, daily, into CarbManager for 15 months. I’ve lost 99 pounds to date. I have no intention of quitting now. Another 20 lbs will put me at my slim high school weight of 145. I’m on this journey with KETO & CarbManager for the long haul.

title: Amazing
body: Great app helps you log and an amazing interface. When you you put your health information in, it caters to you and tells you your goals. Overall an amazing app, a must have!

title: Life changing
body: This app is super easy and it works!!! I will be 49 this year. I lost 6 lbs since Monday and today is Saturday. By the end of the week I had started losing 2 lbs a day. This app has just changed Everything!!!!

title: Easy to use
body: Never been one to track my food but this app makes it easy and I’m at 2.1 ketones from a blood test after 6 days of using this to track! Good keto diet start. Friend recommended this app!

title: The Perfect Tool!
body: If you are on keto this is the GO-TO app! I love it! And upgraded to the premium account because it just makes Keto for me a whole lot easier. I am a beginner in keto but this app helps me keep track of everything.

title: Carb manager
body: It took a little bit to get use to it but figuring it out now!!!   Lots of menu items already listed!!    Great way to keep track of what you eat! Carbs, proteins, fats and calories!!  Keeps me accountable for what I eat!!!

title: A must have for Type 2 diabetes
body: You can reverse your Type 2 diabetes with a Low Carb High Fat diet plus Intermittent Fasting (LCHF + IF). The Carb Manager is very easy to use and makes following a LCHF diet easy. Much better than My Fitnesses Pal, which does not show diabetic carbs in foods.
response: Unlike other fitness and diet trackers, Carb Manager is built specifically for LCHF and Keto diets. Check out our diabetic feature tour here: https://help.carbmanager.com/getting-started/diabetic-feature-tour

title: This app makes it easy to to keep up...
body: I started using this app 5 days ago, and I already see and feel better because I am able to see I and count the carbs... it’s really a great help

title: Easy!!!! Love this!!!❤️❤️❤️❤️
body: This is an amazing ap and I am so thankful for it as it makes the keto plan so easy!!!! I am also excited that they offer it free. It locks up sometimes which is a bummer but makes life so productive when doing keto.💕THANK YOU!!!😁
response: Hello from Carb Manager support. Thank you so much for the praise! It's great to hear how the Carb Manager app has helped you reach your Keto goals. Thanks again for spreading the word!

title: What a LiFESaVER
body: Weight loss wasn’t my goal. It was to reset my habits for better ones. Only doing this for 3 weeks; my energy is longer lasting, sleep is easier & longer, and digestion has become regular again.

title: Love it!
body: Just wish there was an easier way to combine items already in the app without putting each ingredient in one by one to create a personal recipe.   Maybe there is and I’m just not familiar enough with it enough yet. However, it’s a great app.

title: Carb counting
body: This app makes it super easy to figure out how many carbs a day you are eating. I’m also surprised at the restaurants that are listed I work on the road a lot no every day and was surprised that I can pull

title: Great App!!
body: I’ve been using Carb Manager for six months. Best tool ever!  Love the fact it syncs with my iWatch and tracks my calories burned, and I also sync it with Happy Scale to track my weight loss.  Recipes and food data bank are great.  Very, very useful app!!!

title: Customer service
body: Customer service responded in how to cancel subscription I accidentally signed on for . I contacted apple too to assist with giving me my money back as they handle the finances between. Third party app team
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. Our team would love the opportunity to show you how to cancel your Premium subscription. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Kimberly8869" and we'll be happy to assist. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

title: Absolutely Fantastic
body: Incredible app.  It was everything I could have hoped for in a nutritional tracker and more. Great flexibility and extremely user friendly user interface.  If you want to follow a diet this is the app to get!

title: Review
body: On my journey to get healthy My niece found a Carb Manager and it has been invaluable to me! It keeps track of how many carbs and calories I am eating and it’s a practice my exercise. I could not do it without this app! I’ve lost 18 pounds!

title: Good app, but a couple kinks
body: Love this app, but it’s not the best for storing food/exercises in the log. Some of my entries save for quick input, but many of them don’t and I’m not sure why. There could be more variety of “quick finds” too. Even so, I still recommend this app!

title: I finally “get” Keto!
body: This app has made some thing that felt overwhelming to me, so much easier to understand. The only improvement I could wish for is for the app to recognize the store brands of my local grocery stores but that’s not a huge deal!  Thanks Carb Manager!

title: Best tracking app
body: This app makes keeping on point with Keto easy. Nice at a glance pie chart as well as bar graph to make sure you are on an even keel. Have just used the free app so far, but so far that is enough for me. May go premium to add my Fitbit.

title: Best Carb Counting App in my opinion!!
body: This app is amazing, especially for Keto!! And it’s actually free unlike basically all the other apps. You CAN pay for premium, but that only gives you recipes and stuff. You really don’t need it! Love this app!

title: Amazing app!
body: This app is top notch! I have never done Keto the corrrect way before and on day four I’m feeling incredible and have lost some very very stubborn weight! This app by far blows everyone else away ! Keep up the great work y’all!!!!!

title: Needs scan option
body: I would love if the app included the scan barcode button to put up nutritional facts automatically. My fitness pal has this option and it’s awesome.

title: A must have for the Keto Diet
body: I Struggled with understanding how many carbs and fat I was supposed to be getting. The app made it so easy. I plan my next day ahead of time and adjust it based on the macros it shows. It so easy. The app is invaluable to me.

title: Amazing app
body: I ❤️ carb manager.  It’s so simple to use and to create recipes.  Also all the recipes at the bottom of app is a plus to have.  I’ve made so many meals that taste absolutely delish from carb manager.  Highly recommend for keto/low carb lifestyle.

title: Love this App
body: I have type 2 diabetes and I struggle with staying under my 60 carbs per meal. This app helps me track what I am eating and if I am over portioning. Being able to find low carb meals each day with meal planner is a huge help.

title: New problem
body: I have been using this app for two weeks now and it is a life saver. HOWEVER starting this morning it will not load the foods you have entered in yourself under the “my foods” tab which is EXTREMELY frustrating and difficult to put in accurate details and measurements

title: Carb Manager is Fantastic!
body: I started watching my carb intake and needed an app that would help me track my eating and be easy to use.  Carb Manager fits the need.  I'm especially pleased that they have restaurant and packaged food designations.  I lost 8 lbs the first week!  I really needed CM!

title: Great app for carb counting.
body: It’s easy to use and in bold numbers I see you net carb intake. Love it and totally recommend it. I love that it’s free. Although for some of the other parts to use you do have to pay monthly but I just use the free part. I it stays free.

title: Love this app
body: I really love this app! It makes it so much easier to count your calories and your carbs during the day. I really feel that it is help me boost my weight loss and I’m planning on going to the premium membership

title: New interface very buggy
body: Sorry, we’re not liking the new interface.  It’s less user friendly and has many bugs.

title: Disappointed
body: When I first started with Carb Manager I started with a premium subscription for the first year and created recipe cards. Then I went to regular for a year then back to premium as I am making recipe cards again. I haven’t been able to import recipes and I reached out to customer service awhile ago and they stopped responding to help. A waste of money if I cannot use a feature that helps brand me.

title: Keeps me honest
body: This app makes me honest and it’s simple to use, you can save custom meals, search restaurants and scan items.

title: New Update 5 Stars to 2
body: The new update is awful! It's so much harder to navigate. I've been using the app for over a year, absolutely loved it. It's just not intuitive for use at all, and the larger imaging and sectioning makes it more difficult to see as a whole. It's also MUCH harder to locate foods are uploaded by other users. Please change it back!
response: Hi Cheshire! We hear you and our Development Team is working diligently around the clock to fine tune the new version of the app. We have been fixing bugs and smaller glitches as fast as we can.

title: Loving it so far
body: This is an excellent tool to track my intake. Loving it so far! Easy to use has lot’s of food choices. And the scanning option is excellent and very useful when shopping.

title: Premium broken again
body: Someday Carb Manager will figure out a way to release a new version that doesn’t break premium subscribers. But it is not this day.
response: Hi there! I'm sorry to hear you are having issues with the app, what you're describing definitely does not sound like normal behavior. We welcome the opportunity to assist you in troubleshooting the problem you may be experiencing. Please message us from within the app, and our awesome customer service team will be happy to help!

title: New Type 2
body: I am a newly diagnosed Type 2 diabetic and my doctor suggested this app. I have found this app to be very user friendly.

title: Wow
body: I don’t think I’d be able to be in keto without this app. After FIVE days I’ve lost five pounds. I don’t have to do any of the counting. The app does it all for me :). Just scan the foods you plan to eat, and it’ll tell you how it’ll affect your diet. I LOVE IT!

title: Internet connection
body: Please fix now it says something about network and internet connection and cellular data is on so now Incannotnaccessnit. Cellular data is on and still saying still loading internet connection. Maybe something about security ?
response: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. Please contact our support team at support@carbmanager.com and they’ll be happy to assist!

title: Very helpful to watch carbs
body: App offers different options (strict carbs vs light carbs vs moderate) that you are able to select. Calculates caloric need based on weight. All for free. Upgrade is an option for additional features.

title: Vejorra
body: Carb manager was the key to keeping my diet goals! It’s list has just about every food I’ve tried to eat and it has accurate calculations for me to keep track. I’ve lost  35 lbs so far and am very pleased.  Love it!🥰

title: Carb counting made easy
body: This is by far the easiest and most recommended App for anyone who is trying to reduce carbs and monitor macros. The grading system for each item makes it that much better. Love this app.

title: Help
body: Just got the app and I’m wondering if there’s a way to input ingredients you use in your foods you make? I don’t usually go off of a recipe so I need this function, help!
response: Hi there. We can definitely help with your food logging and verifying nutritional info for particular foods. For any help or support you need, please message us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" and we can help you there 1:1. Thanks.

title: Amazing!!
body: I did keto a few years back and didn’t use an app. I wasn’t eating enough fat which caused me to lose a lot of my muscle. This app is easy and has pretty much everything I scan! I love it!!

title: Easy to use
body: I tried some other carb counting apps and this is by far the best one I have used. It is so easy to use and understand. Going premium is awesome because you get some great guidance and delicious recipes.  Love it!

title: Now I’m Loosing Weight
body: The calculators, goal options, and food scans have made it so I really know where I fall with all my meals. I’m seeing results! Which there was a place to add daily weight measurements. Until then I’ll keep using other apps to track that.

title: Carb counter
body: Seems to be a pretty good app.   However, often when I try to log a snack, or something extra, it switches to a different page and won’t let me log anymore ... keeps running an ad that I can’t get rid of 🥴

title: Lifesaving
body: I’m still a beginner, but I’m really on board with this! So informative. I wish I could move the icons the way I want to because I scan everything. First world problem, however.

title: Get this app!
body: I was having a hard time figuring out how to manage keto, but a friend told me about this app. It is helping me stay on track & I've already lost 2# since downloading it 3 days ago!

title: Takes to long to open
body: Never had an app give me so much trouble to open. Seems like every time I have to open it and hit reload at least once because it timed out, then it opens up. Otherwise app works good with a lot of good choices.  just frustrating is all.
response: Thanks for sharing your experience! Sorry to hear you've run into some recent issues; that's definitely not normal behavior. Our support team would love to take a closer look into the loading times of your particular device and help sort that out for you. Please reach out to us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need Help?". Thanks!

title: Best Keto Lifestyle App
body: Heard this app mentioned on several forums and decided to give it a try. I love it. Simple and easy to use once you get the hang of it. Can join to my Fitbit. This app is a Keto lifesaver. If you’re beginning your Keto journey, this is a must have.

title: Accounting!
body: This app essentially makes it EASY to document and record just about everything I’ve been consuming the past two weeks. Love it!

title: Dieting made easy
body: Been keto since December and I find this super easy to journal all the food I’ve eaten for the day. When I can’t find something I just use the scanner and it helps add it to it which is really nice.

title: Love the app !
body: New to Keto and the premium app is essential in tracking carbs offering recipes and many other features and options.  Easy to add and track good choices.  Highly recommend
response: Thanks for your review, rbukel2020! The free version is enough to change your life, but the Premium version has a lot of powerful features to make the journey easier and faster. Premium recipes, meal plans, shopping lists, advanced health analytics, auto-magic photo based logging and more. Let us know if we can ever help with anything!

title: Extremely Helpful!
body: Extremely helpful App! Very user friendly and easy to understand! Lots of good recipes and tips. Definitely worth paying for to get all of the features.

title: Scanner gone?
body: I have used this app for about 6 months and have loved it! I recently updated the app and now I can’t find the scanner or adjust my amounts? This is not good! How can I un-update?? I liked it just the way it was. I hate having to find another app ☹️

title: Love this app!
body: I’m dropping weight on a Keto diet but I owe it all to this app! I had been doing Keto for a month & never getting it right until I found the app. The recipe creator helps me figure out is I’m getting my macros right & then adjusting for optimal fat loss!!

title: The best tracker however...
body: I’ve recently started a Keto Diet and this app helps a great deal! But I’ve also started intermittent fasting. On this app it’s a little hard to time it.

title: Great Keto App
body: Easy user interface does everything you need without having to pay.  Purchases open up meal creation and other features I’ll be trying out soon!

title: Easy to lose weight
body: I have been using carb manager for one week and have changed my eating habits because carb manager is simple to help you judge carbs, proteins and fats. I have lost over 10 pounds in this time.

title: Game Changer
body: I love using Carb Manager. It is very user friendly ... it allows me to add foods and drinks in no time at all. It has a simple format that allows me to see my Carb intake quickly while taking the guess work out of counting carbs!

title: Good for keeping track of micros
body: I downloaded this app to keep track of micros. So far it is working pretty good. Its free and you can upgrade for more in depth tracking and recipes for a monthly fee if you want. I choose not to.

title: Great app for newbies to low card or Keto
