body: New to Keto myself and this app helps track and identify the right foods. I did eventually opt for the premium version. The only improvement would be to allow me to print the recipes. I have to keep my I-pad open while cooking.

title: Upgraded
body: I like app a lot however I upgraded so I can connect to my exercise watch but that doesn’t work It doesn’t show that I upgraded even though it took the money from my account and I have no way to contact anyone.  Not cool

title: Wow!
body: I’m new to the ketogenic diet and I cannot tell you enough about how amazing this app is. I’m a nurse, and I know the benefits of it but I never thought I could do it. The graphs and all of the information make this so easy to understand.

title: Love this app!
body: One of the best tracker apps I’ve ever used. I invited my dietician to join my community so she can see my tracking and we can even chat back and forth.

title: Love this!
body: I use the free version and LOVE IT ! We be upgrading soon! So easy to keep track of the food I eat. Has almost everything from every store and love how I can add my own items! I highly recommend!

title: Much better than MyFitnessPal
body: The search is more accurate, and there are tons of very delicious looking recipes that I am definitely going to take advantage of. Thanks for making this.. really.

title: Good app but crashes
body: I love this app and would give it 5 stars but it crashes and fails to load some times. I have to close the app and restart a few times per day. Not too time consuming but annoying enough to deduct a star

title: Couldn’t have lost the weight without this app
body: I’m logging my food and liquid intake and even supplements and sometimes wine. There’s nothing I don’t like about the app! Wish I could become a representative for carb manager :)

title: Great app, buggy with recipes
body: This is a great app and I love tracking for Keto and daily charts. However, I paid for premium version to have access to recipes, and every time I search database (which says over 360,000) recipes, only 10-20 come up. Not sure what I’m missing here....

title: Great ap
body: CM is very easy to use.  The database already has a ton of foods in it but if you don’t find something it’s super easy to add by scanning a barcode.  Love being able to add recipes and get macro info is wonderfully helpful too!

title: Bar Scan needs to improve
body: Everything is great just that the bar scan needs to improve a bit ... more like MyFitness Pal, it automatically lights up if the area is a bit dark and can’t read barcode

title: Working for me
body: Love this app.  Good size library of Comercial foods. Has been a big help in keeping me on track.  I am in ketosis and slowly losing weight for first time in over a year.  Plan to buy upgrade, developer deserves it.

title: Apple watch 4 complication
body: Love this app and would pay whatever necessary but does not have complication for apple watch. I like to be able to look at my watch and see where i am. Unfortunately this does not have it so i have switched to lose it which i wish i didnt have to. Get a complication for apple watch 4 and i will be back subscribing in minutes

title: Keep on Track
body: Having carb manager helps me to stay on track with my daily meals and snacks. It allows me to scan most foods and saves the commonly eaten. It’s a great way to stay on top of daily choices!

title: New to CM
body: Just a few days into the program and it is helping a lot because there is so much data that you can look at.

title: Shedding the weight
body: I have lost 13 lbs in 16 days with this app. It is amazing and helps you keep track of your carbs without stressing yourself out. The recipes available are just an added bonus!

title: App glitches and now all data gone
body: Worked fine until today when everything is hanging up and all my entries for today disappeared.  They keep bugging me to buy premium too and I don’t want that.  Either make the app free for those who only want the free version or make it premium only.  But don’t penalize the people who refuse to pay $40 annually for premium features they don’t need or want.
response: Hi there, and thanks for your review! The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: Used to be a Great App
body: I’ve been using the App for a few weeks and became a paid member a few weeks ago. Since then I cannot access on a browser, although I’ve tried several and need to turn off Wi-fi to access the App and need to remember to turn it back on. I have good broadband and don’t have this problem with other Apps.
response: Hi there! I'm sorry to hear you are having issues with the app. What you're describing definitely does not sound like normal behavior. We welcome the opportunity to assist you in troubleshooting the problem you may be experiencing. Please message us from within the app, and our awesome customer service team will be happy to help!

title: Super easy to count carbs!
body: This app has made it super simple to count net carbs. It takes all of the computing out of it for you. I also like how you can tailor your macros without having to upgrade.

title: Can’t rename a folder category
body: Carb Manager has made great strides to improve their app. What is missing and the reason I didn’t rate 5 stars is because I created a category folder called “Keto Deserts" and it should be spelled "Keto Desserts". I can’t go back and edit nor delete

title: Update!
body: I’ve had this app for a while now and I loved it. Until the update last night. What happened? Why does it add All my calories at the end like it did before?

title: Poor new update
body: I’ve been using the app for two months now, fell in love with it at first. Now the newest update keeps crashing, doesn’t look as appealing or as organized, and they changed the all the colors of the items they were tracking. Was happy, now very unimpressed.

title: Horrible Update
body: I have been using this app for about two years and loved it. But this new update is terrible. The program was completely changed. Old perameters such as total carbs and fiber are gone. It now takes FOREVER to upload data. The new design might be better but the changes are too radical for long time users.

title: Glitching
body: We love it for tracking but it keeps glitching: not loading foods, saying the streak has restarted when we haven’t gone over, wont let you create a new recipe, or add food to your day.
response: Hi there - sorry to hear you're experiencing these issues with the app. We're regularly releasing updates to any known issues that may fix the glitches you've mentioned. For best app performance, make sure you're running the most recent OS and app version. If you have specific issues, don't hesitate to reach out in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: Premium everything
body: The app maybe ok for tracking some food,  but most options only work if you pay the high price for the premium version including a lot of the foods you want to add to your diary.  It won’t even let me sync to my Fitbit unless I pay up.  There are other apps out there that works great, don’t charge for every little thing and sync with fitness devices without charging!
response: Hi! Our core app is free & always will be. Many of our users reach their goals without upgrading to Premium. Our Premium version is there for users who want access to advanced features, but both versions find success stories! Message us in-app to learn more about free features. Thanks!

title: Great tool
body: Like that you can track calories and carbs. Also like that you can look up any food, any brand, any restaurant or take out. Also like that you can pick exact amount.

title: IOS 14
body: Since I updated my software to IOS 14 my carb manager isn’t working properly. It doesn’t open...I have to shut my phone off. It’s not tracking my activities correctly from my Apple Watch and Apple Health. It is frustrating!
response: Hi there, thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! If you haven't already, please reach out to our friendly and knowledgable support team at support@carbmanager.com. We welcome the opportunity to assist you with the Apple Watch sync issues you are experiencing.

title: Best app
body: Doesn’t shame!

title: Love using the app to track, but it’s super slow!
body: Really great app! however when I’m trying to view previous days it’s super slow and doesn’t always load everything. I also wish I could change the amount of ounces each cup of water is. Otherwise I’m loving the app!
response: Hi, and thanks for your positive review! We're sorry to hear you've run into some loading issues on your device, and we definitely want to help. Please message us in-app so we can check it out and help sort out the problem. Also, increase or decrease your daily water goal by going to Settings - Health Goals. Thanks!

title: Lost my PAID subscript in less than a month!
body: Love this app. Till tonight! Could not log in so I created a new password.
response: Hi and thanks for connecting with us. This sounds like an issue connected with an anonymous account, but don't worry you haven't lost your subscription or original logs. If you haven't already, just message us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" and we can get you back to your original account. Thanks!

title: Carb Manager Recipes Rock!
body: The addition of the recipes within the app is a huge benefit. Tonight I had a protein ready...just no imagination.  Typed in “cod” and the recipes were amazing. Prepared Keto Lemon Cod Piccata in a few minutes. Devine! Also love the management of my macros.  Great app worth upgrading.
response: Thanks for the stellar review, and we're happy to hear you're finding great use in our recipes! Reach out anytime in-app if any questions arise, and we'd be happy to help!

title: Love this app! Counts NET carbs!
body: I’ve tried several calorie and carb tracking apps and this is the best one. You can actually track net carbs instead of total carbs. Most foods are in the database and easy to scan using the barcode.

title: Love it!
body: Such a great app if you’re a first timer Keto diet goer. So helpful and super useful. It also holds you accountable to stay at your carb intake level. Love it! Download if you’re trying to manage your food intake and lose some weight.

title: Easy to use & very helpful
body: This app makes it very easy to log your daily food intake without having to figure out everything yourself. Lots of great recipes too!

title: Great for tracking, connectivity could use work
body: I love this app for tracking my macros. However, when all my other apps have connectivity this one struggles to load frequently saying “Still loading.......”

title: So helpful!
body: This app is literally the best when trying to track your foods. I love that it gives grades and is so great at keeping you on track! There’s no way I could have started keto without it!

title: All in a days work
body: So easy to use n really helps to keep track of carbs, protein, n water intake for the day!! Takes the headache out of trying to figure it out day by day when it’s at the palm of ur hand!!

title: Life changer
body: This application is a life changer. Helping me from morning to sleep helping me moderate my weight in nutritional value and activity levels. I have lost 8 pounds in two weeks thanks to carb managers vital information.

title: Great Start
body: The app has been very useful since I started my Keto journey in week. I’m a newbie but I’ve seen a continual change every day. It has helped me to monitor and track my choices. It is super easy to use.

title: No internet, limited food selection
body: Why is internet connectivity required to enter item?? What if I am traveling on a plane, or camping out in the middle of no where?
response: Thanks for sharing your experience! We're working on updating our offline mode with our next version that will be released later this year. We'll keep you posted! Also, we're constantly expanding our Food Database, but if you need help finding a specific item, you can log it as a custom food, or reach out to us in-app and we can help you track it. Thanks!

title: Great app
body: This has been so far the most accurate app I have run across for keto tracking. It’s easy to use in free mode or you can purchase the full package for a year it kinda a bummer but I get it too.

title: Love it
body: Wish you didn’t have to pay for the other version! Or that there was a way to try it for a week and then buy it.. Otherwise it’s an awesome app and very user friendly! Wouldn’t be able to do keto with out it!

title: 75lbs down using this app
body: Great app!  I have managed to lose 75lbs using this app. Make sure you create an account before updating this app or you will lose all of your entered information excellent free app!!
response: We are so sorry for the interruption! If you are still missing your data, please log out (Settings > Log Out) and then in the log in or sign up screen, look for a link toward the bottom of the page labeled "Get back in here". This will restore your data. If you need additional assistance, please email us at support@wombatapps.com.

title: Great app!!!
body: This has been the first app that I have stuck with. I love that I can look up foods to research their nutritional value and I can even scan a barcode and the data will pop right up!

title: Very satisfied
body: I have been using MyFitnessPal for years with my only desire is the option to track net carbs. At the behest of a good friend I tried Carb Manager and extremely happy with the program.

title: Works great
body: Works great with an extraordinarily large food database.  At times it can be tough to find food if you don’t type it in exactly right.  Also at times foods may differ than the package but I have found the app to be higher (which I like/prefer).

title: Keto-App
body: If you’re new to Keto diet and understand Ketogenisis, then you need this app to keep you straight and true. This app doesn’t lie. Get this if you’re serious about a life long change in life style and the way you look. Good luck!

title: Great carb management tool
body: I recently was put on a low FODMAPs diet and decided to try Keto as well.  This app helps me keep things in order on a daily basis.   Just wish there was more exercises logged in that I could pull from instead of having to develop my own.

title: Makes life easy!
body: It saves all my past foods(saves time and super convenient)

title: I like the app but......
body: I am really enjoying using this app. Quite intuitive. However, is there a recipe builder in the pro version? In other words, does this app have the functionality for me to input my own recipes and it give me a carb count per serving? Thank you.

title: Couldn’t do it with our CM
body: Seriously couldn’t achieve my goal with out CM. It makes starting the keto diet fun, exciting AND delicious! 1 week in and 5 lbs down. I really don’t think I would have had so much stress free success without This app. Thanks :)

title: Keto
body: I started Keto and I was guessing my daily carbs.  I downloaded this app, to my surprise I was very off.  The app makes it very easy to find the food and portion size.  Since, I’ve been losing twice as much weight!

title: Keto me
body: This app is awesome. Foods are easily searched by brand name or type and you can create your own recipe. Helps to keep my carb intake down and also counts my calories. Lots of features  I haven’t tried yet

title: App Crashes
body: I usually use the free version of an App before making a purchase or switching over to “premium”.  This App crashed and took everything with it.
response: Hello from Carb Manager and thank you for your reply. We're sorry to hear that you've experienced a loss of data. We'd love the option of speaking with you about this issue and attempt to recover any lost data. If you could please email support@carbmanager.com and reference the username "Benny Bag O" and we'll be happy to do some investigating as to why this occurred. We're here to support you through your Keto journey and look forward to hearing from you!

title: App is too complicated to use now
body: I liked this app when I first got it. I could quickly find a food and check nutritional data.
response: Hi there, we’re sorry to hear you’re struggling with the update—we’re listening, and our Development Team is working diligently to fine-tune this new version of the app so you’ll love it as much as the old version. Please reach out to us in-app, and our awesome Support Team will be happy to guide you through the update and answer any questions you may have.

title: Easy
body: This app has almost all the foods you would want, recipes, analysis of your menu for the day and it is simple to log everything as you go

title: Hate the Upgrade
body: I’ve had this app for over two years now. I rely on it for the carbs when making meals. Ever since the upgrade it has not been as user friendly and entering receipts is a pain. On top of that you can no longer correctly enter the amount per serving. All I know is that I will be looking for a new app to use. I no longer recommend this app to anyone since the upgrade occurred.
response: Hi there - sorry to hear you're not loving the new app. Feel free to reach out in-app via Settings → Help & Support if you're having any specific issues creating recipes or determining serving sizes. There's also a new knowledge base at help.carbmanager.com in case that helps. Thanks!

title: Can I go back to the way the app was?
body: You call yourself “updating” the app and i do not like the way the new app looks. It’s not as user friendly and I just entered something and it’s not subtracting the sugar alcohol from my item so my net carbs aren’t even correct even though that’s what this app is supposed to track. Fix the net carb tracking and would love a way to go back to the way the app looked before.

title: Frozen screen
body: I’ve had this deluxe version of this app for a long time. Really loved it . Used it daily.

title: What did you do with this update?
body: The app is not opening and when it does the foods are not in order of the last time they were used even if you filter them that way. Please fix this issue because this app is great but this update is horrible.
response: We are so sorry for the interruption! If you are still missing your data, please log out (Settings > Log Out) and then in the log in or sign up screen, look for a link toward the bottom of the page labeled "Get back in here". This will restore your data. If you need additional assistance, please email us at support@wombatapps.com.

title: this app rocks
body: this app has helped me lose 40 lbs.  Great features including a scanner to use while shopping. I upgraded to prime which has great recipes. highly recommend this app if your going Keto

title: Hate the updated app
body: Right in the middle of a weight loss program the app was “updated” and we lost a lot of functionality. Calories are no longer displayed per meal, the ability to scan foods to “my foods” also seems to be gone. Granted, we were using the free version. But still. The new one stinks. After over two months of use, now we have to find a new app. Thanks for nothin’ Carb Manager.
response: Hi! We hear the frustration of getting used to a new app, and know this is a big adjustment. Some changes are expected, others may be a glitch that our developers can fix. Please reach out to our friendly Support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Be sure to reference your app store user name, and they’ll get you sorted out asap.

title: It’s great But...
body: I love this app i just wish i could just manually add without selecting a food, for example my mom made a keto soup and told me it was 4 net carbs and the calories, i wish i could have just added that for my dinner , if you can do this i have no idea how ,

title: Won’t load
body: I’m giving this app one star because I downloaded it and it will not even load. It keeps saying that I have no internet. I have deleted the app & downloaded it again, used just WiFi in airplane mode, tried cellular & WiFi together, tried just cellular, and I restarted my phone. Won’t load at all. Maybe once it works I’ll give it a different rating but this is a tad ridiculous.
response: Hi there and thanks for leaving us constructive feedback! The issue you are having is definitely not normal app behavior. Please allow us the opportunity to look into this further by messaging us from within the app. Just tap on to "Need Help" and our friendly customer support team will assist you!

title: Good, but a bug
body: Overall a good app, but I had the energy units set to kilo-joules but it sometimes switches the number of consumed calories to kiloCalories without switching the total to kiloCalories so you it sometimes says things like “9% of calorie goal” even though your at 34%

title: Very intuitive and premium edition rocks
body: So easy to use and lots of easy recipes that are really good!  Started About 8 days ago and down 7 pounds.   This app has made it easier to stick to a routine.

title: Convenient, easy to use!
body: I am able to quickly enter my foods accurately. The carb scale is a quick reminder of how I’m doing during the day and motivates me to stay on track.

title: Love it but...
body: I love this app but the only gripe I have with it is when measuring foods in grams you have to spin the annoying wheel to get the number.  I don’t want to spin it to 30 grams and then find the decimal as a fraction.  I wish I could type in the number.

title: Cannot live without this app.
body: A must-have for keto dieting and preventing and in my case reversing pre-diabetic symptoms.

title: Keto Diet
body: I love this app. It makes it so easy to keep track of my macros while I’m following the Keto diet. Highly recommend this to anyone who’s watching what you eat and what’s to keep track or journal your food intake.

title: The best journal option for food diary log
body: It’s pretty good to see how you are managing or not managing your daily food intake. I’m preparing this for sharing with my nutritionist.

title: Works well
body: It adds all the things you need to know for keto diet. The only drawback is typing in the field to search a food must be correct, you can tap in the field and insert text, it puts your insertion at the end every time.

title: Great app
body: Love the scanning feature and personal edit function. Really helps me stay on track. User contributions have a lot of the “ Pinterest” Keto recipes broken down to track

title: Information is too inaccurate
body: The app is easy to use and could be a great tool, unfortunately most of the foods were inaccurate or there were too many conflicting entries for the same item. I was having to edit every item to the facts on the box. Someone really needs to clean up the database and quality control the entries.
response: Hey there, thanks for your review and feedback. We're happy to report that we pride ourselves on the accuracy of our food database. Due to the ever evolving list of nutritional information, we're happy to help you suggest edits. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username so we can take a closer look at any inconsistencies for us to check out. Thank you!

title: Carb Manager Changed My Life
body: I used all the major food tracking abs, for like a day, never could stick with them. This app is amazing! I am down ten pounds in one week! Without this app I would be lost in the Keto World!

title: Great app so far
body: I haven’t paid to get the full experience since I’m only starting on Keto, but so far it’s been great. I just hope it gets better when I pay for the “membership”.

title: Great App
body: Carb Manager has been so helpful to me in my food consumption. Keeping close track of what I eat is easy and it has helped me drop weight much better than before I used it. Try it.

title: Lost 30 lbs in 3 months
body: Did 2 weeks on the free version and it worked. Went all in and bought the app.  Best app money I've spent.  Easiest weight I ever lost.  Forming good habits, getting smarter about eating and getting healthier. What's not to like?

title: Keeps me on track
body: I was doing my diet all wrong until Carb Manager.  On the losing weight path and I enjoy logging my food. The barcode scan makes it extremely easy.

title: New to carb manager after MFP and much prefer this!!!!
body: I have been using MyFitnessPal for years and now that I’m using Carb Manager I’m so much happier with the macro breakdown and I feel like I’m able to tweak my diet so much better A+ with this app

title: So EASY!!
body: I love how easy this app makes it for me to log everything I eat and drink each day and keeps me accountable my choices & my success! I’ve been using the app for 6 days and I’ve already lost 6.4lbs!!

title: Carb manager
body: This is the best thing I have found track macros, calories and exercise! I have been using it for less than a week and I have lost 2 pounds already without feeling deprived. Awesome app!

title: Fantastic
body: The scanning feature makes logging food effortless. I have tried other apps, this one allows the most flexibility as far as exercise, carb cycling, and adjusting macros to meet dietary needs.

title: Ketogenic Diet
body: I used this app for my Keto  diet. It's pretty good! The company is upgrading constantly most of the products we consume.  they have more Keto products on the list.  I am testing it and if It really works I will upgrade my app!  So far I love the app ...

title: Kind of like this app
body: They offer a good amount for free and it makes me want to buy the full app because I support their commitment to people losing weight. App doesn’t seem all about money! And it’s so handy 😅😁

title: Free until now?!?
body: Why is my app not allowing me to log foods unless I pay now its work fine until I tried to log my lunch and now you want money to log my foods?!? This was a great app until now!!!!
response: Hi there - sorry for the problem! If you paid for the app previously, you should have unlimited logging. Please reload the app. If you continue to have this problem, contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we will fix it. If this solves the problem, would you consider updating your review so we know you're back up and running? Thanks!

title: Love/ Hate
body: Was loving this app. I carb cycle and was glad the free version allowed me to just focus on carbs and could change my goal daily. I was so glad I didn’t have to pay for an app that I would only use a small fraction of. However I was totally wrong, today it won’t let me log, I guess you have to pay if you want to track more than 12 days?

title: Easy To Use
body: The only complaint I have is that the food data base doesn’t have enough foods in their scanner. I have to manually put in quite a few.

title: So far so good
body: Have only used for a week, but I do like it. It is making me accountable for what I eat, the water I drink, and my steps. So far all the foods I have scanned have been available on the app. So for now, all is good!!

title: Easy to Track With
body: I love this app!!!   It’s super simple to keep track of your daily food intake.  It opens your eyes as to what you REALLY eat since it tracks is down to the nitty-gritty.  Fantastic!  Definitely recommend it!

title: Love this app!
body: I am new to Keto. 21 days in, and 13 pounds down. This app is guiding me, as well as educating me. I am learning to make food counts cover my hunger throughout the day, and see clearly that this is sustainable. I feel great, in large part due to this app!

title: Easy to navigate and intuitive
body: Only suggestion for improvement would be to log off line and have it sync when WiFi is again available.

title: Takes all the guessing out of the keto diet
body: Carb manager has taken all of the guess work out of the keto diet! I thought I knew what I should eat to get started on the diet, but this app has helped me know exactly what to eat! I love this app!

title: Carb Manager is the Bomb!
body: I love this app. I purchased the premium version, and, I am very glad I did. Very easy to set up daily macro and calorie goals, track exercise, set weight goals, etc. I like Carb Manager much more than My Fitness Pal.

title: Easy to use
body: First, I’ve only used it for a couple of weeks. Will post an update after a month.

title: Calories burned
body: The only thing I don’t like is that it doesn’t subtract calories burned from the daily total, if you’re active. Makes calorie count a bit too overstated

title: Individual macros
body: I love this app because it tells you each foods individual macros. This allows you to really learn foods ago stay on track. Use it even if your not doing keto!

title: Unfortunate changes.
body: I have have been using the app since September 2020 to help get rid of my quarantine 15. Before Carb Manager, I had never paid for a membership app. I was down 24 lbs when the developers decided to completely revamp the app.
response: Hi there, thanks for the constructive feedback! We would love to hear more suggestions from our valued customers. Please feel free to fill out this quick form so that we can improve the new version of Carb Manager. Just copy and paste into your browser: https://7vh.short.gy/EOi89i If you need extra guidance with any features of the new version, our Support Team is at the ready to answer any questions you may have. Just message us directly within the app!

title: Best app to take control of your food, body changes and carbs
body: Your age, your weight and even the excercise you do is basic to get results when you take café of what you eat!! 😬

title: Update doesn't work and glitches
body: Ugh the more I use the app after the new update, the more frustrated I get. Apparently you can only copy foods to the Current day now.

title: Give it a try!!
body: I have followed the plan that was suggested for me and am seeing results. It feels like a life changer. I need to drop weight, but want to stay healthy. I love the flexible structure that helps me to make good choices.

title: Boy was I Wrong!
body: I thought I was doing good on Keto but I’m doing even better with the App. I definitely recommend it for a more accurate take on what you eat and where you need to concentrate more.

title: New year new app... NOO!!
body: This new update is awful. Finding my saved foods take forever to load. All the history of my entries with amounts eaten/drank are all reset... loading times are longer than normal. I want the previous version back! Time to look for another tracker. Thanks for helping me lose 150 lbs... but I gotta move on to something that I can use.

title: Recommend
body: Helps me keep me from going over.  Easy to use, and keeps track of everything you need including water.

title: Just started using App
body: This App has really woke me up.  You don’t realize serving size until you start measuring and keeping up with you food.

title: So far so good
body: I like it so far. Wish I could add weight of food eaten in decimals. Maybe I just haven’t figured it out yet. It’s definitely better than my previous app for keto tracking!

title: Easy to track
body: Lots of foods in here and a great scanner. Have not found anything I could not get my count yet.

title: Ease of use is number one
body: Accuracy is top notch too.  I’m enjoying using the app and the reminders.  It helps me to be accountable to record everything I eat.  I highly recommend Carb Manager.

title: Wish you could duplicate portfolios
body: I love this app, I just wish you could duplicate portfolios.

title: Life saver
body: I had been struggling with portion sizes and daily calories as well as keeping my percentages in good range...which spilled into not losing weight even with all my best effort. This app is really helping me and super easy to use.

title: LOOOOOOVE!!
body: I don’t generally write reviews but this app is so helpful and has really aided me in my weight loss journey. The free version is amazing, but I loved it so much I’ve purchased the app in the past and it was totally worth it when doing keto! Best app!!
response: Thanks Dani for all the LOOOOOVE! We're so happy to hear. Message us anytime in-app if we can be of help!

title: Can’t believe you can do so much for free🥳😀
body: So awesome ! It lets you put in your recipes with all the Ingredients and then add a serving to the batch to your day.  I can’t believe it’s free.  I’m super tempted to go with the paid version   This app is amazing

title: Great App
body: App is packed with features, the paid version is well worth the money and much better than expected. Significantly better than previously used Keto / carb management apps.

title: Thank you
body: I only gave three star because I have the free version and not the premium.  This app is excellent and has b en a great help to me.  I have been stuck on plateau for over two months, started using app three days and realized I was sabotaging myself. I feel like I will make progress going forward

title: My Best Keto Friend
body: I purchased the upgraded app and love how it makes everything so much easier to use and figure out your meals and helps keep you right where you want to be!

title: I like it
body: Just starting but fairly easy to navigate.  I like being able to plan my day so I can be sure to get the right amounts.  Good graphics and quick to use.

title: I’m new to Keto
body: This app has helped me to learn the carbs in foods. I love fresh cherries. I was shocked when I saw the carbs per serving, 18 grams per serving. That would be almost all my carbs for one day !  I’m learning every day how food fits into my daily allowance. Thanks.

title: Makes keeping track easier!!
body: My husband does my fitness pal, but I find Carb Manager to be so much easier and less frustrating to track my macros in keto type foods.😊

title: Can’t Use What I Paid For
body: Terrible service! If I’m on the app and tap the banner to get premium (which I did) it should automatically come up on same app not go to email. I shouldn’t have to chase around to sync or delete one or the other. Instructions are not clear for those who are not tech savvy or typical app users. Can’t figure out how to get premium synced with app. Instructions, troubleshooting not helpful. 👎
response: Hey there! Thanks for reaching out. What your seeing isn't normal behavior for the app, so please reach out to our support team at support@carbmanager.com and they'll be happy to troubleshoot. Cheers!

title: I adore this app!!!
body: Thank you so much for this helpful, wonderful app. It’s user friendly, customizable and accurate. Worth the $40 to upgrade to premium too. I’ve cooked a lot of the suggested meals already.

title: Not really free
body: I like this app and have been using the free version for about a month. The free version worked for my purposes until it locked me out because I didn’t buy the service. Now it says it doesn’t recognize my email or password and won’t open at all.
response: Hello from Carb Manager and thank you for your review. Our team would love the opportunity to help reunite you with your existing data. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username and send us a message. We'll be happy to lend a hand. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Great app
body: Best way I’ve found to track daily macros. Easy to use. The scan feature has really been handy and I can create my own recipes that I can refer to next time I make a meal. 6/5 stars.

title: I love this app
body: This is a very user friendly app. It’s easy to use and has a lot of great recipes and information. Removing one star because I want to be able to add recipes so I can get a shopping list but not have to add them to a certain day.

title: Easy peasy keto
body: I had no idea how to do the keto diet.  I knew people were loosing weight, but how was I gonna calculate all of this. My friend told me about the app and boom!  I started dropping pounds!  Down 13 and day 6!!  This app is a life saver and the recipes are delicious!!

title: Thank goodness for this App!
body: If I did not have this app to guide me through the beginning of my Keto diet, I would have given up out of frustration. I tell everyone that asks me how to start to download this app! It’s amazing!

title: Totals
body: Allow for totaling carbs of multiple items within page as poised to adding to meal with add button in pie page.  Save going back and forth.

title: Easy App
body: I just started counting carbs and tried a few apps. This one is far better than others I’ve tried. It’s easy to search and log foods and it has a scanner. It’s great!

title: Saved my marriage
body: This app has really helped turn my life around! My wife was about to leave me for my cousin cuz I wouldn’t try loosing weight. This diet saved my life and my marriage! My cousin however is not a big fan. Kudos!

title: EVERYTHING is premium now!!!
body: I downloaded this app because it had free recipes and meal plans that made it really easy to start keto and be suited to my macros. I think it’s starting to get popular and developers are getting greedy, so now everything has turned premium. So many features I could use before for free, I now have to pay for. That’s ridiculous

title: Great tool to help keep you on track
body: Great easy to use app...Helps me track macro's and stay on track...May try upgraded version looks like that will help me on my keto journey even more...Fantastic job keep it up!

title: Perfect For Tracking. Carbs!
body: Haven't had to manually add any foods. Just scan and go! Large list of foods to search from. Great for tracking carbs. Total carbs calculated and in plain sight as you track your food intake.

title: Easy to use
body: This app is very similar to the MyFitness Pal app, but it takes the guess work out of net grams. The scan feature is amazing. I have recommended this app to few people already

title: Free App - only for the basic
body: I have had a chance to use this app and I am beginning to love it. I have entered my own recipes and I seem to get reasonable results. I would recommend this app.

title: Best diet aid app I’ve used.
body: Over the years I’ve used several diet aid apps including my plate, weight watchers, livestrong... carb manager has been by far the best in helping learn how to track macros and actually lose weight. 48+ pounds in 6 months. Yay!

title: Solid Ap
body: It measures more fitness activities then My Fitness ap. I like that you can log plyometrics as well as free weights. However it is not as user Friendly as My Fitness Ap. You have more steps to do while entering daily log. Otherwise, it meets my needs.

title: Easy to use and track
body: Using this App is easy and allows me to track my Carbs for the day. The more I use it, the more familiar I become with what foods I can eat or substitute. I am trying to reduce my Glucose and A1-C. This is just what I needed.

title: Some struggles
body: I wish that it was more sleek (ie. My fitnes pal) and that there was a social aspect where you can see what other people are eating for ideas and have a profile. A lot of the foods are also incorrectly listed so I have to check my fitness pal for the correct macros and manually enter them for into the app.

title: In app purchase for full access
body: Appears to be a great app with all the bells and whistles if you agree to $40/year.

title: I’ve lost 7lbs this week with no hunger!
body: Great all inclusive app that functions without a glitch. Calculates my dietary needs, provides meal plans, recipes, and shopping lists. Thank you! PS: My daughter spent $1200 to get equivalent service but not telling her 😢
This app is very easy to use and keeps me on track. I’ve only been using it for a few days, but I like it a lot. I’ve used others but this one is by far the best.

title: New carb counter
body: Fantastic! I am a new carb counter. App is pretty easy to use. You just have to spend a little time learning the search protocols. I really like it and have recommended to friends.

title: Easy to use. Very Helpful
body: I’ve mainly used MyFitnessPal forever and needed a change. I’m really enjoying using Carb Manager for its ease of use. It’s been easier (and more helpful) than MFP to track my macros.

title: Tracking
body: It’s great for tracking and I use it a lot. Only downside is that sometimes the barcodes don’t scan items correctly and I have to manually search for the food.

title: Laggy App
body: I like the app itself, presents information in easy to view format. My problem since I signed up for Premium access is that on my iPhone and iPad the app is very laggy. Much faster if you use a browser but then you lose some of the convenience of the app.
response: Hi there, and thanks for leaving us constructive feedback! The issue you are having is definitely not normal app behavior. Please allow us the opportunity to look into this further by messaging us from within the app or emailing us at support@carbmanager.com.

title: Hate the update
body: I can’t be the only one hating the new format. ..right? The old version was much easier to navigate. It doesn’t list my Apple Watch as a device to connect to. When I let it link to Apple health (which I don’t use) it updated my steps for the morning from zero to double the count on my watch. Ugh!!!

title: Love love the app
body: Very thorough & the recipes are delicious. I like the color pie chart so I can see what a food has. The calorie counter has fast foods, custom ingredients. You can plan your meals & it will give you a shopping list.

title: Needs more support
body: I love the meal plans and I love the shopping list. However I am getting nothing on the help and support page. It is completely blank. When I try to enable certain things like meal tracker, it doesn’t allow. I don’t like that there is no way to receive any help.

title: Losing weight daily!
body: Wow, this app is fantastic, guiding me on my keto diet, tracking my percentages of protein/fat/carbs, offering recipes, predicting future weight loss and so much more. Thank you, thank you, thank you!!!! From the bottom of my heart❤️❤️❤️

title: Will not load
body: I have been using the app for a while, but now it will not load. Gave me a message to check whether I have internet. I do and all my other apps open no  their site down?

title: Great app.!
body: I find it easy to use now in my second week. I’m able to use it as a tool to guide my dietary decisions. I’m glad I went premium as many perks go along with the purchase.

title: Disappointed
body: I was liking the app until I tried to find a recipe from a very popular site... nope, carb manager couldn’t find it on the web. So I thought maybe I’ll copy the recipe but the only way to do that was to enter each ingredient separately and then I had to find them in the data base. Arrggghhh! So frustrated. I’m regretting buying the premium version.
response: Hi Roni! It's easy to copy a recipe from a website! Go to Foods- Recipes & Meal Plans - Import Recipe. Copy and paste the recipe URL. Please reach out to us at support@carbmanager.com if you have any other questions- we are happy to help!

title: Love this app
body: It’s so user friendly and takes a lot of guesswork out. The recipes and meal plans are worth it, so I highly recommend paying for the premium version.

title: Lots to learn
body: I have just begun to use this app and I love it already. I know I will love it even more as I learn more things to do with it. I really love scanning food labels instead of typing everything in.

title: Awesome fatfueledat50
body: I’ve been using this app to track my macros on my new high fat carnivore diet.

title: Can only log food now
body: The past couple of days I can only log my foods and do nothing else. I can’t go to groups or my friends/community. It just locks up and then I have to restart my iphone or iPad. Please fix this!

title: Track and stay on it
body: I’m an intuitive eater. Without measuring things out, I wouldn’t be able to meet my Keto goals without this app. It’s user friendly and customizable.

title: Great start!
body: This app has definitely been a staple for myself and my hubby as first time keto dieters.  More for a change of lifestyle and to be healthier and this has simplified for our fast paced, family lifestyle. Thank you!

title: Great resource
body: What a good little buddy to have at your side to listen and provide feedback anytime you need it. Many thanks for making this available to me and others trying to get their eating habits and health In better control.

title: Best App
body: I love how much information this app provides me. The quick reminders are great and the fact that a lot of foods are already known so it doesn’t take long to log.

title: Love this app
body: Since starting to use the Carb Manager app in October, I’m down 35 pounds. I track my total carbs and keep them under 20. I’m doing the Keto diet, also. I have my Fitbit and my scale linked to this app. It is concise and accurate.

title: Great way to track Keto
body: This is a great app to track your carbs, fat, proteins & calories when doing the Keto diet. It would be nice if the app would allow you to share meals with your spouse/partner/friend instead of each person having to enter all the exact same data when eating together.

title: iPhone/Ipad
body: I pay for the Premium and was wondering if I can use my app on both the IPhone and my IPad without having to pay for another app. I love this app. It has really helped me changing my life with Keto. Help.

title: A MUST for KetoLife!
body: I was struggling with tracking my macros and knowing what to eat on Keto each day. Carb Manager has been a tremendous help to know where I’m at and keep me aligned so I meet my daily goals! Week 1 down 7#! Thank you Carb Manager!!

title: Ton of Food Items Documented
body: I don’t have to spend time finding the nutrition and calories per food item, every food I have searched for has been recorded already.

title: Maybe wrong info
body: The app was great until recently. My husband scanned something and it showed 4g carbs. I scanned the same thing and it showed 12g carbs. So I’m not sure what is right. Please fix!!!
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We'd love the opportunity to compare and contrast the settings between your account and your husband's account to explain the variance in carbs. We ask that you please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Moebe007" as well as your husband's email address so that we can take a closer look. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

title: Makes it easy to keep on track
body: I’m able to keep count of what I’ve already had and what I have left. Also LOVE the barcode scanner. It makes it super fast.

title: My big help
body: So glad this was suggested to me

title: Very helpful
body: This app is amazing. It’s the best app to track everything and has everything and the upgrade is worth it the recipes are amazing. I love this app! The whole family uses it ♥️🥰

title: Wish there was a dining out option
body: I’m really enjoying Carb Manager.  It’s very user friendly.  I just wish there was a way to look up foods at restaurants when dining out.  If there is, I haven’t found that feature yet!

title: Excellent
body: Took a minute to figure it all out! But amazed to learn what we were still taking in for carbs! Makes it easy to track, and lose weight faster!

title: Awesome
body: It just made life easier!! I did the 3 month premium plan to start so I could see if I really would like it. I wish I had gone the full year! It covers every aspect on diet and exercise.

title: Awesome
body: This App helped me tremendously I had no idea how many hidden carbs are in food that I thought was carb free. Thank you so much I lost weight already and feel in control. Thank you again I love this app

title: Couldn’t do keto without it
body: I was doing keto for a week thinking I was doing good and half the stuff I thought was good was not. once I started using this app the weight started dropping off immediately.

title: Easy to use
body: No quirks. No crashes.   Very simple to use and with lots of easy to access features.  One of the better apps I’ve used.  Highly recommend.

title: Free is limited
body: Without premium you do not have access to much. I wish I could make my own recipes with it. Instead I do the math on paper, guess the serving size of the meal and can make a nutritional add in.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're happy to report that with the free version of Carb Manager you can create your own recipes! Also, the free features have been all that's required for 1000s of users to meet their Keto goals. If you'd like to know more about our free features and creating custom recipes, please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Feistymak" and we'll be happy to lend a hand!

title: Carb Manager
body: Love the app. Keeps me motivated. Love that it tracks carbs and calories. Suggested improvements: not accurate with steps and my Fitbit. Also it would be better if I could add exact amounts of water rather than just 8oz increments.

title: So easy and user friendly!
body: This is the easiest food tracking app on the planet!

title: Great App!
body: I really enjoy this app! It is so awesome that they make an app that caters to just counting carbs. I also enjoy how they let you add recipes and can search other peoples recipes and break them down into the serving you had. Highly recommend for anyone trying Keto!

title: Love this!
body: This is my second attempt at going keto. The first time I was not successful because I was not tracking my macros. This app helps me keep on track and so far I’ve been very successful. Easy to use app! I love it!

title: Love but has some glitches
body: Love this app but Have run into occasions where it freezes. Currently, it’s not capturing blood glucose information entered. That means double documenting for me and I paid up for the subscription! :(

title: Super easy to use
body: Finally!!! Some results! This app is intuitive, easy to use and has helped me, who holds onto weight like there’s a famine, finally start moving in the right direction.

title: Excellent carb counter
body: It’s simple to use and that’s why I chose this one to start my ketoing with

title: Premium crashes all the time
body: After upgrading to premium the app started crashing multiple times. I have not only close the app to fix it but I actually restart my whole phone so I can enter my macros. So annoying! I’m on the hunt for another app that doesn’t crash as much

title: Shopping list disappointing
body: It’s seems there is no way to add items to the shopping list that are not part of a recipe from meals, which is frustrating as I prefer to use just one list. Also wish there was a sort option to group items; ie; produce, dairy, meat, etc.

title: Keeps you ON TRACK!
body: This really holds you accountable! Sometimes it “freezes” and goes blank on me :(

title: Great tool for watching your carbs
body: In the next update can we get an option to save our custom food. I would like to save a meal I created manually.  To use for another day. We use to be able to do it. And the option to "with Bun". Without bun". That will be useful. The app is good. helped me lose weight.

title: Love this app!!
body: Super comprehensive way to track food with a format that’s easy to navigate. Love the rings that allow you to quickly visualize progress through the day. Best part: the enormous food database!

title: Free? Not likely....
body: So as soon as you “signup” you find out how disabled it is....can’t sync without additional fee... can’t log more than a few items before you have to pay.... should have said this in the beginning....

title: Like a personal trainer
body: I thought I was doing Keto but when I got this app, I realized I was way off. I was way over my proteins. Once I let this app help me, I was making ketones in a couple days. Highly recommend

title: Boo
body: I downloaded this app and entered my email etc ad then it tells me it’s only free the first 7 days after that you are limited to your entries.  So if you want to use the app and you think you will have less than 12 entries per day, but if not you will have to pay or move in.

title: Worth the premium cost!
body: The app is amazing it takes care of everything for you! Calculation and meal planning is easy to use! I’m excited to start my first week using this app!

title: Very helpful app.
body: This is a great way to stay on coarse. Gives you all the tools to keep your record. It’s a bit hard to maneuver at times, a little quirky. Overall the best I have seen.

title: Options
body: I’ve used this app for over a year.

title: Where is my Info?
body: Been using this app for YEARS.  Didn’t need to change my account/login, so why did you delete all of my custom food data?
response: Hi there! We didn't delete any of your info! The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: Still needs work
body: I am thankful for this app- I love the format and the graphics. However, I’ve discovered quite a few products’ nutritional information is incorrect when I scan the barcode. I’m hoping their database gets checked, corrected, and enlarged with time!
response: Hi & thanks! We work hard on the accuracy of our Food DB. It's true some branded/processed foods have been input by users, so if there are inaccuracies, you can always Report a Food Error or make Quick Edits to them. Just reach out in-app, & we can help share how as well as how to identify our NCCDB verified foods to make it easier for logging!

title: The best app ever
body: I just love this app I’m glad I got the yearly subscription, they help making your loose weight journey so much easier all the features are just great. Get it you won’t regret it

title: Best Carb Counter
body: I love love love this app!  It has enabled me to get control of my weight.  So easy to use.  After a recent update they had some small  issues but it is improving every day.
response: Hi Stan - thanks for your feedback. We hear you and understand that change can be difficult! Many users had grown very accustomed to the previous version. Rest assured that we are continuing to tweak and improve the updated version of the app - development takes time. If you have specific issues, don't hesitate to reach out in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: Macro percentages are now gone
body: I don’t know what has changed.  I have been using this app for years and everything works fine (the last update slows it down to a snail’s pace - need to fix that).  But this morning, all of a sudden the macro percentages are gone.  And since I use them ALL THE TIME, this is quite a problem.  How do I restore them???

title: Best Calorie Counting App
body: I’m no longer keto but I still use this for tracking protein and calories and it’s create! It has so many food options I can usually find anything!

title: Disappointed with the new interface
body: They should have made this new interface optional. It’s too much to scroll through. I want to be able to see my stuff at a glance. And to make matters worse, since the update, there are a lot of barcodes that are not scanning anymore. I canceled my subscription today and I’ll be looking for a different app to use to log my meals.

title: Updated app is glitchy
body: Carb Manager is a great app with a TON of features that I love, but since the update the scanner doesn’t work and the app constantly needs to be restarted to log foods or even to show the foods already logged.

title: Old version was better
body: The recent update to Carb Manager has made it slow and buggy and more complicated to use, to the point where I no longer use it. To be specific finding foods and choosing the unit takes longer than before.

title: Thank you for fixing the new update!
body: I’m still getting used to the layout, but the fact that you can see how many grams of macros and how many calories you have left really helps!

title: Great idea, Macros vary significantly from food labels
body: I’ve liked this app especially because I could scan food labels in and it would enter the info. However, I found I could never stay below 25 net carbs. On closer look 75 % of the foods I eat are displayed 2-3 times the net carbs as the food label. Fats and proteins are off on a lot too. Now I’m wishing I hadn’t spent the money on the upgrade.

title: Don’t use for Keto, still great
body: I don’t do Keto. Highly don't recommend, however, this is the only app where you don’t have to pay to get the macros, love it! Easy to use. Has most foods!

title: Apple Watch
body: I love this app truly. It used to automatically put in my calories burned/steps via Apple Watch series 4. I do have them linked. But it’s not doing it automatically 🙃 maybe it’s me? Help!

title: Helpful Tracking
body: Their interface is user friendly for tracking and logging the breakdown of your meals.

title: Keeping Track!
body: It is easy to do. Actually look forward to it. Helps to see where I've consumed too many carbs and what I can forego next time

title: The best!
body: Best food and tracking app I have ever used!  Thank you for a while I was actually writing everything in a notebook because the apps always fell short!  Thank you!

title: Easy and Helpful and free
body: I know another app to keep me accountable but this is easy and very helpful!! I like that it rates keto choices on a alphabetical scale such as good A or Avoid F ,, tempted to get the premium but right now the free version is doing what I need!!

title: So easy and helpful!!
body: Absolutely love this app! It makes it so easy to track my net carbs and fats! It helps me stay on track since I’m new to keto only about 2 mths. Plus it has great info and recipes! Thanks for an awesome app!

title: Great
body: Love the app. Only issue is there are bugs with the app. Keeps loading. I’ve tried to uninstall and reinstall, but issues remained. Hoping they fix because I would upgrade to paid if they did.

title: Amazing free app
body: I would never have been as successful with my health goals if it wasn’t for this amazing app. I’ve been using it for about two years now, and it is just wonderful

title: Easy to use
body: Lobe this app it helps me out to manage how much I eat but the only thing is the past couple of days it won’t open keeps saying it wasn’t able to load if they can fix that issue this would be the beat carb manager app easy to use
response: Hi, and thanks for sharing your experience and review. We're sorry to hear you've run into some loading issues on your phone app, and we definitely want to help. Please message us in-app or email us at support@carbmanager.com so we can check it out and help sort out the problem. Thanks!

title: Cannot get rid of it
body: I tried to delete the data from my account, then I tried to delete the account, and finally, I tried to cancel the  subscription- to no avail. On my iPhone, the only option I have under settings is to “confirm” another year of subscription. I cannot get rid of it. If they charge me for another year, I will file a complaint with the consumer protection bureau.
response: Hey there! Thanks for reaching out. Sorry to hear that you're looking to cancel! With that being said, our support would be more than happy to help you with canceling your subscription and deleting your account and data. You can reach out to them in the app, via Settings-Contact Support, or via email at support@carbmanager.com. Cheers!

title: Worth every penny
body: I seldom find a free app that I later want to pay for the premium. This is one of the very few that I have considered upgrading and paying for. That saying something as I’m notoriously cheap.

title: Awesome App
body: When my friend told me about this app I started using it... after a month on Keto I used this app to set my Macros and finally started loosing weight.. there are many food options as well...

title: Must have for Keto
body: App is great for pre planning future meals and food intake. I love that it has a scan feature to look up barcodes to see how many calories something has. Love it.

title: Keeps me under 25 Carbs!
body: Love this app! I can see why I struggled with weight loss because some foods add more carbs than I realized. I use this every day. Wish I could duplicate meals daily instead of adding each item in new, otherwise the best App for Keto weight loss!

title: Won’t sync to new phone
body: I love this app but can’t get app to sync with new phone. I am n a premium member but can’t b recognize my e mail address. Hard to get in Touch with customer service

title: iPhone 11 problems
body: I love this app. I know it will be life changing. However please please fix the incompatibility with iphone11 I can’t use it on my new phone. It freezes Every single Time!

title: Great carb app
body: I give it 5 stars and am not going to premium. It is incredibly useful to see your macros and get a handle on what you are actually consuming. Too bad I love me some carbs, but with this app I can trim here and there. ❤️😁✅🆒🆗

title: Excellent app to get you started on Keto
body: My wife and I used this to put together a meal plan and shop for food when we started the Keto diet. A week in and it has helped tremendously with hitting our ratios and planning meals.

title: So happy!!
body: Carb Manager has kept me on track and helped me stick to my goals, easy to look up foods and supplements and track water intake. I’ve recommended to my cousin who is starting Keto as well. I love this app!!

title: No too happy
body: I used MFP app and quit to use Carb Manager. I was good two days in but yesterday it would not let me log anything. I reset my phone, redownloaded the app and even tried offline. Today it’s happening again. It won’t let me log anything and it doesn’t log my scans either. I’m not happy at all. Guess I need to look for another keto app. Thanks 👎🏻
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that your experience with Carb Manager was less than perfect. Our support team would love to offer any assistance we can to help correct your issues. We ask that you reach out to our support team so that we can assist further! Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Jenni Bomb" and we'll be happy to help!

title: Limited database and very time-consuming
body: Half the time the scan feature does not find the food or it's listed as a “serving”.  WTH does that mean in terms of portion?   Am I to assume it’s a cup, half cup, quarter cup?   This can make a huge difference in the macros when I’m cooking.  it takes and a enormous amount of my time to locate the items and guess at measurements compared to my fitness pal.
response: Hi Gaston, thanks for getting in touch. With the scan feature, a serving is typically what the manufacturer lists as one serving of the product on the nutrition label. We also try to include other serving sizes, such as ounces, grams, cups, etc. when possible.

title: Detailed and user friendly
body: I enjoy using this app.  It’s easy to use, refreshes immediately and has not been crashing at all so far.  It is detailed, yet not complicated.

title: Keto
body: Started the Keto way of eating. I love Carb Manager. It’s awesome, from tracking my water, food, calories, fat, protein & carbs. It’s easy once you get your the hang of searching for your food. Not paying for app though, at this time.

title: Keto tracker
body: This app is the best app out there. I can create my menus I can look up recipes and tells me the net carbs total carbs fats proteins everything I need to know about my diet plan. It is well worth the money to get the upgrade!

title: Good app all around
body: The app is easy to learn, navigate, and has a good data base of food plus a scanner. Being new to keto diets, if simplified what o needed to learn to get started and over time I can tune my intake to maximize results.

title: Keto made Easy
body: This program is so user friendly and definitely an asset when starting Keto. An app where the premium version is definitely worth the cost!

title: So easy to stay on point
body: Very easy to use.  Haven’t scanned anything yet that the data base didn’t know.  Easy way to hit your macros no matter what diet plan you’re on.  I use it for Keto currently.

title: Better than Noom
body: I just tried Noom, and cancelled.

title: Pretty cool. Easy to use
body: Have found no better way to track what you eat and drink.  Keeps getting better. Recipes. Macros. Everything in one place. Not very good at cooking so I love the help.

title: Like app but ...
body: I really like this app better than any other I have tried ~ but I really liked the older ne better than this one. It was easier to use ~ this one looks great but the other one was more to my liking

title: Most helpful app for MY LIFE
body: After years of every other diet , then spending tons of money to WW for a “social” platform, I decided to follow my doctors advice and do low carb.  My body is shrinking.... not

title: CarbManager
body: This app has been a lifesaver and has helped me lose 20 lbs and keep it off for over a year. It has all of the diets and allows you to adjust for personal preference.

title: Lost 30
body: This app helped me to track my net carbs and lose 30 pounds. When I was new to Keto I had no idea what I was doing. But putting all my food and portions into this app made it super easy

title: Great App- until resent update
body: Been using this app for a while now, I pay for premium. Since the update it’s been nothing but headaches. Doesn’t safe my foods.

title: New update too cumbersome
body: I just downloaded the app and started using it this year. It was super easy, quick, and helpful. Then it updated to a new dashboard. The new dashboard is not anywhere near as intuitive and SLOW to load. It requires more scrolling to see everything and more clicks. Not happy with the new version.

title: Nutrient fact glitch
body: They need to fix the glitch when you change your serving size around it gets stuck sometimes and the calories etc won’t change

title: I’m finally loosing weight!
body: After many diets that have failed!  Using this app helps me to see and keep track of what I’ve eaten and what I have left to yet eat for the day!

title: Use to love it
body: Until yesterday afternoon, I loved using this app. Then came the change to a different format. I tried to get along with it but no luck. It fails to load foods that I have been using on the app for years. I will delete the app and find something that works better for me. I just don’t have time for this nonsense :(

title: Newest Update is Awful
body: This app was fantastic. I liked it because it was incredibly simple. The newest update significantly slow down the app load up, and added a bunch of nonsense and extra menus that I really did not want. It looks much more comfortable to my fitness pal, where are used to be just a plain and simple carb tracker. Not impressed.

title: Carb manager is the best motivation
body: I am new to carb manager used to use fitness pal. This is much better more informative and I love how it tracks and informs you every step of the way throughout the day.

title: Excellent Assistance
body: This app makes it easy to log because u get feedback on what u type unlike a regular notebook.   I especially love the new updated one. Thanks for helping me

title: if the premiumIf the subscription could offer one week free trail it will be even better
body: if the premiumIf the subscription could offer one week free trail it will be even better

title: Works for Vegan Gluten Free Keto!!!
body: I’m a vegan, gluten free keto dieter and this app has been so helpful to track my macros. I’m impressed that the Scan Foods feature works on so many of the odd Whole Foods and other health food store products that I love!

title: I love this App!
body: I started using the app one week ago and I’m down 5lbs. It is so easy to track carbs, Calories, exercise, etc. Of all the apps I have tried, this one is the best for the low price. Love it!

title: Tons of glitches. No customer service.
body: Do not pay for this app. It is not worth it. I reached out several times about glitches in my $16 quarterly subscription and they had the nerve to tell me to just put things in manually if something isn’t working. As if I’m not paying for a service. Don’t waste your money. Plenty of other apps that do the same thing for free or at a lower cost.
response: Thanks so much for the constructive feedback! While I can't give any specifics at this point, I think you'll really appreciate our next major app update :-) If you have any questions in the meantime, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team at support@carbmanager.com

title: I love this app!
body: This app has helped me track my meal and snacks throughout my keto journey. I especially love how if you research or log a food high in carbs (i.e. grapes) it alerts you  and suggests that you avoid the particular food.

title: Keeps charging me!
body: I unsubscribed months ago and it still keeps charging my bank $33!! So I deleted the app as well, still charged me. I am not subscribed to this anymore why does it keep taking money out of my account?! I cannot get ahold of a customer service number either and when I call Apple they say it’s not an Apple problem I would need to call them direct. Can someone help me please??
response: Hello, and thanks for your review. We apologize for any confusion. Subscriptions must be canceled before the end of the term to avoid auto-renewal. Please reach out to us in-app at Settings-“Need Help?” and our friendly customer service team can assist you with your subscription.

title: Love it!!
body: Took me a bit to not be scared of using this App but once I got the hang of it, I LOVE IT. It really helps you know where you stand and helps you make wise choices for your weight loss goals.

title: Helpful for Keto. But micro nutrient counts unreliable
body: Bought and used extensively for weeks Not quite as user-friendly as hoped. Had some challenges trying to maneuver. Support tried to help, but could not figure out why some micronutrients are not added by the app. Deal-breaker for me.  I need that info. Requesting a refund.

title: Family Sharing
body: My daughter and I both have the app. We love in the same house. I bought premium for her. Can I use the premium features as well?

title: Helpful
body: Even though I don’t always hit my goals (I never get to my calories). This helps hold me accountable and make sure I stay pretty in line with my macros. I like using the app!

title: Amazing App
body: Using this app has helped me lose 20 pounds. It is very helpful and it’s a great form of accountability!! I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to be serious about living a keto lifestyle!!

title: Really happy with the service!
body: My only complaint with it is the app. I really wish it followed the iOS guidelines. Like swipe back to go back a page and stuff like that. Otherwise I love the service it provides!

title: Plus & minus
body: This is a joy to use.  I wish there was away to edit carb manager recipes when have to substitute ingredients.  Also some brand name carbs, calories, fat, do not match what a package, jar, or can says.

title: Fantastic!
body: Takes the guess work out of everything! Highly recommend.

title: Limited
body: App features are limited unless you buy the  premium. Would be nice to be able to just add a few features for a lower price.
response: Hey there! Thanks for your feedback. Our core app and features are free and always will be. Many of our users reach their goals without ever upgrading to Premium. Our Premium version is there for users who want access to advanced features like fitness device integrations, premium recipes, and more, but both versions find success stories!

title: Keeps you in check
body: I love this app! I decided to lose the weight and Change my lifestyle. It’s easy to use and has helped me so much through my journey ❤️ Thank you Carb Manager

title: Easy to use and large database
body: I’ve only been on Keto for a week and this app is encouraging me to keep my macros in check especially the carbs. Loving it so far. Very easy to use and helpful
response: And SOOO many features that you probably haven't even discovered yet :-) Don't hesitate to reach out to our support team if you have any questions.

title: Yo-yo dieting no more
body: This is the only way I have been able to lose weight, control my blood sugar, evaluate foods on the fly, and finally be in control!  Thank you for making it so easy❤️

title: Exactly what I needed
body: If you are a dedicated ketonian like me this is what you need calorie counting is important but making sure carbs stay under 20/30 is paramount to staying healthy and shedding fat. This app Taylor’s to exactly what I needed. The ultimate keto helper

title: Great way to keep track
body: I just started using this app because of a YouTuber who used it to count their carbs and lose weight and stay in shape. I love how easy it is and so many free features.

title: Very Helpful
body: I would highly recommend the premium version because they offer so much more content. If you are starting the Keto diet this app really helps!!

title: Love it
body: Can work for any type diet.   You figure out what how many carbs you what to eat and the app does the rest figuring out calories, fat, protein for you.   Don’t waste money on anything else

title: Best and easiest macro tracker
body: I had stalled on losing weight until this awesome app. After only a week I dropped 3 pounds and have more energy because I eat more than I did before this app!

title: I’ve turned my life around.
body: I’ve lost 7 lbs in two weeks because of this app. I don’t even have the premium app, so I assume it’s even more effective if you pay for it.

title: Awful
body: This app is absolutely AWFUL didn’t even get to start actually using it before I deleted it, you can’t be younger than 17-18 to use this app apparently!?. Because you know people that are young with diabetes who maybe I dunno, want to control their diabetes? Seriously this is the first app that shows up when you search “diabetes app”

title: Glitchy but great tracking features!
body: The app can be very glitchy and looks a bit out dated, however, this is the ONLY app that has helped me stick to my lifestyle.

title: Barcode scan feature!
body: Barcode scan feature is awesome. It makes logging so quick and easy.

title: Unbelievably poor UI/UX
body: Update: don’t use quick logging. Turned off, this app has become a really great tool in my toolkit.

title: Best I’ve Found!
body: This App has it all.

title: Keto’s best friend
body: I am really loving this app and the ease of use, I do wish however the premium features were available for a one time fee instead of a monthly charge. If that were the case I would be more likely to buy it.

title: Easy to use
body: Love how many foods are already in the app, makes it so much quicker to log everything.   Have not found anything bad about it yet.

title: Totally working for me!
body: Counting macros is a cinch with this app! Love it. I happen to be a former weight watcher and their app is amazing. Only reason I detract stars, is in comparison to that app...this is not nearly as user friendly or entertaining. On the bright side, I don’t waste time on it, the way I could easily waste time on the ww app. Recommending to fellow Keto dieters nonetheless.

title: Perfect App for Keto Dieters
body: I was struggling with balancing the correct % if fat, protein & carbs.  Carb Manager does that for me & has the info everything I’ve typed into search! Plus it offers great Keto friendly recipes!!  Highly recommend Carb Manager!!

title: I use the free version
body: This app has made it SOOOO easy to track my net carbs, fat and protein intake. I haven’t seen a better app for this. Thinking about upgrading to take advantage of some of those yummy recipes. Recommend!!!

title: Best app
body: LOVE, love, love the app. It is currently restricting me from seeing future days that I’ve added food to which is making me a little sad because that helped me plan out my week of meals :(. Please fix!

title: Thank you carb manager
body: This app makes it so dang easy to track your eating! I am 50 years old and never thought about how I was eating! This app has opened my eyes! Already down 15lbs!

title: Total carbs option
body: I tried different apps, but this one is easier to use and provides the option  to count total or net carbs.

title: Keeps me on track!
body: Love love this app! When I first started keto I had no clue where to begin or even how! This app has so many helpful readings and now it’s nothing for me to log my food everyday!

title: Love love love
body: I would not be doing Keto without this ap. It makes a huge difference for me not only with tracking everything but with my whole outlook on the Keto lifestyle. Thanks for providing such a wonderful tool!

title: Vs MyFitnessPal
body: Better for Keto diets as it tracks net carbs. Interface pretty good. The quick entry lags behind MFP as it doesn’t seem to keep a custom database of foods recently entered. Can copy meals however. It’s temporarily replace MFP for me but I wish it did better with quick entry

title: Best app for LCHF
body: I’m just blown away by this app.  I’m not a premium user, but I did spend $4.99 to unlock unlimited food logs.  Logging with this app and building my recipes into it has shined a very bright light on everything my wife and I take in.

title: Great App
body: Keeps me on track while doing keto! I love it especially when food shopping, as it tells me which foods are great and which are not! Highly recommend it!

title: Useless without the premium buy I’m
body: This app has a lot to offer if you buy the premium for nine dollars a month or $39 a year. Otherwise everything you click on is not available to you. Forget the recipes forget the good information if you don’t wanna spend any extra money forget this app.
response: Hey there! Thanks for your feedback. Our core app is free and always will be. In fact, we don't offer a trial of our Premium, because we always let our users choose for themselves. Many of our users reach their goals without ever upgrading to Premium. Our Premium version is there for users who want access to advanced features like fitness device integrations, premium recipes, and more, but both versions find success stories!

title: Does not sync well
body: I love this app. However, it does not sync with Apple Health very well. Sometimes my entries sync 4 or more times. I’ve contacted support and after a couple of months I’ve been told my issue resolved. It did not.
response: Hi there, thanks for the review. I'm sorry to hear that you have been experiencing syncing issues with your Apple Health app. Our Development Team is in the process of resolving this. If you already have a ticket in with our Suppor Team, you will be contacted once the issue has been resolved.

title: Used to be a great app now not so much..
