body: This ap used to track your steps, when you input manually, and would adjust your daily macros accordingly. Since the update it no longer does this, and it also calculates net carbs incorrectly. I have reached out to customer support, and all I received is argument saying that nothing has changed. It has. Changing to a different app now. Very disappointing.

title: So angry
body: The new version is terrible! All my custom foods and recipes were gone. Realized that when I clicked CONNECT it brought them back but also brought back every random food or recipe that I entered for the last 5 years. Spent all morning deleting foods one by one because the app won’t let you page edit. This “upgrade” is even worse than your last upgrade.

title: Newest update is HORRIBLE. CHANGE IT BACK
body: The newest update is legit the WORST. If I could give it 0 stars, I would. I hate it so much, everything is much much much more confusing. So many errors when I try to import recipes or add things. The layout is ugly and all over the place. If the app doesn’t go back to how it was before I am probably going to cancel my premium subscription and find another app.

title: Recent update ruined it
body: Since I started my keto journey in July of the year of doom, I have relied on this app to guide my way to losing 60lbs. It has been a part of my daily routine, and I give it a lot of credit for my success.

title: Don’t bother with premium
body: I bought a premium subscription today thinking the scan feature would be helpful.  Every time I tried to scan I got a black screen of death that would not go away until I restarted my phone.  I’ve never had a problem with the basic version and have asked for a refund.  I’m using a new iPhone, by the way.

title: Love it - way better than all others I have tried
body: I have tried at least 3 other apps, and carb manager is clearly so much better!!

title: Helpful!
body: This ap is so helpful in balancing all the different elements for weight control. In love all the elements and like pushing that final button at the end of the day and seeing the total picture!

title: I love this app.
body: Trying Keto for the second time and loving this app. I am becoming obsessed with logging each meal as I go. Helps me make better choices with subsequent meals and keeps me on track.

title: Very helpful!
body: I’d give this five stars if the scanner of barcodes worked, but unfortunately it does not work on my iPhone 6S. I wish they would fix this. It’s still very helpful to keep me on track with carbs, fats, water, etc.
response: Hi there! Thanks for taking the time to leave us valuable feedback! We would love the opportunity to assist you with the issues you are experiencing with the barcode scanner. Please reach out to us from within the app and our knowledgeable and friendly team will be happy to help!

title: Not too old
body: I love this app . At 72 , many apps are complicated enough that I struggle to navigate them . Not this one . It’s very easy to get around, it remembers, and mistakes can easily be corrected. And , I’m loosing weight .😎

title: Track your Keto diet
body: This app has helped me to know what to eat and what to avoid on my keto diet. I’ve been able to make the necessary changes and am continuing to get closer to my weight goals.

title: Easy to Use
body: This is a great app if you were doing low-carb or keto. It’s easy to use and has some great recipes.I like having access to the groups and forums they are a great source of support.

title: Keto
body: I’ve been using this app for 6 days now and I absolutely love it. I thought keto was going to be so hard but with the help of this app I feel more confident about everything.

title: Makes Dieting Easier
body: First time ever dieting and I go for keto. Tracking macros is key. Search options endless. The app is not just for keto, lots of other options to count macros. It tailors to your goals.

title: Please Fix the Glitch
body: I truly enjoy this app & it’s been such a huge help on my keto journey, but here lately it doesn’t nothing but glitch! The most annoying one is the scanner. It’s gotten to the point where NOTHING scans. Even the items I use often and have scanned before.
response: Hi and thanks for sharing your experience. We'd love to take a closer look at whatever glitches are occurring and learn more. Please reach out in-app so we can help as well as make sure your settings are set up properly for the barcode scanner. Thanks!

title: Great Assistance
body: Carb Manager has helped me be aware of the amount of carbs each item on a meal has; plus keeping a log of the food I eat or intent to eat makes me more aware of my choices.

title: Amazing
body: This app is just amazing it helps you plan your day ahead of time and have a better organization with your meals i just LOVE IT, so far this is the beat app i have seen for monitoring my ketogenic diet!!!

title: Thank you
body: I had no idea what I was consuming before I got this app. I’ve lost 12 lbs since this app helped me be accountable for what I was consuming. It’s been a tremendous help. Thanks again

title: Best app for counting macros!!
body: I have tracked my macros for years and always used my fitness pal but recently downloaded this app since I’m doing Keto. I can’t tell you how useful and easy to use this app is!

title: Super keto low-carb app
body: I love recipes, The recipes are great and has A large database. The food logging is very good. I have no problems scanning and getting good results. A very good app if you want to do it all. Without alot of frustration.

title: A Fantastic Guide
body: This app has really helped me not just with learning what is/isn’t within my new eating guidelines, but also with evaluating recipes and tracking my intermittent fasting. It’s a fantastic tool for anyone entering the Keto lifestyle.

title: This is the one to get
body: I have lost 44 pounds in 3 months using this.

title: Scan not working
body: The app does not always work properly. The scan feature is delayed and often does not open. It is a white background with the blue lines.
response: Hello from Carb Manager and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that the scan feature is not working as expected. Our team would love to take a look at this issue for you and offer our assistance. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Buckiifan" so that we can assist you further. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Excited but now frustrated
body: Just downloaded this app and when it begins to load it pops up with a screen saying that my network isn’t working— checked my WiFi and data. Even turned WiFi off to run on data and it still isn’t loading. I don’t know if it’s under construction or has a bug bug I was so excited for this app and now I’m just frustrated!
response: Thank you for taking the time to review our app! We’re sorry you've experienced a brief period where you were having issues accessing your account. We are happy to report the issue is resolved. Please contact us in-app directly via "Settings - Need Help" and reference your username so we can assist further. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Not bad...wants you to pay
body: I believe like the typical KD follower, they're wealthy and have a good investment in kitchen appliances. This app has some good basic features. But it needs a paid subscription  I'll report back after I used it for a while.

title: Great but could use a few tweaks
body: Love the scan option. Wish it was easier when something wasn’t in the system. Wish we could scan UPC codes when creating our own meal.

title: Pretty good app
body: Pros: The concept of this app is great. Super easy to learn and add foods. It’s great to search foods before you eat them too. The library of foods to search is huge so that’s nice too.

title: So user friendly!
body: I am loving this app and how user friendly it is! I have never been one to track calories or foods but this app makes doing so, as I learn the nuances of the Keto lifestyle, very easy!

title: GREAT APP, but should have Fast Food reco’s
body: It really is a solid application. I just wish when you search for a fast food it would give recommendations from high carbs to low carbs. Or have section with all the top recommendations on fast food.

title: If you are Keto get this
body: This is my first ap review. I love this app because it helps me manage my macros and it’s the first time ever I have enjoyed counting what I eat! My only criticism would be to add access to a nutritionist. Otherwise—GREAT!

title: Easy eating.....
body: Doesn’t matter how you’re wanting to eat wether its for training, lose weight, eating clean, fewer carbs, calories it doesn’t matter, makes life so much easier.

user_name: Its not easy as you get older
title: Finally an app that matches my lifestyle!!
body: Easy to use, great meal plans that works with my preferences, simple meals to cook, I am actually seeing results in just the first week without exercising (lose total of 12lbs)

title: Simple and Effective
body: I began Keto one week ago and needed a simple tool to track my food. This one has not disappointed. If you are looking for an easy to use App, this is it!

title: First time ketoers...
body: This app has made it easy for a person trying Leto for the first time, just look on you tube for a little direction and you are on track.

title: Easy to use
body: Great app. Easy to track you food consumption and carbs. Plus it has a spot for your water intake. Love the app and would highly recommend this for anyone.

title: Awesome
body: This app is amazing and informative!  Instead of chancing diabetes thanks to recent blood work I decided to reconstruct my diet. This app certainly helps bring a greater realization of how much sugar and carbs are in our food and aids in reconstructing our habits.

title: Best App
body: Keeping up with daily meals is so easy with this app. User friendly. Easy to edit, create custom food and your Fitbit syncs up too!  Also keeps track of water consumed. Does it all!

title: Best one out there.
body: Awesome for tracking and understanding how to balance macros for keto. And there’s no pressure to buy an upgrade - it kind of makes you want to because there isn’t any marketing. Well done.

title: So Helpful!
body: I started my Keto diet writing out everything in nutrition journal until my friend introduced me to this app. This has made it so much easier to plan meals and make adjustments through the day.

title: Great Keto Beginner Tool
body: No knowing much about Keto or counting macronutrients this app has made things so much easier to track. Looking at bumping up to the Premier version if all goes well in the first few weeks!

title: Super easy - lots of features
body: I really like all the features in the premium - only thing I wish it has would be blood pressure tracking

title: Easy and always with me
body: Tracking has always been hard but carb manager makes it easier.

title: Gave it another chance
body: I decided to revisit this app after giving it 2 stars previously. Had no issues this time around. I think it is more promising than I originally thought.
response: Hey there! Thanks for your feedback. Our core app is free and always will be. In fact, we don't offer a trial of our Premium, because we always let our users choose for themselves. Many of our users reach their goals without ever upgrading to Premium. Our Premium version is there for users who want access to advanced features like fitness device integrations, premium recipes, and more, but both versions find success stories!

title: Excellent app
body: I had to go low carb and really struggled at first tracking everything until I found this gem. Super easy to track all your meals. Love it!

title: You Lost Me
body: I’ve been a premium member for over 2 years, but the new interface lost me. Just canceled and will try something else. All the bells and whistles in the world are fine, but if the basic daily log entry is not quick and intuitive, then it’s not worth a premium price. It was an excellent app and really helped me in my journey.

title: Weight loss challenge
body: This app helped me not only reach a weight loss challenge where I won over 1k but I physically shrunk. I couldn’t of done it with out tracking. Thank you

title: Scan feature doesn’t work since update
body: I used to LOVE this app but since the latest update, it is no longer user friendly. The scan feature is one of my favorite parts, but since the update does not work.

title: Easy to use. Identifies thousands of food it’s accurate
body: the app is fantastic. I use this app because of it’s ease of use and the accuracy of 1000’s of foods.

title: So Easy !
body: This app makes it so easy to track macros !  I did it every day at first and it helped me get a rhythm going with my meals. Still use it 4-5 a week. Could not do Keto without it.

title: Carb Manager
body: Makes my eating routine easy and allows me to make accurate decisions on going all day.

title: Only comlaint
body: I don’t eat out much and therefore I cook all/most of my own food.  Options are not showing up for home cooked food like they should. I think they should be first over store bought prepackaged and restaurant foods.

title: Great meal tracker
body: Helps me determine my food intake and stop when i meet my daily food limit for the day. Recommend it to everyone to balance their diet or on keto as i am using it currently!

title: The best thing ever!
body: The app has features that actually work. I took a picture of food on my plate and like magic. This is the type of stuff you see on sci-fi movies. I 😍 this app!

title: Excellent and easy
body: Although I’m following net carbs, I’m not sure how to create the best day for me. Also, can’t figure out how to connect my iwatch to automatically connect to the program.

title: Workout enhancements
body: I love the diet part of this app but would love to see the exercise section be more interactive with being able to add workouts and the app calculate out calories burned over how many reps for weights and body exercises. The diet part though, you guys have down to the “T”.
response: Hi there, and thanks for the positive feedback and review! We'd love to share with you how simple and quick it is to log and track exercise from the app, so you can love it just as much. Message us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" so we can offer tips and help. Thanks!

title: Fantastic and easy
body: I’m a gestational diabetic and this app allows me to easily tract my meals to keep count of my carb intake. Though it’s meant for counting for weighloss I just ignore the messages and follow what my doctor and nutritionist have planned for me.

title: Best Macro App Ever
body: This app has been so helpful in helping me get started on my keto journey. Very easy to use and makes the process easier for me. Allows me to keep track of what I put into my body!

title: Thank you!
body: This app has been invaluable! Thank you so much for a free version and when I can afford it, I will definitely purchase a subscription!

title: Great app for tracking carbs
body: This app has helped me more than any other in tracking carbs. The breakdown for net carbs is very helpful and the pie chart is a quick summary of where I am throughout the day. Very good.

title: Amazing App
body: My husband and I started our new Keto life style and a friend said we should down load Carb Manager so we did and we are SO glad we did! It’s an amazing tool to help us on our journey!

title: Very handy app
body: A really good app for someone just starting out or returning to Keto after several years away from it. Easy to use, lots of recipes and great interface with health apps.

title: Updating.
body: It seems that updates are done too early. Sometimes before I’m able to input my food after 8 pm. It does not help have accurate data. Please update a bit later.
response: Hi Cali - Thanks so much for the great review and for sharing your feedbacks. Our app doesn't push out any daily updates. Can you please reach out to our support team at support@carbmanager.com so that they can troubleshoot the issues that you're seeing?

title: How did this get 4.8 stars
body: Download the app and nothing worked. I could not get past the sign in page. After I deleted the app and downloaded it again I was able to get past the sign in page. After I got into the app I noticed some of the text was overlapping and you could not read anything. It looks like that’s just how it’s sets up but idk. It’s just sloppy looking.
response: Hello from Carb Manager and thank you for your review. We'll be happy to offer some assistance to help you get up and running with Carb Manager. Our support team is standing by ready to assist! Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "All the names are gone" and we'll be happy to help. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Desperately Seeking Simplifying
body: Wow! First I want to acknowledge the hard work that went into the design of this app.  Now, I think  I’m done with it.  I read instructions, watched instruction videos (all of which needed to be synthesized into one instructional document) tried for days to adjust to the incredibly fussy food logging system - now I’m worn out and want a pint of BEN And JERRY’s chunky monkey.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you've run into some issues learning to navigate the app. Our support team would welcome the opportunity to work with you to show you more of how the app functions. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Mantraless" so that we can assist you further.

title: Awesome!
body: I love this app!  It’s easy to use and has a lot of great features.  The scan feature is my favorite!  It really helps with logging food. Highly recommend!

title: Great tracker!
body: Being new to Keto, this app has been extremely helpful. It allows me to track my day and tailer my eating habits in a way that allows me to live in Ketosis.  With the help of this app, I’ve lost 7lbs in one week!

title: Accountable
body: Carb Manager has helped me be accountable to myself. When temptation hits, I can study my day and make better choices. It takes the impulse and slows it down enough for me to gain control.

title: All in one
body: I love that I can Track everything all in one app down to my steps love that my Apple Watch syncs with the app. App is very user friendly. Best of the food tracker apps that I have used

title: Great for tracking!
body: I really love this app for tracking/monitoring macros.  I use the free portion only but may eventually go premium.  I do kind of wish it linked to my activity/health info on my phone but it’s easy to use and does what I need for now.

title: You can’t connect your Apple Watch
body: You can only connect a Fitbit but not an apple watch. Found this out after I bought the subscription.
response: Hey there, to connect your Apple Watch, please go to Settings > Connect with Health app and turn this on. This will enable Apple Watch syncing.

title: Just right
body: Works well and has all the bells and whistles.  Really nice options for low carb diets.  Scan feature is a game changer to get your nutrition information to this app and Apple Health..

title: Highly recommended
body: Extensive database, easy to use and understand, best app I’ve found to keep track of numbers for more than just carbs.

title: Easy least
body: Easy to use, and since I can scan things and it finds the content of foods, it’s really helpful and quick

title: Simple and effective
body: Initially I was supper confused on macros and managing my carbs and what brand had how much. But this app has made it super easy to manage and maintain my diet. Quick scan to enter in foods that arnt listed and to make the process faster over all. Love it.

title: Great Keto App!!
body: This app is cool. I can find delicious Keto meals, and there scan tool works great. Think this is the first app I have found that gives good ideas and work like it should. Simple tools to learn, and pictures.

title: Deceiving
body: This app is great but they never tell you up front that you can only log 9 entries a day. This started happening to me after i had been using it for two weeks. I am so upset because i will have to find another way to track my progress but will lose all my information when I change apps. Very upset! Don’t waste your time in this one, it’s NOT actually free!! 😞😡

title: Like but needs some functions to be 5 stars!
body: Please allow app users to share entries! Husband and wife have to input separately as far as I can tell. Also it is hard to see what ingredients are in pre enter items:)
response: Hi there, thanks for the feedback! Please go to Social > Friends to add your spouse as a friend, and you'll be able to share foods!

title: Awesome!
body: Just started Keto diet and started using Carb Manager free version. It’s is great app!  Highly recommend it. I do plan on upgrading to premium cause of the extras but I have used for a solid week with no problems on The free version.

title: My helper
body: I couldn’t do this new way of eating without this app. Helpful everyday for me.  Lost 6 pounds-first week would have not been able to do this without this app

title: Very happy with this app
body: Without it I wouldn’t be able to track my macros for health and weight loss. It has meal plans and recipes, and so much more. Easy to read, easy to use.

title: Great App
body: Love how simple this app is to use! It is also highly visual for a quick reference. Just wish the food list were a little more accurate.

title: Effective and easy to use
body: I’ve been using it for a week and it’s effective and easy to use. I love the graphics and that I can email each day to myself

title: Great tool Carb Manager!
body: Glad to have this app to manage my carbs. I would be lost without it. I especially like the pie chart. It helps me to see where I do well, and where I need to work harder.

title: Carb Manager
body: Big fan, I have had for a couple years and it just keeps getting better. Well worth the money!!!

title: Get ready for text advertising
body: After installing this app and entering personal info, I began receiving all kinds of weight loss and keto type advertising via text messages. I block the number for each one that comes in, but they just keep coming from random other numbers. I have deleted the app, but the obviously sell the users personal info.
response: Hi there - We actually have a very strict privacy policy and we only collect the minimum amount of personal information. We never sell or share our customer's data, and we never will. We actually never ask for a phone number, so we wouldn't have it available to send you text messages. If you have any further concerns about our policies around privacy, don't hesitate to reach out to our friendly support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support.

title: This app
body: I have used many food tracking apps in the past but I like this one the most. It’s easy to use and understand.

title: Why change a good thing😒
body: I just got the updated app today. I hate it. Wish I could go back to the old one. I have trouble changing the serving sizes. I usually eat below. Now I can’t track my sugars or cholesterol on the free version. I can’t afford another monthly bill so I really appreciated this app. The new one is too confusing

title: Carnivore Kelly
body: It’s very easy to use especially for beginners I’m not a beginner but I like using it from time to time just to keep track make sure I don’t get out of hand

title: Disappointed
body: I have used Carb Manager for almost 3 years and have loved it-until lately. They have changed the way things look and how foods are entered in the app. It is now harder to work with and frustrating. I don’t like the change
response: Hi there! Sorry to hear that you're not loving the updated version. We won't be bringing back the old version, but we are listening and making changes based on user feedback! If you have specific feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out to our friendly support team via Settings → Help & Support. Cheers!

title: Hate the update
body: The app was soooo much better before! It was so much easier to use. Now it’s harder to find things and the import recipe fyuntion doesn’t work correctly. Also what happened to the website version that syncs with the app?
response: Hi Radio - Thanks for reaching out. The recipe import function should be working. And the website version will be updated to sync with the new version of the app very soon. Sorry to hear that you're having difficulty finding things. We'd love to provide personalized assistance on all of these items! Just reach out in the app via Settings → Help & Support and we'll be happy to help. Cheers!

title: I’m making it work and it’s working for ME
body: It’s only been 11 days and I’m down 6lbs!

title: Very helpful
body: I have found this app very helpful for helping me stick to my carb intake, it keeps track of my protein, fat, and net carbs. I love that when I first opened I could select what diet plan I wanted. LOVE this app.

title: Best App for Keto!!!
body: Lost 100 lbs eating Keto and using this app to track macros.   Couldn't have done it without this app.   I continue to use it to track my macros, making adjustments with varying fitness goals now.

title: I absolutely love this app
body: This is the reason I am now out of my weight loss plateau. It’s perfect for tracking macros and easy to maneuver! I am so happy I found this app and yes I purchased it the recipes are awesome as well !!!
response: Hi! You can definitely log meals with our Free app. The pop-up to upgrade only appears 1x a day. We're happy to offer the free app to as many users as possible, however, we do rely on paid subscriptions to assist us in this goal. We hope you understand and continue to enjoy! Reach out in-app & we can share what other free features are offered, as well as offer some tips to make navigation as smooth as possible!

title: Easy
body: It’s super easy to use. After 1 day I knew where to find everything. You can also scan products. It’s a big help!

title: Love this app!
body: I had no clue how bad i actually was doing on my keto diet until I got this and started tracking. You have to track this stuff!!!!! Thanks for creating this perfect app for carb counting. 💕

title: Lost 40 pounds
body: I plan out my meals for 1 week at a time and prepare them all over the weekend. This helps me know exactly what I can eat and when I can it. It keeps me on track!

title: 6pounds
body: I have tried everything to loose weight this is the only thing that has worked

title: A Must For Weight Loss
body: I’ve been keto food tracking on Carb Manager for over six months and have lost almost 30lbs. I could not have been as successful without this app!

title: Love how easy to use!
body: Love that you can scan barcodes, and put so many different types of measurement units and it calculated my daily net carbs. Makes it so easy to track what I’m eating.

title: Voice dictation is superb
body: The ability to dictate your entries is a huge time saver. The software saves and learns from your previous entries making dictation every more accurate.  Awesome!

title: Very easy
body: This app is worth the money. After 7 days I have found every item of food on this.

title: Working for me
body: At first I thought Carb Manager was difficult to use. I stayed with it and use it daily. The database of foods is fantastic, makes it very easy to keep track.

title: Big help
body: This is how I maintain my keto journey! It makes me accountable for what I eat. Without this app I would fail! It is easy to use and I have never not been able to find a good! Great Job guys.

title: Best app
body: This app helps me keep track all day with ease! I love the fact at the end of the day when I add in my workout time my calories go done. I have lost 13 lbs with this app and the gym....

title: Great free app
body: I just started using this app to track my intermittent fasting and keto diets and it has been working wonderfully. Most items I want to add are already in the app. Thanks for offering this free service!

title: Great for keto
body: I love this app so much more than myfitnesspal when it comes to tracking for keto! So user friendly, I love that it remembers all the foods you’ve had in the past, and it tracks net carbs.

title: Great nutrition/macro app!
body: Really love this app so far! There’s data for most of the food I’m eating and I love that I can set it to display my diabetes carbs since I am a type 1 diabetic. It’s a helpful tool to help determine my bolus calculations.

title: Caffeine
body: I like this so far. Are there plans to expand tracking of more nutrients and other values? Specifically why isn't caffeine available for tracking?

title: Greatness
body: This app is a game changer it’s great for Monitoring  your carbs and your calorie intake and very easy to use. I would definitely recommend it to everybody it most definitely helps out

title: Back in track
body: I have been on the keto diet and hit a wall with my weight loss.  Carb manager helps me plan my meals and keep track on my macronutrient levels. Now I am back on track!

title: Great way to stay Keto!
body: It’s only been a week...7 pounds down and love the ease of this app. Super easy to use and tracks my carbs and all the other stuff you’re supposed to count. I just count carbs.... doing the Dirty, Lazy Keto😁!!!!

title: Keto Dieting
body: This has been a life savor. We are able to stay on track with our macros and easy to use when making food decisions.

title: User friendly!
body: This app makes It very easy and smooth to eat Keto.

title: Not very intuitive
body: Tried getting things set up and got frustrated after a couple of hours.  Cancelled subscription and tried to request a refund and was denied.  Will never purchase expensive apps again unless money back clause is listed in app description. Very disappointing.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're happy to let you know that our support team is standing by, ready to provide you with a "Getting Started" guide and to also acquaint you with using the app. Additionally, we'd love to speak with you directly about your billing concerns. If you'd like to connect with us, please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "VegHead04" and we'll be happy to assist! Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

title: Great app !!
body: Just started the Keto diet a week ago and this app is invaluable to help you track what you are eating - it’s super easy to use and helps you stay on track! Thanks to the developers!!

title: Grateful for the help
body: If you are trying the Keto (Adkins) diet, this app is a must.  Easy to use and tracks everything including net carbs to make you choices very easy. 5 stars was easy for me on this app.

title: Not enough food listings in search or scan
body: There aren’t enough foods listed and scanning bar codes of foods

title: Very helpful
body: Easy to keep a daily track of what your eating and lets you adjust to keep within your limits you set for yourself

title: Actual NET carb macros!
body: So much better than MFP for tracking NET carbs. I’m a chef specializing in low carb cuisine and have-until this app-been SO frustrated by the inability to calculate  accurate net carbs for my recipes. It took a little finagling and a learning curve but I LOVE THIS APP!! 💗

title: Super easy and helpful
body: Straight forward and easy way to track food. Helped break my plateau and get back into weight loss. Highly recommended.

title: Keeps me on track
body: Being able to scan product barcodes directly to my meal tracker is a nice time saver. The recipes are hit or miss. I’ve found a couple of my all time favorite keto recipes on here.

title: So Easy !!!
body: Since discovering CM I no longer have to keep log of my macros, making it easier to get into Ketosis. It’s user friendly and have suggested  this app to my family. Love it ! Thank you CM !!

title: Carb manager is perfect
body: I have control now.. it is helping me better understand my body. I am getting better at food choices . I love what it has done so far.

title: Keeps me on track.
body: Love the fact that I can scan or manually enter the food intake daily and not go over my daily calorie limit.

title: Pretty good
body: I like that I can add my own recipes. I am able to ensure the exact numbers I am eating. You have to purchase it to use that feature, but that isn’t too bad.

title: Day at a glance
body: Food journaling made easy. I have even scanned in products and added them to my favorites. Easy to use and allows for portion adjustments when you need to meet your target goal. Happy I have the premium.

title: Huge help
body: I love being able to track my food with this. Their net carb count is awesome. I have been using it religiously and it really helps me to stay on track.

title: Issues loading
body: I love the app & the way it keeps me on target. My biggest issue is that is seriously slow opening and loading, sometimes I just give up and try later. Is there a glitch that needs to be fixed??

title: Everything you need for keto
body: Love the app. They have lots of recipes, you can easily import recipes from any website. Can add ketones and glucose measurements, it is connected with FitBit. Covers literally every need!

title: Love love love this app
body: I used a lot of tracking apps before but this on is hands down the best I’ve found. Not only is it easy accurate but is very customizable. Check out u tube video my fave are by J V

title: Awesome App
body: I just finished using this app for the first day and I absolutely love it. It is very easy to track foods and also the scanner capability at the store level is outstanding.

title: Thumbs up
body: I’m enjoying this app I can’t believe its free! It works even when not tracking only carb counts. I do better when I’m tracking with this app.

title: Great for tracking carbs but
body: Not great for tracking steps unless you carry your phone everywhere you go - including walking around your home. It would be great if this would sync step counts with FitBit.
response: Hi there and thanks for leaving us feedback! Syncing with a FitBit is possible with a Premium subscription. If you have a free account, you can sync your Apple Health app. Please reach out to our awesome Support Team to learn more. You can email us at support@carbmanager.com or contact us directly from within the app. :-)

title: Update Horrible
body: I absolutely loved this app when I first started using it in October 2020. I loved it so much that I upgraded and bought the app to have more options. This lasted update is horrible. It takes for ever to add meals and find my items that I used to use all the time. It’s difficult to add recipes and the new format is just unacceptable. If I could give zero stars I would!

title: Love the New Look
body: This is a great app to keep track of what you eat and to achieve your goals, whether it’s weight loss, blood sugar management or anything else. And the new look is awesome.

title: Best App
body: They recently upgraded the app. I gave it a bad review before throughly checking it out. They moved some things around but it’s really the same great app it’s always been.

title: Recent upgrade is a downgrade
body: I have a premium membership and have found this app extremely helpful. The recent upgrade is horrible. The layout is confusing, the app is slow to open, I can’t enter my weight in the goals and measurements section, and the app is slow to open.

title: Not happy with the update!
body: I had many recipes saved in the app for easy reference when I’m cooking. Since the update, more than half of those recipes are gone and I can’t find them. I’m really not happy right now not to mention that’s time I’ll never get back from what it took me to enter all those recipes

title: So simple! I learned in a day!
body: I don’t use apps- I was surprised at how simple this app was to learn. It took me just one day to learn. Searching for foods and scan bar codes for meal planning is easy.

title: Great app, easy to use
body: This app makes it so easy to track macros. Have lost weight using app to track my keto diet plan. It’s easy to find most foods and easy to enter in new foods.

title: Great App
body: This app will greatly effect your weight management. I would highly recommend it to anyone trying to lose or maintain their body composition.

title: Great app, but
body: Took one star off because what I log on my iPhone does not transfer over to my iPad. If I want it both places I have to enter things twice. So, phone it is because it’s always with me.

title: Conceptually good; practically buggy
body: This is the best diet manager app when it works. I've been using this over a year and I pay a monthly premium. And yet, this thing is sometimes unbearably buggy. And no matter how many critical reviews, they don't seem to get fixed.
response: Thanks so much for the constructive feedback! While I can't give any specifics at this point, I think you'll really appreciate our next major app update that will be released in a few weeks! :-) If you have any questions in the meantime, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team at support@carbmanager.com

title: Great for tracking your Progress
body: Great for keto diet and tracking your carbs for the day. Love the scanning feature. For sure recommend for those tracking their food and carb intake.

title: User friendly
body: Just started using this app. It’s user friendly and is really helping me to understand how food can work on this diet for me.

title: John
body: A little more complicated getting started but overall I like it better than the under armor my fitness pal app. It is more carb and keto friendly

title: Great Tool to Help Keep You On Track
body: This is a great tool to keep me on track. I got my husband to start using it so we both are accountable in our Keto journey. No issues thus far!

title: New
body: I am overweight but I am really excited to start to count my calories so look 👀 really good and easy this app I am 51 years older so never to late to start working on my health 👀🥰😎😝
response: We agree- it's never too late to start working on your health! Well done! If we can help with anything along your journey, please message us in-app. Thanks!

title: Really Helpful
body: This app is easy to use and really helpful. Love the tracking, scanning, recipes, and ability to keep everything in one place.

title: The free version is pretty awesome
body: I have tried others but they always want you to buy the upgrade to do anything! This was recommended to me and I love it!!!

title: Keto Trackers
body: I started Keto a couple months ago, but realized I needed to track my macros for a healthy version of keto & this helps tremendously! Also love how it grades items I can & lets me know if it’s keto friendly or not

title: Love the app
body: I have used a couple of similar apps before. This one is easy to figure out and has all the options I need to achieve my goals.

title: Makes meal prepping so much easier!
body: I’ve lost a lot of weight and feel amazing! Didn’t have to diet or cut the food I loved, just had to get a visual idea of how much I could eat.

title: Won’t open.
body: I used to love this app!  I even purchased the Premium Version.   However, the last update won’t work on my iPhone XR. All I get is the logo for about 10 seconds and then the app closes.    Support keeps telling me the solution is to update my phone.  My phone is updated.  I tried everything.   I just cancelled my Premium subscription and I am forced to move on.
response: Thanks for sharing your experience and review. We're sorry to hear you've run into some loading issues on your device, and we definitely want to help. It seems like you have already reached out to our support team, but can you please message us in-app, so we can take a closer look and help sort out the problem? Thanks!

title: The best
body: I love this app so easy to use it motivates me to eat healthy makes it easy to count my carbs and calories me being a diabetic this app is usful just good for anyone. I highly recommend this app! ❤️❤️❤️❤️

title: Easy to track
body: This app is amazing and makes tracking food so easy! The scan feature is fantastic!!

title: Unsure question about dietary restrictions
body: Just downloaded and upgraded to premium.  Is there a way to put in dietary restrictions?   I have to be on a low fodmap gluten and dairy free diet.  Also trying to incorporate intermittent fasting. Thank you.
response: Mana, for sure we can help with that! Our app caters to dietary restrictions, like low FODMAP, and has a whole feature to help you set up and track Intermittent Fasting. Reach out to us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need Help?" and we can walk you through it. Thanks!

title: Very Helpful
body: I just started keto and have switched to carbmanager from MyFitnessPal and I love it. It makes it very easy to track net carbs and makes net carbs the primary focus. It’s easy to search for common foods.

title: Helpful
body: The app is very helpful when tracking my meals. You can easily look up foods and decide if this is the best choice or should I pick another item that better fits with my goals.

title: Happy camper
body: This my 4 day and just learning but learning new thing each day. Now just putting recipe in that we are going to try. Instant pot recipe which we really enjoy using.

title: In 5 days my blood sugars are under 200
body: I feel amazing. This app is slowing me to be focused and have success. I immediately upgraded because it was definitely worth it!!

title: Premium Subscription is a waste of $
body: I subscribed for the advertised ability to find meals to fit my macros. I want to meet my protein macro, it doesn’t do this. I also had problems with reports showing which boxed I checked to include. I reached out to support within 24 hours of initiating an annual subscription, many hours later they said to contact Apple. Apple rejected my refund request.
response: Aquariusa, thanks for sharing your experience. Sorry to hear you ran into issues with your Meal Macros and Recipe Filters. It's possible the issue is rooted in a setting you have turned on. We'd love to take another look. If you haven't already, reach out to us again via in-app, and we can either guide you through your Meal Plans/Recipes or help you again to request a refund. Thanks in advance!

title: Five Stars! This app is the bomb!
body: This app is amazing! Tracks net carbs - connects to fitness watches and apple health - recipes, meal plans, grades food for those on the keto diet path. Awesome Awesome. Just upgraded to premium and I’m excited to learn about all the new options.

title: Just starting
body: Trying to do this Keto thing and this application is great. Even gives you reminders to log your meals!  I hope I am doing this right😀

title: Helpful
body: This has been my life saver on the Keto diet. It set my macros perfectly and it’s so easy to use. I recommend it to everyone who needs an easy way to track their macros.

title: Love this app
body: I had My Fitness Pal, and think this app is much more extensive and user friendly. (Note - I have a premium membership, which I find totally worth the money!)

title: Ease of use
body: It’s very easy to use, input and follow. The only thing is it wouldn’t let me set my own calorie goal so I have to watch it myself but not too bad for the free version.

title: Easy and it works
body: I’ve had CarbManager for over a year. I use it daily for meal tracking, getting macros for recipes, etc.
response: Cheers, Biffley22!

title: Amazing
body: I couldn’t be successful with Keto without it. I’ve been Keto for 3 weeks and I have lost 16 pounds. I’ve never had this success with anything else before and this app made it possible!!!!

title: App Crashed
body: Latest update causes app to crash when opened. Please fix
response: Thank you for taking the time to review our app! We’re sorry you experienced a brief period where you were unable to access your account. We are happy to report the issue is resolved. Please contact us in-app directly via "Settings - Need Help" and reference your username so we can assist further. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Not working
body: After today’s update I am not able to get into the app.  Hope the issue will be resolved SOON.
response: Thank you for taking the time to review our app! We’re sorry you've experienced a brief period where you were having issues accessing your account. We are happy to report the issue is resolved. Please contact us in-app directly via "Settings - Need Help" and reference your username so we can assist further. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Great Carb counter
body: Working on the Keto diet and this app is pretty slick. You can easily look up all kinds of foods, good search results and scan your labels and knows almost everything.

title: Great app for KETO
body: I have been Keto for the last 8 months, and have used this app to track my macros and weight loss. I have lost 55 pounds!! This app was incredibly helpful. I highly recommend it!!

title: Great app, but how do I measure in increments?
body: I want to do my measurements, but I only see how they are rounded up or down to the nearest inch. I like to keep track by the quarter-inch at the very least. Is there a way to do that?

title: Slow to load
body: I love the app with the exception of the problem with opening or loading the app.  It just hangs there.  I have turned it off.  I have removed it and reinstalled it.  I have shut my phone off. It still won’t open.  It did well for about 3 days and that’s been it. Very disappointed
response: Hi Linda, thanks for contacting us and sorry for the problem! Please contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll work on fixing this issue for you.

title: Wow!!!
body: I’ve been using this app since I have been dieting and it has helped me tremendously! I am so glad they made this app! I can easily track my carbs, water intake, excersize, and much much more. This app is AMAZING!

title: Easy to use!
body: Just wish there was an easier weekly print option.

title: Yes!!!
body: The carb manager helps me so much! It finds everything I’m looking for the only thing I have a hard time doing is when I cook recipes at home but other than that I love this app!!

title: Best App of Its Kind
body: Haven’t used it long, but it is user friendly and a fast way to log your food intake for a Keto Diet. Have lost 8 lbs in a week and brought my Glucose Level from 7.3 to 6.6 mmol.

title: Best Low Carb app
body: Great app. So easy to use. Get everything you need out of it without having to pay a monthly cost.

title: Carb helper
body: I really like this app because when you scan your foods it gives it a grade and help you know which foods to avoid and stay away from.

title: Easy and informative
body: I love this app. It’s easy to use and is teaching me lots about macros. I’m using the free portion now and maybe consider upgrading to try our recipes and blood sugar tracking.

title: Very good app
body: This app is easy to use and has a huge data base of grocery food info so very little manual input is needed. Love the scanning feature. Keeps me on track and motivated.

title: Fantastic App!
body: I love this app!  I just started a low carb diet and between the meal ideas, ability to scan foods, and the categories from A to F grades to let me know what foods are acceptable it has been invaluable!!!

title: Makes the diet work!!
body: Carb manager helps me to stay on track! Would be impossible to keep track of these numbers myself!!

title: Making my Day!
body: I’ve been dieting for many years this has revolutionized my food diary! Love it! Need to load NOW you don’t know what you have been missing! Thanks Carb Manager and App Store!!😊

title: Love it so much I want to marry it!!!
body: This app is easy, free and totally keeps you on track! I’ve been using it for a week and I haven’t found one food yet that isn’t on it!

title: Carb Manager
body: I love the scanner and snap shot features. I also get to record my glucose and ketone levels. I look at it as aiding me to stick to the diet as I use Keto for both my cancer and diabetes. It makes the whole thing feel like a real life game on the IPad.

title: Love this app for Keto!
body: I hated using MFP for Keto , too much work. The only think is that CarbManager doesn’t show sugars? Or is there a way to turn this on somewhere ? I don’t want to have to use MFP just to track sugars too 😞

title: A must have!
body: This app is simple to use and a must have for keto!   Lots of info available with a press of the button.  Highly recommend.

title: Great app!
body: I used for a year and half that I was on Keto and then switched to Ideal Protein diet. While it is not as low carb as keto, this app works perfectly. I would say this app works with ANY diet your trying to be on!

title: Disappointed
body: So you get the Ap, and then nothing is available that you need on it because it is all listed under Premium!! Why does everything today have to have an up charge ? So frustrating. I honestly am
response: Hey there! Thanks for your feedback. Our core app is free and always will be. Thousands of our users reach their goals without ever upgrading to Premium. Our Premium version is there for users who want access to advanced features like fitness device integrations, premium recipes, and more, but both versions find success stories!

title: Scanner won’t work on iPad
body: I love this app but the scan barcode won’t work on my iPad. It won’t fine on my phone. When I try to scan with my iPad, it tells me to supply my email so I can be emailed a link to the app. (?)

title: Limitations for free version
body: Started doing low carb about a week ago, thought it would be helpful to track. Saw this, downloaded, entered my breakfast for today, then my lunch, then tried to enter my dinner and was stopped by the premium pay wall. Really be nice if I could try for a few days before I fork over cash... bummed.
response: Hi there - our basic macro tracking features are always free - including net carb tracking for low carb/Keto. If you see a paywall before you're ready to upgrade, you can always close it (should be an 'x' in one of the corners) and continue logging. Many of our most active users are actually free users! Hope that helps, and good luck with low carb!

title: Don’t like the new look
body: Do not like the new look on the app. Not user friendly and not easy to read and see where you are

title: Diabetic who loves this app!
body: This app is the ONLY way to track your meals as a diabetic. I’ve been using this for years and can’t wait for the update! Thank you for this app ❤️

title: 7.0 version isn’t an upgrade
body: I love my carb manager, or I used to.  I’ve used the app for many months and the functionality was perfect for me. Now that the 7.0 version has been released, logging and tracking foods, especially when using a food scale, are now significantly harder and more time consuming. Thumbs down, I’d recommend a different app at this point.

title: Great for Type 2 Diabetes
body: Got my weight down and A1C level down to 5.3 by following the food %’s allocated for me to accomplish my goals.

title: Used to Love it, but.....
body: I used to really enjoy using this app. My only past complaint was that you have to pay the yearly premium in order to connect to your Fitbit.
response: Hi there, thanks for the feedback. We've released several updates to the new version of the app—please update via the app store and you should see many of the issues you mentioned will be resolved. If you still have a specific issue you can always reach out in-app via Settings → Help & Support for assistance. Thanks!

title: Dont pay for this app
body: No reason to pay for the app, the usefull part is free, the recepies are very limited, the only way I can seem to create a shopping list is making a meal plan (can’t choose a couple of favorite meals and make a list) no way to filter your favorite recepies, when trying to make a meal plan my app lagged and customer service doesn’t even read my message, DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!

title: Great app!
body: App is great! Especially for people just beginning Keto!! So easy to use and keeps you on track! I would recommend to anyone needing to keep track

title: Bomb app
body: This app is great, with or without premium. I rarely pay for the premium version of an app but this one is worth it. All the different aspects make monitoring your carbs easy!

title: The App would Be But Couldn’t
body: This app would be great if you could get on. The friends newsfeed feature never loads. Several days a week I cannot even get on to record my food without constantly trying and wasting my time all day long. This app has amazing features and is the most comprehensive, but what’s the point if you can’t even use it??
response: Hi, thanks for your feedback! We welcome the opportunity to assist you with any issues you may be having or answer your questions about the accuracy! Please reach out to us from within the app and our awesome customer service team will be happy to help you troubleshoot!

title: Love my app
body: I love using this carb mgr app.

title: Key ingredient
body: Carb Manager has been THE key to my success on Keto. Had a quick easy start with simple ingredients. Was able to build on advanced functions for custom

title: Review
body: It would be great to have a page where we could enter our information on items not on the list you offer.

title: Thought I knew what I was doing!
body: Once I set up my profile and followed the carb manager’s recommendations, as well as adding intermittent fasting until my pancreas was reset, I finally lost the weight! SO MUCH MORE FUN SHOPPING NOW!!!

title: ❤️🙌Thank You Carb Manager
body: This app is the best!  Helps me to portion control.  This is a must have for a life style change, especially if you’re having trouble losing weight...

title: Ready to dump
body: I have used this app for 2 years and have enjoyed it despite its annual cost of $39 per year. I just paid for an additional year and now found that the only way I can obtain recipes is if I pay an ADDITIONAL $39! This is extortion, given that recipes were always part of the app. How disappointing. Also, there is no place to contact customer support to ask questions.
response: Hi there, once you have Premium you always have access to our recipes. It sounds like this may be an issue with your Premium not refreshing or of a duplicate account. Simply message our Custom Support from in the app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" or email us at support@carbmanager.com and we can sort it out for you ASAP. Thanks so much

title: Great for tracking macros
body: This is an easy app to help one track their macros on a keto diet. Easy to use, most foods/brands are loaded in the app, good for making sure one stays within their limits.

title: My conscience
body: I will forget to log on for a couple days then play catch up but overall seem to stay within carb limits, really like Keto plan

title: Best tracking app ever
body: I love CarbManager. It tracks items down to the macro level and provides wonderful recipes. I couldn’t make this Keto lifestyle change without you 😃

title: Review
body: This app has helped hold myself accountable and realize everything I eat. I would definitely recommend it to everyone.

title: Love it but
body: For a paid subscription I’d think app updates should be more frequent. Last one was nearly half a year ago. Some UI bugs are prevalent.
response: Hey there! Our app updates are constant and automatic, so they don't need a manual reinstall/update ;) . However, if you think you're running into some issues, please reach out to us in-app, so we can take care of it. Thanks!

title: Prohibited by Premium
body: I have been really grateful for this app in helping me stay on track with eating keto. Today, however, I couldn’t enter some of my foods, because the forced Premium pop-up kept happening, blocking me from entering. Argh! Will I still be locked out tomorrow? I hope not!
response: Hello from Carb Manager support. We're sorry to hear that you've encountered an issue logging food today due to a pop-up. We'd love to connect with you further in order to further troubleshoot this issue. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Ms. Sardinia". We're looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Very helpful!
body: I use it everyday. The scanning feature is so helpful when shopping I wouldn’t want to live without it!! Gamelan going keto or losing weight 10X easier.

title: I love it!!!
body: Wow, this app is SO helpful for me in managing my Type 1 diabetes, diet, and health.  Their database of foods and nutrients is huge, plus you can add your own. They’ve thought of everything I need.  I’m so grateful this exists!

title: I really like it
body: I don’t have the premium and i am still really like this app. It breaks down my meals simply: carbs, fats, proteins and helps me to keep track of what i want to eat to stay on my meal plan.

title: Great app!
body: I’m new to Keto and this app is super helpful keep things on track. The scanner is the best I’ve used compared to other weight loss meal trackers. Definitely worth the premium purchase!

title: Honey
body: I like it but in order to really customize-you need to upgrade with a PURCHASE. At first it seems more inclusive but most things cost so in other words I didn’t get much but I didn’t pay anything.

title: Information is Power
body: This site is awesome.  The most powerful tool is being able to measure the impact of what you eat.  Brilliantly organized and the most courteous staff.

title: Love this app!
body: I have tried several carb counting apps and Carb Manager is where I have landed because it is by far the best. It has easy to search food lists and great data visuals.

title: Huge help
body: This app is a huge help in figuring out what to eat. I don’t have the premium yet but even with just the basic app, it’s a great tool to help watch and log what you eat.

title: Keto Teacher
body: I’m new to keto.  It’s so handy to put food in before I eat it to see the effects on my macro.  The app lets you easily take things off if you choose not to eat them.

title: Great
body: Gotta say, having real time look up as part of meal recording is huge. Went to premium after first day for meal planning aids. Tracks macros and has a ton of features.

title: Really helps me stay on track.
body: I am really impressed with this app!. It's well thought out, and fairly easy to use.  It's keeping me honest, and helping me plan meals ahead so I'm not starving and desperate!

title: New version totally broke the app!
body: Help!  I have to use the web version- I cannot even log into the update. Something is totally broke here folks!
response: We are so sorry for the interruption! If you are still missing your data, please log out (Settings > Log Out) and then in the log in or sign up screen, look for a link toward the bottom of the page labeled "Get back in here". This will restore your data. If you need additional assistance, please email us at support@wombatapps.com.

title: Great App
body: This is a great app. Would have gotten 5 stars but it’s missing multiple add. I think this would be beyond amazing if you can add more than one food at a time like MyFitnessPal

title: VERY IMPRESSED
body: For a free app this is great. Helps you track your intake as well as exercise so easily plus if gives you recipes!! Definitely have recommended this to others

title: Slow loading app
body: I really like the app. It provides/manages comprehensive information. Only criticism is that it takes a lot longer to open/load than Lose It! and My Fitness Pal.

title: My keto diet made easy
body: I love this app! It helps me to keep on track and helps me to figure out what I need to eat. I am not sure I would be doing as well without it. Thanks to the creators!

title: Love it
body: I love everything about it only reason why I gave it 4 stars is because the nutrition facts on the app after scanning an item, is sometimes different from what the nutrition facts on the actual food says.

title: Great help
body: When I feel like getting off track it help me stay on track! Easy to use and easy to understand.

title: Frustrating
body: I really have enjoyed the app, but now that I’ve  paid for the year it’s terribly glitchy, the whole page is gibberish.

title: Carb Manager
body: Love this app.  Have been on many diets and this is the best  way to lose the weight.  Only 12 lbs from goal because of tracking with this app which has an AMAZING  data base..

title: Great for keto diet tracking
body: Lives up to expectations- I like the scanning feature. Fast and easy. Use it to decide what can or can’t eat on plan which helps a lot with those hidden carbs. Sarah G

title: Love it
body: I tried several carb counter apps when I started the Keto diet but quickly deleted them after I tried this app!  It is very user friendly and I love it!

title: Love this app!
body: This app is a lifesaver for me as I’m trying hard to do the Keto diet. The premium app may give totals for each meal but this one doesn’t. I guess I’m just to cheap to swing for the premium. This one is still great!!!

title: Love it for the most part!
body: Pretty good app, aside from the fact it crashes often. Fix that and it will be better. Still not a lot of foods found in the search bar, but over time that should improve with more usage.

title: Missing features in the pro version
body: Need to to be able to check off meals I had and see real time fat to carb to protein ratio.

title: Easy to use - great database
body: Amazing how easy! This is making my Keto diet a whooooole lot easier. Lots in the database- I haven’t had to search or create anything extra if it has a barcode.

title: Carb manager
body: Easy to use, whether searching for food, adding your own, creating recipes. Easy to read. I love it. Can’t get away with cheating if I use it honestly.

title: Simple
body: I don’t usually write reviews lol. But carb manager was very simple. I like searching food and condiments. The data base is full of favorites from brand name to menu items at restaurants.

title: Best Carb App for Keto
body: The interface is easy. Love the ability to scan barcodes. Easy to track weight and add to your daily foods. Keeps record of foods for repeat access...and all that for free!

title: I love this app
body: This app has made it so much easier to track my macros, my recipe and my meals. I am tracking my weight, blood sugar and ketones and my measurements. I love the social aspect as well. Good job. I definetly recommend!

title: Thank you
body: Easy to navigate and extremely helpful to keep me on track daily. Thank you

title: Fasting
body: Favorite App, so awesome! I only wish they had a toggle so on the times when I fast it would record that on there so it knows I am not eating today

title: What Happened??!
body: I use Carb Manager to track my weight loss and maintenance.  What happened today to the graph?  It now goes in steps of 100 pounds to 1000 pounds.  I am a small person, and makes my weight loss and two years of maintenance virtually invisible around the 100 pound mark.  While I appreciate and applaud  inclusion, what happened to using a graph that displays realistic increments.  This is unusable.
response: Hi there, and thanks for your review! The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: No more insulin
body: I have stppped taking my two insulin and have control my sugar level   Amazing I thought I would be taking insulin forever.  Thank you so much.

title: Great App
body: I really like using this app for days that I’m counting my net carb intake. I like the fact that it’s focused on net carbs, the only downside is the lack on finding the net carbs or nutrition information for outside already prepared food. Besides that it’s a great app (it’s also free!)

title: Amazing recipes
body: This is a great app. Tracking is really easy with the scanner. The recipes in the paid subscription are amazing and also make tracking home cooked meals super simple. Love it.

title: Hate this new version!!
body: I have waited to rate so that I could give myself time to adjust to the new interface. This version has too many glitches! Yes it looks pretty neat, but the functionality of the old version is better... wish I could go back to the old version until my subscription for premium is up. Ugh... so frustrating.

title: What happened?
body: Went from a 5 star to 1 star after recent upgrades.  My wife and I used this app a year ago and got the premium version. Neither of us renewed due to the upgrades. So, much of the scanned information is now wrong and can no longer edit the scanned information.  No longer user friendly in my opinion.

title: New update is horrible
body: New update is awful and not user friendly. Would not recommend. May have to look for another app. Dietary restrictions and tracking is hard enough without the developers making things needlessly more complicated in an effort to look more modern. Was thinking of going premium and this makes me glad I didn’t.

title: Amazing app
body: This is my 10th day doing jet and I am already seeing results! The Carb App is fantastic. My favorite is the breakdown of proteins and carbs per day and also the menu library with delicious recipes💕

title: Terrible updated version! Slower than ever!!
body: The previous app version would let you see Net Carbs and Total Carbs in the same view. Now, they got rid of that helpful & simple feature.
response: Hi there and thanks for the feedback. We hear you loud and clear! In fact, we're soon releasing a new version of our app that will optimize our food search and food edit functions. However, in the meantime, both are functional and intuitive. If you're running into issues, please message us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need Help?" so we can take a closer look and help sort it out. Thanks in advance

title: Freezes
body: I have been using this app for about a week this morning I tried to add my breakfast and it won’t allow me to add any food or search anything and it has been freezing. I have tried turning on and off my phone. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app and it still not working.
response: Hi there! I'm sorry to hear you are having issues with the app, what you're describing definitely does not sound like normal behavior. We welcome the opportunity to assist you in troubleshooting the problem you may be experiencing. Please message us from within the app, and our awesome customer service team will be happy to help!

title: Enjoy it while it works.
body: The glitches are getting out of control. Half the time I can’t even get the app to load, tells me I’m not connected to internet. Then sometimes it does eventually load and I can’t do anything because of the continued glitches. Foods start showing up wrong. I wrote to them a long time ago and no one seems to care.
response: Thanks so much for the constructive feedback!. While I can't give any specifics at this point, I think you'll really appreciate our next major app update :-) If you have any questions in the meantime, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team at support@carbmanager.com

title: Easy
body: I find logging in is actually easier than weight watchers. The scanner works great so I’m shopping I just scan and East to know do I buy it

title: Don’t waste your money
body: Don’t waste your money. I downloaded this app over a year ago using the free version. I had absolutely I problems. 3 weeks ago, I upgraded to the premium version and all of a sudden, I CANT EVEN OPEN THE APP! I’ve tried uninstalling and reinstalling it again, it worked ONCE. I haven’t had any problems with this app until I paid for the subscription. DO NOT WATE YOUR MONEY!!!
response: Hi there and thanks for leaving us constructive feedback! The issue you are having is definitely not normal app behavior. Please allow us the opportunity to look into this further by messaging us from within the app. Just tap on to "Need Help" and our friendly customer support team will assist you!

title: Can’t live without
body: I need this for accountability. This tracker has every tool I need. I especially love the scan feature!!! You need this app in your life!

title: Great app for carb management
body: This really helps me keep track of my nutritional information.  Has really kept me aware of what I eat on a daily basis.  Really glad I found it!

title: Awesome Free Keto Tracking App
body: I love this app.  Tracking everything I eat has made me feel accountable for my own weight loss.  You can enter in the nutritional values for any and every food.

title: App won’t load on iPhone or iPad. 🤬
body: I’ve deleted the app and added it again but now it won’t load. My cellular data is on. Please fix bug.
response: Hello, and thanks for sharing your experience. Please reach out to customer service at Settings-“Need Help?“. We would like to help troubleshoot any connection issues.

title: Love It!
body: Using the app is an eye-opening experience & keeps you on track. Love that you can scan items for accurate accountability.

title: Only one that works!
body: This is the first app I’ve been able to use and keep up with. It makes it soooo much easier for my keto diet/lifestyle and love the recipes.

title: Keto App
body: Makes it easy to track what I ate. Also tells you if you could eat certain foods. Started 4 days ago. Could never do keto without this app.

title: Beautifully designed
body: always found it

title: Love this App
body: I love this app because it is so easy to use and log your food items. I love that it gives you a pie chart so I can visualize how I’m doing through the day.

title: LOVE!
body: Love love love this app! It has been a life changer for me and my husband. The tracking is only as accurate as the info you enter and they have made it so so easy to be VERY accurate.

title: I love this app so much
body: It helps me keep track of my macros. It literally has every food and every brand you can think of to ensure that you’re accurately tracking your macros. And it’s FREE 👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻
response: We love you too Jay :-)

title: Micronutrient info
body: I really like this app. I have the premium version. Now that I’m really into tracking the micronutrients, I would like more micronutrients tracked. There are items disclosed on the food packages than what show up in the tracker.

title: Very disappointed
body: That you have to subscribe to connect your tracking device.
response: Hey there! Thanks for your feedback. Our core app is free and always will be. Most Carb Manager users become "Keto success stories" without ever upgrading to Premium. And that's totally ok with us! Our Premium version is there for users who want access to our advanced features like our fitness device integrations, premium recipes, advanced health analytics, our Keto Jump Start e-book, and more. If it helps, our annual plan gets the effective pricing down to just $3.33 a month!

title: Nice wee tracker
body: Found it very easy to navigate and keep a log on my progress. I store all the information and input it at night after dinner.

title: Carb manager
body: This app has kept me stay on track and even though I have just started with this app, I am glad someone recommended it to me!

title: Macros
body: Macros are the real reason people use these apps now. It’s only a matter of time before another app includes this and the ability to carb cycle in their free version. You will lose people who carb cycle. Hopefully you have enough people who pay a subscription...

title: A great convenient helper
body: This app is more helpful than keeping up with writing stuff down on paper....makes tracking easy!

title: Used to Work. Not now.
body: So I used to absolutely love this app before I upgraded to an iPhone 10.  It is completely broken on the iPhone 10.  Because of the uneven shape of the phone’s screen, the VAST MAJORITY of the icons you will want to use are inaccessible off the edge of the screen.  Please update.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you've run into an issue when using the app on your new iPhone. Our team is diligently working on a fix for this. You may also access Carb Manager online via: app.carbmanager.com/account/signin. In case of further questions, please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username so that we can help!

title: Best carb app
body: I love this app. I have only used for a week. So easy. I love how it displays every thing at the top, so you can see how much you have used and how much you have left.

title: Excellent
body: Great app, been using for only a week now and find it easy to use and accurate. Highly recommend!

title: The One Thing for Keto
body: This app is the one thing that’s helping me begin and maintain my Keto diet.  I don’t know what I would do without it.  This app and my small kitchen scale aren’t daily tools.  The recipes are wonderful!

title: Carb Masters
body: I really like this app. It helps me to understand what I am putting in my body. Although, I am not sure it is always 100% correct, I still like using it.

title: Lag
body: The app needs to be more snappy, most of the times it sort of lags while searching through the food database or while typing in something

title: 5 stars
body: Very useful app. Trying out a low carb diet for about 2 weeks now and this is what’s been keeping me on track! Definitely worth it

title: Convenient and capable
body: With exception of a few improvements that I would recommend as a user, this APP provides me with convenience and quality I need.  My Keto journey needed a tool like Carb Manager.

title: Not only for Keto
body: Helpful app! Although I am not doing keto, it still helps me keep track of my diet. You can find almost any food you may be consuming on it. Love it!

title: Love it!
body: I have tried many apps and this is the best by far. User friendly so I’m able to track consistently! A great partner for keeping me on track!

title: Lost 7 lbs in 2 weeks
body: This app has really helped me manage my carbs. It really helps make it easier to stay in ketosis! Easy enough to use for those brand new to dieting/ keto.

title: Keeps me focused
body: This app sends out reminders to log your food. Also makes it very easy to find your food to log. The recipes are excellent. Just 2 words! LOVE IT!

title: Great Food Companion!
body: Being able to track my daily carb intake in Carb Manager has helped me drop 13 lbs in my first week of keto!  Being a carb counting keto newbie this app has helped me tremendously stay on track. I just wish all the cool extras weren’t at cost.

title: Love It
body: I tried several apps and this is my favorite by far! Easy to use, free, and comprehensive. Has helped me keep my diet on track by being easy to use.

title: My review
body: I just started the KETO diet a week ago and do not know what I would do without this app.  Extremely pleased... thanks for all your hard work getting this together for us. Lori Meyer (Minneapolis)

title: Carb Manager is a must use app
body: I just wish I knew a way to retain scanned items. Once I use them I can’t find them again.  Once I got used to it I’m loving it.  Measurements sometimes need adjustments.  Good app!  Highly recommend it.

title: Good on the basics ; many bugs when trying to do custom items
body: When you’re doing the basic functions the app offers for tracking known simple foods it is good. When you try to add your own custom foods or recipes, it is a high friction, non intuitive, exasperating experience as the bugs get in the way.

title: Easy logs
body: I love how easy it is to monitor your meals daily and the weight examples that are given for the inexperienced people. Give this app a chance and let it work for you ladies and gentlemen.

title: Exceptional so far
body: I just went keto this week, buy so far Carb Count has exceeded all expectations by a country mile!  Give it a try.  You won’t be disappointed.

title: Great, but...
body: I think the free app is fantastic, however, it does say in the description that access for recipes is included.  Anytime I click on a picture, all I get is an advertisement for premium.  Kind of confusing...

title: Awesome assistant for my Keto journey
body: I found this app and started my Keto lifestyle and it has been such a huge help. There is so many different opinions and thoughts for Keto I didn’t know what to do... but this app has been a great guide.

title: Reset Keto
body: It is a very powerful tracker. Completely changed my approach to Keto. Don’t waste a day without knowing how you are doing. Enormous data set, easy to add items. Highly recommended.

title: Intuitive
body: This app is free, convenient, intuitive to my needs, and makes tracking carbs painless. I don’t need all that science jazz, I just want to keep track. And BOOM! This app does just that.

title: Really nice app
body: It tracks net carbs and other macros easily. Can build recipes easier than other apps. Great database. I love the notes/journal section. It’s great. Used it daily since I discovered it.

title: Two weeks on Keto - all due to this app
body: I’m a working mom who doesn’t have time to think too much about dieting.  This app makes starting, understanding and staying on Keto or a Low Carb diet doable!

title: Wonderful app
body: This app has helped me so much not only to track the carbs in my meals but also to plan ahead for upcoming days. Really helpful for anyone new to keto or any other low carb diet.

title: Update wiped out my entire log for months
body: Love this app. Works great. But newest update wiped out my info including my account.  Will not update again. Still I highly recommend this app for tracking
response: It sounds like you got logged out of your account. If you are still missing your data, please log out (Settings > Log Out) and then in the log in or sign up screen, look for a link toward the bottom of the page labeled "Get back in here". This will restore your data. If you need additional assistance, please email us at support@wombatapps.com.

title: Good app but...
body: This apps layout is nice, very user friendly. I set up my account very quickly then I started tracking. The scanner is terrible, half the time it won't scan the other half it's incorrect. The first foods I scanned I'm very familiar with and the came up wrong on this app. Not worth it if the nutrition facts are wrong! Very disappointing.
response: Hi Carlie - we're sorry for the issue. Could you email us at support@wombatapps.com with the name of the product, and we'll look into fixing it? Thanks!

title: Great app! ...when it works:/
body: Love this app, super accurate and thorough! Major bummer when app doesn’t open and is unable to be used :( I thought it was bcz I was using free version, but I purchased the app and it’s still glitchy. Boo!!!

title: Keto
