body: I use this app for my Keto WOL and I love it!! I scan in everything that I can and if I eat it often I add it to my favorites. With one glance I can tell what I am close to going over on and what I am lacking. Great app!!!
response: Hi Keto Grandma, thanks for the love! Glad you are liking the scan and tracking features. Please check out the latest version let us know what you think! Best wishes on your low carb journey.

title: Awesome
body: This app is so easy to follow, it organizes everything for you, and seems to have every food I scan to make things even more easy.

title: Easy to use.
body: I do wish the free version, came with the ability to connect with Apple Watch, but works fine

title: Love ❤️ this App
body: Still learning about this app still finding a lot of things I didn’t know were in there but so far loving it thank you

title: Easy to track
body: Doing the no grain thing/ low carb. This is way easier to track carbs using vs. MyFitnessPal. Just started a month ago. Feeling amazing with stable blood sugar and losing lbs!!!

title: Best App out there for those on Keto
body: I love this app!  Easy to use and navigate.  A great tool to use in keeping you on track with  your macros.  My daughter is now using it too!

title: Device Support Limited
body: Device support is limited.  Adding workout from bike and treadmill are not an option.

title: Search option
body: I’m liking this app for the most part BUT, when I try to search for a recipe (and I’ve tried many different things) it tells me, “whoops! Looks like there’s no results here.” So I’m limited to the recipes it shows me already.
response: Hi there, thanks for leaving us a review! The issue you are experiencing has been fixed. If you still are having difficulties with it, please reach out to us from directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com.

title: Helpful for weight loss and diabetes
body: Hi

title: Good tool
body: I essentially use low carb eating as a tool to control calories and expedite weight loss.  I have lost a ton of weight using this apps. I highly recommend it!

title: Help!
body: I updated the app and lost over half of all of “my foods” entries. Fortunately I still have them on my non-updated iPad version, but I really need them on my phone. Is there a way to transfer data? Why didn’t the update carry over all of my entries?!?! 😭
response: Hi there - please reach out to support in-app via Settings → Help & Support if you can't find your saved and custom foods under the green + button → fork + spoon icon → My Foods, and we can help troubleshoot this for you.

title: Don’t like the update
body: Why do app developers always feel the need to change a good thing. This app was great before the upgrade. I hope the developers listen to the users when making additional changes.

title: Horrible new design!!
body: I just came to say that this new design is absolutely horrible and confusing. This app initially helped me lose weight as I tracked my daily macros but now I don't even want to use it anymore. Can you please give us the option to use the old one I hate this new update I just want to delete this app now and not recommend it to anyone.
response: Hi, and thanks for sharing your experience. We're sorry to hear you've run into some loading issues on your device, and we definitely want to help. Please message us in-app or email us at support@carbmanager.com so we can check it out and help sort out the problem. Thanks!

title: What did u do to the app?
body: With the update-Suddenly when i l load my daily food intake ...it all shows up the next day so I can’t load anything for the day unless I delete everything from the previous day.   Rendering the weekly tracking useless.  Please go back to the original format.

title: Need better search option for restaurants
body: Why isn’t there a specific search within the app for restaurants? You have “Brands”, do the same for Restaurants.

title: Great until Feb 2021
body: Wish I could revert to the old version. New update looks flashier, but is much less functional and harder to use. It’s hard to even select which meal its for when adding a food because you end up scrolling the portion sizes/type instead. Why do apps destroy themselves like this?

title: Support is no help
body: Before their big update, I never had many issues. But now, my “most recent” foods aren’t up to date. My recipes that I inputted are gone. I contacted support and they told me to update the app. I’ve cancelled my premium and went to a different app.

title: Don’t like updates
body: I don’t like the new look for the Home Screen that shows macros.  I prefer the previous version.  I also can’t seem to store my history the same way and that is frustrating.  The previous version was more user friendly and appealing to the eye.
response: Hi JuneAurocks - Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts! Sorry to hear that you don't like the new look. Many of our users grew very accustomed to the previous version, and we understand that change can be difficult. The issue that you mentioned regarding storing your history isn't normal for the new app version. Please reach out to our friendly support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support, and they'll be happy to assist :-)

title: Week one down!
body: Thanks everyone this is a great app better today than last year!  One week down and happy to be onboard

title: Keto Diet
body: This app is wonderful for tracking macros and keeping me on track!!!  My only complaint is the inability to print recipes so I don’t have to carry my iPad every time I make a meal😥

title: Review
body: Really like the app keeping track of carbs, fat, protein couldn’t do it on my own this accurate. Wish it had a food scanner too. 😊

title: Getting Started
body: The AP is great. I look forward to tracking my process and it is easy to use. Charting helps keep me on track.

title: Simple & Accurate
body: What an incredible app! It’s simple and easy to use and actually holds you accountable for everything you eat and drink, it’s very helpful.

title: Make determining carbs easy
body: This app was recommended to me for tracking carbohydrates, proteins, and fat. If I didn’t have it I don’t think I may not have reached my daily goals.

title: Making the keto diet SO easy
body: I am loving this app during my ketogenic weightloss journey.   It’s easy to use and helps to keep my daily good items and macros in check to maximize my keto experience.

title: Food
body: Please update your site Panera has menu Keto now...you need to add it so I don’t have to look it up on search engine and create a custom page!

title: Absolutely necessary
body: I was stuck at a plateau and I tried CM and now I never go over my macros which was why i wasn't losing. It keeps you in check like a personal Keto Coach

title: Putting in information
body: I love the charts showing my progress, but I struggle using the appt.  I think it will just take practice.  I have sent a question in. I canceled it, but can use through Sept.  I would like to renew if I can get the hang of it.  I LOVE eating KETO.

title: Making Keto Easy
body: I like this app, I have the paid version and the great recipes and features you get makes it a good purchase for me. I am new to Keto, and I love how easy it converts my foods into macro.

title: Great App for low carb/Keto lifestyle!!
body: I’ve finally found an app that Fits my low carb tracking needs! I would rate it at 5 stars if there were a more interactive/real-time way to track/monitor fasting periods. Other than that, it’s great!

title: Great App
body: I am new to the Keto lifestyle and this app provides tons of useful information and a tracker that really helps me make better choices and monitor my intake and my progress.

title: Not what I want
body: This app seemes fine for what it does, but I only want to track carb intake and I do not want to enter individual foods. (I know how much carb is in what I eat.) NOBODY makes a truly simple app to log intake, and I am sick and tired of downloading and trying apps.
response: Hello from Carb Manager and thank you for your review. We'll be happy to give your account a full review and offer some workflows to help you accomplish your needs! Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username "Canalligators" and we'll be happy to provide some personal assistance. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

title: Loved it until...,
body: This app was a lifesaver during my first few months of Keto. I recently upgraded my phone to an XR though and now it’s slow to open and respond. Now it won’t open at all. Help!

title: It’s very comprehensive
body: This app is amazing.  I love the barcode scanner part, as it saves a lot of entry time when searching for a food.  Overall a definite and well-earned 5 stars.

title: Super helpful!
body: I have never been able to commit to an app but this one is very user friendly. I love all the tools, everything that I need is on this 1 app.

title: Low rating no customer support
body: I purchased Carb Manager Premium my subscription renews in June. In March I received notification to renew early at a reduced rate. I renewed in March then in June I was charged the full renewal fee.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. Our normal response time for support tickets is approximately under 24 hours, so I apologize for any delay. In the case of a subscription purchase via Apple, we require our users to cancel/request refunds via iTunes. If the App store is not able to process your request promptly, please email support@carbmanager.com, and we'll be happy to work with you to help sort out your issue! Thank you for reaching out!

title: Easy app
body: Scan almost everything by the barcode and it goes right in !

title: Love it. Just wish one thing was different.
body: I love this app. The only thing I wish was that the foods all had listed ingredients. Some do however I’ve found a lot do not or they are missing the serving size.

title: Easiest way to track my numbers
body: I was new to the Keto Diet when I downloaded this app. It made me realize I needed more protein in my diet. It’s easy to balance my food and stay in the Keto Diet with this app.

title: Amazing
body: I’ve tried numerous other keto apps and this one is by far the best. It’s so easy to use and you can track everything in this one app. The recipes are awesome.

title: Cool app!
body: Best app!!! Love it! The only reason for 4 stars cause I miss one thing! If you do keto or any other diet with your friend or partner you should be able to get on his page and copy meal you just shared. You can only add items at the moment.

title: Love Carb Manager
body: It is very easy to use. Makes it a breeze to keep track of carbs waters, activities. Would not be able to do it as easy without it.  Great app.  Thank you Carb Manager ! ! !

title: Great App
body: This app has everything I need to stay on track.  I’ve been working hard with my lifestyle change and this helps me.

title: Lenguages
body: In the description of the application it says that it is available in several languages. How can I change the language?

user_name: The best thing to me ok
title: AMAZING
body: Love that I am able to track everything I eat and drink in the day. I also love that I am able to create my own custom meal/drink. Definitely recommend this app.

title: The BEST!
body: This is THE BEST app for counting carbs!!!! You actually get to USE the app with out having to subscribe to pay money to use it!!!  So many recipes!!  My husband and I ❤️❤️❤️ it!  I’m a visual person and the charts make it so easy!

title: Exercise options
body: I ride a recumbent stationary bike for exercise (Life Fitness).  I am using the the only bike option available but the calories burned are lower than what the app records. It would be nice to have this option added.

title: What about sugar tracking
body: I just started to use the app as a Ketosis tracking and so far I like it. Why aren’t you track sugar intake or it’s not a function of this app?

title: Disappointed
body: I like the app a lot but find it annoying that you can only access the free version 9 times a day before it locks you out. Too many other apps out there that allow you to use their content for free.

title: My body likes Keto, this app helps me manage the program!!
body: This app helps me stay honest with myself daily on what I have consumed, how my ratios of fats, carbs, proteins are stacking up for the day. Just a beginner on Keto plan, but this tool has already been a huge help!!

title: My Fitness Pal who?
body: This app blows MFP out of the water, especially if you’re on a low carb diet. The only improvement I would make is to have more restaurant foods. But overall, love this app!!!

title: So easy to use!
body: Scanning bar codes is an awesome feature! I like that you can set goals just for yourself and your own specific needs 🤗

title: Love this app
body: I have tried multiple apps and been frustrated with functionality, accuracy and or ease of use. This is the best app I have found.

title: Family Share
body: I like the app a lot, but how do you family share a premium membership? Five stars if I can figure that out. I'm sure it is just me.

title: Love this app
body: Thought going on a low carb diet was going to be a nightmare. Doing on my on was until I found this app. This make preparing and keeping track easy.

title: Love this!
body: Just getting started but this app has already shown me that I was overeating on my keto.  Hoping for some different results when I weigh next week.

title: Link to fitness apps
body: I may be just missing it but any way to link to fitness apps? Ex I can only put run time but not run distance so a link/sync with something like MapmyRun?

title: best app for keto dieters
body: This app is by far the best i’ve ever tried. It’s not saturated with ads and it doesn’t ask for money every time you want to use it.

title: Incorrect Calculations
body: The most important part to me is adding my own recipes. Every one I have added so far, with the correct servings has given me the wrong calculations for 1 servings. For example, I added a waffle recipe where it should have been around 300 calories per waffle and it says it's over 5,000. Calculations for a lot of food items in the database have also been wrong.

title: Love this app!
body: I love that you can customize your diet needs. It’s simple to use and I’ve yet to find a food that doesn’t have information.

title: Easy to use, convenient
body: Appreciate the variety of foods available to choose from. Easy to use and log foods eaten. Very useful!

title: I paid for one app then it became something else
body: I used to be able to enter and track my macros and track my weight and I can’t figure out how to do any of this on the “ new and improved app”. I no longer track anything because it is frustrating and infuriating and hopeless to try. I hate the new version and want what I paid for.
response: Hi! We hear the frustration of getting used to a new app, and know this is a big adjustment. Some changes are expected, others may be a glitch that our developers can fix. Please reach out to our friendly Support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Be sure to reference your app store user name, and they’ll get you sorted out asap.

title: Helps me stay on track! 23lbs GONE!
body: I try to use Carb Manager every day to keep my numbers constant.  When I don’t I stop having progress!

title: You Screwed It Up
body: You took a fabulous app that I have been using for years, and totally screwed it up with your “all new app”.  It won’t open half the time and when it is open it is unreliable. I can’t find all of my custom recipes.  When it is working, it’s certainly not an “improvement”.  I am a premium member and I’m thinking I want my money back.

title: Awesome food tracking app
body: This app is amazing. Super easy to use and a large pre-loaded database of food. Tasty recipes that are easy to cook and with the grocery list, shopping is a breeze.

title: Happy with App
body: When I started Keto, I had a hard time counting carbs try to see what was good or not. I started using this App and it help me tremendously. Thank you for creating this App. Love it.

title: Great app
body: Can truly keep you within your lines of your diet if you log everything...recipes are also handy.

title: EASY!
body: Great way to start a keto lifestyle. Easy to log food. I sometimes just use the ‘add food’ option to see how different foods will affect my goals that I set in this app. It’s a life saver!

title: My Carb Manager
body: Crazy about my carb manager.  Easy to keep up with the carbs I’m eating each day.  Very convenient and easy to use.  Thank you Katie (my daughter-in-law) for showing me the carb manager.

title: This app is the best I’ve used so far!
body: great app!!  You can almost track any metric you want and have a greater understanding of the nutrients you are consuming!

title: Great Accountability tool
body: My wife and I started the low carb lifestyle and it has been great. This tool has made it easier to track calories and we love it

title: Keto Newbie
body: Although it’s a little tough to figure out all my food count. This still is very helpful to get better at seeing what I eat a day and learn my macros.

title: Convenient
body: I love the fact that I can plug in my own recipe and serving and the app calculates the macros for me. I also love that I can copy and paste a recipe link and it automatically plugs the info and macros in for me.

title: Recipes
body: This is great but I really really want to get recipes for me that help with diabetes for FREE you probably won’t read this but if you do I would love you to consider . That would be great. - whit

title: Love this App! Simplified keto for me
body: Use this every day to track my macros, meals, ketone readings and weight. Also allows me to calculate calories burned from workouts! Love the recipe section too! So many great ideas

title: Great but...
body: The app is great but whenever I try to scan a barcode it says my device isn’t compatible. I ave the iPhone pro max running the up to date iOS 13 os.  Any suggestion or help would be appreciated.

title: It’s ok
body: I regret upgrading to premium, the recipes are something I could find anywhere, the features aren’t worth it, import recipe doesn’t always work, and I almost always have to enter the nutrition facts myself as what I am looking for is never in their database or if it is it’s wrong. Not happy and can’t get a refund
response: Hi and thanks for sharing your experience. Our Premium version is there for users who want access to advanced features and/or in-depth details of their journey. We'd love to take a closer look at some of the issues you're experiencing to optimize your membership. Please message us in-app so we can connect. Thanks!

title: Support stinks
body: My daughter (premium paid annual ) can not get support to understand that her Fitbit syncs but even though settings say to deduct macros and if we click view we can see synced steps nothing is deducted.   Very irritating dealing with their lack of support
response: Hi there, and thanks for sharing your experience. Our Deduct Macros setting deducts from Calorie imports rather than steps, so we'd recommend checking your Fitbit permissions to verify it's importing Calories Burned. We love our Support Team, and if you don't mind giving us another chance, we can do some trouble shooting. Just message us in-app to learn more. Thanks!

title: Comprehensive
body: So far fairly easy to figure out. Haven’t really tried yet and still manage to log my food.

title: I've tried 3 times
body: This app is very time consuming. I just tried, for the third time, to use it. I try to copy the url of the recipes I use and it is never able to find it. I'm not sure who has time to enter in every recipe by hand. It's very frustrating. I bought it over a year ago and just try again every now and then and just get frustrated.
response: We're sorry to hear you're having a problem with the app. When importing recipes, the quality of the results are based on the quality, completeness and formatting of the source recipe. We'll be more than happy to help you manage your recipes in-depth and answer other questions you have. Please contact us directly via "Settings - Need Help" and reference your username so we can assist ASAP!

title: Really helps me dial in my macros
body: Before I started using the app everything was a guesstimate.  It’s interesting to see what the day looks like and to review what I ate.  Seeing the macros is the best thing for me.

title: Excellent!
body: This is the easiest app I have ever used to track my macros. I can always find what I’m looking for and it’s very user friendly! I recommend

title: Phenomenal App
body: Fun to use and highly informative.  Engages the user the more the user learns how to optimally integrate on a daily basis.  Brings order to what otherwise can be chaotic.  Well worth the cost!

title: New to Keto
body: I am new to keto and wanted a way to track what I put in my body and this app is amazing. My only suggestion would be to broaden their exercise list because Zumba is amazing!

title: Easier than myfitnesspal for keto
body: This app is way easier than myfitnesspal to log food to stay track for the keto diet. I hate not knowing net carbs and with this I don’t need to.

title: Great app for most meal, weight tracking
body: The only thing I don’t like is that they took out: automatically subtracting (-) net carbs out of exercise when you are done tracking for the day on the free version.

title: So excited it’s working
body: I open my carb manager and I love seeing the pie chart of how I’m doing for the day. It helps me stay on track. It’s easy to use and it’s working for me!!

title: Typing foods
body: Love this app. Only complaint is that, when typing in food types, you cannot insert letters and carry on. So, too often I end up having to retype the entire food entry. Bearable but annoying.

title: Made Getting Healthy Infinitely Easier!!!!
body: Tracking my food is not my most pleasant task but this app has made it easier to keep track.

title: BRILLIANT APP!!!
body: The database is so broad, that it requires very little work for the end user.  Makes it so easy and fast to track your food intake, and gives you extremely precise calculations.  Love it!!!

title: CM👍🏻
body: Easy to use app! I’m using the free version and love the easy to use features, like scan and daily log. The graphics are nice. Would be neat if you could use CM with friends!

title: Great option!
body: I’ve liked this app more than all the other carb tracking apps I’ve tried! It’s very customizable which is great!

title: Tried many ~ Love this app!
body: I’ve used WeightWatchers, MyFitnessPal, and RealPlans but the Carb Manager is the best app by far the best app for me.

title: Update wipes info
body: This app was fantastic. Then the recent update wiped all my account info. All my diligence in tracking macros, measurements, etc is gone. And I need to set up a new account now? Why? It would’ve helped to get a warning with the update notes that I need to do this.
response: We are so sorry for the interruption! If you are still missing your data, please log out (Settings > Log Out) and then in the log in or sign up screen, look for a link toward the bottom of the page labeled "Get back in here". This will restore your data. If you need additional assistance, please email us at support@wombatapps.com.

title: Great App!
body: Super user friendly. Great way to keep a count on cards. Using it for Keto. Makes it super easy to track all my macros. The scanning tool is super handy. Highly recommend it!

title: Best food tracker
body: Easy to use. Great food ideas. Fantastic tracking and other information communication to other platforms.

title: Awesome!
body: Quick and easy way to track what I eat and I am not usually very diligent, but I enjoy tracking with this! It made me realize that I was eating too much!

title: Great app
body: Helps keep you on track.  After a week or so most your foods are saved in your list making it easy to add what you ate.

title: I want him free for the whole year
body: After 10 days he asked me for money so I did not continue with him and put 3 stars he deserves 5 and thank you

title: Bait and switch
body: Started using app and it seemed to work ok except some nutritional information would come up wrong (even when using the scanner). But, now today it has come up with a 9 log per day limit unless you pay them $10. You've lost me. I'll find another app that doesn't use such idiotic tactics. Cannot recommend to anyone.

title: Too glitchy to use
body: I purchased premium right away to assist me with my Keto diet and tracking my macros. This app wouldn’t save my calorie goal with determined my allotted net carbs. It kept defaulting to a higher number which messed up my daily tracking. Totally bummed I wasted my money. The app had potential. I need something relatable for my dietician and for me.
response: Hi there, thanks for contacting us and for the feedback. We've fixed that bug and all should work properly now. Please try again.

title: Love the free version!
body: Can do quite a bit free for a while but I understand it’s going to make me upgrade (pay) or allow me to only input 12 items. So I’ll prob stop using it when that happens.

title: Love the Carb Manager App
body: Love love love the Carb Manager App - so easy to keep track of what I’m eating and now I’m seeing great results every time I step on the scale. Not just calories- carbs, protein, fat, fiber; it’s all listed and logged for me.

title: The Best
body: This has been the greatest help being on ketosis! You can watch all your carbs, calories and macros! Thank you CM you are making this new life style so much easier!

title: Great App for Keto
body: This is a great macro tracking app! I do wish it tracked magnesium, potassium, and sodium as a whole like MFP. That would be great for the Keto users. Also I wish the food entered was audited and more consistent. Sometimes it’s way off due to inaccurate data by users.

title: Love this app
body: Easy to use. Lots of features including a scan. Also tells calories and other dietary issues. It’s fabulous

title: This app is awesome
body: It takes all the guesswork out when trying to follow my macros and truly is changing my life for healthier better eating and the food scanner is spot on!

title: Carb monitor
body: If I’d just use it it keeps me on track. I’ve had a lot of distractions this year and am ready to get 40 pounds off!  I can do this..

title: Accountability is key
body: I was a skeptic but logging in what I put in my mouth is a game changer… I love making smart choices where as before I made mindless choices

title: BUDDIE THIS APP IS FIRE 🔥
body: This app has been so great for me. I have diabetes so it’s very very helpful I think they could add some more foods so when I scan the barcode it pulls it up. Other than that the app is GREAT, Or shall I say FIRE 🔥
response: Hi there and thanks for leaving us such a great review! We are so happy to be on your weight loss journey with you! Should you have any questions or issues along the way, please reach out to us from within the app- we are happy to assist! :-)

title: Don’t remind for a meal that has food on it
body: Please offer more customizable meal reminders, such as never reminding for breakfast (eg intermittent fasting), and not reminding when a meal already has been entered.

title: Missing the scan
body: I like this up. I gave four stars because it does not allow me to scan products, that would make it perfect.

title: Carb manager keeps me on track - I need it every meal every day
body: I just love carb manager. It takes the guesswork out of planning & especially dining out . It’s helps keep me on task.

title: Easy and adaptable
body: I can enter my own recipes and easily access information I need to log regularly

title: Don’t fix what isn broken
body: I loved the old version of the app. It was simple, easy to use, and most of all, I like how you didn’t need to scroll to see all your meals. Now, the app feels so cluttered. Please bring back the old version, or give users an option to revert back to the old format.

title: Love this app for keto
body: Carb manager is a great app to keep track of your daily food. Easy to use and has many homemade recipes that can be added to your day.

title: Very helpful for a beginner!
body: Just starting out on the Keto diet, and this app has been so helpful for tracking Macros! I hit Ketosis just a few days after starting the diet!

title: Easy path to reality
body: This app is helping me finally face the reality of what I’ve been putting in my body for so long. On my way to freedom through been truthful!

title: Carb manager
body: Easy to use and I like that it tracks everything for me! And the scan option is great and so easy!

title: The best!
body: Carb manager keeps track of everything, but most importantly net carbs. It syncs with my fitbit so deducts my exercise. I can effortlessly and accurately stay on track. And the recipes are easy and great!! I love this app

title: Love Carb Manager
body: I’ve used several different food recording apps and this one fits best for me! I am following the Keto plan & CM does all the work for me and is the most user friendly app ever!

title: App reset itself to default
body: I’ve been using the app faithfully since December 1. 8 months of custom recipes, frequent foods, all my weight loss history is now gone. I’m still logged in. What’s the point in paying for something if it just doesn’t work one day? When it worked it was great.
response: Hi, and thanks for sharing your experience. This definitely sounds like an issue with an anonymous or duplicate account. Just message us in-app at Settings - "Need help?" or email us at support@carbmanager.com so we can restore your original data. Thanks

title: Better than the best version of the weight watchers app
body: I love this app. I have the paid for version and feel it’s worth the annual subscription price.

title: Helps me out a lot
body: This app helps me out on knowing what’s good on keto well for the most part atleast because some items don’t come up or the net carbs are wrong. I try to work around it and If I eat something that’s not in here I’ll just put the closest thing to it.
response: Hi there! We're glad to hear you're finding our app useful on your Keto journey. We allow user contribution for the many new branded/processed foods your local community/stores have that we may not know of yet, but if you're finding errors, we can share how to Report a Food Error and make Quick Edits in the meantime. Just message us in-app so we can connect. Thanks!

title: Love this app
body: I have tried a lot of different app to track everything and this one is the best!!! So stop reading this and download it!

title: App slows down
body: I love the app but a lot of times it will not load. I have to shut my phone off and leave it off for a while and even then sometimes it won’t load.

title: Great app
body: This app is very easy to track your food. I love that it gives you the limits of carbs to eat in a day. I also love that you can add your workout to the app.

title: I’m finally losing weight.
body: Carb manager is amazing, it gave me directions, it’s so easy and also has low carb recipes.  I can see me making my goal. Thanks

title: Great app, just one thing missing!
body: Since I’m carb cycling a couple days a week on the Keto diet, the app needs to allow macros to be different percentages on chosen days of the week. If the app could be tailored a bit, that would help!

title: Love this app
body: This app is amazing. Is has EVERY food! Anything I can buy at HEB and even the paleo beef sticks and cocoa powder I ordered online. It even had a recipe I found online!  If you are doing keto, you need this app!

title: Helpful and easy
body: Since starting carb manger, it have been so easy to stay in track!!! It’s not stressful to use and reminds me when I need it. I love it.

title: Good app for tracking carbs
body: Hard to use sometime.  Like, I can’t even see what I’m typing right now and I don’t know why. This is ridiculous.

title: A Good Way To Start Keto
body: Only a portion of the app is free, but I use this portion to my advantage! I can still track how many carbs I eat everyday and how much weight I’ve lost on the free section!

title: SO helpful!
body: This is an amazing app for anyone watching their macros closely, aka carb intake or fat intake. It helps me to keep a precise daily record of my food consumption so that I never go over my total for the day. LOVE it

title: Great app
body: Without this app I would not know where to start. This app has helped me keep up with everything even calories.

title: Very Helpful
body: Was surprised how easy it is to track my macros with this app. Have made changes in how I eat and am back to losing weight. Thank you.

title: Amazing!!
body: By far the most amazing App when it comes to eating properly. It breaks the macros down into your needs and can even suggest  meals for filling in your remaining macros for the day.

title: Great Tracker
body: I started the Keto diet with no idea how to eat. Downloaded this app and it taught me what I could eat and helped me stay on track. Would highly recommend because I love it!

title: Great app
body: This app is so easy to use. I love how it already calculates for you after you add your food. I’m 100% confident the I’m starting my new life change. Thanks to this app.

title: Super easy to use and very robust!
body: Wasn’t complicated at all to learn and I love all the features. Also very cool that you can add your own custom foods. Was just what I was looking for!

title: Easy to use + super accurate
body: I have been using this since starting Keto and it has been instrumental!!! It has a ton of food preloaded and easy to add new foods.

title: Problems!!
body: I have been using this app for a long time and loved it. This week it seems to have started having issues and it is no longer usable. Not sure if it is related to the latest update? I uninstalled and reinstalled with out positive results 😞
response: Hi there - so sorry for the problem! Please email us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll get this fixed for you.

title: Easy
body: This app is very easy to use. I love the scanning part of the app. It makes it easy to log info. I can even save nutrition for recipes I use regularly.

title: Like the app but it crashes a LOT
body: Having trouble with it crashing every time I try and add a food. Love the layout and function though. Hopefully next update will fix it.

title: Great way to track net cards
body: I have another app i paid for and Carb Manager fits my needs much better. Does very good job of overviewing my day so i know where I’m at. Thanks.

title: Love it!
body: Simple and easy to use, really helps me stay on track and attain my goals. Great idea! I love the scanner option so I can just scan the barcode.

title: Carb
body: So far I really enjoy using the app! It’s very easy especially when you can just scan what you’re eating! Easy to track your net carbs

title: Thank you
body: This application has helped me track my macros like never before and made my life much easier. Thank you!

title: Worth paying for the premium plan.
body: I’ve been using the free version for months.  Finally paid for premium.  The best for meal planning.  It even has a Keto meal plan for families and vegetarians.

title: Inaccurate Measurements from others
body: I wish this app had more verified measurements especially when you may go off of someone else’s incorrect measurements, seems like MyFitnessPal has more verified

title: Definitely a must!
body: I love this app. It’s so easy to track my calorie intake and I am able to scan barcodes! The nutrition facts upload automatically. 5 stars!

title: Very good app
body: Easy to use, intuitive and has great features...really like this one. One improvement I’d like to see is to allow my history to come up as I type foods so it’s easy to input repeat foods I eat.

title: The app is great when it actually works
body: I have this app for 2 weeks now and the first week it worked great but now for the past week it doesn’t even start up so I’m not able to track anything. So I’m going to have to delete it and download something else. Disappointed.

title: Food
body: For person Who is not overly fond of meats I know it’s the best for my diabetes I think the program is very good. But I do love my carbs so I just don’t know what I will do but I will keep this program to track my food absolutely love it for that

title: The best!
body: So user friendly. It definitely keep me on track! It been amazing the progress I have made while using this app.

title: So easy to use!
body: I have never used a tracking app as easy-to-use as CarbManager. I can see my day and plan my meals. It takes away guesswork. A doctor recommended it. Best recco ever.

title: So far it this app is AWESOME
body: Easy to use.  Let’s you know if a food has an “A” or “F” Keto Grade.  Has Great information about the Keto Diet.  I have been able to go into ketosis and stay there so far using this app.

title: Great progress for a great app
body: This app is clear, concise, and does map out everything with your customized program(premium)! The only drawback I have found is that I cannot see my percentage macros when keying in my planner meals.

title: Keep me on track
body: Was having problem calculating my meals till I finally got this App which really helps know exactly how I stand with my carb, fat, and calories.  I love it

title: Woodwardite
body: Have used other app for a few years & have enjoyed the change when I started watching my carb intake.

title: Easy to use
body: Once you know your % ‘s of fats protein and carbs if you put the food in accurately the ap calculates your daily intake in an easy read circular graph. Very simple to use.

title: Great App with one flaw
body: I love this app for tracking what I eat and watching my weight go down! The only thing I don't Like  is that the other features of the app are premium and expensive. I love the free part though!

title: Good app butttt!
body: This is a great app for counting carbs but lately it has been freezing up and timing out when searching for items. If the development issues can be worked out it’ll be best one out!

title: Great for tracking, but too complicated for Keto newbies
body: I love that you are able to track tons of information for weight loss and Keto tracking. However, I feel that this app is too complicated for keto beginners. I spent too much time tracking information and less time learning and adapting. I will most likely cancel my subscription and go for a less complicated app

title: Loving the app!

response: HI Tkdjr1186 - The ability to create custom recipes has always been a Premium feature. That's very odd if you were able to do so on the free version prior to the update! If you're struggling with specific functionality, please reach out to our friendly support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support, and we'll be happy to assist. Cheers!

title: Update to 7.

title: Nutrional info is off
body: Nutritional info is waaaayyy off on this thing. Also it is not correct on macros. Trying to do keto with this thing is pointless. Everything is off on it. It’s not calculating macros correctly. Keeps calculating carbs but not net carbs. I paid the $30 for the full program thinking it would help and it’s trash. Waste of money. Get fitness pal it’s way more accurate.
response: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review. We would love the opportunity to assist you with any issues you are having with the app as well as address any discrepancies you may be experiencing. Please reach out to us in-app at Settings-“Need Help?” and our awesome customer service team can assist you!

Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "d noodles" and we'll be happy to assist. Looking forward to hearing from you!

response: Hi there - Thanks for reaching out. We pride ourselves on the accuracy of our app, and millions of people count on us for that accuracy as they navigate their Keto and low carb diet journey. I invite you to please reach out to our support team in the app under Settings → Help & Support, and be sure to include your app store user name. Thanks!

body: Someone please address the fact that between two drives, scanned food and typed good entries are completely different from phone to phone. This makes absolutely no sense. response: Hey there, thanks for your review! We're happy to report the accuracy of our food database. However, due to the ever evolving list of nutritional information, we're open and willing to accept edits always and help you suggest edits. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username so we can help you to offer edits to our food database. Thank you!

Looking forward to hearing from you!

response: Hi Vtanner1647384, thanks for the note! Due to the enormous size of our food database, we do require an internet connection (either WiFi or cellular) in order to use the app.  We are working on adding some basic offline support -- stay tuned!

response: Hi, and thanks for the review. You may need to grant camera permission to Carb Manager in your phone's settings. If you need help with this, please reach out to Customer Service at Settings - "Need Help?" and an agent can walk you through it.

title: CarbManager

response: Thanks for sharing your experience. Please reach out to customer service at Settings-“Need Help?“. We would be happy to troubleshoot this font issue.

title: Keto Juggler

title: Fantastic tool

title: Wish it sent notifications

response: Hey, and thanks for sharing your review! You do have the option of app notifications, but you need to select it as an option. Some users don't prefer notifications and reminders, so we let you choose. Just reach out to us in-app and we can help set you up with notifications. Thanks!

title: Must Manually Delete All Data You Store
body: This app is okay for tracking data - it is not something you can easily delete.  I went through the proper steps and contacted their support people but got no response.  So, in order to delete my account, I had to manually delete every single entry that I made using this app.  😡 Not a fan at all.
response: Thanks for sharing your experience. We try to make deleting your account simple. Just select Settings - Delete Account & Data. If you've run into trouble and already contacted us, we'll get back to you soon and we can just manually delete your account from our end, no problem. Thanks again!

body: I only been using this app for a week, but I looked at other many other apps. This one tops them all. Easy to use, loaded with great tools.

title: Bugs
body: Freezes often but otherwise good

title: Great help when 1st starting
body: I used the app when first starting Ketos. It was very helpful in calculating my net carbs and giving me success. Cons were the app didn’t have some recipes I made and didn’t allow me to add those net carbs independently. I will continue to use on my Keto journey

title: Love it
body: This app is just what I was looking for to help educate myself on nutritional information and track my carb intake. I love the many ways of entering food items and size of the database. Keep up the great work and thanks Carb Manager!

title: Great app
body: The only thing that I miss that fitness pal app has is the ability to enter ingredients manually for your own recipes. Other than that its a great app.

title: Carb confused
body: I’m just actually understanding the carb manager more clearly after nearly a week. I do love how everything is counted out for you. The food list is endless and the recipes look amazing.

title: Actually Work’s
body: This app has helped me lose 11 pounds since I started using it! It easily helps me track my carb intake with no problem. Love it!

title: Love this!!!
body: I have always used my Fitbit app but this one is so great for keri and just tracking. Love everything about it!!!  I bought premium, totally worth it.

title: Perfect for Keto!
body: Obsessed with this app. It’s helped me keep track of my macros and I’ve lost so much weight thanks to this app that makes tracking my food so soooo easy!

title: Loving it all especially the food!
body: Every single dinner I have made from recipes on Carb Manager that are the best cooking I have ever done. Super easy and so satisfying. 4 young kids and husband approved.

title: Best one so far
body: The people here have done a great job of creating an app that has it all and for a great price. Waiting for my book to really get into the meat and potatoes of this diet.

title: Great app!
body: Amazing amount of information at your fingertips. Very well thought out and in an easy to use format. I’ve already lost 10lbs!!!!

title: Indispensable
body: This app is the reason why my diet is successful. I could never track my intake so well and easily see what I have left to consume for the day.

title: Love it
body: I really like this app! Easy to use, I didn't need much time to learn all that it has to offer. Highly recommend to any one counting carbs

title: Bugs?
body: I really like this app and use it daily. I paid for a premium membership because it’s a tool that makes it easy to track my food each day. I love the graph! I keep experiencing white screen lately, or it gets stuck.

title: Getting there
body: Really like the app but the food selection is very limited compared MyFitnessPal. Would like to see “quick “ buttons to add current weight etc.

title: Great! Even On Free Version!
body: Started the Ketogenic Diet and this app really holds me accountable! Very helpful and does what I want/need even on the free version! This is my first app review ever, and this app definitely deserves my recommendation!

title: Great carb tracker
body: I’ve never liked counting calories or tracking my food, but this app does a great job of visualizing the macros needed for the keto diet. Adding meals is easy and it’s kept me on track.

title: Not accurate
body: I was not able to truck my foot accurately I ate approximately 1600 calories but it did not reflect on my chart. It looked ok in food log but did not showed on the main ring chart.
response: Hi there and thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! It sounds like you may have the setting "Deduct Calories and/or Macros" toggled on. The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: HATE the update
body: The new update is horrible, plus they have added tracking features that were not there in the older version.  If I hadn’t come to the site to write this review, I would never have known.  I’m a premium user, but will be deleting this app from my phone, even though i am paid through May.  Terrible!
response: Thanks for your valuable feedback! I will certainly pass along your comments to our Development Team. Some of the issues you are experiencing can be answered by our awesome Support Team, so I encourage you to reach directly to them from within the app or support@carbmanager.com.

title: Love CM
body: Using CM has made my journey so much more manageable! The app is so user friendly which makes my carb tracking so easy! I highly recommend it!!

title: Best app out there
body: I have been on keto 2 1/2 years,  carb manager keeps me right on track. I don’t think I could do it without this app.

title: Love it
body: Love Carb manager however heard a lot of people dislike the upgrade and want old version back. I have old version and love it!!

title: Account sign in error
body: Keep getting “create account” messages several times a day although I already have created two accounts...you gotta fix it. If I knew this earlier, I wouldn’t have used it. Now the information is already put in, I cannot move to another app without losing the data.

title: Update is horrid
body: Not a fan of all the new changes. I’ve used carb manager for going on 3 years now and pay for premium but with all the new changes I’m leaning towards cancelling now. I hate the new app, it’s not as user friendly and I hate how everything has changed. If it doesn’t get more user friendly or go back I will not renew anymore.

title: New update is awful
body: I really hate the new update. It is not nearly as user friendly as it was before. Also, I pay for the premium but every time I try to use a feature of the premium subscription the app tells me I need to upgrade. It’s super frustrating.

title: Loved until the interface was updated.
body: I’ve loved this app from the moment I started keto 2 years ago. It’s been really to enter foods and my recipes through this journey. With the update, all of my recent foods are missing and the app looks cluttered, really hard on the eyes. I’m going to start looking for a different app that has a cleaner look.

title: It’s great
body: I like the groups you can join, there is one for everyone! Logging food is super easy. I like the motivational messages it sends.

title: Frustrating to use
body: I wanted to use this app to stay on top of my low carb diet but it takes forever to load food items, or doesn’t find them. There’s one food item that shows up as a premium recipe that’s the closest to the food item I made and it won’t let me add it to my food blog. I’m over this app. Deleting this waste of time
response: Hey Betty - Thanks for that feedback, and sorry to hear that the app wasn't a good fit. Most users who have issues with loading are on older versions of either the app or of iOS. Looks like you might be on 7.0.0 of the app rather than 7.0.23. I highly recommend that you update! If you continue to experience issues, please reach out to our friendly support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support. All the best in the meantime!

title: Decimal entry?
body: I’ve used this app for years. It’s the best one for net carb tracking. It used to allow you to input the servings in decimal or type a number vs using the wheel selector. I can’t seem to enable that anymore.
response: Hi Heather! Things are a wee bit different with the new interface. If you click on "Enter Your Own" beside "Servings" it will switch up, and you can enter any number (including a decimal) in the box between the "+/-" icons! Hope that helps, and thanks for being a long-term CM user! We appreciate you 🙏

title: Love this app
body: This app makes it easy to know exactly how to adjust a meal to keep within the macros. I would have never succeeded without it.

title: Life changing
body: A good Opportunity to report all you eat and being able to distinguish the carbs has been of great help

title: Let’s get motivated 🖤
body: Love this app. It is so easy to use and so helpful. 🖤 It motivates me more because it shows me exactly what I am eating and drinking during the day.

title: Love it
body: Love this app. Love the premium features. The companion website is a great feature. I’ve made some great meals from the premium recipes. This app helped me lose 20ibs and counting.

title: Keto diet
body: I have lost weight that has stayed with me for years. Don’t intend to find them againAs long as I record my carbs each day. I have lost 61 pounds so far

title: Easy tracker
body: I love Carb Manager! It is user friendly and has a lot of foods in the database already. It is also easy to add foods that may not be in the system.

title: Love It
body: This app is very convenient and it allows me to put my daily carbs in and to keep track of my carbs. And the app also has recipes and I love it.

title: It was working great
body: I loved this app and then it stoped working. My progress circle will not total. Sooo frustrating. And to try and contact them is a joke.

title: Weight loss
body: I have been seeing rapid weight loss and am able to plan my meals according. I love this app it has changed my life forever.

title: Love this app!
body: This app is so amazing! I love how I can scan any item and all the info magically appears! It makes logging in your food so fast and easy.

title: Love it
body: It makes it easy to make sure I don’t go over carbs or calories. Definitely helps with weight loss.

title: Fantastic
body: A great reminder of the day, when to stop intake or if you could have a bonus that day

title: Great App
body: Great app for tracking carbs. I do think it’s expensive compared to other trackers but the free version works as long as you’re eating basic foods.

title: Gréât way to track what u eat
body: I like this because it is easy to manage. It helps u realize how much you eat in a given day.

title: Compare to MyFitnessPal
body: I was a Big fan of MyFitnessPal but after understanding that it has correct calculation and detailed info  , My new star is you ❤️

title: Easy
body: This app is by far the easiest I have used. Makes logging food a snap. Chart is simple to understand.

title: Easy to use.. great tool
body: You can scan your food or type in food and look it up great way to cont calories and your macro

title: Language the app
body: Hello could you include several languages?  There are many interested and it is more versatile to include Spanish Portuguese Italian Arabic the normal option of an application thanks
response: Hola! La applicación Carb Manager actualmente sólo se encuentra disponible en el idioma Inglés pero es una prioridad nuestra añadir soporte para otros idiomas, que en el 2020 estamos empezando con las versiones en Español y Francés de Carb Manager.

title: The community forum
body: The interface for the community forum is awful. Relationships and community are a huge part of being successful! I wish that part were better, but the app itself is perfect for tracking macros and calories.
response: Hello from Carb Manager and thank you for your review. We absolutely hear you loud and clear and appreciate your suggestion. Community is vital to the Keto lifestyle and we're here to support that notion. I've shared with the product team your thoughts, and we do hope to bring improvements to this area of the app in the immediate future.

title: Careful...numbers sometimes incorrect
body: I do like the app but I was foolish to think all entrees were correct. I scanned a product and compared the app to the label and it was wrong so I was eating MORE carbs. Just double check. I report those with discrepancies. The app needs a good purge.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We do pride ourselves on the accuracy of our food databases, so we're absolutely interested in speaking with you regarding this issue. May we ask that you please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Lizsd619". Please also mention the food item that was not reading accurately in your app and we'll be happy to take a look. Thank you!

title: Great App!
body: Would be 5 stars, but not all of the foods you add have accurate I do, so be sure to double check. Other than that the functionality is awesome and it is super easy to use.

title: Gets the job done
body: I like this app and have used it for about a year. It can be buggy sometimes making it hard to log amounts of food. Customer service is good when you need them.

title: It’s been a good resource
body: I’ve really depended on this app as I try to lower my carbs but I’ve noticed that it needs some tweaking because I went to look up Cajun fries from 5 Guys and it says it’s 0 carbs. No potatoes are 0 carbs

title: Easy to use and great features
body: This app is fantastic! Easy to use with a huge database of foods and the ability to make recipes.

title: Love the simplicity of the recipes!
body: This app really delivers. It is intuitive and the recipes are delicious without being complicated. Highly recommended.

title: Carb manager works
body: I’ve been able to manage my carbohydrates with this app. Also my protein, and fat intake, the amount of water I drink and exercise. 👍

title: Some foods are wrong or inconsistent
body: Pretty easy to use. Some of the foods are inconsistent, such as clams or little neck clams. Or lamb chops, does each mean a chop (rib) or a serving? It is better to just say ounces or meat eaten. How many carbs for a food does not seem consistent. You have to double check the fat, carb and protein values.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We pride ourselves on the accuracy of our food database, so we're happy to give assistance with any questions you have on particular items. From here, we ask that you select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "VikingDA74" so that we can offer further assistance! Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

title: KetoWowZer
body: I’ve used this app from the beginning ! Very Easy to Use - it Covers more than imaginable. & it’s always available on my iPhone 📱 Whoever designed this is my Guardian K Angel 👍😁

title: One minor tweak and it would be perfect!
body: It’s super fast and easy, as long as what I’m eating as a barcode to scan. It would be amazing if there was a way to determine what the numbers would be on a meal at any restaurant and not just for the large chain restaurants.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We'll be happy to give you some pointers on how to use a few of the Carb Manager features to log meals in restaurant-based situations. We do ask that you please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "#Extra" and we'll be happy to help. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Happy camper.
body: Awesome app. Only thing I miss is a time stamp on foods consumed. Would help me to know when I last ate if I should spontaneously decide to fast. Otherwise this is an essential tool for tracking your data.

title: Managed Keto ratios
body: The pie chart made it easy quick reference my ratios. Putting in homemade meals was a little tedious but eating Keto I tend to eat the same things a lot, once you have entered foods the show up at the top of the list

title: Almost perfect
body: This is great for tracking carbs. Lots of customized options. I don’t like that you have to pay to sync your smart watch but that’s pretty much my only complaint

title: Could be better if...
body: Great app, just what so was looking for. The only change is that fats are shown in red and carbs are shown in green. I would switch this, as red usually means caution  or “no/stop” and green means “GO!” Otherwise it’s great

title: Notes disappear?!
body: App is fine, but the notes I take disappear and reappear, and today were deleted when I made my final at dinner.  Was using the notes section to track my glucose and insulin intake, waste of time now that the notes I took throughout the day have been deleted.

title: Love!
body: I absolutely love the ease and the massive amount of information that is held in this app. Thank you so much Making my journey to and through Keto so much easier!

title: Wrong data
body: I typed in my unnecessary height, how much I weigh etc. told me I need to consume 1067 calories. I knew that was wrong because my other app had me at about 1400 cal a day Then when I log onto their website on the computer it goes up 1600 cal. I have sent the messages on Facebook and tried to reach the tech-support and received no help whatsoever. I deleted the app

title: Keto carb manager type one diabetes
body: Best app ever. Super accurate when calculating “diabetes carbs”. I now only use this app to calculate carbs when determining insulin to take. BG levels lookin better than ever

title: Such a big help!
body: I love the carburetor! It really keeps me on track and offers a variety of options! Definitely a five star

title: Keto here I come
body: Just starting

title: Data cleared?
body: I used this app successfully and with great joy for a month.  Then, 2-3 days ago all of my history was wiped clear.  What happened?
response: It sounds like you got logged out of your account. If you are still missing your data, please log out (Settings > Log Out) and then in the log in or sign up screen, look for a link toward the bottom of the page labeled "Get back in here". This will restore your data. If you need additional assistance, please email us at support@wombatapps.com.

title: Go back to the previous version!
body: I loved everything about this app until the recent update. Now it is glitchy, takes forever to load when I try to open the app, and often times does not load or crashes.

title: Worry free
body: I absolutely adore this app. As someone who has battled an eating disorder and still has high anxiety about food, this app has saved me so much stress. I’m so happy that I found it.

title: Best carb calculator!
body: Seriously the best way to keep track of your carbs. The scanner is awesome!

title: Nurse
body: This program is helping me stay on track. Down 3 lbs after a week. Still enjoying many veggies.

title: Great Keto App
body: Makes it easy to track my carbs, protein, and fats.  I can also easily track my water intake and my weight for free.  I highly recommend it for low carbers!

title: Carb Manager keeps me Accountable.
body: Keto can be somewhat confusing. After I found carb manager it really helped me to stay accountable and on track. I’m very thankful for this app. It’s awesome.

title: Hate the new version
body: I loved this app until they changed it.  Now, try as I might, I can’t figure out how to find my favorite recipes, how to connect with others, how to get support.  And I don’t like how they give you limits for each meal instead of for the day.  I’m looking for a new keto app
response: Hi there, we’re sorry to hear you’re struggling with the update—we’re listening, and our Development Team is working diligently to fine-tune this new version of the app so you’ll love it as much as the old version. Please reach out to us in-app, and our awesome Support Team will be happy to guide you through the update and answer any questions you may have.

title: It’s ok
body: I would love if it would create meal plans to help me get started especially. It would make it easier for me to get started and learn how to keep me within my limit of carbs.
response: Hi there and thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! You can easily make custom or generated meal plans! Reach out to our super knowledgable Support Team to find out how! You can message them directly within the app or support@carbmanager.com.

title: Nutritional information
body: Ever since the new app look/change, nothing has been accurate on the nutritional information. I can see chicken thighs at KFC Keto friendly-which they are, but then on the app, it says NO! Duncan Hines has keto cake mugs out and the app says AVOID! It is only 5g net carbs. I use to love this app, but I’m totally hating now. You don’t know what information is accurate anymore.
response: Hi & thanks! We work hard on the accuracy of our Food DB. It's true some branded/processed foods have been input by users, so if there are inaccuracies, you can always Report a Food Error or make Quick Edits to them. Just reach out in-app, & we can help share how as well as how to identify our NCCDB verified foods to make it easier for logging!

title: Bad New format-Give back us back old format!
body: New update is SOOO cumbersome. Why do you think more graphics and bells and whistles are better.  I want an easy to use app that doesn't take so much work to log items. Please allow those of us that loved the old version to continue to use it or I won't renew my subscription!

title: I love it
body: Love how it tracks my daily Macros and how I can scan items they don’t have programmed into the app. Two weeks on keto and I’m officially 13lbs down 🙌🏽🎉🎉

title: Don’t purchase this app
body: Once you make the purchase there is no way to unsubscribe.  That particular option does not pop up.  And it will automatically renew if you don’t cancel.  Support?  Zero.  Push that button and go down another rabbit hole.  Will cancel payment through credit card but people need to be warned.
response: Hi there - as with all iOS App Store purchases, you'll need to cancel your auto-renew subscription via Apple, as they don't allow app creators access to managing subscriptions. Find more info here: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204939 Or reach out to support@carbmanager.com with the email attached to your account + apple ID and we can provide further assistance if needed.

title: Hate the ‘New’
body: Oh no way! There is no more FULL website version of the app. I hate the v7.0 web thing you’ve hit going. WHY would I want a ‘screen enlargement’ of the app ?!?! I go to the Web because I want to see and do more than what I can get on the app! I’ve paid for your Premium Version for a couple years and I’m OUT. I can’t tolerate your new app/brand.

title: New version, not so much.
body: The new version seems to be having some bugginess. Spinning circle and time outs. Also not easy to bring up my frequent food.

title: Terrible update
body: I’ve been using Carb Manager for years but no more.

title: Absolute junk now
body: They updated this app and somehow made it worse. Everything I used to track is now not keto friendly or 3x as many net carbs meanwhile if you do the math it’s not even close. What a total piece of garbage they rolled out. Been using this app for 3 years and now I’m left with nothing since it’s unusable. Stay away from this app!

Just getting into it, but really loving the app. Not new to keto, but this is the first time I have specifically actually tracked my carbs and fat intake. Looking forward to exploring the macro side to keto. Awesome app for the keto lifestyle!

title: Great App. Worth the money !
body: I love how easy it is to search the foods you’re eating so you know exactly how many macros your consuming ! Tons of recipes too !

title: New app is harder to read. Sorry I bought it.
body: I was mostly happy with this until they Redesigned it.  Now the type is thin and small.  The page looks very tidy with all that white space, but I have to find my glasses to use it.  Can I get a refund?  I’ll find something else.

title: Pretty legit
body: I only wish when I was in a 3g of protein ONLY left situation it would have suggestions

title: This is great!
body: The user experience on this App blows all the others away! So comprehensive and fantastic. I don't regret it one bit

title: Never mind
body: I’ve been trying to use this app for a couple of weeks now but, I’m done with it. Every single recipe I put in comes up with totally wrong nutritional info and I finally gave up trying to edit them. All the recipes are from Keto cookbooks that have the nutritional breakdown and they never match. Canceled my subscription 🙁
response: Hi, thanks for your feedback! We welcome the opportunity to assist you with any issues you may be having or answer your questions about the accuracy of our recipes! Please reach out to us from within the app and our awesome customer service team will be happy to help you troubleshoot!

title: I love Carb Manager
body: It helps me to know how many carbs I do throughout my day and how many calories I consume it is helpful to see what I can eat and what I can’t

title: Carb challenge
body: Overall great app, but of course one has to “pay” for the more convenient tools.  Learning quickly to break down foods, though.

title: Great app
body: This makes it VERY simple for me to keep track of my carbs and calories.. everything. Real simple, glad I found this app

title: Easy to stay on track
body: Totally worth the small investment.  Makes it very easy to see the keto impact of each thing I eat.

title: Useful but garbage in garbage out.
body: This could’ve been an amazing app if they had regulated and confirmed accuracy of food in here. There are 250 options for the same item and 99% are wrong

title: Love but needs better exercise options to enter
body: Great food logging app but needs BIG improvements for adding in activities. That part is horrible and cumbersome.

title: Keep on track
body: Know exactly what you are eating to keep you on track

title: App not working
body: I love this application and rely on it to count my macros, however for some reason today everything I scan says it’s not available and is wanting me to custom add the item. This really puts a damper on my tacking today.
response: Hi JacqueKendra! We really appreciate your support, and we're so glad that you took the time to let us know about the issues that you're running into. Please reach out to our support team in the app via Settings -→ Need Help? and they'll be happy to get this resolved for you. When you do, be sure and mention your app store username (JacqueKendra). Cheers!

title: Love the app but....
body: I love this app but today I cannot get into the app. It gives me a message said my internet connection isn't working. Check your internet. Everything is working fine. Just the app isn't working.

title: Product data suffering
body: Second day using this app and finding many items where the nutritional information is inaccurate, wrong carbs, wrong portion size and in some cases bar codes pointing to the wrong product.  From product comments, this has been going on a while with no updates.

title: Great!
body: So far has had all of the foods I’ve either scanned or search for.... The only exception is a bottle of Sauvignon Blanc. Has really help me keep on track

title: Great app ....
body: It’s a great app but sometimes the carb and calories information can differ which can be confusing and frustration when you’re close to reaching your goal/max for the day.
response: Hi Ssminette -

title: Great variety of options
body: Lots of items to add to food log, even add your own recipes. Premium is the best way to view recipes...

title: Great app
body: Easy to use. Love the recipes and ability to put my own in for easy logging. Really the only app I actually use every day👍🏻

title: Best carb/protein manager
body: I follow the Keto-biotic eating plan and carb manager makes my day so much easier by automatically calculating the grams of carb, protein and fat in each meal and each day. It’s a must have!

title: 2nd time keto!
body: Great for beginners. Was happy to come across this. First time i did keto i felt i couldnt eat anything! Was pretty happy this helps me look up different foods to help my crazy cravings!

title: Love this app
body: App helps me keep in control of what I’m eating all day. Love the avoid feature. Message pops up saying avoid when entering a high carb food!

title: Freezes up and won’t open
body: Great app for the first week
response: Hello from Carb Manager and thank you for your review. We're glad to hear that you found some success in your initial week using Carb Manager. However, we're very sorry to hear that you've experienced some issues with using the app on your handheld device. This is extremely out of the ordinary and we'll be happy to offer some immediate help. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "plantrescue" and we'll be happy to help!

title: Glad I found it!
body: Much better for my veggie keto diet attempt than using other apps. I’m still playing around with features but I find it pretty easy so far.

title: Carb Slarb
body: I can’t tell you how helpful this has been with my keto journey. I’d be lost without it. The app is easy to use and takes care of the math for you.

title: Great for Keto!
body: Great for keto! I have noticed tho some nutrition is wrong. Generally I will still google an item myself and correct it. The. Continue with the corrected item

title: 5 Star this App
body: I love how I can scan a product and all it’s nutritional info show up. It tells me if an item is a F grade. Love how it reps track of my weight and  so so much more!!! Love it!

title: New to Ketosis
body: This is my first try and the app has been amazing from the support community, the quick search of food nutrition ect. I love it

title: Finally!
body: I have been using MyFitness Pal for years. This app is far superior for my Keto lifestyle. I find it lacks nothing I need! Thank you for an awesome product!

title: Easy to enter data
body: And all the reports are helpful in premium version. A bit pricey

title: Awesome!!
body: Thank You for all your counting and recipes to make it through my days and be able to loose weight!!

title: Easy to use
body: This is do much easier than the other apps that I have tried

title: Love this site
body: Site makes it easy to track your daily macros.  Keeps me on schedule each day

title: Soooo helpful
body: Would recommend to anyone wanting to have any easy way to track their intake!

title: Simply Love It
body: Started the Keto Diet one week ago and this app has allowed me to easily manage all my foods, not just carbs.  Would recommend without hesitation!

title: Good app
body: I like that this app calculates net carbs.

title: Excellent for tracking macros!
body: Easy to use, especially the scanning feature for barcodes. Most foods are already in the app. Love it!

title: Limited
body: Unless you go premium you are limited to only getting carbs and exercise can’t use bar codes for food but other then that is is great

title: Keto must
body: This app has made it extremely convenient to monitor my intake with the scan feature it’s a breeze

title: New Diabetic
body: This app is exactly what I needed to get my carb intake and sugar on track. Plus unlike a lot of apps it does what it says it will do and does it well.

title: The Best App
body: Being a beginner to really watching my carbs this has been a life saver! Loving all the fats I get to eat on my Keto eating plan. Losing weight within the first week was a super bonus!

title: Great
body: The app is great. I would have gave it 5 stars but once in while I have too close it down and reopen. It has helped me stay right on track. I tell everyone about it.

title: Weight loss made simple!
body: Love this app. Makes it super  easy to stay on track to hit your goals. Very user friendly!

title: Easy
body: Very easy to use app takes little time and effort to log food water exercise etc

title: What Happened?
body: Started using this app Monday - fantastic great for tracking, gave me Marcos and everything then it went down yesterday and it’s all corrupted!!
response: Hi there, please try restarting the app. If that doesn't work, please contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll figure out the problem. Thanks!

title: New at this!
body: I’m still learning this app but I like it so far. Recipes look great and I already tried 2 that were delicious and satisfying 🙌🏼

title: Crashed day 2
body: Wouldn’t work day 2 nothing opening so I deleted app and tried to sign in again ans it gave me the hardest small photos I have ever seen asking to hit boxes with motor bus but only showing windows of what might be trains or buses so it failed 8 times before I managed to get back in
response: Hi there, thanks for your feedback. We have fine-tuned the security sign-in captcha feature, and you should have a much easier time accessing your account. If you continue to have issues, the fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: Stay diligent
body: Great app if you use it. I slip away from using it about the same time I start to slip away from eating correctly. All tools like this are great aids but in the end, it’s up to us.

title: Game Changer
body: This app is a game changer! 3 days in and I will never be the same. I stingily paid for the premium but man oh man am I so glad I did! Take control of your health journey!

title: Love it
body: Great way to keep track of your carb. There is no food in the world not available at least known to me . It’s the best app for carb counting available .

title: If you have original, don’t update
body: I’ve used the app gladly for two or three years, but when I had to update to the new version, it deleted three years of custom food entries. It’s a complete drag.
response: Hi there - sorry to hear your data has gone missing. If you're still not finding it by tapping the "fork + spoon" icon and then "My Foods" where you'll find custom foods, recipes, etc, please reach out to support in-app via Settings → Help & Support and we can troubleshoot this for you. Thanks!

title: Do not like changes
body: This was my go to app.  It was easy to use and I used it on a daily basis.  I used the free edition.  I had gotten sidetracked and wanted to get back on track.  Somehow, the app has changed.  It no longer is easy to use.  I am looking for something  else.  I am so disappointed.
response: Hi there - sorry to hear you're not loving the new app. For help getting back into it, heck out the newFAQs at help.carbmanager.com or reach out in-app via Settings → Help & Support if you have any specific questions. Thanks!

title: Paid for premium features, cannot access
body: The app crashes continuously. I tried to select my personalized meal plan but I had to keep starting over because the app would crash and send me back to selecting breakfast. I paid $15 for premium membership to use this feature and I cannot access it.

title: Horrible version 7 update
body: The new update is horrible!! Not user friendly

title: Update complaints
body: This used to be my favorite app. Now it deletes all my recently viewed things and just shows the foods I created. And it changes the weight/amount of foods after I log them. This app used to be so easy to use, but sadly, I don’t like it very much anymore.

title: Inconsistent
body: I’ve used this app for over a year now however, it’s become real inconsistent on calculating net carbs. It’s deceiving to know exactly what’s keto friendly as far as knowing how much you can have of something. It won’t let me upload photo to give you an example. I also tried emailing customer support and it was undeliverable

title: Latest update is terrible.
body: This app was great until their latest update a week ago. It constantly crashes and opens about 50% of the time. They need to go back to the previous version that worked really well. If something doesn’t change soon, I’ll be canceling this. Fix it!

title: Lost 50 pounds

If you mean you need to re-search foods you've searched previously, you can always find those foods in Recently Viewed or save them to Favorites. If that's not the case, just message us in-app and we can help! Thanks!

response: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. Please contact our support team and support@carbmanager.com and they’ll be happy to assist 😎

response: Hey Grammie, sorry to make you sad! Thanks for letting us know about the issues. Our support team would be more than happy to assist with resolving this for you. You can reach them at support@carbmanager.com. Cheers!

title: Love it
