Other than that which is solved by using frequently eaten foods it works great and does what you are looking for. Also $20 for the year for the upgraded version is a good deal compared to other similar apps.

title: Incredibly helpful for a vegetarian!
body: Just started a Keto diet and this app has been really instrumental in helping me get the hang of ultra low-carb, especially as a vegetarian with fewer low-carb choices. Only question I have is why it deducts only fiber, and not sugar alcohols, in order to calculate net carbs. That might have more to do with my beginner's understanding of Keto and less to do with the app, but throwing it out there to the app designers, for what it's worth. Thanks, Carb Manager! Viva low carb!

title: My video game
body: I got the carb manager after Atkins changed theirs. Carb manager was very easy to use and I truly loved it!! My kids laughed because it was my video game. I could put in different meals before I ate to see what the carbs calories were. I loved it! Then they changed it. Was very sad 😞,but they listened to US and changed it back. Thanks for going back to the way it was. It helped me lose 30 lbs.  I could keep a check on my macros. I love it.

title: Needs some additional features but good
body: Sometimes it's hard to remember how you searched for that food item you ate and logged yesterday and want to log again today. If I could go to a previous day and have the ability to pull a food from that day's foods into today's foods, it would save so much time!  Also, when creating a customized food there's no place to log sugar alcohols in the nutrition information. If a food has sugar alcohols, I have to subtract those from the total carbs before entering it so the net carbs are correct.

title: FINALLY!
body: It took a while to learn my way around but I'm so glad I stuck with it. This app has everything I need and even syncs with my FitBit. I love the immediate info in the pie chart. Tells me exactly where I'm at. I also love the separation of the 3 meals, 3 snacks, and supplements. So much easier to remember that way. Also the fact that you can scan a barcode for unknown foods and it appears instantly. Just a fantastic product. Highly recommend!

title: Do not update!
body: My app updated today, and hasn't worked right since. The barcode scan no longer recognize my foods as it previously did, even the foods that was scanned before no longer listed or it reads " null null".  Totally disgusted!!!!!
response: Hi Jan, thanks for the feedback. We've made a number of changes that make the app much easier to use, including bringing back the wheel picker plus adding keyboard entry of serving sizes. Please give them a try. Thanks!

title: Awful update
body: I've been using CM for a bit over 1.5 years. I have loved it and it has helped me maintain a much healthier lifestyle. I use it to ensure my averages each month stay within my doctor's recommended levels...until now.

title: Want a refund
body: Love Lose It app but was starting Atkins and thought this would be better for counting net carbs. Not really. The calculation for net carbs isn't the same as Atkins. There is no way to subtract sugar alcohols along with fiber; therefore, an Atkins product, for example, that really has 3 net carbs will show up on this app as having consumed 13 net carbs-very deceiving  and also impossible to keep your carb limit. Also, this app has a blank for every other nutrient etc that you can think if but no sodium intake option. In addition the app is much slower than it should be. I wouldn't recommend it for anyone who is trying to stick with net carb intake limits.

title: Great app for starting a diet
body: It has a few kinks, but it really is a great way to monitor and maintain a diet. The best thing about it is the custom foods, as it let's you make meals that are not listed (couldn't find deli corned beef...), and I created a coffee that includes all of the items that I add to my coffee (half & half and Splenda.)

title: I love this app, and use it daily!
body: For people following a low carb diet, this app is perfect for quick, no fuss logging. No internet connection is required to access the food database. Foods not in the database can be added to your personal food list and saved for future use. The app breaks down the nutritional content of all the foods you log so you know by the end of the day if you will be needing a supplement. Great stuff!!

title: Fair
body: A little disappointed.  Could be more user friendly.  Had to search a lot to find certain things.  For instance, a search for tomato gave a whole lot of things with tomatoes in them, and need to scroll down a lot just to find a simple tomato.  Serving sizes also seemed limited.  Entered some items I thought were for yesterday, but they showed up on my today.  Couldn't figure how to move them without starting all over.  As others have mentioned, no Atkins products, and limited sugar-free selections.

title: Great App - But you must use it everyday
body: This is my second review...

title: 💜u just the way u r
body: Honestly, I hadn't noticed that the app was updated because I haven't updated my apps in weeks. When I updated today I noticed the new icon with the note that you had reverted to the original. I'm very happy with the app in its original form and use it all day every day. While I might check out the new version when available, I love you just the way you are (easy peasy).

title: Love it
body: This app really helps me see my macros. I was surprised at how quickly my carbs added up without realizing it. It's easy to search for foods as well as gives list of popular restaurants food. I love the frequently eaten list as I eat the same things a lot.  Doing the ketogenic diet I would like to be able to customize the carb goal to less than 30. So far I have not found out how to do that. Great app!

title: Using every day for several months!
body: Using every day for several months now and it works pretty well for tracking both macro and micronutrients. Some areas for improvements:

title: If I could give zero stars, I would
body: This app is horrible. I am requesting a refund.

title: Another do not upgrade to premium!
body: The bar scanner doesn't work more often than it does work for scanning barcodes. I can scan the identical barcodes with fitness pal which I have the ground entry version of that not the premium and it works but card manager will not pull up the info. This is causing me great frustration and I wish I did not make this purchase. As a matter fact I would like a refund. The other features work well. I just don't like the fact that the bar scanner is so lame.

title: Could be better with food data base worked on
body: The food Data base needs to be organized way better.  How espresso search brings up pages of lamb and meat doesn't make sense.  It is time consuming and lots of the same food listed with different carb counts without any reasoning why.  This would be a good app with a way better food data base.  It doesn't have your basic Atkins foods in there so you have to customize which doesn't subtract sugar alcohols so the carb count is never correct.

title: Love it!
body: After a couple of days, I got use to entering all my food and checking to see where I was at carb-wise through out the day. The "Customize" feature lets you input your special food (like my protein drink). This has a huge data base!  The only thing I would change is that there is no "Edit" feature. You have to delete and start over.

title: Liking it!
body: I've been putting in basically everything! I use a scale at home, measure, and input. Keeps a good track of carbs and calories. Boy, do they add up quickly. Feel more confident that I'm doing things right. Was definitely over personal carb limit without it. As others have said it gets easier to navigate as you use more frequently. But I like it overall.

title: Helpful tool
body: This tool has been really helpful for me in keeping an eye on carbs. I find I eat more of them if I am not watching.

title: Hunting for Carbs
body: I was looking for an app that would help me try to keep my A1C below 7. The problem is that carbs seem to be everywhere and keeping carbs to a minimum is difficult. That is when I came upon this app. I now can see how many carbs I have had before preparing dinner. I can go to the app and enter what is planned for dinner. If I find that there are too many carbs in certain foods, I can make a change. This makes a difficult problem more manageable.

title: Love it!!
body: I've been using the same carb counting app for years! But recently I found a calorie counter app that let me scan my food!! I was hooked even though I don't like to count calories I couldn't find an app  that let me scan for carbs until I found this one!!!it also gives you a break down of fat, protein & carbs in each food!!! Awesome! This from a girl who never pays for apps!!!!

title: Not that great
body: While the charts are nice and there is a selection of restaurant meals to choose from, the list is not customizable. For example, there's no option for a burger with no bun, which if you're going low carb, you're going to order. I could put it in manually but then I have to spend an hour calculating what I ate. The rest of the app features are nothing that other similar apps don't have, many of which are free.  And the stuff I really want to track regarding my health numbers require a whopping $30 yearly subscription. No thanks! Very disappointed.

title: Many features still missing in paid version
body: I bought this because I thought it would be more comprehensive than a free app, but in reality it's missing many features. No weekly overview? No saving meals unless you pay even more money? I had these features with free apps, so I'm not sure what exactly I paid for. I do like how it breaks down net carbs, but that's about all you get with this app unless you pay a premium. Not very user friendly unless you like spending 10-15 minutes loading each component of your meal one by one.

title: Its okay, I don't like the update
body: If your looking to just track your macros and nothing more then this app will work. I'm finding this latest update to be a bit buggy. I'm have problems with editing items after I've  already added them to my meals. Also when I click "add food " or "edit" after I've made an adjustment, there is no indication that I've pressed the button or that that item has been updated to my list. I wish this app interfaced with the onboard apple health app.
response: Hi there, to edit a food in your log, tap on the vertical ... button next to the food item, and then tap Edit. In the food view that appears, make any changes, then tap the green Edit button to finish. Hope this helps!

title: New version
body: Like many of the new features on the latest update but it is Much slower than older version. Also badge counter does not show carbs consumed or remaining. It just shows the total goal. Please fix. Old version had no problems
response: Hi there. We've fixed both of these issues. This version should now be really fast, plus the app badge now works.

title: Very good carb counter
body: I really like this app. I find it easy to use. There are a number of ways to measure food (cups, oz, each, grams, etc) making it simple to get an accurate count. Entries can be edited. Custom foods can be created. On a low carb diet, you are primarily eating produce and meat/seafood/poultry and these are all included. This is really convenient and much better than my old paper food log.

title: Works fine...
body: I have the carb counter and my fitness pal...  What ever I can't find in the carb counter, I can find in the other... I add it to the CC in the "Custom foods" area... Or I check labels and add it that way..   It would be great if foods would come up as entered - but this ap doesn't have the ability to adapt.  All in all I like it. It keeps me from eating something I shouldn't.  Also would be nice to change the amounts to actually reflect correct amounts eaten.

title: Newest Revision Syncs Across iOS
body: Yay!  Now, this is convenient.  I can keep track of my food intake and my exercise more accurately.  I can make entries on my iPhone while I am out and don’t have to wait until I return home to enter them on my iPad.

title: Awesome app
body: I've been watching my carbs for some time now and the weight will not drop. Downloaded this app yesterday and logged a couple previous days of food intake and no wonder - there are so many hidden carbs I didn't realize  !!! I love bananas and eat one daily but 15 carbs - ouch !!  5 stars for opening my eyes !!! If you drop the price of premium I just might purchase that as well. Thanks

title: Clunky, missing many foods
body: I heard about this app in a keto diet group I'm in and decided to waste $3 buying it. There's really only 1 thing I find helpful, the net carb calculation. The interface is really clunky and requires you to open the navigation bar all the time to do anything. It's missing a lot of foods and has no recipes. You can't even input a recipe without paying $20 a year. That's a free feature in myfitnesspal! I'm so disappointed in this app, I wish there was a way to get my money back because it's not worth the frustration of using it.

title: Great App!
body: So far it does everything I wanted for this type of app. I really like the ease of use and intuitive interface. My only concern, and it's not a big one, is that sometimes the nutrition label on the food and what the app gives are close but not the same. No big differences so far, and it may relate to serving size. For the price, the value of this app is well worth the cost.

title: Convenient and feature-packed
body: This app is extremely fast, convenient, well-designed, and just about bug-proof. The feature to have your remaining carb total show up as the notification badge is a slick idea, and makes checking your "budget" even quicker. The macronutrient chart is extremely helpful as well. Overall, it's a sublime fitness app.

title: Carb watcher app works.
body: I've been on Atkins for over a month with just little success until downloading and methodically using this app .

title: Best so far
body: I have been on the ketogenic diet on and off for the past two years and this is by far the the easiest, best looking, and fun carb counting app I have used. It also the cheapest:). This app also helps you track you weight and workouts daily. It is fun to see the weight loss graphs start to drop once you implement a well formulated diet. Awesome app and I recommend it to all my Keto friends.

title: I love this app.
body: This app works very well and the has many great things to offer. Especially the ability to add my own recipes. My only hope is that they will be able to sync with the Fitbit app soon.

title: This one works!
body: Finally, a carb/calorie counter that IS easy to use and works very well. This is the 3rd counter i've tried. The first two were WAY too hard to find common foods and too time consuming. This has a large selection of food and you can easily add any foods you dont find and save for future use. The search is over for me, thanks!

title: Helpful tool but could use a few improvements
body: I can track most of my foods and when I can't find something I enter my Atkins products as costom food. However, I would like to be able to make changes to already entered custom foods. I would also like to be able to go to a previous day and find a meal that took me a long time to enter and just copy it to another day. Maybe future updates will have these capabilities similar to My  Fitness Pal.

title: absolutely love this app
body: I've used this app for a couple days now to enter all my meals and have had no issues whatsoever.  I love the ability to just scan a barcode  and all the info is automatically filled in.  I've also successfully entered a custom food item that wasn't in the database.  Everything has been extremely easy.

title: Love this App
body: I have been using this app every day for 13 months ( 114 #) It is easy to use and does everything I need for my low carb program. I use the custom food section for my favorite foods that vary in carbs.

title: This is easy to use, and does what I need.
body: I would have given this a five star rating if there were a way to connect my Fitbug up to it, so that I don't have to use separate apps every day. I would upgrade to premium in a heartbeat if I could do just that one extra thing, because there are some really great extra benefits that come with premium .

title: Nice variety of features
body: Between the scanner, name brand product listing and the generic listing I can almost always find the foods I am about to eat and reasonable options of portion sizes to log. This good information allows me to make better decisions about my choices. I like that the charts allow you to set targets and them visually represent your progress.

title: Highly Recommend!!
body: This app is great! It is so easy to use and makes eating low carb visually apparent.  Bravo Carb Manager! I tried another carbohydrate tracker app before a friend told me about this one. The app I used before paled in comparison. I'm upset I wasted so much of my time trying to figure out and use the other app.  I would recommend this app to anyone interested in counting carbohydrates.

title: Room for improvement
body: Overall, this is the best app I have used to track net carbs on a ketogenic diet since it automatically subtracts fiber and sugar alcohols from the total carb count. Note to the developer; it would be nice to be able to easily copy an entire meal from one day to another without having to add item by item. Most of my meals are repetitive so it would be nice to "copy breakfast" from one day to another. Thank you.

title: Downgraded with last update
body: I have been using this app for several months and was quite happy. Then this past week there was an update that changed the look of things and downgraded some features. Took the colors off the pie chart and now it's all gray. Not happy with the recent update at all. Now they are pushing to subscribe to premium version by taking away key features on the free version. Bummed.
response: Hi there, to fix the pie chart's colors, please open the Settings page. We actually made recipes free in the latest update, plus increased the free voice logging & snap a pic actions to 3 per day. Please contact us at support@wombatapps.com if you need any additional help. Thanks!

title: Loved until the update
body: The old interface was great. The new interface is frustrating. I went to enter my weight this morning and there's no decimal! Now I can only enter in .5 intervals???? Who loses or gains in .5 intervals???? Well sorry, I only lost .2lbs since yesterday and I can't log it. Can you please fix that? Actually, just go back to the old interface. It was easy. I didn't even finish logging my foods yesterday because I didn't have time to figure it out.
response: Hi there, thanks for the feedback. You can enter your weight in decimals now. Thanks again for using Carb Manager.

title: HowellHome
body: This is a great app! The search is a bit hard to work through, there are a lot of items, it might be better if there were more sub-catergories, also it would be nice if there was a decimal for entering the nutricional information on the custom food menu, other than those two things, i think its a great app, i love the charts and all the graphs that let you track your progress

title: Carb counter
body: If you pursue a low carb diet you will find this app very valuable. It contains the carb, fat, protein and calorie rating of tons of foods. Realistically a single app could not cover these details for every conceivable food on Earth, but this app will give you the nutrition information on most any food you require. Additionally, it will produce useful graphs of your food intake and willow you to input the data so you can graph out your weight loss progress. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

title: Great app!
body: I love this app! Entering food eaten is simple and straightforward, and results are displayed clearly. A suggestion for a future feature would be to include fats and proteins on the main screen. I'm doing a ketogenic diet, which requires not only that I limit my carbs but also that I eat adequate fat and moderate protein, so it would be nice to see these listed on the main screen in addition to carbs.

title: Love It
body: I am recently diagnosed type 2 diabetic and this is by far the best app I've found for keeping track of carbs. The food lookup is wonderful. I've added numerous custom foods from my own recipes. The calculations are easy and a real help in keeping track of my eating habits. This app is easy to learn to use and allows you to start small and increase complexity as you go.

title: Love it! 😃
body: I just started using this app a few days ago and am enjoying it.  Searching foods is easy. One thing I would like to see on it is a recipe builder where you can add all your recipe ingredients in one place and it calculates the carbs. Another thing that would be nice is a place you can save your frequently used recipes and use one click to add the carbs. If these 2 things are in the app, I didn't see them.

title: Working out well
body: I do like this app.  Easy to use and add custom

title: Best Carb Manager!
body: This is a wonderful app! Keeps me very much on task. Super easy to track carbs: barcode scanner, voice logging, snap-a-pic logging and of course, simple searching. My frequent entries are only a tap away! Carb Manager tracks weight, body measurements, BMI, exercise & water intake, etc., plus it gives you a complete nutrition analysis.  Carb Manager makes carb tracking easy. I have lost 40lbs and counting!

title: Great help while getting started on Keto
body: So far so good. I'm a food lover and a decent home chef. But I've never really tracked carbs before. Now I'm trying to get a grip on my inflammation issues and my doctors recommended a low carb/keto diet.  This is helping me make meals my family (and me) still like and keep my carbs low to stay in ketosis.

title: Pretty good but with some issues
body: I really like it but I wish it wouldn't crash so often. I've restarted my phone and still it crashes. So far it crashed when I was picking KFC green beans a few days ago and now it's crashing on my Michelob Ultra. Also, I wish there was a way to 'low carb' foods. For instance, if I order a burger and don't eat the bun or even order it low carb (some places put it on lettuce instead of bread). Would help keep my numbers a little more accurate.

title: Edited after they fixed issue
body: EDITED: they fixed the issue quickly & replied to let me know. App is perfect now!
response: Hi Jenni, thanks for getting in touch. We've fixed this, so your selection will now save. Hope this helps. If this works for you, would you consider updating your review? Many thanks!

title: Only one shortfall
body: The search database for food is incredibly comprehensive. That's a good thing! However, it's a bit cumbersome to use, and takes some retraining on how to get the result your looking for. The only thing in this app that needs a little attention is the search field. The calculator, extensive database, goal charting and planning portions are all fantastic!

title: Good but could use some improvements
body: Has a good library and I like how the data is visually summarized. I wish you could add food right from the summary page instead of having to go back into the menu. I also wish the search recognized misspelled words better. If you don't type it exactly as it's spelled it won't be able to return results and who really knows how to spell rhubarb?

title: Great for my life
body: Easy to find foods. Amazing range of items it will find, such as obscure seaweed snacks by brand name. I like the analyses with pie charts of macros and also measurement tools. I had a different app earlier that was hard to use and would freeze. This one always works.  The favorites list is easy to work with and the display tells me exactly what I want to know.

title: Good app, horrible customer service
body: Of all the carb frackers available this is my favorite, however if you are a paying customer and using it with the premium services they offer; iHealth, Fitbit, Recipe Builder, etc. there are a lot of bugs. The worst part is Customer Service does not respond (ever) to help resolve your issues so you are left with incomplete date logs.

title: Waste of money
body: Can't find "every day" foods. When I searched "chicken breast salad" - zero options come up under every day foods. It took many attempts to find a fried egg. I uploaded two, free Apps that are easy, quick, and the search engine works. It shouldn't be complicated to log everyday foods. Save your money - unclear why there are high reviews. I must be missing something.

title: Works Very Well
body: The interface could be a little more intuitive, but overall I'm really impressed by this app. Easy to use, doesn't crash, the scanning feature works really well. Also easy to log repeats without having to go searching for the same food item all over again.

title: Great app!!
body: I use this app for my low carb dieting and for tracking my foods. I have the yearly membership and I like that too. The only thing I would change about it is the analysis. It tells you what your low or high in but it would be better if it told you what foods you should eat to get your minerals in every day. Other than that it's a great app and well put together! Simple and easy to use!!

title: Love the app!
body: I love this app however after a few short weeks I have one thing I wish were better:

title: Awesome app to track carbs
body: After using many apps, even my fitness pal. I found frustrating not being able to quick track carbs and getting messages that I was eating too much fat. Until I found this app, was the best. You can track weight. Input recipes, look for the amount of carbs certain foods have. Love it.
response: Hi there, thanks for the note! Absolutely - this app is specifically designed for low carb / keto dieters, for which the generic food trackers just aren't suited. Glad you like the recipes sections and weight tracking feature. Do check out our latest version and let us know what you think. Thanks and best wishes!

title: New Update is now great
body: I cannot add food from my frequent list or from a searched food to my daily log?!  Also you have to scroll over to get to the scan upc button. It used to be right there for you to use.
response: Hi MbinFL, glad you're liking the new version! We had a bit of a rocky launch to start, but everything should be working smoothly now. If you have a minute to check out the latest version, we'd love your feedback on it. Best wishes on your low carb journey!

title: Great ap
body: I have been on a low carb diet for 3 weeks now and I have to say this ap has made it fun and easy...I find it to be very accurate and easy to use. The only thing I can't figure out is how to  go back and change something in the log. Over all an excellent ap. I would highly recommend. I have lost 11 pounds so far!

title: Good app, needs some tweaking
body: UPDATE: so, the new update is a sleeker interface, but still no exercise tab nor ability to create a recipe. People watching carbs are working out, and eating foods from recipes as there are very few ready-made low carb meals. Please add these two functions!!

title: Diets- blah!
body: This is the first day of ever truly dieting in my life, and I am soon to be 40. I have heard wonderful things about reducing carbs to bare minimal and the benefits, but I felt it would be too much, too hard, and too overwhelming. However, this tool has made it rather simple, especially since I am motivated to do this right. I would definitely recommend this app.

title: Good site except
body: Food look up is not straight forward. Always need to erase before new search ,always need to spell out full name and spell correctly. Would help if more intelligent by entering first 3 letters like many other sites.

title: Great tool
body: This app has really helped me to stay on track. I love how it figures the net carbs for you and the barcode scan feature is easy to use so almost every food can be entered without searching for the item. I have recommended to friends and coworkers who are now using the app as well. 5 days in and 3 pounds lost so far. Just do it!

title: Very very helpful
body: A low carb can be hard to manage, the cravings, the constant reminder that bread is everywhere and carbs are in everything. This app is helpful in the way of reminding how many carbs you have left for the day and it's vast library of foods already logged into its system. This has helped in my journey 30 pounds down and counting.

title: Misleading
body: I tried out the free version and really liked it. Seamless tracking and wonderful barcode feature. On the free version, I could only add 5 foods a day - so I paid the 2.99 to get the pro version so I could add more food.
response: Hi there - thanks for contacting us. This version of the app includes unlimited food and exercise logging. Please contact us directly at support@wombatapps.com and we'll help you figure out the problem.

title: Love this app
body: This has been the only app that has kept me on track on my Keto Diet. The only reason I don't give it a 5 star is when searching certain options for restaurants, won't provide macros for example a sandwich without the bread. I have to do the research on the internet to find the appropriate macro and manually enter it into the app. Other than that I haVe no other complaints.

title: New Keto UPDATE!
body: The new update is slick and intuitive.  I love the wide range of foods that they have in the database.  Entering recipes and dividing them by servings is so helpful for my math challenged brain.  I love the color coded graphs.  I am very visual and it helps me see where I need to weak my macros.  It has integrated seamlessly with the health info on my iPhone and watch.  Highly recommended for anyone on the low carb Keto WOE!
response: Hi Koala, wow! Thank you for the great feedback! We're glad you like the recipe feature -- it's really unique to our carb counter. We're also very visual, so we integrated lots of progress bars and charts to help our users "see their progress". Best wishes for continued success with your low carb lifestyle! Do check out our latest version when you get a chance and send your feedback!

title: Was Essential but now a pain
body: This app has been essential for helping me navigate the keto and low-carb diet that I am on ..thank you!  Hoping I'm not correct but, after the update I am no longer able to share my food logs with my coach so now I am stuck with trying to screenshot two times per log to fit it all in pictures.

title: Fairly nice, but could be better
body: This is very handy for keeping track of your diet. Would be nice if it could use autocomplete. Takes too long to enter some foods, and it doesn't have realistic options for what you're looking for. Correct answers are far down the list, so it's time consuming. Too many minor, unimportant suggestions for foods. I'm sure this will get better, because it seems to be off to a good start.

title: Great app for keeping track of net carbs
body: It took me a bit to get the hang of this app, but know I can breeze thru it. Is great for tracking net carbs, but still gives you calories and protein and fat tracking . It scans well too. At first I found it a little tricky to find foods, it's a bit different from other apps I've used, but now I have the hang of how to word what I'm looking for so its much easier.

title: Worked great....for a day
body: I got this app two days ago and loved the ease of use.  Then it stopped working.  It seemed to freeze up not letting me click on anything, add anything, basically it was just an image on the screen.  I deleted the app and reinstalled it. After that it worked fine again....for about three hours. I'm about to delete it a second time and probably for the last time.  I wish it worked the way it is supposed to as I really liked all of the features. Unfortunately I have to advise you - don't waste your money.

title: Really hard to use
body: I wish I could get my money back. Super simple foods are impossible to find, like grilled chicken,  Leafy salad, tomatoes, it's more for packaged store bought foods. Hard to find real food at all. Too much to weed through. Switching back to my fitness pal, it's not low carb but it's a lot easier to use. Took me 20 minutes to enter my home made salad. If you prepare meals at home, this app is too tedious.

title: I rely heavily on this app!
body: My mother in law and I started low carb several months ago and we are steadily losing weight thanks to carb manager. Very few apps are perfect, but Carb manager is the best on the market for carb counting. After the crash I lost my premium account, but after emailing the developers they fixed it. Nice customer service! Thanks for this awesome app👍.

title: Perfect!
body: Using this app due to diabetes. Following a Ketogenic diet and this app is perfect!  It does everything I need.  Only one thing I don't like.  After paying for an app (not much!) rather than using one of the free apps, I don't like finding out that I can't use all its features without paying a yearly fee.  Would be good info to have up front.  But the free features work great and do everything I need!

title: Accurate carb counter
body: This app works for me as a carb counter - it has a huge menu of food items and store/restaurant items and the scanner tool is very accurate.  I only gave it 4 stars because I wish it had better graph options for looking at your weight.  Other than that, perfect carb counter.

title: The BEST app for keto-ers!
body: I wrote the company about changing the carbs macro chart to net carbs, and with this new update they added the ability to choose! They have made several other smart improvements as well. Now you can see nutrition by meal. You can even upgrade to use voice to log, and can easily make meals or food groups.

title: Suits my Needs
body: I recently started the Atkins diet after reading the book, The Case Against Sugar.  This app is easy to use and helps me keep track of my daily carb count. I haven't tried any other apps except Lose It. Lose it is not specific to counting carbs so I switched to this. I would highly recommend it for carb counters!

title: New layout is good
body: I really enjoy this app. It helps me stay on track with my calories, fat, carbs, protein and sodium.

title: Could be better....
body: I have used this app for two weeks now and although It has help I think it could be better, no way to grab a food you eat the previous day and also the custom foods cant be edited. I used "loose it" app before and I think the developers can take some ideas and implement them in this app.

title: Needs work
body: You can only delete a food off your custom food list.  It would be wonderful if you could delete from your favorites also.  And once a food is in your log you can not change the date to use it in the future. Having this feature would be very  helpful!

title: Search needs help
body: I read some of the reviews and decided to pay the $2.99. I was immediately frustrated when I searched for Atkins and nothing came up. So I tried Atkins bars and all kinds of different foods came up. I entered a simple search of tomato and I couldn't believe all the items that I had to scroll thru just to find a fresh tomato. Wish I had saved my money cause there are much better apps out there that are cheaper.

title: VERY Worth It
body: Totally worth the price. Every kind of food listed, intuitive navigation and simple. It only asks for useful information & totals net carbs automatically. Would be perfect if you could track multiple profiles & scan food labels, but for me the simplicity & ease of use more than make up for this lack.

title: Awesome App
body: I tried using other similar apps like my fitness pal with little support for us carb counters. This App goes beyond that and keeps tabs on overall nutrition with its analysis tool. I even upgraded and find its worth every penny. I don't stay within my macros everyday but thanks to carb manager I'm not delusional about 'why' either.

title: Good but a question...
body: I really like this app and it's excellent at barcode reading and finding food fairly easily. The one thing I can't figure out, however, is how to delete a food out of one's favorites or frequently eating foods. I tap on the edit button and nothing happens. If I swipe left, it just goes to the page to log it as being eaten. Kind of frustrated…

title: Just Simply AWESOME!!!!
body: By far one of the best apps on the market if you are on the ketosis diet or similar diet, or simply trying to monitor your carb intake along with other Nutritional Facts. The best feature is the scanning for food. Makes it much easier to input all the facts. If you don't at least try this app you're certainly hurting yourself.

title: Net Carbs!!
body: I am on a Ketogenic diet and we keep track of net carbs. I have been using MyFitnessPal, but it tracks just carbs. This app lets me scan in my food, build recipient and everything and the best part is I don't have to go back and subtract the net cards so I know if I am on track! The only things is, some of the food is wrong in the app, so I have to make a lot of custom foods to get the job done.

title: Best Keto / Macro Tracker
body: For those of us who are trying to keep within a certain range of carbohydrates, fats, and protein in our daily diets, this is by far the best app to use, and I have tried them all.

title: Great app for a low carbohydrate focused diet
body: Searched and searched to find an app that would track my carbs and help me learn about portions. Easy to use and has a HUGE database of foods!  Occasionally when I am searching a restaurant item the app will crash. Still love the app and so glad I have it to help me on this journey of making lower carb eating a lifestyle.
response: Hi sarck, thank you for the great feedback! We've fixed the crashing problem in the latest release, so it should work perfectly now. Check out our latest release when you get a chance and let us know what you think. Best wishes for your low carb journey!

title: Great Stuff
body: I love this software, I am doing low carb and the Atkins software was very limited in foods. So easy to use, tracks much more than carbs as well. Why 4 stars?

title: Really good
body: I've tried several carb counting apps and this one is by far the best one yet. My only quibble is that it is perhaps a bit too detailed. I mean 50 entries for fried breaded ham? Really? But, other than that really good - easy to use, extensive and pretty accurate. However I don't eat a lot of prepared (packaged, frozen, restaurant) food so I can't speak to a lack of brand name or menu items.

title: Good but needs work
body: It doesn’t have that extensive a database.  Can’t find a lot of the foods I eat.  For instance, I typed in boneless, skinless chicken breast and I took a while to find something similar.  It needs a recipe builder to be able to add foods to the database especially for eating out.  Also needs a scanner so accurate data can be entered.  It takes time to go through the food and find something similar in carbs, protein and fat.

title: Pittypat
body: I downloaded this app on September 3 I have used it diligently...I am losing weight..the app is easy for me to navigate in now because I always use my favorites I'm sticking to my net carbs and it seems to be working because I have lost 7lbs ... So it is worth 5 stars  to me...I've struggled with weight all my life....I gotta stick with it so say a prayer for pittypat .....

title: Good carb counter that shows fiber.
body: I use this app for logging food intake and initially chose it because of the visibility of fiber on the dashboard which wasn't visible in the other trackers I had used.  It has a good overview for seeing net carbs, carbs, protein, fat, calories, and fiber. They have been responsive when I needed help, or when there were bugs.

title: Review
body: I used the app for a month, and even recommended it to a group of people with this eating style. Then it updated. All the nutritional information and service sizes are way of. I don't have time to manually input all of my food and thats why I paid for this app. I have updated it to the newest version today. Still doest work. Please fix it or refund me!
response: Thanks for the feedback, and sorry for the glitch! It's now been fixed. For any lingering issues, please go the the Settings Page, then turn "Use kiloJoules" on and then off. This will reset the app and restore all of the serving sizes.

title: SJeffrey
body: This is a great app for keeping track of your carbs. It is very easy to look up foods and even has a way to store your own custom concoctions. Also keeps track of weight, water and exercise. If you need more you can upgrade. I have lost 16 pounds with help of this app. Would and do highly recommend.

title: Quick carb check
body: I don't track everything everyday but I do use this site several times a week to check on carbs. Sometimes food is cooked in a manner that increases carbs. I have found several food items in this app that change with different cooking methods. Love it!

title: Best app for diet tracking
body: I have used several different apps to track my keep diet and carb manager is by far the most user friendly. There are pictures and settings to make your tracking and selection easy so that I am not wasting lots of time or getting frustrated and quitting

title: Where are the goals?
body: I like that they figure out my goals for carbs, protein, etc... but where are the goals for my daily vitamin and fiber intake? I also would like a feature on how much natural sugar we should be getting. Obviously ideally we shouldn't eat any added.. I would like to track that.. there is another app that does, but I don't want to have to use two apps.. and since I paid for this once I figured they would have had that available on the app.
response: Hi NY, you can find goals under Settings -> Diet Goals. There is also a goal calculator that can help you determine your daily macros in grams based on the % of calories you wish to eat from each.

title: Like more than I don't like
body: This is really handy in counting carbs... Two things I hope will be changed soon are the ability to edit custom foods after they have been saved and more basic foods in the search... Example,  there are many fancy options for zucchini but not just plain zucchini ... Also customizing serving sizes isn't great... Otherwise it's a nice app... I hope to change my review to five stars someday.

title: Great app... Just wish...
body: This is perfect for me as I don't process carbs properly and helps me keep control of them. However, I wish the food list was more extensive ie having tons of different options for zucchini but not plain zucchini. And shouldn't it have Adkins products listed?  I use the Adkins bars for my sweet tooth and have to put them all in custom. Otherwise perfect app for me

title: Great app
body: I've been following primal blueprint also for about a year. This app is perfect for this type of eating plan. However I dislike that I have to manually enter so many foods. It would be great if there was something to simplify the process rather than having to enter so many custom foods.

title: Carb app
body: This program seems to be very good. I believe it is prudent to have a Exercise tab that converts energy used off sets the amount of carbs Consumed. They are doing this I with counting calories I am sure you can do it with carbs also.  I will purchase this app hoping that in the future you can make that adjustment Sincerely

title: Excellent software!!!
body: In my opinion Carb Manager is the Best program out there for carb tracking.  Only issue I have is that my Weight Graph is now not working and for some reason won't record my daily weights.  But other than that glitch, I would highly recommend this program to anyone!

title: Great!
body: Love how easy it is. Not complicated. So glad I downloaded it because net carbs and carbs are different and I am starting Atkins. My absolute favorite feature is how easy it is to favorite a food and not have to search for it daily!!!!  This is a huge time saver which means I'm more likely to use the app and stick to the diet.

title: Nice but still needs work...
body: I like the concept of being net carb focused, but it still needs work to be great. There seems to be no way to enter previous days if you miss logging in past. Some foods are hard to find and the filtering of foods are weak. You also cant add foods. I like the interface a little but it is a little quirky. The only reason I would use over myfitness pal is the net carb counter, but mfp is a much better app.

title: Best Ever
body: The functionality is great. It's easy to count carbs and keep track of how many  I have left in a day.  It starts out with a goal of 30 a day and I've kept that, and I can increase it when I get to my goal weight.  I've lost 40 lbs and as long as I keep using this, I think I can keep going!

title: Doesn't subtract sugar alcohols from net carbs
body: I like the app overall, especially compared to similar apps. It doesn't subtract sugar alcohols from net carbs, and everything I've read says that's acceptable to deduct them. So I'm having to track those separately so I can still track everything I eat, which is inconvenient. I'd love the option to be able to do so. Thank you!

title: Yes!!!!
body: Ever since they fixed the glitches in the last update, this app is amazing! I love being able to easily plan meals for the entire week. The copying and pasting for any day/any meal that I want makes it so helpful! I've been using this for almost a year and this is the best the app has ever been!
response: Hi there, sorry for the problem. Please open the Settings page and it will automatically restore the colors in the pie chart. Feel free to contact us directly with any additional questions.

title: So glad I found it!
body: Took me a little touring to find all of the options, but this has been a great app!  So quick and easy to use when meal planning or eating on the go.  Some of the food listing can be redundant, which is a bother.  No crashing for me. I would recommend it without hesitation.

title: Easier than Atkins app
body: It really is a good app to keep track of your carbs. I wish it was easier to find the foods. I also use lose it app and just love the way they have the foods and finding them. They are more calories counting and this one more carb counting if only they could use each others strong points it would be a lot easier. But the Atkins app I still can not figure out.

title: Intuitive and effective
body: Seems perfect so far. The interface is easy to use, and the information is presented in a way that is easy to read and understand. Also counts calories and tracks your weight. Exactly as described and no bugs as far as I can tell.

title: No customer service
body: I upgraded to premium because I wanted the added features which are great. I have contacted company through email with various questions and haven't heard a peep. So if you get this app including any additional upgrade beware. I want to link my Fitbit  to app; followed their directions (additional expense) doesn't work and can't get any help.

title: Excellent but numbers not always consistent with nutrition facts
body: Once you get the hang of searching the foods and designating favorites etc, this program is a snap. It lists more carbs than the nutrition facts on food packaging and I don't know which to believe. Tried scanning the UPC on my Jack Links Beef Steak and it wouldn't pick it up.  Nevertheless a fine program and I intend to keep using it.

title: Good for me
body: I like this app because it's a good way for me to track my carbs. 2 things I don't like.. 1. Should sync with Apple health for free. Paying an additional $20 for it seems a bit ridiculous. Or sync to other apps would be nice too. 2. Some foods should come in single quantities. Bacon comes in quantities of 2. So if I ate one slice....??? Other than that, great app to keep you on track.

title: Type 2 Diabetes
body: This attractive little app has made it easy for me to manage my intake of carbohydrates throughout the day.

title: User Friendly
body: I've used several apps in the past, and I like how user friendly this app is. Most of my entries  I use the barcode scanner and adjust the serving size to reflect what I've eaten. In the rare occasion the scanner doesn't upload the item, I make a custom entry.  Overall I'm very pleased with the app and using it to log my daily calorie/carb intake.

title: Makes it easy to stay on track
body: I really like this app. I'm trying to do a low-carb program and Carb Manager makes it simple to add up my daily carbs. It remembers what I've looked at recently. Just wish the upgrade wasn't so pricy, and I'd get it, but $40 is just too much for me. Good design, well thought out.

title: Love this app!!
body: This app does everything! It tracks your homemade recipes and meals, you can save favorited foods, offers recipes, it tracks all nutrient information, and also the customer support is fantastic. The premium upgrade is definitely worth the money! It really helps me stay on track!

title: Great app!
body: I like this app. Love the barcode scan option. I just wish the search was a little more friendly. You type in "bacon" and you have to search through multiple results to find what you're looking for. Otherwise it's pretty good.

title: A 70-year old's review
body: Once you get the hang of it, it's great! No more paper and pencil; I can enter information while I am looking at a menu or as I am preparing a meal. Very colorful visuals show values and totals of what's been eaten making you immediately aware of how close you are to your goals. This helps me plan meals and pace my eating.

title: I love this!!
body: This app is perfect for tracking everything you eat. Worth the money if you are serious about eating healthy and tracking your eating habits!! I love the fact that you can search for items and it will automatically put the info in for you!

title: Worth the money!
body: Started counting my carbs and limiting my intake recently.. I was having trouble keeping track of them and this is such a good tool... it keeps track of your water intake, your exercises, and counts your carbs and calories and anything else you'd want to look at! Such an amazing app and worth the $3!

title: Great app but needs more items in food list
body: I really like the app but the food list needs to have more items even in the scanning bar codes. Maybe do something like fit bit and have customers take pictures of product and nutrition so it can be added.  I do love the focus on carbs and it is great for tracking.

title: Love it so far, but...
body: Can we get a recipe system where we can enter the total of the whole recipe and then select how many servings? It would be easier than doing the calculations myself and that's a pretty standard feature of most diet apps/websites. The barcode feature is nice when you're eating something simple though!

title: Easy to use!
body: I have lost 25 pounds just by tracking my carbs with Carb Manager! Of all the ones I have tried, this app is easiest to use! Keep adding more restaurant and store items, please. Also like the exercise tracking feature. New update has lots of improvements. Thanks!

title: Awesome
body: Great app overall; lots of features, great food selection charts and very easy to use!  Would be great to store and readily access previous selected foods or have the search engine for foods match more the exact entry; the entry for a multiple ingredient food like a custom salad or smoothie makes for a lot of redundant entries.

title: Love this app!
body: I am a diabetic and need to track my carbs for meals.   This has been so helpful to me.  I can put in my food for each meal and know if I'm on track or over.

title: Weight tracking difficult
body: Hard to find weight tracking part of app. It would be really great if weight were listed with the items that came up when the + button is clicked - one place to add everything. And the list of weights is really hard to decider now. I just want to be able to see a quick list of weights so I can see progress.

title: Great App
body: This is a great app!  I use it every day.  I can count my carbs and calories so easily.  It's not a chore any more.  There's only a couple of things I'd add and that's the ability to edit your favorite foods (currently have to delete and then re-enter) and also to have it calculate net carbs correctly when sugar alcohols are included.  Otherwise - it's wonderful!

title: Well thought out app
body: This app works very well and is easy to use. It's also visually attractive which also adds to it's functionality.

title: Discrepancies
body: I just installed and started using tonight and I love the variety of foods in the database!  I have found some discrepancies though, so I just adjust the amount I "ate" to what I know I consumed re: net carbs. This is way better than the Atkins app. Hope to come back and up my rating to 5 stars with the next update! For $2.99 it's very nice.  Also wish it had half pound increments for weight tracking.

title: Finally!
body: They have finally created an app that is super easy to use that counts NET carbs. Not only is there a very extensive list of foods to choose from already, but there is an option to add your own custom foods also. In my carb-counting lifestyle this is a major tool. Thank you to the creators!!!

title: Worked for a while and then stopped
body: It worked for a few months and now I just crashed every time I try to input my food. I emailed support and they didn't help so I had to delete it and find something new. I really liked it at first. Easy to use.

title: Apple Health Integration RIP OFF
body: Do not purchase this app.  Upgraded to premium to use the Apple Health integration and all it did was freeze up every time.  The support is a joke.  Sent an email to their support and didn't not receive anything back.  Why is Apple letting a bogus company rip off its users?  So, I considered my $20 a lost and continued to use the app.  Just updated to the latest version and it wiped out all of my data.  The data is still online but it is no longer syncing with the app.  Just a piece of crap application.

title: Excellent tool!
body: There's nothing like keeping track of what you eat to keep you honest about your carb intake. I also like that this app let's you track your progress, not to mention plan carb intake ahead to avoid overdoing it. The app is simple to use, and well organized.

title: So far so good
body: I've only been using this app for a few days but so far it has been wonderful. Well worth the $. I downloaded after a recommendation from someone who's used it for months and still finds it indispensable 👍 Great app for over all health recording.

title: I don't know how I lived without it. Keeps me losing and maintaining.
body: This app is easy to use and has everything you need but also has a barcode scan that makes it better than all of the other apps I have tried before

title: New version is not as bad as it was
body: I really love this app but this new version is still not 100%. Settings are working now and I got rid of that completely ridiculous circle thing. That alone is worth giving two more stars. If the food database would work right it would be 5 stars, but it's hit and miss.
response: Hi MadScientist, thanks for the note. We fixed a bunch of bugs, and now you can switch back to the pie chat / progress bar by going to Settings -> Progress Wheel and turning it off there. Hope this helps.

title: Better apps are out there
body: Database is difficult to navigate and doesn't include low carb staples like Atkins shakes, etc. Also has no place to track water intake. I stopped using this app after just a few days and found Low Carb Diet Assistant.  Same price, way better app.

title: Add Atkins foods to your custom food area.
body: Very helpful. Took me a few days to figure out to put all the Atkins food under custom foods, and just put the box info into the nutritional values. I had to change the fiber content to make the net carbs correct. After I did that, this tool became the best thing ever.

title: Almost Perfect!!
body: I love this app. It's easy to use and based on your entries, you get a summary of your micronutrients (vitamins & minerals) along w carbs, fiber, calories, etc. I'm following Atkins and this provides precise carb count versus using a booklet or other apps that I've tried. I just have to remember to log what I eat!!

title: Good but not great
body: Good app that does a good job helping with carb intake.  Other apps don't compute net carbs, but this one does.

title: Excellent App for tracking carbs
body: One major ability in this app is that you can enter in a multi ingredient recipe and then easily figure out the carbs per portion. You can then enter that in custom foods for a great time saver. I would like to also see calories per meal/snack as well as the total.

title: Very Good Product
body: This is a good app.  I love the fact that they have placed the barcode in the program which makes it easier and faster to store carb information from foods. I just wished you did not have to pay to get Premium update.  Some of that stuff (logging water intake and getting exercise advice) should be free.

title: Great for Atkins
body: I really like this app for doing Atkins. It's the one carb tracking app that I found works best for me.

title: Great App Overall - But Adds Too many Carbs
body: My husband and I are using this for Ketogenic diets and it's really been helpful to see where we are with our carbs, proteins and fats. Sometimes it's frustrating though when this app adds to many carbs to things we know don't have as many as it says. Otherwise, it's awesome.

title: Fix the chart please
body: The chart is meaningless all I'm gray. Please fix!
response: Hi Cheeky, thanks for contacting us! To fix the charts issue that's popped up for a few users, please open and close the Settings page (left menu). Also, you can add exercises: just select "Exercise" when selecting what to log. Please contact us at support@wombatapps.com if you have any other questions.

title: LOVE IT!
body: I think this is the only app I haven't deleted after two days. It really does help me keep track of my carb intake and my protein intake my exercise.  Very user-friendly and when submitting suggestions I actually got a response within 24 hours, that was very cool!

title: Easy to use, great app
body: Since I downloaded this, I have stuck with better eating more consistently than anything else I tried. This app has a HUGE(almost too big?) data base if foods, the ability to add custom foods, and good-feedback graphs. Highly recommended!!

title: I want my stuff back!!!!!
body: I have been using this app since the beginning of March, I updated, and everything is wiped out!!!  Nothing is there- NOTHING! Do you people realize how much work has gone into building food lists, daily logs, preferences, etc.???? Do you even care??? I WANT MY STUFF BACK!!!!

title: Works very well
body: In general this let's me do everything I need to, but two features that are lacking ( or in sufficiently clear and I can't find them) are the ability to track fluid intake and the ability to edit custom foods after you have entered it.

title: Woohoo!
body: Simple but intuitive. It lets  you track and graph carbs and weight loss so you can see the relationship between your efforts and results. I have lost 25 pounds in 45 days thanks to this simple but sophisticated tool. I have tried many others, but this is the best!

title: Everything I was looking for
body: A few years ago I developed a spreadsheet the almost does everything that Carb Manager does.. Now i have the full power of CM and, incredibly, I have the ability to look up food items as well. Impressive!!!

title: Makes it easy to do LCHF
body: I just started a low carb/high fat way of eating and need to stay at 20 grams or less per day.  This app makes it easy. It's also really helpful to see the proportions you're eating if protein, fat, fiber and carbs. I couldn't be successful without a tool like this.

title: Review
body: I really like this app. However it seems the analysis is not too accurate! For example today I Drank 1 cup of unsweetened coconut milk, 1/3 cup almond milk, Greek yogurt and cheese yet my calcium was still low??? That does not make sense! Otherwise I love the app, easy to use, easy to use recipe builder and graphics are great! Thanks for the app!!

title: APP CRASHES CONSTANTLY
body: When I search for food under "Brand" and find, say, Michelob ultra light beer, and touch that item -- the APP CRASHES. Why? Have you done something behind the scenes? I am a premium member and this did not happen until recently. I am very very frustrated and very very very unhappy. Please help.

title: Great
body: I have been using for a month now. It has really helped me make choices that help me stick to my diet. Easy to learn and use. Syncs with my Apple watch. There was an issue with the new update, i let them know right thru the app and it was fixed in a week!
response: Hey there, thanks so much for the great feedback. We're glad you're finding the app easy to use, and it's our pleasure to help. If you have a minute, would you check out the latest version and let us know what you think? We value your feedback! Best wishes on your low carb journey.

title: Great, looking forward to more
body: So far, this app has been very helpful as I track my carbs on a keto diet to reduce epileptic seizures.
response: Hi there, thanks for the great feedback! To set your goals for vitamins and minerals, please go to Settings -> Diet Goals. You can use the DRI values calculated based on your profile, or set your own goals. Hope this helps. Please check out our latest version and let us know what you think!

title: Myfitnesspal is easier and FREE
body: With all the foods out there, I'd say this app only list .001 of them and it doesn't give you the option of adding your own info which you got right off the container. It also doesn't let you use a barcode scanner to automatically enter information. The idea of buying an App is to be able to use it. With MyFitnessPal you can add foods to the App by entering them manually or by using your barcode reader on your cell phone, 1 beep and it's entered! And it's Free!!!

title: Search Engine is a joke
body: I was hopeful for this app since there seem to be very few apps that want to target limiting sugar/carbs that make actually work. The search engine is terrible. I try to search for a Hamburger patty (0 carbs) and it keeps popping up a Whopper from Burger King. There are no options to strip things off the meal in question and the one listing that didn't mention a bun still listed a patty as having 23 Carb units. I wasted 2.99 on this when I could have bought another hamburger, :)

title: Very functional carb counter
body: I have tried many, but this is a comprehensive and functions carb and nutrient tracker and much more. I had used MyFitnessPal for 3 years, but now I'm in maintenance and this app meets my needs. Syncs among IOS, but would like a web version as well. I'm happy with this app.

title: Love this app so far!
body: I just started using this app today but I really like how it calculates my net carbs for me, along with total calories and so many vitamins and minerals! I had a protein shake not in database but barcode scanner found and entered all the up to date info for me - so convenient!

title: Great weight loss tool
body: As a chef I never realize that I would need an app to help me lose weight. Carb manager has been a great tool to help track my carbs. I've already recommended it to a number of Friends. Really a fantastic app. To date this has helped me lose 40 pounds!!

title: Pretty Awesome so far
body: Easy to use- intuitive. Extensive database of foods. I wish I could easily save a whole meal as a favorite to easily add it again.  I also wish I could track water intake. Otherwise it's the best carb counter I've tried - and I've tried many!

title: Really easy!
body: Great app for tracking.  Easy to use once you get comfy with it.  Makes it pretty simple to monitor everything you are eating.

title: Money
body: Love this app. I never have problems and the recent update makes it way more convenient even tho it was already pretty convenient haha recommend to anybody lookin to count calories or just keep track of what they are eating.

title: Much better than other apps
body: Wow, this app is really put together well. I've had other apps and The depth and ease of use of this one far surpasses the others. Being able to just dictate your daily meals or foods and it just entering is awesome. Five stars

title: Love this app!
body: I seriously love this app! Keeps me keto focused at all times! This new update had a cosmetics change, not a fan yet but I'll get used to it. Unfortunately, the scan won't work. This is what I use it for the most. I scan in all my foods. Please fix the scan!!!!

title: Overall, pretty good
body: Been using it daily for a week. The food database can be cumbersome due to the volume of entries for common items. I have found that it is sometimes easier to create a custom food entry. I would like the ability to edit both custom entries and the prior day's log

title: Log email?
body: The log email that I wanted to be able to send to my doctor says there is a text file attached but it never opens

title: Please stay original!
body: That update was so awful. The original is so easy to use and really makes you want to log your day! The pie chart and calories is what I need to see to stay on track! Thanks for getting it back to normal!

title: Buyer Beware
body: The basic $2.99 app does not allow you to summarize, analyze or graph your data over time.  You gotta sign up for the $20 annual membership to get that functionality. Sort of like buying a shirt and discovering that the buttons come at an extra charge.

title: Great interface
body: This is a great app for low carb diet. I just do not think an upgrade should be required to enter exercise or sync with other devices. Original description leads you to believe the $3 price you pay for app includes much of the services within the app. Not a big deal - still a great app.

title: I'm fine with it
body: I haven't had any issues with this app. I don't see what the fuss is all about lately. I can track all of my carbs, protein, fats, vitamins and how much weight I lost. I track all of my food daily. I highly recommend this very helpful app!

title: Pretty handy
body: I like the calculation of the NetCarbs. It's very helpful. I wish there were more foods to pick from. Sometimes it's very hard finding the food to enter. Also, it would be handy to have the recipe add without purchasing the upgrade.

title: Works for me, but don't like the new version
body: Update: really dislike the updated version. List of Frequently Eaten seems to have disappeared, which was on feature I used the most. Also dislike reversing the order (was good, the assign to meal. Now it's meal, then pick food.) wish I could go back. WAS: Very easy to use. Great for finding "hidden carbs"

title: Cannot Open Settings
body: Not sure what happened, but today I've been trying to change my protein goal and when I click on settings in the app i get a spinning circle as it tries to load, but then just goes back to whatever section I was already in. I've closed the app and restarted my phone to no avail. Please fix.
response: Hi there! Please give it another try now and contact us at support@wombatapps.com if you still are experiencing this problem. Thanks!

title: Carb Manager
body: I love this app, don't like some of the new features, but overall it's still a good app for tracking my food, carbs & protein. I do wish it would remember my frequently eaten foods. Also wish it kept a history of foods I have snapped a photo of the barcode--unless it already exists & I can't find 😜

title: Great app but...
body: I love this app, it has made things a lot easier since I'm following the Keto diet but certain I eat can't be found. If this app had a scanner it would hands down be 5 stars. Even with things I find it would be faster if I can scan and go instead of search.

title: Love this app
body: I was just diagnosed, last week, with Type 2 Diabetes. I found this app. through Calorie King and I love it. I spent hours in the grocery store scanning items. It's been a tremendous time saver and ultimately life saver in my over coming this chronic disease. I high recommend it.

title: Carb Manager great. Customer service not so great
body: I purchased the premium add on. And a synch for my Fitbit.  It slowed everything down.  I wrote customer support. The same day.  To refund the amount and take it off my app.  No word yet. It wasn't worth the 20+ dollars. Basic app works well

title: Better than Atkins app
body: I downloaded the Atkins app because I of course am doing Atkins. Found that the Atkins app had problems finding common foods and scanning correction.

title: So far so good
body: I've only been using this a couple of days but I really like it so far. I was previously using the "my plate" app and it wasn't very accurate with its carb count...I think it didn't subtract the dietary fiber from the total carbs...this app does and from what I have seen is pretty accurate with its carb counts.

title: Finally, what I needed!
body: I started eating LCHF months ago. But I wasn't getting the results because I wasn't able to calculate my numbers correctly. Now that I can, things are moving in the right direction. Thank you for creating this app!

title: Decent start
body: Functionality seems okay, would be five stars, but I can't seem to find a way to input custom macros, other than carbs. Maybe I'm missing something? The food I'm trying to log is not in the database of foods, and I have the fat, protein, and caloric values, but no way to record them. People would like to track more than just carbs.

title: carb counting
body: There is one downside that I cannot figure out perhaps you can help me.

title: Quick to learn-easy to use
body: I have only been using this ap for a few days. Already preferred over the two other free programs i tried.  So easy to use. Especially love the scan feature.

title: So Helpful
body: This app makes it so easy to calculate my net carbs and my calories. I plan my meals every morning. The update has been great, but need to add more options for daily supplements. Also need to add rebounding to exercises. This is my life time plan so I signed up for premium.

title: Carb Counter Is A Great Tool
body: I am following the Atkins program and use the carb counter app every day. Its easy to use and allows you to create your own database of foods.  I recommend this for anyone needing easy quick access to food tracking tool.

title: Food choices are not sufficient/accurate values
body: I have free apps for weight loss that have better and more accurate food lists.

title: Net carb vs total carbs
body: I agree the custom food and food finder aren't ideal. Try to find a burger eaten with no bun or condiment and that is not an option. Also it counts some food as having carbs when they clearly don't (salmon has carbs??) lastly you stay within your carb count and go back through the log and days later your over your carb count? Makes no sense

title: More diabetic friendly
body: I Love this app I just wish that it was more diabetic friendly by having a spot track your blood glucose levels. Also when I tried to email at the email was unreadable. Maybe just put option where you can print them out. Patty

title: Bring back what made it great
body: This new version is a real pain compared to its predecessor. Constantly going back and forth one menu, back to another. Previous version made it easy and effortless.

title: Ketosis with a quickness!
body: Thank you so much for a great app to manage your diet and be aware of what you are actually putting into your body. I have been in ketosis for almost a month and seizure free for the duration as well!!! I appreciate you helping me start achieving a goal ✌️

title: Great app
body: Would give the app 5 stars! But I would like to be able to record blood glucose and weight inside the app. An exercise option would be an added bonus.

title: Best one yet!
body: I've tried other apps. None as comprehensive as this one. I went from a bumbling 500 lbs. to a sleek 180 in less than 12 years. Never had this app off of my phone the entire time. You say Kuh-tosis and I say Key-tosis! For real, it works...!!

title: I love how the Net carbs are front and center.
body: Other apps that allow you to log your food will not let you put the net carbs front and center. When I log food in this app it is similar to another popular app, but places emphasis on the carbs!

title: Changing my Review
body: In the last hour or so the new version has been changed so I am changing my one star review to four stars. Still am unable to see the total grams of carbs, protein and fats I am suppose to have daily. Only shows what I have consumed. Thanks for fixing most of my concerns.

title: Wonderful App for Carb Counting
body: I use this easy to use app everyday, actually 4 times a day. After every meal and a snack I input my meals and presto all my carbs are calculated. I love the custom and favorites sections. It really helps me keep track and stay on target. It is perfect on my iPhone.

title: Love this app!
body: I have used this for a week now and am quite pleased with it's comprehensive food listings, ability to add custom foods and ease of use. Beats looking the info up on computer or in book. I like that it doesn't require wifi.

title: Gam says:
body: I just got this Friday and today I'm trying to get it set up. I really think this is going to be great when I get it all figured out and set up. Waaay too detailed in food descriptions. Takes a while to find what I'm looking for...a little too specific.  Like the label scan Suggestion.

title: Total understanding
body: I found this app to help my carb diet. Best tool ever!!!!!! Please use a food scale, VERY IMPORTANT. Have been losing my goal weight throughout. It lowers your goals as u lose, no BS. No ads. If you are honest, so is the app. Thank you, still 20 to go. From size 46 to 38 already.

title: Love this app!
body: Makes tracking super easy.  Sometimes it isn't always correct with the nutrition info so you just have to manually input it which isn't a big deal.  Overall love it

title: Frustrating!
body: I hate this app, because it is very frustrating to maneuver. I wish I had never purchased it! I deleted it from my iPad and wish I could get a refund, but don't expect it. There should be a way to try an app and if not happy with it have the option to cancel. This makes me very apprehensive in purchasing any more apps.

title: Net carbs should not include sugar alcohol
body: I would have given it a 5 if it didn't add sugar alcohol to net carb count. Programmer didn't fully do a complete analysis of user requirements. If they had, they would know that both fiber and sugar alcohol are subtracted from total carb count. It is uber easy to track food, but I have to go back in and subtract carbs to get my true net carb count. I would advise low-carbers to look elsewhere. Don't waste the money.

title: Good for tracking net carbs
body: I use this app and my fitness pal. While I generally like this app bc it has almost all food and makes it easy to track carbs it could stand for improvements. Like my fitness pal you can copy foods to the next day but they don't all carry over and I wish I could enter a recipe and have a breakdown generated for the meal.

title: Has helped me so much
body: I am on the keto diet I changed to it for my health and It has improved so very much and this app has helped me so very much it shows me where I am at so I don't have to guess it has helped keep me on track

title: Fixed my issue!
body: This is an excellent app.  You can do so much with it!  Not only can you track carbs, but you can enter your own recipe and it will do a nutritional analysis on it for you!  Very valuable for anyone who has diabetes, or who is on a keto diet.

title: Would b 5 star but...
body: This app is great with foods and tracking daily intake. The only issue is the weight graph does not maintain daily daily values when you move week to week. That's the only issue I have found. Have been using for 2 weeks and lost 10 lbs on Atkins.

title: You need this if your carb counting
body: This app lets you count carbs, proteins, fiber, fat, sugars and calories. The food selection is a little cumbersome and that's why I rate this only four stars. You can email status reports, look at graphs, there're several ways to ukeep tracking your progress.

title: Frustrating!
body: Just bought this and want my money back. It takes forever to find things, after having to scroll through the list. It needs a search function. Also items are not exact and it won't let you add your own info. So if you have an item with all the nutritional facts it does not let you add them. Doesn't help me!

title: Don't buy
body: This app proved very disappointing.  The data base is not good and not easy to use. If it had the ability to scan nutritional info from the labels that would be better.  Compared to other apps this one was a waste of money. I'm sorry I bought it.

title: App needs a barcode scanning function!
body: I was extremely excited to use this app, but was disappointed to find that I had to manually enter everything. Would be nice if they had a barcode scanner like some of the other apps. Just takes too long to input items.

title: I'm a big fan
body: I've only been using this app for a few days but am really liking it so far.  It's very user friendly and enables me to keep track of my daily intake of calories, carbs, and fat without much hassle.

title: HELPFUL APP
body: User friendly. When entering foods that I eat regularly; I have to go back and forth. I'd like to see multiple entries at one time. I'm a diabetic; so I have to watch my carbs. New to the app; so I'm still trying to figure out how to use it.

title: Yes!
body: Love this app!

title: Love this app!
body: This app is so easy to use and helps me keep myself on track with my diet. I was surprised to learn how many foods have carbs and it has helped me to lose weight by checking in with it first before just guessing

title: Helpful
body: Very helpful and easy to use app. A nice resource when looking for the carbohydrates and calories of food you eat every day as well as those that are a little more difficult to find.
response: Hey there, thanks so much for the review! Glad you are liking the food finding features. We wanted to check in on your progress -- how is the app working out for you now? We'd love for you to check out the latest version post an update when you can. All the best, Team CM.

title: None
