body: I just uploaded a new version and the load time of the custom items and when you do the item search takes a lot longer time to load than the previous version

title: Mdspk
body: I love this app. It is actually fun to use, and has more good info than I expected. One feature that could be handy is a scanner for nutrition labels, could make adding new things easier. I use this more than angry birds now

title: Easy and intuitive
body: I have used several food trackers and this one is the most useful.

title: Well worth it!
body: Trying out a ketogenic diet, and the Carb Manager has been my best ally. The ability to scan barcodes has been very helpful.

title: Just what I wanted!
body: I wanted a free carb counter. This has some nice extras like the percentage of vitamins and minerals intake and the exercise log, but I like the simplicity. I wish it had a way to copy your favorites so that the items don't hv to be looked up daily.

title: Simple. Effective.
body: If you believe in the effectiveness of recording what you eat before you eat it, and are carb – conscious, then this is a great tool. Simple to use, easily accessible on your phone or tablet, flexibility for any food you may eat.

title: Love this app
body: So helpful on a ketogenic diet.  After writing this review I have now found that there are several things that say they have carbs in them, but don't. I just scanned sugar-free coffee syrup with zero carbs and it's telling me 24 carbs a tablespoon?  Also I don't think a few of the things for the restaurants are right. Need more burgers without buns, etc!

title: Great tracker
body: Great for tracking on a low carb diet - the only one I've found that tracks net carbs. Easy to add custom foods, large database of foods. Also good for logging water and exercise and I like the macro and micro nutrient breakdowns and goal setting features. Highly recommended!

title: Good way to track your carb intake
body: Unlike most diet tracking apps, this app actually lets you track carbohydrates as the primary  measure of your diet. The database of foods is good and you can track your weight in the same app which is nice.

title: Easiest keto app to use
body: It's a good app, I just think some of the functions that are only available in the $40 premium should be included in the original app purchase. Otherwise it's a good app and easy to use.

title: Easy Quick Reference
body: Simple, easy to use, great database. I use it to check carb counts, usually when I am out. I have found a food that is not in the database and you don't need to be online to check. Great app

title: Byzantine but accurate
body: The interface is awkward, clunky, counter intuitive and horribly linked and referenced. That being said, the end product is good; I can see all my carbs and calories, plus see them graphically.

title: Okay, gives carb count, but doesn't have a sufficient food library!
body: This app gives me the info I want, but I have had to input most of the foods I eat.  My Fitness Pal had a lot more foods, but doesn't give the carb count. If there were more foods besides junk (Ho Hos, Krispy something-or-others, and a bunch of pre made stuff) it would be perfect.

title: Like it but needs some desperate fixes
body: Love the tool and it has a long inventory of foods. Only problem is in the Custom Foods section - once you create a custom food, you cannot modify anything about it - not the name or the nutrient contents. That's a bit painful. Wish they would fix that. Otherwise it's a good app amongst all that are there currently.

title: Effective
body: This program helps keep track of not just carbs but general nutrition too. More importantly it helps you to be mindful of what you consume.

title: Wish it had a bar scan feature
body: I like the app but wish it had a bar scan feature like my fitness pal does. So much easier to post foods

title: Great carb tracker
body: I really love this app, it really keeps me on track. It helps me see at a glance not only the total carbs but also how many calories I'm eating every day. This app really helps me stay on track, therefore I would recommend this app for anyone keeping track of their carb, calorie intake.

title: Great For calculating net carbs
body: Most calorie counting apps out there don't calculate net carbs (sugar+starch-dietary fiber= net carbs). Net carbs are the carbs you actually want to be counting as they are responsible for raising blood sugar/ insulin levels. Aim to keep your daily net carbs at 50 grams or less if you want to burn fat off your body :-)

title: Makes a complex task easy!
body: Figures out your macros for you and you can change them if you want. Lists SO many foods and you can add custom foods. You can star your favorite foods like that protein powder you use every day. I LOVE this app. Get it!! It's easy!

title: Reality check!
body: This app provides an accurate portrait of daily carb consumption- for those of us who wonder why the weight isn't coming off, you have found the answer!

title: Excellent App
body: I love this app, I am on Atkins and I downloaded that app and it is not as efficient as this one. I can keep up with everything verses just my carbs. And it has whole lot more foods already programmed versus the other apps.

title: Fine, fine, now dine!
body: This is a very helpful app. I especially like being able to customize my own entry. So far I have had no problems finding any food item I've searched for. I Also appreciate the calculation of the "net" carb being done for me!

title: Inaccuracies
body: I'll give this a little more time but, so far, I've noticed there are no lists for brand name products, and it's cumbersome to add them. Also, I'm unable to make a food item that I've added a favorite.

title: Has everything but...
body: This app is very easy and convenient to use. Be careful of accuracy though. I have often found carb count for foods is very inaccurate. I imagine it's difficult with such a large database of foods. Other than that, I really love the app.

title: Pure Trash
body: Highly upset at the waste of money this has become. $3 for the app, and $20 for yr subscription, and  every single time I open the app it freezes....EVERY SINGLE TIME!  Have tried rebooting and reinstalling...no luck. Wish I would have realized that the last update was 4 months ago...that shows a serious lack of support.  App won't even run long enough for me to try and contact customer support.   I need a refund ASAP.

Love this app!  The only nutritional app that I religiously log all of my meals into every day.  Have used others where the enthusiasm died out in less than a week.  It's very easy to use; don't know what I'd do without it

title: Love this app
body: Great app!  Easy to use. Love the barcode scanner.  It really helps even though there are a vast array of foods with this app.  I would be lost without it!  Really helps control food for diabetics.  Highly recommend this and the related recipe app.

title: Horrible update
body: The previous app was awesome. I loved the favorites tab. That has disappeared. The accuracy of the old app was really spot on. This one I have only used today and already I have found several inaccuracies. Plus the listings aren't nearly as complete. It seemed like every food imaginable, and practically every brand, were listed in the previous app. Well, no longer. I am looking for a new app. This one is worthless.

title: Helpful
body: I use Carb Manager to keep track of my carbs.  It is so easy to misjudge the carb values OK f foods.  So...I learn as I go what foods serve my goals the best.

title: Stay away from latest update
body: I wrote a review blasting the update a couple of weeks ago.  Somehow they fixed it without an upgrade????  Everything that I thought was lost is back and the speed is up about 300%.  My bad!!
response: Hi there, thanks for the note. We pushed a number of updates that makes the app much more user friendly, just like the previous version, plus adds a bunch of new features. I hope you'll check them out and let us know what you think. Thanks!

title: I like it!
body: I agree with #6, 9, and 10. I only have two weeks into this and it really helps track and focus on my weight goal! The search is hard to narrow, so sometimes I guesstimate the values that I think is right and then just get close!

title: Carb killer
body: I love this App.. I've tried others, but I'm hooked on Carb Manager. Easy quick, a lot of the foods I eat. I tracks my sugar sodium fat and calorie in take too. The graphs really help me stay on track....,I recommend it to everyone who asks.

title: Well worth the price
body: I was looking for an app that I could use as a journal and this app fits the bill exactly.  Keeps me on point as to how many net carbs I have taken end and how many I have let.  Thanks

title: I liked it at first, but ...
body: The foods are not organized well at all.  Can you add hash tags to make seek and find easier? For a paid app, it should also have a scanner to input foods.  Check out Weight Watchers for a good example.  Also, why are there so many baby foods? Could that be separated out to make it easier for parents and non-parents to find what they need?

title: Easy to use
body: I love this app. It's so easy to use. I caught on very quickly. Lots of great features. Easy interface to read. If you want a simple yet detailed way to track your carb intake, this app will help you!

title: Don't buy for blood sugar tracking
body: The blood sugar tracking feature is totally useless as it only allows you to track one a day. You can't even enter a time! I requested a refund.

title: Awesome app!
body: I love this app but I just wish that it included sugar alcohols in the tracker as well. It makes me have to count carbs on paper which defeats the purpose of having the app! All in all though, it is a very handy app to have and I love that it has a scan barcode section!

title: Helpful
body: Very helpful app. Easy to keep track of carbs and other dietary items. Needs more commercial entries. But it has been essential to me. Couldn't function without it!

title: Best Keto Tracker!
body: This app is fantastic! I've had it for about a week now and it just keeps getting better! Very intuitive, easy interface, in depth analysis of diet and macros, includes micronutrients counts. Lots of features to help dial in your diet!

title: Very helpful!
body: This app helps me maintain my weight as well as has helped me lose weight. Sometimes I change my choices based on the information the app provides.

title: Disappointed
body: I used the app for about a week. I agree with others that the database is cumbersome to navigate. But the most disappointing experience is I lost my data not once but twice in a week. Poof all gone!! The graph is there with some of my info but all the food entries have vanished. I'm going to try another app that's hopefully more reliable.

title: Finally, a Focus On Carbs
body: A pleasure to use. I much prefer it's usability, database and custom food options over DailyBurn and Live Strong.

title: Best Carb App out there
body: I've tried all the free carb apps and finally bought this one. It was definitely worth it. Could other features be added? Yes, but this app is head and shoulders above the rest.

title: Carb counter
body: I love it. So much easier that writing everything down. I was counting calories but they changed the app since last. I decided to count carbs and found this app. So easy. Thanks

title: Best net carb tracker I've used
body: Love the app!  Not many (good) apps track net carbs. I'm on Atkins and this replaces my pen-and-paper tracking method.  Especially like custom food, favorites, and weight features. I already recommended the app to friends!

title: Pretty good
body: Took a little bit of practice and not always intuitive, but once you learn to navigate this app it's great. Has lots of foods in data bank, and keeps record of carbs, fat and protein.

title: Basic, solid app
body: Carb Manager can break out many nutrients, but its focus is net carbs and it does this well. If you've been using Fitbit, its process will take getting used to. It seems a bit bass-ackward. I'd love it more if you could copy meals to another date or time.

title: Love
body: Best tracker for carbs,fat & protein. Also tracks tons of additional things including water! Wide array of already listed foods but gives you ability to scan or add your own. One of my favorite apps!!

title: Bad service
body: App keeps dropping service. Twice in two weeks. Really not helpful if it only works now and again.
response: Hi Tamra, we're really sorry for the server outage. It was actually one of our cloud providers that went down for about an hour. We'll do everything we can to prevent future outages.

title: Carb mgr easy to navigate
body: As an accountant, my brain thinks linear. CM is easy to get around once you play with it a little while. Lookup is pretty good and the fact that you can look at recent history is great
response: Hi Cookinclay, thanks for the feedback! As software developers, we also think in a linear way -- just like accountants -- and hopefully that has led us to build an intuitive and useful interface. Glad you like the recently viewed, frequently eaten, and favorites view. The idea there is to make food logging as quick as possible. If you have a minute to check out our latest version, we would love your feedback there as well. Thanks and best wishes!

title: Great for Keto diets
body: Love the app. Great for Keto diets as I have to keep my fat intake up as well as keeping carbs down. A little slow on loading your custom food list. Also it doesn't allow for editing custom foods, you have to delete and start all over.

title: Great app
body: I use this app to help me with the Atkins program. It hasn't crashed at all on me. I also like the fact that it counts my calories for me too. I just wish I could create a longer recently used list for foods, or a favorite food/meal list.

title: Life is easier!
body: Thank you for making dieting easy..... I could not do this without the help of Carbmanager.  I would be lost and I'm not talking weight. I tell everyone about this app. Thank you

title: Awesome!
body: I deleted one carb app because the carbs were inaccurate. So far, this app is exactly what I wanted; easy to learn, accurate, and the scan mode makes tracking a lot easier.

title: Love this app
body: This app is so easy to use and is so helpful and meeting your weight-loss goals! Highly recommend! Wanted to lose the last 15 pounds of baby weight. Lost in no time using this app.

title: Made for Ketonians
body: So far so good. I've made of mistakes but I'm learning to maneuver through the app. I wish there were more generic or standard items to choose from. I'd also love the option to select several items to create a standard meal.

title: Paid for product...won't let me log on!
body: App only lets me login to the free app.  I paid the $2 and change and entered my email and password and then it did not let me in.

title: Great for Keto diet!
body: Been using this app to track my net carbs because the scale stoped moving. Turns out, I wasn't counting my carbs right and was over eating. Good news, Im able to track net carbs better now and Im losing weight again! 👍🏼

title: Very Useful
body: Got this app to track carbs. It has been a helpful and informative tool for me.

title: Love Carb Manager
body: I love the simplicity to enter all the food I'm eating and having throughout the day. Especially the favorites section since I'm a person to have similar items weekly.
response: Hi Danielle, thank you for the great review! Simplicity is what we strive for! How have things been going with the app recently? We would love an update on your progress, and also for you to check out the latest version. All the best, Team CM.

title: Used with my insulin pump
body: Helps me maintain better diabetes control with my insulin pump. would like to see more restaurant listings. Lost all of my log data for several months and my favorite list.

title: Love it
body: I recently was diagnosed with type two diabetes. I love this app because it makes it so easy to track the carbs and sugar's I'm eating. I would love it if there was a way to put in my blood sugar levels on a daily basis also but otherwise love this app!!

title: Awesome app
body: It is really fantastic. Especially since they went back to the previous version!!! The newest update was horrible. Thanks for going back. Great for following carbs on my ketogenic way of life.

title: Meh
body: This app is like going to a strip club and only tipping the waitress. You will see lots of good features but you won't be able to access them. If you need help with ketosis and ketogenic dieting this app and diet plan will be great. If you are advanced and don't need, want, or desire another $40 out of your pocket; and don't need another book to throw at your neighbor.  Don't get this app.

title: Love it!
body: Really love this app. I used to use MFP but when I started my ketogenic diet, I needed something to track my net carbs. This is exactly what I was looking for and I'm so happy I found it! I would definitely recommend.

title: Makes tracking carbs easy
body: Very helpful in tracking carbs. It's not a perfect app, like sometimes the carb count of packaged foods is off.  But it's easy to adjust your portion to log it correctly.

title: Keeps crashing
body: I liked this ap! I feel like it has exactly what I've been looking for, until today- every time I attempt to log a new food, it boots me out without logging a thing! I only paid for the $2.99 version, but nonetheless I PAID for it to work. Please fix!?

title: Loved app ....until now 👎🏻
body: I have used this app for about 2 yrs was great until the update now. It keeps shutting off when u try to log my meals, I have contacted for help no response.

title: Want the old interface back
body: I don't like the update at all. The old one was much cleaner and easier to use. Not picking up my exercise from Fitbit and haven't been able to manually load exercise. I tried to edit a food item and nothing happened. Either fix it or bring back the old interface!
response: Hi LBJ, please give it another whirl now, as we're back online. FYI, you can switch back to the pie chart / progress bar by going to Settings -> Progress Wheel and turning it off there. Thanks!

title: Everything I need
body: This app keeps track of total carbs and net carbs, fiber, fat, protein, snacks, supplements, exercise and more. I love being able to scan my product and add it to meal. I'm hoping the food list grows.
response: Hey NinnieT, thanks for the feedback! We're working everyday on expanding the food list -- it's already the most comprehensive available, and is only getting better. If you have a minute, would you check out the latest version and let us know what you think? Many thanks!

title: Good start - pls update
body: I used My Fitness Pal in the past for watching calories, and it had a lot of qualities I miss here. It was much easier to find foods, the graph could show different amounts of time (from a week to entire length of diet), and you could access all of your info at a website. Some or all of these changes would be awesome!

title: With upgrades they'll get 5
body: Like everyone said, it's great but needs more food choices & bar scan. Or better yet cut a deal with Calorie Count and merge. They do all the stuff this app doesn't...has national foods, grocery foods, and bar scan.

title: CARB MANAGER
body: I love it, but sometimes it doesnt add the carbs correct.  it shows 5 carbs for lunch, 6 for dinner and total carbs are 12 for the day as an example. Also, the food search choices are kinda hit or miss if you find your food. But other than that, i love it.

title: Barcode scanner
body: I'm so glad this app has a barcode scanner. I love all the options to track your measurements and the upgraded account features.

title: Not Ideal
body: How can you not have a common food like

title: One of the best Keto apps!
body: I have tried most of the low carb apps, I love this one because not only can I set my own macros but also many other nutrients and water. It helps keep me accountable and watch my net carb intake with a number that shows on my wallpaper so I know exactly the number I have left.

title: Love the app!
body: This is a great app. I'm a carboholic, so I really need to keep track of my carbs. It's easy to use. I haven't paid for the upgrade, but it looks good so someone who's super serious about keeping track.

title: Easy to use
body: Fast food tracking and easy to use. I like how it counts down and marks the app so I can see without opening it how many carbs are left for the day.

title: Great!
body: This app is great and fast. I wish they had more fruits and veggies in the raw form. As it is now you have to pick a fruit/veggie by restaurant or name brand. Really hard to find avocado. Over all it's great and totally worth the $2.99 :-)

title: Newbie
body: Just started using this app and I really like it. My daughter and I are competing to see who can eat the healthiest over the next month.

title: Love this app!
body: Has helped me better manage fat to protein ratio in addition to managing carbs. Sometimes custom food entry fields are not responsive to touch and have to wait a few seconds between fields.

title: Carb Manager
body: This is a nice app, much better than the Atkins one that I tried!  Searching some times is a slow process due to too many variations of foods but after a week, I' m getting the hang of short cuts and favorites.

title: Looks Great-Completely Unusable
body: Can't get the app to not lock up and/or crash within 5 seconds of opening. Appears to lock up when syncing to the $20/year service. Maybe the app works without syncing, but if you want Health app integration it requires the subscription.

title: Love it!
body: Have used app for 15 days. Easy to track carbs. Food lookup list is sometimes too extensive, but that's better than too small.

title: Love this app, but...
body: Love everything about this app. I love the Apple Watch features too. However, I wish that it would include the ability to sync with my Apple Watch activity.

title: Great Ap!
body: Easy to use! This Ap is very accurate when comparing to food labels, and it has lots of quantity options. Have recommended it to lots of friends, even a dietician!

title: Found a problem
body: Love this app. In the first day using it I found the biggest culprit to my weight gain. I've scanned a barcode and searched for foods and found them with no fail

title: Awful and Frustrating
body: I just downloaded this app and I am SO disappointed. The search function for food is atrocious. I've been searching for "burger no bun" for 10 minutes but you have to write it out specifically the way hey have it written otherwise you scroll through hundreds of options to no avail. Waste of money and extremely frustrating.

title: Great App But New Update Not Good
body: The app was really good as it was. The new update is confusing not to mentioned that has some bugs that need to be fixed. I tried to add some food info to the daily log and is not recognizing the nutrition facts and other infos. :'(

title: Latest version is SLOW - do not purchase
body: It's a shame when an app is "improved" and then becomes unusable.  It appears latest version seeks an internet connection upon opening.  Which if one is not available - never opens (I gave up after > 1 min).  Even if one is available, I've seen the app take 15-20secs to open regularly.  BAD BAD BAD.  Can not recommend anymore.  Do not download!!!
response: Hi there, we made some updates that should make loading time much, much faster after the first load. Please give them a try. Thanks!

title: So useful!!!
body: I have a one year old and have been using this app to keep track of what I'm eating and lose the baby weight. So far - ten pounds off! It's easy to use and I love the graphs.

title: Good, not great app
body: I like a lot of the features of this app. Especially that you can create foods from recipes, but there's no way to repeat a meal--like eating the same breakfast a couple of days in a row. All the foods have to be entered in each day. And the lists of food are long to scroll through.

title: Ok but buggy... Needs work
body: It's an ok app. The UI is somewhat cumbersome. There are bugs in the nutrition information Cod for example has a very high sodium and net carb value for raw Cod!!!!  Need facility to modify/edit custom food entries in case error was made during entry. Only option now is to delete an reenter!!

title: Ok but could be great if...
body: Need to alphabetize listings. Searching for particular food is very tedious. Create a module to show total carbs (gross) along with net carbs. Many dietitians develop plans for carbs without subtracting fiber. Subtracting fiber is only useful if the measure is over 5 grams of fiber per serving. Good app for logging daily food consumption. Add search in favorites. Add a scanner!

title: not too bad..
body: instead of calorie counting, I've moved into a more low carb approach… previously i used live strong for my calorie counting… this app does move smoothly.. but i wish they had more of search selection and could sync between my iPad app… def needs an update..but good for now..

title: It's great!
body: I love this app. I paid the annual premium for link with my other apps and not finding that working too well,  but otherwise, it's doing everything I want.

title: Needs work.
body: Ok for basic tracking. C+ on app design. Rather cumbersome as you are required to go back and forth. Needs reports for snapshot of week, month, ytd to see overall progress. Also would be nice to be able to track daily weight progress.

title: Where'd everyone go?
body: You send customer service a message and you never hear back. Radio silence. What kind of company does that? And wouldn't one think that you would have listed low-carb tortillas on an app that specializes in low carbs?

title: Love it
body: I love the update I now feel I can let go of recipe builder and just use this one app it brings in Fitbit and I can log all my other crazy activities like housework lol. Thanks for great update.

title: Love it
body: I love this app for counting carbs, fiber, fat & calories. I did upgrade (it was like $2.99) because you're limited to 5 entries a day otherwise but that's a small price to pay for such a great app.

title: Very helpful!!
body: Got this after reading reviews and  I have not been dissappointed! Many options of specific food items and  food chains . Love the graph of daily carb intake.

title: Nice tracker
body: This definitely is a good tracking tool and has a nice display to it. The food finder can be cumbersome to use, but the custom food option is also helpful. I use it to not only track carbs, but dietary intake of calories, protein, fats, and more.

title: Excellent App
body: Easy to use, very intuitive. I have lost 60 pounds in four months using this application and paying attention. Recommended highly.

title: Nice app
body: I like the app. It has it's glitches. If you spell a word wrong unlike your iPhone the app doesn't search for any that are close to the word. Some of the items I know have no carbs the app adds some in? No sure why.

title: Tells it like it is
body: I was wondering why I wasn't getting the desired results then I used the Bar scan... Explains a lot! Better to know the truth so I can meet my goal.

title: Carb Manager
body: Great App very easy to use! Scanner works great and so far all but one or 2 food items I use are scannable! Keeps up with carbs, fat, calories and protein for each meal as well as for the day

title: Best app for low carb!
body: Just started a Keto diet and this app was essential.  I tried them all and it's the most efficient and it's really easy to see what's going on so I can correlate being in and out of Ketosis to what I ate.  Awesome.

title: Pretty good app
body: Worth the money spent to keep track of calories and carbs. Pretty user friendly. A help menu with some explanation on functions would be nice. Even if you don't upgrade it is still a functional app.

title: Love it!
body: This is so easy to use. I love that I can track my carbs, proteins, calories, etc. You can even scan the barcodes to enter your info. Great app! Highly recommended.

title: Exceptional
body: I've used Carb Manager every day for more than two years and it is a marvel at assisting in controlling calories and carbs.  Go "premium" and it syncs perfectly across all your devices.

title: Great app Overall
body: Would be very helpful if app. Included low carb listings for items like burgers without the bread or list menu item ingredients separately for better calculating. Need to be able to edit custom made entry. Great app overall.

title: Calculations
body: When I enter my own nutritional facts the net grams that appears for the item of food is completely off! I decided to play with the app since I just purchased it and I wanted to know exactly how it worked. So I entered in the nutritional facts from an Atkins bar that I have and it kept coming up as having 12g net carbs when in fact it only has 2g net carbs!! I wish I could get my money back!

title: Food browser confusing
body: When you browse the vegetable category it list non beef and a variety of non-vegetable items

title: Love it
body: I actually downloaded this app and my fitness pal and like this one the best! It's easy to log everything and makes things super convenient!

title: Excellent App!
body: Perfect for my needs. I am currently doing a high fat diet, so the chart (by day and by food) that shows what the percentage breakdown of carb/fat/protein, is super useful. Also love the favorites and custom food options.

title: Best carb program!
body: I recently was diagnosed with diabetes. This program is a godsend! With this program, I was able to manage my diabetes with diet and a little exercise and I've gotten 100% away from insulin and 99% off the The oral meds. I'm thrilled!

title: Crazy bugs after updates!
body: Why in the world do I always lose information every time you update this app? I'm sick of seeing foods that I save all of a sudden be listed as "null" and all of the information I entered just disappears. Seriously, an Atkins Caramel Nut Bar is now "null?" You all need to stop messing with this app. I feel like I was ripped off now.

title: Good app for quick and accurate trackkng
body: Great app. The developers also VERY Responsive. Twice I have ask question , got an answer in 1 business day. Can't beat that.

title: Easy to use!
body: So far, so great. Easy to use. Easy to look items up. Just takes a few moments a few times a day to track my carbs, protein, and fat.

title: Great app!
body: I love all the features, the only thing I would like to see added is the ability to edit or a delete a recipe that I add once it is saved.
response: Hi there, thanks for the great feedback! To edit or delete a recipe once created, please tap the little vertical ... button next to the recipe in the recipe list, then tap Edit. Viola! Hope this helps! If you have a minute, would you consider checking out the latest version and letting us know what you think? Many thanks!

title: Fairly Good
body: Since it is new, I am sure changes will be made. Need to be able to copy meals. The feature to add food to the future days is good, but would be nice to see the log of future days once food added.

title: Great Help
body: I really love this AP. I downloaded the Atkins one and immediately hated it. This AP, however is easy to use and gives you the option of adding your own foods.

title: Needs a scanner
body: This app overall is easy to use and it's very good for tracking carbs. However it's hard to find some of the foods I eat using the search feature. It would be the perfect app if it allowed you to scan bar codes.

title: Easy to use
body: Love this app - has really helped me with jump starting my low carb diet. Would love to be able to also track my weight.

title: Angry
body: I WOULD LIKE MY MONEY BACK. I was promised 2 other apps in a bundle and did not decisive them. Also the stats are wrong on this app. Reported protein count for chicken as being 3x's higher than it actually is. 😡

title: I like it but...
body: Newbie with the net carbs, so this app was a big help knowing & tracking what I eat.

title: Good app easy to use
body: So far I like it a lot. Wish the recipes feature wasn't available only to those who upgrade

title: Love this app
body: This app is so convenient and helps me keep a journal of all my health fitness, carbs, sleep, water intake, & more. Now if I could just receive feedback on how to sync my Fitbit with the app I will be happy as a clam!

title: Best I've Seen
body: I've used too many nutrition counters to count over the years and this is the best by far. I especially appreciate its focus on low-carb dieting and ease of data entry.

title: Great app
body: Use it daily, couldn't be happier. Fantastic. Hope it becomes even better over time with further development of their food database.

title: MM
body: This is the best no-carb app out there. You can search foods, track your consumption and even breakdown high carb foods for small quantity "tastes". There is nothing I can think of that this app is missing.

title: Almost 5 Star +
body: I would of liked to of had a place to add my blood sugar readings and be able to graph them for, breakfest, lunch, dinner, snack and average for the day. Still the best carb counter I have found.

title: Five stars
body: This app "does what it says on the box" which is exactly what I need. The premium features look great, but for now the standard version is more than adequate. Great app.

title: Extremely helpful!  Very user friendly!
body: Love this app!  The barcode scanner is particularly fantastic and the food database while unwieldy at times is still well populated.

title: Love this app!
body: I am watching my carb level during my pregnancy and this has been a huge help! I love that I can set goals and change them at anytime. This is also super helpful as I can export it for my Dr at anytime as well.

title: Great App!!
body: Easy to use and lets me see my daily intake by grams or %... Would be nice though if they could add a space to put my blood sugar readings with the meals (like before or after breakfast, lunch, dinner)...

title: Beware! Bait and Switch!
body: I just purchased this app for the listed price and went to sync my Apple Watch... apparently the ability to sync fitness devices and do anything constructive with the app is an additional monthly subscription.

title: New interface is terrible
body: This used to be a great yet simple app to track carbs.  Now it is overwhelming confusing and hard to navigate. This app more and more is pushing you to subscribe to the premium service which is too pricey for what they are offering.
response: Hi Kranberee, thanks for the feedback. To switch back to the pie chart / progress bar layout, please go to Settings -> Progress Wheel and switch it off. Hope that helps!

title: Excellent until the update
body: I've used this app for 2 months and loved it. It keeps me on track with my carbs, protein, fats & calories. It also calculates nutrients! Very helpful doing Keto.

title: Lifeline
body: This is the cats Meow. It's all done right here for the right price. Life change ko problem keeping track with this. Easy as pushing the microphone icons. The app really does all the work.
response: Hey there, this is simply awesome feedback - thank you! Makes our day to hear that you are loving it, especially the voice logging feature. How are things going lately? We'd love to hear an update on your progress. Please download the latest version and let us know! Thanks and best wishes, Team CM.

title: Good Tracking Tool
body: App is good for tracking. It does lack a number of features that would be beneficial. Lacks some editing features if you need to change specifics of a food

title: I would like a refund
body: just bought the app only to find out the database only included generic foods and not the brands I typically eat...first thing I tried to put in was a whey protein powder that I used in my morning smoothie (Tera's Whey) and I had to manually input the nutrition info. totally inconvenient, I won't be using the app and will ask for a refund!

title: Just what I needed!
body: This is a great app, live the pie chart for my daily goals. I also love the barcode scanner. I do wish lists were in alphabetical order though.

title: Highly recommend it!!
body: I love how I can look up food at restaurants and at grocery stores. I also love how I can see my daily fat as well.

title: LOVE!!
body: I really love this app. I used it previously when I was trying a low carb diet. Just recently I've become Vegan (high carb, low fat). I still use this app because I prefer it to Fitness Pal.

title: Upgrade chaos
body: So we're not back to the  original program (sort of) after the chaos of the last week of updates.  Great except I lost my favorites list three times. Who green-lighted this debacle?

title: Review
body: I really like the app. It tracks my carbs and I can scan my food. It lets me out in my exercises. I wish it would tell me easy fast carb free foods and tell me if I'm eating too much fats.

title: Great app!!
body: This is awesome. After all the one that are worried about only calories and fat, I love that this one breaks it down by percentage of all. Also, the scanner is terrific!! Completely worth it!!

title: Easy
body: Love being able to scan everything.

title: Easy to work with!
body: Took me A little bit of time to figure the app out, but now it's so easy to work with! And I really need this kind of help to stay in ketosis.

title: Needs better search
body: The search engine needs to be more user friendly and not OR the terms together, it should AND them, or at least give the option to do so. Searches pull tons of unrelated items you must scroll and scroll and scroll through.

title: Ok app
body: It's actually better than my first review indicates. Getting easier to use. Definitely better and easier than the Atkins app. Would definitely recommend .

title: Don't like the program
body: I don't like the search feature. It is a "key word" search and is very imprecise.  Just try looking up Almond Milk, a product in every grocery store.  You will get page after page of almond chocolate candy bars or other items containing almonds but not almond milk. This is often the case when searching. It it unproductive and silly

title: Awesome App!
body: Way better than the Atkins app. Searching for food is easier and it has more food options to search for. Love it!

title: Nice App with a BIG database
body: This app has many more foods and other items than any other database/tracker I've used. I really get the big and small picture of my diet with it. Well done!

title: Great!
body: Exceptional app. This is an easy, and highly effective, way to monitor your diet. For the first time since being diagnosed with diabetes, I feel that I'm really in control.

title: Ok, so far.
body: I just started using this app and getting to know how to navigate the many capabilities it has to offer. So far, I am very pleased with its multi-faceted availability. Thank you for making this app available.

title: #MyFavCarbTracker
body: This AP is so user friendly, even for the techno challenged. I love the data base of food they have as well! You won't be disappointed with this carb tracker.

title: Makes tracking carbs EASY
body: Love this app! I think it's the easiest to use for tracking carbs. I can always easily find my foods to add to my daily total.

title: Great app
body: Takes a few to figure everything out but once you do it is a great tool for tracking your nutrition.

title: Everything is GONE!
body: Weeks of data and custom foods disappeared with the current update.  I don't like the app enough to take my chances on losing more data.

title: Love it....but....
body: Currently on Adkins week four, this APP  has made it so easy to stay on track. Used for three weeks so far, easy and accurate numbers. Now, can I export the info to a PDF report....

title: Good Ap.....but
body: Needs a better food base, can't find so any things such as uncured franks or gluten free products. Have to enter a lot as custom. I do love that it nets the carbs. Overall it's a good ap that could be great.

title: Issues after update... REVISED
body: I love this app.., makes my life easier.  I have tried most of the other carb counters out there, this one would be 5 star if more bar codes were added.  Lots of 'no matches' found on name brand foods.. PS.... AWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICE!!

title: One day in and pretty happy
body: So far so good. The only inconvenience (can't call it a challenge) is searching for food items.  Putting in the ingredients for a breakfast sandwich for example or an unwich at Jimmy John's. But otherwise 👍👍

title: Very useful!
body: Absolutely love the pie charts and ability to see the percentages of fat / protein / carbs one is eating.  Would love just a few tweaks to make it even more user friendly but overall it's an excellent tool to aid in carb counting.

title: Great, works like a charm
body: Love it. Brand new to the whole low carb thing, so I definitely needed help knowing what's what. Makes it really easy to count carbs, down 4lbs in one week.

title: Love it!
body: It was a little glitchy after the update, but seems to be functioning well now. Adding foods is more efficient. This app is great for my lifestyle!

title: Excellent customer service
body: After voicing a concern the team was quick to respond and helpful in explanation. Their response was very much appreciated.
response: Hi there, we're sorry for the problem! This is a bug, and we'll fix it shortly. As you mentioned, the Apple Watch app does work, but it's not currently syncing with the app. It will not require a Premium subscription when working. In the meantime, we'll help you get this sorted.

title: It WAS great
body: Until the July 5th update. First it erased all my foods and data. then I found it unnecessarily complicated. The original format was just fine, now it takes more steps to do everything, they just added more crap just to say they improved it. I won't be using it any more for anything except looking up carb content in foods. What a shame.

title: Net carbcount calc wrong in calendar view
body: Easy fix. Hope admins can solve and update. Calendar view shows total carbs instead of net so don't have a fit when you see the percentages!

title: The best
body: Not only does it count carbs, it counts calories and other macronutrients, vitamins and minerals.  Works  for any diet!

title: Very useful and easy to use
body: When I embarked on a kerogenic diet I needed a good way to track my net carbs. This app has been killer at keeping me on track. I recommend it.

title: Very Accurate!
body: Easy to use and so accurate! It's wonderful to be able to just enter the foods I ate while the app does all the calculations for me.... Good job on this app! Maybe add the ability to scan food labels?

title: Easy, easy, easy
body: For busy guy, this app makes it so easy to control carbs and calories.  I spend just a few seconds and done.  It's the best ever.

title: New at the carb counting
body: Never thought I would be one to count/measure anything I eat but now I am and this app makes it easy to do that.

title: Carb manager
body: This has been a life saver!

title: Best Carb App around
body: This carb app is not for CICO, not for low fat dieters--but it is a godsend for keto-ers like myself. Cannot recommend highly enough...love the interface and good directory keeps getting better
response: Hi Maggie, thank you for the note. Absolutely - this app is designed specifically for the needs of low carb and keto dieters. We've been around for almost 7 years, in and that time have learned exactly what keto-ers need to optimize their lifestyle. If you have a minute to check out our latest version (6.0.1), we'd love your feedback on it as well. Best wishes on your keto journey!

title: Winner
body: Carb manager has helped me lose 86 lbs. I love it. And the update is great, even though it took me a minute to relearn it. I do wish there were more restaurant choices, such as Chick-fil-A choices.
response: Hi there - wow, 86 lbs! Congratulations on your fantastic success with Carb Manager. Way to go! It makes our day to hear about people who have really changed their lives with our app.

title: Obsessed
body: I love this app. It has made my ketogenic journey so much easier. I fully plan on continuous use of this app and I tell everyone starting the ketogenic diet to use it.
response: Thank you for using Carb Manager! I'm really glad to hear that it's been helping you on your ketogenic journey. That's our mission. If you get a chance to check out our latest version, 6.0.1, we would love your feedback. Many thanks and best wishes!

title: Not Ready for Prime Time
body: The app is just "OK."  It needs a lot of work and redesign. e.g. Type in "bacon" and you don't get plain old fried bacon, instead you have to select "bacon or side pork, cooked," which is way down the list.  Just try to find a hamburger with no bun on the list of foods. This is a reduced carb tracker after all. I want my money back.

title: Don't buy!!!!!!!!!
body: Crap for low carb dieters. Can't find anything that is usually eaton on low carb. Takes forever to find something

title: Easy tracking app
body: Common foods could be a little easier to find. Otherwise it's perfect!

title: Works
body: Only had this for a few days but I really like it ! Easy to use and what isn't in a look up can be entered manually! Thanks Much.....Lee

title: Stupid update
body: The app was great and worked amazing before the update. Now it's slow and glitchy, and doesn't work correctly. Very disappointed. Why ruin such a great app?

title: So easy to use!
body: I've tried several nutritional apps and this is by far the easiest to log my food.

title: Very useful
body: Help me balance my husband's diet. Wonderful as far as common American food. Should be updated to include more ethnic food, such as red rice, green rice... some of which are produced locally by the Lundberg's farm for example.

title: The update is buggy
body: I can't get any foods to add to the log and stay. So much slower. Not sure this was ready for release.
response: Hi there, sorry for the problem! We had a server outage, but everything is working now!

title: So good
body: I've used so many food tracking apps to track my carbs and this is hands down the best. I'm a pediatric NP and will recommend this to my patients!
response: Hi Amanda, thank you for the note and the recommendations! We strive to make this the absolute best carb counter available, with the largest database and the most powerful yet easy-to-use carb logging features. We wanted to wish you the best on your low carb journey! And please check out the latest version if you get a chance and send your feedback. Thanks!

title: Love this app!
body: Makes keto a breeze, tracking weight measurements etc...it has everything you need to be successful! Couldn't keto without it!
response: Hey there, glad the app is working well for you with your keto lifestyle -- that's what we love to hear! Just wanted to check in and see how things are going. Would you consider checking out the latest version if you get a chance? We'd love to hear you feedback. All the best, Team CM.

title: Simply works
body: This is a great app. Works simply and easily keeps track of everything you need

title: OK. Somewhat cumbersome.
body: Works OK. However the interface in somewhat cumbersome and the look up lacks a good deal of common food. Abbreviations in the food types also complicates matters. You may want to spend a bit more for an app that is more user friendly.

title: Awesome
body: This app is easy to use and has worked well for me. Wish there were a way to edit all of a foods information though so you don't have to delete and start over if you've messed up.

title: Love it!
body: Have been using it now over 6 months. Love the updated version! Wish it had a scan database like My Fitness Pal. Also wish it would talk with other programs, e.g., Body Media.

title: Great app!!
body: This is a perfect app for me because it helps me keep a record of my food and know that my macronutrients are still balanced at the end of the day.

title: Needs work
body: If it takes 20 minutes to log a meal then forget it. The search engine is stupid, I selected green vegetables and alcohol and beef franks came up. Also a lot of brands are not listed. The measurements for food are also weird, the number comes up but doesn't say what qty it's based on,, dumping it.

title: Retiree
body: I just started a ketogenic diet.  It is very low carb - high fat diet.  This tracker program really makes it easy to track my proteins, fat and carbs.  It is by far the best tracker I have used.

title: Search is terrible
body: First off having to pay for an app then pay again to have it connect with Apple health? No! Also the search function is a pain. The most basic search requires a ton of research. All I wanted was to enter plain old coffee with nothing in it! I really wish I could have my money back on this. I'm deleting the app

title: Perfect for Low Carb diet
body: This is exactly the app I was looking for. It's easy to use and the layout is excellent. My wife and I both use and enjoy comparing our pie charts.

title: Loving this app
body: I really appreciate that there are several options for serving sizes/amounts on the foods. So far I haven't found anything that isn't in the database.

title: carbolicious!!!
body: This is a great and easy program for letting you track what you eat. the graphs allow you to see the % of protein,carbs and fat.

title: Great app
body: I love this app i would like to see better the total calories is kinda small any with white letters but i am with ios 6

title: Love This!!!
body: Counting carbs is easy with this app!! Love the food scan feature. Now if they'd just add a recipe builder with a scan feature it would be complete!!!

title: Love app.
body: Love the app. easy to use once you figure it out.

title: Almost perfect
body: Well worth the purchase.  Some improvements needed like most recent foods is a must.  Better did search options needed as well.

title: Crashes every time
body: Ever since the update all this app did was slow down and now it crashes continuously. It's very annoying because I depend on this appt to help me out throughout the day with tracking. I've even erased it and downloaded it again and it 5 minutes later dos the same thing. Please fix it. Soon

title: Awesome
body: Loving the feature of the bar scanning. It makes it so easy to enter data. Perfect for low carbs tracking.

title: Super helpful!
body: I love this app. I am not using it to lose weight but just to eat more healthy and gain some tone. This app is very easy to use and so informative!

title: Carb/Calorie Counter
body: I really like this app. I am not really tech savvy and It is easy for me to use. It keeps me honest with myself. I took one star off because some of the food measuring units are not applicable to the food they measure.

title: Great app
body: I was using Myfitnesspal in the past, but really needed to focus on my carb intake do to being on a Keto diet. This app is so simple and easy. I absolutely love it and will not go back to Myfitnesspal.

title: So easy to use
body: Just tried the Atkins carb counter and it was terrible. This is a dream. I got it right from the first second of using it.

title: Carb counter's awesome
body: Having been recently diagnosed with diabetes i needed to change my diet quickly.  The carb counter played an instrumental role in turning my life around.

title: Tracks daily totals
body: Love this app. Love being able to track carb daily totals. Wish the database was a little easier to interact with. Also wish it was a little more populated.

title: Wrong net carbs
body: This app is supposed to count net carbs but it doesn't count them correctly. It should subtract fiber AND sugar alcohols from the total carbohydrates but it only subtracts the fiber. So any Atkins treats, which primarily use sugar alcohols to sweeten the products are not calculated correctly. It would be great if it weren't for that. Sine that was the main reason I purchased the app I was highly disappointed.

title: Love it!!
body: I'm trying to keep net carbs down to 15 in a 6 hour period. Not only can I track, search foods but I can add my own recipes. Its exactly what I needed.

title: App is so helpful
body: I love seeing my percentages ... making sure I am 75-80% fat with my calories is important and I love a big graph that shows me that!

title: Amazing!
body: This app is more amazing than I could have ever dreamed of! Calculates every nutritional value with the scan of a barcode! Worth far more than $3!

title: What a bargain
body: This app sure does make things easier. Far superior to any other counting app I've tried.

title: Update Bug
body: This new update hangs on "Upgrading Database".

title: Love
body: I love this app.  Helps me track my macros on a daily basis.  It also allows you to create certain go to meals and stores it for future use. Awesome app!
response: Hey there, thanks so much for the stars! Glad you are loving the app. How are you doing with lately? We'd love to hear an update on your progress. Please also check out the latest version and let us know what you think! All the best, Team CM.

title: Awesome app
body: I love this app! I use it daily.  My only problem is searching for foods. The lists are so long it's difficult to find specific foods.

title: The worst food search feature I've ever seen.
body: I tried to add sugar snap peas--eaten raw-- to my tracker. What I encountered when I searched for that was dozens of custom entries in which peas were AN ingredient among many, cooked peas (from fresh, from frozen, with fat, without fat), etc. Could I find the most basic, unadulterated vegetable itself? No.

title: Good tracker, a little worky to use
body: I used this tracker to lose about 20 lbs a couple years ago; now back on it. Works ok, but entry seems a little laborious.

title: Very helpful app! Love it!
body: Easy to use, large database, scan option, customizable food option. Great app with pie chart for macros. Very helpful to my keto journey.

title: Wish premium was more affordable
body: Otherwise my wife and I love the app helps us with our goal and makes you more diligent about what you are eating and drinking.

title: Easy to use
body: Very easy to use. Love the scanner feature. Has picked up everything I scan. So easy to use!

title: Like the idea
body: However after paying 3$ and then realizing it has a limited library of food. I was not happy. I'm used to using MyFitnessPal but like the idea of net carbs front and center. However I tried to search and log a quarter pounder with cheese no bun or ketchup and it's not there. The quarter pounder is there but so are all the carbs with no way to edit it. Pass for me.

title: Easy to use
body: I like that I can see my options of types of food to eat to make the right decision.

title: Good but can't figure out how to log exercise
body: I like this app- but kinda wish I hadn't upgraded.  I can't find how to log exercise.  I'd love to link to my Fitbit.

title: The best
body: This application is the best for tracking carbs and nutritional information I have ever had, and I have tried several.
response: Hi Dutchiss, thank you so much for the review. We're glad you're liking the app! It's our mission to be the best carb tracking solution on the market. If you have a minute to check out our latest version, we'd love your feedback on it as well. Thanks!

title: GREAT APP!
body: This is a fantastic app. It has helped me immensely with my diet. In fact, I'd be lost without it. I highly recommend this to anyone seriously considering a weight loss venture.

title: Just OK
body: Interface for adding foods and viewing a day's inputs is great.  Buggy: calendar view drops data; that data can still be seen on the graphs - need to fix!  BUT -worst of all - there is no online Help!  And no way to reach the support email address - it's not displayed anywhere.

title: Very useful
body: I found the app incredibly helpful. Sometimes tricky to sort through all the listed foods to choose the right one, but over all terrific.

title: Doesn't have ATKINS products in food options!!!
body: Gave this app about 5 minutes. When I realized I couldn't log Atkins items, such as the shakes or bars, I was instantly wishing I did not pay for this app. Come on, don't you think carb counters might be on Atkins???? Probably useful for regular dieters. But this is not a "No/low carb" logging system. How do I get a refund?

title: Great for carbs, but not user-friendly
body: I like this app for tracking carbs, but the pre-loaded food choices are ridiculous. It needs a way for tracking sugar alcohols and subtracting them from total carbs, and landscape support would be good.

title: User friendly
body: This app has really helped me stay on track with carbs.  Also keeps track of proteins, fiber, fats and calories which help when you plateau.

title: Needs suggestions for amendment
body: Scanned Hershey's sugar free chocolate chips and they are not accounting for the sugar alcohol so the carb count is off, give us an option for change suggestions. Otherwise, it's a great app!

title: Awesome!
body: Works great! Has helped me lose weight in the last several weeks by tracking my carb and calorie intake!

title: Great starter app!
body: I am just getting started on a keto diet and this app has helped tremendously! I love getting a visual on what I'm eating so I can judge how my day is going or has gone.

title: Disappointed!
body: I used this app for a short time this winter. It was amazing! It was easy to navigate, functional, and met all my needs. I was excited to start using it again and am
response: Hi there, we're sorry for the problem yesterday. We had a server outage, but we're back online now!

title: Needs cloud storage
body: I like the app a lot, but have I missed something or is there no way to connect my data on iPad and iPhone? BIG missed opportunity, guys.

title: disappointed
body: hard to find foods in search.  would be nice if one could scan barcode with iPhone as i can with MyfitnessPal

title: Love it!!
body: Just got it. Love this ap. wish it had a bar scan feature to make it easier and a broader menu to look foods up. Still love it!!

title: Great tool
body: This is an easy to use app that is helping me lower my boos sugar. I've had noticeable results in less than a week.

title: Great app for controlling carbs
body: This app has helped me lose 30 lbs and improve my blood work numbers all in three months

title: Works great
body: I really like this app. I didn't like that I had to purchas separate apps for my iPhone and iPad. So far it's working very well

title: Works great
body: This app works great. Only thing I don't like is it doesn't list your foods in alphabetical order, other than that I'm glad I purchased it

title: Ms
body: I've researched all of the other apps and like this one best: The format is clear and concise and I love the 'custom foods', and the portion choices.  Please don't change it ... it's perfect!! 😊

title: Extensive list of foods
body: Including restaurant meals and the capability to set up and save favorites is outstanding when following a lifestyle like this.

title: Very helpful
body: Gets the job done easier than most.

title: Awesome app
body: I'm on the Atkins diet and this app is perfect down side is a lot of the food carb count in the food isn't rite but that's where the custom food comes in it's great I love it !!!!!!

title: Love this app.
body: The thing I like most is that it also keeps track of protein, fat and calories. It's easy to use.

title: Just Average
body: The way the food selections are organized is counterintuitive and therefore it takes way too long to find my food of choice .... AND when i finally do ....  the carbs in the app dont match the carbs on the food labels.  You really have to enter in ur own foods from scratch.

title: An app worth paying for!
body: It works well and dose all I need to count carbs. One of only 3 apps I've ever payed for and the only one that was worth it!

title: Great Concept, Horrible Food Catalog
body: The product is great... If you like entering every single it you eat individually, that is.

title: Very easy to use
body: This ap is extremely easy to use and helpful in managing a low carb diet.

title: No bad
body: This isn't a bad app. but it is not 100% accurate when counting net carbs of packaged food. It doesn't figure in sugar alcohol in sugar free or diet food such as Atkins products. Tried saying a treat bar was 10 net carbs when it was actually only 3 per the box.

title: Great concept but carb counts not right
body: Great app for starting my Keto diet however carb counts in some foods are wrong, which is important for a diet. Some of the foods in this app have at least 5g net carbs more than what they actually have when reading the nutrition label. Kind of a big inaccuracy when doing a low carb diet...

title: Very accurate
body: This helps track my food and carbs so accurately !!! Makes following my keto plan so much easier 👌🏽

title: So Far So Good
body: I've only been using the app for 3 days but it has been easy to use and every food I've looked for has been in the app. That's a winner in my book!

title: Great application!
body: Love this application! It does a lot of things. I can track everything I eat. Wish that It had a place to add exercise. That would help out tremendously.

title: Erases data when you travel!
body: If you travel a lot, don't waste your money on this app. Every time I turn my phone off to fly, and change time zones it wipes out all of my data... Not just today's log but the previous ones too! That pretty much makes this app worthless for a frequent flyer...

title: Better than Atkins app.
body: This app made low carb dieting a lot easier. I was having such a hard time figuring out net carbs out of everything, not any more.

title: Great App but........
body: Upgraded to new Iphone and lost all data from old phone. After saving all nutritional information for past 6 months I have to start over.  Lost over 50 pounds with the help of this app.

title: Glad I found this app
body: So glad I got this as it's similar to MFP, but much more affordable! Contemplating on upgrading to the Premium version.

title: Waste of money
body: You pay $2.99 for the app but they want another $20/yr to actually be able to use it. The online site tells you nothing. Can't edit food information and the very first thing I scanned was wrong.. Adding 3 net carbs to my daily count!! Not cool when doing Keto. Deleting the app as soon as I finish this review.

title: CarbManager
body: Love this app!  It tracks net carbs as well as total carbs and even helps me watch my calories. Also has a pretty good restaurant database. I use CarbManager every day.

title: Easy carb counter
body: Really impressed with this app. It's a lot better than the actual Atkins app.

title: Quick & simple to use!
body: Loving it.  Very user friendly.  Helps me stay on track with my diet.

title: New update is awful
body: New update has ruined this app as far as I care. My meals aren't scheduled around your inconvenient "server outages" that were never a problem before. New ui is terrible and hard to navigate as well. Will be searching for a replacement.
response: Hi there, we're really sorry for the problem. We're back online any everything is working well, plus we fixed a number of glitches. Please check it out when you get a chance.

title: Great app
body: It works well with Gary Taubes new book, "Why We Get Fat". Easy look up for everything I've tried. The piechart helps visualize food makeup. Keep making it better!

title: Indifferent
body: It's not terrible I have been using it for two weeks almost. I just find the food search to take up a lot of time. It does what it needs to do. Could use more glitz for 3 dollars.

title: Good

title: Love the updates!
body: So easy to track everything. Live that it now figures out the caloric intake also.  Great app!

title: Love this app!
body: Definitely helping me stay on track,  and continuing to lose weight.

title: Terrible Design
body: I've only started using the app and it is so poorly designed I have doubts I'll continue.  The interface is confusing and non-intuitive and it takes a dozen clicks to log a simple entry.  Free apps will do the same thing only better.

title: Crashes
body: With new update app constantly crashes.

title: Great app
body: You can't discount for sugar alcohols when figuring out net carbs. You have to add them the fiber count instead. A minor issue for a great app.

title: Works great
body: This app works well for tracking my ketogenic diet. I did pay for premium and I think it's worth it.

title: Unable to copy foods

title: Afraid to update now!
body: This is a nice app-tho sometimes a bit overwhelming-

title: Love it.
body: Easy to use.  I found the learning curve for this app was shorter than for some if the other calorie counter type apps out there.

title: Not accurate and complicated

title: So far so good

title: Awesome App!!!

title: Awesome and super easy

title: So far so good!
body: Only been using the app for a few days but so far it's doing exactly what I need it to do.

title: Great app

title: Update has bugs
body: I can't add grams on all foods. It won't let me add the right amount of grams it automatically puts a random gram amount. Very frustrated
response: Hi Captain Awesome, please give it another try. Gram should be an option for all foods. Sometimes you just need to scroll down the list to find it.

title: Very useful to low carb way of life
body: I think this app is better than the Atkins app. I found most foods listed. I only wish they had more restaurant foods.

title: Cindy

title: Good app

title: Losing weight!
body: I love this app. It is simple to use and just what I needed to combine with an easy to follow low carb diet. Thank you! 5 pounds gone in 3 days, woot!

title: So Far So Good
body: Only needs the functionality of scanning products and having food data loaded that way.

title: Needs one thing
body: I know there is a place for a custom entry, but what it really needs is a very quick and easy manual entry. Just name and number of net carbs. Those would be the only two options.

body: Great app!  I like the scan function, but not all items are recognized.  Helps me keep my numbers in range and in ketosis.

title: Great app. Some adjustments needed

title: Beware, $39 In App Purchase Upgrade
body: Great app and certainly worth the $2.99. But, beware there is a $39/yr in app purchase if you want features like linking with Apple Health data.

title: Rating
body: Carb Manager makes it so simple to keep track of your macros, weight etc..
response: Hey there, thank so much for the review -- simple is definitely what we're striving for! Glad that it's working well for you. If you have a minute, would you check out the latest version and let us know what you think? Many thanks and best wishes for continued success!

title: Makes it really easy
body: Great app. Awesome database. Certainly makes it easy to keep a reasonable eye on your intake. Could be a little more accurate but I'm not complaining.

title: Carb Counter
body: Overall ok but could be much better.  Needs a way to enter carbs fats proteins eaten directly without naming the food.   Simple foods are hard to find and the built in lists have too many redundancies.

title: I had no idea......
body: That I was eating so many carbs!

title: Carb Manager
body: Easy to punch in custom foods – like local prepared salads with nutrition information available. Great selection of foods already preprogrammed into the database.

title: Watch those carbs
body: This app makes it very easy to monitor your carbs at every meal and snack. Using it daily.

title: Ketogenic Treasure
body: I'm having to track my net carbs, fat, and protein. I'm a newb, so suffice to say it does not come naturally to me. The app is the only thing making it doable!

title: Bad...
body: Latest update has  seriously messed up carb counts on some items.  Some of these items are in my favorites.  Also, hard to log because the choices for logging some items are not relevant to the item.  Example:  cheese slices need to be able to logged as slices, not pounds, grams or ounces!

title: Glad I bought it
body: I love how you can scan the barcode of your favorite foods!!

title: Disappointed
body: I have been using the basic app for two weeks and decided to pay for the premium version.  Big mistake so far.  I wanted to have access to the recipes  and to have the ability to import a recipe.  So far, I can't do either.  It just spins without results.
response: Hi Tammy, we had a recipe database outage yesterday. Sorry about that! Please try again now, as it should work.

title: Sandy
body: Great app.  I did prefer the other colored wheel rather than your new wheel.  Otherwise I like the layout.
response: Hey Doubledown, thanks for the great feedback, and glad you're liking the new layout. We're working hard to make this the easiest and most powerful carb counter available. If you have a minute, would you consider checking out the latest version? We read and value all feedback. Thanks for using Carb Manager!

title: Could be better

title: Badge

title: Ideal

title: Carb fabulous

title: Stay away!
body: I would like my money back. Not only does this app have the wrong net carb amounts for many foods. But the net carbs don't even add up right - 34 plus 4 is not 37. Entering a piece of food is confusing because the metrics are all wrong - instead of entering cups for rice, you have to do it by the pound or oz. I can't believe this isn't a free app.

title: So far...
body: Still getting used to it but so far I like it.  It is easy to find foods and log them.  Haven't explored much beyond logging carbs.

title: Great way to count carbs

title: Great app but sugar alcohol issue
body: App is great presenting macros, both daily and on a pet food basis, but it counts all sugar alcohols as a full net carbohydrate. It would be nice to see options within the app to let it account for all sugar alcohols as carbs, half, or none.

title: It works.
body: I have quite a database of foods built up so I will stick with it. Easy to use for a non technical person. Doesn't take up too much of my time.

title: Great app!

response: Hi there! Thanks for the great review. To enter a custom recipe, please go to the foods menu -> My Foods and tap the + button and select Recipe. Enjoy!

title: What Now

title: Awesome app.

title: Needs a scanner

title: Best app.

title: Fell through the cracks
body: App isn't user friendly and the premium service was worthless. Asked for a refund and promised one by Kevin on the support team. Well, they cancelled my account ad never gave me a refund. I've been waiting for months on end just to get the runaround. Complete scammers and a very unprofessional company.
response: Hi there - sorry for the delay! It sounds like this did indeed slip through the cracks, and we are truly sorry about that. Please contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll ensure that your case is expedited.

title: Clunky and useless
body: Hate this worse all the time to the point I no  longer use it.  Can’t turn off the stupid auto generated newsfeed so you have to constantly delete things you wish to keep private. Can’t find a way to see what privacy they are giving away in their auto generated profile and there appears to be no way to edit it for personal privacy. Hate the in your face advertising to buy their cookbook from Amazon, I don’t use Amazon, EVER. Absolutely can’t stand the trashy cluttered homepage. Worse it’s blaring white is obnoxious. Can’t control or edit your own dashboard to avoid trashy clutter. Since update it’s just miserable to log food, scan barcodes, create personal recipes. (Which instantly pop up on stupid newsfeed without your consent) Years of waiting for them to put life Essence vitamin tablets in library, endless requests ignored. Library of foods has been reduced so many items can no longer be scanned. NONSTOP GLITCHES AND CRASHES EVERYWHERE IN APP. It’s really bad sensory overload and or mystery puzzle to even do simple things or simple intuitive data entry. Old version was far superior. NO LONGER WORTH PAYING FOR UNDER THESE CONDITIONS.
response: Hi there, and thanks for taking the time to leave us a review. If your barcode scanner is not working properly, please reach out to our Support Team directly from within the app, and they'll be happy to assist you!

title: A.F
body: LOVING this app so far and i got the cookbook to match it off Amazon!  I love being able to see and schedule my meals for the day to monitor my net carbs!

title: Update not user friendly
body: I had this app from 2018-2019 and it was so easy to use and not too crowded, now the homepage is overly crowded and unpleasant to look at. The food search is confusing and overall I regret redownloading the app. Going back to MyFitnessPal
response: Hi there, we’re sorry to hear you’re struggling with the update—we’re listening, and our Development Team is working diligently to fine-tune this new version of the app so you’ll love it as much as the old version. Please reach out to us in-app, and our awesome Support Team will be happy to guide you through the update and answer any questions you may have.

title: No star
body: No one half of star
response: Hi there, thanks for your feedback, and sorry you've experienced issues canceling your subscription. We don't offer free trials with our subscription purchases. Our Support Team is at the ready to assist you with your cancellation- simply email us at support@carbmanager.com. Thanks!

title: Bar code scanner
body: What happened to the bar code scanner?  Is it only available premium now?
response: Hi and thanks for your review! The barcode scanner is available to all our users! If you're having issues with it, please reach out to our awesome Support Team at support@carbmanager.com and they'll be happy to assist you!

title: April iPad app update broke the search function
body: When activating the + button in top right corner, the bar code scanner selection & the microphone selection bring up a pop-up window that requires me to download the app.  I'm using it already!

title: Carb Manager
body: Very easy to do.Love it👌🏾

title: Frustrated
body: Update: Thanks to customer service I was able to get back on the app, but I haven’t started using it yet!!
response: Hi there, thanks for leaving us a review! It sounds like our super awesome and helpful Support Team helped you sort out the password issue you were having! If you have any other questions or issues- please do let us know at support@carbmanager.com. :-)

title: Not too flabby
body: This app (I haven’t tried the premium) has a few flaws.It doesn’t actually track your progress, although it tries to, but when you put in the new weight it reflects that has the start weight. A few bugs here and there, and a lot of the products are not in the search. But overall, it’s better than anything else I have used. I recommend.

title: A good ranking but not great
body: I have been using this app for about a week now and once I figured out the gamesmanship to not paying for their premium services, it’s a pretty good app. My one complaint is they do not monitor/correct the  food entries well.There is a a lot of in accurate entries so I find myself doing a lot of scrolling to find the right one

title: Latest update
body: This update has made it harder to find my foods and the scanner doesn’t work same times. This has to many bugs! Your latest update is the worse so far.This newest update is even worse than the last two!  4-2-21 now it will not let me scan new foods. I have to type in what I want to add. Get this fixed! I rate this no stars!
response: Hey there, thanks for the feedback. Please reach out to Support via support@carbmanager.com with more details so we can troubleshoot for you and get this fixed asap! Thanks!

title: New to keto lost 8lbs in 9 days
body: This was the third  app I tried, deleted the other two. One being the keto app. This is the best app. User friendly, great for beginners!! Best part it’s free.   I ended up buying three months worth tho because it just has more to offer.  I can’t wait to see how much more I loose.  Started at 191 3/17/21 now 183 3/26/21

title: Not as good as the old
body: I just upgraded to the “newer version “of the Carb Manager… A lot of the Pinterest keto recipes that I used to be able to put in here very easily are now difficult or can’t be found! I’d like the old one better… Several of the Pinterest recipes by the usual people aren’t found in this newer version and that’s frustrating and makes it not as good as the older app. Whoever’s in charge maybe you can make that happen?? I won’t hold my breath…
response: Hi there, and thanks for your review! The fastest and most efficient way to assist you is to reach out directly within the app or email us at support@carbmanager.com. Our Customer Support Team is ready to help!

title: Too many entries AWFUL AND INACCURATE
body: I started this almost three weeks ago and I first had a good experience with it. Now after having used it, the first BIG annoyance is whenever I open it, it stays on for about a minute then it says “You Are Offline” which is not true because I’m connected to my wireless internet all the time so I have to hit “Retry” EVERY SINGLE TIME.  Another annoying thing I have come to notice is anyone can add food which is great except none of the nutritional information is fact-checked. One type of food can be listed thousands of times but all have varying degrees of nutritional facts which basically means you might as well add all your food yourself and research the nutritional information so you know it’s correct.
response: Hey there, thanks for taking the time to leave us such detailed feedback! Many of the issues you mentioned have now been resolved. Please reach out to our Support Team to learn more about Food Accuracy and all the great new features that the new version has to offer.

title: KETO LIFE
body: THIS IS THE BEST APP THAT HAS EVER HAPPENED TO ME

title: Just cancelled my subscription
body: New “updates” have made the process of using this app cumbersome, confusing, time consuming and ultimately worthless.

title: Happy with the new version and a suggestion
body: Hello CM team!  Just restarted on an Anti-Inflammatory Keto and began using the app again (had been off for a year).  No problems with the change in views or navigation, just takes some getting used to.  I do have the paid version and am glad to see the % macros under the “In-Depth Details” tab, could you fix it so that the %’s show for each meal and snack section?  I try to get. 70/20/10 for each meal and the cumulative view seen in the In-Depth Details tab doesn’t help much for meals after breakfast.  Thanks for the very useful app!

title: Doesn’t connect to Wi-Fi
