body: When I open the app it doesn’t immediately connect to Wi-Fi.  I’m forced to “retry” before it will connect.  A royal pain in the butt!

title: The update is...not great.
body: Maybe if I wasn't used to the old format, the new one wouldn't be so difficult to use, but now, instead of it popping right up, I have to sit and watch the little logo spin for ten seconds before it opens, and then I waste several minutes trying to figure out how to do what I've been doing every day for the past couple of months. I guess all the functionality is still there, but finding it is a pain in the butt. It was a bad idea to change it so radically - I assume someone beta tested it, but they must have had a lot more spare time than I do.

title: Helpful but don’t love the new update
body: I really love carb manager. I tend to eat the same things fairly regularly so I can copy the meals over to different days. Love the bar code scanner and saving custom foods. However the new update has made the app slower to load and harder to find a few things. But in general, it has definitely been helpful for me to track macros and my progress over time.

title: No longer allows you to create recipes
body: I have loved this app for support through my keto journey for six months now. Yesterday morning I did the update. Last night I made some chicken broth & entered all the ingredients as I usually do. Then I went to create a recipe like I’ve done many times before only to find that in the update, they’ve removed the ability to create a recipe without a premium membership. This is incredibly disappointing. I’ll be looking for another app to record my macros that isn’t going to charge $39.99 a year to create my own recipes. I don’t care about the other premium benefits. Why can’t this feature grandfather into those who were already users or charge something reasonable like $2.99 for the one feature I want?

title: Piss off
body: I have been using Carb Manager man for over a year now and just got the latest update and can I tell you I am so disappointed I like the old version and I knew how manage  it better and since they change it makes me change my password every time I login sent a letter to them five days ago still have not heard anything and cannot login to my carb management if I don’t hear from them I will be deleting app as much as I used to love it and recommended it to everybody

title: Used to love
body: I signed up for a year.  The reports in the old version were just what I needed to sub.it to my nutrition coach. Now they are junk!  I have to switch now.

title: High hopes but disappointing
body: I was recommended from a friend and bought the 3 month subscription and just cancelled it due to the lack of accuracy I was entrusting with this app. I’ve been plugging in my food diligently as well and creating meals when I didn’t use what was within their meals catalog. I’ve been eating similar foods throughout and just today, my tomatoes I’ve been eating as snacks (if I’m hungry) and as a nutritious flavor booster for my daily salads just jumped from 0 carbs to 8!!! Needless to say, I’ve lost some weight but I’m sure that accounts for the no sugar intake and not because of this app at all. I trusted this app for quality and I’ve just been steamrolled in the inaccuracy of it. If all the days prior were updated accurately I bet everyday would have exceeded my carb intake by many grams.

title: Extremely user-friendly
body: This is a great app to track your nutritional habits!

title: Not so great since the "upgrade"
body: I'd been using this app for about a month (+/-) before the new version was unveiled and I'd found it pretty easy to use across my devices (both Apple and Android as well as on the web). Since the new version came out I've found it to be frustratingly glitchy. I can't trust my imported recipes any longer (nutrition information is way off), I can't edit my recipes successfully, and especially on my iPad, the app loads so slowly that I always get a "you are offline" message when I am not. I was a Weight Watchers member for years so I'm used to using a reliable app whose data I can trust, but I switched so I could start tracking macros. Although my initial experience with the old version of this one seemed pretty reliable, that's no longer the case. Very disappointing.

title: Not Worth It
body: So far every single bar code scanned has been wrong. For example, Carb Balance tortillas have 45 calories and 3 net carbs according to the label. This app shows 4 net carbs and 80 calories!

title: Not really free
body: I started using the app and realized the meal planning was not part of the free app and was okay with that. But then once I started trying to actually track my food, I was only allowed to add two foods before I couldn’t go farther without signing up for $39.99/month. Disappointing!

title: I loved this until I hated it
body: I don’t know what this latest update was supposed to accomplish? I lost recipes & staple foods from my food list. There used to be a pie chart that told me where I was with the 75 20 5 ratio. It was nice to see that through the day and know if I needed to adjust my next meal. Now I have to get out the calculator and do the math. It also doesn’t save Staple ingredients in the food list if I used it as an ingredient in a recipe. If I used best foods mayo in a salad then it should also be in my food list so I don’t have to rescan it every recipe. I have put so much effort and time into these saved recipes and ingredients and I feel that the folks who did this update didn’t value that for any of us. I don’t see this as easier or quicker. Previously the way different things were highlighted made them easier to find and/or see. Now I am searching around on a white screen on my phone. I would have said why fix what’s not broken? Well, now it’s broken. See if you can fix it because you had a good reputation once.

title: I want my money back.
body: I have been a premium member for almost two years and loved this app. The new version has ruined my experience. It lags while loading and sometimes I just give up and try later.  You cannot add to my foods list with the new version, there isn’t even an option. If you change the unit of measure (cup, gram, oz) it gets confused and you have to back out and try again.  Also, whyndominneed to see my week on the daily page. Just too cluttered and small.  Your developer needs a kick in the butt. This app is ruined.

title: What the old version back
body: My app recently downloaded the newest version of carb manager. I can’t stand it. The look was totally redone and it does not have the same feel. My Apple Watch no longer syncs and I could not get the bar code to scan. I have used this app for 16 months. I am very disappointed that the app was totally reconfigured. It was awesome before. So no good reason to change. Off to find a new app. I don’t understand why developers are always looking for the new and improved. Most people aren’t good with change. Fixing bugs and glitches ok. Redoing the look not ok.

title: Used to love , bit no longer easy to enter
body: I used to love this app.It was easy to enter information. I really dislike the new version. The larger graphics leaves less room for where I actually enter in the information. The drop boxes and the type size of the numbers are considerably smaller . As a middle-aged woman desperately trying to lose weight this is really obnoxious having to go get reading glasses to track my carbs. It’s just one more reason to give up.

title: HATE the update!
body: I absolutely hate the new update, and I’m in a group where lots of others use it and agree with me even if they haven’t commented here.  They’re changing to different apps left and right.  I think I’m going to as well.

title: New Version - Slick but slow
body: I have used the app for the past 2 years and really like it. The new interface is nice looking and has some great features. I think I’ll get used to the new format in time. The thing that I won’t get used to and I hope improves is the speed and usability. I am using the new version 7.0 on an iPhone 12 but still have the old version on an old iPad Air. My internet speed on Speedtest registers at max on upload/download speed.This is what I’m experiencing.

title: After update, now goes blank screen when entering food
body: It was ok before the 2/2021 update

title: Nice idea
body: Wow, nice idea, but when you have everyone adding meals and there idea of carbs instead of reading the label and copying that you end up with a ugly mess. On top of this the recent upgrade made it so bad I gladly stopped using this 40.00 dollar rip off, app forever...

title: New update
body: App froze when trying to scan bar code.  App will not upload exercise from my health.  Hate this upgrade.

title: Terrible update!
body: We’ve used this app for almost 2 years and loved it until this new version.The new version is not intuitive, simple things like adding foods that I ate yesterday to a meal today don’t show up in the search, the new look isn’t better it’s just new for the sake of being new.

title: Horrible. Do not Subscribe.
body: I’ve written this review twice already. Keeps disappearing when I try to send it. Funny, huh? I’m not bothering to write it again. I will say that they destroyed a perfectly useful app worthy of ongoing subscription and replaced it with garbage. I have deleted my subscription and am searching for a competitor. Too bad. They used to be the best keto app out there. Should they listen to their customers and bring back the previous version, I would happily rejoin, but as it is now? I want my money back.

title: Can’t buy upgrade with I tunes card
body: I tried using my 40.00 I tunes gift card for the premium and it wouldn’t take it. Why?
response: Hi Eli - please reach out at support@carbmanager.com and we may be able to assist, otherwise this may be an issue with iTunes and not Carb Manager. Thanks!

title: Mac/Android Problem
body: This app was working well for me until the most recent update. Now when I enter my stats on my IPad they do not upload to my Android phone. If I end them on my Android phone, they will still upload to my IPad.
response: Hi there - we're currently in the midst of rolling out a new version of our app. You may have noticed that it looks differently on Android than it does on iOS devices currently. The final rollout is happing this week for Android, at which time your data will sync between all devices again. Thanks for your patience!

title: Carb Manager Review
body: I HATE logging my food but this makes it really EASY! I love how it tells me how much fat/ protein/ carbs I’m allowed and how many I have remaining throughout the day! I weighed myself this morning and I have lost 11lbs since I started this and it will be a week tomorrow since I first started this! I recommend it, I got my husband, brother-in-law, and my sister to download it and they all love it as well!

title: Easy app
body: Easy to use

title: Update decreases usability
body: I use this app daily to track my Keto diet and it has served me well for quite some time despite its minor usability quirks and annoyances.
response: Hi Richard - Those issues are not the norm for the updated version, and many users are enjoying much faster speeds at this point. We'd love to help get this sorted out for you! First, please be sure to update to the absolute latest version of the app (looks like you might be a couple of incremental updates behind) and of iOS. If you still run into issues, please reach out in the app via Settings → Help & Support. Thanks!

title: Refund refund refund
body: I have a friend that’s lost 65 pounds in about a year told me how great this carb counter program was I’ve always hated to get something online because they turn around and always mess you up with membership fees and when they’re supposed to take them out in the amount of each payment but my friend told me that this App was great and worth the money so I decided to get it I I am disabled and live on a fixed income so I clicked on the option for 333 a month and carb counter turnaround and charged me $39.99was immediately overdrew my account I’ve tried and tried and tried to get in touch with them for a refund to no avail so now it’s cost me $39.99 Plus the $32 overdraft fee where oh where are the real people
response: Hi Michael - Thanks for sharing your feedback. As with any online service, when we show our annual pricing, that means that the amount will be taken out all at once. To make this as clear as possible, we have an FAQ at the bottom of the pricing page titled "When will I be billed?". I'm sorry to hear that you haven't gotten a response back from our support team. You can reach them in the app via Settings → Help & Support. They typically respond within 24 hours. All the best in the meantime!

title: iPad app no comparison to iPhone or online
body: I am usually a pretty understanding person regarding the flexibility that companies have to develop their features, but this iPad app is almost a total non-starter for me.
response: Hi NWBobStu - Thanks for your feedback! I can confirm that nearly all features of the iPhone version are available for the iPad version. They're just laid out a bit differently. Your custom "My Foods" ARE available between devices, and it IS possible to edit scanned item names.

title: Update issues resolved, new interface needs work
body: I had an issue with the upgrade and I contacted support. Thru join troubleshooting we resolved the issue. Now, the new interface has much to be desired. While I appreciate a new look and feel, there are limitations that are confusing.
response: Hi Hjbinatx! I'm SO glad that support was able to assist with those upgrade issues. Rest assured that we've ALREADY pushed out several iterative releases, and that we're continuing to fine tune the new version of the app based on customer feedback. Some of the items that you mentioned aren't actually accurate. For example, you can definitely choose portion sizes without needing to do math to convert. If you're not sure how, our support team would be happy to point you in the right direction. :-)

title: Frustrated with the “update”
body: Was loving this app until the “update” this week, now nothing works right! Nothing entered on my iOS version carries over to my android version on my phone all of a sudden, and now tonight I can’t add any food! Very frustrating when something works great for months and then is absolutely useless after an “upgrade”
response: Hi Kegetz - Thanks for your feedback. I can assure you that the issue you're experiencing is not normal behavior for the new app version, and that sync between devices is still functional. Please reach out to our friendly support team in the app via Settings → Help & Support, and they'll be happy to get this straightened out for you! Be sure and reference your app store user ID for fastest service. All the best in the meantime!

title: Not great since updat
body: I started to use this app at the beginning of the year. It came highly recommended.Now granted I don’t pay for the premium but I still really enjoyed this app. But then the update happen my barcode scan won’t scan almost anything any kind of products that I use. Stuff that I used to put in it is now doubling sometimes four times the amount of carbs that it should be.  Please fix this or I will have to use another app again.

title: New app not so great
body: There are some glitches that make the app not work correctly. I cannot see the food I have logged for the day. I am able to see programming code. The new update is not usable for me. It loads and loads but then tells me I am offline. I have rebooted my phone but it doesn’t fix the issue.

title: Works great on android
body: I switched from android to iOS.  This app is awesome on android, but it won’t run at all on my new12 pro max,
response: Hi there and thanks for leaving us constructive feedback! The issue you are having is definitely not normal app behavior. Please allow us the opportunity to look into this further by messaging us from within the app. Just tap on to "Need Help" and our friendly customer support team will assist you!

title: Simplest app for keto or low carb EVER!
body: I love this app so much! I’ve attempted keto before without this app and I was not successful at all! Also other apps I’ve tried make counting macros so complicated but not this app this is surely made for dummies like myself lol cause it’s a breeze to keep track of things and I love the bar code scanner! Makes things so much easier! We are creatures of convenience and this app helps me so much Ive actually grown to like logging my food! HIGHLY recommended!

title: Easy to use
body: I have found this app very helpful.I have the premium paid version. Free seemed a bit limited. It’s easy to use, great hints and tips and amazing looking recipes.My only complaint is that when I was checking out the app it said it was good for family sharing up to six people. That is only good with the free version not the premium version. We specifically bought it because we thought we could share it. Instead, my husband and I had to each pay for our own subscription But I think it’s gonna be worth it.

title: Thank you
body: Carb manager, has made it easy as I struggle daily to watch my carbs.  This app reminds me to check in and monitor my progress. I started my lifestyle Change February 1st.2019. I am down 32 pounds. Thank you for I needed the help.  Love the recipes too. Today 8 months ago I started and I am now down 78 pounds!! I have a ways to go you help me a lot !! Yeahhh! Thank you carb manager app.

title: Great product as long as you don’t purchase premium
body: App worked perfectly than I purchased premium version than all of a sudden it stopped syncing my Apple health info. Plus it consistently deleted all exercises I manually entered due to not extracting info properly from Apple Watch. I always have to add notes as to what I’d did for exercise and calories burned and steps walked for that day.  Very frustrating especially since I had decided to drop $40.00 for something that’s got some bugs in the system. Maybe they need to update software to iOS 14 more compatible?
response: Hi there! Thanks for leaving us a review! Apple just released a bug fix, 14.0.1. If you're still experiencing issues after downloading the most recent iOS update, please email us at support@carbmanager.com and we are happy to assist you with some further troubleshooting!

title: Highly Recommended
body: Very helpful especially if you are not sure if the food you're about to get is okay for keto! You can scan code of foods while you go to grocery stores!

title: Wonderful Tool
body: I've done the keto diet before and it was tricky to track with accuracy.This app is a breeze!

title: Perfect for losing weight. 100% awesome!
body: So I found this app just searching the App Store and happened to download it just by chance. Holy crap am I glad I did.

title: Great app
body: Started using is this app and I lost 60 lbs in 6 months. I stopped using it and I gained 30 of it back. I started using it again and I have lost 12 of it again. This app has TONS of foods in it. Even many fast food restaurant menus items. Scan the bar code on items from the grocery store and almost anything pops right up. Keeps track of your daily calorie, fat, protein and carb intake. I highly recommend using it.

title: Awesome
body: Awesome

title: Cancel but NO Refund - Please Read
body: I have not used carb manager for months now.  My renewal  showed up on my Credit card today.  I canceled but there is no refund so I have to  Pay for  365 days that I will not use.  Complete rip off!!! You might want to think of this before you join. $39.95 just thrown to wind... or should  I say  carb manager.
response: Thanks for sharing your experience, and we can help sort this out. Cancelling a subscription turns off auto renewal, but we can help process a refund for you. If you haven't already, just reach out to us in-app, so we can look up your account and take care of it. Thanks!

title: Nutritional
body: I really enjoy your app. It is very helpful.It would be really great if you could connect the recipes with the nutrition information that you have left for the day so you can connect recipes with what you still need to cheat for the day.

title: Nothing matches
body: I used this app for a week to help me keep track of my carbs. I ate an "Enlightened" keto ice cream and the app counted all the alcohol sugars into my net carbs. Each ice cream has hundreds of comments below it telling the app that it is recorded wrong and nothing has changed. (Bar code scan) so you have to manually enter it.
response: Hi & thanks! We work hard on the accuracy of our Food DB. It's true some branded/processed foods have been input by users, so if there are inaccuracies, you can always Report a Food Error or make Quick Edits to them. Just reach out in-app, & we can help share how as well as how to identify our NCCDB verified foods to make it easier for logging!

title: Review of Carb Manager
body: Love to be able to input food items.

title: Useful But Buggy
body: The barcode scanner is pretty unreliable. Often it will fail the scan a barcode that worked previously (same bar code, same lighting). There are also times when I’ll get the scanner to work and the spinner comes up but the food item never appears. Pretty frustrating.
response: Hi & thanks for sharing your experience. We're glad you're finding the app useful! Please reach out in-app so we can make sure your settings are set up properly for the barcode scanner. We'd also like to share how to optimize loading speeds as well as check out any other problems you're running into. Thanks!

title: Keeps Crashing
body: The app has been working great until 6/18/20 when it would crash every time I would log something. Please Fix!
response: Hi, and thanks for sharing your experience. We're sorry to hear you've run into some loading issues on your device, and we definitely want to help. Please message us in-app or email us at support@carbmanager.com so we can check it out and help sort out the problem. Thanks!

title: Carb manager
body: Very great app if you are doing keto tracks everything you need to track and will subtract calories you have burned from the calories you ate that day.also connects to Apple Watch,Fitbit,and some German watches

title: New to Keto and this is a MUST HAVE app for beginners!
body: I use this throughout my day to stay on track with my new way of eating. Being new to Keto, the Carb Manager helps me easily keep track of my food intake allowing my body to stay in a state of Ketosis.  It is extremely user friendly!  I can easily copy previous meals into current days and there is a huge resource of foods already in their database. I especially like the scan feature to get info from the bar code which immediately downloads the nutritional information onto my phone.

title: Database Is Not Accurate
body: The app seems to use some form of crowd sourcing for the data. When I scan a package, it shows the proper item but most of the time the nutrition is incorrect.
response: Hi there, and thanks for the thorough review. We allow user contribution for the many new branded/processed foods your local community/stores have that we may not know of yet, but if you're finding errors, we can share how to Report a Food Error and make Quick Edits in the meantime. Just message us in-app so we can connect, as well as share how to resolve any loading issues you're facing. Thanks!

title: Not user friendly and not always accurate
body: I am a long time My Fitness Pal user and really like a lot of their features. The ability to connect it to different apps is incredibly helpful. I don’t have a garmin or Fitbit so the effort to add in exercise/steps distance is just tedious.

title: Bait and switch. Requires Payment to use at all!
body: This app claims to offer a free option.  During setup, a pay wall pops up.  You cannot get past it without paying $39.99. If you want people to pay, that’s fine—but then don’t claim to be free! Deleting this app just based on the bait and switch.
response: Hi! Our core app is free & always will be. Many of our users reach their goals without upgrading to Premium. Our pop-up ad to upgrade appears 1x a day or if you're trying to access Premium features, and our paid subscriptions allow us to offer the app for Free to so many as well, so we hope you understand. Msg us in-app to learn more. Thanks!

title: Wow
body: This app made the whole day so easy.. I can plan all my meals .copy to the next day .and work my food in to a workable diet..If you really want to lose weight. Spend some time working with this app.Enter everything.I do and I lost 22 pounds in 18 days and I feel great.All you need is this app a good kitchen scale and keep to the plan..

title: Food count wrong
body: Even when you scan a bar code it records the nutritional information wrong
response: Hi, and thanks for sharing your experience. We work hard on the accuracy of our food database, however some branded & processed foods have been input by other users, so if you find there are inaccuracies, you can always Report a Food Error to be updated, and in the meantime, make Quick Edits to the Nutrients. Just reach out in-app, & we can share how. Thanks!

title: Great for any Diet
body: I’m using this app for a keto diet. Very convenient since you can scan the bar code and instantly transfer nutrition facts from product. I recommend upgrading to premium if you have a specific diet, such as keto, because it gives you perfect recipes tailored to your specific diet, saving you time if you were to search high and low online. In addition, the app allows to apply all nutrition facts straight from the chosen recipe to your daily log.

title: Keto Macros are 🔥🔥🔥
body: This app has easily helped me start my keto diet. It figured my macros for me and I match my diet around it. The keto diet along with this app has helped me to lose roughly 22.6lbs in less than 1 month. Only 20 more lbs until my goal wait of 180 lbs. LETS GOOOO

title: THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!!
body: After a recent blood test, I was told that I’m pre-diabetic!!  Scary to say the least! Some major changes were in my future, I struggled to find away￼ to keep track of my carb intake for the day. And wouldn’t you know it, I came across this wonderful app. It is VERY detailed and WELL thought out!! The other night I ate something that is not in this apps database, I was able to put all the info in and create the food and send it to be put into the  database! I’m currently using the free side of this app, but I want the developers to know that I will soon pay for the premium because they deserve some money from me:) ￼

title: Best for keto
body: This is the standard. Logs my food. Counts my macros. And doesn’t give me a five food limit like the keto.app free version.

title: Notifications never clear
body: Notifications never clear
response: Hi, and thanks for your review! The only notifications you may be getting are either Meal Reminders or the Carb badge, if you have an iOS device. You can turn off both, if you choose to. Just message us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" and we can share how. Thanks!

title: I love this app
body: I am knew to keto and this app makes it so easy to keep up with it and makes it super easy to see what I can eat and can just my simple scanning the code in.

title: This app is the bomb.com
body: Love everything about this app!!!

title: Usable but
body: One star down for the bright painful only option of bright theme. It had been almost a year since apple announced dark theme for iPhones
response: Hi! The pop-up to upgrade should only appear 1x a day or when trying to use Premium features. If you think it's happening more, please reach out in-app. We're happy to offer the free app to as many users as possible. However, we do rely on paid subscriptions to assist us in this goal. We hope that you understand and that you continue to enjoy! In the meantime, we're working on our dark mode compatibility, and hear you loud and clear! Please message us in-app with any other questions you may have

title: Excellent App & Tool
body: The app is very user friendly. Bar code scan brings up everything I have scanned. Adding & editing entries very easy. Great recipes & many other informative extras not found on other apps. No matter what kind of weight loss system you may be running this app will be a useful tool in your bucket.

title: The best thing that happen on my way to keto
body: Started keto in August of 2019 and without this app I would have quit for the 2nd time. It has helped me track and understand foods so much better. Easy to use and handy bar code scanner. On premium you get lots of extras and recipes. Works with my Fitbit.

title: Love It So Far!
body: I’ve only had this App for a few days, but it seems to do everything I need it to, with a couple suggested improvements. First, when I scan a Bar Code, I can always change the nutrients later, but I’m stuck with whatever the bar code called the item! Would really like to be able to edit the food name so it’s easier to find as my foods list grows.

title: Wrongful Charge
body: I was charged $39.99 a year to the day that I signed up for a free account.
response: Hi there, and thanks for sharing your experience. If you signed up without meaning to, we'd be happy to help cancel and process a refund. Just reach out in-app, by selecting Settings - "Need help?" and we can sort it out for you. Thanks!

title: Easy to use
body: I love the bar code feature and ease of use to log food. I always find what I need b on this app

title: Is this product trustworthy ?
body: Their app constantly links to a URL called test-app.link which, according to my Gryphon router is reported to install unwanted software and may collect personal data without permission.
response: Hi there! Thanks so much for reaching out. As the #1 Keto diet app since 2010, we're extremely careful with our code base, and with our user's trust. We don't use any URL that would be at all similar to test-app.link. We'd love to learn more about what you're seeing though. Would you be willing to reach out to our friendly support team at support@carbmanager.com? We appreciate you!

title: Dietary Data Points
body: Carb Counter has allowed me to get to a whole new level of dieting and living Keto while helping me to obtain and keep my body in Ketosis (B-Ketones = 2.4 -3.8 mmol/L as measured by my KetoMojo meter). CC helps me to identify those foods or ingredients that have positive as well as negative effects on my blood glucose levels (mg/dL) as well as my blood Ketones without the guessing game.

title: Love iI have not been successful in creating an account. Each time I have tried it doesn’t except me
body: Love it except I have not been successful in creating an account. Each time I have tried it doesn’t e money has been deducted out of my account xcept me. The money has been deducted out of my account.  not able L Love it except I ha Love it except I have not been successful in creating an account. Each time I have tried it doesn’t except me. The money has been deducted out of my account.  ve not been successful in creating an account. Each time I have tried it doesn’t except me. The money has been deducted out of my account.  ove it except I have not been successful in creating an account. Each time I have tried it doesn’t except me. The money has been deducted out of my account.

title: CARB MGR: KETO DIET APP
body: Not a person to write long reviews but this app is totally worth it; at least for now.  I’ve only been using this a few days and am highly impressed.  Would like to address some of the highlights and respond to some of the negative reviews.

title: Please fix bugs
body: Today it won’t log anything but carbs even though my macros should be almost 75/20/5
response: Thanks for sharing your experience. It's possible a setting has been changed to not track all Macros. Please reach out to us in-app, so we can take a closer look and sort it out for you. Thanks!

title: Good!
body: The scan code is the beeeeeeez kneeeeeeeez

title: Love everything about Carb Manager
body: This is a fantastic app. Track everything in one place. Scan foods, recipes are fantastic. Well worth the annual fee of $40.00.

title: Charged
body: I’m extremely upset and have an issue I need taken care of right away. I was under the impression that when it said 39.99 (3ish) dollars per month for premium. We would be charged monthly rather than all taken out. I okayed the charge only to see that the entirety of the amount would be taken out. We JUST purchased this and need it reversed. The payment “plan” should be more clear, and should NOT include a monthly price if the only way to pay is annually.
response: Thanks for sharing your experience. We have a monthly, quarterly, and annual plan. The annual plan is the best offer as it breaks down to the lowest price per month. However, if you're interested in downgrading to monthly or back to Free, just reach out to us in-app, and we can reverse the charge. Thanks in advance!

title: Trying to Upgrade Failed
body: I’ve been using the free version for a couple of weeks now and very pleased with the App.  A couple days ago Carb Manager offered a special price of $29.00 for the one year subscription. I decided to upgrade and went through the sign up. It posted to my bank account that there was a pending charge.  Never received any info from the company/app that it was upgraded.  Several days later the pending was removed from my bank account.  I’ve tried everything to communicate with the company to no avail!!
response: Sorry to hear you're having some issue accessing your Premium features! We can assure this is an easy fix, and can get you upgraded in no time. Please reach out to us in-app by selecting "Need help?" and we can get it sorted out, if it hasn't already. Thanks!

title: Customer service doesn’t exist
body: When you cancel this service, they forget to inform you that unless you REQUEST a refund from Apple, you do not automatically get your money back.  The hassle to cancel is not worth the app so be informed before you agree.  5 days later, no refund, no phone number to call, just might as well burn $30.00.  Please take my advice, you don’t need this frustration in your life!
response: Hey PavilR - Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts. Really sorry to hear that you found canceling to be a hassle. We've done everything that we can to make it as quick and easy as possible. All that's required to cancel is to go to Settings-Cancel Subscription. You're correct that refunds don't happen automatically on cancellation. This is standard for any service. Sorry that it came as a surprise. Don't hesitate to reach out to support@carbmanager.com with any other questions.

title: Bugs abound
body: This app is the buggiest on my phone. I love using it. Big library. Able to include my own recipes. All of that is great. BUT the amount of functional and formatting bugs (like the save button disappearing) making it difficult to use are insane. The 4.8 score is not justified in my opinion at this time. Please fix bugs, because this app could be so much better. I get that this was ported from Android, but please don’t think that means your users on this platform are any less valuable.
response: Danecdote, we hear you! Thanks for your compliments as well as your feedback. We're definitely working on major improvements, and are in fact releasing a new version in the next few months that we're sure will please you. In the meantime, please reach out to us in-app so we can share how to improve some of the issues you're currently experiencing with your device. Thanks in advance!

title: CarbMaster is the Master!!
body: OMG- why have I wasted all these years trying to use FitnessPal to keep track of my dietary and nutritional information?! Carb Master is FAR more advanced in its functionalities and its database!!! And much more user friendly too!!! I bought the premium after one day ! My husband also uses the app ( not a premium member though) and he is SOOO impressed with how well CarbMaster operates and presents the information AND it works without glitches. The bar code scanner works well and makes product info entries a breeze!! Also foods in the database ...the numbers seem MUCH more acurate. This is our favorite diet app now!! Oh and it integrates with Apple Health! Another plus!!

title: Overcharged
body: I just bought the premium which is $39.99, but was charged $43.29 - I am live in USA so am unsure why I’ve been overcharged as it’s not a currency conversion...
response: Hi Welbexk - Thanks for reaching out. The App Store applies sales tax based on your location. We have no control over this on our end. It looks like a sales tax of around 8% was applied. If you feel that this is in error, or you have further questions, please reach out to our friendly support team in the app, via Settings - Contact Support. All the best in the meantime!

title: Mislead
body: I would like my money back. I was 100% mislead into the sale price. They charged me more than what was advertised and shown. I did not click to an agreement for that price neither. I was told monthly charge of 2.50 for the sale price of  $29.99 for the year. They basically took almost $42 out. It’s not worth that much. I only wanted to see if I could better input my work outs for adjusting calories since it limits you on the badge plan.
response: Hey there! Thanks for reaching out. Please contact our friendly support team via support@carbmanager.com and they'll be happy to assist :-)

title: Upgraded to premium & still shows Free status
body: I’m beyond frustrated, my gift to myself was get serious with Keto so I upgraded today 1/01/2020
response: Thanks for sharing your experience, and we apologize for the mix-up. However, this is an easy fix! If you haven't already, please reach out to us in-app by selecting Settings - "Need help?" and we'll get your account upgraded to Premium ASAP.

title: So amazon!!
body: So easy to follow. Thank u!!!!! U r making my new Keto diet so easy!!!!!

title: Awesome
body: Love, love, love this app! I can do a meal prep for everyday to make sure I’m at or below my macros.  I do not like eating the same thing every day (except for eggs, I love eggs) so this allows me to mix our meals up.  BUT the best feature is the bar code scanner, AMAZING!!!  Let me put it this way, my husband stopped going grocery shopping because I scan everything and I mean everything 🥒🍠🍗🍖🍕🥦🌭🌮🌯🍨🍯🥧🍣🥩 to make sure it’s Keto friendly.  The last time we went I saw him putting things in the cart.  I was like “what are you doing, I have to scan everything!”.  He threw his hands up 🙌 in the air and said “That’s it!  You are certifiably nuts 🤪 and I’ll be in the car.”.  I did purchase the items he put in the cart and I apologized when I got to the car.
response: Thanks so much for the epic review Agnes! Shared your story with the whole team and it made everyone's day - especially the part about your husband! You get the award for best use of emojis in a review this year :-)

title: New to Keto
body: This has helped me get started on Keto. Being able to see what foods , fast foods and recipes ready at the click of a finger.simple and easy to use and understand

title: Verify the numbers!
body: Update 12/1/2019 -  gave it a second chance and compared it with 5 other food tracking apps. While all of the apps numbers varied, Carb Manager was the closest to the actual numbers on the packaging or looking up online.  The UI could use some changes to make input simpler, particularly for the glucose and ketone tracking. (Hint: allow those of us entering multiple days worth of data to change the date and time so we don’t have to delete it and start over). I was surprised to see that it calculates GKI for you, nice feature. Keep an eye on which foods you pick if there are more than 1. See my plain black coffee example below.
response: Hello, from Carb Manager Support, and thank you for your review. We're happy to investigate some recently logged items in your account to ensure that you are selecting your foods from the extensive NCCDB verified section. We do pride ourselves on the accuracy of our database! Please select "Need Help" in-app and reference the username, Lost On The Numbers, so that we can assist you further. We are looking forward to hearing from you shortly!

title: Over charge
body: Says $39.95 was charged $49.95. Didn’t see the $10 hidden fee. Although it may have been on there but I did not see it.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear you've run into an issue with a recent bill for Carb Manager. We ask that you please reach out to the support team for further assistance. One important thing to mention is that the costs you mentioned don't align directly with our prices so we'd like to take a closer look. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username you provided. Thank you!

title: Not accurate with nutrition
body: When I scan a bar code, sometimes the nutrition facts show up wrong. For example, I put an item in and it had 5 carbs and 5 fibers. When I scanned the bar code, it showed up as 5 carbs and 3 fibers. It’s really frustrating.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We'll be happy to take a look at the scanner issues that you've encountered and offer some assistance. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "ashleydawwn". Please include the items that you've scanned as we'll be happy to help!

title: Tracker
body: Awesome tracker with the scan code and everything with the huge database for food. Love it.

title: Shouldn’t allow people to alter scanned foods
body: This app is good. How ever it have been very frustrating when you go to scan the barcode for foods to put in you daily meals. Only to be shocked by the amount of carbs. Then you read the package only to find out that the app has had multiple unverified changes. Very very frustrating and there for you need to change this feature when it comes to bar code scans.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We'll be happy to review the issues you're having with scanning food items. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference your username. If you could please include the names of the food items that are giving you issues, that would be extremely helpful. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: KEEPS ME ON MY TOES
body: I can type in to get my food to get carbs/fat/protein and calories to figure out what my consumption would be and if it doesn’t work out then I can delete and start over. I also like the ability to scan the bar code!

title: Mostly great!
body: It would be a helpful time-saving feature if you would add code that allows users to transfer foods / entire meals / days from one user to another so when two people are dieting together and cooking and eating together, one can enter the info for the day and simply share it to the other via email or Bluetooth bump or something. Please add this in a future update.

title: GREAT recipe features!
body: I have used MyFitnessPal exclusively for almost 8 years. It did the job, but my boyfriend switched to this app when we went keto and I was right behind him. I absolutely LOVE this app.  My main gripe about MFP has always been that you couldn’t account for net carbs in your macros. That was what first attracted me to Carb Manager, but I have really enjoyed using the recipe features, and the scan feature is INCREDIBLY convenient. I can create a recipe for meal prep for the week, portion it out, and send it to my boyfriend for his macro tracking too. The food library isn’t as expansive as MFP of course, but adding macros or meals is super easy. This app is genius. My only request would be that you’re able to account for pounds in decimals instead of just whole numbers. Other than that, fantastic!

title: If your not pleased with their app they will not issue a refund
body: I purchased the yearly subscription for this app ($43.29 with tax) feeling after the reviews it was the carb counting app I was looking for. I had used the free version to start with then upgraded to the premium version. I purchased the yearly because it was cheaper that way. After using it for about 3 days I felt it was not the easiest, user friendly app available, too much jumping around from screen to screen, not finding some food or recipe items that I wanted to add to my daily count, some inaccurate macros readings and not much of anything different from the free version, etc.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're very sorry to hear that you were denied a refund. I'm afraid our refund practices are dictated by the Apple Store and Google Play stores. We'd welcome the opportunity to review your account standing to see if we can assist in any way. Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Bobby715" and we'll be happy to help!

title: Ease of use
body: Everything is at the touch of a button. I can be anywhere and check or log a meal to check the carbs. After I send this I’m getting the full version of this program.

title: App support is terrible.
body: I used the premium app for 2 months, happily paid $39.00. I loved the app. Told family & friends about it. Then it stopped working!! It would not load. I didn’t know what to do, I read one suggestion of deleting the app and reinstalling it, so that is what I did. Unfortunately, even when I signed back in with the same email, all of my info was lost and my premium account is lost! I really don’t care about the past information, I just want my premium account back. I cannot find the customer support page. The app support is just articles. So frustrating!!
response: Thank you for taking the time to review our app! We’re sorry you've experienced an issue with your account. Please contact us in-app directly via "Settings - Need Help" and reference your username so we can assist further. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Convenient
body: Great app to track your food intake, progress, etc.love it!

title: Great app for diabetics.
body: I’m so grateful for this app for a few reasons. Before I get started I’m reviewing the premium version, I had the basic version and I was so impressed by app I went for the full experience. The basic version is still worth checking out though.

title: Stopped working
body: i was using this app for about a week and was finally starting to get the hang of it and like it, but for some reason it stopped letting me add food to my daily meals. I keep getting an error message telling me it could not load that food item. If this isn’t fixed soon I’ll be removing the app.
response: Hi there - we're so sorry for the problem! Please contact us at support@carbmanager.com and we'll help you get this resolved.

title: It’s my diet babysitter!
body: I love this app! In the past, even when I thought I was eating very healthy or cutting a lot of carbs out of my diet. I had no idea how many carbs I was really eating.(1 carb per grape.YIKES!!) This app makes it easy and fun to choose what I eat. Almost like a game to meet my daily goal. I also like how it tells me exactly how much weight I SHOULD loose at the end of the month by the changes I make daily.

title: Save my butt
body: Couldn’t budge the scales and then I found this app. Lost seven pounds in seven days. Then dropped 2 pounds per week for 5 straight weeks. 17 pounds in 6 weeks is making a big difference. Now I just need 25 more.

title: Easy to find foods!
body: I’ve used other apps and a decent percentage of the bar code scans wouldn’t pull up the item. Every bar code scan it’s been in the food list and I’ve found quite a few restaurant meals in here as well. Quite surprised and happy with this app! Crushing this dadbod!

title: Keto Perfection!
body: Anyone doing Keto should have this app.it is so easy to just speak into the program exactly what you ate and have it calculate your macros. Don’t think I could keep track on paper by myself. Thank you for doing the really hard work for me!

title: NOT WORKING/Froze Up
body: I bought this app several days ago and this morning I go to scan some food and it just sits and spins and nothing happens. It’s been this way for over 2.5hrs and I can’t log anything due to the screen being stuck on a spinning circle. I reset my phone. I logged in and back out of the app. NOTHING.

title: This app is already helping me!
body: This is my second update and I am very frustrated. I bought the premium app because it looked like it said $2.50 per month. They charge $32.46 instead for the year. It was an overwhelming app that I didn’t have time to digest due to travel so I went ahead and canceled the premium to go back to the standard membership thinking I would purchase the premium in the future. Instead of putting me back to standard membership they seem to have deleted me altogether! I can see my membership is still there and I still have the app but I cannot get into my account! There is NO LIVE HELP and NO HELP IN REAL TIME.

title: Love this app tremendously!
body: Love this app tremendously! I love that I can enter recipes and copy to My Foods for future use as well as other food items. I love that the app will figure the macros per serving. I only wish the ‘serving size’ section would go beyond ‘g’ and ‘ounce’. It’s hard to figure out serving sizes when recipes do not give you a total number of servings. It could just be me though so any feedback from developers would be great! Today, 4/16/19, I have not been able to enter anything at all due to some issue beyond my understanding. Missing the app’s user friendliness today!!! Thank you for developing this app though!

title: Very Helpful App
body: I love being able to track what I eat. Especially like being able to take a picture of the bar code and have it automatically entered. My problem is figuring out how to enter my recipes. It needs to be more strait forward on how to do that.

title: Not easy to use
body: For some reason this wasn't as easy to use as it says it is, to me. I couldn't get past trying to input breakfast. I ate 4 farm fresh eggs of varying sizes, so for two of them I put in 2 xl eggs which worked well. Well then I typed in "2 large eggs" to the search because I wanted to be consistent and true to size,  and all that came up was "2 large eggs scrambled without cheese or milk"
response: Hi Shippyb! Thanks so much for that honest feedback. There are a lot of features in the app, and we're working to make the navigation more intuitive as one of our core development initiatives right now. As far as the Macros, if you're looking to input custom macros, make sure that you've selected the "Custom %" option. Otherwise, the app will force you into the macros ratio for the diet that you've selected. Let us know if we can help with anything else! - Trever

title: Easy to Use!!!
body: I really like using this app. It breaks down everything for you to use while on the Keto Diet; Carbs, Protein, Fat. So all the micro-nutrients  are broken down for you. I use the bar code scan quite a bit while grocery shopping. I have only had it not recognize 2 different items. This app is great. I have not had to purchase anything. Have logged every single item I have eaten for 7-days. They even have areas built into the app that allows you to read, in order to learn more about the Keto diet. The app must be working, I’ve lost 5+ pounds in the 7 days. YEAH!!!

title: Frustrated
body: Have tried all I know and keeps saying go to carbmanager.com to settings! Trying to get my FitBit synced up with CM seems impossible at this point! Bought Premium and now feeling short changed because of this. I’ve closed out anything with CM and same results...frustrated.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support. We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues syncing your FitBit with Carb Manager. We'd love to offer some personalized assistance to help you connect your device. Please select "Need Help" in-app and reference "ajingle74" so that we can offer you assistance immediately. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Just what I needed!
body: This is the best app I have used to track carbs. It’s easy to add new foods by scanning bar code - my favorite part! And I love being able to link to my Garmin. Definitely worth the money to upgrade to paid subscription.

title: Have to reinstall it every day because it can’t load
body: I am getting tired of having to reinstall this APP every day.
response: Hello from Carb Manager support and thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing an issue with the app. We'd love the opportunity to look into this matter further to ensure the full usage of the application. Our support team is ready, willing, and able to assist you! Please select "Need Help?" in-app and reference the username "Antoninagloria" so that we can help! Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Awesome!!!!
body: This has made  the Keto diet so easy to balance the right amount of carbs ,protein, and fats.Thank you Carb manager this app is easy to use as well! Love it!

title: Awesome
body: Awesome

title: Great keto tracking app
body: UPDATE TO MY UPDATE, now 4 star, evening Feb 5 2019:
response: Thanks for contacting us! I believe we've restored your data. An account is not required to use the app, and you can continue to use it as before. If you need additional assistance, please email us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll get right back to you.

title: Great App! Except it seems I made a mistake!!’
body: When I purchased this

title: Charge me to use my phone?!?!
body: Want me to pay a premium charge to use the features of my phone to track steps?!?!  WTH?  Poor business model when you figure other providers include steps from the phone or watch at no cost!

title: New to Keto
body: Love this app. I just started 2-20-19 and was so confused as to how I was going to calculate and keep track of my macros. This app does it all for me and it has really been easy which surprises me.

title: Great for Keto beginners
body: I needed something to guide me on calculating net carbs and my daily ratio of net carbs, fats, proteins for weight loss. After I created my profile and selected a conservative weight loss of 4lbs a month it calculated my daily net carbs to be 14. I’m a beginner but I think that is crazy low. Still I’m trying to stay under 25 and the app shows me I’m getting way to much protein and not enough fat.
response: Hi there - thanks for the feedback! You can adjust your carb goal using the slider in Settings > Macros -- the app uses a standard 5/25/70 macros split to calculate keto macros based on your target calories. If you'd like to log a repeating food, please select the "Add Every Day" option underneath the green "Add" button in the food view. Please contact us at support@carbmanager.com if you need any assistance. Thanks!

title: A must have!!!
body: I started doing keto just on my own, thinking I could keep track of my carbs. I have quite a bit of food knowledge but I plateaued with my weight loss. I decided to get the app! WHAT A LIFE CHANGER! It’s so easy to use! The vast pr-set food choices are accurate! Also having the bare code scanner is awesome! The recipes and the education on keto is great! I’ve recommended this app to at least 10 friends! If you want to stay on track with weight loss or maintenance, this app is a must have!

title: A bit generic, but easy
body: Free version is generic, you cant customize for your individual needs but makes it easy to track.My only complaint is that it is remarkably challenging to figure out how to change your eating style from the default of keto.

title: Misty P
body: Easy to use. It tracks everything. The bar code reader is a huge help.

title: Not user friendly
body: I had heard that this app was good for tracking a keto diet. I downloaded app and found there wasn’t much to do without subscribing. So I subscribed, paid over $16 for 3 months, and immediately was disappointed. I was trying to find my way around the site and somehow their shared recipe ended up in my meal diary for the day. I tried to erase it and again that was not simple. Then when I went to add my actual meal, I saw that I had to add all the data for every part of my meal... this is understandable, but very frustrating coming from a “free” meal tracking app which can take most of this info just from a bar code or from a data base.
response: Hi there, thanks for the feedback and sorry for any difficulties you've experienced using the app. Please get in touch again with our support team if you haven't heard back yet and we'll help you out right away.

title: Misleading app
body: I purchased the app because it is a family share app and when I purchased premium my spouse could not use it. So after searching and asking Apple support they referred me to your website. I am highly disappointed and feel misled by you. You tout family share and the conditions that go along with it, but you bury the most important part regarding your premium service. Which was the SOLE reason I spent 39.99 on the app, the ability to share!

title: Carb Manager
body: I've only been using the app for a few days but it's already helped me tremendously! You never really know how you're doing unless you track.Love it!

title: Amazing!
body: I am not tech savvy and usually shy away from most things dealing with apps.  However, this was ideal for me counting macros for doing Keto. Super easy and I liked that I could put my meals in for the day and see where I needed to adjust in order to stay within my limits.  Then, I’d just check Carb Manager throughout the day to remind myself what I needed to eat.  Don’t need to purchase the “premium” upgrade yet. A definite must have for anyone wanting to keep track of carbs.

title: bye bye myfitnesspal
body: This is a great app for lchf/keto.  Simple and intuitive - easiest tracking app. I have used. I had been using myfitnesspal which is not user friendly for keto folks.Stumbled upon this app. and was blown away. So user friendly AND a snap to use on my iPhone. (mfp seems best suited for a laptop)

title: BEER & WINE KETO GRADED ‘A.’
body: Get KETO grade fora liter of wine, notice that it is about 95% carb, 25g net to be exact. No protein, no fat. The KETO grade: ‘A,’ which is described as “Keto approved.”
response: Hey, just to follow up, right now the keto grade is based on a standard serving size of the food item, so it would be a wine glass (175mL) in this case, which is about 4.4g net carbs. We'll make that clearer in the app. Thanks for the feedback.

title: Everything is wrong
body: Their app and website NEVER work properly. The links to their terms of service and privacy policy does not work. You click on the page and it’s a broken page or the page says “Oops! Nothing here.” I refuse to pay for something that does not let me read the fine print. Please do not tell me where to find the T&C and Privacy Policies again, considering I obviously know where they are supposed to be located however they are not actually there!
response: Hi there - We're here to help! Please email us at support@wombatapps.com or visit the support center at Settings > Support Center. We respond to requests within 24 hours. I'm not sure why the policies (www.carbmanager.com/terms and www.carbmanager.com/privacy) aren't showing on your end, as they are most definitely up and available. Please get in touch with us directly and we'll figure out what's causing these issues and help get your password reset ASAP. Thanks!

title: Fantastic app! Great tool for changing what you eat.
body: I got this to go Keto. The free version lets you pull from their extensive database to log food, mark favorites, create custom foods, and enter recipes with # of servings. I love the scanner that reads a bar code and pops up the entry.

title: Disappointed with premium
body: I just upgraded to the premium version for two reasons. The first is that I wanted my exercise workouts to sync to my Apple Watch and no matter what I do I cannot get them to sync. The second reason I upgraded is that when I read the information about the premium version it said that when I input information about the food I ate it would sink across my devices so I could input onto my iPad and that would show on my iPhone.  That is absolutely not the case.  For some reason although I have input my user ID and password multiple times on my iPhone and I have logged food on that device  alternate days every time I create the ID it tells me I don’t have an ID or user name but it works fine on my iPad. I am extremely disappointed to have paid 39.99 and the main features I was looking for absolutely do not work and I have no interest in keto recipes I have plenty of cookbooks already so I spent $40 for nothing. The app itself is very good with that pie chart on how much protein carbs and fat you are eating but I suspect that the calorie count is not very accurate it seems rather low.

title: Best App for Tracking Macros
body: I don’t usually write reviews, but recently felt compelled. Last year I used this app for several moths to track carbs while on a Keto diet. Was very pleased. I made great use of the recipes, and on premium, the ability to download online recipes into the app.

title: Carb Manager
body: LOVE LOVE LOVE this app!!!

title: Great tool!
body: CM is fairly user friendly once you play around with it. Still learning new things. Best part is it really puts things in perspective. My hubs and I "thought" we were doing good on keto, but not much weight loss. Started using CM and paying attention (weighing) to how much we were actually eating. Turns out, too much. Within 2 days of using CM we both lost 4-5 lbs. Highly recommend it. Would also suggest a food scale. You can get a very nice digital one on Amazon for under $20. That has also been a critical tool.

title: Great app
body: Just starting using this app pretty straightforward and easy to navigate.Only reason I didn’t give it 5 Stars is some veggies and fresh proteins are difficult to calculate. It will give a blanket rating when you are looking for a fresh organic version. I live right outside of San Francisco yet a majority of the barcodes I scan won’t read. I found it’s mainly organic and fresh foods are not in the database. Still would recommend this app just needs a few tweaks

title: Pleased
body: Honestly this is the only app I’ve ever used for watching what I eat, but I love the fact that I can type in what I’m eating (even if it’s from a restaurant) and it will pop up. The bar code scanning is great too, that way if I can’t find it, or in a rush, it’s 10x easier to just take a quick picture of what I’m eating or drinking. Still trying to get used to watching my carbs because I love pasta and bread so much. I will continue to use this until I reach my weight goal. *also great you can adjust slowly down with the carbs so you’re not quitting cold turkey!

title: 4th review/update - Best Keto app
body: **4th updated review on 07/24/18**
response: Hi Dave, thanks again for the note and detailed feedback. We believe we've made significant progress fixing the two issues you mentioned above. Would you mind contacting us at support@wombatapps.com or via the support center to confirm that these are fixed? If not, we can work with you to figure out the exact problem and ensure a timely fix. Thanks again for using Carb Manager.

title: Simple Yet Effective!
body: I don’t like apps that monitor. I’ve tried them with other areas of my life and I quit or delete after a few days. NOT THIS ONE! Both my trainer and my doctor suggested I monitor my carbs more and stay within 100-150 daily. This app makes it so easy to do with easy input and visual graphs. Takes me seconds per meal. Even though it has lots of other extras I’m slowly getting to, they don’t get in the way of my main objective:counting carbs!

title: A diabetic in love with this app
body: Fortunately still treating my diabetes with pills but the way things have been going insulin injections did not seem far away. Thought I would try the low carb idea and found this app to help. Can’t believe what has happened in the first full week. Lost 3 pounds and my blood sugar has dropped 30 points by watching my carbs. I really hope these levels sustain. Feeling great too. Amazing app!!! Also have come up with new way to catalog foods into food “groups” - edit each new entry with a 2 letter code + a dash and a space so an apple would be (Fr- apple). Fr = fruit. With a lot of foods it seems it will make it easier down the road to find things grouped by a category.

title: Best App
body: This app is awesome and easy to navigate also love how it breaks down my macronutrients which is absolutely great and helps me to keep on track of my golds so I recommend this app to anyone out there.Thanks again for this App.....

title: Awesome
body: Def good for a keto beginner or just in general. Love the scanning bar code option which makes counting macros so easy!

title: Very Useful but...
body: The app has been great thus far but I found that I needed to double check foods that I scanned since the information pulled up at times are inaccurate. It makes it very time consuming when I’m preparing a meal when I have to edit the nutrition list each time.

title: Love and Need This for my Keto Lifestyle
body: I love that this app measures all my macros that I need to keep track of for staying low carb. Too much protein will convert to carbs, so I have to constantly keep that in check if I'm going to stay below 30g of carbs. I allllllmost took a star off bc it took me a second to learn to navigate it- and I got frustrated a time or two- but I'm not sure of a better way to cram in all of the things I love about this app into, well, one app. So because I love this and need this on the reg, I'll give it 5. I haven't even upgraded to the full version and don't think I will ever need to. (Don't get any ideas, CarbManager!)
response: Hi there, thanks for contacting us! We have a simple, $4.99 upgrade option that does not require a subscription and does not renew. This will lift the limit. Please check it out in the Go Premium page. It's the light grey button.

title: Carb diet love
body: Some what ez to work with.thank you for this app

title: Not perfect, but the best I’ve found
body: I downloaded four carb/blood sugar tracking apps to see which might help me log in my foods and track macros (protein, fat, carbs) + net carbs, fiber, blood sugar.  Carb Manager really stood out.  “My Fitness Pal,” which a lot of low-carbers use, had a very limited food database, and doesn’t track fiber/net carbs.  “Stupid Simple” had cute icons, but almost no database.  I don’t recall the fourth, except that the interface was not a good fit.  Carb Manager has an extensive food database.  The only thing I haven’t found in it so far is orange extract.  It lets me save custom foods (like bulletproof coffee) and even recipes—so I can see how many net carbs are in one of the almond flour cookies my daughter has been experimenting with.  Since I liked the food tracking so much, I sprung for the one-year membership ($39.99) so I could add blood sugar and sleep tracking, and food minerals, as well.  It displays data in useful ways—bar graphs, line graphs, pie charts—and ties it together.  It’s not always the most intuitive to use:  I keep losing the sleep entry field (under “Lifestyle”) vs. blood sugar (“My Measurements”—aren’t I measuring sleep?).  And, if my macros look off, 8 have to double check that the right portion size of a food or ingredient registered.  But, it’s easy to edit, and in a week I’ve already brought my fasting blood sugar down 12 points and lost a pound!  Carb Manager is the tool I need to stay on track with my blood sugar health.

title: Carb manager
body: It’s ok if you are just putting in food w/ bar code but can’t put in your own recipe. Not all recipes can be searched on the web? How do you calculate a personally made up recipe for macro amounts? (I have been MFP and while it has its drawbacks, you can create your own recipe. JS) I should think this app could provide that option as well.

title: Net Carbs
response: Hi there, thanks for getting in touch about this, and our sincere apologies for the problem. We had a server outage earlier today. Our engineers have restored service and all systems are up and running again. We are very sorry for the interruption.

title: Cumbersome
body: While I like the feature of Net Carb tracking while I’m on the Keto diet, I think other parts of the app need work.

title: Not smiling
body: Just started to make this new version work, reloaded all my recipes, figured out the charts, thinking okay maybe I can handle this. I am praying you stop updating and...just fix the messes!!! Now I can't get off the home page to use ANY part of this app. It froze up and the little wheel in the middle just keeps spinning!!!! Please make this torture stop!! You have no idea how much I have depended on this app for a long time to help control my diabetes..fix it....different day new problem-now logging food I ate has changed and it won't log fractions-only whole numbers. That whole setup has a new and difficult application. How come every day I find something changed?? STOP SCREWING THIS UP FOR ME !!! No way would I waste money on upgrading..I need an answer..what am I supposed to do ?? It is a new day, and I hung in there to see if kinks were fixed. So far, it seems to do what it should. Hoping nothing changes in the morning🤞. Thanks for responding... 8/25/17...>you just updated this app, and now it is screwed up again..not surprised !!! I have nothing but a blank white screen. Why can you not just leave it alone. It was working fine, and now I have nothing!!!!!!  Here is my review update:: you are too freaking late-I deleted it this morning because it was still crashed !!! Nothing zero dead app and I had so much stuff in there I cannot even believe it. I will not reload that app ever again because you will screw it up with another update😡🖕..................11/15/17..just paid for premium-and you erased everything in my history. All my favorites and recipes, EVERYTHING!!! please put it back or refund my money. I wanted to give this app a chance because it is useful, but not if I have to keep starting all over again !!! Help me please.........now it is 11/17/17, and I don’t think you can help me now. I reloaded this app AGAIN with all my info, and I canceled the auto-renewal of my upgrade. I prefer to use the free version. And not go through this again. I have diabetes, so managing all of this is very helpful to me...fav foods, recipes, weight control, and I don’t want to have to reload all this a third time, or waste anymore money...I will not pay for anymore premium. But gee, thanks for responding..............5/23/18 Latest update—have tried to create an account to preserve my data, but this app will not accept my info. It says this email address has already been taken—YES—BY ME! I am trying to use my own email and password, and this app won’t accept what everyone else on the planet will. Can you tell me why. Have asked for help once, and got nothing
response: Hi there, please contact us at support@wombatapps.com and we'll get that fixed asap! Thanks.

title: Loving this app!
body: Decided to go back on low carb after a few years off and now retired found myself slowly accumulating the pounds. Looked at a few apps that would help me get back into the swing of things easily. This app has it all! So easy to enter foods by text or bar code scanning. Haven't tried the speech recognition yet. The photo option identified almost everything on my plate (chicken leg, cole slaw and grape tomatoes). And they even have most restaurants included. They have delicious recipes and can even customize a meal plan in a few clicks! You can tell it to eliminate certain foods that you may be sensitive to or just don't like. It has gluten free and fodmap free versions! Love that all my Fit-Bit steps and exercises are linked. I used the free version for a few days(while I was prepping for success before I started my new low carb lifestyle) and decided to invest in the paid version because it has so much to offer. Anything is worth it if it makes life easier and helps guarantee success!

title: Easy dieting
body: I love this app because it’s so easy to find the food or scan the bar code and it does the work for you by calculating it so you know exactly where you are for the day!

title: Love it!!!
body: Love this app!!! Makes tracking a breeze! I started the keto diet on 6/18/18, & 9 days later have dropped 13.5lbs with help from this app!! Only complaint (which is the case with most apps), is the pop ups to review & pushing to go premium. I’ll review or go premium when I want to, but that aside is a great app!

title: Waste of time.
body: Gave it 2 stars cause I like the concept. BUT your only able to log 9 items per day.. unless of course you buy the premium upgrade for 39.99. No thanks. See ya.
response: Hi there, thanks for the note! There is a one-time payment option for a small fee that will allow you to log unlimited food items, with no Premium upgrade required. This is brand new -- check it out.

title: Amazing app!
body: Counts carbs but ALSO gives nutritional info, use of recipes preloaded and on the web with THEIR dietary info, can use with Fitbit, and I love that it tracks weight, water intake, sleep, as well as exercise. Lost almost ten pounds in a month.  I am on the plant paradox diet now so not counting carbs but it is still great to know what you are eating. Love that you can scan foods using bar code!

title: Superb carb counter
body: This is a great application.  Really love the food scanner which gets the nutritional information right off the stores food bar code and lets you identify as a favorite food item list for quick recording.  This application has really helped me get control of my diet.

title: I wish
body: I love this app so far. I just wish they would explain to you that in top of paying $39.99 for a year you also have to pay $9.99 for the unlimited entry's of your meals. It's not cute clear. Besides everything is good. I love counting my macros as it makes me more aware of what I'm putting in my body.
response: Hi there, thanks for contacting us! Just to clarify, the Premium subscription includes unlimited logging. If you paid extra, please contact us at support@wombatapps.com for a refund.

title: Easy to use!
body: I got serious this month and have been tracking for over a week now. This app is very easy to use. My requirements were the ability to log my keto foods and amounts, certain brands and restaurants and the pie chart showing macros.

title: Carb Manager
body: This app works really good really like how you are able to scan a UPC code

title: Need to be clearer about Premium/ Free features
body: Updated Review.... 11/1/17
response: Hi there! Sorry for the delay in getting back to you. I think we sent you an email on 11/1 and hopefully we can help resolve any issues you're having. Unlimited logging lets you add unlimited entries to your log, but doesn't include the items listed on the "Go Premium" page as Premium features, which require a subscription.

title: Absolutely INCREDIBLE!
body: My wife has been following a keto diet for a few months, and I have been apprehensive about joining her because A.) I have absolutely no idea what I’m doing and B.) I have terrible eating habits that would require too much thought and effort to break, if I’m being totally honest. This app is absolutely worth $39.99 a year for the premium version. It not only helps me keep track of things—I actually ENJOY using the app to keep track. It is incredibly informative. If it were possible, I would give it 10 stars.

title: Exactly what you need for keto
body: I purchased a different keto app and it was worthless; basically a food diary that tracks fat, protein and carbs. But that’s all it did. The food scanner was worthless and 90% of the food I ate had to be entered manually. Just a lot of work for very little value.

title: Best way to manage my carbs
body: I am an absolute carb lover I love just about anything high in carbs which took a huge toll on me in 2015-2017 where I gained 30lbs and if I count the years before that it would be about a total of 60lbs which is what I’m aiming for at the end of the year aiming for a healthier me. I’ve always been that person with energy and life but it has slowly declined as the weight packed on me a have to do something about it and so far this app is helping keeping track of what I’m putting in my body and when I’m getting to too much. Thanks for such a great app 😘

title: Fab app - love it
body: This app does it all, huge data base of foods (although very repetitive sometimes) options for putting in personal food choices and combos, great tracking graphs, print stats via email. I'd like decimals, but I can work with the choices provided and they keep improving it.

title: Waste!
body: The serving size selection process takes way too long to complete! Makes using this app difficult and cumbersome!

title: Too much detail
body: Good app but way too much detail. Takes too much time to  muddle through all the choices. Then u have to select serving size, oz, servings.... Really, really??? Sorry I don't have the patience.

title: Carb Manager
body: A great tool to keep handy.

title: Love it
body: Love it.... it counts calories too and many other nutrients. Agree w/ suggestion to include longer than a week in graph view. Also food lists need serious consolidation. For customization they should allow PERCENT DV since most labels dont show weights for many nutrients. In spite of these weaknesses i like it alot!

title: Good overall
body: Agree with others that need to be able to edit custom foods and streamline search foods.  Graphs got longer than a week would be nice.

title: Don't Buy!
body: DO NOT BUY! What a wast of time and money.  The graphs are great and the other nutritional info - however it is joke searching for the food items - for example - searching for raw spinach - the first item says Spinach, cooked, fat added in cooking - and scrolling up and down list still didn't find raw spinach - and don't even try to find a rib eye steak - after a couple min I gave up.

title: Carb coiner
body: Need carb calculator

title: Ms
body: Best Diet App ever!!!

title: Great
body: Excellent app

title: Practical
body: Wide variety of items. Would be nice to be able to customize ingredients more widely

title: My review
body: A BIG help that's also a lot of fun to use as it turns out!

title: Easy!
body: Love this ap! Works great and easy to use!

title: Very good app
body: This app is very well done. Easy to use and the information is accessible. I tried many of the carb trackers available. This one is the best.

title: Awesome app
body: This is a very comprehensive app-let's you not only count carbs but ensure your other key nutritional items are also in check.  I use this in conjunction with Dotti's app which has alot of nutritional info for major restaurants.  User interface could be streamlined for less clicks but it is worth it for the info I get. Use it all the time.
